name: No Wrong Answers: Adults Only
description: Wait, there’s no kids reading this, right? GOOD! Because this deck of No Wrong Answers is for Adults Only! Perfect for Happy hours, friend hangs, bachelorette/bachelor parties, or book club (we won't tell if you didn't read the book). This game will get you talking about sex, drinking, bad bosses, pop culture, existential dread and more.

name: Crystalline Toasting Flutes, Set of 2
description: Delicate, elegant, and very festive, this is a set of two flutes for very special occasions. The clear crystal that fills the stems and the faceted clear crystal base of each of these adds an element of romance to any evening - making it a touch more special. Includes a set of 2, each measures 10" x 2.625" x 2.625".

name: Happy Valentine's Day Cookie Cake
description: This classic cookie cake is baked fresh when you order, made using the highest quality ingredients and the results are obvious in every bite. Moist and chewy, this colossal cookie cake is made with real butter, whole eggs, and pure vanilla. Eat your cookie cake with a fork or your fingers, on plates, napkins, or right out of the box. Any way you slice it, our Big Cookie Cakes are still first in flavor. Due to the dough mixing process, all product may have come in contact with nut oils. Kosher certified.

name: Hydro Melt Lip Mask
description: Relax and refresh your lips with this leave-on lip mask enriched with hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, jojoba oil, and shea butter. This silky smooth, ultra-moisturizing lip care product melts into your lips to deliver maximum nourishment and hydration for soft, supple lips all day or night. The mask comes with a spatula for easy application.

name: Fabric Defuzzer
description: Don’t let a little fuzz or pilling make you toss away your favorite sweater or throw blanket. Revive them effortlessly with the Steam & Go Fabric Defuzzer. Use this rechargeable fabric shaver on cashmere, wool, cotton, or any other fabrics you have, and bring new life to your old clothes! It has 30-40 minutes per full charge, and includes a USB Charging Cable.

name: Nano Power Bank with Built-in Foldable USB-C Connector
description: Designed for the ultimate convenience, the Anker Nano Power Bank features a foldable USB-C port for seamless, cable-free charging on the go. It's powered by Anker's PIQ3.0 Technology, offering PD 20W, and Qualcomm QC 18W capabilities, and delivers an impressive 22.5W total output. With its compact dimensions of 3.0 x 1.4 x 1.0 inches, it easily fits into pockets or purses, ready to provide instant charging. Only compatible with Android & iPhone 15+.

name: Best Selling Single Nail Polish
description: A collection of Pure Polishes designed to complement every skin tone. Each bottle is long-wearing, 8-free, vegan-friendly, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and made in the USA. Application is made easy with highly pigmented colors, just 1-2 coats needed. Includes one polish, choice of color.

name: Everyday SPF Faves Kit
description: This kit has 4 SPF bestsellers in TSA-approved travel sizes that provide skincare & beauty benefits while protecting against UV rays. This gift includes Unseen Sunscreen SPF 40 (0.68 fl oz), Glowscreen SPF 40 in Sunrise (0.68 fl oz), Glow Stick SPF 50 (0.70 oz), (Re)setting Refreshing Mist SPF 40 (1 fl oz), and a Travel Bag measuring 4 in x 3 in x 8 in.

name: LARQ Bottle Movement PureVi, 32 oz
description: The LARQ Bottle Movement PureVis™ actively self-cleans and improves water quality in a lightweight single-walled stainless steel build–perfect for outdoor adventures, going to the gym, or whatever moves you. It uses PureVis™ technology to neutralize up to 99%* of E.coli from your water and bottle.

name: Crystal Ear Seed Kit
description: Ear seeds carry a deep legacy in Chinese Medicine as a tool used to reduce stress, relieve pain, restore hormonal balance and more. Place these tiny adhesive beads on various points to stimulate relief and promote healing. Remove seeds after 3-5 days and reapply weekly. This kit includes 20 Swarovski Crystal Ear Seeds, 20 Gold Ear Seeds, Gold WTHN Tweezers, 100% latex free medical grade adhesive, and a How-To Guide.

name: EvolutionX Cordless 4-in-1 Wine Opener
description: Everything you need to maximize your wine enjoyment is right here. Complete cordless convenience makes opening bottles easier than ever. The Cuisinart EvolutionX Cordless Rechargeable Wine Center opens up to 50 bottles on a single charge. The foil cutter neatly removes foil seals. Use the aerator to bring out the wine’s full flavor, and the preserver to retain freshness. To recharge, simply plug the USB cable into the port. Quick. Easy. Exceptional.

name: 3 Months Alo Moves
description: Unlock wellness wherever you are with Alo Moves. Find what moves you with instant access to thousands of classes from top trainers, including styles like yoga, Pilates, barre, strength, HIIT, walking, meditations, self-care, and more. Improve your sleep, boost your energy, and feel more productive during your day when you include Alo Moves in your routine.

name: DeathAdder V3 Ultra-lightweight Ergonomic Esports Mouse
description: With the Razer DeathAdder V3, victory takes on a new shape. Refined and reforged with the aid of top esports pros, its iconic ergonomic form is now more than 25% lighter than its predecessor, backed by a set of cutting-edge upgrades to push the limits of competitive play.

name: JuiceBalm Tinted Lip Balm
description: Formulated with a nourishing shea butter base, each shade is made with good-for-you ingredients derived from fresh produce like mango seed oil, vitamin E, and vitamin C. This soft, cushiony balm glides on lips and gives the perfect dewy sheen.

name: PowerDrive 2 Alloy Car Charger
description: PowerDrive 2 Alloy is a ultra-compact mini 24W car charger that fits flush to your dashboard, so you won't even notice it's there. Hit the road with twin USB-A charging ports equipped with Anker’s world-famous PowerIQ technology.

name: Vibrance
description: Cheery sunflowers are accented with the coolness of silver dollar eucalyptus, plus a pop of purple to top it off. Includes 12 mixed stems, vase not included.

name: Aria V-Neck Cashmere Sweater
description: Introducing a forever chic style knit in luxuriously soft cashmere. Aria features a classic plunging v-neckline, relaxed silhouette, raglan sleeves, and ribbed trim finish.

name: Wolf by Tyler, The Creator
description: Long out of print on vinyl, Tyler, The Creator’s classic album Wolf finally receives an official repress. The album is pressed on two pink-colored LPs in a gatefold jacket with printed inner sleeves and a 12”x 12” insert.

name: Organic Cotton Tote
description: Kindhumans donates 3% of your gift to a nonprofit of your choice. This 100% organic cotton carry-all is perfect for grabbing groceries, running errands, or hitting the beach. Added bonus: Extra-long handles allow more wriggle room to carry multiple bags on your shoulder. All seams and stress points are double stitched for durability, so load ‘er up. And unlike bulkier bags, this tote folds flat to fit tight spots. Measures 14" x 14" x 7".

name: Evening Unwind Loose Leaf Tea Essentials
description: Reach for a cup of tea in the evening instead of a glass of wine, and feel the difference. Each herbal tea in this collection is created with real plants and botanicals and zero added flavorings or sugars. Rest, digest, and drift off to dream with a little help from nature. Bundled with Firebelly's beloved Tea Strainer with resting cup for simple steeping that's stylish, effective, and doesn't make a mess.

name: GoPro MAX 360 Degree Action Camera, Black
description: Capture quality videos and photos with this GoPro MAX 360 action camera. The 1600 mAh rechargeable Li Ion battery ensures uninterrupted use, while the intuitive touch screen allows for seamless operation. This GoPro MAX 360 action camera features Wi-Fi connectivity for easy content sharing, and the water resistance up to 16 feet enables safe use in wet conditions.

name: 2 Piece Spoon Set
description: Use the Ultimate spoon to cook a sauce and perfectly drain and plate your pasta of choice with the Ultimate Perforated Spoon. Choice of set color.

name: Women's BlanketBlend Hoodie
description: The Softest Hoodie Ever. This custom developed BlanketBlend fabric combines the comfort of cotton, with the performance features of polyester finished off with a rare yarn & ButterWash process to create a super soft, durable hoodie for every occasion.

name: Small Leather Catchall
description: Perfect to catch keys, as a base to a candle, store gadgets and more. A functional and beautiful catchall tray, made of natural tanned leather with molded sides. It measures 7.5 x 9.

name: Titleist Hybrid 14 Stand Bag in Black
description: The new Titleist Hybrid Collection bags are distinctly designed for every way you play, whether you ride, carry, push or pull. The Hybrid 14, with 14 full-length club dividers, is cart-friendly, with premium comfort and upgraded organization. It features an integrated cart strap tunnel for easy access, a premium double strap, and 9 total pockets, including double apparel pockets and external water bottle pockets.

name: Make & Take Lunch Box
description: Let's do lunch! This bento-inspired lunch box keeps food crisp, fresh, and separate for the ultimate to-go meal, making it the ideal companion for everything from weekday commutes to summer picnics. Stylish, bento box design features 3 separate compartments with enough space for sandwiches, salads, fruits, veggies or snacks. Roomy, 4-cup bowl is perfect for large salads and grain bowls, while the 2-cup tray holds chips, sandwiches, or fruit; tray divider keeps snacks and sides separate.

name: 3 Months Classique
description: Choose any 1 item each month from thousands of luxury accessories. This three month membership allows you to choose 1 piece of jewelry or bag each month for three months, with a retail value up to $4,000. A Vivrelle digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address you provide within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription on Vivrelle's website.

name: Bamboo Salad Plate Set
description: From snacktime to dinnertime, from outdoor hangs to your kitchen table, Poketo bamboo tableware is there for every delicious occasion. These Bamboo Salad Plates are made from certified organic bamboo fiber and cornstarch. Durable with a smooth, modern look, they can be used over and over for your favorite moments of the day. They measure 7.85" in diameter and are dishwasher safe. Includes a set of 4.

name: Natural Deodorant Cream
description: Been trying natural deodorants but haven’t found “the one” yet? Hi. This is the one. PiperWai's original Natural Deodorant Cream has a creamy paste-like consistency that you rub in with your hands. This activated charcoal deodorant is formulated with clean ingredients that melt into your armpits, absorb moisture and provide long-lasting odor protection. Did we mention it's also aluminum-free, vegan, and cruelty-free?

name: Moments Candle, 7.5oz
description: Be transported to a moment you love with a natural soy wax blend scented candle. Find a candle that takes you back to that special memory. With a burn time of 30 hours, these candles are non-toxic, contain no lead, plastics, paraben, or phtalates. Includes one 7.5 oz candle.

name: Rose Cardamom, Single Bar
description: To make this bar, Tanzanian cacao is gently steamed over rose petals and cardamom, conjuring a luscious and dreamy floral bar. Includes one 1.8 oz bar.

name: Brightland Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: These olives are sourced from a family-run California farm and cold-pressed by a master miller within 90 minutes of harvest for freshness and flavor. Choose either robust Awake for roasting or sautéing, or smooth Alive for Salads, hummus, and bread.

name: Monogrammed Leather Circle Coasters, Set of 4
description: Personalized barware adds a touch of class to any occasion. This cool coaster set is made of high quality full-grain genuine leather and includes your choice of monogram inscription and choice of leather color. Measures 4" in diameter. Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted, 3 character limit.

name: Sending Love Gift Box 25 Pack
description: Let them know you’re thinking of them with treats guaranteed to make them smile. Enjoy Baked By Melissa's most loved assortment, all wrapped up in a beautiful tie-dye gift box with a ‘Sending Love’ sleeve! Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats.

name: Inspire 2
description: Fitbit Inspire 2 is an easy-to-use fitness tracker packs 24/7 heart rate, Active Zone Minutes, activity and sleep tracking, up to 10 days of battery and more--paired with step-by-step fitness & nutrition programs, personalized insights, and sleep tools, you will have all you need for a healthier lifestyle.

name: 1 Year Subscription
description: Whether you are a student, professional, or lifelong learner, Brilliant Worldwide has the tools and exercises to keep your mind growing in whatever area you choose to focus. A Brilliant Worldwide digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. No expiration date.

name: Butcher’s Choice Box
description: The Butcher’s Choice Box features the founders handpicked selection of the cuts they love to cook year round. You’ll enjoy pasture-raised essentials, plus a rotating selection of their tastiest, seasonally appropriate favorites. Each box includes 2 Dry Aged Steaks (either Strips or Ribeyes), 2 Sirloin Filets, 2 Pork Chops, 1 lb of Dry Aged Ground Beef and 1 lb of Pork Bacon. Additionally included is an assortment that changes each month, like 2 lbs of Short Ribs and 1 lb of Kielbasa, or a Half Pork Butt and 2 lbs of Brats. And don’t worry, they’ll only send cuts anyone can make in the kitchen, no meat smoker necessary (unless that’s how you roll!). Note: due to the holiday season orders will begin shipping in early January.

name: Color of Change Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Color of Change designs campaigns powerful enough to end practices that unfairly hold Black people back, & champion solutions that move us all forward.

name: Passenger Travel Carrier
description: Bring your favorite travel buddy wherever, and however, you roam in Diggs' five-star crash test rated Passenger Travel Carrier. By plane, train, car, or foot, Passenger is a safe and comfortable way to transport your furry BFF. It’s the first travel carrier designed for quick and clean waste management on the go. Recommended for use with dogs and cats up to 18 lbs. Weighs 4.5lbs and measures 20" x 10.8" x 11.5".

name: Woody Fragrance Classic Candle Bundle
description: Discover Apotheke's four best-selling woody scents. This set features Charcoal, Hinoki Lavender, Santal Rock Rose and White Vetiver. Made with a premium soy wax blend and essential and perfume-grade fragrance oils, these luxury scented candles are designed to provide a clean-burning and exceptional scent experience. The four Classic Candles are featured in white translucent glass vessels with a velvety-smooth luxe matte finish enhancing any space with a modern and timeless design. Includes four candles, each with approximately 60-70 hours burn time.

name: Premium Vegan Gift Box
description: Bunny James Premium Vegan Box is a collection of 20 individually wrapped healthy vegan protein rich snacks. It includes 1 Lesser Evil Paleo Puffs (1 oz.), 1 Munk Pack Protein Cookie (2.96 oz.), 1 Mamma Chia Vitality Energy Chia Squeeze (3.5 oz.), 1 GFB The Gluten Free Bar (2.05 oz.), 1 Sweet Nothings Oatmeal Raisin and Peanut Butter Nut Butter Bites (1.40 oz.), 1 Beanfields Grain Free Cracklins (1 oz.), 1 Whoa Dough Chocolate Chip (1.60 oz.), 1 Kapop Ancient Grain Popped Chips (1 oz.), 1 BEAR Real Fruit YoYos - Raspberry (.70 oz.), 1 BTR Peanut Butter Bliss (1.23 oz.), 1 88 Acres Dark Chocolate Sea Salt, Seed Bar (1.6oz), 1 Ripple Plant Based Original Milk (8.00oz), 1 Bobo’s Bites **Lemon Poppyseed** (1.30 oz.), 1 Rule Breaker Chocolate Chunk Blondie Bites (4oz.), 1 Jana Banana Green Banana Bar (1.06 oz), 1 Siren Snacks Birthday Cake Bites (1.9 oz.), 1 Yes Bar - Salted Maple Pecan (1.4 oz.), 2 Natures Bakery Whole Wheat Fig Bars (2 oz.), and 1 Primal Strips Meatless Vegan Jerky (1 oz.).

name: Vintage Flashlight
description: Convenient everyday LED flashlight with a nod towards its vintage cousin. Cage styling with hammertone style texture paint gives a classic look with modern appeal. An additional hook on the bottom makes it easy to hang at eye level in the garage or tent. Perfectly sized to fit in your hand. Throw it in your bag or car for emergencies, or pack it while camping or hiking. Runs for 15 hours on low, 1.5 hours on high with a recharge time of 3-4 hours.

name: The Original Crumbs Bakeshop 12 Pack Classic Cupcakes
description: The crowd favorites, the MVPs. These signature cupcakes are sure to satisfy. Includes 12 cupcakes, each about 3 oz. Crumbs donates all of their leftovers each day to NYC food banks.

name: The Jessie Dragon Tree Plant
description: The Jessie is a Dracaena Janet Craig Plant, also known as a "Dragon Tree." She makes a great addition to your home or office (or home office!). This plant comes in a 4" nursery pot. Please note: as plants are a live product, colors and varieties may slightly vary from the photos shown to provide you with the freshest and most beautiful plant.

name: Cast Iron Care Kit
description: You'll hear a lot of opinions about cleaning cast iron. Regardless of your position on using dish soap for the final act, it's a no-brainer that any food bits that did manage to stick to your cookware need to come off. This combo has your care bases covered, a stiff natural bristle brush should do the trick; if not, a trusty chain mail scrubber can handle the rest.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig, Large
description: This plant is kind of a big deal. You've probably seen it while scrolling through your IG feed or on the cover of Architectural Digest. The vibrant venation, color, and shape of its leaves are what threw it into the spotlight. It's notorious for being dramatic at times, but hey, it ain't easy being famous. Bright indirect mixed light with direct exposure is ideal. Measures ~4' tall and comes in a 10" grow pot.

name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Donate to the world's leading children's hospital. Your donation will help St. Jude provide treatment for the toughest childhood cancers and pediatric diseases.

name: Oyster Shucker
description: Though it’s perfect for shucking all types of oysters, this Massachusetts-made Oyster Shucker features a straight blade design typical for New England oysters. This chef-favorite Oyster Shucker is designed to fit perfectly into the oyster’s hinge and open with ease. Featuring a Walnut Wood handle to help you keep a steady and comfortable grip with a razor sharp 420HC High Carbon Stainless Steel Blade, this Shucker helps you enjoy oysters at their freshest.

name: 50G Gift Set, Roe Bites + Crème Fraîche
description: Includes a 50G tin in a custom wooden presentation box, one mother of pearl caviar spoon, 12 bite size potato pancakes and Bellwether Farms crème fraîche for serving plus a key to open.

name: Soothing Sherpa Robe
description: This super-soft sherpa robe makes mornings less, well, morning-y. It's a fact. Now imagine what kind of magic it can do at night. It has pockets, too. Made of 100% polyester with a relaxed fit and tie at the waste.

name: Lightweight Moisturizer
description: Quench thirsty skin with this gel-like daily moisturizer. The flash-absorbing formula features skin brightening vitamin C and E, tripeptide-5, and hyaluronic acid to create a firmer, smoother complexion. This hydrating lotion is unscented and fragrance-free with a healthy, matte finish. The bottle holds 2 fl oz / 60 ml.

name: Jewel Garden
description: The Jewel Garden will put a smile on anyone's face and bring a touch of nature to any small space.

name: Love Socks
description: In support of Breast Cancer Research, for each pair of socks sold, NAKEDCASHMERE will be donating $25 to the Breast Cancer Research Foundation. Indulge in the softest cashmere socks. Complete with a sweet white heart embroidery accent on the side of each sock.

name: Branded 14 oz Rambler Mug
description: Stackable for compact storage and insulated for hot brews. The rambler mug comes with the YETI MagSlider Lid, the only drink lid that uses the power of magnets to keep your favorite drink on lock. Engraved with your logo front and center.

name: Plush Macaron Squeaky Dog Toy
description: This fun and adorable design comes in a cute box with 3 adorable plush macaron toys. You easily can fit them all back into the box after each play. Perfect for fetching, snuggling or playing.

name: Men's Cotton Fisherman Sweater, Navy
description: Jenni Kayne's best-selling Cotton Fisherman Sweater. Lightweight and breathable with added length and ribbed edge detailing, it’s destined to become your new everyday staple. Made of 100% cotton.

name: Cricut Maker 3
description: This is the ultimate smart cutting machine. With lots more compatible materials and tools than our other cutting machines, you'll be amazed by what's possible. Blow minds with big banners, engraved metal, debossed leather, and so much more. Plus, bust out popular projects like custom cards, T-shirts & full-color stickers. No design experience required.

name: Premium Down Alternative Pillow, Standard
description: A hypoallergenic alternative with the support and loft of luxury down. Wake up feeling fully rested. Available in two densities for whatever your best night of sleep requires.

name: College Town Candle
description: Smells like school spirit with scents inspired by your favorite alma mater. Enjoy this 13.75oz college candle with a burn time of 60-80 hours.

name: Sterling Silver Birth Flower Bolo Bracelet
description: Everyone has a special flower associated with their birth month. Thanks to this adjustable bolo bracelet, you can take that gorgeous bloom everywhere you go! Available in all twelve birth flowers in silver tones, it's made with sterling silver, is adjustable up to 8" in length, and has a 0.75" charm where one size fits most.

name: Lightweight Cotton Cashmere Cardigan
description: You found it, the light layer you’ll carry with you everywhere. Extra-soft, lightweight, and breathable, this cotton cardigan is blended with a touch of cashmere for that extra bit of cozy. As essential as your wallet and keys when you leave the house, it’s just right anytime there’s a slight chill or breeze.

name: Wi-Fi Enabled 360 Reality Audio Speaker
description: Curled up on the sofa with a good book or cooking up a storm in the kitchen, ambient room-filling sound provides the perfect musical backdrop, enjoy the experience anywhere in your home with this compact wireless speaker. Like the background music in your favorite café, ambient room-filling sound is calm and unobtrusive, with sound diffused both horizontally and vertically to create just the right atmosphere anywhere in your home. Immersive Audio Enhancement, a unique Sony algorithm, effectively delivers your favorite stereo tracks as ambient room-filling sound.

name: Black Girls Code Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation creates new opportunities for girls and gender nonconforming youth of color to have a daring impact on tech. When they succeed, we all succeed.

name: The Outdoor Core Set
description: Made from natural, plant-based materials, The Outdoor Core Set is plastic-free, while being super durable (and even microwave-safe). Featuring 16 refined, minimalist pieces, including big bowls, small bowls, big plates, and small plates, it has everything you need for your years and days outside.

name: Polarized Aviator Classic
description: Ray-Ban RB3025 Aviator sunglasses encompass the shape that started it all. The Ray-Ban Aviator is the brand staple originally designed for the U.S. military fighter pilots in 1937. Ray-Ban Aviator sunglasses have a timeless look with the unmistakable teardrop shaped lenses. This style allowed the Aviator to quickly spread beyond its utility, becoming popular among celebrities, rock stars, and citizens of the world alike. Choice of black or gold frame.

name: Architecture Taj Mahal
description: Whether you have been lucky enough to visit the Taj Mahal yourself and want a special souvenir of the experience, dream of visiting one day or just appreciate elegant buildings, this LEGO Architecture Landmarks Collection set (21056) is ideal for you. Wondrous details This inspiring, hands-on challenge to enjoy in your spare time lets you recreate a symbol of eternal love and an architectural wonder of the world in LEGO style.

name: Skinny Tumbler with Straw in Glossy Finish, 20oz
description: This personalized skinny tumbler keeps your drinks hot for 12h and cold for 24h, making them the perfect sipping companion all year round. With 20oz capacity, this tumbler comes in a glossy finish, and feature a tapered shape with a slim design for effortless carriage.

name: amfAR Donation
description: The gift of giving! amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research, is one of the world's leading nonprofit organizations dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education, and advocacy.

name: White Truffle Hot Sauce
description: TRUFF's White Hot Sauce is a curated blend of ripe chili peppers, organic agave nectar, white truffle, and a hint of organic coriander.

name: Second Harvest Food Bank Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps distribute food through a network of nearly 400 partners at more than 900 sites across Santa Clara and San Mateo counties.

name: Chocolate Covered Fruit Box
description: This gift box is bursting at the edges with a delicious assortment of chocolate covered fruit and chocolate dipped fruits from the Orchards of California. With a design featuring a cursive Compartés logo on a chic spring orchard scene with white rose, fresh fruits and wild birds, clients and loved ones will delight upon opening it with treasures of chocolate fruit inside.

name: Sauce Bundle 4 Pack
description: No reservations needed. Fresh Ingredients consume you, aroma resonates, that is the experience that erupts when you crack open any jar of Carbone sauces. Choose which one to delight in tonight! Includes a pack of 4.

name: Natural Premium Bamboo King Duvet Cover
description: A breathable, anti-sweat and oh-so-soft duvet cover made of 100% viscose from bamboo. Includes one king sized duvet cover, choice of color.

name: Nodpod® SILK
description: The beauty benefits of premium silk. Nodpod's award winning strap-free design equally distributes the power of deep-touch pressure across key pressure points to help calm overactive minds, soothe headaches and help you sink into deep restful sleep.

name: UNICEF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to UNICEF USA helps ensure the world’s most vulnerable children get the nutrition, water, protection, education and health care they need to survive and thrive.

name: Disney Micky Pants & Minnie Skirt Double Wall Espresso Glasses
description: The Disney Mickey Pants and Minnie Skirt double wall glasses will make any fan smile! Each glass holds 2 oz, is double walled insulated, and fits under an espresso machine.

name: Monogrammed Passport Case
description: This durable case lets you keep your passport, cash, ID and most important cards organized and secure. It's perfect for both travel and everyday use.

name: Callaway 2022 Chrome Soft Golf Balls White
description: Precision Technology delivers consistently fast ball speeds, tight dispersion, and consistent performance. A new Hyper Elastic SoftFast Core delivers more distance, forgiveness, and incredible feel through the bag. Color: white and includes a dozen.

name: Ready To Use Bundle
description: Cleaning delicates made easy with this Ready-To-Use Bundle. Clean and condition materials like suede and nubuck with Jason Markk's favorite delicate essentials. The Ready-To-Use Bundle includes a 7oz RTU Foam, Premium Brush, and Microfiber Towel.

name: Men's Golf Ankle Sock 3-Pack
description: Midweight purpose-built socks with strategic zone cushioning for all-day comfort on the links. Thermoregulation helps your feet breathe, and moisture-wicking keeps sweat away from your body. Made with a proprietary cotton-poly yarn blend that performs but feels natural. There's also a mesh under-toe ventilation zone, an area where feet tend to overheat the most.

name: Everyday SPF PLAY Kit
description: A travel-ready kit of water- & sweat-resistant sunscreen for sport & active days, with four SPF favorites for face, body & lips, plus an on-the-go bag! This gift includes Watery Lotion SPF 50, PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50, PLAY Antioxidant Body Mist SPF 50, PLAY Lip Shield SPF 30 Coconut, and a Travel Bag measuring 4 in x 3 in x 8 in.PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50, PLAY Antioxidant Body Mist SPF 50, PLAY Lip Shield SPF 30 Coconut, and a Travel Bag measuring 4 in x 3 in x 8 in.

name: Notebook
description: Guided notebooks designed by therapists. Choice of notebook.

name: Drunk on Love
description: Margot Noble needs some relief from the stress of running the family winery with her brother. Enter Luke: sexy, charming, and best of all in the too-small world of Napa, a stranger. The chemistry between them is undeniable, and Margot is delighted that she lucked into the perfect one-night stand she'll never have to see again. That is, until the winery's newest hire, Luke, walks in the next morning. Margot is determined to keep things purely professional, but when their every interaction reminds her of the attraction still bubbling between them, it proves to be much more challenging than she expects.

name: Classic Confetti Cake
description: Cue the confetti! This treat is perfect for a party and consists of fluffy confetti cake layers and creamy vanilla frosting, and is finished with colorful confetti sprinkles. Serves 6 to 8, and measures 7 inches in diameter.

name: NAACP Donation
description: The gift of giving! NAACP’s mission is to ensure the political, educational, equality of minority group citizens of States and eliminate race prejudice.

name: Thinking of You Gift Box 25 Count
description: Let them know you’re thinking of them with treats guaranteed to make them smile. 25 of the latest and greatest flavors all wrapped up in a beautiful tie-dye gift box with a 'Thinking of You' sleeve. Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats.

name: Levain Bakery 12 Pack
description: Choose between Chocolate Chip Walnut, Two Chip Chocolate Chip, Dark Chocolate Chocolate Chip, Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip, Oatmeal Raisin or a variety pack.

name: 3x3 Inch Tattoo
description: Selects your choice of 3x3 inch tattoo. Each tattoo is designed by one of Inkbox's talented artists and lasts 1-2 weeks.

name: Planned Parenthood Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps protect and restore access to sexual and reproductive health care, including abortion.

name: Uber Appliance Air Fryer XL Deluxe
description: The Uber Air Fryer XL is one of the best air fryers on the market, perfect for any household with its roomy 5 quart basket, you can air fry a whole chicken. Features an easy to use touch display for temperature and time setting with temperatures ranging from 150F to 400F, as well as several pre-set cooking temperatures. The odorless air fryer provides a higher quality air fryer taste.

name: Napa Sunset
description: A whimsical design featuring apricot, wine, and golden blooms, accented with wild garden greenery. Includes premium flowers, glass vase, and fresh hand delivery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Toys for Tots Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to Toys for Tots helps provide toys, books and other gifts to less fortunate children this holiday season.

name: Self-Inflating Camp Sleep Pad and Pillow
description: Foam and air combine for a luxury snoozing experience in your favorite tent. This open-cell foam sleeping pad and camp pillow self inflate to a 3-inch thickness that provides ample comfort, with a sueded polyester coating up top that feels great with or without a sheet or pillowcase. On the bottom you've got an anti-skid texture to keep things in place on uneven ground or slippery tent floors, and the whole thing rolls up for easy storage and transport.

name: TRX Strength Band, 25-50lb
description: Add light intensity to your training or make a move more manageable, from banded squats and bench presses to pull-up assistance, with the help of the 25–50 lb. TRX Strength band.

name: ATLP120XBT Bluetooth Stereo Turntable
description: Play your favorite records with this Audio-Technica wireless turntable. Bluetooth technology lets you pair speakers or headphones for a wireless listening experience, while the RCA cable connects to your home stereo for high-quality sound. This Audio-Technica wireless turntable has a DC servo direct-drive motor and an adjustable anti-skate control to play 33 1/3, 45 and 78 rpm records smoothly.

name: Vital Body Wash
description: Step up your shower game with the Vital Body Wash, an energizing, body-acne clearing emulsion. The active lather uses natural, non-stripping ingredients like Green Tea and Sea Buckthorn to deeply cleanse, tackle breakouts, and combat body odor. The invigorating woody fragrance blend will make your skin smell as good as it looks.

name: MYST Ultrasonic Humidifier
description: With an essential oil diffuser, cool and warm mists, and an ultra-silent design, MYST will help keep your house comfortable and moist like a greenhouse throughout the year. The new generation ultrasonic humidifier for asthmatics, allergies, and sinusitis is here! MIKO’s MYST is the perfect humidifier for bedrooms, home offices, and small apartments. Perfect for bedrooms and home offices, it covers up to 540 sq ft.

name: Lightweight Textured Throw Blanket
description: Soft, airy, and woven, the Lightweight Textured Throw Blanket is also versatile, perfect for decorating your living spaces or layering it on your bed. Suitable for use all year round, wrap it around yourself for just that extra bit of cozy. Made of 100% cotton, blanket measures 70" x 50".

name: PowerPort Fast Charger and USB-C to 6ft Cable
description: Power up to two devices simultaneously with this Anker PowerPort Atom III charger. The USB-C cable lets you charge and sync compatible smartphones and laptops easily and is 6 feet long to support device use while charging. This Anker PowerPort Atom III charger is compact to slip easily into a bag or briefcase.

name: Cupcake Baby Bundle
description: Celebrate the new mom or mom-to-be in the best way possible with cupcakes made of baby essentials that are practical and oh-so-adorable! Includes 1 pair of socks, and 1 cotton flannel receiving blanket (30x30 inch). Arrives in a clear box topped with a bow.

name: Set of 3 Pickleballs
description: A Pickleball necessity! A single set comes with three balls to get you and your friends started. These balls are durable and meant to last and available in their signature green/orange enhancing visibility. 1 Set is 3 balls w/ 40 holes each.

name: Private DJ Lesson for One, San Francisco, CA
description: Want the power to make people move on the dance floor? Learn how to drop the beat that will make it happen with a Private DJ Lesson from a Studio that has been featured on ABC News and Entertainment Weekly, and whose instructors have produced tracks sold on Beatport! Lessons are completely customizable to your skill and comfort level while you learn equipment set-up, music theory, mixing multiple songs, music selection, sampling, beat matching and more! Includes an experience for one.

name: Blackwater Outdoor Mini Bluetooth Speaker
description: Add your soundtrack to any adventure with the Blackwater Bluetooth outdoor speakers. This IPX6-certified waterproof speaker takes any hiking trip head-on. Its compact size along with the included carabiner clip & micro USB charging cable, make it the ideal companion for listening to your favorite tunes while exploring. Bluetooth working range - 33 ft, 2 hours of music at max volume.

name: Celebrating LGBTQ+ Founded Brands
description: Shop our curated selection of LGBTQ+ founded brands.

name: Beloved
description: By Toni Morrison. Sethe, its protagonist, was born a slave and escaped to Ohio, but eighteen years later she is still not free. She has too many memories of Sweet Home, the beautiful farm where so many hideous things happened. And Sethe’s new home is haunted by the ghost of her baby, who died nameless and whose tombstone is engraved with a single word: Beloved.

name: Oil and Vinegar Serving Set with Oak Stoppers
description: The Oil + Vinegar glass bottle set is the perfect addition to your table glassware. Use for vinegar and oil, a single serving of wine, milk for your coffee or juices, or flights of wine! Made with hand blown glass and features a solid oak stopper in each bottle. Lead free and dishwasher safe and will not cloud or discolor over time. Each measures 7 3/4" tall and holds 10 1/8 ounces.

name: Love You Candle
description: Share the love with a candle that'll win their heart (but not more than you, of course). This Driftwood and Mahogany scent is a warm embrace of rich woods, complemented by hints of lavender and geranium for a touch of floral magic. Let this full-bodied fragrance turn any space into a cozy and intimate retreat that both of you will adore! Includes one 9 oz candle made of a vegan soy wax blend, with a 40 hour burn time.

name: Apple Watch Band, Universal Fit
description: Machete Apple Watch Bands are beloved by fashion editors world wide. Made of Italian Acetate with hypoallergenic Stainless Steel hardware. Watch bands measure 8.75" and can be sized down at a local jeweler if needed.

name: Shantell Martin x Whitney Museum Pride Playing Cards, 1 Pack
description: A holographic foil limited edition presented in collaboration with the Whitney Museum of American Art, with a portion of proceeds benefitting The Trevor Project and the ACLU. Shantell Martin Playing Cards feature a fully custom design inside and out, exhibiting her wonderfully crafted storytelling at every inch. The cards themselves are carefully framed in canvas-textured, blind embossed paper with holographic, rainbow reflective foil. Includes 1 deck.

name: Boxing Trackers and Bag
description: For those who want a boxing bag. Get the essentials you need to start your FightCamp journey, plus the best free-standing bag on the market. Track your progress, compete against others, and access on-demand workouts. As an exclusive perk with Goody, FightCamp is also including two free months of membership. Details of membership included with shipment. Kit includes trackers, quick wraps, and boxing bag.

name: El Camino
description: If you enjoy walking the course but still ride a cart from time to time, or you don't use all 14 clubs and prefer to keep it light, then this golf bag is for you. Weighing in at 3.9 lbs and with the ability to fit up to 10 clubs, the El Camino is the ultimate lightweight golf bag versatile enough for any style of golf!

name: Personalized Hip Flask
description: Add your initials to the front of this beautiful, personalized hip flask. The matte black exterior with stainless steel contrast gives an amazing finish. Holds 7 oz of your finest beverage. Please allow up to 10 business days for personalized gifts to deliver.

name: Indulge Box
description: Includes a 125G tin in a custom wooden presentation box, two mother of pearl caviar spoons, and a key to open.

name: Baby2Baby Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide children living in poverty across the country with diapers, clothing and all the basic necessities that every child deserves.

name: Wild Cocoa Luxury Chocolate Gift Box
description: Known as the world's best chocolates, make an impression with a gift box unlike any other, adorned with wild animals and florals and featuring 16 of Compartés' most popular chocolates inside. These chocolates are sure to make an impression!

name: Yuzu Matcha
description: Golde blended real Japanese yuzu with ceremonial grade matcha for a squeeze of fresh citrus flavor. It’s bright, zesty, + perfect for summertime sips. Each pouch comes with a limited-edition Golde branded teaspoon.

name: Toni Morrison Book Bundle, Beloved + The Bluest Eye
description: Toni Morrison is an eternal inspiring and elevating force. Unabashedly Black, woman, brilliant, beautiful, and strong. The Bluest Eye, published in 1970, takes place in Lorain, Ohio, and tells the story of a young African-American girl named Pecola who grew up following the Great Depression. Beloved is a 1987 novel set after the American Civil War, it tells the story of a family of formerly enslaved people whose Cincinnati home is haunted by a malevolent spirit.

name: 3 Pack
description: The best part of a Sundae Cone now available as a bite-sized snack! GMO-Free and Kosher UD Certified, and stored in a resealable bag, choose which flavor you want or try them all in the variety pack!

name: Heartfelt Hot Cocoa Gift
description: Your Valentine will be lovestruck once they try this tempting selection of sweets. This alluring gift includes two indulgent hot cocoa bombs, two festive brownies, six pink foil-wrapped chocolate hearts, four chocolate-dipped pretzels, and two decorated heart cookies.

name: Levain Bakery 4 Pack
description: Choose between Chocolate Chip Walnut, Two Chip Chocolate Chip, Dark Chocolate Chocolate Chip, Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip, Oatmeal Raisin or a variety pack.

name: Card & Waste Bag Essentials Case
description: Sleek, good-looking and compact, the Card and Waste Bag Essentials Case is perfectly designed to carry a credit card and waste bag. You had a problem, maxbone has the solution, a functional and cute essentials case. The best part? It's vegan!

name: The Daily Backpack
description: The Daily Backpack is an everyday laptop backpack. Compact, lightweight, and functional, the Daily Backpack is the perfect backpack for work, travel and everything in between. The separate laptop pocket fits up to 14” Macbook Pro, while the whole bag measures 17" x 11" x 5.5".

name: Brightland The Essential Capsule
description: The Essential Capsule features Brightland's DUO (AWAKE and ALIVE oils) and the PAIR (RAPTURE and PARASOL vinegars). The Capsule is the perfect foursome of essentials to complement and round out the kitchen.

name: Home Town Maps Wine Tumbler
description: Stay refreshed and inspired with this Home Town Map insulated wine tumbler with lid. Engraved with a stunningly detailed map of the streets and neighborhoods of any U.S. city and town for a uniquely personalized and eye-catching 12 oz beverage container.

name: 6oz Century Glass Set of 2
description: A modern classic destined to become your new go-to drinking glass. The Century Glasses are made using premium borosilicate glass that is most commonly associated with laboratory glassware and high end kitchenwares. It provides a delicate appearance and superior thermal shock durability. Includes a set of two, 6 oz glasses. Choice of color.

name: Stunning Silver Bakery Gift
description: A stunning silver roll-out tower filled with the finest in bakery snacks. This impressive gift includes a dozen gourmet cookies, 6 Chocolate Chip and 6 Sugar, 4 individual Sweet Carolina snack mixes and eight individually wrapped brownie bites including Chocolate Truffle, Chocolate Truffle with Walnuts, Marble Cheesecake and Cookies & Cream, all tied up with a stunning black satin ribbon!

name: The Sampler
description: The AVEC Sampler allows you to try all of their five flavors that are perfect to stock the bar cart, prepare for a weekend away or impress guests with upgraded cocktails. Includes 15 cans, three each of Jalapeño & Blood Orange, Ginger, Hibiscus & Pomegranate, Grapefruit & Pomelo, and Yuzu & Lime.

name: Yoga Knee & Elbow Pad
description: This yoga knee/elbow pad is designed to provide comfort while maintaining balance and stability in your yoga exercises. It has printed patterns that will guide you in achieving proper posture and body alignment. The extra thick yoga pad gives body support during your daily workout. It also has an excellent grip that works in any type of floors and mats. This yoga pad makes your daily workout the fun part of your day.

name: Single Mystery Tackle Box Elite
description: These Single Mystery Tackle Boxes are stuffed full of tackle from leaders in the fishing industry, and even feature limited edition baits. Choice of box type.

name: Vegan and GF Chocolate Chip Walnut 4 Pack
description: This vegan, gluten-free cookie features chunks of crunchy walnuts and semi-sweet vegan chocolate chips. Baked with a rich and creamy butter that’s made from cashews, it’s a plant-based take on the classic Levain cookie, one that everyone can enjoy.

name: Wedding Rice Krispie 12 Pack
description: Celebrate the big day with this wedding themed 12 pack pack of delicious hand-crafted crispy rice and marshmallow treats. All treats are gluten free with the exception of Cookies and Cream.

name: UNICEF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to UNICEF USA helps ensure the world’s most vulnerable children get the nutrition, water, protection, education and health care they need to survive and thrive.

name: Sunshine Box
description: This box says Hello Sunshine with a selection of bright fun. The Sunshine box includes Juicy Fruit® Gum, Peanut M&M's, Smile Notepad, Smile Stress Ball, and Hal's Sea Salt Popcorn.

name: Barracoon
description: In 1927, Zora Neale Hurston went to Plateau, Alabama, to interview eighty-six-year-old Cudjo Lewis. Of the millions of men, women, and children transported from Africa to America as slaves, Cudjo was then the only person alive to tell the story of this integral part of the nation's history. Based on those interviews, which feature Cudjo's unique vernacular, this book illustrates the tragedy of slavery and of one life forever defined by it.

name: I Love You More Tea Kit
description: The perfect gift to celebrate someone who loves tea and cozy nights in. Each all-inclusive kit contains a heart-shaped mug, a heart-shaped tea infuser, and your choice of a caffeinated tea, a caffeine-free tea, or both.

name: Black Obsidian Facial Roller
description: Relieve tension, reduce puffiness, and create a more toned and sculpted appearance with this elegant dual-stone roller. The different size rollers on each end of the tool allows you to easily reach all areas of your face, providing a deep, relaxing massage that will leave your skin looking and feeling refreshed and revitalized. Use the smaller side along the side of your nose and divot above your lips, and the larger side along your cheeks and jawline. Each roller is unique and may have slight variations due to the organic nature of the stone.

name: Freestanding Power Strip
description: The Freestanding Power strip adds a bright touch to any work environment. White ash, leather accents and a unique palette imbue this office staple with warmth and style, while the powder coated steel base and knit cabling are built to last for years of use. It sports 3 power outlets (15 amp, 125 volt, 1875 watt), and a 10 foot knit cable with leather strap. Choice of stand and cord colors.

name: Daisy Jones & The Six
description: Everyone knows DAISY JONES & THE SIX, but nobody knows the reason behind their split at the absolute height of their popularity . . . until now. Daisy is a girl coming of age in L.A. in the late sixties, sneaking into clubs on the Sunset Strip, sleeping with rock stars, and dreaming of singing at the Whisky a Go Go. The sex and drugs are thrilling, but it's the rock 'n' roll she loves most. By the time she's twenty, her voice is getting noticed, and she has the kind of heedless beauty that makes people do crazy things. What happens next will become the stuff of legend.

name: Farmhouse
description: A rustic design featuring premium sunflowers alongside fresh summer and autumnal blooms in a gorgeous green, burgundy, and orange palette. Includes premium flowers, glass vase, and fresh hand delivery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: $100 Anise Health Gift Card
description: Culture is built into every step of your end-to-end mental health journey with Anise. This includes tailored clinical assessments that accurately diagnose your intersectional needs, cultural sensitivity training for all clinicians to deliver high-quality care to you, and personalized treatment plans that support your mental wellbeing holistically. By joining the Anise Health community, you’ll get exclusive access to a care team consisting of both a therapist AND a coach, 4 weekly telehealth appointments, and a content library of digital resources that address unique cultural stressors, such as bicultural tension, perfectionism, shame, guilt, emotional suppression, and more. Gift card will be emailed to the email address you provide upon acceptance.

name: PLAY Antioxidant Body Mist SPF 50 with Vitamin C, 3 oz
description: A non-aerosol, sweat- and water-resistant sunscreen body spray with SPF 50 that leaves skin radiantly glowing. This lightweight, refreshing SPF mist is literally the easiest way to wear sunscreen, just point, spray and play! You can even apply it onto wet skin for total UV protection. Contains 3 oz.

name: Sweet Romance
description: The Sweet Romance bouquet includes 38 mixed stems of roses, anemone, snapdragon, solomio, delphinium, and hebes. Vase not included.

name: Baby Cupcake Bundle
description: Celebrate the new mom or mom-to-be in the best way possible with baby essentials made into cupcakes that are practical and oh-so-adorable! It includes 2 pairs of socks, and 4 cotton flannel receiving blankets (30x30 inch).

name: Sigma Switch Brush Cleaning Tool
description: This innovative, double-sided mat features soft silicone textures designed to gently pull liquid foundation, cream makeup or powder pigments from your makeup brush bristles without using water or instant brush cleansers. Perfect for creating looks with multiple eyeshadow shades or makeup formulas, this ingenious product allows you to quickly switch colors without changing makeup brushes.

name: Shearling Mule, Natural
description: Shearling trim gives texture to their best-selling mule. Made in Italy, the Shearling mule has a lightly padded leather insole for all-day comfort and semi-pointed toe.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Ribbed Beanie
description: This signature cashmere beanie will instantly add the perfect dose of warmth and style to any outfit. Made from butter-soft pure Grade-A Mongolian cashmere, the ribbed texture and adjustable folded cuff creates a versatile design to be worn exactly how you like it. The unisex design makes this cashmere hat a perfect fit for anyone.

name: Soft Pretzel and Beer Cheese Kit
description: This absolute favorite bar snack is a soft pretzel (ideally warm) with beer cheese on the side for dipping. It easily competes with any good cheese plate. Savory and salty, it’s certainly a guilty pleasure. So much so that you'd prefer eating it with friends in the comfort of our own home. This kit Includes Pretzel Baking Mix, Malt Powder, Pretzel Salt, Baking Yeast, Cheese Cloth, and Vegetable Rennet.

name: Vegan Volcano Cake 4 Pack
description: Word on the street is people are fighting over Southern Roots volcano cakes! Not your average cupcake, these are about twice the size so they are big enough share but you most likely will want them all to yourself! Choose your favorite delicious flavor of this plant-based cupcake.

name: World's Best Mom Shirt
description: Give it up for the MVP of motherhood in your life with a super-soft tribute to the world’s most rewarding job, and the gal who does it best. World’s Best Mom!

name: Pip-Squeaks Telescoping Marker Tower
description: With a wide range of vibrant colors, this Crayola Pip-Squeaks Telescoping Marker Tower gives your child even more big color fun. The 3-tiered telescoping tower gives a clear view of all 50 marker colors, allows children easy access to a full range of color creativity. Easy to collapse down to one layer for storage, the marker tower rises into 3 layers when it's time to play. The easy-to-hold short barrels are scaled to match little hands and the ink is Crayola's special washable formula.

name: Women's Lightweight Frill Quarter Socks
description: This one’s for the frill seekers: a delectably soft, lightweight sock with a frilled cuff and rich solid colors. Wear it folded down, slightly scrunched, or straight up, and be prepared to answer “Where’d you get those socks?” all night. It even has built-in arch support so you still feel comfortable in your dancing shoes. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Spade Hand Shover
description: The Garden Trowel works quickly and comfortably through both soft soil and rough ground. This gardening tool is ideal for digging, turning, and spreading soil, prepping garden beds, and planting seedlings. Constructed with an ergonomic, heat-treated stainless steel blade and a comfortable wooden handle. Measures 13.5" x 3" x 2".

name: Wall Basket
description: This gorgeous basket is the perfect way to bring a touch of global texture to any wall. They also make the perfect fruit baskets or put them on a table as catch-all baskets. No matter what makes its home in these baskets, they'll add a hint of global charm to your life. Baskets are handwoven with elephant grass and recycled plastic and measure 18" D x 2" thick. This is a one-of-a-kind handmade product that will have slight variations in design, color, and size.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Oversized Boyfriend Cardigan Sweater
description: Quince took your favorite Grade-A Mongolian cashmere boyfriend sweater and made it extra. With more of an oversized fit, it’s even roomier than a classic cardigan fit. So comfy cozy with fisherman rib detailing premium coastal vibes. Consider sizing down for a little less volume.

name: Toddler Washable Cashmere Beanie
description: This 100% Cashmere Beanie is guaranteed to keep your little one cozy and cute. Their all-natural cashmere has a cloud-like softness, meaning it won’t irritate your little one’s delicate skin. It is lightweight and breathable, so it will keep them warm without the risk of overheating. Due to its natural antibacterial qualities, it requires less frequent washing, and no dry cleaning is required.

name: Valentine's Wishes
description: The Valentine's Wishes bouquet includes 24 mixed stems of roses, solomio, ranunculus, scabiosa, and eucalyptus. Vase not included.

name: Vacuum Insulated Tumbler, 11oz
description: Designed to keep your beverage hot up to 5 hours and cold for 15 hours, the Sherpa is an 11oz insulated vacuum tumbler that also doubles as a 12oz can insulator. Its double-wall construction features an 18/8 grade Stainless Steel inner wall, and a Stainless Steel outer wall. Features clear, press-on lid with slide closure.

name: The Body Lotion, Fragrance-Free
description: The Body Lotion is a daily multi-peptide firming lotion for skin. This daily lotion is infused with 5 peptides, 2.5% Niacinamide and facial-grade oils rich in Vitamin A/C/E/F + Omega 6/9. The Body Lotion helps deeply moisturize, firm and strengthen skin on contact, and delivers continuous 48-hour moisture. Contains 5.8 fl oz.

name: 30 LB Rubber Dumbbell
description: Includes ONE 30 LB Dumbell. The Inspire Fitness Rubber Dumbbells are an essential addition to any home gym, providing unparalleled quality and durability. Crafted with precision using high-quality materials, this dumbbell is designed to last.

name: Teeth Whitening Kit
description: The most powerful teeth whitening kit that's clinically proven to whiten teeth, the Teeth Whitening Kit combines professional gel with LED light technology to remove stains in just 30 minutes per day. The LED light accelerates teeth whitening results and works with the whitening gel to whiten teeth up to 10 shades in 7 days.

name: Sunrise Balloon Ride for Two, Temecula, CA
description: You and your guest join a group to soak up the charming Temecula Wine Country during sunrise from above on a hot air balloon ride. Embrace the serenity as you float effortlessly 1,500 feet above the ground with an experienced hot air balloon pilot. Celebrate upon landing with a champagne toast! Includes an experience for two people.

name: Body Oil Sample Set
description: Try the full range of Esker oils with this Body Oil Sample Set. Each set comes with 3, 5ml glass bottles representing the entire line, including Firming Oil, Restorative Oil, and Clarifying Oil. Experiment with each one and find out which is your perfect match.

name: Variety 6 Pack
description: Try all of their classic flavors—Fruity, Frosted, Cocoa, Peanut Butter, Blueberry Muffin, and Cinnamon Roll. They’ve reimagined all your favorite childhood cereals with 4-5g net carbs, 12-14g complete protein, and no artificial ingredients.

name: Modern Classic Coat
description: A clean, modern style with classic corduroy, a soft and warm sherpa lining, and adjustable velcro closures for a comfy fit. Choice of color and size.

name: Tomato Sauce with Ricotta and Pecorino Cheese
description: Richness through simplicity. This ricotta and pecorino tomato sauce by Cascina San Cassiano is an authentic delicacy that reproduces the best of the traditional Italian kitchen. Made in Italy, Gluten-Free and GMO-Free. Includes one 10.2 oz jar.

name: The Snacker
description: Yes, it’s a lunchbox, and it’s for more than just snacking. The Snacker is the vegan leather, insulated pouch that everyone needs. The insulated interior will keep your food cool and is easily wipeable for those accidental spills. Throw it in your tote, or carry it on its own, and no one would ever know what was inside. Measures 6" x 9.5" x 2.25".

name: New Job
description: The thrill of starting something new. Coffee, a fresh set of pens, and an empty notebook. Deep breaths as you take it all in.

name: Artisan Collection Notebook
description: This extra special leather volume lends its weight to anything you write inside, with ribbed bindings to give a touch of a crafted feel. Heavier 100 gsm paper makes for beautiful handwritten entries and the extra thick width means you can tell your whole story. At 400 pages, it measures 5.5“ x 8.3”. Includes one notebook, choice of color.

name: The Brush
description: Regular brushing with a dual bristle brush helps distribute your hair’s natural oil, giving you healthier strands and a cleaner clean when you wash. Detangling brushes gently remove knots and protect your scalp and strands from breakage, creating the optimal environment for strong, healthy hair to grow. And the Boar Bristle brush is perfect for thin, fine hair, or styling anytime.

name: Black Girls Code Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation creates new opportunities for girls and gender nonconforming youth of color to have a daring impact on tech. When they succeed, we all succeed.

name: Studio3 Wireless
description: With a host of powerful features and capabilities, Beats Studio3 Wireless brings the best audio experience to the noise-canceling headphone market. You can enjoy everyday activities with the new and proprietary Pure Adaptive Noise Canceling (Pure ANC) technology so you hear more of what you want and less of what’s around you. Beats Studio3 Wireless has the Apple W1 chip, which means you also get proximity pairing, seamless switching between Apple devices, industry-leading Class 1 Bluetooth connectivity, exceptional battery life and Fast Fuel charging. Color: Matte Black.

name: Pottery Starter Bundle, Acrylic Paint Pens
description: The dream combo for creating patterns and designs on your pieces. The Pottery starter bundle comes with all the materials, tools and guidance you'll need to create functional and useable pottery pieces from home. This set includes the original Sculpd Pottery Kit as well as 8 Mediterranean themed shades for decorating. These pens are super versatile, and work perfectly on plastic, wood, cardboard, paper, glass and most other surfaces.

name: Vitamin E Face Moisturizer
description: This best-selling moisturizer keeps your skin perfectly balanced and hydrated all day. The lightweight formula is quick to absorb and is intensely nourishing, delivering just the right amount of moisture without feeling greasy or sticky. Includes one 4 fl oz bottle.

name: Focus Headband
description: This wide athletic headband keeps your hair out of your eyes so you can focus squarely on your goals.

name: Tahini Taster Set
description: Can't decide which Seed + Mill Organic Tahini to try? Now you don't have to choose! This Tahini Taster Set includes a jar of each of Seed + Mill's current tahini lineup: Organic Tahini, Organic Za'atar Tahini and Organic Roasted Garlic Tahini. Tahini is a versatile, nutritious ingredient for cooking and baking, spreading and drizzling, or eating by the spoonful. Their Organic Tahini is made from premium, Ethiopian sesame seeds, and is an all natural product that's high in calcium, iron and protein. It fits perfectly in a vegan, gluten free or paleo lifestyle. But above all, it's delicious!

name: Women's Sheer Sparkle Quarter Sock 4-Pack Gift Box
description: Glittery, moodsetting socks that make every wear feel like a special occasion. A super luxe, feather-light style with Micro Honeycomb Arch Support, a Seamless Toe, and a not-too-tight cuff. Just like tights, these are ultra-sheer, so you can stay light on your feet while you dance the night away in your favorite dress shoes. Includes 4 pairs. As always, 4 purchased = 4 donated.

name: Icons Tiny Plants Build and Display Set
description: Create an elegant, zero-maintenance floral display with this home decor creative building set for adults. This beautifully arranged build and display set is the perfect touch for your home, coffee table, or kitchen decor. The LEGO Icons Tiny Plants (10329) building project features flowers based on arid, tropical and carnivorous species, each nestled in a buildable, terracotta-colored pot.

name: Le Spritz 36 Pack
description: Ghia's signature non-alcoholic aperitivo, but spritzed. Because a real drink is made of real ingredients, powerful enough to bring out the best version of you. Born on the coasts of France and Italy, the classic Apéritif is a bold combination of botanicals that kickstart the appetite and the conversation. Light and dry, an aperitif is perfect for slow-sipping and fast-talking, a drink that takes friends from sunset to sunrise.

name: Love Me, 2 Decks
description: Curtis Kulig's signature 'Love Me' can be seen in galleries and rooftops around the world. The message is timeless and universal. This Valentine's Day share the art you love with the one you love with 2 decks sporting this incredible artist.

name: Good Habits Trio
description: Give every nook and cranny of your mouth the care it needs. The Good Habits Trio includes an Electric Toothbrush & Cover (3-month battery life), Refillable Floss String, and Mint Anticavity Toothpaste (100% recyclable tube & cap).

name: Vegan Leather Travel Jewelry Case
description:
The Vegan Leather Travel Jewelry Case is perfect for organizing and protecting all of your jewelry on every adventure! It features an 8 hole earring holder, zipper pouch, 2 necklace holders, and a ring section.
It's 6 x 14 x 5cm in size. With every purchase, MadebyKWest donates 10% to Girls Going Global.

name: The Bail Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide free bail assistance to thousands of low-income Americans every year.

name: NFL Jam Tee
description: Boomshakalaka! NFL Jam is here! Rep one of your favorite duos with a super-soft tee, highlighting two of the most talented players on your team. Let’s get ready for some football.

name: Classic Gluten-Free Gift Basket
description: This classic gluten-free gift basket is filled with only the finest of foods. Gourmet Gift Baskets searched far and wide to find a diverse selection of GF-friendly products that will surely be enjoyed in this gift basket. You will enjoy treats such as chocolate chip cookies, trail mix, jerky, and so much more.

name: World Central Kitchen Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide fresh meals to communities in need.

name: Chocolate Covered Pretzel Birthday Box
description: These best-selling Birthday Cake pretzels make for the perfect b-day treat! These celebratory boxes are sure to sweeten up the recipient's day! Includes 3 pretzel rods measuring 4" long.

name: Decanter and Wine Glass Set of 4
description: This elegant Decanter and wine glass set is the best way to ensure your wine reaches its full potential, whether it’s a full-bodied Napa Cab or even a White Burgundy. This Decanter is crafted from crystal glass, is the perfect size for one bottle of wine and will fit comfortably on any table. It is designed with a wide bowl to trap sediment before it gets to your glass and to produce the perfect swirl. The wine glasses are constructed from the purest raw materials and are free from heavy metals. Designed to create a superior mouthfeel while staying light and balanced in hand, they are resistant to breakage and abrasion, and are dishwasher safe for easy clean up.

name: Shockoe
description: The Shockoe's are the largest round eye so you can block out more of those UV rays without the wrap. They're a fabulous unisex style but there are many stories where they were borrowed by your significant other and never given back (so be on the lookout).

name: 12" Perforated Pizza Peel
description: This perforated aluminum pizza peel is a high-quality, lightweight peel for sliding, turning and retrieving pizzas from your oven with ease. Use the tapered peel edge to slide straight under pizza bases, while the perforations mean a perfectly cooked pizza every time as steam is able to quickly evaporate and excess flour falls away from the pizza base. A super-sleek, hard anodised coating provides increased corrosion resistance and a hyper-smooth surface to guarantee a seamless experience when launching and retrieving pizzas. Measures 12".

name: All Day and Night Dip Dishes
description: You can use these dishes as salt and pepper cellars and for oils, nuts, and olives in your antipasti glory hours. This multicolor set of four chic, low-edged dip dishes comes with one of each of Year & Day's signature colors in an elegant giftbox.

name: Men's Merino Wool Blend Calf Sock 4-Pack
description: Merino Wool is a super strong natural fiber that's incredibly soft, will keep you warm in the winter and breezy-cool in the summer, and its natural moisture-wicking properties keep your feet dry and cozy. And that's just the fabric, before they add all of the sock tech features that come in every pair of Bombas.

name: Red Prayer Plant in Ceramic Potter
description: The prayer plant has vibrant, striped foliage and can bloom tiny purple or white flowers in the right conditions. It gets its nickname from its leaves folding up at night, mimicking hands praying. Place in low to bright indirect light, as direct light will burn its leaves. This plant is about 10 to 12 inches tall. Planters are 100% premium ceramic, hand-finished in a matte glaze, and include drainage holes with rubber stoppers. Includes one Maranta Prayer Plant, one 5" ceramic potter, and one bag of custom-blended organic potting mix.

name: Spout
description: Spout is a trusted pal to hold and drizzle olive oil and more. Its oversized handle makes it easy to grab. Plus, the long, precise spout and the breather valve on the lid give you complete control over a steady pour. The colorful glass will look handsome on your countertop or dining table, Spout loves a dinner party! Holds 19 fluid ounces.

name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
description: Kahneman takes us on a groundbreaking tour of the mind and explains the two systems that drive the way we think. System 1 is fast, intuitive, and emotional; System 2 is slower, more deliberative, and more logical. Kahneman exposes the extraordinary capabilities—and also the faults and biases—of fast thinking, and reveals the pervasive influence of intuitive impressions on our thoughts and behavior.

name: Arris Tote
description: Suited for office, supermarket, or beach, the Arris Tote fits neatly into the rhythm of a considered life. Its rugged, water-resistant nylon material is quilted to act like corrugation, rigid in one direction and flexible in the other. The handle length was carefully selected to be comfortably worn over your shoulder or held at your side without dragging on the ground. The Arris Tote also features two large interior side pockets, and a water-resistant zipper pouch, allowing for separation and easy access to the trappings of a busy day. It measures 22" W x 16" H x 12" D, and weighs 1.2 LBS.

name: Black Food: Stories, Art, and Recipes from Across the African Diaspora
description: A beautiful, rich, and groundbreaking book exploring Black foodways within America and around the world, curated by food activist and author of Vegetable Kingdom Bryant Terry. Hardcover.

name: Daily Chair, Recipient's Choice
description: Make your office feel like home with the Daily Chair: the stylish task chair for every work environment. It has a contoured nylon back and lumbar rest for breathable support, and medium-firm cushion rated for 4-6+ hours of comfort. Tilt and tilt tension encourage natural movement, and the intuitive armrest and seat height adjustments will ensure you sit comfortably. It measures 22"W x 22"D x 35-38"H. Recipient's choice of color.

name: Portable Wine Glass
description: Take your wine or cocktail to-go with the modern, minimalist Porter Glass, crafted from durable glass and wrapped in protective matte silicone. Holds 15 ounces of your favorite wine, cocktail or water.   The Lid is sealed with a high-quality silicone gasket to minimize splashes.

name: Home Town Maps Rocks Glass
description: Well Told's bestselling 11 oz rocks glass is custom-etched with a stunningly detailed map of U.S. cities and towns. Designed and made with pride in the USA.

name: On-The-Go Hammock
description: Made of heavy-duty nylon and polyester that’s as comfortable as your mattress at home. It's a breeze to set up just about anywhere thanks to two simple fastening ropes with built-in carabiners. The ultra-compact design fits neatly into a travel-friendly pouch, which acts as a hammock pocket to stash your phone or shades once you get comfy. It measures 108” L x 55” W.

name: Flowknit Performance Pant
description: These favorite performance joggers are a slim but relaxed fit with the perfect amount of stretch for ultimate comfort. Thick drawstrings, cuffed ankles, and two pocket design give them a premium feel. Our Flowknit is made from Global Recycle Standard poly yarn, which diverts and recycles plastics destined for landfill or the ocean, so you can feel and look good in what you wear.

name: Single Succulent in Potter
description: Each beautiful hand-picked succulent comes in a modern four-inch ceramic pot and is planted 24 hours before delivery in soil & rock.

name: Branded Dad Hat with Leather Patch
description: The leather patch hats are made from 100% bio-washed chino twill. It's a very comfortable yet sturdy material that will last for ages. The 100% PU leather patch is a great base for printing even the most vibrant designs. The hat's shape is unstructured, six-panel with a low profile and a pre-curved bill – this popular design suits almost everyone.

name: Stone Diffuser
description: The Stone Diffuser scents your home and looks beautiful while doing it. With a cover crafted out of matte ceramic, it doubles as a piece of decor making it perfect for bedsides, countertops, and shelves. For every woman who works at vitruvi, the company funds the university education of a woman in Kenya through One Girl Can.

name: The Apron
description: Use it for making dough, helping in the kitchen or playing pretend. It's the perfect way to step up your little chef's cooking game!

name: Baby Carrier Harmony, 3D Mesh
description: The I-want-it-all carrier. Crafted in luxurious mesh, this carrier is super-comfy, super-soft, and super-stylish, as well as ergonomic for you and your baby. Pressure-relieving waist belt and padded shoulder straps and back support make Baby Carrier Harmony incredibly comfortable. The super-soft mesh hugs your baby and provides a constant feeling of closeness to one another. Baby Carrier Harmony is easy to use and lightweight and can be easily packed down into your stroller or diaper bag. Features four carrying positions for maximum versatility. Made of 100% polyester 3D Mesh fabric to be flexible, and breathable, releasing excess heat. Best suited for babies 0-3 years, 7-40 lbs, and 21-39".

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Cities
description: Be transported to a place you love with natural soy wax blend scented candles and fragrance oils from Homesick. Find a candle that smells like home to you.

name: Secure Holder with Key Ring for Apple Airtag
description: Track your belongings with confidence. Belkin's Secure Holder with Key Ring for AirTag has an innovative twist-and-lock design and raised edges to keep your AirTag secure and protect it against scratches. Easily attach it to your keys, car remote, luggage, pet, and more with its convenient, sturdy, and secure key ring.

name: Bandit Kit
description: The TRX Bandit Kit is like having a gym in your pocket. This packable set includes 4 TRX strength bands and a pair of TRX Bandit handles to power your workout with resistance and control.

name: European Linen Tablecloth
description: Elevate your dining experience with this European Linen Tablecloth, expertly crafted from 100% European flax. The classic design and luxurious garment washed texture makes this tablecloth the ideal foundation for any tablescape. Made without the use of harmful chemicals or pesticides and holds STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® certificate. Measures 70" x 108", ideal size for tables fitting 6-8 people.

name: Object Notebook
description: Their bestselling Object Notebook is back in new designs to collect your boldest ideas. A durable, fabric-like cover features a wavy checkered design while soft blank pages on the inside provide a roomy canvas for your notes and sketches. The sturdy Smyth-sewn binding lies flat when open for ease of use. It comes with 140 blank pages, and measures  7" x 9.75" (17.8 cm x 24.8 cm).

name: The Perfect Gift
description:
A premium tea ritual in one stylish set, including a 
Stoneware Small Teapot with built-in strainer that makes it easy to pour the perfect cup.
The modern stoneware Teacup with ergonomic handle makes enjoying tea more stylish and comfortable than you ever knew was possible. It also includes your choice of 3-tea variety pack.

name: TB12 Electrolytes 15ct Powder
description: Don’t let thirst or dehydration be a drag on your active lifestyle. With TB12 Electrolytes, recovery never tasted so good. They're fast, easy, versatile, and boasting with essential minerals to help you stay active and hydrated. Because your water should perform as well as you do. Includes 15 packets.

name: Lush Garden
description: Everything you ever dreamed of, and more. Lush Garden is the ultimate gift for any occasion. Contains an assortment of 6 small, 4 medium and 1 large, pre-planted fresh succulents and measures approximately 15 x 6 x 6 inches.

name: Extra Fancy Drifters
description: These polarized, shatter-resistant sunglasses come in an assortment of ultra-bold colors that make the whole world look like magic. Break them, drop them, lose them, Hipsterkid will replace them with a 100% guaranteed year-long warranty.

name: Haircare Staples Magnetic Travel Capsules
description: Elevate the way you organize your haircare in this magnetic and leakproof three-Capsule bundle, designed to help you maintain your routine whether you’re at home, the gym, or on a trip. Each capsule holds 0.56 ounces and is guaranteed to be 100% leakproof, watertight, and airtight. Includes three 0.56 oz magnetic capsules designed to hold Shampoo, Conditioner and Hair Serum. Note shipping takes an estimated 12-14 business days.

name: Timeless Treats Gift Tower
description: The Timeless Treats Gift Tower is full of culinary classics that are sure to delight. Bursting with juicy oranges, crispy crackers, savory sausage, delectable cheese, crunchy pistachios, and indulgent chocolate grahams, it's the ultimate gift for friends and family on any occasion.

name: Great Whisk
description: The Great Whisk consists of silicone that is easy to grip and features non-bendy wires, made of reinforced stainless. BPA and BPS-free, dishwasher-safe, heat-resistant up to 550 degrees.

name: 10K Gold Round and Baguette-Cut Diamond Hoop Earrings
description: Accentuated by stunning baguette diamonds, these hoop earrings are ready to bring a touch of elegance to your look. Made of 10k yellow gold, these earrings come with a clip mechanism to allow you a secure fit. They're embellished with 1.00 c.t. of natural round and baguette-cut diamonds. Be ready to be the center of attention at dinner parties with this pair of gorgeous hoop earrings.

name: Great Spatula
description: The Great Spatula consists of silicone that is easy to grip as you stir, flip, and ladle. Extremely durable with an ergonomic design, this spatula is rounded with soft edges for getting those cheesy bits out from the corners. Made of food-grade silicone. Dishwasher-safe, heat resistant up to 550 degrees.

name: X-T5 Mirrorless Camera with XF16-80mmF4 R OIS WR Lens Bundle
description: Comparable in size to the original X-T1 and 50g lighter than its predecessor, X-T5 features high-resolution, 40-megapixel X-Trans 5 HR sensor for simply stunning results. Quick and easy to use thanks to its classic, dial-based layout, the camera features cutting-edge technology.

name: The Cruiser Mini Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable mini bluetooth speaker with a built-in bottle opener that is completely water, dust, and shock proof. Featuring a compact design a five hour battery, and intuitive controls, the H2.0 Cruiser allows you to savor epic moments in the outdoors with friends in true wireless surround sound. Its pocket-friendly design delivers powerful audio, while a built-in mic lets you take speakerphone calls on the go. It's 100% waterproof, has a built-in bottle opener, and Dual speaker pairing.

name: Cotton Tee
