description: This classic unisex jersey short sleeve tee fits like a well-loved favorite. Made with 100% soft airlume combed cotton with a loose fit, this will become your new favorite t-shirt.

name: Sampler Pack Gift Box
description: When you can't decide, this is the one for you. The sample pack includes 6 tubes 1/2 Lb each, with a myriad of flavor choices in each pack.

name: Maman: The Cookbook
description: By Elisa Marshall, Benjamin Sormonte and Lauren Salkeld. Experience the award-winning recipes for cookies, cakes, quiches and croissants from maman, the beloved rustic-chic café with locations in New York City, Montreal and Toronto. Hardcover.

name: Brilliant-Cut Diamond Miracle Stud Earrings
description: Add a shimmering touch to your wardrobe with these elegant and extravagant diamond earrings. Fashioned in the round shape, the earrings are crafted of your choice of sterling silver plated with white rhodium, or with 10K rose or yellow gold electroplating. Each of the studs captivates with miracle plated round cut diamonds, which gives the illusion of larger diamonds, making them shine like countless stars glitter in the sky.

name: Herringbone Chain
description: Looking for a classic herringbone chain necklace that will never go wrong? We've got just the thing. Add a dash of shine to any outfit in your wardrobe when you're wearing this sleek, versatile chain. Chain measures 18" and made with rhodium plated brass.

name: JBL Clip 4 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: The vibrant fresh looking JBL Clip 4 delivers surprisingly rich JBL Original Pro Sound in a compact package. The unique oval shape fits easy in your hand. Fully wrapped in colorful fabrics with expressive details inspired by current street fashion, it’s easy to match your style. The fully integrated carabiner hooks instantly to bags, belts, or buckles, to bring your favorite tunes anywhere. Waterproof, dustproof, and up to 10 hours of playtime, it’s rugged enough to tag along wherever you explore.

name: Second Harvest Food Bank Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps distribute food through a network of nearly 400 partners at more than 900 sites across Santa Clara and San Mateo counties.

name: Premium 100% Organic Sampler Box
description:
This snack box is a collection of 24 individually wrapped snacks made with 100% organic ingredients. It includes 1 Bunny James Foods Carrot Fries Sea Salt, 1 Annie's Organic Bunny Snacks, 1 Amazon Black Forest Organic Gummy Bears Candy, 
1 Eden Gourmet Pumpkin Seeds Spicy Pumpkin, 1 Eden Gourmet Pumpkin Seeds Salted, 1 Kate's Real Foods Oatmeal Cranberry Almond, 1 Iwon Mesquite BBQ Flavored Organic Protein Stix, 2 Yum Earth Tropical Fruit Snacks, 1 Sweet Nothings Oatmeal Raisin and Peanut Butter Nut Butter Bites, 1 Safe Food Corp Apricot Dried Fruit, 1 Safe Food Corp Fig Dried Fruit, 1 Mamma Chia Wild Raspberry Squeeze Vitality Snack, 1 Lesser Evil Paleo Puffs No Cheese Cheesiness, 4 Heavenly Organics Mint Chocolate Honey Patties, 1 Tosi Cashew Coconut SuperBites, 3 Yum Earth Gummy Bears, 1 Homefree Organic Ginger Snap Cookies, and 1 Solely Organic Fruit Jerky.

name: Serving Bowl
description: Finally, a Serving Bowl large enough for your most ambitious dinner parties. Since the 1600s, the world’s best Plateware has come from Stoke-on-Trent, England, where the local clay and craftsmanship creates uniquely hard-wearing high alumina vitrified china. Prized for its beauty, longevity, and unrivaled chipping resistance, it’s historically been reserved for the hospitality industry, until now. Instead of partial glazing, the Serving Bowl is fully glazed for 360° scratch- and chip-resistance. The glazing also makes it resistant to stains and oven safe to 580F, so you can keep your prized creation warm until your whole meal is ready to serve. Measures 12" in diameter, 3.54" in height.

name: Sampler Case
description: The 1st Asian-inspired sparkling water, Sanzo uses real fruit and no added sugars to deliver refreshing taste. Sampler of four award-winning flavors including Lychee, Calamansi,Mango and Yuzu. Includes 12 cans.

name: Clear Jar Soy Candle
description: Select the fragrance of your choice for this 9 oz soy candle with a 40 hour burn time.

name: Bloom Coupe Glasses, Set of 2
description: Don't settle for less when you can have a mesmerizing high-end bar experience in the comfort of your home. The functionality of these is limited only by your imagination. Try a Margarita, or why not a shaken martini. These coupe glasses have a unique design that complements every extravagant drink. Each glass in this set of two holds 9.2 Oz.

name: Oven Box
description: This sweet, nostalgic treat will remind you of neighborhood bakeries and after school snacks. Includes 2 oz of loose leaf tea.

name: Men's Vintage Pocket Tee, Navy
description: Inspired by the look and feel of a lived-in vintage tee, this casual basic is destined to become a staple in your everyday wardrobe in no time. Made in the USA with 100% cotton.

name: Linen Robe
description: These 100% Linen Robes are made from the finest Belgian and French flax and stonewashed for irresistible softness. The fabric is breathable, lightweight, and gives the perfect effortless vibe to your post-shower, post-workout, or mid-lounge glow. This Robe is one-size-fits-all and ideal in every season.

name: Clampy Bending Lamp
description: Create your at-home reading nook wherever you want it, because good lighting can always come with you. This Clampy Bendy Lamp has cordless portability and 360-degree flexibility, and you can clamp it onto anywhere with the lamp clip. Illuminate your favorite reading nook or sanctuary, then dive into your work or your favorite book. While the lower lamp is a soft reading lamp designed for visual comfort, the upper cat-ear-shaped glow cap is actually a second light, controlled separately. You can use the top one as a night light in the evening or for ambient mood lighting whenever you're feeling it. Each lamp has three levels of brightness, you can choose to have both lamps on, or just one.

name: Take Me Home Gift Set
description: This is the complete newborn essentials that includes one big waterproof-lined zip pouch to hold everything and take you from bag to bag. A cozy outfit for the earliest of days, a soft on-the-go changing mat, a blanket for the car seat and stroller and a small waterproof-lined zip pouch for the little things like a pacifier and nail clipper.

name: Compression-Rib Baby Tee
description: Simple and sweet, this baby tee stands out under a jacket and looks great on its own. Made with a feel-good ribbed material that snatches the waist and flatters any figure.

name: Metallic Madeline Earrings
description: The Madeline earrings have a light-refracting effect. Handmade with sequins and beading, these transforming statements promise endless possibilities. Easy, enviably chic, and impeccably luxurious. Made of 100% goat leather backing, 18K gold plated stainless steel or rhodium and a 14K gold filled post. Choice of color.

name: Large Recycled Double Pocket Backpack
description: Crafted from recycled water bottles, this large size Recycled Double Pocket Backpack is a practical choice for kids on the go. With its spacious design and two separate compartments, it offers ample storage for all their essentials, plus pockets, clips, and holders to keep their belongings organized. Its adjustable straps ensure a comfortable fit, making it an ideal companion for school, outdoor adventures, or any other activity. Perfect for children 4th grade and up. Measures 17.13" x 12.2" x 7.48".

name: Diaper Caddy
description: Whether it’s stuffed animals, toys, swaddles, burp cloths or a diapering station, this white rope diaper caddy basket is a simple, chic vessel. Perfect for the nesting & organized Mama, packaging meets function for the win! It measures 9.5” x 15” x 7”.

name: Court Bag
description: The court-bag is the ideal carry-all for pickleball paddles, pickleballs, and courtside snacks. Hang it near the front door for the next impromptu game with pals.

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Frida Kahlo: The Complete Paintings
description: Frida Kahlo, one of the key figures in Mexican revolutionary modern art was also undeniably a pioneer of the politics of gender, sexuality, and feminism in the field of women artists and their art. 624 pages, hard cover, made in Italy. By Luis-Martín Lozano.

name: Stainless Steel Rocks Glass Set of 2
description: Whether you prefer Negroni or whiskey neat, this 11oz stainless-steel rocks glass will maintain the temperature and great taste of your fave cocktail. The design is elegant, comfortable in the hand with plenty of room for XL ice cubes while not being as bulky as typical rocks glasses or steel tumblers.

name: British Scorpion Tank Ride Along for One, Uvalde, TX
description: Planes buzzing overtop and bullets whizzing by, pretend you and your friends are at war during this awesome British FV101 Scorpion Tank experience. Includes an experience for one person.

name: Perfect Prime Base Coat
description: A strong foundation that helps to adhere polish, prevents cracking and staining, and acts as a ridge filler.

name: All The Feels Moodmask Kit
description: You may have that whole youthful-skin thing down pat, but that doesn’t mean your complexion couldn’t use a pick-me-up! Created for different skin concerns, Patchology moodmask facial sheet masks treat the problems of younger skin. From blemishes to dry patchy skin, they’re here to combat all of your “what the heck?!” moments, to make you look really good. It includes 1 Get Dewy With It Mega Moisture sheet mask, 1 Just Let It Glow Healthy Glow sheet mask, and 1 The Good Fight Clear Skin sheet mask.

name: Italian Leather Quilted Card Case
description: Treat your cards to the quality they deserve. The Italian Leather Quilted Small Card Case is a chic, compact style designed to keep your essentials organized and easily accessible. Crafted from high-quality Italian sheep leather, this richly textured card case exudes quiet luxury. Toss this beauty into any handbag, she's designed to fit into even the smallest shapes. Features 4 exterior card slots and one center compartment. Measures 3"H x 4"W.

name: Care Kit
description: Whether you're freshening up your favorite shoes or getting that stain off of your designer bag, the Jason Markk Care Kit has everything you need to get the job done. It’s the perfect gift of CARE!  The kit includes 7oz. Ready-To-Use Foam Cleaner, 2oz. Repel Spray, Premium Cleaning Brush, and 3 Quick Wipes.

name: Private DJ Lesson, Los Angeles, CA
description: Show off your rhythm and sharpen your skills during a Private DJ Lesson! Whether you're new to the turntable or an aspiring music enthusiast, you will learn tricks, styles and formulas from the best in the business. Show off your rhythm and sharpen your skills during a Private DJ Lesson! Whether you're new to the turntable or an aspiring music enthusiast, you will learn tricks, styles and formulas from the best in the business. Includes an experience for one person.

name: Branded One Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: These are the cookies that get you hooked and keep you asking for more. Even non-cookie lovers can’t stop themselves with this mix of Cravory's most craveable and gourmet cookie flavors. Includes 12 cookies.

name: MB Pod 24"
description: If a cloud and a bird’s nest had a baby, it would be the MB POD.  Since that’s not how life works, MB set to design the most comfortable, sleep inducing, full body supportive beast bed imaginable.  Starting with a core of high loft, 100% recycled fiber, then surround the core with a durable, removable and washable cover of the most incredibly soft fabric. Fits beasts up to approx. 30 lbs.

name: Compartés Chocolates 20 Piece Truffle Gift Set
description: A 20 piece selection of award winning and best selling chocolate ganache truffles that look like pieces of modern art. A Compartés tradition, handcrafted in Los Angeles, these chocolate ganache bonbon infused truffles feature edible art, patterns and prints. A 20 piece gift box featuring delectably famous and handcrafted chocolate truffles, infused with ingredients from around the world.

name: BuildOn Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide access to education for a child in a country with high rates of poverty and illiteracy.

name: Birthday Gift Box
description:
The Birthday Box is a collection of 28 individually wrapped healthy snacks to celebrate the big day. It includes 1 Lenny & Larry's The Complete Cookie Double Chocolate, 1 Lenny & Larry's The Complete Cookie Snickerdoodle, 1 BEAR Real Fruit YoYos,1 Chum Chum Fruit Bites,1 Rip Van Waffles Snack Wafel Chocolate, 1 Rip Van Waffles Snack Wafel Honey, 1 Partake Foods Cookies Chocolate Chip, Partake Foods Cookies Birthday Cake, 1 YumEarth Fruit Snacks, 1 YumEarth Gummy Bears, 1 Nature's Bakery Fig Bars Blueberry, 1 Nature's Bakery Fig Bars Raspberry, 3 Heavenly Organics Honey Patties Chocolate Almond, 3 Heavenly Organics Honey Patties Chocolate Mint, 1 Mamma Chia Wild Raspberry Squeeze Vitality Snack, 
1 Yum Earth Vegan Sucker, 1 Munkpack Protein Cookie Peanut Butter Chocolate, 1 Munkpack Protein Cookie Mini Cookies Snickerdoodle, 1 Chasin Dreams Sweet and Salty Popped Sorghum, 1 Nunbelievable Low Carb, Low Sugar Keto Friendly Snickerdoodle w/Baobab Cookies, 1 Yes Bar), 1 Rule Breaker Brownie Birthday Cake, and 1 Rule Breaker Blondies P'Nutter Chocolate Chip.

name: Kind to Your Kitchen Kit
description: Kindhumans donates 3% of your gift to a nonprofit of your choice. This eco-friendly kitchen kit makes it easy to swap to a plastic-free, planet-loving kitchen. (The long-handled cleaning brush included in the kit is different than the one pictured, but just as awesome!) This kit includes 1 No Tox Life Dish Block Dish Washing Bar Free of Dyes and Fragrance, 1 Three Bluebirds Black Sunflowers on White Swedish Dishcloth, 1 No Tox Life Moso Bamboo Soap Shelf, 1 Kindhumans Icon Organic Cotton Tote, 1 EcoCoconut Scrub Pads 2-Pack, and 1 No Tox Life Casa Agave Long Handle Dish Brush with replaceable head.

name: Glass Meso Incense Holder
description: Inspired by Mesopotamian architecture, the incense holder perfectly suspends stick incense and is a perfect pedestal to watch your incense burn. Made of borosilicate glass, measures 3.5" D x 2.25" H. Includes one incense holder, choice of color.

name: Everyday 20L Totepack
description: The clean look of a tote with the active carry convenience of a backpack, the Everyday Totepack is ideal for on-the-go everyday and photo carry. Padded backpack carry straps quickly stow, leaving you with robust padded hand carry straps. An extra wide top access point seals via magnetic clasp or weatherproof zip. Dual zip access points on either side for grabbing your camera, water bottle, or other oft-used items. Carry even more with 2 stowable external carry cinch straps.

name: Parachute Waffle Bath Towel
description: The perfect balance of cozy and modern. Made of 100% long-staple Turkish cotton and textured with a honeycomb weave. Includes 1 towel.

name: Rainbow Cake
description: This delicious 5 layers of colorful cake with a fruity flavor is covered with a delicious white-cream frosting and topped with a spectrum of frosting dollops. Serves 6 to 8, measures 7 inches in diameter.

name: Signature Line Bundle
description: The ultimate tea lovers gift set. This bundle includes 8 boxes of tea featuring 1 of each Signature Line tea blend. Each box contains 10 tea bags and flavors include Chai, Fake Coffee, Cup of Sunshine, Cup of Love, Royal Treatmint, Edith Grey, Blushing, and Chamomile Mint.

name: Signature Tote
description: Designed for drawn out days, the Legend is Dagne's largest signature coated canvas tote bag, and it lives up to its reputation. Stylish and spacious for those long days that become nights or those legendary nights that become days, this tote can carry everything you need, including the details. The Legend features a padded laptop compartment, pockets for your personal details (ie: wallet, phone, metro card, lip balm), a key leash, and a sturdy zipper to conceal it all. Dimensions are L 14 ¾” x H 11 ½” x W 6”.

name: Vegan Leather Tote Bag
description: This large and stylish vegan leather tote bag is perfect for anyone on the go. An inside pocket helps keep your phones, keys, or wallet organized. It has a premium vegan leather open top, and measures 18.5”W X 13.5”H X 6”D.

name: Australian Shearling Scuff Slippers
description: Make your other slippers jealous with these luxuriously soft, warm, and cozy shearling lined slides. The best part? The moisture wicking shearling lining naturally adjusts to your body temperature. These slippers will keep your feet warm and toasty in winter, or cool and cozy during summer. Once you slide into these slippers, you won’t want to take them off, no matter what the season. Made with suede leather and 100% Australian shearling lining and insole. Durable non-slip rubber outsole.

name: Royalty Luxury Candle
description: Black History Month is an opportunity to understand Black history and to spotlight Black achievement. Onyi Home Essentials wanted to put forward a candle that personifies black excellence and celebrates their achievement. The elegance of the vessel embodies the rich history of African-Americans in this country. Notes of Bergamot, Sparkling Orange & White Jasmine. 11oz, burn time 80 hours.

name: Extra Strength Whitening Pen
description: The extra strength whitening pen contains fast-acting 9% hydrogen peroxide that removes stains from the teeth faster. This pen contains 40+ treatments and is a quick way to whiten and remove stains from coffee, wine, soda, tea, smoking and more.

name: Alpha 6700 APS-C Mirrorless Camera
description: The α6700 combines the latest AI technology with Sony's outstanding α-series image quality in a compact APS-C camera body. Offering enhanced subject recognition, the latest technology for capturing stills and movies, and E-mount lens compatibility, the lightweight α6700 is designed for creative adventures, anytime, anywhere.

name: Hat Care Kit
description: Stay clean from head to toe. The Jason Markk Hat Care Kit includes a fragrance-free solution specifically formulated to gently, yet effectively clean hat materials, along with their signature soft-bristled Premium Brush. This gentle new formula is safe to use on cotton, wool, felt, corduroy, polyester and more. Kit includes 4oz. Ready-To-Use Hat Cleaner and Premium Cleaning Brush.

name: World Central Kitchen Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide fresh meals to communities in need.

name: Hooked: How to Build Habit-Forming Products
description: How do successful companies create products people can’t put down? Why do some products capture widespread attention while others flop? Nir Eyal answers these questions (and many more) by explaining the Hook Model—a four-step process embedded into the products of many successful companies to subtly encourage customer behavior. Through consecutive “hook cycles,” these products reach their ultimate goal of bringing users back again and again without depending on costly advertising or aggressive messaging.

name: Pava Toner
description: Achieve smoother, softer, and glowing skin with this uniquely formulated blend of glycolic acid, papaya, and guava, which gently resurfaces and dissolves dead skin cells. It serves as the ideal skin reset to achieve healthier, happier, and clearer skin.

name: Great Jones King Sear
description: This 12-inch cast-iron skillet is a durable workhorse ideal for cooking chicken with crispy skin, caramelized onions, and steak. It’s big enough to feed multiple pals, and pre-seasoned to make cleaning easy. Great Jones partners with and donates regularly to charities that focus on food insecurity, including Hot Bread Kitchen and Heart of Dinner.

name: Box of 36 Macarons
description: The specialist in authentic high end French macarons, the freshness and quality of these meringue-based confections will melt in your mouth. Includes a box of 36 macarons.

name: Pure Matcha, 40g Tin 3-Pack
description: The foundational green superfood for energy, focus, and cellular health for all. Pure Matcha goes beyond Ceremonial Grade: freshly shade-grown and cold-processed in Uji, Japan for maximum antioxidant and amino acid content. It’s organically grown and certified radiation-free and heavy metal-free. It’s also vegan, gluten free, and non-GMO.

name: Omaha Top Favorites
description: This gift includes 4 (10 oz.) Ribeyes, 4 (5 oz.) Butcher's Cut Top Sirloins, 8 (5 oz.) Steak Burgers, 4 (6 oz.) Boneless Pork Chops, 8 (3 oz.) Gourmet Jumbo Franks, 4 Boneless Chicken Breasts (1 lb. pkg.), 4 Potatoes Au Gratin, 4 Caramel Apple Tartlets & 1 oz. jar Signature Seasoning.

name: Women's Merino Wool Blend Sweater Quarter Socks
description: Imagine a wizard transformed your coziest sweater into a pair of socks. Well, start believing in magic, because these resident sock wizards have made a sock that's as soft, cozy and perfect for wearing on brisk winter days as the coziest sweater out there. Made with Merino Wool blend, it's warm and festive, perfect for lounging, celebrating, and just generally snuggling up. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Rebels of Kindness Recycled Trucker Hat
description: Kindhumans donates 3% of your gift to a nonprofit of your choice. They’re leading the charge in offering this sweet trucker hat that’s made of recycled polyester and recycled terry cloth. These Rebels of Kindness recycled hats are super comfortable, eco-friendly, and will soon become part of your everyday outfit!

name: Men's Dress Calf Sock 12-Pack
description: Get your dream sock drawer: filled with comfortable Bombas. A little shorter than a normal dress sock, hitting mid-calf. That makes these a little more casual, but with all the same comfort innovations and sock tech as regular dress socks. 12 purchased = 12 donated.

name: Movers & Shakers
description: Tea-to-go. The Stop-Infusion Travel Mug brews the perfect cup of tea and keeps it hot or cold for hours. The 3-tea sampler pack will keep you performing all day long. Gift includes One 16oz Stop-Infusion Travel Press and 3 Tea Sampler.

name: Disney Peter Pan & Wendy’s Storybook Adventure
description: Endless stories await Disney and Peter Pan fans aged 5+ in this LEGO® Disney Peter Pan & Wendy’s Storybook Adventure set. The book is based on the upcoming Peter Pan & Wendy movie and features the Darling house with a bedroom, Big Ben, the Lost Boys’ hideout, Skull Island, a pirate ship, 3 LEGO micro-doll figures, a LEGO animal figure and a key. The LEGO Builder app will guide them on an easy and intuitive building adventure, letting them zoom in and rotate models in 3D, save sets and track their progress. Includes 111 pieces and is best for ages 5+.

name: Mise en Place Prep Bowl Set
description: The Mise en Place Set contains 4 nestled bowls of different sizes, ranging from about 3” to just under 7”. They’re perfect for prepping spices, herbs, and other ingredients ahead of cooking, which will save you time, minimize cleaning, and eliminate unnecessary or duplicative work. They’re also an elegant way to serve garnishes, sauces, and other accoutrements. As beautiful as they are high-performing. Each bowl is fired in Stoke-on-Trent, England, where the local clay and pottery tradition creates uniquely hard-wearing high alumina vitrified china. Prized for its beauty, longevity, and unrivaled chipping resistance, it’s historically been reserved for the hospitality industry, until now.

name: Limited Edition Jet Set Travel Kit
description: With this Jet Set Travel Kit, you can ditch the hotel samples for an on-the-go, easy and effective routine built with your skin in mind. These five simple steps are all you need to pack before you hit the road. And, yes, it’s TSA-approved. This set includes Daily SPF + Moisturizer, Dark Circle Eye Rescue, Clay Cleanser 15ml Sample, Hydro Boost Gel 15ml Sample, and Matte Lip Balm.

name: The FTL Original
description: The bag loved by business travelers, athletes, entrepreneurs, and more. A true balance of function & aesthetics. An aesthetic that works in a gym, in an office, and anywhere in between, this bag is made with fully water resistant vegan leather, and has extremely efficient carrying capabilities. Features a padded laptop sleeve, separated shoe comparetment, two primary compartments for clothes, and attaches easily to a roller bag. Measures 18.5" x 8" x 11".

name: Mouthwash Starter Kit, Recipient's Choice
description: So simple to use, you can do it with one hand: just press the dispensing button, pour into the pre-marked dosage cup, add water, and swish for one minute. It’s a little bit of mouthwash magic! The reusable dispenser is built to last. Press to dispense perfect amount into your dishwasher-safe cup.

name: Monogrammed Leather Heart Keychain
description: This personalized black, heart-shaped leather keychain with antique hardware is the perfect way to keep your keys organized. Choice of monogram inscription and leather color. Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted, 1 character limit.

name: Freeze Dried Skittles
description: Shift from the well-known chewiness of Skittles to an innovative, crisp sensation poised to captivate and delight your taste buds. Indulge in a generous 16-ounce serving of Freeze Dried Skittles, a big resealable bag perfect for sharing and ideal for snacking, enhancing movie nights, or as a delightful topping on ice cream, cakes, or your favorite treat. It's the familiar candy you adore, now with an exciting spin! Contains 16 oz.

name: amfAR Donation
description: The gift of giving! amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research, is one of the world's leading nonprofit organizations dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education, and advocacy.

name: Sun Choker
description: This everyday vintage brass choker is made of brass and measures 17". Each choker is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship out.

name: Skincare Starter Set
description: This clean, super moisturizing face oil and oil balm are made from the Original Extra Virgin Olive Oil for skincare that is powered by polyphenols, naturally-occurring antioxidants. Set includes 1 Extra Virgin Oil Balm, 1 Extra Virgin Hydrating Face Oil, and a Kosterina Drawstring Pouch.

name: 3-in-1 Avocado Slicer
description: The plastic blade smoothly cuts through avocado skin and fruit, yet isn't sharp to the touch. The pitting tool quickly removes pits with a simple twist. The fan blade cuts fruit into perfect slices and scoops them out for serving. Measures 7.75" x 2.25" x 1".

name: Nourish Your Mind Stainless Steel Bottle
description: Keep your mind and body hydrated all day with this everyday water bottle. Made from recycled metal you can also feel good about reducing your environmental footprint. It has a 17 oz capacity and features a twist off lid.

name: Branded Stalwart Backpack
description: Navigate your day efficiently from morning commute to evening gym session with this 26-liter backpack that has a large opening for quick-access to the main compartment. It also features an organizational panel and a 15 inch laptop padded sleeve to protect your gear, while keeping it accessible.

name: Friendship Macaron Collection
description: This friendship collection includes 12 macarons in rose, green apple, and lemon flavors, plus 6 printed macarons with friendly icons for extra fun! Includes 1 Rose printed with a heart, 1 Rose printed with “Hugs & Kisses”, 1 Green Apple printed with a heart, 1 Green Apple printed with “Hugs & Kisses”, 2 Lemon printed with “XOXO”, 2 Rose, 2 Green Apple, 2 Lemon.

name: 6 Pack
description: The best part of a Sundae Cone now available as a bite-sized snack! GMO-Free and Kosher UD Certified, and stored in a resealable bag, choose which flavor you want or try them all in the variety pack!

name: Deli and Cheese Half Gallon Bag, 4 Pack
description: Goodbye, messy deli drawer. Hello, serene and orderly land of lunch possibilities. These half-gallon (re)zips are slim yet spacious, perfect for storing cold cuts and sliced cheeses. Like all (re)zips, they're durable, food-safe, and simple to clean which makes them remarkably convenient for meal prep, freezing fruit for smoothies, keeping fresh herbs fresh, and cut veggies handy for healthy snacking.

name: Monogram Tag
description: The Monogram Tag is the perfect addition to your favorite travel bag and a great way to make the on-the-go lifestyle feel more personal. Choice of color and monogramming. Special characters not permitted, 3 character limit.

name: Always
description: Eternally iconic and elegant, red roses still stand out as the ultimate symbol of unconditional love. If you're looking to show someone all the love in your heart (or sweep someone off those feet), this 12 Rose Bouq has a perfect track record. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: The Good Shears
description: As seen in Bon Appetit, GQ, The New York Times, and more. The ultimate in quick kitchen cutting and everyday use. With micro-serrated blades made of German stainless steel and comfy silicone handles, you can snip up herbs and craft for hours with one nifty tool.

name: Nodpod®
description: Nodpod's award winning strap-free design equally distributes the power of deep-touch pressure across key pressure points to help calm overactive minds, soothe headaches and help you sink into deep restful sleep.

name: Lightweight Down Duvet Insert, Full/Queen
description: Transform your bed into a cloud of comfort. Made with European white down, this insert has a fill power of 750, giving it superior fluff and just the right amount of warmth. Soft sateen is sewn around the down in a baffle box construction, keeping the feathers evenly distributed. It's finished it off with sturdy, double stitched seams to maintain its shape and durability for years to come.

name: Elsie Elephant Plush Toy
description: Upgrade your dog's toy collection with the best-selling Elsie Elephant Plush toy. This chic & whimsical toy will give your pup something to fetch, chew, and snuggle.

name: Y2 New Generation Foot Massager with Heat and Vibration
description: Y2 is bringing the home foot massage experience to a whole new level. Featuring Petrissage Max Technology, various massage modes, target heat, and effortless wireless control, Y2 is truly the best foot massager to buy as a treat for yourself or anyone you love. Say goodbye to foot pain in the heels, bottom of your foot, and ankle pain. See how your life changes when you're uptuned from the ground up!

name: amfAR Donation
description: The gift of giving! amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research, is one of the world's leading nonprofit organizations dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education, and advocacy.

name: Jack Puzzle
description: It is exactingly milled, and weighs just over one pound with six different notched brass bars interlocking in one specific way to create a unified "jack" shape. A desk object, a paperweight, and a true distraction, but be warned, if you take it apart, you might not be able to figure out how to put it back together. It's made from solid brass, measures 3" x 3" x 3", and weighs 1.1 lbs.

name: Therabody RecoveryTherm Hot and Cold Vibration Knee
description: Ice packs and heating pads are a thing of the past with RecoveryTherm Hot & Cold Vibration Knee. This all-in-one device seamlessly combines cold, heat and vibration therapy to optimize recovery and keep you moving throughout the day. With cold therapy, manage pain and inflammation. To reduce tension and aches, apply heat. And to maximize effectiveness, try vibration for increased blood flow and pain relief. Therabody's proprietary Cryothermal Technology enables fast cooling, heating, and effective contrast therapy. RecoveryTherm takes knee rehabilitation to the next level.

name: Lassie Travel Bowl, Large
description: Fun travel bowls in a larger size, this Lassie is the perfect solution for feeding your pup while on the go. It's made of durable fabric and can be folded in half, with a zipper design that keeps it collapsed and easy to transport. Perfect for any outdoor event. Easy clean waterproof lining. Features a dog snap to attach to leash, key chain, or bag. Measures 4" x 7.5" diameter.

name: Infused Olive Oil
description: Grown on small family farms in California’s Central Coast, these olives are cold-pressed by a master miller within 90 minutes of harvest for freshness and flavor. Choose which infused oil best compliments tonight's fare!

name: My First Touch Musical Doodle Board
description: Crayola Touch Lights gives your toddler the power of creative play with a self-contained gel tablet and exciting lights and sounds. The sealed gel surface is safe for doodling with fingers, making it perfect perfect for mess-free, portable play. Includes Touch Lights unit with 6 songs and 12 colors and instructions.

name: Le Mini Round Eternity Rose
description: Each Le Mini arrangement features a stunning, singular Eternity Rose®, set in Venus Et Fleur's luxurious Parisian-hat box inspired round boxes. The Le Mini is the ideal arrangement for elevating any small space, and serve as perfect gifts. Box measures 2"x2"x2". Includes one eternity rose, choice of color.

name: Mini Hoops
description: These mini hoops add a pop of newness to an otherwise classic shape. Lightweight, versatile, and stylish, these hoops look great with everything from your polished 9-to-5 look to the of-the-moment outfit you styled for this Friday night. These handmade hoops are approximately 1.2” in diameter. Includes one pair, choice of color.

name: Classic Latte
description: A fan favorite for a reason, this kit includes everything you need to make Copper Cow's signature Vietnamese coffee. The Classic Latte kit includes 5 Classic Black Vietnamese coffee pour over filters and 5 single-serve sweetened condensed milk creamers to complete your coffee experience.

name: Insulated Flask + Speaker
description: Built from durable stainless steel with double-walled insulation, and a fully-integrated, weatherproof, Speaqua premium Bluetooth speaker, the Insulated Flask is a practical tool that makes the moments in between adventure memorable. Engineered to address common issues of traditional flasks, the VSSL Insulated Flask keeps your drink exactly the temperature it’s supposed to be, features a removable drinking cap for easy filling and cleaning, a locking carabiner top for secure carry, and is built tough thanks to 304 stainless steel.

name: The Skinnytaste Air Fryer Cookbook
description: Gina Homolka brings her expertise to the game-changing air fryer appliance. Using high-powered, super-hot circulating air like a convection oven, air fryers crisp up your favorite fried foods with barely any oil needed. Cook times are shorter than traditional oven methods and the process requires little clean-up.

name: You Made a Fool of Death with Your Beauty
description: You Made a Fool of Death with Your Beauty is a 2022 romance novel by Nigerian writer Akwaeke Emezi. It is Emezi's first romance novel, third adult novel and it follows Feyi Adekola, a Nigerian American visual artist as she heals from the trauma of widowhood and finds new love. Hardcover.

name: NAACP Donation
description: The gift of giving! NAACP’s mission is to ensure the political, educational, equality of minority group citizens of States and eliminate race prejudice.

name: Emilie Multi Strand Necklace
description: Pull off an effortlessly layered look in the Emilie Multi Strand Necklace. Mini versions of Kendra Scott's most iconic silhouettes and delicate Chains put you in the freshly-showered-sun-soaked-warm-kinda mood. Made with 14k yellow gold over brass, the chains measure 15.5" with a 3" extender and lobster claw closure.

name: Nourish Stainless Steel Bottle
description: Keep your mind and body hydrated all day with this everyday water bottle. Made from recycled metal you can also feel good about reducing your environmental footprint. Bottle comes with a twist off lid and has a 23 oz capacity.

name: Signature Line Sample Set
description: An herbal tea-tasting flight with 100% organic herbs, flowers, and spices that are super good for you. Try the rainbow, which includes 2-tea bag samples each of Cup of Love, Fake Coffee, Cup of Sunshine, Royal Treatmint, Chamomile Mint, Edith Grey, Blushing, and Chai.

name: Moments Candle
description: Be transported to a moment you love with natural soy wax blend scented candles and fragrance oils from Homesick. Find a candle that takes you back to that special memory.

name: The Sidekick Tech Kit
description: Leave your device stand at home next time— this Tech Kit has got you covered. A flap on the back flips out with ease and becomes a kickstand for your phone or tablet, so you've always got a spot to catch the game or take a meeting. Power mesh and elastic organizers keep your cables and gear in place, and the front pocket is purpose-built to house a portable charger. It's got a splash-resistant exterior, and the whole thing zips open flat for easy access.

name: Tivoli Audio Revive
description: Revive is so much more than a Bluetooth speaker. Stream high quality audio and change the direction of the speaker with the pivoting head. Light up any space with the LED lamp with 4 brightness options. Put your phone on the base and charge your phone with Qi wireless technology. Need to charge something without wireless capability? A USB port included for those items. Simple buttons built into the base of Revive allow you to control volume, pairing, and lamp brightness easily. Clear up the clutter of cords with the Revive and enjoy high-quality audio with this simple and elegant solution. Choice of color.

name: Natural Premium Bamboo Queen Top Sheet
description: A simple, breathable, hypoallergenic and silky-soft flat sheet made of viscose from bamboo. The perfect finishing touch for the perfect bed. Includes one queen top sheet, choice of color.

name: Supersonic Hair Dryer
description: Blow away your clients with this thoughtful gift. Give the gift of endless, salon-quality blowouts from home with the Dyson Supersonic hair dryer. With five attachments to style your hair your way including a styling concentrator, diffuser, gentle air attachment, wide-tooth comb and flyaway attachment.

name: Classic Soda Variety 12 Pack
description: Sip down memory lane with some of your favorite throwbacks like Vintage Cola, Classic Root Beer, Doctor Goodwin and Cream Soda.

name: Allover Roller
description: Esker’s Allover Roller is made up of a textured Xiuyan Jade roller and polished Xiuyan Jade handle to provide a deep and gentle self massage for the entire body. At 7” long and 3.25” wide Allover Roller’s texture is designed to break up fascia in the top layers of the skin to reduce tension and puffiness. This unique tool also encourages a deeper penetration of Esker’s Body Oils. With continued use, the Allover Roller reveals a renewed skin that is firm, soft, and glowing.

name: Dextera 39mm Watch
description: This bold Swiss Made chronograph will help you make the most of every hour. Distinguished by its 39 mm faceted case and multi-linked bracelet in stainless steel, the metallic styling is heightened by a silvery bezel featuring Roman and Arabic numerals, as well as a silvery dial that is given extra dimension through its grid pattern, three counters, crystals for index markers, and a single stone in the crown. An industrial-chic piece from the Dextera family. Water-resistant to 50m. Watch strap measures 6.25" and case measures 1.75" x 5.5".

name: Mini Hoop
description: Light-weight, agile & portable, each mini hoop was designed by a featured artist. Made of quality components including a sturdy polycarbonate backboard with a durable steel rim and precision printed digital graphics. Includes 5" mini rubber ball and padding to protect doors. Mini hoop weighs 2 lbs. Choice of hoop design.

name: Porter Bowl
description: An ultralight lunch container, perfect for transporting your salad, grain bowl, or leftovers - wherever life may take you. Roomy, one-liter capacity packs everything from big salads and grain bowls to pasta and veggies. Crafter from BPA-free plastic, the durable base is wrapped in the highest quality protective silicone with a silicone snap-strap to secure the lid. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Elvis Playing Cards
description: From his early days in Tupelo, Mississippi to becoming a worldwide phenomenon, take the stage with Elvis each time the cards are held in your hand and brought out for play. The box packaging is made for the spotlight - featuring multi-level embossing, hot stamping, and flashy pink and gold foil. It dazzles and pops with a presence that only Elvis himself can deliver. Grab your ticket, take your seat, and enjoy the show!

name: Celebrating Female-founded Brands
description: Let your recipient choose a gift from our curated selection of female-founded brands.

name: 24 FT Gym Flooring Exercise Mats
description: Comprising 6 seamlessly interlocking gym flooring pieces accompanied by 10 borders, this set boasts shock-absorbing qualities and effortless assembly for your convenience.

name: Smart Hydroplanter
description: Grow an indoor, organic garden all year round with this Hydroplanter. This bamboo hydroponic planter connects to the Modern Sprout App, which enables users to select or create an irrigation schedule based on plant preferences. Features a top-feed setup that delivers water and nutrients directly to the roots of 3-5 plants of your choosing. Stylish and multi-functional, the Hydroplanter is perfect for a wide array of herbs, veggies, fruits, flowers and more. Requires a 2.4GHz wifi network.

name: Tea To Go Gift Set
description: This set includes a Stop-Infusion Travel Mug and 2 packages of premium loose leaf teas. The stop-Infusion Travel Mug makes perfect hot or iced tea on-the-go. The tea is packaged in home-compostable pouches, and makes 16-20 cups. Packaged in premium gift box with gold foil embossing.

name: Bloody Mary Bar
description: Perfect for any brunch lover, this curated selection of essentials and snacks will elevate any brunch game. The package includes all the key ingredients to craft the ideal bloody Mary, including Big Tom Bloody Mary Mix, a salt and pepper blend of sea salt, and spicy Black Truffle hot sauce. To add extra depth of flavor, also included is Farmstead Bloody Mary Mix. The care package isn't just about the drink. It also includes delicious snacks that pair perfectly with a Bloody Mary,  creamy queso dip with crackers or sharp cheddar cheese and savory salami.

name: Playing Cards Variety Box
description: Select 12 decks for your own personal brick of playing cards!

name: Le Mini Number Eternity Roses
description: The Le Mini Number is comprised of roses in a number-shaped black box inspired by a Parisian hat box. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care. These mini flower numbers are perfect for celebrating birthdays, anniversaries, and other important milestones. Includes one arrangement in a letter shaped Parisian hat box, choice of number and floral color.

name: Baby Led Weaning Complete Set
description: The UpwardBaby toddler feeding set comes with everything you need to help your little one start exploring food. Perfect for baby-lead weaning and children learning to feed themselves for the first time! It includes the Strong Suction Bowl and Placemat, 3 Food Catcher Bib, and 3 Baby Led Spoons. These  silicone baby utensils won’t stain and are dishwasher, microwave, and freezer safe.

name: Paradise Loose Leaf Tea Box
description: Find yourself a little piece of paradise anytime, anywhere. This relaxing chamomile tea is light and satisfying at the same time, layered with subtle lemon verbena and lavender notes. Apple and rosehips add body and sweetness. Makes 25-30 cups.

name: The Clean Essentials
description:
Upgrade your clean routine with just the essentials, these four best-selling products all in one bundle. These items have all of the plant-based power without any of the single-use plastic, made to keep your home and planet in tip top shape. This set includes 1 reusable 9oz glass Forever Bottle and
1 Foaming Hand Soap tablet (Scent: Iris Agave), 1 Multi-Surface Cleaner Forever Bottle and 1 Multi-Surface tablet (Scent: Fresh Lemon), 1 Bathroom Cleaner reusable 24oz Forever Bottle with 1 Bathroom tablet (Scent: Eucalyptus Mint), and 1 Glass + Mirror Cleaner reusable 24oz Forever Bottle with 1 Glass + Mirror tablet (fragrance-free).

name: World Necklace with Chain
description: This beautiful pendant necklace includes not one, but all 7 of the continents. Take the world with you everywhere you go with this globe inspired pendant. Pendant is 18mm in size with an adjustable 16-18" chain. Pieces are finished so they are water, sweat and tarnish resistant.

name: Monogrammed Double Expansion Travel Satchel
description: With an impressive 13" of expanded depth to maximize your packing capacity, this exceptionally strong travel satchel is the one to grab for long weekends. A generous front pocket allows you quick and easy access to key essentials. Made from TUMI’s signature, ultra-durable FXT® ballistic nylon.

name: Rise And Shine Set
description: Start and end your day the right way with the Rise and Shine set of 8 patches. Power through the afternoon slump with B12 Awake, and use Dream for the beauty sleep you deserve. Includes 4 patches of each, Awake and Dream.

name: Baby Swaddle
description: This soft swaddle blanket is all about optimal Mom function, with a sun design to make her smile. It measures 47” x 47” and is made with super soft bamboo and cotton blend.

name: Bioluminescent Paddle Adventure for Two, TIitusville, FL
description: Experience nature's incredible light show as two of you paddle through the glowing waters of the Indian River Lagoon during this Bioluminescent Paddle Adventure! Learn the basics of paddling a kayak or canoe from a 5-star rated experience provider while discovering the amazing secrets behind the natural phenomenon of bioluminescence. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Organic Cotton Knit Throw
description: Keep this chunky organic cotton throw close at hand for your next movie night or impromptu afternoon nap. The thick knit stitch adds cozy texture to super-soft cotton yarns – which make it light enough for year-round use.

name: Invisible Women: Data Bias in a World Designed for Men
description: A landmark, prize-winning, international bestselling examination of how a gender gap in data perpetuates bias and disadvantages women, now in paperback. Data is fundamental to the modern world, but because so much data fails to take into account gender, it treats men as the default and women as atypical, and bias and discrimination are baked into our systems. And women pay tremendous costs for this insidious bias, in time, in money, and often with their lives.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Wrap
description: Easy, elevated, elegance. Perfect whether you’re bundled up in a chilly office, napping on a long flight, or need a layer for after sunset in wedding season. This cashmere wrap shawl will keep you cozy, is incredibly long-lasting, three times as warm as wool, and sourced sustainably and ethically. Crafted from 100% Grade-A Mongolian cashmere with a 12-gauge fabric weight. Measures 86" x 25.5".

name: Bamboo Meditation Bench
description: Experience longer, deeper meditation with the Florensi folding meditation bench. This meditation chair is made of durable bamboo with a soft, removable velvet cushion. This meditation bench allows you to sit in many different positions, including seiza, lotus, cross-legged or with your legs tucked underneath. It also features a 5-degree forward tilt and does not require you to cross your legs, so you can practice mindfulness in comfort without pins and needles, numbness, or pain.

name: Flower Pin Earrings
description: A notorious Yam design. A playful flower earring made from recycled metal and finished on a hoop. Casted in New York. Made with brass/bronze with a gold filled hoop, each measures 2" long. Each pair is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship.

name: Collapsible 20 oz Sports Bottle
description: A shape-shifting wonder with a twist cap for more on-the-go hydration. It holds 20 oz of liquid when full, and collapses into a polite sphere when empty. Comes with a tether for hands-free carrying. Dishwasher safe, comes apart for easy cleaning. Bottle made of LFGB Certified silicone, cap made of BPA-free polypropylene.

name: Suede Mule, Saddle
description: The classic, wear-anywhere mule is a wardrobe workhorse. With a sleek pointed toe that elongates the leg, this chic and comfortable flat pulls together any outfit. Handmade in Italy, it's 100% suede.

name: Miracle-Set 3 Stone Ridged Gentlemen's Ring
description: Just for him, a diamond fashion ring as stylish and sophisticated as he is. Created in sleek two-tone .925 Sterling Silver, this handsome band is centered with a trio of shimmering diamonds in unique settings that make them appear larger. Grooved detailing along the shank adds texture and dimension to the style. Dazzling with 1/20 ct. t.w. of diamonds, this ring is finished with a bright polished shine.

name: Gluten-Free Birthday Gift Box 25 Count
description: Celebrate your GFFs (gluten-free friends) with a delicious bite-size dessert! Fill a colorful birthday gift box with an assortment of gluten-free cupcakes (made with rice flour!) in new flavors like Cookies & Cream, Marshmallow, Cookie Dough, and Chocolate Caramel. Every treat is handcrafted with the most delicious gluten-free ingredients and is safe for people with celiacs.

name: Grow By Gifting Jubilant Succulent Garden Trio
description: Three beautiful hand-picked succulents in a modern four-inch ceramic pot, planted 24 hours before delivery in soil and rock.

name: Soft Knit Beanie
description: Ease the chill of any day with this soft knit beanie. One size fits most.

name: Coconut Wax Candle
description: Crafted from organic coconut wax with a cotton wick for clean burning, these candles fill your home with the benefits of natural essential oils and can be reused as a double-walled drinking glass after the candle is finished. Herbal, Woody, Fresh, and Floral fragrances bring a sense of calm and clarity into your space, while the reusable double-walled glass vessel can be enjoyed long after the life of the candle. Includes one, 6 oz candle with a burn time of 40-45 hours. Choice of fragrance.

name: Original Deano Tote Bag, States Prints
description: The tote bag that started it all, Scout's original design that remains their #1 best-seller year after year for a reason! This versatile open-top tote is ideal for carrying pretty much everything (work stuff, beach/pool stuff, sports stuff). It measures 19" W x 15" H x 10" D.

name: Retro Water Bottle
description: Stay hydrated on the court! This new water bottle is equal parts style and function. This retro style bottle is lightweight, portable, and leak-proof. Measures 9.84" x 2.76", holds 620ml / 21oz. 100% BPA free.

name: SOS Spray Duo
description: A soothing, purifying, and renewing toner treatment for fast angry skin relief. Use AM/PM to maintain and prevent redness and irritation. Spritz SOS anywhere, everywhere with a TSA-approved mini + a regular full-size SOS Daily Rescue Facial Spray for general skin maintenance and angry-skin prevention.

name: Small Pillo Dog Bed
description: Pillo is an ultra durable, adaptable, and most of all cozy dog bed that celebrates dogs for being dogs. Its plush filling and tough exterior allow pups to express their natural nesting and burrowing instincts without having to worry about rips and tears. Dimensions are 26"L x 2-6"H x 18"W.

name: Make-A-Wish Donation
description: The gift of giving! For every wish we’re able to grant, there’s another child with a critical illness waiting for theirs.

name: Magnetic Acacia Wood Knife Block
description: Gorgeous, matte acacia wood. Industrial-strength neodymium magnets. A hefty weight and size that won’t slide around your counter or tumble over. All reasons to love this clever knife block from Marcellin. Its arc-shaped design allows you to fan your blade handles out, maximizing space and safety while displaying your prized steel in a way that actually looks nice. All together, it’s a one-two punch that instantly boosts your kitchen organization and keeps your blades (and your hands) as safe as possible. It weighs 7 lbs, 6 oz, and measures (L) 9.75" x (W) 2.75" x (H) 9.75". Includes knife stand only, knives not included.

name: Bride Piñatagram
description: Surprise a bride to be! Filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: Flowknit Performance Half-Zip
description: Supersoft with half zip action, this long sleeve has a secure cell phone pocket at side-seam and a collar that's waiting to be popped. Quince's Flowknit is made from Global Recycle Standard poly yarn, which diverts and recycles plastics destined for landfill or the ocean, so you can feel and look good in what you wear.

name: Le Cuisinier Gift Basket
description: Elevate the culinary experience to new heights with the Cuisiner Basket. This luxurious gift basket has been carefully curated to offer a fine selection of artisanal pantry essentials, hand-picked for exceptional quality and flavor. Each hand woven raffia and pine needle basket comes carefully packaged in Venus et Fleur's signature black classic box and includes a Sylvie Porcelain Vase Eternity® red rose arrangement, olive wood cooking utensils, Picual olive oil, Himalayan pink sea salt, and an olive wood salt cellar. Celebrate moments and create memories with this culinary indulgence.

name: 1L Spiked Bottle
description: The endlessly refillable, beautifully sustainable cult favorite glass water bottle. It makes drinking water blissful, it’s dishwasher safe, it's the water bottle soulmate you never knew existed. 1L bottle, choice of color.

name: Vertuo Next Premium by Breville with Aeroccino3
description: Vertuo Next takes the full range of Nespresso coffee styles even further with five cup sizes available to brew at the touch of a button. With a sleek new design made from 54% recycled plastics and stylish chrome accents, Vertuo Next will fit any kitchen and to go the extra mile, even connects to Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to ensure its software is always up-to-date.

name: French Hair Pin
description: Uncomplicated, simple, and elegant. This French pin is the perfect accessory for an effortless updo that holds your hair in place while still being gentle on the strands. Pin a low bun in place, sweep your hair into a french twist, or create a twisted half-up bun. The French pin measures at 5 inches, so it is just big enough to handle all of your hair while still small enough to fit in a handbag on-the-go. Includes one hair pin, choice of color.

name: Double Wall Mug
description:
The double-wall design of these glass mugs does double duty: adding extra insulation for your hot beverages and creating a unique look in five different color options. Made with Borosilicate glass resistant to thermal shock, more so than any other ordinary glass.  Each mug is sold individually. Slight color variations & markings on the glass are not flaws but part of the standard glass blowing & staining process.  
 Hand-blown 
 Borosilicate Glass 
 Handwash only  
 6.8 oz (200 ml) 
 3.25" diameter x 3" height (8.3 x 7.6 cm)

name: BuildOn Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide access to education for a child in a country with high rates of poverty and illiteracy.

name: Vacation Summer Leisure Pack
description: A leisure pack to keep summer vibes going all year long. Includes: 1 Classic Lotion, 1 Super Spritzer, 2 Air Fresheners. Vegan, paraben-free and cruelty-free.

name: Women's BlanketBlend Joggers
description: Made with feat's signature BlanketBlend fabric for a super soft, fluffy outside and smooth inside. Featuring side pockets and continuous drawcord with signature metal tip Feat laces. This custom developed BlanketBlend fabric combines the comfort of cotton, with the performance features of polyester finished off with a rare yarn & ButterWash process to create a super soft, durable jogger for every occasion.

name: Eco Packable Sling Carrier
description: Made using water bottles and recycled nylon fabric. It’s the perfect bag, but with less waste. In addition to being eco-friendly, maxbone's first ever sling carrier packs up into a small included pouch for easy travel and storage. In this carrier, your tiny dog will feel cozy and right at home. The strap drop is 17"-21", the bag depth is 10.5", and the bag length is 23".

name: Star Wars™ Stackable Character Glasses, Set of 2
description: You don't have to travel to a galaxy far far away to find the perfect glassware set for any Star Wars™ fan, whether they’re in use or on a shelf. These 8oz glasses come in a set of two perfectly stackable glasses that form your favorite Star Wars™ characters when stacked. Each measures 6.5” W x 2.45" T. Dishwasher, fridge, freezer, and microwave safe.

name: Brightland The Mini Essentials
description: The Mini Essentials have a bright new look for the holidays. Includes Brightland’s bestsellers in petite, easy-to-share sizes for everyone on your list: AWAKE, ALIVE, RAPTURE and PARASOL.

name: Poop Bag Dispenser
description: This dispenser keeps poop bags easily accessible so you can take care of business and get back to enjoying your walk together. Includes one roll of Poop Bags to get you started and when you're ready it's easy to quickly refill and fits most standard waste bags.

name: The Way of Integrity
description: A life coach helps readers uncover what integrity looks like in their own lives. By Martha Beck. Hardcover.

name: inKind Pass Gift Card, $200 Value
description: inKind Pass gift cards can be redeemed via the inKind mobile app for food, beverage and tax across hundreds of top-rated restaurants, bars, and coffee shops nationwide. An inKind Pass gift card will be delivered via email within 24 hours. A $200 value.

name: Learn To Fly A Helicopter for One, Schaumburg, IL
description: Learn to Fly a Helicopter for 30 minutes as you take the controls of an extremely maneuverable OH-6A helicopter. You'll get an introduction into the operation of a helicopter and the theory of flight, and actually take the controls of the helicopter. Experience the unparalleled sensation of flight as you take the controls of a helicopter. Includes an experience for one person.

name: The Handler Floating Hand Grip for All GoPro Cameras
description: Keep your GoPro camera steady for captivating shots with the GoPro The Handler floating hand grip. The nonslip material ensures a firm grip for safe handling, while the adjustable wrist strap provides security. This floating hand grip keeps your camera on the surface if dropped on water, and the compatibility with most GoPro cameras allows quick setup.

name: Mulberry Silk Eye Mask
description: Sleeping on the luxurious Mulberry Silk protects skin and hair from friction damage. This eye mask is versatile: it's naturally cool to the touch while possessing a breathable yet insulating fabric, which makes it great for all seasons.

name: AIRKNIT x Boxer Brief
description: Breathable performance underwear engineered to keep you dry, cool, and comfortable to the end of your workout (or workday). Choice of color.

name: Infrared PEMF Go Mat
description: Stay grounded, wherever you go. The Infrared PEMF Go Mat is travel-ready and fits for your WFH chair, bringing you the benefits of client-favorite Infrared PEMF in a portable size. Pulsed Electromagnectic Field (PEMF) grounds you in the earth’s magnetic field for a full-body reset, while Infrared’s deeply-penetrating heat doubles your dose of recovery and detox. An additional layer of healing crystals emits negative ions, which boost your mood and neutralize free radicals in the body. Potential benefits include reduced stress, increased energy, better sleep, improved circulation and improved muscle recovery. Measures 19.5 x 39 inches, weighs 11 lbs.

name: Original Wayfarer Classic
description: Ray-Ban Original Wayfarer Classics are the most recognizable style in the history of sunglasses. Since its initial design in 1952, Wayfarer Classics gained popularity among celebrities, musicians, artists and those with an impeccable fashion sense. As an iconic style of sunglasses, Original Wayfarer Classics always make a statement. Glasses are eye size 50 mm.

name: Plantable Candle
description: This Zero-Waste luxury candle is hand poured, soy based, and designed to enjoy a multi-purpose lifespan by turning into a beautiful planter when the candle has finished. Each Plantable Candle includes plantable Seed Paper and a Soil Pod.

name: Face Cupping Kit
description: Give yourself a natural facelift. Face cupping is a Traditional Chinese Medicine technique that increases circulation, boosts collagen, and releases facial muscle tension. Each kit comes with a comprehensive how to guide so you feel ready to face your new routine.

name: Helix Match Cloche
description: The word helix, Greek for twisted, perfectly describes the ribbed inside of Skeem's new, clear match cloche collection. Crafted from hand-blown glass with 120 four-inch matches and a strike-on-bottle flint. Measures 7˝ high x 3˝ wide. Choice of color.

name: Maternity Gift Set
description: Curated just for Mama-to-be and tucked into the new Tulip XL Zip Pouch. All to celebrate this special body and this special time. The set includes a 4 pack of Blissful Moments Belly Mask, Love Lines Stretch Mark Balm and a beautiful tulip scented Tangent hand cream.

name: One on One Choker
description: This upcycled interlocked choker is made of brass and measures 17". Each choker is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship out.

name: Demon Copperhead
description: Set in the mountains of southern Appalachia, Demon Copperhead is the story of a boy born to a teenaged single mother in a single-wide trailer, with no assets beyond his dead father’s good looks and copper-colored hair, a caustic wit, and a fierce talent for survival. Hardcover.

name: Sinus Support
description: Beekeeper's combined the beehive’s most powerful immune supporter - propolis - with quercetin, bromelain and nettle leaf to provide a potent dose of seasonal sinus care that helps support healthy histamine levels. Use daily to proactively support healthy histamine levels and ease sinus response to dust and other irritants.

name: Cocoa Magic Mushroom Blend
description: The power of adaptogenic mushrooms meets single origin dark chocolate in this nourishing daily blend. Reishi supports a calm mood, lion's mane keeps you sharp, lucuma adds sweetness and chocolate makes you happy. It's practically magic. Just mix 2 tbsp into 1 cup of hot water or plant-based milk and froth for 30 seconds, until fully dissolved. Enjoy on its own or blend it with coffee, tea, smoothies, or oats. Enjoy cold for an iced cacao elixir. The pouch is 5oz and contains 8 servings of Cocoa Magic.

name: Global Fund for Women Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps ensure equal opportunity for people of all genders and especially women.

name: Italian Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: Quality meets design. An exclusive, refined packaging inspired by Italian tile patterns meets the complex, richness of this extra virgin olive oil by Frantoio d’Orazio. Spicy with almond notes, this Italian made oil has great character, harmony, and complexity. Never intrusive, always balanced, it is the right ingredient for any dish. Includes 1, 17.6 fl oz bottle.

name: Cabana Pet Carrier Set Plus with Personalized Embroidery
description: This set includes the Cabana Pet Carrier and the Aviator Carry-On Plus. The Aviator Plus Carry-On fits 4-7 days worth of clothes and 2-4 pairs of shoes. And now you can take [insert your furry companion’s name] wherever you go—comfortably, safely and smoothly. Its made with an EcoCraft Canvas® exterior made from 38 upcycled plastic bottles with recycled vegan leather details and fits pets up to 20lbs. This purchase is about more than a travel companion for your constant companions. Every Pet Carrier purchase helps cover medical and transportation bills for dogs at Rescue City, a rescue in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Acupressure Mat Set
description: If you suffer from chronic pain, tech neck, headaches, body stiffness or stress, the acupressure mat is for you. Leveraging the traditional principles of acupressure, the WTHN acu mat has gentle stimulators that activate points across the body to foster deep relaxation. Made with linen and filled with coconut fiber for your most luxurious acupressure session yet. This set includes a Coconut Fiber and Linen Acupressure Mat, Memory Foam and Linen Acupressure Pillow, and an On-the-Go Linen Carrying Case.

name: Mason Digital Frame
description: Send photos from your phone to Mason, Aura's WiFi-connected frame with even better resolution. Enjoy all your favorite moments on Mason's 9" Full HD display that sits in portrait or landscape (just flip the frame). Add unlimited photos and videos, and invite all your loved ones to fill the frame using the free Aura app. Frame measures 9.7" x 2" x 7.6", with a 1600 x 1200 display.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Throw
description: Expertly crafted from 100% Grade-A cashmere, this cashmere throw blanket is the epitome of luxurious comfort. Equally lightweight and cozy, it's the perfect year-round layer. Measures 50" x 60" with a 4" fringe and 500 gram-weight.

name: Reserve 12oz Old Fashioned Tritan, 4 Pack
description: Everyday elegance has never looked so good. With eye-catching colors, a stunning diamond cut base and best-in-class durability, the 12oz Old Fashioned makes upscale drinking an everyday thing. Made out of BPA-free Tritan™ Copolyester, a shatterproof, ultra-durable, and dishwasher-safe material, you will never have to worry about your favorite drinking vessel leaving you. Each cup measures 3.6" x 3.3" and holds 12 oz.

name: The Smoky Trio
description: The Fishwife Smoky Trio includes one tin each of smoked rainbow trout from Idaho, smoked albacore tuna from off the Pacific coast, and smoked Atlantic salmon from Norway. Each tin is brined in sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, brown sugar, and garlic salt, and wood smoked in small batches.

name: OHOM Uvio Self Purifying Water Bottle
description: The Uvio Water Bottle is a self-sanitizing bottle that uses state of the art UV-C technology to purify your drinking water wherever you go. Simple to use and designed with portability in mind, the Uvio Water Bottle fits effortlessly into an active and productive lifestyle.

name: Indoor Pizza Oven
description: Do pizza night right with the Cuisinart Indoor Pizza Oven: a must-have for making artisanal 12” pizzas right in your kitchen. Cook authentic Neapolitan pizza in 5 minutes or less and explore other regional favorites like deep dish, Detroit style, and New York style pizzas, all customized with your favorite toppings. This countertop oven uses radiant heat to reach 700°FL the ideal temperature for cooking the crispy crust and bubbling cheese you love for the tastiest, most authentic flavor.

name: Louis Vuitton: The Birth Of Modern Luxury
description: Louis Vuitton’s passion for fine luxury design is captured in the stunning pages of this book. Following the lives of the company’s first three leaders, this new edition includes updated material that covers the brand’s recent history. By Paul-Gérard Pasols. Hardover.

name: Deluxe Snack & Chocolate Gift Basket
description: Impressive and generous, this Snack & Chocolate Gift Basket is guaranteed to delight no matter the occasion. Inside a classic paperboard crate, you will discover an unparalleled selection of gourmet snacks and cookies. Complete with artisan crackers and savory cheese, this signature summer sausage, and parm crisps.

name: The Connoisseur's Set, Nosing Glass Edition
description: Discover the Original Rocks paired with stunningly beautiful crystal whiskey Nosing Glass. The round solid granite stones cool your drink without the dilution found from traditional melting ice cubes which alters the true taste of spirits. Designed for the connoisseur, this collection will elevate your whiskey tasting experience, awaking your senses as you sip your favorite whiskey.

name: World Famous Chocolate Assortment
description: This premium assortment of chocolates varies but may include chocolate covered nuts, chocolate caramel, chocolate fruits, oreos, marshmallows and confections. Handmade in Los Angeles.

name: Truffle Dozen Box
description: Bite-sized cake morsels in childhood favorite flavors that make the perfect celebratory treat. Includes one gift box of 12 cake truffles in your recipient's choice of flavors.

name: The Everyday Napkin, Set of 4
description: Dress them up or down, set them indoors or out! These napkins offer style, substance, and je ne sais quoi. Use and reuse them to your hand, lap, and heart’s desire, your tablescape will be better for it. This set of 4 napkins measure approximately 17" x 17".

name: Adult Paddle
description: Recess paddles are perfect for an impromptu pickleball game with friends or a spontaneous day in the sun! Have your pick from a variety of eye catching colors for the durable fiberglass surface on the composite paddle head. Each paddle includes an embroidered canvas case with leather detailing.

name: Personalized Money Clip Wallet
description: With its minimalist design, this custom money clip will be displayed with pride for years to come. Made with handmade, split leather, this wallet features 5 card slots, a cash stash pocket, and a magnetic money clip. Personalized with your choice of initials + choice of leather color. Please allow up to 10 business days for personalized gifts to deliver.

name: Deluxe Bakery Box
description: An indulgent assortment of the finest treats. This delicious deluxe bakery box includes six Brownies (Chocolate Truffle, Chocolate Truffle with Walnuts, Marble Cheesecake and Cookies & Cream), four Cookies (Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal Raisin, Snickerdoodle and Ginger Molasses) four JUMBO Brownies (Cheesecake, Raspberry Crumb, Velvet Ganache and Lemon Bar), three Sandwich Cookies (Chocolate Chip/Vanilla, Oatmeal/Vanilla and Vanilla/Caramel), three Black and White Cookies and three Gold-Foiled Chocolate Covered Cookies.

name: Bamboo Compression Socks
description: For all those who have to spend long hours sitting or standing, these socks apply a gradual compression that helps to improve blood flow.

name: RecoveryTherm Hot Vibration Back and Core
description: This all-in-one wearable device provides precise heat paired with expertly placed vibration to reduce back and core discomfort. Experience relief from everything from minor muscle tweaks to injuries to menstrual cramps, as well as chronic lower back pain and post-workout recovery. Hands-free and convenient, you can easily slip it on and go about your day.

name: Sculpd Candle Making Kit
description: This candle making kit provides you with everything you need to make your own unique candle! The Step-by-Step Candle Making Guide will walk you through the stages of making your candle and also provides some inspiration to help spark your imagination. What you make is really up to you. It's your own creative expression through clay.

name: SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen
description: This clean, mineral SPF 30 sunscreen absorbs instantly and is residue-free for immediate, water-resistant protection and hydration. The broad-spectrum gel-cream formula helps defend against harmful UVA + UVB rays + environmental aggressors with ingredients that help to brighten and replenish skin. Includes one 1.7 fl oz bottle.

name: Macaron Power Bank and Hand Warmer
description: Nothing’s worse than being in the cold with a dead phone battery. Now, with this cute power bank hand warmer, you can warm up frozen fingers in only 3 minutes and give your phone a charge simultaneously. This adorable macaron fits right in your purse and is ready for you when you need it most. Bring your phone back up to 100% and enjoy extra cozy hands. Plus, this cute power bank has a built-in mirror so you can look your best before every meeting. Large 10,000 mAh battery capacity can fully charge up multiple completely dead phones. Hand warmer heats up to 130F. Measures 3.46" x 3.46" x 1.5".

name: Flowery Gift Set
description: Savor a perfect blend of freshly mixed floral and herbal tea, elegantly packaged in plant-based materials. Each set features three tea boxes with 10 compostable bags per box, offering Cup of Love, Royal Treatmint, and Blushing flavors.

name: The I Love Trader Joe's Cookbook
description: Both budget-friendly and delicious, we all love Trader Joe's(R)! So why not explore your love for this beloved grocery store with the creative and mouthwatering recipes in The I Love Trader Joe's(R) Cookbook?

name: Toddler Pullover Fleece Hoodie
description: Designed for seamless comfort, this personalized toddler hoodie features a jersey-lined, double-needle hemmed hood for enhanced durability. Plus, it comes with cover-stitched shoulders and armholes, as well as cover-stitched waistband and cuffs. Along with the side seam pockets, these toddler hoodies are designed for long-lasting coziness.

name: Nespresso Vertuo Plus Deluxe Coffee & Espresso Machine with Aerocinno
description: Nespresso introduces the Vertuo Plus by De'Longhi, offering freshly brewed coffee with crema as well as delicious, authentic espresso. The VertuoPlus coffee machine conveniently makes 4 cup sizes at the touch of a button: 5oz, 8oz Coffee and single and double Espresso. Each machine includes a complimentary welcome set with a range of Nespresso pods Vertuo with unique aroma profiles.

name: Le Mini Square Eternity Roses
description: This Le Mini™ Square arrangement features 9 stunning mini roses, set in a classic Parisian-hat box inspired square box. The Le Mini is the ideal arrangement for elevating any small space, and serve as the perfect gift. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care. This arrangement fits in the palm of your hand, the box measuring 2"x 2"x 2". Includes one arrangement, choice of rose color.

name: Branded Tin Candle, 4oz
description: Create a treat for aromatherapy enthusiasts with these custom tin candles. These candles come natural coconut soy wax that is made and hand-poured in the USA. All candles feature a lead and zinc-free cotton wick with an average burning time of 20 hours.

name: Hidden Valley Road
description: Hidden Valley Road: Inside the Mind of an American Family is a 2020 non-fiction book by Robert Kolker. The book is an account of the Galvin family of Colorado Springs, Colorado, a midcentury American family with twelve children, six of whom were diagnosed with schizophrenia.

name: In Good Hands Gift Set
description: This intensely nourishing hand cream synthesizes vitamin B5 with absorbent fatty acids delivering intense hydration to skin, cuticles and nails. Pair it with a soothing mojito lip balm formulated with a blend of fatty acids giving your lips an extra layer of hydration and long-lasting protection when they need it most. This set includes Malin+Goetz's best-selling mojito lip balm + bergamot scented, vitamin b5 hand treatment.

name: AirTag Loop Holder
description: Both lightweight and durable, the loop is made from polyurethane and securely fastens your AirTag to your items. The enclosure fits tightly around your AirTag to ensure that it stays put, so you can keep track of whatever it's attached to. AirTag is sold separately.

name: ASPCA Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the ASPCA helps fight cruelty and makes a life-changing difference for animals across America.

name: Bamboo Bowl Set
description: From snack time to dinnertime, from outdoor hangs to your kitchen table, Poketo bamboo tableware is there for every delicious occasion. These Bamboo Bowls are made from certified organic bamboo fiber and cornstarch. Durable with a smooth, modern look, they are great alternatives to styrofoam and can be used over and over for your favorite moments of the day, whether that be a casual picnic or family meal. Includes a set of 4, each measuring 6"D x 2"H. Dishwasher safe and non-toxic.

name: Vegan Leather Small Domed Pouch
description: This functional vegan leather domed pouch is perfect for everyday use. A great fit for stationery supplies or travel-sized toiletries and makeup. It fits perfectly into your tote bag or backpack, Measures 9”W X 4”H X 2.75”D.

name: Edison Pendant Light
description: High-tech outdoor lighting meets classic style in this Edison Pendant Light. Water- and rust-resistant and powered by USB portable charger, the LED Edison Pendant is designed to be at home among the trees or on the terrace. Light must be powered by an external USB power source. Includes 10' cable.

name: The Ryan Succulent
description: The Ryan Succulent is an elephant bush succulent, scientifically known as Portulacaria afra. It is a versatile and resilient plant that is popular for its attractive, trailing growth habit and small, round leaves. This succulent comes in a 4" nursery pot. Planter not included.

name: Cobra Wired Gaming Mouse with Chroma RGB Lighting
Best Wishes Bouquet with Vase
description: The Best Wishes bouquet includes 24 mixed stems of roses, scabiosa, solomio, ranunculus, and eucalyptus, displayed in a tasteful vase. Please note that as flowers are a live product, colors and varieties may slightly vary from the photos shown to provide you with the freshest and most beautiful bouquet.

name: Arlo Tech Organizer
description: The perfect travel tech organizer great for cords, chargers, odds and ends. Lining made using 4 recycled plastic bottles. Measures 4.5” L x 2.25” W x 5” H.

name: Switch OLED Model with White Joy-Con
description: Play on your TV at home or pick up and play in handheld mode on a vivid 7-inch OLED screen with the Nintendo Switch OLED Model system. The system also features 64GB of internal storage, enhanced audio, a wide, adjustable stand, and a dock with a wired LAN port.

name: Get Well Soon Gift Package
description: Just what the doctor ordered! Hot soup nourishes, hydrates, and soothes. This gift includes 4-6 servings of soup, 6 delicious rolls, 6 classic Chocolate Chip cookies, a keepsake ladle to serve up the smiles, all wrapped in bright and cheerful packaging.

name: Planned Parenthood Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps protect and restore access to sexual and reproductive health care, including abortion.

name: Beam (Gen 2)
