The Rival Garment Steamer is designed with their patented “Cool-Touch” hose to reduces surface temperature. This kills 99.9% of germs. Gentle on cotton, linen, silk and more. Equipped with wheels to allow smooth and easy portability. Automatic shut-off feature when it’s too hot or short on water. Folding rack included.

name: Bestsellers Sample Set
description: Tea for two (or two for you), this herbal tea-tasting flight is made with 100% organic herbs, flowers, and spices that are super good for you. This sampler set is a mini rainbow of Big Heart's best-selling, most adored tea blends. A great gift for the tea lover in your life. Includes 2-tea bag samples each of Cup of Sunshine, Cup of Love, and Royal Treatmint.

name: Tushy Spa 3.0
description: The TUSHY Spa 3.0 comfortably cleans your bum with adjustable warm or cool fresh water, the same as your sink or shower. (Never the bowl!) This set includes a Tank Adapter and Flexible TUSHY hose for an easy install on almost any toilet, a Mini Adapter with 6-foot long connection hose, Push-to-Connect Adapter (attached to bidet), and Push-to-Connect Locking Ring (pre-attached) for simple hookup to your sink for hot water, an Inlet Cap included for use without hot water, and a TUSHY Spa 3.0 Owner's Manual.

name: Infrared Sauna Blanket Insert
description: Supremely soft and smooth, these HigherDOSE Sauna Blanket Towel Inserts are crafted from a blend of 35% bamboo and 65% combed long-staple organic cotton. Medium weight, absorbent and extremely comfortable, it's a high-performance, reusable towel insert designed to fit comfortably inside your HigherDOSE Infrared Sauna Blanket. Note - Infrared Sauna Blanket not included, only blanket insert.

name: The Prepster Lite, 3-Day Emergency Kit
description: The Prepster™ Lite is a truly handsome Natural Canvas Barrel Backpack for one person. Stocked with all of the necessary supplies and other tools needed to help you get through 72 hours following a major emergency. This gift includes food and water rations for 3 days, Marvis toothpaste and toothbrush, deluxe First Aid kit that includes 40+ pieces, Stainless steel Multi-tool equipped with 14 functions, Emergency Rain Poncho, Emergency mylar Space Blanket, Floating High Decibel Whistle, Premium Chocolate, Kusmi Tea for hot or cold brew, Air Respirator Mask, UCO Waterproof Survival Stormproof Matches, Preppi 4-hour Candles, Paracord 550 Rope, Water Resistant Utility Bags, Field Notes Expedition Waterproof Notebook and Preppi Pencil, and Poker Playing Cards.

name: Catch:1 Classics, Italian Leather
description: Single device wireless charging. Weighted so it stays put, made with quality materials like aluminum alloy wrapped in premium Pebble-Grain Italian Leather and monogrammed with gold foil stamping.

name: Premium Vegan Candy Gift Box
description: The Premium Vegan Candy Gift Box has 10 snacks, including 1 Yum Earth Giggles Sour (2 oz.), 1 Yum Earth Fruit Snacks (.70 oz). 3 Yum Earth Vegan Sucker (.21 oz.), 1 Blakes Strawberry Rice Crispy Treat (0.78oz), 1 Nature's Bandits Fruit Stix (1 oz.), 1 VegoBears Santa Monica Gummy Bears (0.78oz), 1 BEAR Fruit Yoyos (.70 oz.), and 1 Wiley Wallaby Licorice (4 oz pack).

name: Happy New Year Glow Garden
description: A combination of two fresh succulents planted in a circular garden. This fresh succulent garden arrives in a festive Happy New Year planter gift box - ready to display and enjoy.

name: Valentine's Day Cookie Collection
description: This Valentine’s Day, outdo yourself with this ultra-limited collection, crafted to perfection, and brimming with flavors that tell a story of love and indulgence. Includes twelve crave-worthy limited addition cookie flavors.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig, Medium
description: This plant is kind of a big deal. You've probably seen it while scrolling through your IG feed or on the cover of Architectural Digest. The vibrant venation, color, and shape of its leaves are what threw it into the spotlight. It's notorious for being dramatic at times, but hey, it ain't easy being famous. Bright indirect mixed light with direct exposure is ideal. Measures ~15" tall and comes in a 6" grow pot.

name: The Ariana Snake Plant
description: The Ariana, a Snake Plant, also known as the Mother-in-Law's Tongue, is a natural air purifier that will make a great addition to your home or office! Snake plants have strong, sturdy, sword shaped leaves, which are drought tolerant and retain water (read: don't water too often!). Pro tip: this plant can easily be propagated by leaf cuttings, so you can multiply your family of snake plants!

name: $150 Gift Card
description: Live-streamed workshops for everyone with cocktail, culinary, flower arranging, wine tasting & more! Award-winning events that mix and stir top talent with crave-worthy kits. An Alice's Table digital gift card will be delivered to your recipient by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. No expiration date.

name: Sisal Placemats
description: Round out your tablescape with a chic place for plates to land. These one-of-a-kind, coiled placemats bring a touch of texture and style to every meal. They measure 12" in diameter.

name: The Ride of a Lifetime
description: A memoir of leadership and success: The executive chairman of Disney, Time’s 2019 businessperson of the year, shares the ideas and values he embraced during his fifteen years as CEO while reinventing one of the world’s most beloved companies and inspiring the people who bring the magic to life.

name: Extra Fancy Aviators
description: These shatter-resistant sunglasses come in an assortment of ultra-bold colors that make the whole world look like magic and include a stay-on strap. Break them, drop them, lose them, Hipsterkid will replace them with a 100% guaranteed year-long warranty.

name: Rodney Scott's World of BBQ: Every Day Is a Good Day: A Cookbook
description: By Rodney Scott. In the first cookbook by a Black pitmaster, James Beard Award–winning chef Rodney Scott celebrates an incredible culinary legacy through his life story, family traditions, and unmatched dedication to his craft.

name: 1x1 Inch Tattoo
description: Select your choice of 1x1 inch tattoo. Each tattoo is designed by one of Inkbox's talented artists and lasts 102 weeks.

name: Pour Over Carafe
description: The Pour Over Carafe is an artful, functional tool for every day use. Brew clean, perfectly balanced pour over coffee for one, or to share. Each carafe comes with a lid that helps keep coffee fresh for later, perfect for storing in the fridge for cold brew. Makes 1-6 cups of coffee at a time. Measures 5" D x 10" H. Includes one carafe, choice of color.

name: DRIP, Chocolate Hazelnut Spread
description: DEUX's Chocolate Hazelnut Spread is enhanced with Aloe Vera Extract and is vegan and gluten free. Catch us dipping fruit & spreading on toast by the pool this summer, while we get the skin benefits of Aloe Vera.

name: Rod and Reel Spinning Combo 2500
description: Light tackle re-imagined. These spinning combos combine cutting-edge materials with creative, ergonomic designs and engineering, for the ultimate in fishing performance. Paired with powerful, responsive rods that are built to last with rugged salt-proof components and a revolutionary ergonomic handle that won’t chip, tear, or weather. Choice of rod.

name: Citronella Triple-Wick Candle
description: Citronella is a proven, all-natural, insect repellent made from the leaves and stems of the lemongrass plant. It repels insects by masking the smells biting insects are attracted to. These citronella oils are blended with fine fragrances to smell as good as they look.  Each one has 3 wicks for the maximum scent throw to keep bugs at bay, have an 80 hour burn time, and measure 4 3/4˝ wide x 3  1/2˝ high.

name: Gua Sha
description: Reduce puffiness and create a more toned and sculpted appearance with this elegant gua sha tool. This smooth, heart shaped stone is carefully crafted to gently massage your skin and allow you to easily reach all areas of your face and neck. Each gua sha tool is unique and may have slight variations due to the organic nature of the stone.

name: 14oz Vino, 12 Pack
description: Brighten up your next wine night with colors that are sure to impress even the most high class of guests. Perfect for outdoors, glasses are made with up to one post-consumer bottle per cup and are BPA-free. Guaranteed to never break, chip, or crack. Each 12 pack comes with 3 cups of each color. Handwash only and 100% recyclable. Each cup measures 3.7" x 3.3".

name: 3 Month Plant Subscription
description: This 3 Month Plant Subscription will provide a surprise house plant each month selected by the ReVased team! They send you beautiful, live plants directly from sustainable-minded greenhouses in the U.S.A. You will receive one 4" plant per month for 3 months. Planters not included.

name: Good Habits Trio, Metal
description: Give every nook and cranny of your mouth the care it needs. This set includes the Electric Toothbrush & Cover created by dentists and designers with all the guiding features teeth need (and no wires or bulky charger), a slim reusable floss dispenser (with a preloaded refill) and pre-marked every 18" to show you where to cut for the perfect daily amount, and Mint Anticavity Toothpaste (100% recyclable tube & cap) made with anticavity fluoride to strengthen teeth, with xylitol to help reduce oral bacteria.

name: M20XBT Studio Monitor Headphones
description: The ATH-M20xBT over-ear wireless headphones include all the features you want and the audio quality you demand. Inspired by the #1 selling ATH-M20x wired professional studio headphones and featuring powerful 40 mm drivers for enhanced low-frequency performance, the ATH-M20xBT Bluetooth headphones deliver an incredible listening experience with full-range, high-fidelity audio and enhanced bass.

name: Bamboo Coasters Set
description: Made out of certified organic bamboo fibers and cornstarch, these eco-friendly coasters are sleek with a subtle artistic touch. Place them for a modern statement to any tabletop. Includes a set of 4 coasters, each measures 3.5" diameter. Non-toxic and dishwasher safe.

name: 30 Piece Gift Box
description: Experience unrivaled sensations as raspberry ganache, passion fruit caramel, lemon-almond paste, caramelized pistachios, and other exciting flavor combinations explode in your palates with this 30 piece gift box. From the smooth and unassuming to the dark and exotic, the ZBox 30 includes the full range of flavors in their Numbered Collection presented in Traditional and Exotic Assortments, and the stylish ZBox serves as the perfect dramatic backdrop for the recipes that made zChocolat a famous global luxury brand. The traditional assortment is a balanced mixed of traditional pralines, ganaches, solid chocolates and caramels. The exotic assortment is a mix of coconut, pistachio, ginger, and other classic flavors.

name: Goddess Bath Gift Basket
description: Honor a sacred moment of solitude and connect with the goddess within you. Introducing this luxurious Goddess Bath Basket. This gift basket has been carefully curated to offer a selection of spa essentials that will nourish and revitalize the body, mind, and soul. Each handwoven keepsake basket comes carefully packaged in a signature black classic box and includes a Le Mini Round eternity® rose arrangement, available in multiple colors, a signature Rose Oud room spray and votive candle, a crystal and floral infused milk bath and body oil, and a dry brush. It's a thoughtful and luxurious gift that will transport you to a place of serenity and tranquility.

name: Apple Watch Series 9, 45mm
description: Apple Watch Series 9 helps you stay connected, active, healthy, and safe. Featuring double tap, a magical way to interact with Apple Watch, an even-brighter display, faster on-device Siri, and Precision Finding for iPhone.

name: Peperomia 'Hope' in Ceramic Potter
description: This plant's oval-shaped leaves grow upon vibrant, reddish stems. It's so easy to care for, even so-called "black thumbs" shred a bit of hope. It looks great hanging from a shelf or sitting in a tall planter. This plant is about 6 to 8 inches tall, and the planters are 100% premium ceramic, hand-finished in a matte glaze, and include drainage holes with rubber stoppers. Includes one 6-8" Peperomia, a 5" wide ceramic potter, and one bag of custom-blended organic potting mix.

name: Plant Mister & Pruning Shears
description: Perfect for green thumbs, the mister provides the ideal amount of moisture needed for seed starting and sprout growth, and the sheers make pruning and harvesting a breeze. Also great for both humidity loving and water-sensitive plants. Lightweight and durable shears, these grip-friendly shears combine a high carbon steel blade with a needle-nose tip for easy pruning and harvesting.

name: California Fruits Chocolate Bar Gift Set
description: This delicious assortment captures the essence of California summer. Indulge in a curated collection of four distinct and mouthwatering flavors: Wild Cherry dark chocolate, bursting with luscious tangy sweetness; Caramel Apple, a delectable swirl of creamy caramel and apple; Date Shake, a delightful fusion of chocolate, vanilla, and dates; and California Fruits and Nuts, a delectable bar studded with a wholesome medley of fruity crunch.

name: Yonder
description: The Water Dancer meets The Prophets in this spare, gripping, and beautifully rendered novel exploring love and friendship among a group of enslaved Black strivers in the mid-19th century. Hardcover.

name: Waffle Cone 10 Pack
description: Ice cream is just better in a cone, and this Ugandan dark chocolate with pieces of homemade gluten-free, whole-grain waffle cone is a tribute to that tasty truth. Includes ten, 1 oz waffle cone bars. Choice of flavor.

name: Edgewater Ceramics Collection 5 Piece Set
description: A ceramic collection beautiful enough for guests but durable enough to withstand every day use. The subtle speckled pattern adds visual interest and texture making it the perfect backdrop for all your delicious kitchen creations. Each piece is hand-thrown and unique giving it a beautiful handmade quality. The Edgewater Stoneware Set includes one each with an espresso cup, saucer, bowl, salad plate, and dinner plate. Choice of set color.

name: Baby Onesie
description: Whether layered or styled alone, this onesie is soft yet durable enough for tummy time. Features lap shoulders and a three snap closure. Includes custom branding.

name: Body Set
description: This set includes 3 Flex Medium Capsules that hold 1.32 fl oz each. Featuring labels that keep your everyday body care routine organized.

name: Cake Batter Cookies, 12 Pack
description: The familiar flavors of funfetti cake and frosting in one party-filled-chocolate-dipped cookie bite! Best part? No candles required. Includes 12 cookies.

name: Slant Collection Wine Decanter and Stemless Wine Glass Set
description: Crafted from premium quality glass with a luxurious golden amber finish, this set includes 4 stemless wine glasses and a matching wine decanter. The glasses are designed with a sleek and modern look, featuring a slanted edge that will elevate your wine-drinking experience. The matching wine decanter is designed with a classic yet modern shape that will impress your guests and enhance the flavor of your wine. Decanter measures 7.5" diam., 10" high with a 69 oz. capacity, while the glasses measure 4" high, and 13 oz. capacity.

name: Talk Flirty To Me Sprinkles Set
description: This Talk Flirty To Me Sprinkle Set is bound to make you blush. Collect all 3 limited-edition Valentine’s Day blends for your baking and decorating needs. Includes 3 jars of sprinkles, each containing 0.5 cups.

name: Bountiful Harvest
description: Inside a beautiful two-handled seagrass basket, you will discover a stunning arrangement of freshly harvested orchard fruits, including crisp apples, juicy oranges, and sweet pears, nestled amongst coveted gourmet foods. Complete with irresistible snacks, like classic farmhouse cheddar cheese, cookies, gourmet jam, and sea salt caramel sauce. This generous gift is perfect for any occasion!

name: 2 Hour Session
description: Flytographer connects you with hand-picked local photographers in over 350 destinations around the globe for fun, hassle-free photo shoots. Flytographer can capture your destination vacation and deliver the perfect travel souvenir, priceless memories. This 2 hour session includes 60 photos at multiple locations.

name: Pasta 101
description: The best starter kit to become a real pasta master! This box features two types of pasta, three divine sauces, and a gorgeous olive oil. The Mancini spaghetti marry beautifully with the basil pesto from Genova while the Eliche of Gragnano with their signature twisty shape can take on a bolder affair with the arrabbiata sauce or the ricotta and pecorino cheese tomato sauce. Both are soulmates to the Frantoio d’Orazio extra virgin olive oil that they suggest to pour over your dish for an extra touch of gourmet!

name: EOS R100 4K Video Mirrorless Camera
description: Designed for modern-day content creators, the compact and portable Canon EOS R100 Mirrorless Camera offers a wide range of features to suit a variety of multimedia applications. Its excellent still-image capabilities start with its APS-C-sized 24.1MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 8 processor, and the camera also provides 4K 24p cropped video recording.

name: Black-Owned Businesses Collection
description: Shop our curated selection of Black-Owned Businesses.

name: Cotton Napper, 20 lbs
description: A knitted weighted blanket to help you sleep better and feel calmer, naturally. Made of organic cotton and measures 45”x72”.

name: Pura Smart Diffuser + Apotheke Fragrance Set
description: The power of fragrance in the palm of your hand. The Pura 4 smart home fragrance diffuser uses smart technology to give you the most modern, customizable way to fragrance your space. Use your smartphone to control the time and intensity of the scent you want, from where ever you want. Adjust the fragrance intensity, set schedules and timers and more in the Pura app. To get you started, one of each of Apotheke's best selling scents Sea Salt Grapefruit and White Vetiver are included.

name: Silicone Reusable Bag Starter Pack
description: A set of 5 reusable Porter Bags, providing a better bag for cooking, freezing, steaming, preserving, storing, and sous-viding. Thoughtfully designed with curved corners so there’s nowhere for pesky buildup to hide, the Bag is an easy-to-clean, hygienic workhorse tool. This Starter Pack has a 10 oz, 34 oz, and 46 oz Bag and a 36 oz and 50 oz Stand-Up Bag. Cover all your needs with this bundle from packing snacks and sandwiches and marinating and freezing meats to storing leftover chips and frozen cookie dough balls.

name: Googly Eyes Piñatagram for Birthday
description: A classic piñata design filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: Collapsible 24 oz Junior Box, Recipient's Choice
description: This little guy is perfect for grapes on-the-go or hummus in a hurry. The four clasp lid creates a spill-proof seal and the box is collapsible and portable so your little one can snack while saving the world. Dishwasher and microwave safe, comes apart for easy cleaning. Bowl made of premium food grade silicone and is BPA-free, lid made of BPS-free polypropylene. Recommended for Ages 6+.

name: Personalized Crossbody Phone Bag
description: Effortless upgrade for the omnipresent phone. Crafted from premium recycled vegan leather, the Crossbody Phone Bag features a secure magnetic closure, zippered card and key pouch on the back, and an adjustable crossbody strap. Designated ring makes adding an optional Clip-on pouch for AirPods and lip balm a breeze. It measures 7"H x 4.3"W.

name: Sculpd Pottery Kit
description: A Sculpd Pottery Kit contains everything you'll need to sculpt, carve, and seal your own pinch pots, succulent plant pots, trinket dishes, vases, candle holders, sculptures and everything in between. The premium air-drying clay is soft, supple, easy to manipulate and dries a lovely light grey color with a smooth surface.

name: Go Rib Legging
description: This jogger provides the comfort and support you need, on leg day or any day. You'll hit all your goals with its super-soft, sustainable wicking jersey that's ribbed for extra stretch and durability.

name: Women's Golf Ankle Socks
description: Midweight purpose-built socks with strategic zone cushioning for all-day comfort on the links. Thermoregulation helps your feet breathe, and moisture-wicking keeps sweat away from your body. Made with a proprietary cotton-poly yarn blend that performs but feels natural. There's also a mesh under-toe ventilation zone, an area where feet tend to overheat the most.

name: Flourless Chocolate Truffle Lava Cakes
description: Warm chocolate ganache will flow freely from the middle of these moist chocolate cakes when you slice into this unbelievable dessert. They include 4 flourless, cakes that can be warmed in the oven or the microwave once they arrive to achieve the molten lava look and freshly baked taste. This product does not contain Gluten, however their facility is not Gluten Free. Includes four 4-inch mini cakes.

name: The Spout
description: The Spout is Brightland's much-requested, brushed gold, stainless steel spout. It has a rubber stopper cork that fits securely in the bottle, a straw that lives inside the spout to limit spills and ensure smooth pours, and a lid to protect the oil.

name: Basketball
description: Official size basketball designed by featured artists. Made of premium materials including durable composite leather and nylon blend winding, designed for excellent air retention and true rebound. Official size of 29.5 and weight. Choice of design.

name: The Year of Magical Thinking
description: The Year of Magical Thinking, by Joan Didion, is an account of the year following the death of the author's husband John Gregory Dunne. Published by Knopf in October 2005, The Year of Magical Thinking was immediately acclaimed as a classic book about mourning.

name: Best Sellers Variety 12 Pack
description: Basically their all-star lineup including Root Beer, Classic Grape, Tropical Punch, and Vintage Cola. AKA it’s a win-win-win-win situation.

name: Disney100 Mickey Mouse
description: This ultra-radiant Mickey Mouse-inspired figurine celebrates Disney100 with a beautiful example of Swarovski's savoir-faire. Showing Mickey in a typically dynamic pose cut with 530 facets, it has a reflective platinum look created with an all-over coating of our signature Aurora Borealis effect for increased shimmer and intensity. The metallic base has a chrome finish and black velvet bottom, with "Disney100" engraved on the front. The figurine can be removed from the base and placed anywhere in your home. A playful piece that commemorates one of the world’s most beloved animated characters. Measures 4.75" H x 3.25" W x 3.25" L.

name: Ember Tumbler
description: Designed to be used wherever life takes you, the Ember Tumbler does more than simply keep your coffee hot. Ember's largest mug yet, the 16 oz Tumbler allows you to set an exact drinking temperature and keeps it there for up to 3 hours, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold. It features the most advanced chip ever for improved Bluetooth.

name: The Great Bowl (Single)
description: The Great Bowl is an all-in-one mat with bowls that capture your pet’s mess. The mat grips to any flat surface, making it difficult for paws (and toddler hands) to tip over. Comes with the mat plus a removable stainless steel bowl for easy refills and cleaning. 100% Silicone. 32oz bowl.

name: Dog Mom Stoneware Coffee Mug
description: This Dog Mom Coffee Mug is great for any fur mama in your life!

name: Planned Parenthood Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps protect and restore access to sexual and reproductive health care, including abortion.

name: These Precious Days
description: At the center of These Precious Days is the title essay, a surprising and moving meditation on an unexpected friendship that explores "what it means to be seen, to find someone with whom you can be your best and most complete self."

name: Lip Service Gloss-to-Balm Treatment
description: Your lips and Lip Service Gloss-to-Balm Treatment = the perfect match. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, aloe and honey for a cushion of hydration, this unique lip treatment locks the good stuff in for ultimate softness. Once slicked on, this gloss slowly melts into a soothing treatment balm to nourish, condition, and protect delicate skin against dryness.

name: The Trio of Knives
description: The only three you need. Made of Japanese stainless steel with a high-carbon core for superior strength, resilience to corrosion, and razor sharp performance. The Trio of Knives features The Almost 4” Knife, The Serrated 6” Knife, and The 8” Knife. Knife stand not included.

name: Classic Lotion SPF 30
description: Broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection that smells like a combo of coconut, banana, pool water, pool toy and swimsuit lycra. 3.4 oz. Hawaii Reef Compliant, vegan, cruelty free, water-resistant up to 80 minutes.

name: Mini Match Bottle
description: These mini match bottles are a sophisticated and updated option for storing your matches. The bottles feature Skeem's exclusive strike-on-bottle design, so you can light all your matches in style. Each holds forty 2" matchsticks. Recipient's choice of design. Each holds forty 2" matchsticks, and measures 4" high x 1 1/2" wide. Choice of design.

name: Men's BlanketBlend Crewneck
description: Feat's custom developed BlanketBlend fabric combines the comfort of cotton, with the performance features of polyester finished off with a rare yarn & ButterWash process to create a super soft, durable crewneck for every occasion.

name: Kepler Pen
description: Behold, the Kepler Pen. In an effort to help enhance your analog routines, Craighill created a writing tool that is beautiful, functional, and a joy to hold in your hand. Each pen measures 5" L x 0.3" D and weigh 2 oz each. Includes 1 pen, choice of color.

name: Valentine's Day Gift Box 50-Pack
description: Celebrate love with a February Fix 25-Pack and Latest & Greatest 25-Pack, all wrapped up in a premium Sweetheart 50-Pack Gift Box.

name: Monogrammed Extended Trip Packing Case, Texture Blush
description: Exceptionally striking up close or from a distance, this super durable packing case boasts a modern silhouette with fluid looking, strategically contoured angles. This larger hardside luggage piece is ideal for longer business or leisure trips, or when two are traveling together. As with all metals, wear and tear, including nicks, dings and slight denting, is to be anticipated and carried with pride for a journey well-traveled. To further add to the unique characteristics of your travel case, they’ve packed a variety of vintage-inspired decorative stickers inside your case. Upon delivery, this item will require a signature. Dimensions include20.5" W X 30.5" H X 11" D.

name: Branded Rectangular Magnet
description: Add a touch of character on any metal surface with these button magnets. On the front, where your custom design goes, you'll find a clear mylar/UV cover that protects against fading and scratches. Measures 2" x 3".

name: Travel Shoe Cleaning Kit
description: No matter where your travels take you, keep your kicks fresh with the Jason Markk Travel Kit. The kit contains travel sized versions of their essential cleaning products including a 2 oz. Premium Shoe Cleaner, a mini Premium Brush, a 9” x 9” Premium Microfiber Towel and three Quick Wipes. The durable ripstop nylon case features elastic mesh pockets that keep products secure and organized. Plus, the clear front window makes it a breeze to go through security lines at the airport.

name: Kid Friendly Puzzle and Book Set
description: This Book + Puzzle Bundle is a partnership with ASA Books to provide engaged learning for young children. A great family activity, explore kid friendly puzzles to keep young minds growing and creating. Each gift comes with a puzzle and book.

name: Call Me Maybe
description: 16 stems of Peach, light pink, and cream roses add the prettiest sunset-inspired gradient to any room. These blooms show the best kind of reminder – that long as you’re living, your special someone’s baby you’ll be. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Sweetie Pie
description: This 10-inch ceramic pie dish looks as cute as it sounds. The wide, wavy rim will help guide your crust crimping, turning amateur bakers into all-stars. Plus, it distributes heat evenly and consistently produces golden-brown crusts.

name: BlendJet 2, Metallic
description: BlendJet 2 is portable, USB-rechargeable, and BPA free. BlendJet is perfect to make smoothie-bar-quality beverages, cozy fall soups, silky-smooth protein shakes, top-shelf mixed drinks and creamy frozen lattes, plus milkshakes, slushies, baby food, dips, dressings, sauces and so much more.

name: Chocolate Lovers Pretzel Gems™ Gift Box
description: Perfect for any occasion, Pretzel Gems™ offer a balance of sweet and salty, making them impossible to resist (and ideal to gift). A crispy pretzel core is enrobed in one of three gourmet chocolate varieties, making way for a surely satisfying bite! This gift box includes three 1lb tubes with flavors Milk Chocolate, Dark Chocolate, and White Chocolate.This Gift Box includes 3 Full-Size Tubes of 1 Lb each, with favors Milk Chocolate, Dark Chocolate, and White Chocolate.

name: Girls, Inc Donation
description: You have the power to help a girl grow up strong, smart, and bold. She is a leader and ready to succeed. Your investment will help equip her to create positive change in her life and in the world around her.

name: Everyday Sweater, Taupe
description: Made of Jenni Kayne's everyday fabric, you'll love this knit for everyday wear. Easy, lightweight, and great for layering over dresses or button up shirts. It's made of 40% wool, 25% viscose, 25% polyamide, and 10% cashmere.

name: The Linen Tablecloth
description: Meet this instant tabletop upgrade. This soft but sturdy table linen elevates any table while standing up to the wear and tear of everyday life. These linens are made in small batches of 100% flax linen and stone-washed. As a result, each piece will have natural variations in color and texture, both of which will only get better with time. It's dimensions are 90" x 60".

name: Kris Good Luck Bear
description: A playful celebration of nature, this cute figurine is a new member of the iconic Kris Bear collection, which has been delighting collectors since 1993. The design is crafted with 547 facets and showcases an adorable bear sitting with three red ladybugs, a symbol of luck. A wonderful way to spread joy and good wishes. Not for children under 15.

name: Candle
description: Experience MALIN+GOETZ's dynamic fragrances for the home, inspired by traditional apothecary ingredients and favorite memories. Hand poured in Brooklyn and made with high-quality perfume oils and a vegetable wax blend, each candle has a clean, slow burn that fills any space with an intense and lasting scent. After the wax has been burned through, the glass can be upcycled as a drinking glass or decorative container. Includes one 9 oz candle with a 60 hour burn time.

name: USB Cardioid Dynamic Microphone
description: Help ensure recordings sound their best with this Audio-Technica cardioid dynamic microphone. The included tripod holds everything securely upright, or you can simply carry it in your hand for stage performances. This Audio-Technica cardioid dynamic microphone is compatible with both Windows and iOS for added versatility, and the metal construction offers durability.

name: Pink Diaper Cake
description: Celebrate the new baby girl with a teddy bear diaper cake that not only makes an adorable shower decoration, but gift as well! This modern style diaper cake is sure to leave guests and the mom-to-be swooning! It includes approximately 40 Pampers Swaddlers Diapers (Size 1).

name: Tot Nest Booster Seat
description: The Nest Booster Seat was designed with a soft, removable cushion, as well as a high back and sides, to make any grown-up chair comfortable for your little one. It was also designed to be easy to clean and store, to make the after-meal clean up comfortable for you. The back and bottom chair straps are adjustable for a secure fit on different chair styles and sizes and the non-slip feet keep the Booster Seat stable while protecting chairs from scratches.

name: Skinny Tumbler with Straw in Matte Finish, 20oz
description: This personalized skinny tumbler keeps your drinks hot for 12h and cold for 24h, making them the perfect sipping companion all year round. With 20oz capacity, this tumbler comes in a matte finish, and feature a tapered shape with a slim design for effortless carriage.

name: Rejuvenating Under Eye Gels
description: Dry skin. Puffy eyes. Fine lines and wrinkles.  Don't worry! Patchology has the quick fix for tired eyes. Faster than most topical eye creams or serums, Patch technology accelerates the delivery of essential ingredients Caffeine and Hydrolyzed Collagen to your under eye area. And the Hydrogel patches stay put—so you get these ingredient on that sensitive skin where you need them most. Includes 30 pairs.

name: Mini Desktop Hourglass, 5 Minute Timer
description: Take a break, or focus in using the next 5 minutes as you need. This tinted hourglass can help you reset and guide your day whether it be at home or the office.

name: All-Day Neoprene Phone Sling
description: Proof that good things come in small packages, this All-Day Neoprene Phone Sling has room for everything you need without weighing you down. Plus, it's made from up to 2 recycled water bottles for a look that’s as sustainable as it is stylish. It measures 5.5" H x 8.5” W x 1” D and fits an iPhone 14 Max or Galaxy S23 Ultra.

name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Donate to the world's leading children's hospital. Your donation will help St. Jude provide treatment for the toughest childhood cancers and pediatric diseases.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig, Small
description: This plant is kind of a big deal. You've probably seen it while scrolling through your IG feed or on the cover of Architectural Digest. The vibrant venation, color, and shape of its leaves are what threw it into the spotlight. It's notorious for being dramatic at times, but hey, it ain't easy being famous. Bright indirect mixed light with direct exposure is ideal. Measures ~10" tall and comes in a 4" grow pot.

name: Pima Crew Neck T Shirt
description: This unbeatably soft and slim crew neck looks just as good layered under a blazer as it does flying solo.

name: Branded 16oz Travel Mug & Tea Sampler
description: The ultimate tea travel mug for wherever life takes you. Designed with the go-getters in mind, it’s 100% leak-proof, has perfected flow control, and allows you to start or stop your iced or hot tea infusion wherever you are. Your recipient also gets to choose from a 3 Tea Sampler Pack (30 cups of tea) including Downers, Uppers, The Arsenal, or Cold War.

name: The Goldie Peperomia Frost Plant
description: Goldie, a Peperomia Frost plant, is a charming houseplant appreciated for its attractive, textured leaves with silvery-white markings. Gold 4.25" x 4" planter included.

name: Cosmic Seed Kit
description: Connect to the cosmos by growing a flower inspired by your zodiac sign. As you unfold the box, you’ll discover the meaning behind your elemental garden. The box packaging can be refolded into an origami star pot for planting.

name: The Woman in Me
description: In June 2021, the whole world was listening as Britney Spears spoke in open court. The impact of sharing her voice, her truth was undeniable, and it changed the course of her life and the lives of countless others. The Woman in Me reveals for the first time her incredible journey - and the strength at the core of one of the greatest performers in pop music history. Written with remarkable candor and humor, Spears's groundbreaking book illuminates the enduring power of music and love and the importance of a woman telling her own story, on her own terms, at last. Hardcover.

name: Monogrammed Hanging Travel Kit
description: This versatile travel kit fits everything you need and keeps it well organized. Designed to hang from towel racks or sit on flat surfaces, it features an easy-access U-zip opening to the main compartment and two convenient exterior side-zip pockets, as well as an antibacterial lining. Complimentary 3 Letter Monogram included.

name: Rosé Toes Foot Mask
description: There’s nothing a little rosé can’t fix, and these ultra-hydrating, rose-gold booties are no exception. Infused with the scent of effervescent strawberry rosé and lined with creamy shea butter mixed with omega-rich strawberry oil and age-defying resveratrol, this foot mask will have your tootsies looking, feeling, and smelling fresh in ten minutes flat.

name: Barbie Looks Signature Curly Red Hair 13" Doll
description: Inspired by the original Barbie Basics collection, Barbie Looks is back again with diverse dolls wearing eye-catching designs. Her articulated body and mix and match fashions are ideal for at-home styling, posing and photographing. Includes doll stand and Certificate of Authenticity.

name: ASPCA Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the ASPCA helps fight cruelty and makes a life-changing difference for animals across America.

name: Barbie Baby Panda Care and Rescue Playset
description: Barbie Baby Panda Care and Rescue Playset lets kids explore their adventurous and nurturing sides with a vet Barbie doll devoted to panda rescue. With two baby panda dolls, both with color-change transformation and 20+ themed accessories, this careers playset inspires imaginations.

name: Baby2Baby Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide children living in poverty across the country with diapers, clothing and all the basic necessities that every child deserves.

name: Natural Premium Bamboo Fitted King Sheet
description: A fitted bed sheet made of 100% premium quality viscose from bamboo. Sustainable, breathable, and oh so silky-soft. Includes one king sized fitted sheet, choice of color.

name: Latest And Greatest, 100 Pack
description: A 100 bite-size cupcake sampler of 12 unique, hand-crafted cupcake flavors. Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats.

name: Harness Walk Set
description: This innovative, one-step on/off harness sits comfortably and stylishly dogs of all shapes and sizes, and stands up to the toughest pullers. Easy to clean, soft-touch coated nylon leash sits comfortably on your pooch and resist odor and moisture, and our no-tear tissue-style poop bags dispense effortlessly with one hand. This set includes our Harness, Dispenser, Leash, and Poop Bags.

name: Baker's Bench Scraper
description: The perfect tool for any baked goods enthusiast, from novice to pro. The acacia handle is comfortable to maneuver, and the beveled edge lets you easily scrape surfaces, lift ingredients, and chop soft foods. It’s also useful for pushing or carrying chopped ingredients (like diced veggies) from the work surface to the cooking surface, or when you’re looking to level out spreads, sauces, icing, and toppings. Blade measures 6".

name: Siena Pajama Set
description: There is nothing more comfortable or effortlessly elegant for lounging or bedtime than this cashmere pajama set. Designed for a relaxed fit, the set features a button-front long-sleeve top with collar and classic notched lapels. Paired with a matching straight-leg pant with elasticated waist and draw string for a comfy yet put together look. A luxurious gift for your loved ones or an indulgence for yourself.

name: Unisex Premium Pullover Hoodie
description: Beat the cold with this premium pullover hoodie that’s just the right layer of warm and cozy. Made with three-panel fleece lining, this pullover is double stitched for durability and roomy. Pick one in your favorite color to match your style. 80% combed ringspun cotton, 20% polyester.

name: Beyond Measure 4-Cup
description: Why should any part of your kitchen be boring? The Great Jones glass measuring cups are colorful and highly functional, with clear, printed measurements in ounces, cups, and milliliters (no mental math!). Made from sturdy borosilicate glass, this spacious 4-cup size can go from prep to serving and be placed right on your table, no extra vessel needed for your vinaigrette or freshly mixed cocktail. Includes one glass measuring cup.

name: Sweater-Knit Fleece Full-Zip Vest
description: Whether you're layering up for an outdoor adventure or adding a cozy touch to an any-day outfit, this vest has you covered. The best part (besides the classic style, of course): It's made of 100% recycled materials that keep you warm while keeping plastic bottles out of oceans and landfills.

name: Shimmer Tea Light Holder
description: Embellished with over 1,500 Swarovski crystals set in the Crystal Rocks technique, this contemporary glass tea light holder shines brightly in golden tones. Certain to add sparkle to any room; it will create a glamorous atmosphere, day and night. A perfect gift for a loved one. Includes one tea light holder, measures 1.375" x 2.625" x 2.625".

name: Beer Glasses, Set of 4
description: This set of four 19 oz beer glasses are a perfect gift to treat yourself, a friend, or any cerveza lover. Made as a spill proof glass cup for easy drinking, they are dishwasher and freezer safe.

name: Soothing Lozenges
description: A fan-favorite, now with a new and improved formula! Each lozenge is formulated with liquid propolis, honey, and other nature-powered ingredients that soothe dry, scratchy throats and helps support your immune system. These aren’t your average cough drops.

name: Fire Pit Grill 30"
description: Meet your outdoor cooking match. When you’re ready to update your grilling system, the Barebones solid steel Cowboy Fire Grill System is the absolute go-to. Designed with direct input from Barebones open fire chef partners, this modular design allows for multi-use as fire pit, open fire grilling, and cooking station. Adjustable grill grate gives you choice for the source and distance of heat, creating perfect cooking conditions every time. There’s no limit to what this grill system can do.

name: Quilted 15" Laptop Sleeve
description: Protect your laptop with this puffer laptop sleeve. Made from soft and smooth nylon, this durable and lightweight sleeve has a sleek and clean aesthetic. The zipper closure and interior padding provide protection to your laptop. Fits a 15” laptop, and measures 10.5”WX15.375”HX1”D.

name: EOS R7 Mirrorless Camera with RF-S 18-150mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM Lens
description: With a 15 FPS mechanical shutter, the high-performance EOS R7 is the most advanced APS-C camera from Canon. Featuring a high-speed shooting 32.5 MP sensor, in-body stabilization up to 7 stops with coordinated control IS1, and 4K60p video, it offers maximum versatility for capturing photo and video of fast action, wildlife, and everything in between. The perfect all-around camera for dedicated professionals and advanced hobbyists alike.

name: The Food Container
description: This microwave/dishwasher safe, leak proof, stackable container is functional enough to meet your everyday needs, while chic enough to want to show off. An upgrade from the one that came with last night’s takeout, but perfect for fitting those leftovers. Measures 8.27 x 5.78 x 2.52 in.

name: Ghia Apéritif, 2 Bottles
description: Ghia is a non-alcoholic apéritif made with the purest ingredients. Vibrant, fresh and satisfyingly bitter, it tastes like summer on the rocks. Nothing to buzz you or to make you snooze. This versatile apéritif brings depth to any Spritz, just add bubbles. Includes two bottles.

name: The Alexandra Succulent
description: The Alexandra is an Echeveria 'Cat's Claw' succulent. These succulents are known for their captivating rosette formations and vibrant colors! White 4" planter included.

name: Outdoor Lighting Power Bank
description: With a nod towards vintage apothecary, the 5000 mAh Power Bank includes a mixed-metal design and matte neutral coloring, allowing it to exist seamlessly alongside vintage-inspired lights. Beautiful copper wire handle and built-in bottom magnets empower versatility in use: hang it or create a connection to any metal surface. This battery bank includes USB-A and USB-C output and comes included with a USB-C charging cable. Ideal for glamping settings, backyard hang-outs far from outlets, or emergency use. Measures 4.5" x 2.5" x 1".

name: Thank You Glow Garden
description: This fresh succulent garden arrives in a beautifully crafted planter gift box - ready to display and enjoy. Measures approximately 4 x 5 inches.

name: Pure Matcha, 40g Tin
description: The foundational green superfood for energy, focus, and cellular health for all. Pure Matcha goes beyond Ceremonial Grade: freshly shade-grown and cold-processed in Uji, Japan for maximum antioxidant and amino acid content. It’s organically grown and certified radiation-free and heavy metal-free. It’s also vegan, gluten free, and non-GMO.

name: 1 Month Super Yum Snack Box
description: The Universal Yums snack box delivers the best, most exciting international treats from a country or region around the world. Each box features delicious international snacks and an interactive 12+ page booklet to help introduce snackers to the exciting new cultures they're tasting! Each box will feature an exciting, mystery country or region and contains 15-18 snacks.

name: Personalized Whiskey Decanter & Glass Set
description: This engraved Whiskey Decanter set comes personalized with the name of your recipient's choice. This custom whiskey decanter and matching glasses will be displayed with pride for years to come. Set includes a 28 oz decanter holds 28 oz and two 8oz glasses. Please allow up to 10 business days for personalized gifts to deliver.

name: 2024 Piñatagram
description: Ring in 2024 with a mini piñata form Piñatagrams. Every piñata is filled with an assortment of Skittles, Starbursts, Double Bubble Gum, Airheads, Dum Dums, and Tootsie Rolls.

name: Herringbone Sherpa Fleece Blanket
description: Everyone has their favorite blanket to cuddle up on the couch with. Rumpl thought it's time that blanket got an upgrade. This Sherpa Fleece Blanket features high-pile sherpa fleece with anti-static treatment, made to be your new indoor go-to that's never felt so good. Measures 50 x 70".

name: Birthday Bash
description:
Celebrate your birthday the sweet way with Nosh's Birthday Bash set. It comes with three 7.5 oz tubes of birthday candy, including a tube of "BETTER WITH AGE" prosecco gummy bears, a tube of "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" funfetti cake batter bites, 
and a tube of "MAKE A WISH" cupcake gummies.

name: 1L Bottle
description: The endlessly refillable, beautifully sustainable cult favorite glass water bottle. It makes drinking water blissful, it’s dishwasher safe, it's the water bottle soulmate you never knew existed.

name: Flamingo 2-Rider Towable tube
description: Float across the water with this super sized towable flamingo. Durable and comfortable, made to accommodate 1-2 riders. Grip handles are extra padded, so it'll still be a comfortable grip while you're white knuckling it! Suitable for ages 13 years and up. Weight capacity of 340 lbs.

name: Koda 12" Gas Powered Pizza Oven
description: Your time is precious, so make it count. Ooni Koda 12 fires out jaw-dropping pizzas in 60 seconds flat. No assembly, no mess, no fuss. Cooking outdoors with gas has never been so simple. Ready right out of the box, the super compact Ooni Koda 12 is good to go in seconds. Simply flip open the foldable legs, insert the stone baking board, and connect to a gas tank. Featuring instant gas ignition, Ooni Koda 12 is ready to cook in 15 minutes and can reach temperatures up to 950°F (500°C). Use the heat control dial to cook pizza in just 60 seconds, right through to roasted fish, vegetables and steaks. Includes Koda 12 pizza oven, cordierite stone baking board, and a gas regulator and hose to connect to your propane tank. Pizza Peel is not included and sold separately.

name: Yoga Wheel Set
description: Florensi Yoga Wheels are a multi-purpose tool for practicing yoga, back massages, strengthening your core, and improving balance and flexibility. This set includes 3 sizes for varying degrees of firmness/pressure to target your specific training needs. It includes the Large 13” for deeper poses and backbends, the Medium 10” Wheel for stretching out your back and hips, and the Small 6” Wheel ideal for massaging your neck, back, and legs.

name: Boxing Trackers
description: For those who have access to a boxing bag. Get the essentials you need to start your FightCamp journey. Track your progress, compete against others, and access on-demand workouts led by expert trainers. As an exclusive perk with Goody, FightCamp is also including two free months of membership. Details of membership included with shipment. This gift contains trackers and quick wraps.

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Cookie and Brownie Snack Box
description: A shareable snack box overflowing with fan favorite cookies and brownies! This delightful gift consists of 8 tasty cookies (Chocolate Chunk, Oatmeal Raisin, Vanilla Sugar and Triple Chocolate) and 6 gourmet brownies.

name: 11 x 8.5 Matte Hardcover Photo Book
description: A coffee-table-worthy book for displaying epic adventures, weddings, and other fond memories. Includes 19-pages that are fully customizable. You will be emailed a gift code to the email that you provide upon acceptance, within 24 hours, with instructions to create your personalized photo book.

name: ATLP60XBT Bluetooth Stereo Turntable
description: Enjoy your treasured vinyls with this Audio-Technica automatic wireless belt-drive turntable. Bluetooth connectivity enables pairing with wireless speakers and headphones, and the included RCA cable provides compatibility with wired components. This two-speed Audio-Technica automatic wireless belt-drive turntable plays 33-1/3 RPM records and comes with a 45 RPM adapter to accommodate singles.

name: Body Plane Set
description: Your full-body exfoliation ritual is at the ready with the Body Plane Set. Housed in a plastic-free box, they've created the perfect set including in-house designed exfoliating tool, The Body Plane, a 2 ounce Esker Oil of your choice, and a washable and reusable cloth to wipe dry skin, dirt and impurities from the blunt, colloidal silver blade.

name: Gluten-Free Boutique Bakery Gift
description: A tasty assortment of delicious gluten-free treats! This perfectly gluten-free gift includes one dozen gourmet gluten-free cookies, 6 Chocolate Chip and 6 Snickerdoodle, 4 Very Berry Snack Mixes and eight individually-wrapped gluten-free brownie and blondie bites. This is all tied up with a stunning red satin ribbon - and ready for gifting! This product does not contain Gluten, however the facility is not Gluten Free.

name: Small Plates
description:
Use it for salad or dessert, this
rimless, coupe-style Small Plate is made for both. Includes a set of 4 plates.

name: JBL Go 3 Eco Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: New innovative, eco-friendly design with the same big audio performance. Help make the world a little greener with a must-have accessory for your next outing, made from up to 90% post-consumer recycled plastic and wrapped in 100% recycled fabric on the speaker grille. The JBL Go 3 Eco looks as vivid as it sounds with bold styling, expressive, edgy details, and rich JBL Original Pro Sound. The waterproof and dustproof design also features an integrated loop, so you can take your music anywhere, rain or shine, sustainably. Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery, the Go 3 Eco gives you up to 5 hours of playtime on a single charge.

name: Video Doorbell 4
description: Video Doorbell 4 is the upgraded smart, wifi-enabled doorbell camera with improved video previews that works on any home. Video Doorbell 4 features improved battery life and performance, enhanced dual-band Wi-Fi, a quick-release battery for easy recharging, and Quick Replies. And with improved Pre-Roll, a 4 second color video preview of motion events before they trigger an alert.

name: Lessons in Chemistry
description: A delight for readers of Where'd You Go, Bernadette, this blockbuster debut set in 1960s California features the singular voice of Elizabeth Zott, a scientist whose career takes a detour when she becomes the star of a beloved TV cooking show.

name: Maui Youth Inflatable Sup Kit
description: The Solstice Maui Youth SUP is an all-around recreation SUP intended for kids and smaller paddlers. Its rounded nose, wide-beam, and pinned tail makes it an easy to use board for any rider while not compromising performance. Featuring one 10” removable skeg, this board will track straight while only being 8’ long. It is a super lightweight board, easy to carry, roll up, store away and bring on every adventure.

name: Beast Blender
description: The Beast B10 Blender is thoughtfully designed and meticulously engineered with industry-leading technology, resulting in a machine that is the ultimate in preparing nutrient-rich smoothies and infusions that make you Strong Inside™. INCLUDED: Blender Base, Blade Assembly, 1000mL Blending Vessel, Drinking Lid, Carry Cap, and Storage Lid. SPECIFICATIONS: Single button to pulse + blend. 1000-watts, 120V.

name: Pacific Natural At Home
description: Featuring inspiring women and their beautifully unique homes, Pacific Natural At Home offers a window into each woman’s personalized approach to designing with all facets of life in mind. Broken up into four distinct landscapes—canyon, ocean, desert, city—each section aims to capture the essence of west coast interiors.

name: Nappa Leather Duffle Bag
description: This Nappa Leather Duffle is perfectly spacious with enough room for 3-6 outfits. Handmade in 100% full-grain nappa leather with protective metal feet, interior security pockets and a key-clip to keep you organized. Two top handles and detachable strap give it extra versatility on the go. It measures 21" L x 11" W x 11" H.

name: $100 Spa and Wellness Gift Card
description: The Spa & Wellness Gift Card by Spa Week is the ultimate wellness gifting solution offering unfettered access to the largest Spa & Wellness network of over 9,000 spa locations throughout North America, providing hundreds of spa and wellness services such as massages, facials, waxing, man/pedi's, salon services, fitness classes and beauty products.  A Spa Week digital gift card will be delivered to you by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. No expiration date.
brand: The Spa & Wellness Gift Card by Spa Week

name: 2-Slice Wide-Slot Toaster
description: Known for their wonderfully retro refrigerators, Smeg has launched a joyfully designed retro kitchen appliance collection based on the curved and compact lines of postwar design. The retro toasters brown bread at six levels with three convenient pre-set programs. Extra-wide slots accommodate different slice widths and self-centering racks ensure even toasting.

name: 500ml Spiked Bottle
description: The endlessly refillable, beautifully sustainable cult favorite glass water bottle. It makes drinking water blissful, it’s dishwasher safe, it's the water bottle soulmate you never knew existed. 500ml, choice of color.

name: Branded Unisex Color Blast Crewneck Sweatshirt
description: This 1545 Comfort Colors® crewneck sweatshirt has a unique look thanks to the three-end garment-dyed ring spun color blast fleece. With your custom designs, it's a guaranteed bestseller. It features a double-needle neck, shoulder, armhole, cuffs, waistband, and 1x1 rib collar for a sleek look. The rolled-forward shoulders, side seams, and back neck patch compliment the relaxed fit, which is popular among streetwear lovers. It features a twill-taped back neck for extra durability and a signature twill label.

name: The Prepster, Two-Person 3-Day Emergency Bag
description: This signature 2-Person Emergency Kit is generously stocked with the necessary supplies to help get through 3-days following an emergency event. These heavy-duty metal framed bags are made from water resistant canvas and leather. It is equally as tough as it is handsome, and comes with a lifetime guarantee. Inside you will find a Preppi solar charger & emergency radio, 3-day water supply, 3-day food supply, Malin+Goetz essential kit, Marvis toothpaste & toothbrush, premium chocolate bar, Kusmi Tea, FIRST-AID KIT, multi-tool equipped with pliers, sharpened blades, can openers, and a wood saw, Preppi Ponchos, Preppi mylar space blankets, hand warmers, floating high decibel whistle, duct tape, tube tent for quick shelter, UCO Waterproof Survival Matches, Preppi 4-hour candles, Canvas PVC Dot Work gloves, utility bags, Paracord Rope 550, Field Notes Expedition Waterproof Notebook and Preppi Pencil, LED combination signal flare, flashlight, flasher, glowstick & whistle, LED headlamp, poker playing cards, and a BYOS stainless steel hip flask.

name: WARMKNIT Flanel Shirt
description: Powered by Thermolite® technology, this lightweight, WARMKNIT flannel is engineered to trap heat, but release moisture, so you’ll stay warm and dry all weekend.

name: Learn to Fly A Plane for One, Addison, TX
description: Soar into a journey of adventure and discover what it’s like to fly your own airplane with this exciting introductory flight lesson. Fly high under the watchful eye of a FAA Certified Flight Instructor on a 30 minute flight. Take the controls of a Cessna 182, one of the most popular training aircrafts. Start with a preflight inspection and get hands on ground training and then sit in the pilot's seat on your very first flight. No experience necessary. Includes an experience for one person.

name: Tushy Classic
description: The TUSHY Classic bidet cleans your butthole with fresh water, the same as your sink or shower. (Never the bowl!) Now with a slimmer design, easier installation and improved nozzle spraying. Patented Self Cleaning SmartSpray™ nozzle rinses before and after each use for a better clean, and it automatically retracts when  turned off. It's an easy install in 8 ½ minutes or less on most standard toilets. Universal fit on almost any toilet with adjustable seat fasteners that firmly secure your TUSHY between the toilet bowl and seat. Dimensions are 9” H x 16.5” W x 9” L.

name: Also a Poet: Frank O'Hara, My Father, and Me
description: A staggering memoir from New York Times-bestselling author Ada Calhoun tracing her fraught relationship with her father and their shared obsession with a great poet. Hardcover.

name: Laundry Essentials
description: Get a powerful clean with the plastic-free Laundry Detergent Tablets, a boost of stain-removing power with their Oxi Laundry Booster, and reduce wrinkles, static, and dry time with the Dryer Balls. This set includes 1 steel Forever Tin with 60 Laundry Tablets (fragrance-free), 1 steel Forever Tin with 500g (25 standard loads) of Oxi Booster Powder with Clear Skies fragrance (smells like crisp linens), and 3 Dryer Balls made from New Zealand wool that are fully compostable.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Gloves
description: Treat your hands right with these Mongolian cashmere gloves. They have a long cuff for extra coziness, breathable and soft. This quality cashmere is incredibly long-lasting and three times as warm as wool, sourced sustainably and ethically.

name: 14K White Gold Lab Grown Diamond Classic Solitaire Stud Earrings
description: A timeless jewelry essential, these white diamonds studs will bring unparalleled sparkle to your ears. These elegant lab grown diamond stud earrings feature a 4-prong basket setting in a glistening 14k white gold metal. The 2 round, brilliant lab-grown diamonds radiate a beautiful white sparkle as they float within the four-prong setting of these 14k white gold stud earrings.

name: Four Paddle Pickleball Set
description: This is everything your recipient needs for a beautiful day of Pickelball out in the sun. Your recipient will be able to pick 4 adult composite paddles from a range of eye-catching fiberglass surface colors. The kit also includes 2 sets of white pickleballs and an effortless court bag.

name: Kitty Desktop Vacuum Cleaner
description: Tired of having to constantly clean dust and crumbs from your workspace? If so, you'll love this Kitty Desktop Vacuum Cleaner! This powerful little gadget comes with a brushless motor and suction to make short work of dirt, dust, and crumbs. Plus, it features an adorable cat lamp on top! Best of all, each full charge of this mini desktop vacuum cleaner lasts 70 minutes. Includes a rechargeable battery and USB cord measuring 25cm. Measures 3.39" x 3.39" x 3.62".

name: Make-A-Wish Donation
description: The gift of giving! For every wish we’re able to grant, there’s another child with a critical illness waiting for theirs.

name: Caffeinated Marshmallows, Latte Edition
description: An energy boost, in marshmallow form! These latte flavored marshmallows are actually infused with caffeine for the perfect little pick me up in every bite. Enjoy alone or elevate your cup of coffee with a mallow (or 2)! Includes 12 delicious mallows.

name: The Luminous Capsule
description: Citrus flavors and golden colors feel light and celebratory. Includes AWAKE olive oil, PARASOL champagne vinegar, California Orange Blossom Honey and the spout.

name: Branded Heavy Duty iPhone Case
description: Personalize Apple iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, and Google Pixel devices with premium-quality custom protective phone cases. Every case has double layers for extra durability and protection. The outer polycarbonate shell will resist daily impacts. Create a beautiful design, and we'll print it in picture-perfect quality with a glossy or matte finish.

name: Cravory Cookies Half Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: These are the cookies that get you hooked and keep you asking for more. Even non-cookie lovers can’t stop themselves with this mix of Cravory's most craveable and gourmet cookie flavors. Includes 6 cookies.

name: Spiral Notebook
description: These notebooks feature a thick gloss full-color laminated protective cover. Made in the USA, this journal comes in 5x7 size with 150 pages of lined paper.

name: Slim Card Case
description: A slim piece you can easily tuck into your pocket, this card case is an excellent choice for those who prefer to travel light. It features card slots on each side, as well as an ID window and a subtle slip pocket for bills and receipts.

name: Harry Potter Collection
description: Premium playing cards by theory11 featuring all of your favorite characters in four spellbinding color editions, representing the four houses of Hogwarts: Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, and Hufflepuff! Includes 4 decks of cards.

name: Washable Stretch Silk Notch Collar Blouse
description: Take your collared look up a notch. This notch collar blouse has a relaxed, slim fit with a clean and crisp look for an everyday appeal. Perfectly made to be layered or worn solo. Plus, silk fiber contains 18 kinds of amino acids that make it amazing for skin nourishment, hypo-allergenic, and naturally thermoregulating to help maintain body temperature. Crafted from 90% mulberry silk for luxe feel, and 10% spandex for a little stretch, with 19mm fabric weight for a premium drape.

name: Barbie Make & Sell Boutique Playset
description: Kids can sew up a career in fashion with Barbie doll and the Make & Sell Boutique playset! Young designers will love creating their own looks with the easy-to-use foil screen-printing feature. A display rack and hangers showcase the original designs for purchase, and customers can shop with a realistic register and card reader.

name: Like the Moon Loves the Sky
description: With vibrant illustrations and prose inspired by the Quran, this charming picture book is a heartfelt and universal celebration of a parent's unconditional love. It's a reassuring bedtime read-aloud for mothers and their children, and perfect book for sharing Muslim family traditions and for families teaching diversity and religious acceptance.

name: Love & Chocolates Gift Set
description: The Venus et Fleur Love and Chocolates Gift Set includes a set of six decadent bonbons, accompanied by a petite heart arrangement filled with eternity roses artfully shaped into a heart. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care. The arrangement size is 11.75 x 7.5 x 4".

name: Italian Wool Chore Jacket
description: Your new go-to jacket as the temperature starts to drop. This Italian Wool Chore Jacket is made from a warm wool blend, plus the patch pockets and stylish buttons make it easy to layer over just about anything. You'll be reaching for it every day of the week.

name: Baby2Baby Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide children living in poverty across the country with diapers, clothing and all the basic necessities that every child deserves.

name: Waffle Crunch Minis Bag
description: Raaka takes all the imperfect odds and ends of their homemade gluten-free waffle cones that don't make it onto the Waffle Cone bars and fold them into a single origin Ugandan dark chocolate, creating a crispy, crunchy, chunky bite-size bar. Each bag contains approximately 40 mini bars.

name: 2 Pack
description: Superfood cookie dough, ready to eat. Includes 2 jars of your choice.

name: Branded Unisex Color Blast T-Shirt
description: The Comfort Colors 1745 is a unisex, unique color blast t-shirt and any tee shirt maker's dream. Made 100% with incredibly soft, ring-spun cotton, each tee is soft-washed and garment-dyed. Its relaxed fit makes it the perfect daily choice for any casual occasion.

name: Quip Electric Toothbrush
description: Good brushing habits made simple, sleek, and sustainable. With this gift you get a slim handle, soft-bristle brush head & cover. With timed sonic vibrations, and a 3-month battery life, this electric toothbrush is the clear choice.

name: Pitcher
description: This Pitcher is designed for offering fresh-squeezed orange juice, holding lilies and lupines, or acting as the star of your tablescape. This timeless silhouette suits both the mantle and breakfast table. Modern and multi-purpose, it’s built to last. Safe for dishwasher, freezer, and microwave. Measures 7.16" base diameter, 5.78" opening diameter, 8.14" height, with 58 oz capacity.

name: Wilson Brass Keyring
description: A simple and efficient brass keyring, the inherent strength of the wire creates a secure closure. Holds more keys than you're likely to need. This keyring may improve your life, if only a little bit. Made of 1/8" Brass wire and measuring 2" x 1.25" x 0.1".

name: Best Sellers
description:
Using their signature, melt in your mouth, all-butter crust and time-tested family heirloom recipes, they’ve created a classically Southern selection of 
sweet and savory dinner pies your family will love. Choose from their Best Sellers!

name: Bamboo Dinner Plate Set
description: From snack time to dinnertime, from outdoor hangs to your kitchen table, Poketo bamboo tableware is there for every delicious occasion. These Bamboo Dinner Plates are made from certified organic bamboo fiber and cornstarch. Durable with a smooth, modern look, they can be used over and over for your favorite moments of the day, whether that be a casual picnic, family meal, or professional plate twirling. Includes a set of 4 plates, each measuring 9.85" in diameter.

name: Nest Pour Over Coffee Kit
description: The Nest Pour Over Kit incorporates double walled stainless-steel construction with a BPA Free lid and storage connector into a rugged, portable pour-over coffee brewing system. Dual threads enable the 5-piece kit to assemble into one compact unit perfect for travel, overlanding and other outdoor endeavors. When disassembled, the Kit delivers two 10oz mugs, one splash proof lid, a pour-over dripper, and a nesting storage connector. This holistic coffee brewing system delivers a premium brewing experience. Anywhere. Everywhere.

name: Caramel Dark Chocolate Tartlet XL Heart
description: This jumbo heart is filled with 3 decadent layers of Vanilla Bean and Salted Butter Caramel, 64% Madagascar Grand Cru dark chocolate ganache, and crunchy butter cookie praliné. Includes one 3.5 oz tart.

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: 20oz Glass Tumbler with Lid
description: This 20oz cup with straw is slim enough to fit in your car cup holder, and it’s made from borosilicate glass so you can enjoy drinks hot or cold. You won’t burn your hands or worry about condensation on these glass tumblers because the silicone sleeve has you covered. The inside of bamboo lid is covered with silicone, to prevent water damage. Includes one 20oz glass (6.9" x 3.3"), a silicone non-slip sleeve, and 2 straws. Made of borosilicate glass that is BPS, BPA and PVC free.

name: Photo Kit
description: Small, but mighty! Perfectly sized to help you organize all of your small items. The Photo Kit holds 2 batteries, 3 memory cards, and an extra wire. Measures 5"H x 3.5"W x 1.75"D.

name: Global Fund for Women Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps ensure equal opportunity for people of all genders and especially women.

name: Monogrammed Fold Up Belt Bag
description: A sustainable, ultra-lightweight, water-resistant sidekick to keep your things tidy and together. Multiple color options and delightful details like striped webbing make this belt bag a functional way to add brightness to your look. And the white monogram finishes the look!

name: Fresh Air Diffuser Blend Kit
description: A limited-edition collection of 4 invigorating essential oil blends: Energizing Golden, Citrusy Boost, Dewy Grassland, and Floral Wild Posy. Perfect for breathing new life into your home this season.

name: Meals on Wheels Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps support the local programs that keep seniors safe and living independently nationwide.

name: Face Roller Kit
description: A Traditional Chinese Medicine beauty technique to reduce puffiness + dark circles and increase product absorption. Each kit includes the Rose Quartz Roller, a detailed how-to guide, and a canvas carrying case.

name: Baby Gripper Socks 8-Pack (6-12 Months)
description: Keep those first steps extra steady with grips that help prevent slips. Designed to inspire more smiles than a straight-to-the-belly raspberry, and so comfy they’ll want to start walking as quickly as possible. While our grippers are pretty good at helping to prevent slips, they’re not magic. So make sure your kids are extra careful, and do their best to practice good coordination out there. 8 purchased = 8 donated.

name: Terracotta Grow Kits
description: The cutting edge of houseplant cultivation. This terracotta kit has a glazed interior and is outfitted with a passive hydroponic system known as “wicking,” which brings water and nutrients up to the plant's roots. So whether you forget to water, overwater, or both, this planter's got you covered. Comes equipped with everything you’ll need to start growing, just add water and set in a sunny window. Perfect for budding plant parents - a must have for city dwellers looking to grow their indoor desert oasis.

name: Monogrammed Kylie Tote
description: Simple - but far from basic.  The Kylie tote features a removable organization insert that has a place for everything and can be zipped closed.

name: Titan Copper Insulated Food Storage
description: Made with the adventurer in mind, this insulated container is made with robust stainless steel and features high-end copper insulation that keeps your meal cold for 24h and hot for 8h. Its capacity allows you to bring 16.9oz (500ml) of food anywhere you go while each container comes with its own foldable, metal spoon.

name: Pretzel Making Kit, Recipient's Choice
description: Make a dozen of these deliciously salty and savory treats at home with a fresh round of ingredients. Just because soft pretzels are the ultimate bar snack doesn’t mean you can’t enjoy them at home, too! Included is Pretzel Baking Mix, Malt Powder, Pretzel Salt, Baking Yeast, and whatever flavored spice you choose.

name: Flower Grow Kits
description: This fluted ceramic planter includes a complete grow kit with an immersion hydroponics setup that wicks water to flowers as needed. This hand-selected collection of flower varieties are meant to last in the home, so you can marvel at the beauty of fresh flowers, every day. Just add water! Includes Non-GMO Seeds. These plants have thick, deep green foliage. In warm climates, the foliage is considered evergreen and will remain year-round.

name: AIRKNITx Ankle Sock
description: These breathable AIRKNITx athletic sock keeps your feet dry and fresh, with compression and cushioning for high-impact support. Includes one pair, choice of color. One size fits most US men's shoe sizes 9-13.

name: Many Happy Returns
description: The Many Happy Returns bouquet includes 38 mixed stems of roses, ranunculus, anemone, solomio, and hebes! Vase not included.

name: Reusable Stretch Wrap
description: Say goodbye to single-use plastic wrap and foil for good. Made from super-stretchy, ultra-thin, and durable platinum silicone that is infinitely reusable so you can wrap, stretch, and store a variety of foods. Dishwasher safe, freezer safe, microwave safe, oven safe, BPA free, lead free. The Reusable Stretch Wrap Set includes a 7x8", 10x11", and 13x14" rectangular wrap.

name: Beer Making Kit
description: These Beer Making Kits are reusable and include the brewing equipment and ingredients for a one-gallon, all-grain batch of beer. This kit inlcudes the specific flavor and hops of your choice, as well as Beer Making Yeast, a Glass Fermentation Jug, Thermometer, Racking Cane, Tubing, Tubing Clamp, Screw-cap Stopper, Airlock, and No-Rinse Sanitizer. All you need for your next batch is another Beer Making Mix and packet of No-Rinse Sanitizer.

name: Staff The Baster
description: Bring a little extra happiness to the holidays (and beyond) with The Baster. So cute you just want to pinch their cheeks, which is luckily all you need to do for them to work. With a purple rubber bulb and a translucent pink plastic tube, bring smiles this Holiday season.

name: Ember Cup, 6oz
description: Ideal for espresso-based drinks such as cappuccinos, cortados, and flat whites, the new Ember Cup 6 oz offers a premium coffee experience that does more than keep your coffee hot. Ember's smart mug allows you to set your preferred drinking temperature, so you can enjoy your expertly crafted hot drink, from the first sip to the last drop.

name: The Full Plate Cookbook
description: Enjoy family-friendly recipes that are ready in no time, when you've got no time, from 2x New York Times bestselling author Ayesha Curry. The Full Plate brings the best of Ayesha's home kitchen straight to you, with 100 recipes that are flexible and flavorful and come together in less than an hour. You'll find sheet pan dinners and crowd-pleaser pastas, hearty salads and healthy updates to takeout favorites, and fresh spins on classic dishes-plus kid-friendly meals, desserts, and sides (and a few beverages just for the adults).

name: Ace Sweatpant
description: Mack Weldon gave your college sweats a modern upgrade with a tailored fit and exclusive Ace fabric, a micro-brushed French terry. Featuring thoughtful detailing like back-ribbed ankle cuffs, stealth zip pocket and exterior drawcord, these sweats will be your new go-to.

name: The Ice Box
description: Make perfect ice, in bulk. The Ice Box holds 3 trays of ice cubes in a compact and sleek profile. The lid doubles as an ice tray, while also protecting against freezer odors and enabling stacking. Remove it altogether to use the box as an elegant tableside ice bucket. It's a better-looking ice tray that makes better-looking ice. Makes and stores 48 ice cubes in one compact profile, and measures 8.9 x 4.5 x 4.7 in.

name: Apple Watch Series 9, 41mm
description: Apple Watch Series 9 helps you stay connected, active, healthy, and safe. Featuring double tap, a magical way to interact with Apple Watch, an even-brighter display, faster on-device Siri, and Precision Finding for iPhone.

name: OMG (Ooey Marshmallow Goodness)
description: This Ooey Marshmallow Goodness is XO's version of marshmallow creme -- a sticky, sweet spreadable marshmallow treat that is perfect for dips, dunks, and desserts of all kind. You'll love to keep pints in the fridge or freezer (fluff ice cream anyone?) but you can keep them at room temp too!

name: Pink Ruffles
description: Indulge in the beauty of this Pink Ruffles arrangement. Featuring lavish pink and white blooms in an exquisite, soft and lush arrangement. This is the perfect way to add a touch of elegance to any home. Varietals such as roses, hydrangea, and lisianthus will be incorporated into this design pending seasonality, freshness, and availability. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: 1/2 Sheet Non-Stick Pan
description: The Sheet Pan was created in partnership with Chef Matt Horn, the award-winning pitmaster behind Oakland’s Horn Barbecue. Professional-grade Non Stick guarantees that everything releases without fuss for the easiest cleanup possible. It measures 18.25” x 13”.

name: Blue Light Glasses
description: Designed to be lightweight and long wearing, these frames make for a clever choice for your ultimate blue light protection. Block up to 35% of blue light emissions from all digital devices to reduce eyestrain and eye fatigue. Note glasses do not have added optical strength.

name: Oval Low Serving Bowl
description: From crowd-pleasing kale caesars to family-style chicken piccata, this Oval Low Serving Bowl is a jack of all trades. Fill it to the brim and pass it across the table. It’s big enough to go around-and back for seconds. Made in Portugal using locally-sourced clay and single-fire production to reduce emissions. Safe for dishwasher, freezer, microwave, and oven up to 480 degrees. Measures 18" x 12" x 2.5" tall.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps bring independence back to our nation’s most severely wounded veterans.
