name: Opulust Portable Cocktail Decorating Kit
description: Bring on happy hour! The Opulust Portable Cocktail Decorating Kit includes 10 multi-serve edible glitter packets conveniently packaged in a sleek portable carton and paired with Unicorn Breath Fancy Sugar for perfectly rimmed, sparkling bevies.

name: Half American
description: The definitive history of World War II from the African American perspective, written by civil rights expert and Dartmouth history professor Matthew Delmont. Hardcover.

name: Strawberries & Champagne "LOVE" Bar
description: This delectable 3.5 oz chocolate bar is crafted using genuine strawberries, blended with popping candy to create a delightful champagne-like effervescence, and topped with crunchy dark chocolate pearl bubbles for added texture.

name: Toddler Gripper Slipper
description: Now made with a thicker footbed for extra cushioning, these Gripper Slippers have an ultra-warm brushed lining, special grips on the outside designed to help prevent slips, plus a separate travel bag that makes packing a breeze. You may never want to wear real shoes again. While our grippers are pretty good at helping prevent slips, they’re not magic. So be careful, and practice good coordination out there.

name: No Wrong Answers: Junior
description: Dinosaurs, roller coasters and silly voices - kids are in charge of the conversation with No Wrong Answers: Junior! Perfect for family dinner classrooms birthday parties, and road trips (never hear "Are we there yet?" again!) No Wrong Answers: Junior has 70+ prompt cards that kids and grown-ups will love.

name: Branded 10 oz Rambler Mug
description: Stackable for compact storage and insulated for hot brews. The rambler mug comes with the YETI MagSlider Lid, the only drink lid that uses the power of magnets to keep your favorite drink on lock. Engraved with your logo front and center.

name: Women's Roam Joggers
description: Meet your most essential pant. Made with feat's signature lightweight FlowTech fabric, the Roam Jogger is designed to perfectly balance comfort and versatility. Transition from lounging to just about any activity you can come up with in confidence with this high-waisted smoothing fit.

name: Personalized Dopp Kit
description: This personalized leather dopp kit will make travel a breeze. Handmade of split leather with antique brass effect hardware and personalized with your initials, it's the handsome travel accessory that you've been looking for. Choice of leather color. Please allow up to 10 business days for personalized gifts to deliver.

name: Get Salty Spray
description: Love to get sweaty? You better GET SALTY, first. This magnesium spray proactively replenishes the skin with the vital electrolytes you are about to sweat out, while helping your body efficiently absorb all of Magnesium's benefits: from calming effects to muscle relief to restorative sleep. We sourced our Magnesium from the Zechstein Sea, the purest Magnesium source in the world. This ancient seabed is now deep beneath the Earth’s surface, keeping its Mg source pollutant-free and incomparably potent.

name: Courant MAG:2 Essentials
description: The perfect accessory for an iPhone and AirPods user. Magnetically snap-on your iPhone 12/13/14 on the charging stand, and place your wireless charging AirPods on the base. This unique, sleek design, inspired by home decor, works best on your desk or bedside.

name: Cal Bookends
description: A clean, architectural solution for keeping your prized volumes upright and organized. The Cal Bookend is comprised of two steel rods, which elegantly bend across each other and are locked into place by a single bolt. Named for its resemblance to the caltrop—a rudimentary antipersonnel weapon—but in this case a tool of warfare has been redeployed as an object whose purpose is to literally uphold knowledge. Learn more about the story behind the Cal Bookend here. It measures 7.75" H x 6" W x 4.5" D, weighing 2 lb 3oz each.

name: Be Mine! Heart-Shaped Red Velvet Chocolate Cake
description: Say it with a cake! This heart-shaped cake has two rich layers of red velvet chocolate cake, and is filled and covered with the finest cream cheese frosting. Red icing rosettes and BE MINE written across the top are the finishing touches.

name: Barbie Doll and Newborn Pups Playset
description: Barbie doll's adorable pet dog has puppies on the way! With the Barbie Newborn Pups playset, kids can help Barbie doll deliver three adorable baby puppies when they press down on mommy dog's back. After welcoming the puppies, kids can fill the tub with ice-cold water, then dip the towel in and swipe it over the puppies to reveal a special birthmark on each. Barbie doll's flexible knees help her welcome her new pets, and with an adorable puppy carrier featuring room for all three pups, she can care for them on the go!

name: Variety Pack, 24 Pack
description: The Variety Packs contains 24 packets of mix to create 24 delicious cocktails or mocktails, showcasing Craftmix's best selling flavors. Just add liquor (if you want), sparkling water, a packet of craftmix, pour over ice and you'll be instantly on vacation enjoying Blood Orange Mai Tai's, Mango Margarita's, Passionfruit Paloma's and Strawberry Mule's. Includes 24 total packets, 6 of each flavor.

name: All Purpose Fine Jewelry Cleaner Liquid and Cleaning Brush
description: Revitalize your jewelry collection with this jewelry cleaning foam. This remarkable product, born from a unique blend of bio-based surfactants, effortlessly disintegrates daily grime, unveiling the brilliance of your cherished pieces. A commitment to eco-friendliness shines through with a formula devoid of harsh chemicals, peroxides, phosphates, or ammonia, ensuring it's gentle on both your jewelry and the environment.

name: Figaro Chain Necklace
description: A delicate and unique chain necklace like this one belongs in every woman's jewelry box! Treat yourself or a loved one to a sophisticated accessory that will look good no matter what it's worn with. Chain measures 17".

name: Swaddle Blanket
description: The best and most versatile baby blanket you’ll be reaching for long after the swaddling phase. Designed to look great however you use them. 100% organic cotton.

name: The Rainbow Fish
description: The award-winning book about a beautiful fish who finds friendship and happiness when he learns to share. Eye-catching foil stamping, glittering on every page, will delight every child, but it is the universal message at the heart of this simple story about a beautiful fish who learns to make friends by sharing his most prized possessions that gives this book its enduring value.

name: Digital Gift Card, $50
description: A gift card to use towards self care. A Heyday digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout. Please Note: Gift cards do not expire and can be redeemed online or at any Heyday location for products and services.

name: Motivational Metal Pen Set, Neutrals
description: This Motivational Pen Set is perfect. Chic, stylish, easy to write with, there's no better way to jot down your dreams and goals.

name: Uber Chill XL 12 Can Mini Fridge, Recipient's choice
description: The sleek and highly functional Uber Chill XL Personal Mini Fridge is great for the office, dorm room, or as a beauty fridge. Capable of housing up to twelve 12 ounce cans or six 16.9 ounce bottles of your favorite beverage. Utilizing state of the art and environmentally friendly thermo-electric peltier technology, this mini fridge is capable of cooling or warming the contents within a reasonable amount of time, making it convenient in almost any occasion. In addition to this, the portable unit comes with both standard home and car power cables for ultimate portability.

name: Smashed Burger Kit
description: Lock in the juicy flavors and create a caramelized crust with the Cuisinart Smash Burger Kit! This ultimate burger set includes 1 Cast Iron Burger Smasher, 1 Stainless Steel Burger Spatula, 1 Stainless Steel Seasoning Shaker, and 100 Restaurant-Grade Hamburger Patty Papers.

name: Desk Mat Pro + 2 Magnetic Cable Block Managers, Recipient's Choice
description: Desk Mat Pro protects your desk in style and provides unparalleled cable management. Crafted from premium PU Pebble Leather with a faux suede bottom, the Desk Mat Pro protects your desk from spills and scratches. Included are two silicone cable managers to magnetically attach anywhere on the metal-infused desk mat,  keeping your cables organized on the workspace and preventing them from dropping to the floor! Dimensions are 31 in x 16 in.

name: 1 Tin Mushroom Chocolates
description: Whether you need to refocus your morning with a burst of brain energy, or need to calm your mind at the end of a long day, Alice Mushroom Chocolate has the answer for you. Each bite of Alice is formulated to promote long-term benefits while also delivering an immediate boost to cognitive functions. The long term benefits come from the functional mushrooms. These substances are felt over time, not instantly. When incorporated into a daily routine, the nutrients compound in your body and become more effective (and noticeable) with sustained use. But we also know that nothing beats instant gratification. That’s why Alice combined mushrooms with the best nootropics and adaptogens. This union pairs the long-term benefits of mushrooms with the immediate effects of the nootropics, and keeps you on your journey into the delights of fungi. Each gift contains 2 bars for a total of 18 square doses.

name: Essential Brush Set
description: Complete any look with this set of 12 essential brushes for the face and eyes. Made with exclusive SigmaTech® fibers, these brushes are designed to better hold, apply and blend a variety of formulas to ensure you get the most from your makeup products. Whether you're looking for the perfect starter kit or adding to your brush collection, this set is great for every beauty lover!

name: Branded Classic Hardcover Ruled Notebook
description: Moleskine classic notebooks are perfect notebooks for writing journals, a daily diary, or note taking in college classes or meetings. Moleskine notebooks are beloved by travelers & bullet journalists for their slim design.

name: 14K White Gold Brilliant Cut Lab Grown Diamond Pendant Necklace
description: This understated yet dazzling diamond-forward piece the perfect way to highlight every big occasion, transition, and personal achievement in your life. This exquisitely simple design features a round diamond solitaire in a classic 14kt white gold four prong setting. The solitaire hangs from a v-shaped split bail on an 18" box chain with spring ring clasp. This is sure to become an everyday favorite; your future self will thank you!

name: Weekender Fold-Up Bag
description: This is our go-to travel bag because it’s a roomy, feather-light duffle when you need it that folds into a tablet-sized pouch when you don’t. Bonus points that it’s made from 22 upcycled plastic water bottles!

name: Gallon Bag 4-Pack
description: Behold, the reusable gallon. This spacious, waterproof, leak-proof reusable bag is a versatile storage workhorse. It’s like disposable gallon zip bags you know but made of the 100% food-safe, BPA-free, lead-free PEVA, which is lightweight and tough enough to hold up for hundreds of uses, saving as many bags along the way. The double-lock closure is designed to seal tight, locking air out and liquids in (bye, freezer burn). This performance makes them incredibly useful in all kinds of situations beyond the kitchen, from stroller to market, to carry-on bag, throughout a vacation, and back again. Includes a set of 4, gallon sized bags.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ plant is an excellent low-maintenance indoor plant (trust us, they are difficult to kill). You can place them almost anywhere, and they will grow, but they do appreciate a little bit of light now and then. Wherever they go, they are a tasteful and classy addition to your Green Space. Overall size is 4" to 6" W, and 7" to 10" H, and is not safe for pets.

name: Monogrammed Large Laptop Cover
description: Slip your laptop into something sleek, functional, and protective. Featuring a secure zip closure, and convenient interior and exterior accessory pockets, this sleeve offers a perfect fit for your 14" to 15" laptop. Made from TUMI’s signature, ultra-durable FXT® ballistic nylon.

name: Personal 2-Speed Single-Serve Blender
description: Fresh, clean and compact in glossy cream, the Smeg personal blender whips up on-the-go drinks in no time. The double stainless steel blade swirls fruits, vegetables, nuts and more into fresh smoothies or milkshakes. Blend directly in one of the break-resistant bottles, top with a cap and tote your creation to the office, gym or school.

name: The Shark Tank Bundle
description: The mother of all Fishwife products, this mega-pack includes one tin of each Fishwife tinned fish! This set includes 8 tins of Fishwife tinned fish (1 tin of each) including Smoked Rainbow Trout, Smoked Salmon, Smoked Albacore Tuna, Smoked Salmon with Fly by Jing Sichuan Chili Crisp, Cantabrian Anchovies with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Slow Smoked Mackerel with Chili Flakes, Sardines with Preserved Lemon, and Sardines with Hot Pepper.

name: Premium Vegan & Gluten Free Box
description:
This snack box is a collection of 15 individually wrapped certified gluten free and vegan healthy protein rich snacks. It includes 1 Daily Crunch Nashville Hot Sprouted Almonds, 1 Craize Sweet Corn Toasted Corn Crackers, 1 Solely Mango and Orange Whole Fruit Gummies, 
1 Eat Your Coffee Caffeinated Snack Bite Cocoa Espresso, 1 Tosi Cashew Coconut SuperBites, 1 The GFB Gluten Protein Bars Coconut Cashew, 
1 Pasokin Peanut Butter Bites, 1 Love Corn Love Corn Cheezy, 1 Iwon Mesquite BBQ Flavored Organic Protein Stix, 1 Kapop Cinnamon Churro Vegan Puffs, 1 Jana Banana Green Banana Bar, 1 Eden Gourmet Pumpkin Seeds, 1 Rule Breaker Chocolate Allergen Free Brownies, 1 Bubbba’s Banana Chips, and 1 Chasin' Dreams Sweet and Salty Popped Sorghum.

name: All Season Down Comforter, King/Cal King
description: Brooklinen's most versatile comforter, this is ideal comfort that lasts year round. Snuggle up to this cozy comforter, each tucked within Brooklinen's ultra-soft, 100% long staple cotton shell.

name: Slim Refillable Pen
description: This pen is the perfect companions to your Aya Paper Co. Journals! Choose between the Black Intention Pen or Gold Manifestation Pen. Black Ink and 0.5 mm tip ballpoint.

name: The Salt Sphere
description: The Salt Sphere is perfect for storing finishing salts, peppers and spice blends. It does double duty as a beautiful object and smart storage, featuring a handy magnetic swivel lid and a stackable fluted base. Made of FSC-certified wood and measures 4.25" wide, 5" tall.

name: Tushy Travel
description: TUSHY Travel is a portable bidet, perfect for people who poop when they’re out and about… which means you! TUSHY Travel is collapsible and expandable for discreet portability. It includes Collapsible bottle with TURD-gonomic grip and squeeze, a hinged nozzle with 3-point spout for a 5-star clean, a discreet carrying case, and carabiner to hook onto your bag. It can hold up to 11 fl oz of water.

name: BuildOn Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide access to education for a child in a country with high rates of poverty and illiteracy.

name: Vegan Essentials Mix
description: The Vegan Mix includes each of their 4 Vegan assortments: the Dark Pepites, the Orangettes, the Pâtes de Fruits and the Z chocolates number 10 and 15. Perfect for Vegan aficionados in search of fine delicacies with a French twist.

name: Collapsible 36 oz Bowl
description: This do-it-all bowl holds a whopping 4.5 cups! Collapse and stack it for space-saving organization, or fill it up to take your meals to-go. The four clasp lid creates a spill-proof seal. Dishwasher safe, comes apart for easy cleaning. Bowl is made of premium food grade silicone, lid is made of BPA-free and BPS-free polypropylene.

name: Rally Bag
description: It's game time with the new Rally Bag. Made out of a lightweight yet sturdy polyester, this pickleball bag has extra padding for structure and comfort. The rally bag can be worn as a backpack or cross body. The choice is yours. Measures L 17" x W 9.7" x H 2.35".

name: Staff The Oven Mitts
description: These Staff are a happy pair of different colored oven mitts that want to hold your hand. BPA free, food grade silicone and dishwasher safe. Includes 2 oven mitts that measure 11.6”H x 7.5”W each.

name: The Base
description: The Base is designed to elegantly and conveniently display all of your kitchen tools, while protecting your knives with a hidden magnet that will keep your blades sharp. Made exclusively with FSC certified, sustainably-harvested wood. Measures 5" long, 6" wide, 9.5" tall.

name: Crystal Thermos
description: This thermos is decorated with 15 Swarovski crystals and features built-in strainer which makes it easy to brew herbal tea. Suitable for hot or cold drinks, made of shiny black stainless steel and holds 450 ml.

name: Function101 Desk Mat Pro + 1 Magnetic Cable Block Cable Manager
description: Desk Mat Pro protects your desk in style and provides unparalleled cable management. Crafted from premium PU Pebble Leather with a faux suede bottom, the Desk Mat Pro protects your desk from from spills and scratches. A silicone cable manager magnetically attaches anywhere on the metal infused desk mat keeping your cables organized on the workspace and preventing them from dropping to the floor! Includes 1 Desk Mat Pro and 1 Cable Block XL.

name: Crystalline Wonder Watch
description: This Swarovski watch from the Crystalline Wonder family artfully combines form and function. Approximately 1,000 crystals in the stainless steel case create a brilliant sparkling effect. A stainless steel bracelet and a white silver tone dial embellished with Arabic numerals and the Swarovski swan at 12 o'clock, complete the sophisticated design. This Swiss made watch is water-resistant up to 50m. Watch strap measures 6.4" and case measures 1.375".

name: Art Hokusai The Great Wave
description: Lovers of art and classic paintings will adore this incredible LEGO Art building set for adults. You can create a LEGO replica of one of the art world’s most iconic works Hokusai’s The Great Wave (31208). During the immersive building process, you can completely relax , and indulge in some creative joy and genuine mindfulness.

name: 15 Piece Edible Gold
description: A fantastic fusion of sophistication and flavor, the Sapphire Gold features every recipe from the Traditional assortment glamorously gilded with a combined total of 28 leaves of edible gold and presented in a mahogany box. With pure gold adorning the outside of each chocolate, and chef-inspired flavors like raspberry ganache and Valencia almond-studded praline on the inside, it’s a Midas-worthy gift for anyone who appreciates the finer things in life.

name: Pacific Tote with Personalized Hand Painting
description: A sophisticated everyday tote crafted from EcoCraft Canvas® and recycled vegan leather. Generously sized to fit all your daily essentials, carry it as a versatile day bag or wear over your shoulder with the removable shoulder strap. A top clasp provides additional security. Perfect addition to your travel routine with a hidden smart strap, which slides over the handles of your luggage to secure it in transit. It measures 14"L x 12.2"H x 5.1"W.

name: No. 4 Comb
description: Machete combs are so beautiful you will never want to put them away. But just in case you have to, they come with a pouch for easy storage. Best for curly hair and afros. Combs are handmade of Italian Acetate, each, measuring 3.5" long, 2.63" wide.

name: Pretzel Tube
description: Each tube is filled with a half pound of chef crafted pretzels made in micro batches.

name: Checkerboard Mini Pillow
description: The best things come in small packages (with sunny colors and a ton of personality). This irresistibly soft, fan favorite Mini Pillow will brighten up your bedroom or cozy TV corner. Includes one pillow that measures 18" x 12".

name: Malala Fund Donation
description: More than 120 million girls are out of school today. Your support helps break down the barriers holding them back.

name: UV Phone Sanitizer and Wireless Charging Pad
description: Clean up to 99% of harmful microorganisms and keep any phone from becoming a portable petri dish while also charging it. This 2-in-1 UV Phone Sanitizer and Wireless Charging Pad utilizes UV-C light technology to clean your phone in just 90 seconds - with a deep cleaning mode also available at 5 minutes. The wireless pad supports 5W wireless charging and is compatible with most plastic phone cases.

name: Sausalito Food and Wine Tour for One, Sausalito, CA
description: Taste and sip your way through Sausalito's historic downtown village on this Sausalito Food and Wine Tour. Explore the famed Sausalito village with a 5-star provider on Yelp and TripAdvisor with an approximately 3.5 hour guided walking tour that visits up to 4 local stops for gourmet food, chocolate, and wine tastings. You'll experience farm-to-table and sea-to-table offerings with Napa or Italian varietals, including 4 sit-down restaurant experiences in all, with an organic chocolate stop for the sweet tooths. Includes an experience for one.

name: Four Hundred Souls
description: Four Hundred Souls is a unique one-volume “community” history of African Americans. The editors, Ibram X. Kendi and Keisha N. Blain, have assembled ninety brilliant writers, each of whom takes on a five-year period of that four-hundred-year span. The writers explore their periods through a variety of techniques: historical essays, short stories, personal vignettes, and fiery polemics. They approach history from various perspectives: through the eyes of towering historical icons or the untold stories of ordinary people; through places, laws, and objects. Hardcover.

name: Triple Prep Weightless Multitasking Moisturizer SPF 40
description: A multitasking face moisturizer that delivers a trio of benefits: Weightless hydration, expert sun protection & a supported moisture barrier, powered by a hydrating complex. Triple Prep was created to be your essential morning moisturizer: It hydrates, supports and protects your skin in one powerful step. Triple Prep is one of the easiest ways to make sunscreen part of your daily routine, and was formulated especially for those with normal to oily skin types to deliver daily hydration in a weightless formula that absorbs easily and preps your skin for the day.

name: Insigne Pendant Necklace
description: Add a meaningful touch to your style with this star pendant from the Insigne family. The star-shaped design is rhodium plated and is decorated with 12 round Swarovski Zirconia, each in a refined prong setting. Along with a lobster closure, the pendant features an additional stone at the end of the elongation. An expressive piece of jewelry for yourself, or a perfect gift for a loved one. Includes a 15" chain and pendant measures 0.875" x 0.75".

name: Baby Bundle
description: This Baby Bundle is the most useful set for new parents! The Gift Set includes 3 matching pieces includes one quilted muslin baby blanket, one swaddle, and one burp cloth set.

name: Instax Mini Link 2 Wireless Photo Printer
description: Connect to your Smartphone via the free downloadable Instax App and watch creativity flow with the all-new INSTAXAiR feature. Add bubbles, petals, neon, spray paint or even glitter to your Smartphone photo by drawing in the air with the Instax Mini Link 2 device, all before printing out onto Instax Mini instant film. You can even record a video of the drawing and share the moment as a printable QR code, ready to scan with a Smartphone.

name: Iced Tea Box
description: Summertime, and the sippin’s easy. If you believe that tea is amazing all year ‘round, make the most out of summer tea with the Iced Tea Box! It’s filled with fun and fruity tea blends to support all your outdoor activities, or for sitting on the porch and sipping with a nice book. Choose between a caffeinated or caffeine-free version of the Iced Tea Box.

name: Black Girls Code Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation creates new opportunities for girls and gender nonconforming youth of color to have a daring impact on tech. When they succeed, we all succeed.

name: Go-To Sweatpants
description: Nothing beats a good pair of sweatpants. This pair improves on a classic with its super-soft, brushed fleece, relaxed fit, side pockets, back pocket and elastic at the waist and cuff. Size up if you're looking for a roomier fit.

name: Malala Fund Donation
description: More than 120 million girls are out of school today. Your support helps break down the barriers holding them back.

name: Head-to-Toe Set
description: This set comes with a complete skin and hair care routine. Includes samples of invigorating shampoo and conditioner to prevent hair loss, refreshing body wash to treat body acne, clay-infused face wash to deeply cleanse the face from debris, and lightweight gel moisturizer to soothe, rehydrate and repair skin while you sleep.  It's about time you treated the rest of your body as good as you treat your face.

name: Magnesium Bath Enhancer
description: This Magnesium Bath Enhancer is a first-of-its-kind, ultra-concentrated salt soak solution for both hot and cold water. This potent Zechstein and sea salt based elixir adds maximum wellness benefits to any soak including detoxification, increased circulation, muscle relief, mineral rebalancing and skin softening. Naturally found in epsom, magnesium is absorbed dermally with the help of naturally occurring terpenes that help with penetration. Holds 10 FL oz.

name: Tiny Cup
description: Learning to drink out of an open cup is an important developmental milestone, and the Tiny Cup helps baby transition from bottle to cup. Open cup drinking supports healthy oral and speech development, aids with teething, helps baby learn to have a strong swallow and can decrease tooth decay. Made of 100% Silicone that is BPA, BPS, PVS, plthalate and latex free. Holds 2 oz.

name: Cordless Wine Opener
description: No wine enthusiast's entertaining bar is complete without the Cordless Wine Opener from Cuisinart. Powerful enough to open 50 corks on a single charge, this stylish and compact tool also comes with a foil cutter.

name: Covert Belt
description: Fully reversible with flexible stretch webbing (think the perfect worn-in leather belt bend) that won’t wear down—paired with a powder-coated buckle for durability and bottle opener on the back.

name: Home Office Upgrade Set
description: Add some personality and style to your work space! This bundle has the perfect pairing of purpose and personalization. This custom mousepad and catchall tray set comes engraved with your choice of personalization. No more need for your things to be scattered, these leather Catch Alls are the perfect place to put it all. Choice of personalization and leather color.

name: Refillable Floss String
description: Slim, reusable floss dispenser you’d be proud to display on your bathroom counter, with a preloaded refill you change every 3 months. Retractable top saves space and makes on the go easy. Just tap, tear, and take everywhere.

name: Vertuo Lattissima Espresso Machine
description: From your every coffee wish to your cup, there’s only one touch with Vertuo Lattissima.  With its integrated milk solution, the ideal coffee and milk moment is at your fingertips. Simply press the button to enjoy your coffee black or with foam. And with a wide array of coffee varieties and cup sizes to choose from, less effort means more pleasure.

name: Key West Sunset Sail & Champagne for Two, Key West, FL
description: The two of you experience the magic of the sunset from the sparkling, emerald waters of the Florida Keys on the Champagne Sunset Sail. Enjoy a chance to see the famous natural phenomena, the "Green Flash" of the sun, plus dolphins, sea turtles and other wildlife on the two-hour sunset sail. Savor a perfect evening spent off-land sipping champagne and taking in the beauty of the ocean. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Limited Edition Gift Set
description: Life comes at you fast. That’s why Cardon developed this Anti-Aging Skincare Set full of just what you need to tackle fine lines, rough texture, and other signs of aging in the skin. From protecting skin all day long to boosting its ability to repair and rebuild overnight, your past, present, and future selves will thank you. This set includes Dark Circle Eye Rescue, Purifying Clay Cleanser, Daily SPF + Moisturizer, and Hydro Boost Gel Moisturizer.

name: Solar Charger and Emergency Radio
description: This Preppi Charger and Emergency Radio has USB device charging, weather band radio to receive emergency updates, LED flashlight, LED room lamp, and even a high decibel SOS siren all in one. The upgraded 2000 mAh battery will give your device more charge during that emergency scenario.

name: Herb Garden Jars
description: These self-watering herb kits feature a vintage-inspired mason jar outfitted with a passive hydroponic system known as “wicking,” which brings water and nutrients up to the plant's roots. So whether you forget to water, overwater, or both, they’ve got you covered. This year-round indoor planter comes equipped with everything you’ll need to start growing, just add water and set in a sunny window. Includes Organic and/or Non-GMO Seeds.

name: Adventure Challenge
description: 50 Scratch-Off Adventures! Every adventure in the book is a surprise until you scratch it off! Don't forget to take photos and let the book become a keepsake full of memories to look back on. Choose which type of adventure you want to go on, be it deepening a connection with a significant other, enlivening family time, or looking inward to your own growth.

name: Eyewear Stand
description:
The Eyewear Stand is a cast brass pedestal that is crafted in humble service of spectacles. Dimensions: 3" x 2" x 1.25". 
Cast Brass.

name: 9oz Amber Jar Candle
description: Indulge in the scents of summer with these luxurious candles from Sweet Water Decor. Transport yourself to the beach, island, or a tropical flowerbed that means summer to you.

name: Beast Hydration System
description: Glass water bottle that includes infuser to infuse your water with fresh, natural ingredients. Remove the Infusion Chamber to take your smoothie on the go. Holds up to 750mL. Made of borosilicate glass, stainless steel, silicone, PP, and TPE.

name: The Weekend Duffel
description: Pack for the weekend like a pro with this versatile and spacious duffel. It's got a generous 35 liters of space for all your essentials, plus a ventilated pocket for your shoes, along with mesh pockets for your socks and underwear, and a large side pocket that fits Halfday's tech kit just right. It also features a water-resistant shell and a rubberized base to keep it adventure-ready, and a luggage pass-through for easy wheeling around the airport concourse.

name: LARQ Bottle Swig Top, 34oz
description: Sippers, chuggers, swiggers and ice-lovers rejoice! The LARQ Bottle Swig Top was designed for easy hydrating on the go, simply snap open the cap. 24 hours cold, BPA-free and made with food-grade 18/8 stainless steel. 34 oz. This bottle does not use LARQ's PureVis technology but its double-wall insulation means that water stays cold for up to 24 hours.

name: Angela Davis: An Autobiography
description: Her own powerful story up to 1972, told with warmth, brilliance, humor and conviction. With an introduction by the author. Hardcover.

name: Everyday Lightweight Cotton No-Show Socks 4 Pack
description: This no-show socks come in a pack of four and work for everyday wear. Made from extra-comfy, organic cotton, they have premium details like the cushioned footbed, stay-put silicone heel grips, and seamless toe. These cushy socks are designed to mold to your feet to ensure comfortable fit and stay up on your heel.

name: Floral Maternity Robe
description: This silky soft Nurtured 9 Classic Cream Floral Maternity Robe for pregnancy and hospital is the ultimate luxury maternity wardrobe staple that elevates mom-to-be’s bedtime (and often all day long) routine. She’ll feel extra cozy and beautifully feminine wearing this pregnancy bathrobe around the house - from swanky Babymoon to welcoming baby at the Hospital.

name: The Brush Cleaner
description: A great brush is an investment in your overall hair health, take care of it with a good clean once a week. This brush cleaner makes it easy to maintain brush cleanliness with 100% nylon bristles that gently remove excess hair, fluff, and product build up.

name: Instax Mini 12 Camera Case
description: This stylish and lightweight Instax Mini 12 camera case is the perfect fit for your Instax Mini 12 instant camera. Made from quality polyurethane leather, this case has detail after detail. From the reinforced adjustable shoulder strap and tone-on-tone stitching to an attractive debossed Instax logo, this Instax Mini 12 camera case is the perfect companion to bring to all of your Instax picture-taking moments.

name: Self-Care Sample Trio
description: Relaxation is near with this sweet box set of Palermo's most popular relaxation products, made mini for your convenience. This set includes a deluxe sample size of Replenishing Salt Soak, Soothing Milk Bath, and Botanical Facial Steam. Each deluxe sample size is packaged in individual resealable and recyclable bags and contains enough for two generous uses.

name: 3-Piece Executive Computer Decanter & Glass Set
description: For whiskey lovers who also love navigating the online world, this decanter is a digital delight, complete with syntax-tic rocks glasses and a charming glass tumbler display shelf. And while these may be glassware sets for a good ol’ fashioned Windows 98, you can also go a little Open Source, and use it for rum, tequila or any liquor glasses you like. The cloud’s your limit! This gift includes a 27oz Decanter with two 10oz whiskey glasses, and a display shelf with accessory drawer.

name: Black Truffle Pasta Sauce Combo Pack
description: Meet your new go-to red sauces. The Black Truffle Marinara is the perfect blend of ripe tomatoes, delicate herbs, black winter truffle, and red chili peppers. The Spicy Marinara Sauce is a blend of ripe tomatoes, delicate herbs, black winter truffle, and a generous dose of red chili peppers. This pair of sauces blends the iconic flavors of TRUFF with garden-fresh ingredients to create a rich pasta sauce that’s both balanced and bold.

name: Sauce Bundle, 2 Pack
description: Enjoy Carbone's take on quintessential homemade sauces, straight from the Carbone kitchen and into yours at home. Elevate pasta night with this exceptional addition. Choice of sauce.

name: Venn Puzzle
description: The Venn Puzzle is a surprisingly difficult dexterity challenge and an intriguing addition to your desk, shelf, or coffee table. The assembled puzzle creates a perfect sphere so each piece makes up one-third of the sphere by volume.

name: Big Frosty Golf Bag Cooler
description: This cooler is perfect for carrying your favorite beers, fitting into any bag, and most importantly keeping your refreshments cold for when you birdie (or bogey) the first hole. This golf bag cooler holds up to seven cans of your favorite swing oil and keeps 'em ice cold the entire round. This golf bag drink cooler fits discreetly inside your golf bag and can be used anytime on and off the course!

name: Beer Bottle Set
description: Your days of peeling labels off empty beer bottles are over! The Beer Bottle Set comes with ten 12-oz amber bottles perfect for bottling your next batch. The box also doubles as a dark place to store your bottles as they condition.

name: Candle Care Kit
description: Extend the life of your candles by caring for them after each burn! The wick trimmer will help clip the ashy, excess wick bit after you burn it which will ensure that the next time you light it, the burn will be clean. Snuff out the flame by laying the dome over for a few seconds when you’re done enjoying your candle. Use the wick dipper as another way to extinguish, by using the hook and submerge the wick into the molten wax, then pull it back up. This set includes a wick trimmer, a snuffer, a wick dipper, and a carrying pouch.

name: The Marble Coaster Set
description: With marble quarried in Turkey, the stone grains will vary from piece to piece, making each set remarkable and truly unique. Includes 4 marble coasters, each measuring 4" x 4".

name: 1989 (Taylor's Version) by Taylor Swift
description: 1989 (Taylor’s Version) Vinyl 21 Songs Including 5 previously unreleased songs from The Vault 1 of 4 Editions: Collectible album gatefold jacket with unique front and back cover art 2 Crystal Skies Blue vinyl discs 1 of 4 Editions: Collectible album sleeves including lyrics and never-before-seen photos for each version.

name: The Good Bowl (Double)
description: The Good Bowl is an all-in-one mat with bowls that capture your pet’s mess. The mat grips to any flat surface, making it difficult for paws (and toddler hands) to tip over. Comes with the mat plus two removable stainless steel bowls for easy refills and cleaning. 100% Silicone. 16oz bowls.

name: Glider Ride and Flying Lesson for One, Warner Springs, CA
description: Combine the thrill and tranquility of a glider ride with a lesson on how to pilot these incredible machines. Fly out of one of the largest soaring centers in the US with an FAA Certified Pilot and explore views of Lake Henshaw, Hot Springs Peak, Palomar mountains and more. After your ground training instruction, you will get to fly the plane yourself, no experience necessary! Includes an experience for one person.

name: Weighted Throw Blanket
description: Wrap yourself in serenity. The Weighted Blanket is made of breathable, textured cotton, with a quilted interior layer of tiny glass beads (better for the environment) that make this blanket feel like a hug every time you put it on. Suggested to reduce anxiety and support a more restful sleep, the Weighted Blanket is the perfect addition to your living or bedroom, ready at a moment's notice to provide the comfort you deserve. Weighs 12 lbs. and measures 48" x 72".

name: Pink Chocolate Covered Oreos
description: New and gorgeous, these Oreos are dunked in stunning ruby pink chocolate, and laid out in Limited Edition Palms gift box, for the perfect Valentine's Day chocolate gift. Delicious Oreo cookies are dipped in premium pink chocolate three times for a delicious and decadent chocolate treat. This Valentine's chocolate gift is so beautiful and so yummy, get these limited edition treats before they're gone.

name: Natural Deodorant Stick
description: If your preference is a natural deodorant you can apply the old-fashioned way, say hello to the Natural Deodorant Stick. Formulated with absorbent and odor-controlling superpowers, all you need is one to two swipes for long-lasting odor protection. And, you'll feel extra good using it knowing it's aluminum-free, vegan, cruelty-free!

name: International Committee of the Red Cross in support of Israeli and Palestinian Civilians Donation
description: The gift of giving! The ICRC has been present in Israel and the occupied territories since 1967. As a neutral, independent, humanitarian organization, the ICRC visits detainees in Israeli and Palestinian places of detention. They also help improve access to essential services like water and electricity in Gaza and support livelihood projects throughout the occupied territories.
brand: International Committee of the Red Cross

name: Miracle Plate Round Diamond Tennis Bracelet
description: Silver S shaped links wrap around beautiful miracle set diamonds in this alluring 1/10 carat link tennis bracelet. Round-cut diamonds are tucked inside silver to create a wave-like design that will sit delicately on your wrist. This piece is crafted in the finest 925 sterling silver, and plated with rhodium (a platinum-family metal) for a lifetime of tarnish-free wear. The bracelet is 7-1/4 inches long, good for small and medium sized wrists. It has a box with tongue closure for secure all-day wear.

name: Large Customizable Tile Mat
description: Meet the all-purpose mat that is functional, beautiful, and, most importantly, completely customizable. Its timeless, vintage-inspired hexagon tile design and removable caps can be used to create endless patterns, designs, and words. Includes 200 Black Tiles in a mesh cotton bag for tile storage. The large mat measures 24" x 36" x 0.25".

name: New England Breakfast Gift Basket
description: In New England, a traditional breakfast is more than just a meal, it’s a ritual. Inside this gift, you will discover New England tea and coffee, New Hampshire maple syrup, and a classic New England buttermilk pancake mix, along with wild Maine blueberry jam, and a delicious scone mix. Now anyone can enjoy a North Country breakfast no matter where they are.

name: Ubarre Weight, 4lb
description: The Ubarre's ergonomic shape is designed for comfort and utility. Made of steel, it measures 11 x 14 inches.

name: The Comfy Dream Wearable Blanket
description: This is The Comfy's lightest, softest, and most, well, dreamlike wearable blanket yet! The Comfy Dream® wearable blanket is a single layer of luscious microfiber that's so soft, you’ll feel like you’re wearing a baby blanket. Its lightness makes it perfect for wearing around the house, or even to take with you when you need your warmth to travel.

name: PIXIO Mini Monsters Magnetic Block Construction Set
description: Whether a monster is cute or scary doesn't depend on its size. The MINI MONSTERS set is your chance to assemble unique creations. You'll get 100 PIXIO blocks in 6 colors to create a ghost and more! Rebuild, rename, and reinvent your monsters: you're now a PIXIO monster master. Recommended for ages 6+.

name: All Eyes On You Kit
description: Your undereyes are often the first to show signs of aging and less-than-optimal sleep. You can spend your life behind sunnies, or try this  amazing alternative: rejuvenating, restoring, and illuminating eye gels that make you look well-rested when you’re anything but. This set includes 2 pairs FlashPatch® Rejuvenating Eye Gels,  2 pairs FlashPatch® and Restoring Night Eye Gels, and 2 pairs FlashPatch® and Illuminating Eye Gels .

name: College Care Package
description: Nutritious chicken noodle soup, or any other soup of your choice, beats a late-night pizza any day. This package includes two 32 oz containers of study-session worthy soup, six bacci rolls, six cookies like mom makes, and a ladle to serve up the smiles.

name: The Serving Set
description: Whether you're serving a crowd or feeling fancy for one, this trio handles everything from big salads to bucatini. The Serving Set includes one of each of the Serving Platter 13.5", Serving Bowl 9.25", and Low Serving Bowl 13.25". All pieces are finished with an elegant & durable semi-matte glaze, and are safe for the dishwasher, freezer & oven up to 480 degrees.

name: Beosound Explore Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: Beosound Explore is designed to perform under extremes, and it’s just as intuitive to use as your other trusted gear. Inside the scratch-resistant, anodised aluminium shell, a vertical rib structure provides serious protection from bumps. Clip it on your backpack or hang from your belt. Or lodge it in a cliff-side alcove. The rubber base keeps the speaker steady on most surfaces. Plays continuously for up to 27 hours, recharges in 2 hours.

name: Tot Diaper Caddy with Changing Mat
description: OXO designed the Tot Diaper Caddy with Changing Mat with a place for everyday diaper changing essentials, so you’ll never be caught empty-handed. The generously sized, comfortable folding Mat fits right inside, for changes anytime, anywhere. A large-capacity wipes compartment fits most wipes dispensers, while the storage area keeps diapers and lotions at the ready. The accessory drawer provides easy access to ointments, grooming kits, first aid supplies, even backup pacifiers. The locking handle makes it easy to grab and go, making you ready for any diaper emergency.

name: inKind Pass Gift Card, $500 Value
description: inKind Pass gift cards can be redeemed via the inKind mobile app for food, beverage and tax across hundreds of top-rated restaurants, bars, and coffee shops nationwide. An inKind Pass gift card will be delivered via email within 24 hours. A $500 value.

name: The Total Package Gift Set
description: This gift set includes everything needed for  enjoying the perfect cup of tea. Packaged in premium gift box with gold foil embossing, this set includes a ceramic teacup, a tea strainer with resting cup, and 2 packages of premium loose leaf tea. The Tea is packaged in home-compostable pouches, and makes 16-20 cups.

name: Le Explorer
description: Maintaining Brunch’s iconic hotel-slipper aesthetic while prioritizing form and function, le explorer is designed to deliver more comfort and durability than ever before. The footbed features eva foam that molds to the foot while offering a countered shape that protects and cradles the heel. Meanwhile, the outsole is made from partially recycled eva, a material typically used for running sneakers, for added support and traction. Made from the highest-quality of materials, le explorer is stain resistant and machine washable, making it the perfect accessory for your greatest adventures.

name: The Great Bowl (Double)
description: The Great Bowl is an all-in-one mat with bowls that capture your pet’s mess. The mat grips to any flat surface, making it difficult for paws (and toddler hands) to tip over. Comes with the mat plus two removable stainless steel bowls for easy refills and cleaning. 100% Silicone. 32oz bowls.

name: Purim Macaron Collection
description: This Purim Collection brings a festive flavor with a Box of 12 macarons in salted caramel, lemon, raspberry, mango, red velvet and pistachio flavors! They've also included 4 limited edition printed macarons featuring a mask and happy Purim to really complete the celebration. Taste the sweetness of Purim with this one-of-a-kind collection.

name: Champagne Diamond Cross Pendant Necklace
description: Embrace your spirituality with this sparkling 14kt yellow gold plated 925 sterling silver cross necklace. This pendant is embellished with 21 champagne color diamonds in classic shared prong settings. The diamonds are round-cut and have a total carat weight of 1/2 c.t. This piece comes with an 18" inch rope chain that hangs beautifully off the neck. This cross pendant is the perfect piece to celebrate your faith everyday.

name: SOS Intensive Rescue Serum
description: A lightweight serum to help visibly reduce redness and irritation for softer, clearer-looking, and happier skin. SOS has received the National Eczema Association's Seal of Acceptance™ and is safe for all skin types.

name: House Blend 4-pack, Ground
description: 100% Colombian farm-fresh specialty house blend coffees, roasted to order. 4 x 12oz bags, medium grind.

name: Best Sellers Bundle
description: The gift that keeps on giving. This bundle includes Aya's Intention Journal, an elegant Plastic-Free Tote Bag, a touching Affirmation Card, a captivating Abstract Illustration Card, and a charming Grown Grown Birthday Card.

name: Valentine's Day Chocolate Covered Pretzel Box
description: Sending you love with chocolatey sweet and salty pretzels. Includes 3 chocolate covered pretzel rods each measuring 4".

name: Edgewater Collection Coffee Mug
description: A ceramic mug beautiful enough for guests but durable enough to withstand every day use. Each piece is hand-thrown and unique giving it a beautiful handmade quality. The Edgewater Coffee Mug is the perfect size to enjoy your morning coffee or tea, and each cup holds 16 oz. Dishwasher safe, microwave safe, oven safe up to 300°F. Includes one mug, choice of color.

name: Stocked Freezer Favorites
description: This gift includes 4 Ribeyes (10 oz.), 8 juicy Steak Burgers (5 oz.), 4 Chicken Fried Steaks (4.5 oz.), 2 All-Beef Meatballs (12 oz. pkgs.), 8 Gourmet Jumbo Franks (3 oz.), 8 Kielbasa Sausage (3 oz.), 4 Boneless Pork Chops (6 oz.), 4 Boneless Chicken Breasts (1 lb. pkg.), 4 Individual Scalloped Potatoes (3.81 oz.), 4 Caramel Apple Tartlets (4 oz.) & Signature Seasoning (1 oz.).

name: The Jumper Camera Backpack
description: The Jumper uses dividers to configure your camera setup making it the perfect companion for photoshoots and everyday use. Featuring premium details to make photoshoots a breeze including a top compartment to hold an extra set of clothes, a laptop sleeve that holds up to a 16" Macbook, a quick access pocket on the side so you never miss a shot, a passport pocket, a luggage-passthrough to comfortably fit on your suitcase, and a hidden pocket to keep valuables safe. The Jumper measures 17" x 11" x 5.5" and is made of 600D Polyester.

name: Orochi V2 Lightweight Wireless Optical Gaming Mouse
description: Introducing the Razer Orochi V2, a compact, ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse with the longest battery life in the market for peerless portable performance. Armed with an upgraded sensor and switches for crisp control, it’s the perfect partner for gaming on the go.

name: Replenishing Salt Soak with Geranium + Jasmine
description: This pretty pink blend combines powerhouse nourishing Himalayan Pink and Dead Sea Salts with heavenly Jasmine Sambac absolute and geranium oils for a lush and rejuvenating bath time upgrade making this blend a dreamy and effective way to reset body and mind. Includes an 8oz  glass jar, provides 6-8 uses.

name: Stainless Steel Kitchen Utensil
description: As featured in New York Magazine, each of these Stainless Steel Kitchen Utensils feel substantial yet are light enough to move swiftly. Select which stainless steel utensil you need to compliment your kitchen, between The Air Whisk, The Only Tongs, or The Slotted Spoon.

name: Gardening Gloves
description: Make quick, painless work of prickly plants, rough soil, dry bark, and grasp wooden tool handles with ease. Barebones re-creation of the classic work glove means maximum comfort, outdoor versatility, and quality protection. The keystone thumb stitch improves dexterity while shirred elastic back keeps gloves in place. Made of premium grain cowhide that is soft, warm, and breathable.  Sizes run small.

name: 10K White Gold Pear Shaped Blue Sapphire and Diamond Hoop Earrings
description: Indulge in the captivating allure of these exquisite 10K White Gold Huggy Hoop Earrings. Crafted with precision, these earrings feature a pear-shaped blue sapphire, radiating its mesmerizing hue. Adorned with a total of 12 dazzling round diamonds, these earrings offer a touch of elegance and sophistication. The diamonds, with a color grade of H-I, are set in a pave setting, enhancing their brilliance. The lever-back finding ensures a secure and comfortable fit. The sapphire gemstones, treated for color enhancement, measure 4 x 3 MM and are expertly set in a 3-prong setting.

name: Fireside Hybrid Slippers
description: Your puffer jacket and your sneakers eloped and had twins. These cozy shoes are the result, built with a puffy upper and a tough EVA sole. Use the cord lock to tighten the elastic laces, or fold down the collapsible heel and jam your feet in slipper-style.

name: Lanai Inflatable Stand-Up Paddleboard
description: At the heart of its design, the Lanai inflatable SUP has a rigid 5” core that allows for optimal tracking and a great capacity, perfect for intermediate lighter weight paddlers for both touring or recreational paddling and stable enough to practice yoga exercises on. The board shape includes a defined nose and rounded tail, helping it glide even in windy and choppy conditions.

name: 3 Piece Grilling Tool Set
description: This 3-piece grill tool set is great for beginner and seasoned grillers alike. The tongs feature scalloped edges for easier grabbing. Use the built-in bottle opener for grill-side sipping, and lock and unlock with the tong holder. The turner has a double-bend design for leverage when flipping. It comes with a heat resistant surface to rest tools, and extra-long handles with non-slip grips. Includes a pair of grilling tongs, a grilling spatula, and a silicone tool rest.

name: Candle Stick Holder Making Clay Kit
description: This pottery starter kit includes all the materials and guidance to make the homeware piece pictured. It also has a more in-depth and step-by-step video tutorial. Inspired by a classical candlestick shape, this elegant pair make a brilliant addition to any tablescape or mantlepiece. Decorate and personalise to suit your style.

name: Telegraph Collection Serving Platter
description: The sleek and simple design makes the ideal canvas for all the delicious meals you cook up. Each piece is hand-thrown, which gives it a unique feel and variation. Dishwasher safe, microwave safe, up to 300°F. The platter measures 14". Includes one serving platter, choice of color.

name: Seaside Escape
description: Bring the feeling of a relaxing day spent at the salty shore home with a coastal inspired spa surprise! They'll love this assortment of small batch self-care products with a seaside vacation theme. This gift box includes Cozy Socks in Ivory, Formulary 55 Facial Steam, Formulary 55 Sea Clay Body Mask, LAPCOS Aqua Daily Sheet Mask, Get Dewy With It Sheet Mask, FlashPatch Restoring Night Eye Gels, Tea with Tae Spa Day Tea (Set of 5 tea bags), Candlefolk Sea Salt & Orchid or Similar, Sea Loofah Soap, and Deluxe Gift Wrapping.Deluxe Gift Wrapping.

name: Eyob Pencil Case
description: Crafted from one single piece of full grain Ethiopian leather, the Eyob Pencil Case is perfect for more than just your writing tools and offers you the perfect travel companion for your charger cords, earbuds, and personal items.

name: EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Video Two Lens Kit
description: Compact and capable, the Canon EOS Rebel T7 is a sleek entry-level DSLR featuring versatile imaging capabilities and a helpful feature set. Incorporating a 24.1MP APS-C CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4+ image processor, the T7 produces high-resolution stills with notable clarity, reduced noise, and a flexible native sensitivity range from ISO 100-6400 for working in a variety of lighting conditions.

name: Black Cake
description:
We can't choose what we inherit. But can we choose who we become?
In present-day California, Eleanor Bennett's death leaves behind a puzzling inheritance for her two children, Byron and Benny: a black cake, made from a family recipe with a long history, and a voice recording. In her message, Eleanor shares a tumultuous story about a headstrong young swimmer who escapes her island home under suspicion of murder. The heartbreaking tale Eleanor unfolds, the secrets she still holds back, and the mystery of a long-lost child challenge everything the siblings thought they knew about their lineage and themselves. Can Byron and Benny reclaim their once-close relationship, piece together Eleanor's true history, and fulfill her final request to "share the black cake when the time is right"? Will their mother's revelations bring them back together or leave them feeling more lost than ever?

name: Essential Backpack
description: The cotton and leather backpack blends exceptional utility and intelligent design, with plenty of pockets and compartments to keep organized. There is a spacious main compartment with an internal padded laptop sleeve. The comfort of padded shoulder straps makes this backpack great for everyday wear. It has an interior 13" laptop compartment and measures 12.5" W x 5" D x 17" H.

name: Swaddle + Burp Cloth Set
description: Always have these on hand (and in multiple rooms + bags!) for spit ups, wipe downs and in a pinch, a little coverage for baby or Mama. Includes 1 swaddle blanket and 1 burp cloth set (set of two).

name: 3 Month Yum Snack Box
description: You will enjoy 3 boxes over three months, inspired by surprise destinations themed to each month, each with snacks and booklets of their own. Gift includes 3 snack boxes that consist of 5-7 snacks each. One box will deliver as soon as possible, the following two boxes will be delivered once per month.

name: Large Heart Eternity Roses
description: These Heart Box arrangements are perfect for Valentine's Day, and a beautiful way to show that special someone how far your love extends. Includes 36 Eternity Roses. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care.

name: Ceramic Speckled Jewelry Dish
description: Organize your jewelry in style with this ceramic White Gold Speckled Jewelry Dish. This beautiful white trinket tray is the perfect addition to any room in your home. The gold foil details add a touch of chic glam, making it easy to dress up any space!

name: Puffy Blanket Poncho
description: Cozier than a poncho, and more functional than a blanket, this is a wearable performance essential that’s more than the sum of its parts. Its durable, water-resistant construction is outfitted with a drawstring hood and plenty of pockets, so the whole thing seamlessly transitions into the perfect wraparound blanket in the blink of an eye. Toasty polyester fill is wrapped up in an ultra-durable ripstop shell to make a wraparound outdoor garment that you can practically live in. One size fits most, measures 75" L w 46" W.

name: Big Presentation Mega Jewelry Set
description: This set is all about pastel elegance! From a book report presentation to the bff’s birthday party, these extra-sparkly jewels will carry you throughout your day with confidence and class. The original Mega Set features a pink heart pendant necklace and an added bonus of not one, but TWO rings and earring sets! All items come in a yellow gift box or signature packaging. The rings are all size 4 and adjustable (squeeze to tighten or pull apart slightly to loosen). Small parts, not intended for children under 3 years.

name: Propolis + Vitamin C Lioposomal
description: Supercharge your immune support with a liposomal formula delivering 100mg of propolis and 1,000mg of Vitamin C. Liposomal delivery system offers optimal absorption & maximizes usability and bio-availability. Propolis supports your immune system with antioxidants, zinc, iron, B vitamins, and over 300 other beneficial compounds. Naturally contains flavonoids and polyphenols that fight free radicals and combat oxidative stress. Vitamin C provides extra defense for a healthy immune system and is known to support muscle recovery and healthy collagen levels for glowing skin. Includes twelve, 0.27 fl oz packets.

name: Signum Swan
description: This large decoration piece is inspired by the new Swarovski Swan logo. Designed by Martin Zendron, it is crafted purely from clear crystal with 349 facets, with the Swan's head and neck shaped to form an elegant 'S' for Swarovski. Looking towards the future, with its wings lifted and ready for take-off, this impressive design celebrates the brand's unique craftsmanship and heritage in a modern and sophisticated way. Measures 5.125" H x 3.75" W x 3.75" L.

name: Recovery Treatment Oil
description: This botanical oil treatment absorbs quickly to nourish skin and help improve appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The evening primrose, argan and jojoba oils help boost hydration, while grapeseed and rosehip oils deliver vitamins C and E to help improve skin tone, and geranium and borage oils help balance skin. It's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, with natural fragrance and color.

name: Men's Tri-Block Marl Ankle Sock 6-Pack
description: This tri-blocked ankle sock is architectural in design and pure Bombas in comfort, with high-quality soft cotton yarn-work. As always, 6 Purchased = 6 Donated.

name: 12 Pack
description: The world's first low-carb, high-protein, and 100% plant-based instant ramen. Choice of flavor.

name: Natural Premium Bamboo Fitted Queen Sheet
description: A fitted bed sheet made of 100% premium quality viscose from bamboo. Sustainable, breathable, and oh so silky-soft. Includes one queen sized fitted sheet.

name: Era Candle Collection
description: Illuminate every new chapter in life with the Era Candle collection. Step into your era with labels for mom, auntie, engaged, and teacher. Inspired by life's different times, these candles will celebrate the era you're currently (or about to be) in. Each candle choice has scent notes of jasmine, rosemary, sea salt, and honey will help capture these moments. Burn time is about 40 hours.

name: Secure Holder with Cable, Lock & Protect Keychain for Apple AirTag
description: Track your belongings with ultimate confidence. Belkin's Secure Holder with Wire Cable for AirTag features an innovative allen key locking system with a durable braided wire cable so you can securely attach your AirTag onto your belongings without fear of it getting detached.

name: Rubber Soul by The Beatles
description: Rubber Soul is the sixth studio album by the English rock band the Beatles. It was released on 3 December 1965 in the United Kingdom on EMI's Parlophone label, accompanied by the non-album double A-side single "Day Tripper" / "We Can Work It Out".

name: Positano Lemon Earrings
description: The essence of Italy, bursting with fresh citrus and fragrant life-like blooms, is embodied in these sweet, delicate, hand embroidered drop earrings. 14k gold plated brass.

name: Variety Pack
description: The TRUFF Variety Pack. A beautiful assortment of their three classic flavors, The Original, HOTTER and White TRUFF Hot Sauce.

name: City Bonfire Candle
description: This City Bonfire candle is a portable fire pit, handmade with nontoxic materials. The portable, compact design makes it easy to take on all your outdoor adventures. Bring your own bonfire wherever you roam. Safe to roast marshmallows with FDA food grade soy wax. It's easy to light and extinguish, with 3 to 5 hours of burn time. It measures 4 in x 2 in, and is made for outdoor use only.

name: The Belt Bag
description: This all-purpose crossbody is made from recycled polyester and features an adjustable strap, two small interior pockets, one large interior pocket, and an exterior pocket at the back. Measures 8”x4.5”x1.5”.

name: Baby Led Weaning Silicone Spoon Set
description: Perfect for the transition into solid feeding, these stage 1 spoons are great for beginner chewers and work amazingly for dipping in purees! UpwardBaby baby spoons use the purest of material to ensure your baby’s safety. Completely food safe, BPA free, Phthalate free, Lead Free and completely non-toxic you can trust UpwardBaby spoons to give you that extra peace of mind!

name: UNICEF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to UNICEF USA helps ensure the world’s most vulnerable children get the nutrition, water, protection, education and health care they need to survive and thrive.

name: Mini Cup + Straw Training System
description: Learning to drink from a straw is an important developmental milestone that develops lip rounding and promotes speech development. The ezpz Mini Cup + Straw Training System teaches toddlers to drink from an open cup and safely learn to use a straw. Made out of 100% Silicone that is BPA, BPS, PVS, plthalate and latex free. Holds 4 oz.

name: Overvest
description: Designed for versatility, the Overvest seamlessly transitions from Fall through to Spring, and from the sofa to the store. Made with a lightweight recycled nylon in a rich olive color, with a subtle shine, and a silky buttery texture to touch. Sleeveless for extra mobility, whilst retaining your body's core heat where it matters, it also has an adjustable bungee waist for styling and comfort. It's water resistant to keep you dry in unexpected light showers, one size fits all and gender neutral.

name: Double Wall Espresso Glasses, Set of 2
description: This set of double wall glass espresso mugs will keep liquid hot or cold for a longer period of time while the outer glass cup remains safe to touch. Shatter resistant, made from borosilicate glass, and hold 2 ounces each. Dishwasher, microwave, freezer, and oven safe up to 330 degrees. Includes a set of 2.

name: Australian Single Sheepskin Rug
description: These authentic 100% sheepskin rugs use the highest quality sheep's wool for superior softness and density, and are ethically sourced from Australia and New Zealand. Layered over a chair or styled beside your bed, this rug instantly adds a cozy chic factor. Includes one rug measuring 2' x 3', since this is a natural hide, minor size variations can occur.

name: Monogrammed Leather Passport Cover
description: Travel in style with this personalized leather passport cover. This sleek travel companion is made of high quality full-grain genuine leather and includes your choice of monogram inscription and leather color. Measures 8" x 5.75". Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted, 8 character limit.

name: NexStar 6 SE Schmidt-Cassegrain Computerized Telescope
description: Celestron’s iconic “orange tube” design is updated with all the latest features to provide the best stargazing experience for beginners and experienced observers alike. 6-inch aperture with excellent light-gathering ability provides impressive views of the Moon and planets, along with deep sky objects like the Orion Nebula, while retaining a compact form factor. Fully automated GoTo mount with database of 40,000+ celestial objects automatically locates and tracks objects for you. SkyAlign technology gets your telescope aligned and ready to observe in minutes. Unique single fork arm design and sturdy steel tripod all break down into separate components for easy transport and quick assembly.

name: Art Print
description: This series of art prints designed by Kheprisa Burrell are perfect for decorating your home, or as a gift to a friend. Includes 1 print, measures 11 x 14 in.

name: Cordless Glass Electric Kettle
description: Bring form, function and safety to your kitchen with the elegantly designed Brentwood glass electric kettle. With 1.7-liter water capacity and 1100-watt of power, this electric kettle is faster and more efficiently than a microwave. This kettle is constructed from durable and stain resistant borosilicate glass and BPA free Polypropylene (PP) plastic (Lid). Features include a concealed water heating element and a one touch flip-up lid and a washable spout filter for convenience. For safety purposes, this kettle is equipped with automatic shut-off, boil-dry protection, secure locking lid, cool-touch buttons and ergonomic stay-cool handle. For added convenience the kettle can be removed completely from the detachable base, after boiling, for cord free use.

name: Hella Awkward Card Game
description: The perfect addition to date night or game night with friends, 140 questions across 4 categories to spark deeper and more meaningful conversations. Four exciting categories on relationships, dating, sex, and real talk that will have you laughing or in your feels crying. Try this fun way to strengthen your relationships and talk about what matters most. For 2-6 players, suggested for ages 18+.

name: Filament Lamp Kit
description: This Filament Lamp Kit is the first of its kind, an innovative way to create your own lamp and lighting designs from home using only your imagination and that magical material we all know and love, air dry clay. This kit includes everything you need to create the lamp of your dreams and more. The centerpiece is the dimmable amber spiral filament bulb with its vintage Edison feel and soothing warm glow. The perfect tone setter for any design-focused room. The bulb screws into the socket which connects directly to the wall via a dimmer switch, all provided in the kit.

name: NFL Hoodie
description: Designed to take you from the first tailgate to the last touchdown, all season long. The softest hoodie you'll ever wear while proudly repping your city, your team. Unisex, relaxed fit.

name: Steel Pizza Wheel
description: Make pizza night even better with the OXO Steel Pizza Wheel. It has a large 4in stainless steel blade that effortlessly zooms through thin crusts or thick pan pizza piled high with toppings. The sleek handle makes slicing extra-easy, too: It has the strength of stainless steel, with lots of leverage, plus the comfort of a soft grip, so you can slice up a pie with minimal effort.

name: Reed Diffuser
description: Onyi Read Diffusers bring the luxurious aroma of Onyi signature fragrances to every corner of your home. The life of the reed diffuser is about 6-8 months so you can enjoy for months to come. The reed sticks are an all-natural wood/bamboo combination.

name: 12 Months Alo Moves
description: Unlock wellness wherever you are with Alo Moves. Find what moves you with instant access to thousands of classes from top trainers, including styles like yoga, Pilates, barre, strength, HIIT, walking, meditations, self-care, and more. Improve your sleep, boost your energy, and feel more productive during your day when you include Alo Moves in your routine.

name: Men's Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: Soft, smooth, and so effortless. Your everyday shirt. Considered one of the highest quality cottons in the world, Peruvian Pima cotton has an ultra-soft, luxe hand feel and pills less thanks to its long fibers. As always one purchased = one donated.

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Cleaning System
description: Reduce, refill and reuse with this 100% plant, mineral, water-based cleaning concentrate and stainless steel bottles. One bottle of the multi-purpose cleaning concentrate makes 16 surface sprays, hands soaps, or baby bottle soaps. A gentle yet effective solution for your family that's microbiome friendly, sustainable, and safe for baby's developing body and brain. Includes 16 oz of cleaning concentrate, a 12 oz reusable stainless steel bottle for foaming hand soap, a 16 oz stainless steel bottle for foaming baby dish soap, a 16 oz stainless steel bottle for surface spray, and 3 reusable Swedish dish cloths.

name: Make Your Own Playdough Mix: 3 Pack
description: Easy step by step instructions and three boxes of dry mix to whip up three organic batches of fresh play dough at home.

name: Standup Snack Bag 2 Pack
description: Rezip made this size with a mission to replace as many single-serving snack packs as possible. Now, you can snack freely without all of that waste. Small yet mighty, with a wide base and a tidy profile, the Standup 1-cup holds the ideal number of bites. Like all genuine (re)zips, they are 100% food safe PEVA, so they’re sturdy, airtight, and leakproof, keeping contents and your tote bag safe and dry. P.S. Your dog asked us to mention they are good for dog treats.

name: Ivy CLIQ+2 Instant Film Camera
description: The pocket-sized IVY CLIQ+2 Instant Camera Printer from Canon is a fun and easy-to-use instant camera printer you can take with you when you are on-the-go. Available here in rose gold, the IVY CLIQ+2 lets you instantly shoot and print 2 x 3" photo stickers, which you can then place almost anywhere thanks to their peel-and-stick backing.

name: Players Double Canopy Umbrella
description: This umbrella will have you fully covered! The Players Double Canopy Umbrella features a sleek, black/white design and a durable double canopy with 68” of coverage.

name: A Gift for A Great Employee
description: Select a gift of your choice from our entire catalog!

name: Stainless Steel Wine Glass Set of 2
description: This 8oz stainless steel wine 'glass' looks and feels like sipping from an actual wine glass. The svelte shape is elegant and easy to hold, and the double-walled material is lightweight but shatterproof.  And the thin 1mm rim is like fine crystal for the best wine drinking experience. Includes 2 glasses.

name: Tot Splash & Store Bath Tub
description: They created the OXO Tot Splash & Store Bathtub to grow with little ones from birth through 18 months. The built-in support post keeps babies safely in place, no matter their age or stage. The quick-release, dual-sided drain is easy for grown-ups to access, even with baby in the Tub. The tub collapses flat for compact storage; the 360° swiveling hook hangs from shower heads or rods for quick drying.

name: Botanical Collection Flower Bouquet, LEGO® Icons
description: Create a beautiful bouquet from LEGO® pieces for a stunning display that never withers. Each detail of the bouquet is made from LEGO components, all customizable to create a unique display. Most of the flowers have petals that are positionable so you can have fun designing different arrangements. Take the stems apart and recombine to adjust the height and shape of your flowers. Part of the LEGO Botanical Collection for adults, this set includes several elements made from a plant-based plastic, produced using sustainably sourced sugarcane. Includes 756 pieces.

name: Porter Lite Golf Hat
description: The Sunday Golf Porter Lite hat takes performance golf hats to a new level. This premium performance golf hat is made with nylon sweat-wicking, breathable material. The perforated design will help you keep your cool on even the toughest of lies. With a built in ball mark and holder, you're always ready for golf. One size fits all.

name: EasyPress Mini
description: Unusual objects and improbable projects are no longer a challenge! With its thoughtful, compact design, Cricut EasyPress Mini makes wow-worthy heat-transfer results possible for even your most uniquely shaped objects and projects. Curve with contours, get between buttons, and squeeze into seams, transfer onto shoes, stuffed animals, and more.

name: Miramar Leather Backpack
description: If you need a bag for everyday use, the sleek and chic leather Miramar pulls double duty for a stylish and super-durable backpack you can carry over your shoulder to the office, gym, or shopping. Adjust the shoulder straps for style and comfort, or hook the handle over your arm to carry as a tote. Measures 12" x 3" x 15". Choice of color.

name: Cheese Knife Set
description: Charcuterie with the best of ‘em. These simple, yet elevated, cheese knives will make your next board un-brie-lievable. Includes a sharp cheese knife and a cheese spreader. Cheese knife measures 9.25" and spreader 6". Dishwasher safe.

name: Wanderer Double Hammock
description: Perfect for anywhere you may venture, be it backpacking through the deep woods, a lazy afternoon at the local park, or a sunny day at the beach. With triple-stitched seams and included ropes for hanging, the Wanderer Hammock is ready to hang. Measures 114" x 71" and weighs 24.6 oz. Recipient's choice of color.

name: Quilted Baby Blanket
description: This quilted muslin blanket is the coziest! Perfect for a stroller, cozying up on the couch, and as a toddler blanket for bed. Get for baby and use for years! Lewis designs their products to look great in any room of your home, including your nursery, and to withstand everyday use, bridging the often overlooked space between useful and beautiful.

name: Votive Candle
description: Experience MALIN+GOETZ's dynamic fragrances for the home, inspired by traditional apothecary ingredients and favorite memories. Hand poured in Brooklyn and made with high-quality perfume oils and a vegetable wax blend, each candle has a clean, slow burn that fills any space with an intense and lasting scent. After the wax has been burned through, the glass can be upcycled as a decorative container. Please note there is one 2.35 oz votive candle included. Candle has a 25 hour burn time.

name: Make-A-Wish Donation
description: The gift of giving! For every wish we’re able to grant, there’s another child with a critical illness waiting for theirs.

name: The Essentials Hospital Set
description: This set of essentials includes a cozy nightgown and robe, full-coverage brief, and luxurious cashmere socks to keep you relaxed and comfortable during your stay. Made of rayon from bamboo, the soft and stretchy fabric of the nightgown, robe, and brief is breathable and hypoallergenic, while the cashmere socks will keep your feet warm and toasty. Packaged in a beautiful gift box, this set also makes a thoughtful present for any expecting mother.

name: Starter Kitchen Tool Set
description: Good Grips kitchen tool sets keep you going in a busy kitchen. The Swivel peeler features sharp stainless steel blades, the can opener features large handles for easy use, and the balloon whisk offers an innovative handle shape. All three are dishwasher safe.

name: By Jing Box
description: Jing’s very best Sichuan flavor essentials come together in the ultimate flavor set, to brighten and embolden anything, anytime. This gift includes the Sichuan Chili Crisp, Sichuan Gold, Chili Crisp Vinaigrette, Zhong Sauce, and Mala Spice Mix.

name: Mara Phone Sling
description: Less is def more. Tote all your essentials hands-free. Lining made using 2 recycled plastic bottles. Measures 7.5" L x 1.5"W x 4.5"H.

name: Small Recycled Everyday Backpack
description: Made from recycled water bottles, the small Recycled Everyday Backpack is a fun and functional must-have for kids on the go. With spacious compartments, utilitarian details, and padded, adjustable straps, it offers plenty of room for all their essentials. Whether it's for school, sports, or a day out, this backpack is designed to keep up with their active lifestyle. Perfect for children kindergarten through 3rd grade. Measures 14.74" x 11.22" x 4.72".

name: Diletto
description: The Diletto Cheese Board features hand selected artisan cheeses, charcuterie options, dried fruits, nuts and crackers sourced from around the world. This board serves 5-6 and arrives chilled, fully arranged and ready-to-serve in a reusable acacia wood board. Each board 39 oz of cheese and condiments total. Includes bamboo serving ware. Nuts arrive individually bagged and placed in each tray. Choice of assortment.

name: 9 x 12" Silicone Baking Mat
description: This elegant, reusable silicone baking mat is an eco-friendly alternative to expensive parchment paper, nonstick spray, and aluminum foil. perfect for cookies, biscuits, rolls, roasting vegetables, frozen foods, and candy-making. Measured for standard quarter sheet baking pans (9x12), and can be cut to fit any custom size. Measures 8.0 in L x 11.5 in W. Dishwasher safe. Includes one mat, choice of color.

name: PowerCore Portable Battery Charger
description: PowerCore III 10K is a slim and powerful portable 10000mAh battery. With two USB-A port PowerIQ outputs for high-speed dual device charging and one USB-C PD input for incredibly fast recharging.

name: Plush Towel 6 Piece Set
description: Featuring 6 high-performance terry towels with a cotton jacquard border and classy, minimalistic design, this Plush Towel Set is soft and quick to dry.
