Make post-shower towel time feel like a deluxe spa retreat. Made of 100% combed, long-stable cotton. The set includes 2 Bath Towels (30” x 60”), 2 Hand Towels (20” x 36”), and 2 Washcloths (13” x 13”). Choice of color

name: BuildOn Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide access to education for a child in a country with high rates of poverty and illiteracy.

name: Kids Umbrella
description: These technicolor umbrellas will keep your mini-minimalist's head dry as their feet stomp through every. single. puddle. Measures 32" across when open. Break it, drop it, lose it, Hipsterkid will replace with a 100% guaranteed year long warranty.

name: Ulu Knife Set
description:
Chopping a salad. Slicing through an oven-fresh pizza. Cutting herbs, bread, sausage, cheese, and vegetables. With this versatile knife based on a traditional Alaskan design, it's all fair game. The rocking motion from the tempered, high-carbon stainless steel blade lets you slice and dice smoothly and quickly on the cupped center cutting board.
The board measures (L)8” x (W)8” x (H)1”, the blade: (L)6".

name: Pestos & Pasta
description: A top pick for pasta lovers this box has it all (and it cooks in only 20 min!). Includes extra virgin olive oil, spaghetti By Pastificio Mancini, artichoke pesto, Genovese pesto sauce and sun-dried tomato and olive tapenade.

name: Global Fund for Women Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps ensure equal opportunity for people of all genders and especially women.

name: Caramel Tube
description: The one-two-punch of rich and creamy confectionery creativity melts in your mouth and pleases the palate. It’s the ideal after-dinner treat. Or before dinner. Or as dinner. Includes one 1 lb tube.

name: Quilted Totebag
description: This puffer tote has a sleek silhouette, finished in a soft and smooth polyester. The top zipper closure keeps contents secure while the interior padded sleeve protects your laptop. Interior slip pockets keeps your phone, key, and wallet organized. Measures 22”W X 15”H X 7”D.

name: Braided knot and Sphere Studs
description: Want to add a bright metallic touch to any look? You'll adore these stud earrings, which feature a braided knot design. These glam studs are made with your choice of 14K gold plated sterling silver or sterling silver.

name: Men's Winter Calf Sock 4-Pack
description: Remember those reindeer socks you got when you were a kid? These are the grown-up version of those. A modern variety of subtle holiday designs, from border stripe to fair isle, you can wear all winter long, with innovative comfort features like Honeycomb Arch Support and Stay-Up Technology. Includes 4 pairs. As always, 4 purchased = 4 donated.

name: Nuuly 1-Month Subscription
description: Choose any 6 items from Nuuly’s shared closet of more than 15,000 styles, over 300 brands, and sizes up to 5X and maternity. Wear them on repeat then send them back, Nuuly takes care of shipping and laundry. Please note: a credit card is required to setup the digital subscription on Nuuly's website.

name: I Am Not Your Negro
description: I Am Not Your Negro is a kaleidoscopic journey through the life and mind of James Baldwin, whose voice speaks even more powerfully today than it did 50 years ago. Paperback.

name: Fujifilm Instax Mini 12 Instant Film Camera
description: As fun as it is to scroll through photos on Instagram, nothing beats having a physical copy of your favorite memories in your hands. The mini 12 has a built-in macro mode and a selfie mirror for the perfect selfie. Compatible with Instax Mini Film, film not included.

name: Original Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: Cold pressed in small batches from a single blend of early harvest Koroneiki olives grown in the Peloponnese region of southern Greece, this EVOO has a high chlorophyll content, making it rich in healthy polyphenols (an anti-inflammatory antioxidant). 375ml.

name: Atomic Habits
description: No matter your goals, Atomic Habits offers a proven framework for improving every day. James Clear, one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, reveals practical strategies that will teach you exactly how to form good habits, break bad ones, and master the tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results. Hardcover edition.

name: Ultra Plush Bath Towel Bundle
description: Treat yourself to that spa-day feeling any day with our plushest, most luxurious towels yet. Made from long-staple Turkish cotton, these towels are extra thick, have superior absorbency, and feel like a cloud to wrap up in. Bundle includes two bath towels, two hand towels, and two washcloths.

name: Wade Diaper Tote
description: Looks like a normal tote. Acts like a diaper bag. The Large Wade is great for parents of newborns who can’t leave the house without bringing everything with them. And bring everything they can with pockets for wipes, bottles, and lovies, and whatever else their new bundle of joy needs. But it’s not just about baby, there’s an exterior phone pocket and interior pouches for mom and dad. And since lack of sleep has no doubt clouded your memory, the Large Wade has not one, but two key leashes to help you remember where you put your keys and your little one’s binky. You’ve got this!

name: Hue Colored Stemless Wine Glasses, Set of 6
description: The moment you drink from these big 15oz decorative wine glasses expect to instantly feel the mood brighten! This 1/8” thick BPA Free, lead free glassware is tough enough to toast a sangria, gin and tonic, cabernet, pinot noir, chardonnay, or even iced coffee or tea, without breaking. Includes a set of six each holding 15 oz.

name: Pretzel Dip Duo
description: Pretzels.com spent months in the kitchen perfecting these recipes and they're finally sharing them with you. Creamy and smooth texture, with a sweet and tangy taste that is sure to satisfy your taste buds.

name: The Comb No. 001
description: Handmade in Switzerland from plant-based cellulose for wet or dry strands and all hair types. With widely spaced teeth and rounded tips to gently work through tangles without causing breakage, use it for detangling, styling, and giving yourself a light scalp massage. Increase circulation to nourish your roots and promote growth in the meantime. Measures 3.6in x 2.4in.

name: All-Season Down Full/Queen Comforter
description: However you sleep, Brooklinen has a comforter (new and improved) to match your needs. Snuggle up to varied levels of warmth and construction, each tucked within Brooklinen's ultra-soft, 100% long staple cotton shell. This all-season comforter will keep you comfortable year round. Made for full or queen sized beds and measures 90” x 90”. Includes one down comforter.

name: Graza Drizzle and Sizzle EVOO, 4 Pack
description: The Drizzle is Extra Virgin finishing oil made from olives that are picked early, when flavor is bold and antioxidants are highest. 500ml made for eating, never heating. The Sizzle is Extra Virgin cooking oil made from mature, mid-season olives that yield a more mellow flavor. 750ml to use every day, in every way. Includes 4 bottles.

name: The Japanese Art of the Cocktail
description: By Masahiro Urushido and Michael Anstendig. The first cocktail book from the award-winning mixologist Masahiro Urushido of Katana Kitten in New York City, on the craft of Japanese cocktail making. Harcover.

name: Ui Artist Collection
description: Indulge in the artistic allure of the Artist Collection. Each handcrafted mug showcases a mesmerizing range of colors, elevating your daily hot beverage into a delightful sensory experience. Retaining the signature self-heating system of the Ui Mug the Artist Collection ensures your drink remains at the perfect temperature, enhancing flavor and pleasure with each sip. It doubles as a wireless charging pad for your cell phone, blending elegance, practicality, and convenience seamlessly.

name: Extra Large Popcorn Bag
description: This tall, re-sealable 19oz bag of popcorn and pretzel mixes is a beloved Funky Chunky favorite, making a great hostess or business gift. Each bag contains nineteen gourmet popcorn confection servings.

name: Glass Water Pitcher with Lid
description: While some 1/2 gallon jugs are only good at holding cold things, this 50oz glass jug holds all things luke warm, fridge-cold, freezer chilled and boiling hot. And not only that, it's a pitcher with filter in a comes with a dual-purpose lid that lets you pour fast from one side, or filter out fruity bits on the other! It measures 10.2” tall, and 6.3” wide and includes a stainless steel lid.

name: Carre Whiskey Glasses, Set of 2
description: This glass set comes with a 2 pack of top quality 10-ounce whiskey glasses. Dishwasher safe.

name: Cordless Glass Electric Kettle
description: Elegant and durable, the OXO Brew Cordless Electric Kettle boils water faster than the microwave and safer than the stovetop. Features include auto shut-off, stay-cool handle, easy-to-read measurement markings and a soft-open lid. The Kettle heats on a 360° swivel base, is cord-free when removed from the base and has an insulated bottom for easy transport. 1.75 L.

name: The Body Wash, Eucalyptus
description: The Body Wash is a daily oil-in-gel cleanse for skin. Infused with facial-grade Cacay-, Marula- and Meadowfoam oils rich in Vitamin A/C/E + Omega 6/9 and Niacinamide, The Body Wash is made to nourish, soften and balance skin. Gentle Plant Surfactants provide a luxe, soft lather. No SLS / SLES. No Silicones. No Phthalates. No Parabens. No PEGs. Non-stripping. Non-drying. Formula is tested on all skin types and tones. Refillable bottle made from 100% Eco-Material (Bio-Resin). Contains 8.4 fl oz.

name: Merino Fleece Shirt Jacket
description: It’s a shirt, it’s a jacket, it’s your closet essential. Designed with premium Italian fleece and naturally moisture-wicking merino wool, this comfortable Merino Fleece Shirt Jacket is the perfect layer to throw on in any setting.

name: Nodpod BODY®
description: All the benefits of a weighted blanket in a pod. Nodpod BODY's unique design allows for a cooler body contouring experience. Enjoy the benefits of a weighted blanket in a portable, machine washable pod. Measures 25" x 30" and weighs 6.5 lbs.

name: Rumpl Original Puffy Blanket
description: The weatherproof, all-season blanket that keeps you cozy anywhere you go and folds into a 7 x 16" sack for easy transport. Made of 100% post-consumer recycled polyester shell and insulation with a DWR finish for stain and water resistance. Measures 52 x 75" flat and 7 x 16" packed. Water-resistant stuff sack included. Choice of color.

name: Opaque Ripple Cup Set of 2
description: These signature Ripple Cups now offered in a set of two, opaque borosilicate glasses. Perfect for a glass of wine, spirits, cocktails, table water, or any other drink of your preference. Each cup holds 6oz and measures 3.5"H x 2.5"W. Heat and cold resistant, dishwasher safe. Includes 2 cups, choice of color.

name: Sampler Vegan & Gluten Free Snack Box
description: This box includes a collection of 10 individually wrapped healthy vegan and gluten-free approved snacks. It includes 1 Bunny James Foods Carrot Fries, 1 Kapop Ancient Grain Popped Chips, 1 Beanfields Grain Free Cracklins, 1 BEAR Real Fruit YoYos, 1 Eden Gourmet Roasted Pumpkin Seeds, 1 Blakes Strawberry Rice Crispy Treat, 1 Rule Breaker Blondie Cookie,1 Symmetree BAR, 1 IQ Brain Fuel Bar, 1 Jana Banana Green Banana Bar.

name: Organic Core Sheet Set, Queen
description: Meet the freshly-squeezed collection of GOTS-certified organic cotton that’s safe for your world. In 100% long-staple organic percale, it's breathable, crisp, lightweight, and relaxed (thanks to garment washing!). Go organic already—it’s the next level of comfort. Includes 1​ flat sheet, 1 fitted sheet, and 2 pillowcases in Queen sizes. Choice of set color.

name: Petite Hatbox Bouquet Baby Bundle
description: Celebrate the arrival of a new baby boy with this petite Blossom Bouquet gift box. This special gift is filled with essential items for the new baby. It includes 1 bodysuit, 1 burp cloth, 1 bib, 3 washcloths, and 3 pairs of socks.

name: Body Wash
description: The gentle foam feels silky on the skin and the essential oils infuse your skin with a gentle and invigorating scent. Each body wash comes in a 8.5oz post-consumer recycled PET bottle.

name: Ornata V3 Full-Size Wired Mecha-Membrane Gaming Keyboard with Chroma RGB Backlighting
description: Meet the Razer Ornata V3, a low-profile ergonomic gaming keyboard powered by Razer Chroma RGB. Sporting a new ultra-slim form factor, more durable keycaps, and unique mecha-membrane switches, enhance your work and play with a hybrid keyboard that combines the best of both worlds.

name: 20-Piece Holiday Bundle
description: Made out of Tritan™ Copolyester, a shatterproof, ultra-durable, and dishwasher-safe material, these 'glasses' will allow you to go anywhere & do anything in good taste. All are crystal clear and feel just like a glass with superb weight. BPA-free. The bundle includes 8 Stemless Martini Glasses, 8 Stemless Wine Glasses, 2 Limited Edition Cocktail Shakers, and 2 Totes.

name: GoPro HERO10 Black
description: Updating their flagship action camera with a 23MP sensor and a new G2 chip design for enhanced functionality, the HERO10 Black from GoPro adds more speed, performance, touch control responsiveness, and higher frame rates, rounding out this full-featured action camera. This newest model provides high-detail 5.3K60, 4K120, and 2.7K240 video and 23MP photos with updated professional settings and practical functions from its predecessor, the HERO9.

name: Java G25 Coffee Grinder
description: Ultra-durable military grade aluminum and stainless-steel materials incorporated in a fastidiously engineered unit purpose built for adventure. The push-release top cap allows quick access to the bean hopper. The grind handle retracts for double duty as a carabiner handle. The grinder knob threads to attach within the catch when not in use. Perhaps most importantly, the conical burr and dual bearings provide the most consistent grind size of any hand-grinder on the market. It’s 50 grind setting ensure you can dial in the right size and consistency to achieve the best cup of coffee anywhere and everywhere.

name: Grove Blue-Light Glasses
description: For those that lean towards a bit more artsy vibe, these compact round eye style have the details you're looking for. Similar in style to the Wynwood, the Grove was named after Coconut Grove, a place that takes its Bahamian influences with a modern family twist.  When you're there, put these on at your favorite coffee shop and stroll on down to Peacock Park.

name: Private Ninja Lesson for Three, Yonkers, NY
description: Learn about mysterious ninja warriors and martial arts in NYC at one of the oldest Bujinkan schools, affiliated with Bujinkan Hombu Dojo in Japan since the 1980's. Learn the history and philosophy of this 900-year-old martial art from an instructor who was awarded the title of Shidoshi, "teacher of the warrior ways". Practice self-defense, heightened awareness and combat strategy methods.

name: The (mini) Air Whisk
description: When it comes to whisking, the secret ingredient is air, and the key is control. This whisk feels substantial yet is light enough to move swiftly, and has a flat-headed shape so it can stand on its own. Measures 8" long, 1.5" wide. Dishwasher Safe.

name: Quirky
description: A contemporary design featuring amber and orange blooms, accented with modern greenery. Includes premium flowers, glass vase, and fresh hand delivery.

name: Black Ceramic Mug
description: Warm your soul with a nice cuppa out of this perfectly sized black ceramic mug. It’s BPA and lead-free, microwave and dishwasher-safe, and made of black durable ceramic. 11

name: Truffle Lovers Pack
description: They've bundled a variety of their umami-rich products into one set! Includes the Signature Black Truffle Hot Sauce, Black Truffle Marinara Pasta Sauce, and Black Truffle Oil encased in a beautiful VIP box.

name: Dry Brush
description: This dry brush is composed of grass tree wood, all natural bristles, and finely wound hemp twine around the handle. The ancient practice of dry brushing improves circulation from head to toe and exfoliates the top layer of skin for a brighter, firmer surface all over. The skin is left invigorated from short, quick strokes of the soft bristles across the entire body, including arms, legs, and torso. Measures 8” long x 3” wide and is 1 ⅛” thick.

name: Heatbag
description: Heatbag is much more than a heating bag, working to relieve stress, muscle and join pain through a smart heat experience which releases heat slowly and focused on the desired spot. Designed for a supersoft comforting feeling, with a recycled memory foam cover lined in a soft jersey fabric. Warm it up and it will become the perfect companion while lounging , freeze it and it will become a safe pain relief.

name: The Connoisseur's Deluxe Set
description: A fine whiskey deserves a fine vessel that opens the banquet. Discover Rock's complete and sophisticated gift sets for a unique tasting experience featuring their iconic round fast cooling non-diluting granite whiskey stones. This is the perfect gift for a whiskey lover looking to elevate their drinking experience. Includes a set of Original Rocks whiskey stones with holder, and your choice of two tasting glasses.

name: Mac Mini Desktop 8GB Memory in Silver
description: Now with M2, Mac mini packs the speed you need. From rich presentations to immersive gaming, M2 flies through work and play. And with a wide array of ports to connect all your favorite peripherals, Mac mini is up for anything.

name: Kitty Hawk
description: You can't go wrong with a classic pair of Aviators. And while you're at it, you may or may not have been in the air if it hadn't been for the Wright Brothers. These are an ode to the birthplace of flight, polarized to reduce glare when you're out there feeling the need for speed.

name: Youth Marl Calf Sock 4-Pack
description: Classic colors, marl weave. Marls get their distinctive look by weaving two different-colored strands of yarn together giving them a texture and depth. Marls feel and perform just like Bombas' other cotton socks, just with a bit more pizzazz, oomph, panache...you get it. Fit most youth ages 5-11 or US kid shoe sizes 9T-3. 4 purchased = 4 donated.

name: Roaster Sample Box
description: Can't make up your mind about which coffee to try? The solution is the Roaster Sample Box! Includes a collection of the teams current favs with four fresh seasonal 4 oz bags of Onyx's single origin offerings. Onyx donates coffee year-round to local food shelters, women's shelters and other needs-based organizations in Northwest Arkansas.

name: 3 Way Toiletry Bag
description: Meet the simple solution to toiletry and makeup organization, with three separate compartments (larger one on top, two smaller ones on bottom) because no one wants their toothbrush and hairbrush in the same place. Also fantastic for organizing pencils, pens, and craft/school supplies. Easy clean inside and out, of course. It measures 10.75" W x 5.5" H x 4" D.

name: 9 Piece Valentine's Chocolate Heart Gift Box
description: A classic Valentine's gift with a modern footprint, featuring an eye-popping red heart on a soft pink background on the cover, and filled with a collection of 9 luxury chocolates inside, adorned in reverse color combination hearts to match the cover. Filled with fresh raspberry and strawberry creamy centers, wrapped in dark chocolate shells, the chocolate bonbons inside are a heavenly chocolate indulgence. This is the perfect luxury Valentine's gift, that says love with elegance. A perfect thank you, I love you, I miss you, I want you, this chocolate gift box says it all.

name: Seed Lollipop 3 Pack
description: A playful take on seed starting! Seed Pops feature seeds embedded in a nutrient-rich clay mixture and are designed to be planted in the ground or a pot. Just unwrap, plant and grow! Once planted, the wooden stick serves as a garden marker. Bury 1/2 of pop into soil. Start indoors or plant outside after the last frost. Water regularly. Do not let pop dry out, and fertilize monthly.

name: Mermaid In Training Goggles
description: Mermaid Dress-Code: Gem-Covered Goggles Required. Have you ever seen swim goggles so cool?! Super Smalls made the Mermaid in Training Goggles so you wouldn’t have to sacrifice serious style for serious swim practice. With a Super seal that really works and an adjustable-strap for growing kids, you’ll be diving like a mermaid in no time. Small parts, not intended for children under 3 years.

name: Shenandoah
description:
The Shenandoah is a rectangular frame with a slight wrap to stop any rays from sneaking in. With polarized lens, 
recycled plastic frames and multiple different color ways, these frames are for anybody looking for a wrapped sunglass without sacrificing a bit of grace.

name: Set of 3 Pickleballs
description: Pickleballs are a must-have for your next game. Recess Pickleballs have a strong, durable, and smooth surface that provides for a great bounce. Includes 3 balls, 9” x 3” x 3”.

name: Switch with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con
description: The Nintendo Switch system is designed to go wherever you do, instantly transforming from a home console you play on TV to a portable system you can play anywhere. So you get more time to play the games you love, however you like.

name: Seek and Hide
description: Seek and Hide: The Tangled History of the Right to Privacy is a nonfiction book by Amy Gajda, a Tulane University Law School professor. Published by Viking Press in 2022, Seek and Hide examines how the right to privacy has been viewed by the law and the public from the founding of the United States. Hardcover.

name: WWF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the World Wildlife Fund helps protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature.

name: Original Deano Tote Bag
description: The tote bag that started it all, Scout's original design that remains their #1 best-seller year after year for a reason! This versatile open-top tote is ideal for carrying pretty much everything (work stuff, beach/pool stuff, sports stuff). It measures 19" W x 15" H x 10" D.

name: Bright Side Seed Balls
description: Bright Side Seed Balls celebrate planting joy with decadent seed ball “truffles”! Simply plant, water and grow. Includes 5 seed balls comprised of non-GMO seeds, clay and worm castings.

name: Uwraps Weights, 3lb
description: These vegan leather Ubarre Uwraps can be used as ankle weights or wrist weights. With an ergonomic shape designed for comfort and utility, it's a chic and delicious body loving workout tool. Whether you are adding to your yoga practice, using on ankles or wrists on your run, or rocking as though they were your new favorite anklet and bracelet the UWRAPS will help to bring more movement and health to your day. Includes two Uwraps.

name: TRX 13" Rocker
description: Move aside, foam rollers—the foam rocker encourages more targeted back-and-forth motion over tight areas to achieve muscle release (and relief) like never before.

name: Branded Stagg Pour-Over Kettle
description: Wake up to the perfect cup of joe. Stagg Pour-Over Kettle's beautifully functional design kicks your brewing up a notch. Enjoy an intuitive, steady pour with Stagg's precision pour spout. Keep track of temperature with a built in brew-range thermometer.

name: Red-iculously Awesome Box
description: A box to show how Red-iculously awesome you are with this curation of all-things red. This box includes Original Cheez-It, Red Notebook & Pen, Red Hots, Kit Kat Chocolate Bar, and Nacho Cheese Doritos.

name: Posy Choker
description: Upcycled pearls paired with golden tube beads with a handmade daisy heart millefiori charm. Made with gold plated beads, chain length measures 17". Choice of color. Each choker is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship.

name: Hair Clip Trio
description: Pull back your hair and perk up your look with these pastel matte claw hair clips.

name: Better With Friends Tote
description: The ideal carry-all for pickleball paddles, pickleballs, and courtside snacks. Hang it near the front door for the next impromptu game with your pals.

name: Crystal Ice Tray
description: Take your cocktail game to the next level with an ice cube tray that creates Ice that will melt slowly and chill your drink to perfection. Select your choice of four 2.25” ice cubes that resemble brilliant cut crystals, or four over-sized ice spheres, inspired by the Art Nouveau movement.

name: Youth Gripper Slipper
description: Now made with a thicker footbed for extra cushioning, these Gripper Slippers have an ultra-warm brushed lining, special grips on the outside designed to help prevent slips, plus a separate travel bag that makes packing a breeze. You may never want to wear real shoes again. While these grippers are pretty good at helping prevent slips, they’re not magic. So be careful, and practice good coordination out there. 1 purchased = 1 donated.

name: Black Girls Code Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation creates new opportunities for girls and gender nonconforming youth of color to have a daring impact on tech. When they succeed, we all succeed.

name: Red Heel Squeaky Dog Shoe Toy
description: Every pup knows there’s no dog toy more enticing than a couture shoe. That’s why Bonne et Filou created their own version, as a dog chew toy! The crème de la crème of French footwear now available as squeaky dog toys made especially for your best fur-friend. Best for small dogs, this toy measures 8" x 5.5".

name: Bath Kit
description: These Bath Kits are designed to restore the body as well as the mind. An ideal gift for yourself or a loved one, the set comes with Body Wash, Restorative Oils, and Candle tucked inside in a gift box featuring an original, hand- watercolored print.

name: The Cherie Money Tree
description: Native to central and South America, the Money Tree 'Guiana Chestnut' is an enchanting and unique houseplant that is believed to bring good luck and prosperity to its owners. The Cherie comes in a ceramic 6.5" x 5" x 5" planter.

name: Graduation Piñatagram
description: Happy Graduation! Filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: The Light Phone II
description: This the phone you use to detach, and free yourself from digital distractions. With only a few operation highlights such as directions, music, text, and alarms, this phone is about simplifying communicating, and your life. It includes the essentials like a headphone jack, Bluetooth, and hotspot capability, while the electronic paper screen does not emit any blue light. The Light Phone II ships as an unlocked 4GLTE cell phone, and like all phones, it does require an active and compatible SIM card to operate.

name: States and Countries Candle
description: Be transported to a place you love with natural soy wax blend scented candles and fragrance oils from Homesick. Find a candle that smells like home to you.

name: Women's Solids Ankle Socks
description: Keep it simple with classic colors of the most comfortable socks in the history of feet. Easy everyday socks that are the unsung heroes of your sock drawer. One purchased = one donated.

name: Dark Dots LED Light Covers
description: Cover up those pesky LEDs that are always glaring away just when you're trying to hit the hay. Sheet of ten sticker dots.

name: Branded Afternoon Zip Hoodie
description: The Marine Layer Afternoon Hoodie is lightweight, durable, and absurdly soft. Basically the definition of afternoon delight. Features your brand logo embroidered on the front chest.

name: The Runner Camera Backpack
description: The Runner uses dividers to configure your camera setup making it the perfect companion for photoshoots and everyday use. Featuring premium details to make photoshoots a breeze including a top compartment to hold an extra set of clothes, a laptop sleeve that holds up to a 16" Macbook, a quick access pocket on the side so you never miss a shot, a passport pocket, a luggage-passthrough to comfortably fit on your suitcase, and a hidden pocket to keep valuables safe. The Runner measures 17" x 11" x 5.5" and is made of 600D Polyester.

name: Clean Skin Duo
description: Clean up from tip to toe with ingredients and packaging you can feel good about. Buy your bottles once and refill them forever with refill powder packs. This bundle includes the Body Wash Starter Set with one 18 fl oz. Forever Bottle and 3 x 2.3 oz. Powder Refills (Variety Pack of 3 scents), as well as the Facial Cleanser Starter Set with one 8 fl oz. Forever Bottle and 0.6 oz. Powder Refill.

name: Therabody SmartGoggles
description: The only eye mask powered by SmartSense Technology, Therabody's exclusive biometric sensor customizes treatments to lower your heart rate to a more relaxed state. Slip them on to soothe headaches, relieve eye strain, and invite calmness into the body and mind. Whether you stare at a screen all day, suffer from headaches or anxiety, or struggle to fall asleep, SmartGoggles keep you moving throughout the day and help you rest at night.

name: Girls, Inc Donation
description: You have the power to help a girl grow up strong, smart, and bold. She is a leader and ready to succeed. Your investment will help equip her to create positive change in her life and in the world around her.

name: European Linen Blackout Curtain
description: These linen curtains are woven from 100% European linen with a blackout liner so that you can get the best of refined looks and premium light blocking. This linen is made from 100% European flax, which is more sustainable and less resource-intensive to grow. Measures 48" W x 84" L.

name: Classic Kit, Brown
description: All the essentials, three of LoveSeen's most popular lash styles, guaranteed to give you eye-opening curl and fluttery length. This kit was designed for anyone who has (or wishes they had) naturally darker lashes. Kit Includes: LUCA Brown, IRIS Brown, JACK Brown/Black. Lash glue not included.

name: Face Mask
description: Revitalize your face with one of these three gentle exfoliating mud masks. Whether Smoothing, Brightening, or Clarifying, there is no wrong choice. Includes one face mask holding 1.7 oz, choice of mask type.

name: The Cozy Duo
description: Meant for two, The Cozy Duo combines the soothing scent of Terracotta Plantable Candle with our luxurious Body Oil. Whether you're enhancing your everyday bathing ritual or setting the scene for a special night, this is the perfect duo to enhance your bath experience. Each duo includes a 2 fl. oz Body Oil (available in Clarifying, Restorative or Firming Formulas) and our Zero-Waste Terracotta Plantable Candle.

name: Maranta Red Prayer Plant
description: The Julianne is a Maranta Red Prayer plant, which is a beautiful, evergreen perennial native to South and Central. This unique plant has a tint of purplish-red on the undersides of the leaves. The plant responds to light, as its leaves are flat during the day to maximize sun intake, and they point upward at night to maintain moisture. Their position at night looks as if they are praying, hence the plant's name. This plant comes in a 4" nursery pot. Planter not included.

name: The Good Bowl (Single)
description: The Good Bowl is an all-in-one mat with bowls that capture your pet’s mess. The mat grips to any flat surface, making it difficult for paws (and toddler hands) to tip over. Comes with the mat plus a removable stainless steel bowl for easy refills and cleaning. 100% Silicone. 16oz bowl.

name: Silicone Reusable Stretch Lids Baking Set
description: Crafted from premium clear-view silicone to keep loaves, brownies, and casseroles airtight, plus, they're oven-safe for baking & reheating. Multiple lid sizes stretch to fit a variety of baking dishes, loaf pans, and casserole dishes, even ones with handles. Freezer-safe, dishwasher safe, BPA free, microwave safe, and oven safe. Includes one 5x9", 8x8", and 9x13" 100% silicone stretch lid.

name: Wildflower: A Memoir
description: Empowering and full of heart, Wildflower is the riveting story of how Aurora James made an indelible mark the American economic system, and a rallying cry for those eager to make change. Hardcover.

name: Bearaby Cotton Napper, 15 lbs
description: A knitted weighted blanket to help you sleep better and feel calmer, naturally. Made of organic cotton and measures 40”x72”.

name: Dark & Puffy Under Eye Cream
description: Leave your eye baggage at home. Meet Geologie's bestselling eye cream, made with kojic acid and caffeine to inhibit melanin production and wake up tired-looking eyes.

name: Box of Loose Leaf Tea
description: Each of these amazing flavors makes 25 to 30 cups. Choose which cultivated blend suits you. Can be enjoyed hot or iced.

name: Sterling Silver Diamond Heart Pendant Necklace
description: This diamond necklace features 2 rows of round diamonds prong set along the edge of this open heart shape crafted of stunning .925 sterling silver, with a matching box chain necklace with a spring ring clasp. The contemporary yet classic 18" box chain complements any neckline beautifully. Both pretty and personal, this romantic diamond heart pendant necklace is sure to radiate romance. This open heart design features 84 rose-cut, promo quality diamonds.

name: House Blend 3-pack, Whole Bean
description: 100% Colombian farm-fresh specialty house blend coffees, roasted to order. 3 x 12oz bags, whole bean.

name: Packin' Heat Makeup Bag
description: Keen on bringing your full beauty routine? Pack all your makeup, hair, or travel accessories in a single place with this very spacious, versatile bag. The interior slip pocket brings order to smaller things, like bobby pins, cotton balls, and hair ties. Roomy enough to fit your regular hairbrush. It measures 9.75" W x 7" H x 3.75" D.

name: Silicone Sun Teether
description: Thanks to this adorable silicone sun teether, Mom is enjoying some much-needed silence from teething tears and even on the cloudiest of days, this feels like a ray of sunshine. If you're looking to still gift a little something for baby, make it an item that is going to give Mama a well-deserved moment of peace & joy too! BPA Free + 100% non-toxic materials.

name: Travel Duffelpack 65L
description: A monster gear hauler, the Travel Dufflepack 65L maximizes your carry capacity without compromising comfort or versatility. Ergonomic padded backpack-style shoulder and waist straps support the heaviest of loads, yet stow instantly beneath magnetically-sealed back panels. Padded grab handles on all sides of the bag give quick carrying options. Integrated expansion zips offer a massive 20L of payload expansion.

name: Classic Harness
description: The Diggs Classic Harness is a premium harness made for comfort and ease of use, and built to withstand tough pullers. With adjustable straps and front and back leash attachment points, the Harness is perfect for a variety of dog sizes and shapes across all life stages.

name: Fire Pit
description: Bring warmth and durability to the heart of your campsite. The Fire Pit is crafted with coated steel in a large open-bowl design that supports heavy logs and high temperatures from lively fires. Its sturdy legs and handles make for simple transportation to and from your favorite location. Whether you’re preparing a slow-cooked cast iron meal, roasting marshmallows over smoky embers, or simply sinking into a warm evening and your favorite cocktail, the Fire Pit’s rugged durability will preserve the moment. Measures 29" x 16" and weighs 21 lbs.

name: Grande Heirloom Claw Clip
description: Elegant Heirloom Claw Clips in a variety of beautiful designs that are made to last a lifetime. Clips have reinforced double-walls, are hand-screwed, and made with Italian Acetate. Measure 2" x 3.75" each.

name: Classic Helmet
description: Make sure your kids have a safe a fun ride with this great range of toddler helmets for boys and girls in classic looks. Designed with a durable ABS hard-shell and lined with a softer inner foam for a comfortable fit. The bike helmet has a dial fit adjustment system in the back which helps to secure a safe and exact fitting for your toddler. Ideal to keep your little one safe on the road. Also ideal as push bike helmet. Measures 50-54 cm. Suggested for children ages 3-7.

name: Gourmet Brownie Sampler
description: The most amazing array of brownies baked with all-natural ingredients. These scrumptious delights are individually wrapped and delivered in a sophisticated gift box. Flavors include 3 Chocolate Truffle, 3 Chocolate Truffle with Walnuts, 3 Marble Cheesecake and 3 Cookies & Cream brownies.

name: Cryo Toning Tool
description: Thermal water technology and a stainless steel ergonomic massaging shape combine the benefits of cryotherapy and lymphatic drainage to contour, lift and detoxify skin for a sculpted, firmer, more radiant appearance. A lymphatic facial massage helps sculpt and contour to lift the jawline and cheekbones, drain excess fluid and toxins to reduce puffiness and breakouts, and firm skin to improve overall skin health and vibrancy. Includes a set of 2, choice of color.

name: Cleansing Facial Brush
description: Alder New York's Cleansing Facial Brush is the ultimate tool for achieving radiant, healthy-looking skin. This innovative brush is designed to gently yet effectively cleanse your face and remove dirt, oil, and other impurities. It’s made with over 1.25 million gentle nylon bristles, not boar or other animal fibers, for a super soft and cruelty-free cleansing experience. Plus, the ergonomic palm grip handle gives you the ultimate pressure control and comfort.

name: Rod and Reel Combo 3000
description: Light tackle re-imagined. These spinning combos combine cutting-edge materials with creative, ergonomic designs and engineering, for the ultimate in fishing performance. Paired with powerful, responsive rods that are built to last with rugged salt-proof components and a revolutionary ergonomic handle that won’t chip, tear, or weather.

name: Premium Down Alternative Pillow, King
description: A hypoallergenic alternative with the support and loft of luxury down. Wake up feeling fully rested. Available in two densities for whatever your best night of sleep requires. Includes one king size pillow.

name: Mini Bath Container Set
description: Keep your bathroom tidy and organized with this mini bath canister set. Perfect for makeup tools cotton balls and more. Each container has a push button lid that creates an airtight seal. Containers are perfectly calibrated to also store foods to keep fresh. Nest with lids for convenient storage. They are dishwasher safe, and includes three 0.6qt containers.

name: Single Mystery Tackle Box Pro
description: These Single Mystery Tackle Boxes are stuffed full of tackle from leaders in the fishing industry, and even feature limited edition baits. Choice of box type.

name: Cloud Cool Mist Humidifier
description: The Cloud Humidifier naturally hydrates your air and looks great while doing it. Coming in a sleek nightstand-friendly shape, this ultrasonic cool mist humidifier improves your skin, sleep, and natural immunity.

name: Cloud Nine
description: This bundle has all the bells and whistles, like face sheets, eye gels, and hand and feet masks, all packed with nourishing strawberry goodness. You can pamper yourself like a true VIP, right in your own home, and come out the other side with glowy, revitalized skin. Formulated with antioxidants Resveratrol (from grapes!), Hyaluronic Acid, and Strawberry Extract to help protect from environmental stressors which can lead to early signs of aging. Includes 2 Rosé Face Masks, 15 Pairs Rosé Eye Gels, 1 Renewing Rosé Finger Mask, 1 Renewing Rosé Toes Mask.

name: Ergonomic Chair
description: Designed in Italy for superior support and endless adaptability, the Ergonomic Chair puts you at the center of work. Its firm lumbar support and contoured upper backrest encourage active, healthy posture while it's industry-leading eight points of adjustment make it easy for anyone to find their perfect fit. Wrapped in a breathable, transparent backrest that keeps you cool throughout the day, it adds a minimalist and modern touch. It has eight points of adjustment for a complete fit: 3D armrests, height, tilt and tilt tension, seat depth and removable lumbar rest. Measures 25"W x 24"D x 38-42"H. Choice of color.

name: Limited Edition 2-pack, Ground
description: Limited edition single-estate coffees for the connoisseur, roasted to order. 2 x 12oz bags, medium grind.

name: Smart Standard Growframe
description: A Full Spectrum Grow Light for Living Green. Light the way to a greener home with Smart Growframe, the vital solution for creating a lush vertical plantscape in sun-deprived spaces. It beautifully frames and thoughtfully nourishes low-to-bright light loving plants. Simply mount, add plants and connect to the Modern Sprout App. Light is delivered daily to keep your plants happy and brighten your home. Produces a natural white light with long lifespan LEDs. It measures at 20.8” x 17” x 5.5”.

name: Large Facet Bowl
description: The Facet Bowl accommodates a variety of needs: a centerpiece display vessel for seasonal happenings, a fruit bowl for the kitchen, a tray to help tidy and style your coffee table, or a dish for loose change and items as you enter and leave your home. With a beveled edge at the bottom, the bowls have a softly floating appearance, complemented by another beveled edge at the top. Measures 12.4" x 5.4" x 1.4".

name: Body Lotion
description: This lightweight yet intensive body lotion helps deliver long-lasting hydration, absorbing quickly and without residue. Recipient selects from the Vitamin B5 and Bergamot with absorbent fatty acids, or Rum with signature dark rum scent. Includes one 8.5 oz bottle.

name: Groov Training Aid
description: Groov is a first-of-its-kind crate training tool that helps pups love their crates. It also comes with a freezer shell so it doubles as a delicious pupsicle. Made of high-quality, food-grade and BPA-free all-natural rubber. Fits with most wire crates, measures 5.9" x 3.9" x 2.93".

name: Champagne Pop
description: A luxurious flower arrangement featuring premium pink blooms, grouped by floral variety in a modern design and accented lightly with greenery. Varietals such as roses, lisianthus, and orchids will be incorporated into this design pending seasonality, freshness, and availability. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Accidentally Wes Anderson
description: Wes Anderson's beloved films announce themselves through a singular aesthetic - one that seems too vivid, unique, and meticulously constructed to possibly be real. Not so - in Accidentally Wes Anderson, Wally Koval collects the world's most Anderson-like sites in all their faded grandeur and pop-pastel colours, telling the story behind each stranger than-fiction-location. Hardcover.

name: Utensil Crock
description: From whisks for rouxs, to tongs for salad-serving, this Utensil Crock fits it all. Made with the same semi-matte ceramic as Year & Day's dinnerware, it delivers style and utility with ease. It has a 6" diameter and is 7" tall.

name: Mother of Pearl Initial Necklace
description: The perfect gift and their best-selling necklace! The small heart charm is engravable to showcase your besties and loved ones. Bracelet has 3mm beads, Heart Disks measure  9mm, 15mm, and the adjustable chain reaches 18"-20".

name: Lacto Pickle Kit
description: The easiest way to make lacto-fermented pickles at home. Your favorite kinds of pickles—from deli-style full sours and half sours, to classic dills and fiery hot pickles—all get their signature snappy crunch and tart pucker not from vinegar, but from fermentation. Specifically lacto-fermentation. This kit includes 1/2 Gallon Glass Fermenting Jar, Glass Fermentation Weight, Lid with Airlock, Kosher Salt, and a Black Tea Bag.

name: Zoe's Ghana Kitchen
description: Zoe's Ghana Kitchen introduces you to dishes, sweet with peanuts and hot with chillies, that have big flavors and are satisfyingly no-nonsense. By Zoe Adjonyoh.

name: Makeda Crossbody
description: Is there such a thing as a perfect crossbody bag? We think so. Handcrafted from Ethiopian goat leather or premium suede, this is one you’ll reach for time and again. And it only gets better with age (just like you).

name: Hanging Camp Lantern
description: Illuminate your outdoor adventures or cozy indoor gatherings with rechargeable LED lighting that blends vintage inspiration with modern tech. Offering five light modes, including a mellow candle mode and a red mode for night vision, this splashproof lantern delivers up to 45 hours of soft, warm light wherever you hang it.

name: Eco Compression Packing Cube Set of 6
description: Say goodbye to messy luggage with this set of Eco Compression Packing Cubes. Crafted in durable, water-resistant twill made from 61 recycled water bottles, this packing cube system features a space-saving compact design so you can pack more and stay organized. Each packing cube can be compressed by up to 60%, so you never have to worry about overpacking again. Set of 6 includes one extra large cube, one large cube, two medium cubes, one small cube, and one extra small cubes.

name: Dozen Branded Cookies
description: La Marguerite & Co. can customize their delicious hand made vanilla flavored cookies. Their custom cookies will make a great addition to any holiday or event.

name: Tushy Toilet Brush
description: Keep your throne immaculate with the only guilt-free toilet brush with single-use, biodegradable Coconut Husk Scrubbing Pads that put the planet first. Who knew something that cleans your toilet could be so sleek, clean and sexy? This includes TUSHY Toilet Brush & Base, and 8 Lemon and Tea Tree Oil-infused Coconut Husk Scrubbing Pads. 8 Lemon and Tea Tree Oil-infused Coconut Husk Scrubbing Pads.

name: Mini Plush
description: Mini plushes support your child's emotional growth and bring learning to life. Each machine washable and stuffed with hypoallergenic fiberfill. Recipient's choice of mini plush animal.

name: A Gift For The Foodie
description: Select a gift of your choice!

name: Rubber Travel Bowl
description: ⁠Designed to make life easier for you & your pet, this collapsible bowl has a clip for easy transporting and is convenient to take with you on walks, road trips, outdoor adventures, or your next vacation. Measures 5" diameter x 2 1/4" tall.

name: Dressing Containers
description: Take your toppings to go. These two reusable, leakproof containers keep dressing and condiments separate until you’re ready to eat, so you can say goodbye to soggy meals. These sleek containers help you cut down on single-use plastic, looking good while they're doing good. Made of lightweight, BPA-free Tritan plastic and protective silicone, Porter Dressing Containers are safe for storing and freezing food, while also Microwave-safe and dishwasher-safe. They each measure  2.25 x 2.375 x 2.75 in.

name: Eye Mask
description: With its total blackout and ergonomic design, it is the best ally of those who need to switch off and rest in absolute comfort.

name: ZZ Plant
description: This naturally shiny leaf plant is a stunner to look at! Also known as the Zanzibar Gem, this deep green plant makes a perfect addition to any space, adding lots of greenery. The ZZ plant leaves store water, making it a hardy, drought-tolerant houseplant that only needs water every few weeks.

name: The Hill We Climb
description: "The Hill We Climb" is a spoken word poem written by American poet Amanda Gorman and recited by her at the inauguration of Joe Biden in Washington, D.C. on January 20, 2021. Hardcover.

name: The All Day Crossback Apron
description: All of the features you know and love from the Essential Apron, but with crossback straps that offer all-day support for your marathon rendering, braising, smoking, and slow-roasting sessions.

name: Slipper Sock
description: Kicking off your shoes and slipping into this super-soft slipper sock is a day-changer.

name: Sparkly Essentials Set
description: This gift set includes the Small Slim Huggie Pair, the Baguette Stud Single, the CZ Cluster Stud Single, and the Gold Connectore Chain measuring 30mm.

name: Washable Cashmere Pointelle Baby Blanket
description: This beautiful blanket with pointelle stitching is not just an indulgent gift, but a practical one as well. This all-natural cashmere has a cloud-like softness, meaning it won’t irritate your little one’s delicate skin. It is lightweight and breathable, so it will keep them warm without the risk of overheating. Due to its natural antibacterial qualities, it requires less frequent washing, and no dry cleaning is required. Made of 100% Grade-A Mongolian cashmere. Measures 30" x 40".

name: World Earrings
description: A set of earrings inspired by the globe, featuring all 7 continents. Take the world with you everywhere you go. Pieces are finished so they are water, sweat and tarnish resistant.

name: European Linen Sheet Set, King
description: These European linen sheets offer year-round luxury and feel as good as they look. Ethically woven from the finest flax, this mid-weight linen sheet set is pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, and only gets softer over time. Includes a king size fitted sheet, a king size flat sheet, and 2 king size pillowcases. Fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 16" deep and has elastic all the way around. Woven from 100% European flax.

name: Rustic Rectangular Wood Tray
description: This large rustic trinket dish is perfect on your countertop or vanity as a jewelry dish, key holder, and more! Add to your rustic, modern, or farmhouse style home to complete your decor. It measures 14" x 4" x 1".

name: Market Tote
description: Big enough to fit a stalk of Brussels sprouts, a full roast chicken, and a dozen apple-cider doughnuts.

name: WWF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the World Wildlife Fund helps protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature.

name: Great Flip
description: The Great Flip is the spatula that brings comfort and happiness into your daily cooking. Extremely durable with an ergonomic design, the head is slotted and offers a slight slope, allowing you to get under those fried eggs with ease. Made of food-grade silicone. Dishwasher-safe, heat resistant up to 550 degrees.

name: Starter Set
description: This set features labels for an easy place to start. Includes 3 Flex Mediums and 3 Flex Small Capsules. The Capsules are magnetic and come with magnetic labels, labeled for Shampoo, Conditioner, Moisturizer, Sun Icon, Pill Icon, and a blank. The Capsules are leakproof, TSA-compliant, dishwasher safe, and BPA-free.

name: Drip 10-Cup Coffee Maker
description: Serve delicious drip coffee with a splash of style. Italian-based SMEG is known for '50s retro-look appliances designed in collaboration with some of the world's top architects. This SMEG drip coffee maker combines iconic midcentury style with convenient features like auto start and aroma control, so you can brew a cup tailored to your taste and schedule.

name: Baby Shower Rice Krispie 12 Pack, Recipient's Choice
description: Baby Shower themed 12 pack of delicious hand-crafted crispy rice and marshmallow treats. All treats are gluten free with the exception of Cookies and Cream. Recipient's choice of color.

name: Scalloped Rim 16oz Tumbler Glass, Set of 4
description: Add a soft touch of color to your drinkware collection with this set of Scalloped Rim Fluted Tumbler Glasses. This stylish tumbler combines a contemporary fluted design with a delightful shade of pink, creating a versatile and charming glass that is perfect for any occasion. The perfect gift for those who appreciate the fusion of elegance and modern design in their glassware. Includes a set of 4.

name: Therapeutic Heated Eye Massager
description: Imagine a gentle caress of warmth enveloping your eyes, melting away the stress and fatigue of the day! With its innovative technology, this Therapeutic Heated Eye Massager brings the spa experience right to your fingertips. Whether you've had a long day at work, a marathon of screen time, or simply need a moment of pampering, this device has got your back. Its compact and portable design allows you to bring the magic wherever you go. Heats up to 104F and can be used for around 60 minutes, with a 3 hour charging time. Measures 8.27" x 3.07" x 1.57".

name: 8.5 x 8.5 Matte Hardcover Photo Book
description: A smooth cover with a soft finish that's great for travel memories, new family member arrivals, and anniversaries. Includes 19-pages that are fully customizable. You will be emailed a gift code to the email that you provide upon acceptance, within 24 hours, with instructions to create your personalized photo book.

name: Reserve Stemless Martini Glass Set, 4 Pack
description: Whether you take yours shaken, stirred, dirty, or neat, this is the glass for you. Combining the classic angles of a traditional martini glass with an upscale diamond cut base, this glass is bound to turn heads at any gathering. Made with Tritan™ Copolyester, a shatterproof, ultra-durable, and dishwasher-safe material, you'll never have to worry about broken glass again. Crystal clear and feels just like glass with a superb hand weight. BPA-free. Made to last and withstand decades of use. Each glass holds 8oz, includes 4 glasses.

name: 10 Piece Truffle Gift Set
description: A 10 piece selection of award winning and best selling chocolate ganache truffles that look like pieces of modern art. A Compartés tradition, handcrafted in Los Angeles, these chocolate ganache bonbon infused truffles feature edible art, patterns and prints. A 10 piece gift box featuring delectably famous and handcrafted chocolate truffles, infused with ingredients from around the world.

name: Great Tongs
description: The Great Tongs consist of silicone that is easy to grip as you flip, and lift. Extremely durable, super study, with high-density tips that make for easy grabbing. BPA and BPS-free, dishwasher-safe, and heat-resistant up to 550 degrees.

name: $50 Daily Harvest Gift Card
description: Stock your freezer with delicious food built on organic fruits + veggies delivered to your doorstep, ready in minutes. Enjoy craveworthy food made with 250+ unique, nutrient-packed ingredients. A Daily Harvest digital gift card will be delivered to you by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout.

name: 4 Pack Savory Pie Bundle
description: A delicious assortment of petite savory dinner pies to sample! Pies are 5 inches in diameter and serve 1 - 2 people. The Savory Pie 4 Pack includes Chicken Pot Pie, Southwestern Taco, Tomato, and Pot Roast Pie.

name: Diamond Halo Cluster Men's Ring
description: This distinguished cluster ring makes a bold fashion statement, rich with contrasting black and white diamond cluster accents. For this sophisticated design, twelve shimmering white diamonds halo seven black, color treated diamonds in an eye-catching circular motif. Exquisite decorative detailing showcases a gorgeous openwork filigree design along the shank for added appeal.

name: Swell Twist Ring
description: A distinctive wave inspired ring, inspired by an ocean swell and its powerful presence. Let the current take you away and go with the flow. A ring designed to keep you inspired and adventurous. The Dome Height is 10mm.

name: Terracotta Succulent Garden
description: The Terracotta Succulent Garden Gift includes five beautiful hand-picked succulents in a large hand-made 8' inch-wide terracotta pot. Each succulent garden is planted 24 hours before delivery in soil and rock.

name: Mini CZ Stud, Single
description: External 14K Gold studs with Internal Brass and Cubic Zirconia detail. Butterfly back closure. Includes a pair of 2 studs. Measures 2mm x 2mm. Choice of color. This is a single earring, not a pair.

name: BlendJet 2, Solid Colors
description: BlendJet 2 is portable, USB-rechargeable, and BPA free. With it make smoothie-bar-quality beverages, silky-smooth protein shakes, top-shelf mixed drinks and creamy frozen lattes, plus milkshakes, slushies, baby food, dips, dressings, sauces and so much more.

name: Heavyweight Wide Turner
description: This versatile tool is designed for precision no matter the task, gently flip an egg without breaking the yolk or smash a burger with full force. Its finely beveled edge effortlessly slides under food to flip, lift, or move ingredients without a hitch. Full-tang, tempered stainless steel is firmly riveted to the acacia wood handle with classic brass rivets. Head measures 5.75" and overall length is 15.75".

name: Brilliant-Cut Diamond Stud Earrings
description: Celebrate any occasion with these classic shimmering diamond stud earrings. Fashioned in .925 sterling silver, each earring showcases a sparkling ¼ carat round, brilliant cut, miracle-set diamond solitaire. The unique miracle-plate setting centers each genuine diamond in a mirror-finish, high-polish frame, giving the illusion of a much larger stone. Dazzling with a bright polished shine, these post earrings secure comfortably with friction posts and butterfly backs. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal), a precious metal that will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come.

name: Renew Lip Oil
description: Get the nourishment of a lip balm and the shine of a lip gloss in one perfect product. These smooth, non-sticky lip oils add a protective layer of luxurious high-shine color, and hydration to your lips to help them look soft, supple, and juicy! Includes one lip oil, choice of color.

name: Self-Inflating Camp Pillow
description: Foam and air combine for a luxury snoozing experience in your favorite tent. This open-cell foam camp pillow self inflates to a 3-inch thickness that provides ample comfort, with a sueded polyester coating up top that feels great with or without a pillowcase. On the bottom you've got an anti-skid texture to keep the pillow from slipping out from under you, and the whole thing packs down compactly for easy storage and transport. Measures 15" x 11" x 3.5".

name: The (mini) reBoard
description: Mini, mighty, multicolored. Same sustainable materials as its larger sibling, in a ~25% smaller package. Dimensions: 13 1/3" long, 8 1/2" wide and 3/8" thick. BPA-free, dishwasher-safe cutting boards uses zero virgin plastic.

name: Percale Pillowcase Set of 2
description: Rest easy with these soft, natural pillowcases. Crafted in Portugal from 100% premium, certified long-staple Egyptian cotton, this percale is lightweight and durable with a crisp finish that only gets better with time. Includes a set of 2 standard/queen sized pillowcases.

name: Youth Super Bowl Tee
description: Super Bowl LVIII is almost here and the San Francisco 49ers and Kansas City Chiefs are meeting for the second time in four years. Gear up for the big game with this super-soft youth tee.

name: Neelum Firewood Carrier Tote
description: A perfect carry-all, this extra-large waxed canvas tote is handsome, versatile, and water-resistant. Use it as a log carrier, car-camping-stuff-hauler, massive grocery bag, and more. Thick, durable cotton straps and sturdy metal hardware make this a bag you’ll use for years. Measures 19.75" x 8" x 15.75".

name: Rolling Pin
description: Made in Hungary by a father/son team, this Rolling Pin is made from 100% solid Beechwood. With its fine grain and closed pores, Beechwood prevents excess moisture absorption, prolonging the life of your Rolling Pin and ensuring recipes come out as intended. It measures 20”x 1.5”.

name: Weston Ribbed Beanie
description: Keep warm with the Weston ribbed foldover beanie. It's 65 grams of 100% pure cashmere in 7-gauge knit, ribbed throughout, with a fold over bottom.

name: Reed Diffuser
description: With a scent that lasts for 3+ months, each reed is infused with essential oils, instantly elevating a space for relaxing days or cozy nights in. Includes one reed diffuser, choice of fragrance.

name: 30G Gift Set, Roe Bites + Crème Fraîche
description: Includes a 30G tin in a custom wooden presentation box, one mother of pearl caviar spoon, 12 bite size potato pancakes and Bellwether Farms crème fraîche for serving plus a key to open.

name: Jones Cashmere Scarf
description: Throw on the lightweight woven Jones Cashmere Scarf to dress up any outfit. 100% pure cashmere with fringe trim detailing, measuring about 70 1/2" x 33 1/2".

name: Minimalist Desk Mat
description: This durable vegan leather desk pad transforms any surface into your office. Protect your tabletop from laptop scratches, heat, ink stains, and more and instantly make your desktop feel more put together. No need for a separate mousepad. It measures 31.5" x 16.75" (80 x 42.5 cm). Includes one desk mat.

name: Clip-on Mini Phone Selfie Ring Light
description: The perfect light for selfie time! Looking for a way to take your selfie to the next level? Or maybe you need a little extra light for your next IG live / Facetime? You'll always have just the right amount of light with three different lighting effects. The large clip ensures that it securely attaches to your phone, even when you're moving around. Plus, the 400 mAh battery means you can use it for hours without worrying about recharging! Measures 4.33" x 3.35" x 0.39" with a USB cord length of 25cm.

name: Baby2Baby Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide children living in poverty across the country with diapers, clothing and all the basic necessities that every child deserves.

name: Zodiac Earrings
description: Whether you're a star gazer or an occasional horoscope reader you can wear your sign on your sleeve (or your ears). Build your own power stack with these zodiac star earrings. These earrings are 10mm in size with CZ Stones.

name: APOTHEKE 3-Wick Candle
description: Hand-poured with perfume-grade fragrance oils and a high quality soy wax blend. This scent is formulated with a unique wick, wax, and fragrance combination to create a strong and clean burn of an estimated time of 120 hours. 32oz.

name: Crystal Gourmet Chocolate Heart
description: This gorgeous Compartés gourmet dark chocolate heart hand studded with thousands of multi colored edible sugar crystals. Gorgeous and stunning this edible crystal chocolate heart is delicious and blingy, who needs jewelers for Valentines when you can eat this!

description: Delve into Miami's melting pot of cultures with this authentic food tour through the historic neighborhood of South Beach. Experience South Beach's legendary Art Deco Architecture, it's melting pot of cultures, and of course delicious culinary delights. Enjoy a variety of tastings at 5-7 stops of some of South Beach's favorite eateries. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps bring independence back to our nation’s most severely wounded veterans.

name: Cilantro Hair Conditioner
description: This gentle, lightweight conditioner synthesizes natural cilantro extract with absorbent fatty acids and fatty alcohols to effectively hydrate various hair and scalp types. Gently conditions and detangles hair without leaving any residue, reduces frizz, and doesn't weigh down hair. Natural fragrance and color. Includes one 8 fl oz bottle.

name: Luxe Sateen Core Sheet Set, King
description: Ideal for softness lovers and snuggle fans. Buttery smooth softness that gets better with every wash. These Luxe Sateen sheets start with the highest quality threads using 480 thread count long-staple cotton with a one-yarn-under and three-yarn over weave. This means more thread surface is exposed, giving the Luxe Sateen its signature silky-soft feel and luminous sheen. Sateen is more tightly woven, which means you get a warmer, incredibly soft sheet that's ideal for year-round comfort. This gift includes 1 Flat Sheet, 1 Fitted Sheet, and 2 Pillowcases.

name: Margherita Pizza Making Kit
description: Pulled straight from a fiery hot oven, freshly made Margherita pizza is about as crowd-pleasing as it gets. With this kit, you can craft handmade mozzarella and pizza dough that’s totally authentic, from scratch in your very own kitchen. The Margherita Pizza Making Kit comes with the specialty equipment ingredients needed to create both the pizza dough and mozzarella completely from scratch. Included in the Margherita Pizza Making Kit is Pizza Flour, Baking Yeast, Cheese Cloth, Cheese Thermometer, Citric Acid, and Vegetable Rennet.

name: Eau de Parfum
description: A collection of eau de parfums inspired by traditional apothecary ingredients. Elevated through the modern pairing of opposite but complementary notes, each dynamic scent is formulated for everyday wear and gender-neutral appeal. Includes one 1.7 fl oz eau de parfum bottle.

name: PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract, 2.4 oz
description: This clean, dermatologist-tested sunscreen lotion is perfect for active days in the sun. With high-performance protection against UV & infrared radiation, this formula nourishes skin with proven ingredients while also helping to prevent photoaging & dehydration. Contains 2.4 oz.

name: Essential Travel Brush Set
description: Create flawless looks anytime, anywhere using this elite set of 7 basic, travel-size brushes for the face and eyes. With a chic and sturdy Brush Cup included, your brushes will always be protected and organized!

name: European Linen Table Runner
description: Expertly crafted from the finest European flax, this linen table runner is equally chic and functional. The classic design and texture makes this runner well suited for formal gatherings or casual nights at home.

name: Ripple Bowl
description: These small colorful bowls make meals more fun, for pets and people alike. Heat and cold resistant, dishwasher safe. Made of borosilicate glass. Dimensions are 5”D × 2-5/8”H. Includes 1 bowl, choice of color.

name: The Black Birthday Gift Box 25 Pack
description: A special edition birthday present. Fill your matte black gift box with their most loved latest and greatest flavors. Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats.

name: Nested Mixing Bowl Set

This set of 3 includes a Large bowl measuring 9.7x9x4.65" and holds 96oz, a Medium Bowl measuring 8.5x8x4" and holds 56oz, and a Small Bowl measuring 7.3x7x3.4" and holds 35oz.

name: Dark Circle Eye Rescue
description: The Dark Circle Eye Rescue hydrates and brightens the skin around the eyes to reduce the appearance of dark circles and wrinkles. The stainless steel rollerball makes it easy to apply, while also working to de-puff. Bottle holds 15ml.

name: 3 Pack, Smoked Atlantic Salmon
description: This Atlantic Salmon was raised by third-generation family farmers in the icy Arctic circle with deep ocean currents that keep the water fresh. Brined in extra-virgin olive oil, natural sea salt, organic garlic salt, and organic brown sugar, wood smoked in small batches.

name: The Bail Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide free bail assistance to thousands of low-income Americans every year.

name: Sub Zero Waterproof Jacket
description: Super warm. Super cool. This newest winter jacket is engineered to keep your pet warm when temperatures drop below zero. The lightweight design makes it easy for them to carry the cozy vibes anywhere, and the hood can be removed so it can be worn as a vest! And the best part? Not only is it warm, but it is also water-resistant!

name: Personalized Winnie Pouch
description: One of Boulevard's most popular everything pouches. Easy to pack and easy to use, made with lightweight nylon, a top zip closure, and a leather patch that can be monogrammed. Measures 8" (L) x 5" (H) x 5" (D). Choice of bag color, monogram color, and monogram text.

name: Parachute Home Classic Turkish Cotton Slippers
description: These cozy cushioned slippers feature plush terry fabric and ribbed rubber soles. Soft and breathable, they’re footwear made for lounging in luxury.

name: Branded Theragun Elite
description: Powerful deep muscle treatment, in an ultra-quiet smart percussive therapy device with advanced sound insulation. Elite is scientifically calibrated to reach 60% deeper into muscles than your average massager for greater therapeutic benefits, melting away tension and releasing soreness.

name: Copper Saucepan
description: The 1.9 QT Copper Saucepan features performance details like a stay cool handle, stainless steel cooking surface, and an ergonomic design for maneuverability. Whether you’re reducing veal stock or re-heating a sauce once your guests arrive, this saucepan will take your most memorable meals from the stove to the table.

name: Pate De Fruits
description: Embrace the radiant allure of Vegan Pâtes de Fruits assortment, each piece shimmering like a gem, supple to the touch, and exploding with flavor true to its fruit origins. Each morsel unveils a burst of vibrant cherry, zesty lemon, crisp apple, sun-kissed orange, juicy strawberry, succulent raspberry, or lush apricot, bringing you an authentic taste of French countryside in every bite. Includes 15 pieces.

name: Small Teapot
description: A small teapot that’s big on style. Note the ergonomic handle, the drip-proof spout, and the micro-perforated stainless-steel filter. Serves 1 full cup or 2 smaller cups. Dishwasher safe. Cannot be used on any heating element.

name: l'Essentiel Hotel Slipper
description: l’Essentiel is a hero line of hotel slippers with a contoured footbed and thick outsole designed to be worn indoor, outdoor, and all moments in-between. l’Essentiel is the perfect accessory for travel, leisure, and all moments in-between.

name: Edison Pendant String Lights
description: Add illumination and ambiance whether you’re off the grid or in the heart of the city. The Edison String Lights make it simple to style your outdoor space. Three LED Edison lights connect by a single cord to make for easy hanging and styling. Includes a 10 ft cable, 3 carabiners for hanging and 4 ft between each light.

name: The Relax and Reflect Motherhood Journey Gift Box
description: This gift box is perfect for a new mom during postpartum or the "fourth trimester" with tools to help ease postpartum stressors. To relieve new mom stress and extreme thirst, this gift includes a Classic Nurtured 9 Maternity/Postpartum Robe, a Motherhood Journal, a bkr Glass + Silicone Water Bottle, a Dry Brush, and a Lavender, Rose & Cedarwood All-Natural Bath Bomb.

name: Dash Grocery Tote
description: This grocery tote is great for adding a little style to your errands or runs to the grocery store + farmers market. It's also perfect for non-food things like library books + gym clothes.

name: S'mores Chocolate Bark
description: Zac's most popular sweet treat, made with a milk chocolate base mixed with gooey marshmallows, cinnamon graham crackers, and topped with a graham crackle crumble and dark chocolate drizzle.

name: Botanical Gift Box Set
description: This botanical collection is cultivated for your specific gardening needs, perfect for houseplant enthusiasts and novice gardeners alike.

name: 9-Piece Knife Organizer
description: Perfect for kitchens with limited counter space, the in-drawer Knife Organizer offers elegant and expandable drawer storage that actually keeps blades sharp. The 9-Piece Organizer can hold up to 5 large (Chef, Nakiri, Bread, and Santoku) plus 4 small (Paring and Steak) knives. Sustainably-sourced beech is lacquered with a food-safe water-based varnish and then fitted with non-slip rubber feet that prevent sliding in the drawer.

name: Large Glass Mixing Bowls with Lids, Set of 4
description: Each bowl comes with an airtight lid for fresh food, and nests into the other with the lids on so nothing gets lost in your cupboard! Includes a set of 4 glass bowls with 1 large, 2 medium, and 1 small size. Freezer, microwave and dishwasher safe (bowls only).

name: Italian Night In
description: Indulge in an authentic Italian feast without leaving your home with this Italian Night In Comfort Food Care Package. Whether you're craving a taste of Little Italy, The North End of Boston, Bella Vista in Philly, or The Hill in St. Louis, this package has got you covered. Start off with a tasty combination of salty and savory cheeses, crackers, and crostinis, paired with red wine and savory sausage for the perfect appetizer. Next, dig into a plate of linguine pasta drenched in rich marinara sauce, and finish with a sweet touch of artisanal chocolate biscotti bites. Buon appetite! Enjoy a taste of Italy in your own home.

name: Little Cloud Tray
description:
A natural landing pad for daily essentials, inspired by clouds. Place by your front door as a magnet for keys, change, and other pocket precipitation. Named for its visual kinship with the great cumulus cloud, the Little Cloud Tray is crafted from moulded cork. On a coffee table, it can capably corral remote controls, mechanical puzzles, or other objects that are prone to rolling into oblivion. Atop a desk, you might employ it as a pillow for your favorite writing tools. 
It measures 10"x 7"x 1".

name: Nimo Coasters, Set of 4
description: The perfect accent to any space, these functional decorative coasters will keep your table, desk, and countertops free from drink rings while also adding a hint of global charm. Handwoven using techniques passed down through generations of Senegalese women, a set of coasters will bring traditional African craftsmanship and beauty to your home. They each will have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product. Each measures 4"x4" wide x 0.25" thick.

name: Fireplace Flame-Effect Humidifier Lamp
description: Relax and cozy up by the faux-fire with this magnificent Fireplace Humidifier. The innovative cold flame technology creates realistic visual effects of flames that can provide a soothing and relaxing atmosphere in any room. This flame humidifier uses ultrasonic frequencies to generate a fine mist that keeps the air moist and comfortable. It's the perfect fix for those suffering from dry skin, allergies, or respiratory problems. You can also add aromatherapy essential oils to the humidifier to enjoy the added therapeutic benefits! Measures 6.73" x 2.96" x 3.98".

name: Vagabond 20 oz Tumbler
description: Minimize your plastic footprint with style. This tumbler is the best companion on road trips – it fits perfectly into car cup holders. The rubber gasket makes it spill-resistant on bumpier roads, and the double-wall insulation makes sure drinks stay at the right temperature until the next pit stop.

name: Comfy Cropped Ribbed Cardigan
description: This cropped cardi makes cozy so easy. Built with your favorite comfy yarn for extra softness. Perfect on its own or worn open with a tank or baby tee.

name: Nest Thermostat
description: Meet the Nest Thermostat, the helpful thermostat with a cozy price. It can turn itself down to save energy when you leave the house. You can control it from anywhere with the Google Home app - whether you're on an errand or in bed. And it's easy to install yourself.

name: Coconut Milk, Single Bar
description: This is a vegan dark milk chocolate. It’s proof that we can, sometimes, have it all. It’s a silky, smooth utopian bar that catapults you into peak summer, with lush notes of berries and cream. Made with single origin Ugandan cacao from Semuliki Forest and pure shredded coconut. Once referred to by Edible Brookyn as "an actual dream."

name: Shearling-Lined Crossover Sandal, Saddle
description: With the style of their Crossover Sandal and the comfort of the Shearling-Lined Moc Clogs, the Shearling-Lined Crossover Sandal is a cozy take on everyday footwear that you can wear anywhere. Made in Italy, with suede upper with shearling lining and a cork footbed.

name: TRX Rip Trainer
description: The TRX Rip Trainer™ is an innovative weighted bar and resistance bungee duo for your home gym that frees you to move in every direction to work the abs, obliques, backs, and hips while building up your speed, agility, and balance. This gift includes TRX Rip Trainer, Door Anchor, Medium Resistance Cord, Safety Strap, and Free trial to TRX Training Club.

name: Rove Weekender
description: This Rove Weekender is well-suited for short trips or as a companion to any of our Aviator luggage—it slides securely over the handles. Made of EcoCraft Twill and recycled vegan leather, it combines durability, incredibly soft hand feel, and sleek style, with functional pockets on the exterior and interior to keep essentials within easy reach. Smart organization to stay on the go while looking sharp.

name: Appetizer Flatware Set
description: Toss the toothpicks and skip the bulky spoons. This flatware set is sized just right for little bites, from meats to cheeses to dips and beyond. Includes two mini appetizer forks and two mini appetizer spoons. Hand-finished and made of the finest European 18/10 stainless steel. Forks measure 4.25" and spoons measure 4.75". Dishwasher safe.

name: 4 Pack
description: Includes 4 jars of your choice. Choose between Pumpkin Spice, Sugar & Spice, Birthday Cake, Chocolate Chip, Gooey Brownie, and more.

name: Signature Candle
description: Hand-poured in the San Francisco Bay Area, Sweet July candles are vegan, cruelty-free, and featured in concrete vessels that are individually handmade in the USA. Each candle features two wicks made of pure, braided cotton. Only premium, soap grade fragrance is used that is phthalate-free and derived from essential oil.

name: Travel Size Soy Candle, Recipient's Choice
description:
These pure soy wax candles are hand poured with no additives, dyes or fillers, and are hand labeled and crafted in small batches. Each are 4oz
and have a burn time of 25 hours, and have a natural cotton wick braided with thin paper threads (lead and zinc free).

name: Get Well Soon Rice Krispie Treat 12 Pack
description: Brighten up someone’s day with this pack of delicious hand made crispy rice and marshmallow treats. Treats include cookies and cream, caramel sea salt, sugar cookie, M&M, topped with tasteful “get well soon” fondant plaques.

name: Salt & Pepper Grinder Set
description: The Salt & Pepper Grinders are easily adjustable and rest flat when upside down for easy refilling. The non-corrosive ceramic grinders won't absorb flavors or odors, and are positioned at the top so they won't leave a mess on the table. Sold filled with sea salt and black peppercorns.

name: Daily SPF + Moisturizer
description: Stave off sun damage for healthy, youthful skin for years to come with this Daily SPF + Moisturizer. Its fast-absorbing, lightweight formula uses Cactus Extract and Chia Seed Oil to provide all-day hydration, plus Broad Spectrum SPF 30 to protect against UVA and UVB rays with zero residue or white cast. Includes one 35ml bottle.

name: Ultimate Spatula
