description: Toadfish set out to do the impossible…innovate a spatula. The result is a fine-tuned, all stainless steel masterpiece with no detail overlooked. It sits balanced, weighted, and secure in the hand with a perfectly thin, flexible tip. When you set it down it boasts a built-in spoon rest keeping your surfaces clean and your food sanitary. This is the last spatula you will ever buy.

name: PlayStation 5 DualSense Wireless Controller
description: Discover a deeper, highly immersive gaming experience1 that brings the action to life in the palms of your hands. The DualSense™ wireless controller offers immersive haptic feedback2, dynamic adaptive triggers2 and a built-in microphone, all integrated into an iconic comfortable design. Midnight Black.

name: Party Beast Crown
description: Finally, the Queen or King of your castle can now look the part. Today’s royalty demands a clean, modern aesthetic made of 100% wool felt and Modern Beast is here to serve. Measures 2.25" x 2.25" with an adjustable elastic strap.

name: Men's Cotton Fisherman Sweater, Beechwood
description: Jenni Kayne's best-selling Cotton Fisherman Sweater. Lightweight and breathable with added length and ribbed edge detailing, it’s destined to become your new everyday staple. Made of 100% cotton.

name: Theragun Mini 2.0
description: The mini is your pocket-sized partner, giving you Theragun quality muscle treatment with unparalleled portability. Compact but powerful, Theragun mini is the most agile massage device that goes wherever you do.

name: Tushy Ottoman
description: Enjoy this sleek high-end design toilet stool that elevates the look and feel of your bathroom. It fits discreetly in front of your toilet and seamlessly blends with your toilet. The carefully crafted curvature is made to keep your feet comfy during your equally comfy squat. Dimensions are 9” H x 16.5” W x 9” L.

name: Monogrammed Luggage Tag
description: With an interior section where you can write your contact information in case your luggage is lost, a removable strap, and gold embossed Monogram on the front, this is the perfect gift for any traveler.

name: Toddy 16oz
description: The perfect size for your morning and evening routine. The Toddy 16oz is 100% leakproof and insulated to keep hot, cold, and carbonated drinks the perfect temperature.

name: Mini Tin Candle
description: Hand-poured with perfume-grade fragrance oils and high quality soy wax blend. Includes one 2 oz. candle with an estimated burn time of 15 hours.

name: Breath of Fresh Air Box, Small Plants
description: This small (4" nursery pot diameter) is the perfect box to brighten up your space and purify your air. Each box consists of four air-purifying plants that are scientifically proven to remove harmful toxins, dust, and germs from your space.

name: Happy Birthday Rice Krispie Treat 12 Pack
description: 12 Celebratory Birthday Cake crispy rice and marshmallow treats packed with sprinkles and topped with homemade blue marshmallow. Tradional garnish alternates with festive “Happy Birthday” fondant plaque.

name: The Healthy Hair Set
description: Exclusively available during the holidays this year, The Healthy Hair Set combines two of Crown Affair's bestsellers with The Leave-In Conditioner and The Towel—in one limited-edition bundle, wrapped up custom packaging by artist and illustrator Carly Kuhn. Together, they work to protect and hydrate hair, for your healthiest strands.

name: 12oz Century Glass Set of 2
description: A modern classic destined to become your new go-to drinking glass. The Century Collection is made using premium borosilicate glass that is most commonly associated with laboratory glassware and high end kitchenwares. It provides a delicate appearance and superior thermal shock durability. Includes two, 12 oz glasses. Choice of color.

name: Honoring Mental Health Awareness
description: In honor of Mental Health Awareness, browse through our curated selection of gifts that are bound to brighten your day.

name: Organic Chamomile and Ginger Natural Body Wash
description: Introducing the natural body wash you’ve always wanted. Made with Moringa Oil, an ultra-hydrating super oil rich in omega fatty acids, nutrients, and antioxidants, this body wash hydrates as it cleanses. A calming blend of chamomile and ginger essential oils use their anti-inflammatory superpowers to soothe your mind and body while combating dry or irritated skin.

name: 3 Pack
description: Responsibly sourced and exquisitely packed tinned fish. Each tin is brined in sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, brown sugar, and garlic salt, and wood smoked in small batches. Includes 3 tins with your choice of smoked fish.

name: Little Guides to Style: The Story of Four Iconic Fashion Houses
description: Exploring four designers who exemplify elegance and high couture, these little books of fashion follow these brands from their creation, moving through their style evolutions, the key looks that define them and their impact on the fashion landscape today. Discover the story behind the little black dress with the Little Book of Chanel, the tailoring behind Milan minimalism with Prada, the conception of the New Look with Dior and the genius behind androgynous maximalism with Gucci. Includes 4 books. By Laia Farran Graves, Emma Baxter-Wright, Karen Homer. Hardcover.

name: Mini Zac-Pac
description: The perfect box of handmade chocolates! Made in small batches, the mini Zac-Pac includes 6 truffles, 2 salted caramel pretzels, 2 m&m pretzels, 2 chocolate covered Oreos, 2 cookie butter Oreos and 2 cake batter cookies.

name: Purple Garden Mix
description: A garden-style design featuring a variety of purple and lavender blooms, accented with soft greenery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: For The Bride
description: Enjoy this milestone with a simple gift that will look great in your newly decorated hands. This gift includes the Pinch Provisions Minimergency Kit for Brides, Voluspa Bourbon Vanille Candle, and 2 Azeria Ivory Silk Scrunchies.

name: Basilisk V3 Wired Optical Gaming Mouse with Chroma RBG Lighting
description: Create, control, and champion your playstyle with the new Razer Basilisk V3—the quintessential ergonomic gaming mouse for customized performance. With 10+1 programmable buttons, an intelligent scroll wheel, and a heavy dose of Razer Chroma™ RGB, it's time to light up the competition your way.

name: Soursop Vitamin C Serum
description: Protect and nurture your skin with this Vitamin C serum featuring the powerful combination of antioxidant-rich soursop, ferulic acid and green tea. With a formula that is gentle enough for daily use, it will help visibly brighten, firm and hydrate your skin.

name: Aviator Grand
description: The sustainable, timeless, quality companion for your next extended stay. Packing 8-10 days of clothing and 4 pairs of shoes, this checked luggage features thoughtful details with 360 spin wheels, smart interior pockets and a removable laundry bag. Measures 19.7" x 28.1" x 11.7".

name: Cashmere Socks
description: Wrap your feet in pure indulgence with these Cashmere Socks, the ultimate in warmth, softness, and style. These socks are 75% cashmere, 15% nylon, 10% tencel. The Cashmere blend minimizes pilling and keeps their shape. One size fits most.

name: All about Love
description: The word 'love' is most often defined as a noun, yet we would all love better if we used it as a verb," writes bell hooks as she comes out fighting and on fire in All About Love. Here, at her most provocative and intensely personal, renowned scholar, cultural critic and feminist bell hooks offers a proactive new ethic for a society bereft with lovelessness--not the lack of romance, but the lack of care, compassion, and unity.

name: 45 Piece Gift Box
description: Triple your delight with three delectable assortments of luxurious gourmet chocolates that are elegantly showcased in an unmistakably modern ZBox. Fifteen chocolates each from zChocolat's Traditional and Exotic Assortments are complemented with a selection of 15 additional bonus pieces from the most sought-after Praliné recipes. It’s undeniably a divine and distinctive gift for any occasion.

name: Hu Chocolate Variety Pack
description: Deciding is hard, so let's not. This variety pack includes 8 vegan dark chocolate bars made of simple ingredients with unbeatable taste, including all of Hu's best selling flavors to indulge in. Includes Crunchy Mint, Vanilla Crunch, Salty Dark, Simple Dark, Cashew Butter + Raspberry , Hazelnut Butter, Cashew Butter, and Almond Butter Dark Chocolate Bars.

name: NAACP Donation
description: The gift of giving! NAACP’s mission is to ensure the political, educational, equality of minority group citizens of States and eliminate race prejudice.

name: Aviator Carry-On
description: This best-selling carry-on is not only going to become your new favorite travel companion but it's also the most sustainable piece of luggage you'll ever own. Just the right size, packing 2-4 days worth of clothes and shoes, this carry-on features thoughtful details with 360 spin wheels, smart interior pockets and a removable laundry bag. TSA approved sizing, measures 13.7" x 21.7" x 9".

name: Catch:1 Essentials, Belgian Linen
description: Single device wireless charging. Weighted so it stays put, wrapped in designer-quality Belgian Linen, this charger will be a sleek addition wherever it's placed. Can charge through most cases up to 3mm in thickness and has a USB C input, braided charging cable included. Measures 3.9" x 3.9" x 0.6".

name: Move Diffuser
description: The Move Diffuser is cordless, allowing you to scent every corner of your home. Put it on the coffee table while you’re reading on the couch; set it on the bathroom counter while you’re taking a bath; place it in the hallway when guests come over. No matter where it sits, Move fits.

name: Mason Luxe Digital Frame
description: Send photos from your phone to Mason Luxe, Aura's WiFi-connected frame with gorgeous clarity and hand-speckled finishes. Enjoy all your favorite moments on Mason Luxe's 9.7" 2K display that sits in portrait or landscape (just flip the frame). Add unlimited photos and videos, and invite all your loved ones to fill the frame using the free Aura app. This frame measures 9.8" x 7.8" x 2".

name: Shearling Slide Sandal
description: A shearling strap makes these slides perfect for the cold mornings on-the-go. You'll love wearing them with fine socks in cooler weather. Handmade in Italy, they are 100% shearling upper. Due to the natural dye variances that occur when coloring animal hide, no pair is ever exactly alike. Color and texture may vary.

name: 1 Month Classique
description: Choose any 1 item from thousands of luxury accessories. This one month membership allows you to choose 1 piece of jewelry or bag with a retail value up to $4,000. A Vivrelle digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address you provide within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription on Vivrelle's website.

name: The (grippy) reBoard
description: All of the grip, none of the slip. Featuring silicone pop corners, this is one cutting board that won't budge, making it a must-have for slick countertops (we're looking at you, marble) and vigorous choppers. BPA-free and made from 75% recycled plastic, 25% renewable sugarcane with silicone corners. Measures 14.75" long, 10.75" wide, 0.375" thick. Dishwasher safe.

name: Roomba i3+ EVO Wi-Fi Connected Self Emptying Robot Vacuum
description: The Roomba i3+ EVO robot vacuum is smarter than ever, learning and mapping your home room-by-room so it can clean the room you want, when you want. With 10x the Power-Lifting Suction and Premium 3-Stage Cleaning System. Powered by iRobot Genius, it stays one step ahead of everyday messes, by learning your life and suggesting cleaning schedules—to clean when you’re out enjoying life. It will also will return itself to the base when the bin is full, automatically empty and resume cleaning, so you don’t have to think about emptying the bin for months at a time.

name: Toys for Tots Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to Toys for Tots helps provide toys, books and other gifts to less fortunate children this holiday season.

name: Mendocino Country Gift Crate
description: Mendocino County in California is the birthplace of many great products and Gourmet Gift Baskets has gathered the best collection of nuts in this gift crate. The deliciousness of Mendocino's cashews, pistachios, almonds, and toffee peanuts will leave anyone with a lasting smile. Deliver the tastes of California to their front door with this healthy nut selection.

name: Vittoria V-Neck Cashmere Sweater
description: Cropped and cozy, the Vittoria features a sleek v-neck design and ribbed trim for an  effortlessly elevated look.

name: Luxury Organic Sateen Sheet Set, King
description: Sweet dreams start here. Rather than rely on thread count alone, Quince begin with high-quality threads sourced from the finest long-staple 100% organic cotton on Earth and weave them with the utmost of care. The result: buttery, breathable luxe sateen that only gets softer with each wash. Equal parts durable and luxurious thanks to a sleek-without-too-much-sheen design, these sateen sheets are crafted using windmill-powered green energy and finished without the use of harsh pesticides, GMOs or toxins like formaldehyde. Investing in practices that are good for you and the planet means you can rest a little easier. Set includes 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet, and 2 king pillowcases. Fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 16" deep.

name: Signum Vase
description: Bring vibrancy to any room with this mesmerizing vase. Inspired by the Wiener Werkstätte art scene, the geometric pattern features Swarovski's signature octagon in color pop blue. Adorn your own home or give the gift of playful sophistication to a loved one. This vase is part of an exclusive collaboration with porcelain brand Rosenthal. Includes one vase, measures 5.875" H x 3.25" W.

name: Summer Beach Pack
description: The Vacation Summer Beach Pack is everything you need to optimize your seaside recreation. This pack includes a Vacation Beach Towel, SPF 30 Classic Lotion, and a deluxe Air Freshener with the portable scent of the world's best smelling sunscreen.

name: Baby Plate, Spoon and Fork Set
description: This durable and cute set is designed for young children who want to self-feed. In addition to their appealing colors and shapes, the plates, spoons and forks are specifically designed for very young children. The plate’s trefoil shape makes scooping up food easier, while the strip underneath prevents the plate from sliding around. The spoon and fork are shaped to not slide down into the plate, and the short handles are easy to grip. All are dishwasher safe, BPA-free and PVC-free. Best suited for children 4 months or older. Includes 2 full sets with 2 spoons, 2 forks, 2 plates.

name: Chocolate Covered Pretzel Best Sellers Gift Box
description: You can't go wrong with their Best Sellers Assorted Set! It's an incredible collection of only the most popular, drool-worthy Fatty Sundays gourmet chocolate pretzels! This set includes Toffee, Rainbow Sprinkles, Salted Caramel and Birthday Cake. 12 pretzel rods per set, each pretzel rod is approx 4" long.

name: LoveSeen Gift Card, $150
description: A gift card to use towards lashes. A LoveSeen digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout.

name: 5 Piece Ultimate Tool Set
description: The ultimate cooking experience starts with GIR's Ultimate Bundle. This set includes the Ultimate Ladle, Ultimate Spatula, Ultimate Flip, Ultimate Spoon, and the Ultimate Spoonula. Choice of set color.

name: Stainless Steel Clad Frying Pan
description: The Stainless Steel 12" Clad Frying Pan is a top-performer with fast and even heat retention. Made from a premium construction of 5-layered American metal, it smoothly transitions from restaurant-quality stovetop searing to oven roasting up to 800 degrees. The handle is designed to stay cool on the stovetop and is ergonomic to help balance the pan.

name: Fleece Joggers
description: Staying active is no problem when you’ve got a stylish pair of premium-quality joggers like these. The back pocket is customizable and has two spacious pockets on the sides. Choice of color and size.

name: Travel Set
description:
Cozy up at home or travel in style with this luxurious 4-Piece Travel Set. Each set includes a silk travel pillowcase, eye mask, a pair of deluxe cashmere socks and a lightweight cashmere throw. Measurements are 11.5" x 15.5" for the Silk travel pillowcase, 9" x 3" for the Sleep mask, and 82" L  x 50" W
for the Cashmere throw blanket.

name: Fireplace Match Cloche
description: Inspired by vintage glass domes used to protect emerging seedlings, these Match Cloches are made of handblown glass and fitted with a cork to stylishly hold an assortment of matchsticks. A striker flint on the glass adds functionality, and the delicate vessels can be reused to display treasures and curiosities. It holds approx. 120 white-tipped matches, and measures 11.25” tall x 3.5” wide.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Enjoy a cozy, limited batch of hot chocolate for a comforting, festive gift for the holidays. Each pouch is 5 oz and contains 8 servings of rich hot chocolate.

name: Baked Goods Deluxe Gift Basket
description: No matter the occasion, this decadent baked goods deluxe gift basket is guaranteed to add a delightful touch of sweetness! Nestled inside a beautiful seagrass basket is a carefully curated assortment of fan favorite bakery treats. Prepare to indulge in irresistibly delicious cookies, richly delicious brownies, and whoopie pies, all elegantly arranged in this exquisite assortment.

name: Recycled Lunch Box
description: Made from recycled water bottles, this durable lunch box features vibrant colors and playful designs to make lunchtime more enjoyable. The insulated main compartment provides ample space for sandwiches, fruits, and snacks, keeping everything organized and fresh. It also comes equipped with an interior mesh pocket for holding silverware and a clear pocket for holding special lunchtime notes. It measures  6.89” H x 10.04” W x 3.35” D.

name: Women's Merino Wool Blend Calf Socks
description: Naturally cushy Merino takes Bombas' already plush socks to the next level. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Nadiya Bakes
description: By Nadiya Hussain. New York Times bestseller. The host of the beloved Netflix series Time to Eat and Nadiya Bakes and winner of The Great British Baking Show returns to her true love, baking, with more than 100 delicious recipes for sweet treats. Hardcover.

name: Fabric Refresher
description: Oooh, that’s fresh. Add a spritz of pure bliss onto fabrics that could use a little extra love. Only the good stuff in here. Hypoallergenic, with no: petroleum; artificial dyes; parabens; phthalates or phosphates. Tested by trusted third party labs. Includes one 8oz fabric refresher in Dream Clean scent, a warm and welcoming blend of citrus, vanilla, and amber to spice up your spin.

name: The Garment Duffel
description: Keep your wardrobe crisp and organized, no matter where you're headed. Durable, water-resistant, and ridiculously convenient, the Garment Duffel transforms from a garment bag into a roomy, TSA-friendly duffel in an instant. The hanging compartment can fit a suit or tux and a handful of dress shirts, then zips up to create enough space for a full load of folded clothes (plus shoes which get their own dedicated sleeves). Long story short, meet your ideal long weekend, business trip, destination wedding, or fancy getaway companion. Dimensions measure 22" x 12" x 12".

name: Levain Bakery 8 Pack
description: Choose between Chocolate Chip Walnut, Two Chip Chocolate Chip, Dark Chocolate Chocolate Chip, Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Chip, Oatmeal Raisin or a variety pack.

name: The Craft Cocktail
description: These cocktail kits contain all of the premium ingredients needed to create 2 top-shelf cocktails wherever you are. Just add the hard stuff.

name: Branded Color Contrast Notebook
description: For writing down memories, storing secrets, studying, and ticking off to-do lists—these hardcover Journalbooks notebooks get the job done. Their rubber bands match the bright-colored edges and inside covers (4 colors available). Each notebook features 96 off-white ruled pages, a blind deboss brand imprint, and smooth, matte-black covers. They come in ​​one size: 5.5" × 8.25" (14cm x 21cm).

name: Toys for Tots Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to Toys for Tots helps provide toys, books and other gifts to less fortunate children this holiday season.

name: California Orange Blossom Honey
description: California Orange Blossom Honey is a radiantly golden honey from single estate orange groves in the Central Valley. Delicious, amber hued with a clean, citrus finish. Each recyclable glass jar contains 9 oz of honey. Made of 100% pure raw, unfiltered honey.

name: Seasonal Sustainable Kit
description: Toss those single-use plastic bags and embrace a greener future with these versatile reusable food storage bags. (re)zips are made from 100% food-safe, BPA-free, lead-free PEVA, so you can rest assured your food is in good hands. The Seasonal Sustainable Kit includes 2 Gallon Bags, 2 Half Gallon Bags, Flat Lunch Bags, and 2 Stand-Up Mini 1/2 Cup Bags. Save hundreds of single-use sandwich, snack, and quart bags that actually "click" when you seal it. They are freezer-safe, waterproof, leakproof, and airtight, keeping food fresh without leaks or spills.

name: Metallic Acrylic Paint Pen 8-Pack
description: Acrylic paint pens are a new way to paint and an illustrator's dream! The precision of a pen combined with the glossy finish, smooth consistency and reassuring thickness of acrylic paint. Used for coverage and detail these paint pens give you complete control over the marks you make. Highly pigmented with a satin finish these pens are sure to provide you with the ultimate finish to your piece. Includes a set of 8.

name: Tiny Terracotta Garden Kits
description: This tiny terracotta kit comes equipped with everything you’ll need to start your fruit and veggie garden, just add water and set in a sunny window. Features a terracotta planter with a water-tight glazed interior and a nested coconut husk liner that provides drainage. As the plant matures, the liner can be transplanted into a larger pot or garden.

name: Callaway Tour Authentic Umbrella
description: The Callaway Tour Authentic 68 Inch Golf Umbrella features a massive double canopy that shields you from the elements and allows wind to pass through, ensuring that the umbrella doesn't collapse and is easier to hold in harsh conditions.

name: World Central Kitchen Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide fresh meals to communities in need.

name: Waffle Hand Towel
description: These lightweight, minimalist towels textured with a honeycomb weave will make your bathroom look and feel like a fancy spa. Made of 100% long-staple Turkish cotton. Includes 1 towel.

name: 100 Piece Puzzle
description: Inspiring jigsaw puzzles for kids that look good before, during and after completion. Each 100 piece puzzle comes in a reusable cardboard tube and includes adhesive sheets to preserve your masterpiece. Recommended for kids ages 6+. Choice of jigsaw puzzle design.

name: Vegan Latest & Greatest Cupcakes 25 Pack
description: Baked by Melissa's best-selling cupcake assortment goes VEGAN! Curated by Melissa herself, the Vegan Latest & Greatest is your one-stop-shop for every vegan cupcake flavor on the menu.

name: Artisan Meat & Cheese Platter
description: This artisan meat and cheese platter features a carefully selected assortment of gourmet meats, artisan cheeses, crackers, and antipasto items. From Finocchiona to summer sausage, to creamy cheese, to Artichoke Bruschetta, and gourmet preserves, this is perfect for any occasion. Arrives nestled in a wooden cutting board, ready for immediate use!

name: Rebels of Kindness Book
description: Inside the pages of this book are science-backed practices designed to engage the heart, mind and body in how kindness can transform every aspect of your life. Featuring the stories of 40 “rebels of kindness” who have made an impact on humanity and the planet and who in turn can inspire you.

name: AirPods Pro (2nd Gen)
description: Magic like you've never heard. With all the components for a top-notch audio experience, Apple Airpods feature Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound, transparency mode so you can hear your surroundings, and a customizable fit for all-day comfort. With more than 24 hours of battery life with the included MagSafe Charging Case, AirPods Pro connect magically to your Apple devices, and they’re ready to use out of the case. Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation than the previous generation. Second generation.

name: Spärkel Beverage System
description: Designed for sparkling beverage fans, Spärkel allows you to easily sparkle and infuse the delicious tastes of real ingredients – into any drink – with no CO2 tank. Each system comes with 1 Spärkel Bottle (750ml) and 10 Carbonators.

name: Nova Sling Bag
description: Not too big. Not too small. Nova is perfect for your actual essentials (hand sani, keys, wallet, phone, etc.) With multiple pockets and sleek storage, this lightweight sling bag also fits other items you deem essential, be it umbrella, book or hat. Made from REPREVE® recycled polyester created by repurposing 7 recycled plastic bottles, Nova is definitely earth-friendly. Measures 9.5” L x 4” W x 12” H.

name: Dry Jan Starter Set
description: This six-bottle case is the ideal way to make Dry, or even just Dry-ish, January fresh and fun. A combination of red, white, and sparkling Proxies, including favorite sparkling releases, is here to make sure there's nothing drab about your Dry Jan. Not wine. Proxies.

name: Taya Storage Basket
description: This beautiful storage basket is perfect as a laundry hamper or used as a storage container or just standing as a design piece. Each basket is handmade in the traditional coil-style weaving technique passed down for generations in Senegal. These baskets take up to 40 hours to make and are made by a small, dedicated group of Expedition Subsahara artists. Please allow a minimum of four weeks to create and ship. We promise they'll be worth the wait! Each basket have slight variations in design and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product, basket measures 20" tall without the lid and has a 15" wide opening.

name: Falcon Toy
description: The Falcon Toy features a custom falcon-claw design with multiple treat cavities to promote both interactive or independent quiet play, while the interlocking shape allows multiple toys to combine for added feeding, tugging, treating, and rolling functionality. Two types of treat cavities accommodate both dry food (like kibble) and spreads (like peanut butter) simultaneously.

name: Studio Buds
description: Powerful true wireless earbuds that deliver a high-quality audio experience in a sleek, lightweight and comfortable design. Sweat- and water-resistant earbuds with an IPX4 rating and up to 24 hours of battery life, Studio Buds brings quality Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency and for the first time ever, convenient one-touch pairing to both iOS and Android users. Color: White.

name: Showstopper
description: This spray roses and alstroemeria Bouq is putting on a show, but the real star is a beautiful succulent that can be saved and replanted by the lucky recipient! The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Unwind Mini Gift Box
description: This gift includes Latika Muscle Bath Soak, Coastal Calm Travel Size Body Butter, Baudelaire Therapeutic Unwind Bath Cube, Apotheke Canvas Mini Tin Candle, and Kind Lips Sweet Mint Chapstick. Comes neatly packaged in a beautiful gift box tied with a satin ribbon.

name: Manifestation Journal
description: The Manifestation Journal is the perfect place to manifest the life you deserve. “Less Planning, More Manifesting” is embossed in gold foil across the front of this 100% recycled paper journal to be a constant reminder that everything you want is within reach. Size: 5.5 x 8 in, 100 pages, wire binding.

name: The Works Bundle
description: The Works Bundle features all of your fan favorites for bath time. Includes the Dry Brush, Sparkling Bath Salts, Bath Board, Body Wash (8.5oz) and Body Oil (4oz).

name: 250G Indulge Black Box
description: A chic and classic spin on Gift Sets and Indulge Boxes. The black box is here for a very limited time and will be paired with a specialty imported caviar. The 250gm Black Indulge Box includes a custom ROE presentation box, four Mother of Pearl Spoons, and a ROE key. Serves 6-8.

name: Dusty Rose Maternity Robe
description: This silky soft, comfy maternity robe in an elegant dusty rose color is the ultimate luxury maternity wardrobe staple that elevates mom-to-be’s routine. She’ll feel extra cozy and beautifully feminine wearing this dusty rose robe around the house all throughout pregnancy, from swanky Babymoon to welcoming her baby at the Hospital.

name: Women's Cashmere Blend Calf Sock 3-Pack
description: Imagine the coziest sweater you've ever worn, now times that by 100 and imagine your feet feeling like that, all the time. Just when you thought there was nothing more comfortable to possibly make socks out of, Bombas threw you a curveball and mixed in cashmere. This takes their next-level soft Merino Wool blend socks, and launches them into the comfort stratosphere.

name: Men's Dress Calf Sock 4-Pack
description: A little shorter than Bombas' normal dress sock, hitting mid-calf. That makes these a little more casual, but with all the same comfort innovations and sock tech as Bombas' regular dress socks.

name: Monogrammed Tilly Large Tote
description: Simple, but far from basic. This bag features dual straps with an interior zip pocket, as well as a flat base for stability. Accented with Italian Vegetable tanned leather, as well as a top snap closure, this bag solves a lot of problems while remaining chic.

name: World Central Kitchen Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide fresh meals to communities in need.

name: Chai Me Up Loose Leaf Tea Blend
description: This warming chai blend is what sweater weather was made for. Sencha green tea mixes with traditional chai spices like ginger, cinnamon, and nutmeg for an unforgettably cozy tea. Loaded with antioxidants and aids digestion. Crafted with 100% pure ingredients with no added sugar, flavorings, preservatives, or anything else. Makes 25-30 cups.

name: Assorted Cookie Tin
description:
Sometimes the correct answer is “one of each,” but we think "two of each" is right the rest of the time. You’ve got the right to refuse to choose, so we put together these cookie cornucopias covering all the bases: fruity, corny, chewy, crispy, fudgy, and salty-sweet.

6 Ct. Tin contains 1 Compost Cookie®, 1 Cornflake Chocolate Chip Marshmallow Cookie, 1 Corn Cookie, 1 Blueberry & Cream Cookie™, 1 Chocolate Confetti Cookie, and 1 Confetti Cookie. All cookies are individually wrapped.

name: Treat Plates, Set of 4
description: This Treat Plate set of 4 makes a ritual out of everyday moments of sweetness - from vegan donuts to jammy pavlovas to box mix brownies. It’s a beautiful excuse to elevate your indulgences and take your pleasure seriously. The plates measure 6.5" in diameter.

name: Peace Lily Plant
description: The Peace Lily is a flowering tropical plant and is a wonderful symbol of calm and balance. Note that peace lilies are toxic to pets and people, make sure to place out of reach from our furry friends and children!

name: Box of 24 Macarons
description: The specialist in authentic high end French macarons, the freshness and quality of these meringue-based confections will melt in your mouth. Includes a box of 24 macarons.

name: Guts by Olivia Rodrigo
description: The sophomore album by 3-time Grammy Award-winning recording artist Olivia Rodrigo. Available here on vinyl. 2023, Geffen/Interscope/Geffen/A&M.

name: First Foods Set
description: The First Foods Set provides all of the developmental tools you need to set baby up for mealtime milestones, plus calm and confident parents.

name: International Committee of the Red Cross in support of Israeli and Palestinian Civilians Donation
description: The gift of giving! The ICRC has been present in Israel and the occupied territories since 1967. As a neutral, independent, humanitarian organization, the ICRC visits detainees in Israeli and Palestinian places of detention. They also help improve access to essential services like water and electricity in Gaza and support livelihood projects throughout the occupied territories.
brand: International Committee of the Red Cross

name: Star Wars Collection
description: The Star Wars Collection includes 2 decks of playing cards, the Light Side and the Dark Side. Featuring all original, breathtaking design showcasing iconic characters and scenes from the legendary film franchise.

name: Featherweight Cashmere Silk Frayed Edge Scarf
description: This super soft, airy scarf is framed by eyelash fringe for a stylish day to night look. Made of 60% cashmere, 40% silk. Measures 28" W x 78" L.

name: Red Light Neck Enhancer
description: Your neckline reveals true age, reverse time by softening the lines. This Red Light Neck Enhancer doses your décolletage with red and near-infrared (NIR) light: two powerful wavelengths known to diminish fine lines, reduce redness, boost your mood, and activate glowing skin. Skincare shouldn’t stop at the face. Add this powerful, portable décolletage device to your radiance rituals.

name: Planned Parenthood Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps protect and restore access to sexual and reproductive health care, including abortion.

name: Lunar New Year Bundle
description: This Lunar New Year Bundle is inspired by the year of the dragon and includes 9 eternity roses in Le Mini Square, 1 Le Mini Round, and a 2.4 oz votive candle. Individually illustrated, each scale depicts a beautiful dragon swimming through a sea of roses. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care.

name: Rectangular Baker
description: With curved corners and round handles, this semi-matte glaze Rectangular Baker is equal parts soft and sturdy. Bake and serve your favorite classic casseroles and cobblers with ease and elegance. Includes a matching lid, and measures 15x9.5x1" with 117.5oz capacity.

name: SoundLink Micro Bluetooth Speaker
description: It doesn't really matter what you're doing - hiking, biking, cooking dinner or hanging out. You need music. Bose designed a speaker that keeps pace with all of your adventures and delivers unmatched sound for its size. The SoundLink Micro speaker is small, but powerful, super rugged and waterproof. It features a tear-resistant silicone strap - so you can take it along wherever you go.

name: Nooner Lunch Box
description: Your new lunch date is wide, slim, lightweight, wide at the bottom for easy loading, and fits nicely inside most SCOUT totes. The outside pocket is perfect for napkins and utensils, energy bars, or other treats. Also makes a great insulated sunscreen bag for hot summer days. It measures 14.25" W x 8" H x 6" D.

name: Home Town Maps 16 oz Can Glass
description: This modern 16 oz Can Glass can be custom-made with a beautifully engraved map of ANY city or town in the U.S.  In the classic profile shape of a beer/soda can it will truly transform your bar top. Well Told takes pride in creating artwork that represents each town as best as possible.

name: Find Your People
description: In a world that's both more connected and more isolating than ever before, learn best practices on how to build community. By Jennie Allen.

name: The Knives + Stand
description: As featured in Oprah's Favorite Things 2021. This trio of knives are constructed to perfection, made from three layers of Japanese stainless steel and high carbon to be meticulously sharp and incredibly resilient. Their perfect match? The Stand, which we designed to store your knives in a show-stopping yet entirely practical way, with an entirely magnetic wooden body. This set includes The 8" Knife, The Serrated 6" Knife, The Almost 4" Knife and The Stand.

name: 11-Inch iPad Pro 128GB
description: With astonishing performance, superfast wireless connectivity, and next-generationApple Pencil experience. Plus, powerful new productivity and collaboration features in iPadOS 16. iPad Pro is the ultimate iPad. Available in Space Gray.

name: M.U.L.E. 12 Hydration Pack
description: CamelBak shifted gears to update your go-to pack so you're never left trailing behind. You get the same trustworthy M.U.L.E. with slight body modifications for a smooth ride and fit. It also features smart storage options, Air Support Back Panel, lightweight materials, and max ventilation to keep you feeling and looking cool on the trail.

name: Silly Scents Mini Inspiration Art Case
description: With the Crayola Silly Scents Mini Art Kit, kids have everything they need to unleash their creativity in vibrant and fragrant ways. This art set includes Mini Twistables Crayons that are fun to use and don't require sharpening, Slim and Broad Line Markers for drawing and coloring, 20 sheets of paper, and a convenient carrying case. Perfect for artists aged 3 and up, each art tool features a brilliant color and fun scent to spark inspiration. Stimulate young artists' senses and watch their imaginations come to life with this versatile kit.

name: Branded Aviator Carry-On
description: This best-selling carry-on is not only going to become your new favorite travel companion but it's also the most sustainable piece of luggage you'll ever own. Just the right size, packing 2-4 days worth of clothes and shoes, this carry-on features thoughtful details with 360 spin wheels, smart interior pockets and a removable laundry bag. TSA approved sizing, measures 13.7" x 21.7" x 9".

name: The Comfy Dream Blanket
description: The Comfy Dream Big Blanket is a GIANT 8' x 8' throw blanket you'll never realize you're sharing...that is, if you do share! Think almost 3 Comfys tall by 3 Comfys wide! Wrap yourself in ultimate happiness with this ridiculously cozy, hugged-by-a-cloud-feeling throw blanket.

name: Hand Soap Starter Set, Classic Variety
description: Your sink's new BFF (literally, forever). Blueland eliminated the single-use plastic waste of traditional hand soaps by creating one bottle made to last forever. Just fill with water, drop in a tablet and voila! Hydrating, foamy goodness at your fingertips. Each set makes three full bottles of Foaming Hand Soap for you to enjoy in 3 scents - Iris Agave, Perrine Lemon, Lavender Eucalyptus.

name: Carry-On Hard Shell Suitcase 21"
description: Fit more into your trip with a roomy carry-on that still fits in overhead bins. Perfect for those in-between-length getaways, this ultra-light suitcase with a super sturdy polycarbonate shell packs more punch with interior compression panels and a removable laundry bag for your dirty clothes. Breeze through the airport in style with luggage that features Japanese-crafted Hinomoto 360 degree wheels, TSA-approved lock, smooth gliding telescopic handle, and YKK zippers. It measures 22.8" H x 15.6" W x 9.8" D.

name: SOS Daily Rescue Facial Spray
description: A soothing, purifying, and repairing daily rescue spray for angry, stressed out skin. 100% Natural. Dermatologist Tested. Clinically Proven. SOS has received the National Eczema Association's Seal of Acceptance™ and is safe for all skin types.

name: Extra Virgin Hydrating Face Oil
description: This clean, super moisturizing yet featherweight formula is perfect for adding hydration to your face, neck, hands, or anywhere you might need a little more love. Each bottle contains 1oz/30ml.

name: On-the-Go Mini Karaoke Machine
description: Looking to bring karaoke fun everywhere you go? This mini karaoke machine speaker has everything you need to start a party, and in an adorably tiny package. With cool voice features like baby voice, KTV, male to female (and vice versa), you can bring professional-grade karaoke fun wherever you are. And if your voice gets strained from singing, put down the mic and just use the speaker to play your favorite hits, the 1200mAh battery provides 4 hours of continuous playback! Measures 4.33" x 2.76" x 1.97".

name: WWF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the World Wildlife Fund helps protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature.

name: Sigmatic Scrub 2-in-1 Brush Cleaning Tool
description: Achieve a quick and total clean with the 2-in-1 power of this solid brush cleanser and silicone texture. Outperforming instant brush sprays that only remove surface-level makeup residue and bacteria, the all-natural cleanser dissolves tough pigment and foundation stains while the silicone texture penetrates brush bristles to scrub it all away.

name: Salted Caramel Pretzels, 12 Pack
description: This heavenly combination of gooey, stretchy, sweet and salty will leave you on cloud nine! Includes 12 Milk Chocolate pretzels.

name: Astrology Greeting Card Set
description: Celebrate the people behind your favorite zodiac signs in your life by reminding them of all the things that make them special. Inside each card are key facts about the sign and an inspirational message of admiration based on its unique qualities. Each card set includes 12 folded greeting cards and kraft envelopes in a sliding gift box.

name: Legend by Bob Marley & The Wailers
description: Legend is a compilation album by Bob Marley and the Wailers. It was released in May 1984 by Island Records.

name: Bilboquet Wine Glass Set of 2
description: A pair of playful wine glasses in the French “ballon” style. Perfect for your everyday table wine, festive enough for your best bordeaux. Each pair comes in a set of two mismatching (but complimentary) color combinations, and holds 5oz each.

name: Cast Iron Garlic Roaster
description: Transform garlic into sweet, buttery spreadable magic with this purpose-built, cast-iron roaster. Just lop the head off a whole bulb, drizzle the garlic with oil, and let the roaster's engineered heat retention do the rest. Its vented lid maintains precise airflow to promote even cooking; side handles ensure safe transport from oven to table. This one's more than a party trick – it's a culinary tool that'll change the way you cook (and eat).

name: Mini Doses
description: Thirty of our bean-to-bite-sized mini bars in one pantry-ready package. Perfect for those who just need a daily nibble (or more!)

name: Topography Maps Rocks Glass
description: Well Told's bestselling 11 oz rocks glass features a detailed contour map with elevation data of the world's most iconic locations etched on a classic rocks glass. Designed and made with pride in the USA.

name: Hotel California by The Eagles
description: Hotel California is the fifth studio album by American rock band Eagles. Released on December 8, 1976, by Asylum Records, Hotel California was recorded by the band and produced by Bill Szymczyk at the Criteria and Record Plant studios between March and October 1976.

name: Soundcore by Anker P25i True Wireless In-Ear Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in your favorite tunes with the Soundcore by Anker P25i True Wireless Headphones. Enjoy detail-rich sound with 10mm drivers and thumping bass. AI-enhanced clear calls work with 2 built-in microphones so you can hear and be heard. The IPX5 water resistance rating helps protect your earbuds from the elements. And, with 22 preset EQs, you can customize your listening experience to suit your ears.

name: Constellation Bracelet
description: Write it in the stars when you're wearing this constellation bracelet! Each bracelet is adorned with CZ stones that make up the lovely stars of the constellation. Measures 9", one size fits most.

name: Herb Starter Bundle
description: The Herb Starter Bundle was created to help you get started with herbal medicine. This trio will help you manage stress, digestion and sleep - the natural way. It includes Daily Calm, Sleep Well, and Daily Digestion herbal remedies.

name: Small Filing Cabinet
description: With a sleek design and integrated lock and wheels, the Small Filing Cabinet is a compact and stylish companion for offices where space comes at a premium. Compact and low profile, it measures 20"H x 12"W x 20"D. It also has locking wheels and drawers (two keys included). Choice of color.

name: Round Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven, 3.5 qt
description: The Dutch Oven’s exceptional heat retention and circulation transforms even tough cuts into tender, fall-off-the-bone braises. Its light-colored cooking surface makes it easy to keep an eye on fond (and thus flavor) development, and the non stick enamel simplifies cleaning. Their proprietary Cloud Cover Lid boasts pea-sized dimples to trap steam and return moisture to your food. At two-thirds the size of their Award-Winning original, this French-made cocotte perfectly serves two (plus leftovers).

name: Diaper Cake Baby Bundle
description: Looking for the baby shower gift or decoration? Look no further! This diaper cake is wrapped in beautiful custom printed fabric and quality ribbons, and comes with upwards of 35 diapers (size 1). It sure to be the talk of the baby shower and the mom-to-be will love that it's made of diapers she can use for baby!

name: Small Steam
description: Rinse, steam, splatter, serve! This colorful, multitasking design is a 4-in-1 colander, steamer, splatter guard, and trivet. It’s made with food-grade silicone and reinforced by stainless steel. BPA and BPS-free. Dish-washer safe and heat-resistant up to 550 degrees fahrinheit. Includes one small steam.

name: We're Better Together
description: Showing that we're better together when we play, when we make music and when everyone pitches in, this beautifully illustrated kindness book celebrates people coming together to solve problems, support communities and honor differences.

name: Small Bowls, Set of 4
description: You'll use the Small Bowl in the morning for cereal, yogurt, grains, or ice cream. Each measures 6" in diameter and 2.8" tall.

name: Pink Pill Tray 3 Piece Set
description: Meet the Pill Tray Set! Tenn Prairie has combined the Original Match Holder, Pill Tray and the Palo Santo/ Smudge Sticks to make one super cute set. Each Pill Tray Set comes with three pieces: Original Match Holder, Pill Tray & Palo Santo or Smudge Stick.

name: Hyperbola Choker
description: More is more with this statement choker necklace, expertly crafted from mixed cut clear stones. Set on a sleek rhodium plated frame, it is designed to bring a touch of spellbinding drama to any look, whether a simple white shirt and jeans, or elegant evening wear. This choker is part of the Hyperbola family, designed by Creative Director Giovanna Engelbert for Collection I. Adjustable length measures 12.625" - 14.125" with a 1.375" W.

name: The Happy Camper Parlor Palm
description: The Happy Camper is a Parlor Palm Plant, a gorgeous slow-growing, easy-to-care-for, air purifier. At its mature height, it can reach 3-4 feet! This tropical 4" plant has been cultivated as an indoor plant due to its ability to thrive in low light conditions. The pictured 4.5" ceramic planter is included.

name: 2 LB Popcorn Gift Pail, Recipient's Choice
description: This gourmet popcorn gift tin is filled to the lid with two rich and delicious pounds of your favorite Funky Chunky flavor. This popcorn tin is the perfect sharing or gifting size for family gatherings.

name: Men's Originals Ankle Sock 4-Pack
description: This is the original. The first pair of socks they made, and still one of their best sellers. Two years of R&D helped  design it with key comfort innovations like honeycomb arch support, a seamless toe, and the blister tab.

name: Premium Top 8 Allergen Free Box
description: This snack box is a collection of 15 individually wrapped certified top 8 allergen free healthy snacks. All of the snacks included are free of milk, eggs, peanuts, treenuts, fish, shellfish, soy and wheat. It includes 2 Rule Breaker Cookie, 1 Sea Food Corp Fig Dried Fruit, 1 Partake Foods Cookies Chocolate Chip, 1 Blake's Strawberry Rice Crispy Treat, 1 88 Acres Sunflower Seed Butter Spread, 2 Kapop Ancient Grain Pop Chips, 2 Blakes’s Seed Based Protein Bars, 1 GoNanas Instant Banana Bread Packet, 1 BEAR Real Fruit YoYos, 1 Home Snack Foods Awesome Granola Original, 1 Homefree Organic Ginger Snap, Sngl, GF, and 1 Yum Earth Healthy Fruit Snacks.

name: Performance Jersey Golf Polo
description: Stay cool and comfortable with the Performance Jersey Golf Polo. Featuring a timeless polo collar and a classic three-button placket, this shirt effortlessly combines sophistication with sporty flair. This moisture-wicking polo is lightweight, quick-drying, and has UV-SPF40 protection so it can transition you from the office to the golf course seamlessly. Made from approximately 7 recycled plastic bottles.

name: Casual Friday Super Clip
description: Comfy, Casual and Cool. This Super Clip is going places! Like that feeling of freedom only a Friday afternoon can bring—throw your hair up and head out the door. Your go-to for easy up-dos, perfect for those dressed down days when comfort reigns, but sparkly gems are still on the brain. Small parts, not intended for children under 3 years.

name: Boarderie Ciccetti
description: The Ciccetti Cheese Board features hand selected artisan cheeses, charcuterie options, dried fruits, nuts and crackers sourced from around the world. This board serves 3-4 and arrives chilled, fully arranged and ready-to-serve in a beautiful reusable acacia wood board. Choice of assortment.

name: Branded Stanley 40oz Quench Tumbler
description: Constructed of recycled stainless steel for sustainable sipping, the Stanley 40 Oz. Quencher Tumbler offers maximum hydration with fewer refills. Commuting, studio workouts, day trips or your front porch, you’ll want this tumbler by your side. Cream color only.

name: Java G45 Coffee Grinder
description: The Java G45 utilizes machined aircraft grade aluminum and stainless-steel materials to deliver the world’s finest hand-held coffee grinder. It produces roughly 50g of grounds depending on the roast. It’s meticulously engineered for durability and ease of use: A retractable grinder handle converts to a carabiner attachment, a press-button release top cap allows quick access to the hopper, and the grinder knob attaches within the catch when not in use. What’s more, it has 50 grind settings, ensuring you can dial in the perfect grind size for your chosen brewing method on any adventure.

name: Non-Tipping Rocks Tumbler
description: Just add your favorite cocktail to the 10 oz Toadfish Rocks tumbler and keep your drink accident-free and always chilled. Includes built-in graduated measurements for the perfect pour and a shatter-proof lid with a removable slider. The Toadfish Rocks Tumblers hold on when others can't. Choice of color.

name: Redwoods & Wine Country Lunch Tour for Two, San Francisco, CA
description: Discover two of northern California’s most iconic experiences on this combo adventure into the Redwood forests and Wine Country. Meander through the mythic beauty of a giant California Redwood forest and explore the sun-soaked vineyards of Sonoma Valley and Napa Valley. Visit 3 boutique wineries and taste unique vintages and varietals and enjoy a 3 course lunch with wine pairing. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Customizable Tile Mat
description: Meet the all-purpose mat that is functional, beautiful, and, most importantly, completely customizable. Its timeless, vintage-inspired hexagon tile design and removable caps can be used to create endless patterns, designs, and words. Made with rubber-like Flexible Vinyl this gift includes 150 Black Tiles, with a mat measuring 18" x 30" x 0.25”.

name: Pee Pad, 20pk
description: Accidents are no big deal with these leak-resistant, worry-free Pee Pads. These are the first pee pads designed for travel carriers with a convenient smaller size. With an absorbent lining, leak-blocking edges, and adhesive stickers, they’re great for housetraining at home or containing messes on the go. Includes 20 20.8 x 11.6” pee pads.

name: Duet White Noise Machine with Night Light and Wireless Speaker
description: Fall asleep faster and sleep soundly with the help of the Yogasleep Duet Multi-Sound Machine and Night Light. Featuring 30 sound options including white noise, pink noise, brown noise, fan sounds, nature sounds, and 8 lullaby tracks. Stream your favorite sleep soundtrack, podcast, or music from your smartphone directly to the Duet speaker wirelessly. Rechargable with USB cord, cord included.

name: Organic Tahini Trio
description: Seed + Mill’s Organic Tahini is made from premium, Ethiopian sesame seeds. A perfect and nutritious ingredient to have on hand for cooking and baking, spreading and drizzling, or simply eating by the spoonful! This set contains three flavorful 16 oz jars of the classic Organic Tahini.

name: Face Your Allergies Bundle
description: Itchy eyes? Sinus pressure? This seasonal support bundle will help you feel like yourself again. It includes the Rose Quartz Mask and In the Clear herbal supplement.

name: Ice Stamp Set
description: Here's something you didn't know you wanted to do: customize your cubes. This tool from Marcellin lets you do just that. It's got a wooden handle and interchangeable stamp disks with designs inspired by classic tattoos or "Truth or Dare." Just attach your disk of choice to the tool, dip the head into lukewarm water, and press down on a cube for five-to-ten seconds, your ice just got cooler.

name: Bright Days Bouquet
description: The Bright Days bouquet includes 14 mixed stems of roses, butterfly ranunculus, matilda, scabiosa, and hebes. Please note that as flowers are a live product, colors and varieties may slightly vary from the photos shown to provide you with the freshest and most beautiful bouquet. Vase not included.

name: Women's Running Ankle Sock 6-Pack
description: Lightweight, purpose-built socks for running, working out and movement. Made with Hex Tec construction for breathability and moisture-wicking, and Proprietary poly/cotton blend yarns with comfort innovations like strategic zone cushioning and airflow ventilation. Specially designed to help you move with grace and speed. Includes 6 pairs. As always, six purchased = six donated.

name: Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking
description: In Quiet, Susan Cain argues that we dramatically undervalue introverts and shows how much we lose in doing so. She charts the rise of the Extrovert Ideal throughout the twentieth century and explores how deeply it has come to permeate our culture. Passionately argued, impeccably researched, and filled with indelible stories of real people, Quiet has the power to permanently change how we see introverts.

name: Glass Cookie Jars with Airtight Lid, Set of 2
description: Transform your kitchen into a haven of sweetness and sophistication with these exquisite Glass Cookie Storage Jars. Crafted with care and designed with airtight lids, these jars seamlessly blend form and function. Includes two 8" tall glass jars, each holding 0.5 Gallons.

name: Reusable Baking Mats, Set of 2
description: Whether you’re baking oatmeal cookies or roasting broccoli, these washable, reusable baking mats will set you up for success. A sustainable alternative to parchment paper, these nonstick mats are perfectly sized and designed for easy cleanup. They’re made from silicone and are dishwasher-friendly, BPA-free, food- and oven-safe, and FDA-approved. Includes a set of 2, each measures 16" long, 11" wide.

name: Lightweight Down Comforter, Full/Queen
description: This lightweight comforter is perfect for hot sleepers, with a cloud-like softness that comforts without the weight. Snuggle up to a perfect level of warmth and construction, each tucked within an ultra-soft, 100% long staple cotton shell. Ultra-soft baffle box construction ensures even distribution of warmth and coziness.

name: Monogrammed Extended Trip Expandable 4 Wheeled Packing Case
description: Equally striking from a distance or at close range, this expandable packing case boasts a modern silhouette with fluid-looking, angled lines. Made with a recycled polycarbonate shell, it's lightweight and flexible, yet still durable. It's ideal for extended business and leisure trips, or for group packing. The smooth and quiet four-wheel system combined with expandable packing ensures effortless travel. Protect what perfects your journey with PROTX2® technology. This item’s lining has been treated with the innovative anti-microbial coating to help prevent the growth of bacteria, mildew and mold that may cause fabric odor on its surface. It's dimensions include 20" W X 30.5" H X 11" D.

name: Ceramic 2-Wick Candle
description: Apotheke redesigned their best selling fragrance with this exclusive ceramic vessel that is beautiful to display. This candle has a 60–70-hour approximate burn time and is made from a soy wax blend. Includes 1 candle.

name: APOTHEKE Reed Diffuser
description: Carefully crafted with the highest quality alcohol-free, perfume-grade fragrance oils. It's uniquely designed to fill any space with a lasting, beautiful fragrance. The diffuser is 6.7 fl oz and lasts 3-4 months.

name: Brass Incense Holder
description: Fashioned from solid brass, the incense holder features a delicately chamfered edge, a small cavity for cone incense, and an interior hole for stick incense. This gift includes one incense holder measuring 0.8" x 0.5"H.

name: Branded Ember Mug², 10oz
description: Designed for home or office, the Ember Mug² does more than simply keep your coffee hot. This smart mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.

name: Red Bestsellers
description: There are moments when only a glass of non-alcoholic red will do, be it fireside, steakside, après ski, or to wash down a juicy burger. This four-pack combines Wine Proxies best-selling non-alcoholic reds for you to enjoy when you’re looking for something to warm you up from the inside. Please note that the bottles in this set rotate based on current bestsellers, and the flavors you receive may not always be the same as shown.

name: Women's Tri-Block Marl Ankle Sock 6-Pack
description: This tri-blocked ankle sock is architectural in design and pure Bombas in comfort, with high quality soft cotton yarn-work. As always, 6 Purchased = 6 Donated. Choice of size.

name: 291 Piece First Aid Kit
description: The Thrive Travel First Aid Kit is packed with 291 must-have pieces of hospital-grade medical gear. This complete home first aid kit is also ideal in an emergency road kit, adventure or military kit, nursing supply kit, and more. This emergency travel medicine kit is light enough to take on backpacker adventures, when camping, and even to sports events. It can be used as an earthquake survival kit, school nurse first aid kit, tactical medic kit, or as part of a family vacation or cruise safety kit to keep your kids safe.

name: Digital Gift Card, $100
description: A gift card to use towards a facial. A Heyday digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout. Please Note: Gift cards do not expire and can be redeemed online or at any Heyday location for products and services.

name: Refresh Essential Oil Kit
description: A bundle of 4 uplifting essential oil blends: citrusy Boost, happy Golden, herbal Pacific, and tropical Retreat. Perfect for making your home feel light and invigorated. Each bottle contains 5ml of 100% pure essential oil blend.

name: Valentine's Zac-Pac
description: The ultimate box of handmade chocolates! This small batch box of chocolates includes S'mores Chocolate Bark, 2 Cookie Butter Oreos, 2 Salted Caramel Pretzels, and 6 Oreo Truffles. This gift is for pre-order and will arrive between 2/9-2/14.

name: Caste: The Origins of Our Discontents
description: In this brilliant book, Isabel Wilkerson gives us a masterful portrait of an unseen phenomenon of an America shaped by a hidden caste system. A rigid hierarchy of human rankings that links the caste systems of America, India, and Nazi Germany, Wilkerson explores eight pillars that underlie caste systems across civilizations, including divine will, bloodlines, stigma, and more. Using riveting stories about people--including Martin Luther King, Jr., baseball's Satchel Paige, a single father and his toddler son, Wilkerson herself, and many others--she shows the ways that the insidious undertow of caste is experienced every day.

name: Checker Rings, Red Set of 2
description: The perfect set of 2. A classic checker pattern adorns these vintage dome inspired silhouettes. You'll love a checker print because it'll never go out of style. This stunner has a modern appeal to infuse a little fun into your daily stack. The dome height is 10mm.

name: Toys for Tots Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to Toys for Tots helps provide toys, books and other gifts to less fortunate children this holiday season.

name: Indulgence Relief
description: Undo when you overdo. Metabolize indulgence and support liver detox with Indulgence Relief tablets. A time-tested blend of Chinese herbs known as Curing Pill includes Organic Fenugreek, Milk Thistle + Ginseng. Because living a balanced life comes with big nights out too. 10 packets are included in each box.

name: Weekend Short
description: Your favorite short, now in fleece. Enjoy easy, cool comfort with a drawstring to keep them in place for all your day-of activities. Designed to be a comfy fit.

name: Personalized Whiskey Glass Set
description: Personalized with the name or initial of your choice, these custom whiskey glasses will be displayed with pride for years to come.

name: NAACP Donation
description: The gift of giving! NAACP’s mission is to ensure the political, educational, equality of minority group citizens of States and eliminate race prejudice.

name: Best Seller XL Cupcake & Cookie Variety Pack
description: Try Crumbs Bakeshop's best-selling cupcakes AND cookies! This set includes Two Red Velvet Cupcakes, Two Birthday Cake Cupcakes, Two Cookies and Cream Cupcakes, One Sprinkle Sundae Cookie Jar, One Oatmeal Raisin Cookie Jar, and One Chocolate Cherry Cookie Jar.

name: Stowaway Folding Cutting Board
description: The Stowaway folding cutting board is designed to easily fold, lock, and stow anywhere. Fits easily into kitchen drawers, boat boxes, tackle bags, and travel packs. When unfolded, it locks together to match the feel of a 1-piece design. Features non-slip rubber feet to grip any surface and a built-in knife sharpener so you’re never left with a dull blade. Dishwasher safe. Unfolded measures 12"x16", folded measures 3"x16"x1.5". Includes one cutting board.

name: White Jar Candle + Wood Lid
description: Soft nature and instrumental music begins to play as you put on your robe and slippers and light a candle. These 11oz White Jar + Wood Lid candles are your ticket to relaxation. Made with a vegan proprietary soy based wax blend, each candle has a 60+ hour burn time.

name: Monstera 'Swiss Cheese Plant', Large
description: A fan favorite, its perforated and waxy dark green leaves breathe life into any stale space. Easy to care for and unique in appearance, it quickly gained traction as a houseplant favorite on Instagram. Medium to bright, indirect light. Measures ~3' tall and arrives in a 10" grow pot.

name: Pottery & Canvas Painting Bundle
description: The Pottery & Canvas Painting Bundle is an opportunity to experience two different crafts in one bundle. It's also a great option if you'd like to create a matching pottery piece and canvas artwork to decorate your home. The bundle includes the original Sculpd Pottery Kit, plus a Large Abstract Canvas Painting kit with pastel paint colors.

name: The Date Night Cookbook
description: Date nights should be magical occasions filled with fun, flirting, and, most importantly, food! Whether you're nervously planning a first date, enjoying a lazy night in, enjoying some much-needed quiet time while the kids are at camp, or marking a special anniversary, The Date Night Cookbook is the perfect creative and memorable foodie accompaniment to your romantic plans.

name: 90 Minute Session
description: Flytographer connects you with hand-picked local photographers in over 350 destinations around the globe for fun, hassle-free photo shoots. Flytographer can capture your destination vacation and deliver the perfect travel souvenir, priceless memories. This 90 minute session includes 45 photos at multiple locations.

name: I Want My Hat Back
description: A bear's hat is gone, and he wants it back. Patiently and politely, he asks the animals he comes across whether they have seen it. Jon Klassen's beloved tale plays out in sly illustrations brimming with visual humor -- and winks at us with a wry irreverence that will leave readers of all ages thrilled.

name: Essential Kit
description: The perfect pairing for your all-around, general cleaning needs. This Essential Kit includes a 4 oz. Premium Deep Cleaning Solution and Standard Cleaning Brush. The Premium Solution is formulated using natural ingredients, completely biodegradable, and is safe on all materials including leather, suede, nubuck, canvas, vinyl, cotton mesh and more! Effectively cleans and conditions with 4 oz. of Premium Deep Cleaning Solution it can clean up to 100 pairs of sneakers.

name: Nappa Leather Toiletry Bag
description: Upgrade your travel accessories with this Nappa Leather Toiletry Bag, a luxurious yet practical way to store your grooming essentials. Made from high-quality nappa leather, this soft yet durable bag is designed to last. Its spacious interior features a main compartment large enough to hold full-sized bottles of shampoo, conditioner, and other grooming products, while the smaller pockets are perfect for storing smaller items like razors, toothbrushes, and cologne. It measures 10.6" L x 6.5" W x 5" H. Recipient's choice of color.

name: White Unicorn Piñatagram for Birthday
description: A magical piñata design, perfect for any celebration. Filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: Biscotti with Almonds and Dark Chocolate
description: T’a Milano’s bags of crunchy biscuits should be opened under supervision. The cantuccio biscuit with almonds and chocolate is just the right touch of sweet and tart, and goes well with any beverage. Contains 5.64 oz.

name: Wine Decanter
description: Crafted by artisans who have been producing the world’s finest glassware since the late 1800s, the Decanter is free of lead and heavy metals to be more durable and create a colorless clarity. The surface area is large enough to accelerate aeration, yet compact enough to avoid crowding your table. Durable enough to withstand over 1,500 industrial dishwashing cycles, the Decanter will be an essential part of your unwinding for years to come.

name: Dozen Branded Macarons
description: These custom macarons will make a great addition to any event or holiday! Kosher certified, dairy free, and gluten free.

name: Logitech Lift Vertical Wireless Ergonomic Mouse
description: Desk life getting you down? Lift yourself up with Lift Vertical Ergonomic Mouse, a comfy and intuitive wireless mouse with quiet clicks crafted specially for small-to-medium hands. Lift’s unique 57-degree angle elevates your wrist to give a feeling of relief, and sends a wave of comfort through the forearm and upper body. Scrolling feels second nature with SmartWheel, which easily shifts from precision to speed-scroll. Customize Lift ergo mouse using intuitive Logi Options+ Software.

name: Glow On-The-Go
description: Your passport for glowing skin. Wherever you may be headed, keep your skin fresh and hydrated with this new Glow On-The-Go set - each face oil packet is full of powerful antioxidants and skin-loving nutrients for a youthful, luminous complexion. 7 Travel Face Oil Packets (.1oz/3ml each) & Drawstring Pouch.

name: House Blend 4-pack, Whole Bean
description: 100% Colombian farm-fresh specialty house blend coffees, roasted to order. 4 x 12oz bags, whole bean.

name: Sonoma Valley Scenic Biplane Ride for Two, Sonoma, CA
description: Don your flying helmet, slide into a 1941 World War II open cockpit biplane and prepare to soar over the vineyards and rolling hills of the Sonoma Valley for 20 minutes with your guest. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Galaxy Buds Live True Wireless Earbud Headphones in Blue
description: The earbud designed to tune in to every moment. With an iconic shape and ergonomic design, a fit that lets in your natural surroundings, and a speaker optimized for a better experience. This is sound made for your ears.

name: Hopsulator 12oz Slim Can
description: Never experience another warm sip in your slim cans. Features Push-Lock™ Technology so you can easily insert and remove your cans without unscrewing the gasket. Cup-holder friendly and with a non-slip base, every sip from now on is ice cold.

name: Heart Stud, Single
description: External 14K Gold or Rhodium Plated with Internal Brass, Butterfly Back closure, measuring 3mm x 4mm. This is a single earring, not a pair.

name: Black and White Checker Ring, Single
description: Rellery's most recognizable Checker Collection that has gone viral on social media and on celebs. A classic checker pattern adorns this vintage dome-inspired silhouette. You'll love a checker print because it'll never go out of style. This stunner has a modern appeal to infuse a little fun into your daily stack. The Dome Height is 10mm.

name: Irie Power Face Oil
description: In Jamaican culture, "everything irie" means all is well. This clarifying face oil, enriched with a powerful trio of salicylic acid, neem seed, and turmeric root, leaves the skin feeling irresistibly irie. Packed with omega-3 fatty acids, vitamins, and antioxidants to combat congestion and inflammation, this fast-absorbing oil provides a radiant glow.

name: Traveler Power Bank and Hand Warmer
description: This sleek traveler power bank has your back when your phone decides to die right as you leave the house. Plus, with a built-in hand warmer, you can warm up frozen fingers in a flash. Compact and lightweight, it's perfect on-the-go! Rechargeable Battery has a 5500mAh capacity with an output voltage of 2.1A. Hand warmer heats to 105F-130F. Measures 4.61" x 2.56" x 1.20".

name: Engaged Box
description: She said yes! The Engaged Box is bound to get any bride-to-be excited for her next chapter. It includes Bling Brush from Baublerella, Bouquet Candle from Wheeler and Kane in a white glass vessel with gold detailed label, and champagne gummies from Sugarfina (Non-Alcoholic) all wrapped in a deluxe ivory paper box tied with blush satin ribbon.

name: 5-Piece Mini Tool Set
description: Combining the best of GIR's award-winning kitchen tools, the GIR 5-Piece Mini Tool Set is made for little hands and big ideas. It includes the Mini Spatula, Mini Flip, Mini Spoonula, Mini Spoon, and Mini Whisk. All BPA and BPS-free and made with 100% pharmaceutical-grade, platinum-cured silicone.

name: Compartés Signature Chocolate Gift Tower
description: A beautiful assortment of luxury chocolates handmade in Los Angeles. This chocolate gift tower features a stunning 20pc gift box, premium 2 bar gift set and a small gift box of traditional items like chocolate apricots, Oreos, turtles or marshmallows. The perfect gift set for any occasion! Varieties and chocolate designs may vary, but all are guaranteed to be delicious!

name: Insulated Flask
description: Fuel your next adventure with the Insulated Flask. The double walled, vacuum sealed VSSL holds 8 oz of your favorite beverage. Ready to be enjoyed on the trail, at the campsite or anywhere your adventure takes you the patent pending leak-proof double port drinking cap makes for easy drinking. Made from durable stainless steel, this Insulated Flask is the ultimate outdoor companion.

name: Pure Matcha, 100g Pouch
description: The foundational green superfood for energy, focus, and cellular health for all. Pure Matcha goes beyond Ceremonial Grade: freshly shade-grown and cold-processed in Uji, Japan for maximum antioxidant and amino acid content. It’s organically grown and certified radiation-free and heavy metal-free. It’s also vegan, gluten free, and non-GMO.

name: The Softest Throw
description: UpWest turned their super-soft winter scarf, fringe and all into a cozy blanket you can enjoy year-round.

name: Happy Birthday Cookie Cake
description: This classic cookie cake is baked fresh when you order, made using the highest quality ingredients and the results are obvious in every bite. Moist and chewy, this colossal cookie cake is made with real butter, whole eggs, and pure vanilla. Eat your cookie cake with a fork or your fingers, on plates, napkins, or right out of the box. Any way you slice it, our Big Cookie Cakes are still first in flavor. Due to the dough mixing process, all product may have come in contact with nut oils. Kosher certified.

name: Imagination Art Set
description: The Crayola Imagination Art Set features plenty of art tools to get kids creativity flowing! This inspiring art set contains 115 pieces in a colorful carrying case. The set includes 14 Washable Super Tips Markers, 15 Short Colored Pencils, 14 Washable Pip Squeaks Skinnies Markers, 56 Crayons, 15 Large Sheets of Paper. Also built into the case are 3 Rubbing Plates to create cool textured effects. It’s the perfect birthday or holiday present for kids ages 4 and up.

name: Ergonomic Chair + Standing Desk Bundle
description: This Ergonomic Duo Bundle combines Branch's best-selling Ergonomic Chair and new Duo Standing Desk to create a healthy, productive office in compact spaces. The desk's frameless design offers more legroom and stability with less weight and clutter than comparable desks. The Ergonomic Chair has seven points of adjustment for a complete fit: 3D armrests, height, tilt and tilt tension, seat depth and removable lumbar rest. The double layered mesh backrest offers durable, breathable support. The desk measures 36" x 24". Choice of desk and chair colors.

name: Cotton Baby Jersey Tee
description: Striking the perfect balance between comfort for younglings and toddler-specific durability, this infant fine jersey tee delivers on all fronts. Featuring side seams to better support the garment’s shape, these tees also come with ribbed knitting for improved durability and taped shoulders for a breezy fit. Solid colors are 100% soft ring-spun cotton, but heather colors include polyester.

name: Duo Standing Desk
description: The Duo standing desk brings movement to every space. The frameless design and compact size reduces weight and clutter, while an airy and welcoming silhouette helps the Duo suit multi-purpose spaces from a studio apartment to a team office. Equipped with a 20" adjustment range, two height presets, collision detection, and programmable reminders to stand, Duo punches above its weight with advanced sit-stand features without compromising on best-in-class stability. Assembly is a breeze with threaded inserts, and optional accessories make storage and cable management simple. Measures 36" X 24". Choice of color.

name: Rustic Wood Tray
description: This wooden tray is the perfect addition to your kitchen, bathroom, and home. It fits most soap dispenser bottles so you can have your hand and dish soap side by side. These rustic trinket dishes are also perfect on your countertop or vanity as a jewelry dish, key holder, and more! This tray measures 6.9" x 3.7" x .75".

name: It Ends with Us
description: Lily hasn't always had it easy, but that's never stopped her from working hard for the life she wants. And when she feels a spark with a gorgeous neurosurgeon named Ryle Kincaid, everything in Lily's life seems too good to be true. As questions about her new relationship overwhelm her, so do thoughts of Atlas Corrigan--her first love and a link to the past she left behind. When Atlas suddenly reappears, everything Lily has built with Ryle is threatened.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Cardian Sweater
description: That classic cardigan look but in cozy cashmere. With ribbed cuffs and faux horn buttons, this has timeless look that is layerable or standalone. This quality cashmere is incredibly long-lasting and three times as warm as wool, sourced sustainably and ethically.

name: Cabana Tote, Monogrammed
description: The quintessential carry-all for any season and personalized to you with a beautiful embroidered monogram. This vibrant, ultra-lightweight, and attractive tote has the strength necessary to stand up to any adventure. Features thoughtful details like interior slip and zippered pockets, a hook-and-eye top closure, and a sturdy leather base and tag. Made with premium sustainable materials like Ecocraft canvas and Oeko-Tex Standard 100 using 30 upcycled plastic water bottles. Choice of color and monogram inscription. Monogramming is in black stitching in capital letters, special characters not permitted, 3 character limit.

name: Monogrammed Gabby Make Up Bag
description: A no-fuss travel bag ideal that's quick to pack, easy to access and a breeze to clean.  You'll love the giant open design that lets you grab everything quickly and the mesh bag to protect pencils and store small tools.

name: Leather Jewelry Travel Case
description: Beautiful and functional, this travel case is perfect to take your favorite jewelry pieces wherever you go, tangle free. The perfect size for your next weekend trip or for when you only want to pack your most-loved pieces. Features four necklace hooks with pocket, six holes for earrings and a ring holder measuring 2" long. This case measures 4 x 4 x 1.4".

name: Valentine's Chocolate Heart Gift Bundle
description: Make hearts melt with this new premium Valentine's Chocolate Heart Gift Bundle, the perfect gift for that special someone. Featuring a Limited Edition 9 Piece Chocolate Heart gift box, filled with heart-stamped raspberry and strawberry bonbons, 2 of the most popular Valentine's themed chocolate bars, plus a box of their award-winning Hot Cocoa.

name: Pink Ribbon
description: This stunning all pink design in support of Breast Cancer Awareness Month. It includes premium flowers, glass Vase, and fresh Hand Delivery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Unseen Face & Body Set
description: This set features Supergoop's iconic invisible SPF from head to toe! This daily duo is scentless, weightless and leaves a natural finish.
