Use the #1 bestselling Unseen Sunscreen as a makeup-gripping primer or on a bare face, and pair with Unseen Sunscreen Body for easy, glide-on sun protection for body. Includes one Unseen Sunscreen 3.7 fl oz, and one Unseen Sunscreen Body 3.4 fl oz.

name: Twist Cuff, Single
description: A criss-cross cuff that will make you shout, in silver or gold. External 14K Gold or Rhodium Plated with Internal Sterling Silver, a cuff closure, measuring 8mm x 6.5mm. This is a single earring, not a pair.

name: Diamond Spiral Wave Tennis Bracelet
description: Feminine yet glamorous, this bracelet shines in a polished setting in real, solid .925 sterling silver. The tennis bracelet features a curved wave design that spirals around each beautiful round diamond for a unique and elegant bracelet you'll cherish forever.

name: Personalized Lara Large Shoe Tote
description: The big tote perfect for the quick overnight trip. The Lara tote has a separate zippered section to store all the kicks and keep everything nice and tidy, and features a water-resistant coated canvas exterior. It measures 16" (H) x 22" (L) x 9" (D), with a handle drop of 7". Includes personalization, choice of bag color and monogram text.

name: The Rain Cover
description: This high quality rain cover is made of highly waterproof fabric and taped seams to prevent any leaks, keeping your backpack and gear dry. It's self-packing for easy storage. Measures 5" x 3"  packed.

name: Football Rice Krispie 12 Pack
description: Perfect Treats for the Football fans of all shapes and sizes. Great for the team after the game, and great to munch on while watching the game.  Foil wrapped chocolate footballs on hot cocoa treats and cookie and cream treats.

name: Nappling, 8 lbs
description: A weighted blanket for kids to help them sleep better and feel calmer, naturally. Made of 100% organic cotton and measures 40”x60”. Bearaby recommends for kids ages 4+ and suggests a weighted blanket that is around 15% of your child’s body weight.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps bring independence back to our nation’s most severely wounded veterans.

name: Trio Garden
description: This fresh succulent garden arrives in a beautifully crafted planter gift box - ready to display and enjoy. Measures approximately 4 x 5 inches.

name: 450 Piece Puzzle
description: Inspiring 450 piece jigsaw puzzles that look good before, during and after completion.

name: 1 Month Couture
description: Choose any 1 couture item from thousands of luxury accessories. This one month membership allows you to choose 1 couture piece of jewelry, bag, or limited edition piece with a retail value up to $4,000. A Vivrelle digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address you provide within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription on Vivrelle's website.

name: Volt 12" Electric Pizza Oven
description: Ooni’s first electric oven, Ooni Volt opens new ways to make authentic, restaurant-quality pizza at home, indoors and out. It cooks delicious a 12" pizza in just 90 seconds from the comfort of your own kitchen year-round. This ultra-convenient oven can also be used outdoors for maximum versatility. The Ooni Volt 12 oven has a generous 13" cooking area and reaches its maximum heat of 850˚F (450˚C) in just 20 minutes. This oven is ideal for the novice pizza-maker as well as experts because it has finely tuned settings for different pizza styles such as Detroit, Neapolitan, and more. All you have to do is set your desired oven temperature and launch your pizza into the oven. It really is that simple.

name: Planned Parenthood Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps protect and restore access to sexual and reproductive health care, including abortion.

name: Beoplay HX Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Listen in comfort whether you're on a call, working from home or taking a moment for yourself. Soak in your favorite songs with a new level of fidelity. Custom-made 40mm drivers with neodymium magnets deliver a powerful and precise sound experience. Adjustable noise cancellation and highly sensitive microphones mean you'll never struggle to hear or be heard.

name: Italian Leather Pouch Travel Set
description: Introducing a new way to travel in style. Handcrafted from 100% Italian leather, this Pouch Travel Set is a chic way to organize any suitcase or weekender. The larger case is roomy enough for travel-size toiletries, while the small pouch is perfect for stashing anything from makeup to phone chargers. And though the vibe is pure luxury, the water-resistant microfiber interior ensures it can easily be wiped clean, so there’s no need to fear spills. The large pouch measures 6.5" H x 11" L x 3.5" W, and the small 5" H x 9" L x 3" W.

name: SPF Bestsellers Starter Kit
description: A trio of bestsellers to create your SPF skincare lineup, featuring Supergoop's OG clean SPF lotion, their invisible #1 bestseller and their glowy fan fave for head-to-toe protection. Nourish your skin from head to toe with the original clean SPF lotion, then get a boost of glow or a natural finish from the two cult-fave SPFs for face: Unseen Sunscreen and Glowscreen! Plus, you can take them anywhere in their reusable sunny yellow pouch. Includes Unscreen Sunscreen SPF 40 (0.5 fl oz), PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 (1 fl oz), and Glowscreen SPF 40 in shade Sunrise (0.5 fl oz).

name: Black Apothecary Matches
description: These stylish safety matches are the perfect compliment to any space. Modern, chic, and rustic in design, they are perfect for any room. Approximately one hundred 3-inch matches per jar.

name: Second Harvest Food Bank Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps distribute food through a network of nearly 400 partners at more than 900 sites across Santa Clara and San Mateo counties.

name: Purple Reign with Signature Vase
description: Give your favorite person the royal treatment. Lavender and ivory roses are the crowning glory in this 36 stem Bouq, along with stock, pink mums, and eucalyptus. Whether it’s for the love of your life, a real champion, your killer queen, or best friend, this Bouq’s kinda magic. Especially with the Signature Vase included. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Little Sheet Duo
description: Even the smallest ovens can fit Little Sheet, these quarter-sized sheet pans made with Great Jones' signature nonstick, nontoxic coating. It's perfect for baking a personal portion of cookies or reheating leftovers. Set of 2, each measuring 13" x 9.5" x 1".

name: Pumpkin Spice Loose Leaf Tea Blend
description: This caffeine free tea is made with real pumpkin pieces, with an infusion of apple, and warming Chai spices. Crafted with 100% pure ingredients, no added sugar, flavorings, preservatives or anything else. Loose leaf tea, makes 25-30 cups. Makes a great latte, just add frothed milk.

name: Rooted Candles
description: Burn, plant, and grow! This ceramic candle vessel transforms into a planter after the flame has burned down and includes seeds to grow lavender. 6oz soy-blend candle and seed packet are packaged inside a beautifully designed box for easy gifting.

name: Baby Dinner Set
description: Cleverly designed for children who want to start self-feeding. A perfect present that comes in a cute gift box. The plate’s trefoil shape makes scooping up food easier, while the strip underneath prevents the plate from sliding around. The spoon and fork are shaped to not slide down into the plate, and the short handles are easy to grip. The cup is stable and easy to hold, and its contents can be seen through the frosted plastic. The bib’s soft neckband is adjustable, and the deep spill pocket catches food and mess. This baby dinner set is perfect for children who want to start self-feeding (and parents who want to minimize messiness). Best suited for babies ages 4 months +. All products are dishwasher safe, BPA-free, PVC-free.

name: Miracle-Set Diamond Round Faceted Bezel Tennis Bracelet
description: This feminine and luxe tennis bracelet is made up of the most lovely, multifaceted rose cut diamonds, reminiscent of vintage-era Art Deco jewelry style. Set in real, solid .925 sterling silver links for a timeless style, in your choice of precious metal finishes. The diamonds are naturally mined from conflict-free sources and give a wonderful sparkle. The diamonds are set in an illusion setting with faceted round bezel frames, to give a much bigger and more sparkly look.

name: UTOPIA by Travis Scott
description: Utopia is the fourth studio album by American rapper Travis Scott. It was released through Cactus Jack and Epic Records on July 28, 2023.

name: Galaxy Buds FE Wireless Earbud Headphones in Graphite
description: Meet Galaxy Buds FE, the new audio solution that fits perfectly into your workday. With a newly redesigned wingtip and your favorite Galaxy innovations, you can stay locked in to your workflow comfortably with the great sound quality and features you expect from Samsung.

name: European Linen Sheet Set, Queen
description: These European linen sheets offer year-round luxury and feel as good as they look. Ethically woven from the finest flax, this mid-weight linen sheet set is pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, and only gets softer over time. Includes a queen size fitted sheet, a queen size flat sheet, and 2 standard size pillowcases. Fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 16" deep and has elastic all the way around. Woven from 100% European flax.

name: Happiness
description: A modern design featuring red and copper blooms, accented with grasslike greenery. It includes premium flowers, a glass vase, and fresh hand delivery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Small Batch Granola 3 Bags
description: Hampton Grocer is a super nutty granola brand that features nostalgic and unique flavors. They sweeten their granola naturally and take pride in their ingredients.

name: Kids Propolis Throat Spray
description: Everyday immune support for your kiddo with antioxidants, vitamin C, zinc, iron, B vitamins, and over 300 other beneficial compounds. Contains flavonoids and polyphenols that fight free radicals and combat oxidative stress. Soothe the littlest throats with buckwheat honey. For children 2-12 years old, 4 sprays, 2 times per day are recommended for immune support that’s worth sharing with the whole family. Contains 1.06 fl oz.

name: Meals on Wheels Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps support the local programs that keep seniors safe and living independently nationwide.

name: Sweet July Organic Room Spray
description: Experience the Sweet July home fragrances all around your home to help calm, soothe, and inspire. Includes one bottle of room spray, each holds 4oz/118ml. 100% natural.

name: Skincare Essentials Gift Set
description: The Everyday Face Wash and Repairing Night Cream are made with a safe and effective blend of anti-inflammatory, oil reducing, hydrating and acne-punishing ingredients that will keep your skin clear and vibrant.

name: Monogrammed Modern Collection Wine Carrier
description: This Modern Collection double wine bottle carrier is a gift that they will never forget. With faux shearling lining on the inside, this insulated wine tote keeps your wine bottles safe in transit. Includes a gold foil monogram.

name: My America: Recipes from a Young Black Chef: A Cookbook
description: Featuring more than 125 recipes, My America is a celebration of the food of the African Diaspora, as handed down through Onwuachi's own family history, spanning Nigeria to the Caribbean, the South to the Bronx, and beyond.

name: Snack Gift Basket Classic
description: Brimming with treats both sweet and savory, this elegant gift is sure to delight at any occasion! Inside a beautiful wood gift crate, you will discover an unparalleled assortment of artfully arranged gourmet snacks and decadent treats. Complete with deliciously crisp cookies, savory cheese, and sweet kettle corn.

name: Olivia Organizer Pouch
description: Keep your main carry or travel bag neat and orderly with the Olivia Pouch. Featuring accordion-style internal pockets, it’s the perfect way to carry phone-keys-wallet in one easy-to-reach pouch, or keep those little items from hiding at the bottom of your bag.

name: Premium To-Go Kit
description: Get moving with Firebelly's best-selling Stop-Infusion Travel Mug plus 3 essential loose leaf teas. Steep the perfect cup of tea on-the-go with no mess or leaks, and keep it hot or cold for hours (there’s a reason it’s been featured in publications like New York Magazine). Plus, have the perfect tea on hand for any day, any time, any mood, with 3 fan-favorite teas in sustainable compostable pouches. Tea blends make 75-90 cups in total.

name: HydroBak Light Hydration Pack
description: Lighten up and stay hydrated, wherever adventure calls. The Hydrobak Light carries a 1.5-liter Crux Reservoir with Quicklink disconnect, plus an extra 1-liter of cargo space for basic essentials so you can carry on. Designed with lightweight and durable materials, the streamlined silhouette features an Air Support Light Back Panel and a ventilated harness for cooling and breathability.

name: Chocolate Jewels, 6 Piece
description: ChocAllure brings a visionary approach to the chocolate world, that treats chocolate making as an art. Each Chocolate Jewel has an intricate and artistic design and is layered with exquisite ingredients and textures. This box includes 6 flavors, a collection of ChocAllure's legendary seasonal chocolates with flavors such as Salted Caramel Cheesecake, Hot chocolate and Marshmallow, and Caramel Apple. Flavor assortment varies per box.

name: Trapeze Lesson for Two, East Meadow, NY
description: Have you ever wanted to run away and join the circus? Or maybe you've dreamed of flying through the air or swinging by your knees. Well now is your chance with this trapeze lesson in New York! Review basic techniques on the ground followed by in air instruction and experience the thrill of swinging through the air and being caught by a teacher. No extreme upper body strength is required, making this great for all athletic abilities. Includes an experience for two.

name: Stainless Steel Carafe and Wine Glass Set
description: This beautiful insulated wine carafe holds a full bottle of wine and will keep it chilled at the same temperature you poured it for hours.  Paired with a matching set of 8 oz stainless steel wine glasses you can enjoy your favorite chilled wine anywhere.

name: Check-In Hard Shell Suitcase 24"
description: Pack it all in. Yes, all of it. This ultra-light check-in bag with a super sturdy polycarbonate shell is an organizer’s dream. This suitcase features interior compartments with a compression panel to help you pack more, plus a removable laundry bag for your dirty clothes. Breeze through the airport in style with luggage that features Japanese-crafted Hinomoto 360 degree wheels, TSA-approved lock, smooth gliding telescopic handle, and YKK zippers. It measures 26" H x 19" W x 11" D.

name: Off Road Growler
description: The 64oz growler that keeps your beer carbonated AND cold. Trusty double-wall construction takes care of the temperature, keeping contents cold for 36 hours, or hot for 24, while a leakproof pressure-lock seal keeps the bubbles inside where they belong. A wide mouth lets you gulp heartily, and the ergonomic lid-mounted handle detaches for heavy two-handed swigs using the ridged grips.

name: Slim Wallet
description: The Slim Wallet is a savvy solution to carrying all types of currency wherever the world takes you. The wallet’s bifold, snap-close construction locks in bank cards and cash while a zippered side pocket keeps loose change secure. The slender size of this everyday accessory allows it to fit in the smallest of spaces, and with a lightweight coated canvas body, it’s also easy to clean. Dimensions are L 7 ¾” x H 4”.

name: Bubbly Eye Gels
description: Looking to lift your skin’s spirits? These bubbly eye gels will do the trick. Formulated with Orange Extract, Resveratrol (from grapes!), and Niacinamide, it’s the perfect cocktail for environmental protection, anti-aging, and brightening. Sip, sip, hooray to that! Includes 15 pairs per jar.

name: No Kid Hungry Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps connect vulnerable kids in communities around the country with the nutritious food they need to grow and thrive.

name: The Extra Virgin Olive Oil Gift Set
description: The Duo Gift Set includes "Sizzle" cooking EVOO and "Drizzle" finishing EVOO together in one pristine (and adorable) ready-to-gift box.

name: 100% Mullberry Silk Pillowcase, Queen/Standard
description: Upgrade your beauty sleep with 100% mulberry silk. Sleeping on a silk pillowcase keeps your skin and hair hydrated, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and minimizes dreaded bed head. Plus, silk fiber contains 18 kinds of amino acids that make it amazing for skin nourishment, hypo-allergenic, and naturally thermoregulating to help maintain body temperature. Standard size measures 20" x 30", 22mm fabric weight, includes one pillowcase.

name: Edison Mini Lantern
description: Inspired by old mining and warehouse lights, this water and rust-resistant steel lantern creates an intimate space anywhere. Light enough to hang creatively from a tree branch. Power by USB (included), or utilize two AA batteries (not included) for light on the go. Runs for 20+ hours on low and 5+ hours on high.

name: No Kid Hungry Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps connect vulnerable kids in communities around the country with the nutritious food they need to grow and thrive.

name: Elite Series 2 Core Wireless Controller for Xbox
description: Experience the Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2 featuring adjustable-tension thumbsticks, wrap-around rubberized grip, and shorter hair trigger locks. Experience limitless customization with interchangeable components and exclusive button mapping options in the Xbox Accessories app

name: Ghia Apéritif, 1 Bottle
description: Ghia is a non-alcoholic apéritif made with the purest ingredients. Vibrant, fresh and satisfyingly bitter, it tastes like summer on the rocks. Nothing to buzz you or to make you snooze. This versatile apéritif brings depth to any Spritz, just add bubbles.

name: TB1 Sport Shaker Bottle
description: The TB12 Sport Shaker Bottle bottle has your day’s nutrition and hydration needs covered, so you can be ready for anything. The BlenderBall® wire whisk quickly mixes protein, and the odor-free and thoughtfully engineered materials ensure you'll never taste yesterday’s TB12 Plant-Based Protein smoothie in today’s water.

name: Candier I Love You More Than Ice Cream Candle
description: Everyone needs a cutie like you to laugh with, cuddle up to, and occasionally make bad decisions with. Honey, honestly, you complete me. Notes of Soft Serve Ice Cream, Smooth Buttercream, Gourmand, and Vanilla. Made of 100% natural soy wax, fragranced with essential oils, with a 60+ hr burn time.

name: Men's Cushioned No Show Sock 4-Pack
description: Like other Bombas, these No Shows are designed for comfort while being specially engineered to never fall down. They provide maximum coverage and stay in place just below the edge of your shoe, exactly where they're supposed to be. The best-looking socks no one will ever know you're wearing. As always, 4 Purchased = 4 Donated.

name: Less Stress Care Package
description: Soothe stress with aromatic gifts from head to toe, six cookies, and a meme-themed greeting. This gift includes fuzzy, lavender-filled eye mask, a lavender hand lotion, lavender lip balm, a lavender scented candle, six you-deserve-these cookies, as well as bright and cheerful packaging that’s a treat in itself.

name: Staff The Plunger
description: Bring some joy to your bathroom, especially when you need it most. Complete with a sleek and sanitary drip tray. Plus a bronze ring for a little razzle dazzle. Measures 23.4" high with a 6" diameter base.

name: Pink Cakesickle Kit
description: An ode to the golden year: 2016. There was a Pantone God and her name was Rose Quartz. The Millennial Pink Cakesicle Kit takes us back to a trend that we refuse to let go of…and for good reason! This kit includes a round Cakecicle Mold, Melting Candy in snapdragon and optic white, Rosé All Day Sprinkles, and Champagne Rose Gold Edible Glitter.

name: Stainless Steel Cocktail Shaker and Rocks Barware Set
description: Upgrade your barware assortment with these indoor/outdoor insulated rocks glasses with matching cocktail shaker. Insulated to keep ice melt at bay and double walled so they don't sweat, they will keep cocktails tasting great from the first pour to the last sip. This set includes an Insulated stainless steel cocktail shaker and 2 stainless steel rocks glasses.

name: SunnyDays SPF 30 Tinted Sunscreen
description: A 2-in-1 mineral sunscreen with broad spectrum UVA/UVB SPF 30 protection and light-medium coverage. SunnyDays evens redness and soothes UV-stressed skin while maintaining a natural finish so your freckles, moles, and real skin can have their moment in the sun! Designed for problem/sensitive skin.

name: Matte Lip Balm, 4 Pack
description: Deeply hydrate, smooth and soothe your dry, chapped lips on-the-go without the shine. Infused with Cactus Extract and Ceramides, this moisturizing lip balm may become your best friend after one use. Comes in packs of four.

name: 2 Dozen Red Roses in Vase
description: A classic design featuring 24 premium hand-picked roses, accented with seasonal greenery. Glass vase included. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Edison Light Stick
description: A completely unique collector's item. This vintage-inspired light stick is an outdoor lantern and emergency flashlight in one. Dual lighting options make it ideal for camp or a luxury backpacking item: light up your tent with the lantern. Includes 1 edison light stick, 1 USB-A to USB-C cable, 1 Barebones specific LI-ION Battery, and 1 muslin carry bag.

name: 10.9-Inch iPad 64GB
description: Loveable. Drawable. Magical Colorful. Incredibly capable. Even more fun. Meet the magical, colorful, all-new iPad Unbelievably capable. Unmistakably iPad. Colorfully reimagined and more versatile than ever. With an all-screen design, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, and four gorgeous colors.

name: Color of Change Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Color of Change designs campaigns powerful enough to end practices that unfairly hold Black people back, & champion solutions that move us all forward.

name: Nursing Friendly Sleeved Wrap
description: This super soft, lightweight Nurtured 9 nursing cover with sleeves is a cozy extra layer to keep a Mom-to-be or new Mama extra comfy at home. The design of this breastfeeding wrap keeps her hands free for snuggles and snacks, while also offering coverage if she’s a nursing Mama. One size fits all.

name: UNICEF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to UNICEF USA helps ensure the world’s most vulnerable children get the nutrition, water, protection, education and health care they need to survive and thrive.

name: Sampler Gift Box
description: Can't decide on which flavors to try or looking to sample them all? These Gift Boxes are filled with 8 bags of Hampton's top selling popcorn flavors and are beautifully wrapped with silver ribbon. Flavors include 1.5 oz. Bag of Butter Popcorn, 2 oz. Bag of Orange Cheddar Cheese Popcorn, 2 oz. Bag of Kettle Popcorn, 4.5 oz. Bag of Caramel Popcorn, 5 oz Bag of Chocolate Caramel Sea Salt Crunch Popcorn, 5 oz Bag of Cookie and Cream Popcorn, 5 oz Bag of Peanut Butter Cup Popcorn, and a 5 oz Bag of White and Dark Chocolate Swirl Popcorn. Kosher Certified.

name: Ball Boy Scented Candle
description: A luxury scented candle commemorating the historic moment when Prince® and Vacation® employees at the 7th Annual Interoffice Tennis Championships stumbled upon an insight that would change the trajectory of the Vacation® Sunscreen Company forever. Scent include Freshly Uncanned Tennis Balls, Vacation® Sunscreen, Prince® Cotton Sweatbands, and Courtside Cucumber Sandwiches.

name: Family Style 5-Piece Cookware Set
description: This five-piece collection of essential cookware includes a mix of cast-iron and stainless-steel designs. With this set, you can pare down clutter and focus on the pieces you actually need to cook confidently. The four stainless designs share lids and nest to save space. This set includes The Dutchess, Big Deal, Deep Cut, Saucy, Small Fry, 1 Big Lid, and 1 Small Lid.

name: 1000 Piece Puzzles
description: Puzzles improve critical thinking skills, memory recall and encourage collaboration. This assortment of 1000 piece puzzles provides for the perfect family activity, conversational piece, mental challenge and exercise as well as an opportunity to escape and focus on each piece of inspiration. Puzzles of Color puzzles are made to be glued, framed and displayed and make for a great centerpiece addition to any wall.

name: 7 Quart Slow Cooker
description: This Slow Cooker creates delicious meals while you go on with your day. Place the ingredients in the morning and have dinner by the time you get home. It's dishwasher safe, with a removable glass lid and ceramic pot to make serving easy and clean up a snap. This slow cooker works for your fast, on the go lifestyle. The beautiful quilted red exterior adds a modern aesthetic to your kitchen.

name: PowerPort PD 2 Bundle
description: Anker's PowerPort Classic PD 2 is equipped with a USB-C power delivery port, and loaded with 18W of output power to give the latest iPhones and a full-speed charge, 0-50% charge in just 30 minutes. This paired with a USB-C to Lightning fast-charging cable means you're ready for high speed charging right out the box.

name: Collapsible 12 oz Cup
description: Not too big, not too small, the 12 oz is just right for everything. Fits standard cupholders so you can take it with you everywhere, and you’ll always be ready for a spontaneous cup of coffee. Cup is made of LFGB Certified silicone, lid and heat sleeve are made of BPA-free polypropylene. Dishwasher safe, comes apart for easy cleaning.

name: Salt Cellar
description: This Salt Cellar is designed with a wide, open top and organic shape inspired by the waning crescent moon. Grab a pinch and season freely with nature’s purest mineral. Salt has never had a chicer home.

name: Half-Dozen Vegan Cake Donuts
description: Moist and delicious, enjoy one or all of these famous flavors of handmade vegan cake donuts! All of Southern Roots baked goods are vegan friendly, which means no dairy, eggs or animal products. Other great stuff you will find in their baked goods - no nuts and no fake ingredients. The donuts come in heat-sealed packages to preserve freshness.

name: Champagne Diamond 11 Stone Band
description: Crafted in 14kt yellow gold plated 925 sterling silver, this timeless look features 11 round sparkling diamonds; each with a color rank of K-L and clarity of I1-I2. These stunning diamonds are beautifully channel-set in a slim design. Radiant with 1/2 cttw of shimmering diamonds and a bright polished shine, this ring is just her style.

name: Toddler Organic Cotton Gripper Ankle Socks 8 Pack
description: Wrap your little one in comfort from their head to their tiny toes. Crafted in soft organic cotton, this 8-pack of socks was designed with all the premium details like the cushioned footbed and seamless toe. These cushy socks also include springwave arch support for extra comfort, blister tabs to shield the ankle from unwanted friction, and non-skid gripper dots.

name: Extra Virgin Face Moisturizer
description: The only moisturizer you’ll ever need. Ultra hydrating, antioxidant-rich moisturizer for all skin types. This innovative, proprietary formula is an emulsifier-free, all-natural moisturizer with effective, ultra hydrating and soothing benefits. Bottle includes 1.7oz/50ml.

name: 100% Italian Nappa Leather Belt Bag
description: There’s a science to the perfect mini bag. This one holds the exact right amount of accessories and can be worn like a belt, or across your body. It should also be buttery-soft, so Quince crafted it from 100% Italian Leather. It measures 5 1/4" H x 7 3/4" W x 2" D. Your choice of bag color and belt size.

name: NBALAB Ping Pong Paddles
description: Official NBALAB Ping Pong Paddles designed by artist Vic Garcia who reimagines the heritage and culture of each team and brings his freestyle creative ethos to this new canvas.

name: Premium Bundle
description: The right tools for all your premium shoe care needs. Maintain, clean, and protect your delicate materials. The Premium Bundle includes a 7oz Ready To Use Foam, Premium Brush, Micro Fiber Towel, Suede Cleaning Kit and 5.4oz Repel.

name: Premium Snack Gift Basket
description: Traditional and elegant, this Snack Gift Basket is guaranteed to delight! Inside an elegant crate an assortment of irresistible foods is arranged. Boasting gourmet treats that are loved by all, including delightfully crisp cookies, kettle corn, smooth aged cheese, and hearty crackers.

name: Vintage Linen Throw
description: This timeless linen throw offers a vintage look and lived-in feel. Made of thick, garment washed linen for soft texture and finished with casual fringe. It measures 50" x 70".

name: PLAY Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract, 1 oz
description: A fast-absorbing, non-greasy SPF face & body lotion that hydrates skin & is water- & sweat-resistant for 80 minutes. This clean, dermatologist-tested sunscreen lotion is perfect for active days in the sun. With high-performance protection against UV & infrared radiation, this formula nourishes skin with proven ingredients while also helping to prevent photoaging & dehydration. Contains 1 fl oz.

name: Signature Essential Oil Kit
description: This is the core 4. This bundle of Vitruvi's 4 most legendary essential oil blends includes the grounding Legacy, soothing Sleep, refreshing Pacific, and warm Golden. A perfect harmony of floral, citrus, herbal, and woodsy aromas. 100% pure, vegan, and cruelty-free.

name: Cocktail Smoking & Infusion Kit
description: This simple set allows you to infuse cocktails with rich, smoky flavor. All you’ve got to do is set some wood chips on the base, light the chips with your torch until they start to smoke, and cover it all with the cloche for a few minutes to infuse. As for the torch itself, just add a little butane (easy to grab at your local convenience store), fire it up, and get to smoking. When you're not drinking, use it to crisp up the fat caps on a steak, melt cheese over your soup, or brûlée your crème. This set includes a glass cloche, oak smoking platform, and butane torch with adjustable flame.

name: Disney King Magnifico’s Castle Building Toy Set
description: Kids aged 7 and up help solve a mystery with the LEGO Disney King Magnifico’s Castle (43224) buildable playset. The box holds a 4-level Wish castle from the upcoming film from Walt Disney Animation Studios, and includes a kitchen with a fireplace and bakery counter, a mirrored closet and a room with removable pyramid roof.

name: Rocks Glasses, Set of 6
description: 10oz of lead-free crystal clarity, showcasing your amber elixir like a champ. The heft feels just right in your hand, whether you're a seasoned connoisseur or a curious newcomer. Think neat pours, ice-cold Manhattans, or smoky old fashioneds. The Faye whiskey and bourbon glass handles it all, and cleans up like a dream in the dishwasher. Plus, this tumbler glass arrives gift-ready, so you can spread the whiskey love (or keep them all for yourself!). Includes a set of 6 tumblers each holding 10 oz.

name: European Linen Duvet Cover Set, Queen
description: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, this mid-weight linen flax duvet cover set offers year-round luxury and feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, this linen only gets softer over time. Set includes full/queen sized duvet cover and 2 standard size shams. Duvet includes button closure and corner ties to keep comforter in place. Made from 100% European flax.

name: Branded Carter 12oz Slide Mug
description: Coffee that’s ready when you are. The uniquely angled lid slides open with the flick of a thumb for mid-commute coffee breaks, then effortlessly slides back securing your drink and locking in heat and flavor. The heat-lock double wall vacuum keeps drinks hot or cold for 6 hours. Fits in car cup holders. Made of 18/8 stainless steel, BPA-free plastic lid, inner True Taste ceramic coating. Features your logo engraved front and center.

name: Our Missing Hearts
description: From the #1 bestselling author of Little Fires Everywhere, comes the inspiring new novel about a mother’s unbreakable love in a world consumed by fear. Hardcover.

name: Le Petit Round Eternity Roses
description: Le Petit Round is like a miniature garden inside a Parisian hat box. It features seven immaculate Eternity Roses in the color of your recipient's choice, on a lush bed of green moss, and comes in The Petit Round black hatbox. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care. This stunning arrangement brings style and grace to any small or medium-sized space. Box measures 5 x 5 x 4.5. Includes one arrangement, choice of rose color.

name: Saturday Sweatshirt
description: With a perfectly lived-in feel that rivals that of your most-loved sweatshirt, this one is the ultimate closet staple. This unique French terry is based on a vintage Japanese fabric that boasts a looser knit for an ultra-soft feel.

name: Orchard's Abundance
description: Inside a water hyacinth gift basket, juicy oranges, crisp apples, and sweet pears are artfully arranged along with an assortment of delicious gourmet foods. Complete with Vermont cheddar cheese, chocolate-covered cherries, butter peanut crunch, Belgian chocolates, crackers, and a salted caramel sauce. This classic arrangement is perfect for any occasion.

name: Sophie Lou Jacobsen Single Ripple Cup
description: A wavy borosilicate glass drinking cup, perfect for a tall glass of water, beer, mixed drink, iced coffee, smoothie, or any other drink of your preference. Each glass holds 12 oz and measures 4.5"H x 3"W. Includes 1 glass, choice of color.

name: Kids 100% Cotton Poplin Smocked Dress
description: Cottagecore, but make it kid-size. This 100% Cotton Poplin Smocked Dress channels all those dreamy playtime moments into a charming tiered dress with sweet ruffle trim. Crafted in soft, breathable fabric with smocking for a flexible fit, it's a comfy yet carefree choice for playtime or dress-up days.

name: Red Velvet Chocolate Cake
description: Two rich layers of red chocolate cake, filled and covered with the finest, pure cream cheese frosting, and then garnished with white chocolate shavings around the sides.

name: Enamel Camping Mug
description: Great for indoors and outdoors, this sturdy and stylish camping mug is perfect for coffee, tea, or even your morning cereal. 12 oz and stainless steel with enamel finish.

name: LARQ Bottle Swig Top, 23oz
description: Sippers, chuggers, swiggers and ice-lovers rejoice! The LARQ Bottle Swig Top was designed for easy hydrating on the go, simply snap open the cap. 24 hours cold, BPA-free and made with food-grade 18/8 stainless steel. 23 oz. This bottle does not use LARQ's PureVis technology but its double-wall insulation means that water stays cold for up to 24 hours.

name: Protective AirTag Keychain for Apple AirTag, 4 Pack
description: Track your belongings with confidence and style. Belkin's Secure Holder with Key Ring has an innovative twist-and-lock design and raised edges to keep your AirTag secure and protect it against scratches. Easily attach it to your keys, car remote, luggage, pet, and more with its convenient, sturdy, and secure key ring.

name: Oversized Rib Knit Throw
description: An everyday staple piece, this easy oversized throw is made for movie nights, afternoon naps and mornings on the patio. Knit from natural Turkish cotton in a cozy rib pattern, it’s like a sweater for your bed or sofa.

name: Snake Plant 'Laurentii' in Potter
description: One of the most popular and hardy of houseplants, it's virtually indestructible and adaptable to almost any condition. Whether you throw it in full, direct sunlight or shove it in the low-light corner of your apartment, it'll grow. And to top it off, it'll go weeks without water if it must. Plant is about 12 inches tall, and planters are 100% premium ceramic, hand-finished in a matte glaze, and include drainage holes with rubber stoppers.

name: 250g, Tin Only
description: White Sturgeon caviar, sustainably farmed by aquaculture in California and crafted by hand using techniques mastered through generations of experience. Optimally selected for size, firmness, color and taste. This 250g tin serves 7-12.

name: Yata Basket
description: The Yata basket is the perfect size for the assortment of knick-knacks in your life. Set it on a stand near the door to store your keys, phone, and wallet; display it on your end table or your entry for a pop of culture and color. Each will have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product. Measures 8x5" wide.

name: The Core Set
description: This 16-piece set comes with four of each of the Big Bowls, Small Bowls, Big Plates, and Small Plates. The Core Set combines the Ceramics you’ll use every single one of your years and days. Year & Day ceramics are made with locally sourced clay by artisans in Portugal using a single-firing process that is better for the environment. All pieces are finished with an elegant & durable semi-matte glaze and are safe for the dishwasher, freezer & oven up to 480 degrees.

name: NFL Arch Tee
description: Ready for kick-off, ready for anything: the super-soft NFL Arch tee is here. Suit up for every game of the season. Because we know you’re ready. Pay homage.

name: Stainless Steel Odor Removing Bar
description: Effectively remove gross cooking odors from your hands, with science. The simple, ingenious solution for those persistent kitchen smells that linger even after washing your hands. Designed with a ‘soap bar’ form factor, the Marcellin Odor Removing bar uses the power of stainless steel to bond with sulfur molecules found in odor-causing foods such as fish, garlic, and onions. With a simple “scrub,” it helps eliminate stubborn smells, leaving your hands fresh and odor-free to tackle the next recipe. Made of durable 18/8 stainless steel, this measures 2.25" L x 3.5" W.

name: Women's Tri-Block Ankle Socks
description: Bombas' signature triple-colored style. A bestseller for 6 years and counting. The Honeycomb Support System cradles the arch of your foot, like a firm but comfortable hug around your midfoot. The Seamless Toe is linked with a special knit stitch that eliminates the annoying bump that runs across the toes of most socks. You won't feel a thing. Extreme comfort and extra support for your soles. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Tea Towel
description: This printed tea towel from Sips by makes a charming addition to any kitchen. Each tea towel is made of 100% cotton and measures 23" x 23". Includes 1 tea towel.

name: Original Food Catching Suction Placemat
description: UpwardBaby’s food-catching placemat is a convenient and hassle-free way for growing babies and toddlers to practice eating on their own without making a mess. Perfect for baby-led weaning and all stages of learning to eat! This placemat instantly attaches to almost any clean, smooth surface and stays in place thanks to a strong suction base. It's also dishwasher safe, so cleanup is a breeze.

name: Baby Oil SPF 30
description: A legend of backyard leisure reimagined for safe use in the sun with high performing SPF 30 actives, naturally derived oils, a signature “baby oil accord” aroma, and a lightweight formula that delivers an iconic, enviable shine. Holds 3.4 fl oz/ 100mL.

name: Merino Crew Socks 4 Pack
description: Upgrade your toes with merino wool crew socks. Merino wool is a natural moisture-wicking fiber that ensures that your feet will be dry, comfortable, and feeling great all the day long. The benefits of merino are plentiful: it's biodegradable and renewable for lessened environmental impact; wrinkle- and UV-resistant for long lasting low maintenance; and naturally breathable for comfort.

name: Vogue on Christian Dior
description: Using words and beautiful archival photos, British Vogue documents the illustrious career of one of the twentieth century’s greatest fashion designers. One of the most famous designers of the 20th century, Christian Dior still fronts one of the most successful haute couture fashion houses. By Charlotte Sinclair. Hardcover.

name: Women's Roam Hoodie
description: Roam hoodies are designed to do it all. Made with feat's incredibly soft and stretchy active fabric, FlowTech. An understated everyday staple. Unisex, slim fit, with side-entry pockets on each side.

name: Chucktown
description: The Chucktown has been the go-to style since the beginning, hence the name matching Nectar HQ. They're unisex, fit most all face shapes and are equipped with recycled frames, which is just a fancy way of saying they’re light on your face and can also take a beating.

name: AIRFLEX Hat
description: With a lightweight performance fabric and smart details, this hat is designed for running that 5K (or just those errands). One size fits all.

name: Mag:3 Essentials, Belgian Linen
description: The MAG:3 features a sleek 2-in-1 charging zone with both “MagSafe” and “Qi” compatibility to power your iPhone and AirPods side by side. The recrafted valet tray has increased tray space with an improved modern shape to display your everyday essentials - plus, an extra USB-C port on the back, perfect for a 3rd device or Apple Watch.

name: Double Dutch Oven 2-Piece Set
description: Get the best of both worlds with Great Jones' two-piece set of Dutch ovens. The Dutchess, a 6.75-quart enameled cast-iron Dutch oven, is perfect for family-style cooking (it fits a whole roast chicken); the round, 3.5-quart Dutch Baby is ideal when you’re making a side dish, or just cooking for yourself and a pal. Plus, Dutch Baby nests perfectly inside The Dutchess for easy storage. Safe for all stovetops (including induction), oven-safe up to 500 degrees, and dishwasher friendly.

name: Digital Gift Card, $25
description: A gift card to use towards self care. A Heyday digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout. Please Note: Gift cards do not expire and can be redeemed online or at any Heyday location for products and services.

name: Women's Solids Ankle Sock 4-Pack
description: Keep it simple with classic colors of the most comfortable socks in the history of feet. Easy everyday socks that are the unsung heroes of your sock drawer. As always, 4 Purchased = 4 Donated.

name: NBA Jam Tee
description: Boomshakalaka! Check out the stars featured on this NBA Jam tee, and find the dream duo you won’t want to miss.

name: How Women Rise
description: Sally and Marshall identify the twelve habits that hold women back as they seek to advance, showing them why what worked for them in the past might actually be sabotaging their future success. Building on Marshall's classic bestseller What Got You Here Won't Get You There, How Women Rise is essential reading for any woman who is ready to advance to the next level.

name: Matrix Hoop Earrings
description: These perfectly formed Matrix hoop earrings are defined by the timeless look of clear round stones and rhodium plated metal. It’s a radiant combination that is essential to any jewelry box. Reach for these hoops to deliver perfect circles of radiance to any outfit. Hoops measure 1.375".

name: Pretzel Tube Sampler 3 Pack
description: These sampler packs include three 1/2 lb tubes, each one a different flavor within a cultivated profile. Selects the sampler pack flavor assortment of your choice.

name: Snug Body Pillow
description: Extra long and super soft pillow to decorate and cuddle with. Cover is made of 100% microfiber and filling is made of memory foam. Includes one pillow measuring 48" x 14", choice of color.

name: Googly Eyes Piñatagram for Anytime
description: A classic piñata design filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: Hamptons Cap
description: Keep the sun out of your eyes while you rush the kitchen with this stylish Pickleball Hamptons Cap.

name: 4-Piece Mini Tool and Container Set
description: Combining GIR’s top-selling kitchen tools, the GIR 4-Piece Mini Tool Set is made for little hands and big ideas. This mini set includes the mini Mini Spoonula, Mini Flip, Mini Spatula, Mini Whisk, and container for all 4. It is Dishwasher safe, Stain, odor, and microbe resistant, and Heat resistant to 550°F.

name: Treats Flavor Pack
description: More protein? With none of the fluff?? Meet Magic Spoon Treats! Their brand-new, crispy cereal snacks are packed with 11g protein and all of the chewy crunch. Tastes just like the classic childhood snack–but with no artificial ingredients. Includes 4 boxes.

name: One SL Wireless Smart Speaker
description: Get rich, room-filling sound with the all-new Sonos One SL, and control it with the Sonos app, Apple Airplay 2, and more.

name: Color Me Proud Mini Brush Set
description: Channel those rainbow vibes with this gorgeous brush set, featuring 3 metallic rainbow-hued eye brushes inside a matching Beauty Bag. 100% of the proceeds will be donated to QUEERSPACE collective. All in travel-friendly sizes, these high-quality beauty tools will help you create bold, colorful eye looks on the go that you will always be proud of!

name: Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum with XL Dust Cup
description: The Shark Pet Cordless Stick Vacuum combines deep-cleaning suction with cordless convenience. Powerful suction delivers deep cleaning on both hard floors and carpets while the vacuum's lightweight design and removable handheld vac allow for cleaning from floor to ceiling. For added convenience, the XL dust cup features CleanTouch technology for hands-off debris disposal.

name: Loog Pro VI Acoustic Guitar
description: A light and compact guitar, bundled with flashcards, an app, and free video lessons. The Loog Pro VI Acoustic makes it easy for beginners to finally learn to play guitar. Recommended for Ages 9+.

name: Triple Chocolate Enrobed Brownie Cake
description: This is the perfect cake for the true chocolate lover. A dense, moist brownie cake is covered in not one, but three layers of decadent chocolate. The cake is coated with a rich chocolate fondant icing, showered with dark chocolate shavings and then finally drizzled with milk and dark chocolate glazes. This triple-chocolate delight is sure to satisfy any sweet tooth. Each cake is delivered in an elegant gift box. 7 inches in diameter.

name: Playdough DIY Mix
description:
The DIY Mix includes easy step by step instructions and all-natural dry mix made with organic wheat flour, sea salt, cream of tartar, beet, turmeric, with spirulina for color. Just add water and oil!
Recipe makes one 15 oz batch of dough. Ages 3+

name: Luxury Candle
description: Onyi luxury candles delight the senses and provide your space with elegance. Burn time of 80 hours, candles are 11oz each.

name: MAG:1 Classics
description: A low-profile magnetic charger, wrapped in designer-quality Italian Leather and sleek matte aluminum alloy. This charger works best in locations where space saving is top of mind like on end tables, office desks, and kitchen countertops or islands. All of MAG:1 chargers come with a Courant-branded travel pouch for on-the-go power. For full magnetic compatibility, they recommend use with iPhone 12 or 13.

name: Cloud Cotton Quilt, Full/Queen
description: Bring an alluring loftiness and elegance to your linens with this warm bedding essential. Made of a 100% organic cotton shell and stuffed with an insulating polyester fill. So soft and fluffy, you have to feel it to believe it.

name: The Table Knives
description: Made with German steel stainless and hand-finished with a matte, stain-resistant, and ever-so-slightly grippy handle. Each set of 4 includes a maple holder, which lays horizontally in your drawer or stands vertically on your countertop.

name: White Truffle Honey
description: This special honey is a perfect addition to a cheeseboard and excellent with aged Italian cheeses like Pecorino, Parmigiano Reggiano, and Grana Padano. Jar holds 4.6oz. Made in Italy, GMO-Free.

name: Branded Carter 16oz Cold Tumbler
description: Whether you’re at the beach or just dreaming about it, Carter Cold carries your cold brew, cocktails, or kombucha in style, wherever you chill. This 16oz cup is spill resistant with 18+ hours cold, has True Taste Ceramic Coating, and is cup holder compatible. Features your logo engraved front and center.

name: AirTag
description: AirTag is an easy way to keep track of your stuff. Attach one to your keys or slip in your backpack. And just like that, they’re on your radar in the Find My app. AirTag has your back. Includes 1 Airtag.

name: Limited Edition 2-pack, Whole Bean
description: Limited edition single-estate coffees for the connoisseur, roasted to order. 2 x 12oz bags, whole bean.

name: The Bail Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide free bail assistance to thousands of low-income Americans every year.

name: Cloud-Like Comfort Mouse Pad
description: Get ready to float on a cloud of comfort while navigating your digital world. Embrace the enchantment of floating on a cloud as you work, create, and play. Let this cloud-like mouse pad with wrist support transport you to a world of comfort and productivity. It's time to make every click and scroll a delightful experience. Treat yourself with this whimsical ergonomic mouse pad with wrist support and let the cloud-like comfort brighten up your computing adventures! Measures 9.65" x 8.11" x 0.55".

name: Small Link Bracelet
description: Simple and minimal gold filled link bracelet. Stunning on its own or clustered with other bracelets.

name: The Everyone Unisex Crewneck
description: Getting back to basics is a good way to ground yourself. So is this classic unisex crewneck sweatshirt, made with sustainable fabric. Designed to be a comfy fit. Choice of color and size.

name: Signature Soy Wax Candle
description: Each of these premium quality soy wax candles are hand poured in Canada with a 100% cotton wick, in a beautiful tinted glass vessel. Includes one 10 oz candle.

name: Callaway 2023 Warbird Golf Balls, White
description: Callaway's Warbird is a distance ball that creates maximum speed from a large high energy core, and a 2-piece construction. This design promotes high launch and long carry from our HEX Aerodynamics, with impressive feel and control to complement all that distance. Color: white and includes a dozen.

name: Joyful New Baby Gift Set
description: This curated new baby gift set includes four new baby essentials. First up, they’ve curated a super soft bamboo and cotton swaddle blanket in a beautiful sun print that is perfect for swaddling. Next, a cozy bear lovey that makes the best companion for cuddling and helping to soothe baby. Also included is a silicone teething trinket to help baby feel more comfortable as those teeth start poking through. Finally, a colorful board book that will become a cherished part of family wind-down time.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Scarf
description: Need effortlessly style this winter? This is your girl. This over-sized scarf can layer on anything for a chic look to stay warm all winter long. This quality cashmere is incredibly long-lasting and three times as warm as wool, sourced sustainably and ethically. Crafted from 100% Grade-A Mongolian cashmere, 12-gauge. Measures 10" W x 80" L.

name: Color of Change Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Color of Change designs campaigns powerful enough to end practices that unfairly hold Black people back, & champion solutions that move us all forward.

name: Nest Wifi Router and Point
description: Enjoy blazing fast mesh wifi with the brand new Nest Wifi router system. Nest Wifi blankets the whole home in fast, reliable Wi-Fi. With up to 3800 sq. ft. of coverage, it automatically updates itself to get new features and help your network stay safe. And Nest Wifi points have a speaker with the Google Assistant for extra help around the house. This product comes with 1 Nest Wifi Router and 1 Nest Wifi Point (enabled with Google Assistant).

name: Pruner & Sheath
description: Inspired by old-world Japanese design, Barebones Pruners offer unmatched dexterity and utility, complemented by timeless beauty. Durable steel construction, classic copper accents, and easy comfortable handling make the Pruners a lasting staple of indoor and outdoor gardening. The Pruner Sheath unites utility and design. Made of 900D polyester with an interior liner, it weathers real-world use while protecting the tool.

name: TheraFace PRO
description: A relaxing facial massage meets the facial treatments you love in this all in one device. Reduce tension and relax facial muscles with the technology behind Theragun percussive therapy, now designed for the face. From skin-toning microcurrent to rejuvenating light therapy, you can combine and customize more facial health treatments than any other device.

name: Variety Pack, 12 Pack
description: The Variety Packs contains 12 packets of mix to create 12 delicious cocktails or mocktails, showcasing Craftmix's best selling flavors. Just add liquor (if you want), sparkling water, a packet of craftmix, pour over ice and you'll be instantly on vacation enjoying Blood Orange Mai Tai's, Mango Margarita's, Passionfruit Paloma's and Strawberry Mule's. Includes 12 total packets, 3 of each flavor.

name: Makeda Leather Crossbody Bag
description: From business to play, this stylish and versatile handbag is one accessory you’ll reach for time and again. Wear it crossbody for comfortable travel on the go, or remove the strap to carry it as a fold over clutch for an evening party.  An open interior compartment offers plenty of room for phone, wallet, and accessories, while the soft leather body keeps this handbag light on your shoulder.  Handcrafted from Ethiopian goat leather, the Makeda is designed to stand the test of time and will only get better with age. It measures 1.5" L x 7.5" H with a 32"-58" crossbody strap.

name: The Tote
description: Because everyone needs that perfect tote bag. The MP Tote has a vegan leather exterior and comes with a removable insulated pouch, perfect for keeping your food cool and separate from your daily essentials. Your laptop and lunch are safe with this. The tote measures H 13" x W 16" x D 7", while the insulated snap-in & snap-out pouch measures 11" L x 4.5" D x 10" H.

name: Soap Dispenser
description: This refillable soap dispenser will complete your home decor in your kitchen, bathroom, or home. Stylish yet simple, this soap refill jar can be filled with your favorite product over and over again. Reduce plastic use while giving your space a fun update! Each Glass Dispenser holds 16oz, and measures 2.75 x 2.75 x 8.5"  with pump unlocked. Includes 1 soap refill jar, choice of dispenser style.

name: Ravioli Making Kit
description: Impress yourself (and your dinner guests) with perfectly delicate hand-rolled fresh pasta stuffed with homemade ricotta. This kit comes with the specialty equipment and ingredients to create both the pasta dough and homemade ricotta from scratch, for the most magical melt-in-your mouth ravioli ever.

name: Green Tea Lover
description: Green tea makes an incredible base for a huge range of flavors. From chai spices to jasmine leaves, the possibilities are endless, and this bundle is the perfect way to experience them all, plus get all the benefits of green tea. Includes 3 full-sized green teas for sustained energy. Also included is a Teacup and Tea Strainer with resting cup to make the whole experience that much more elevated.

name: Austin BBQ, Brunch and Beer Tour for Two
description: Hop on board and experience the sights, sounds and tastes of the city on a one-of-a-kind Austin Food Truck Tour by bus. Visit gourmet food trucks in South Austin, Downtown and the East Side of the city in the comfort of a 28-passenger air conditioned executive bus. Enjoy 5-6 food truck tastings with a variety of flavors as well as a plethora of local craft beers, cider or wine! Includes an experience for two people.

name: Solo3 Wireless
description: Beats Solo3 Wireless brings award-winning sound to a portable, durable design featuring a flexible headband, 360-degree pivoting ear cups and noise isolation. This evolution of the Solo line provides up to 40 hours of battery life due to the efficiency of the Apple W1 chip, as well as Class 1 Bluetooth. The earcup controls let you take calls, play music and activate Siri, and Fast Fuel provides 3 hours of playback after just 5 minutes of charging via the included micro-USB cable. Color: Matte Black.

name: 16 Pack
description: Your recipient selects their choice of wellness patch designed for boosting their day or helping to treat life's common struggles. Includes 16 patches.

name: Hydrate Sheet Mask
description: Ever notice those patches of dry skin on your face? That is your face begging for a hydrating facial treatment to reinvigorate your skin. That's why Patchology developed the original FlashMasque Hydrate 5 Minute Sheet Masks, to combat dehydrated skin and soothe those dry patches on your face. This advanced masque material accelerates delivery of essential ingredients Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin B5 to improve elasticity and smooth your skin in just 5 minutes. Includes 1 sheet mask.

name: 1 Month Alo Moves
description: Unlock wellness wherever you are with Alo Moves. Find what moves you with instant access to thousands of classes from top trainers, including styles like yoga, Pilates, barre, strength, HIIT, walking, meditations, self-care, and more. Improve your sleep, boost your energy, and feel more productive during your day when you include Alo Moves in your routine.

name: Men's Winter-Grid Knit Dress Calf Socks
description: An elevated, but not too dressy, sock for the holiday season and beyond. The cuff of the socks is designed to fit perfectly around your leg, so your socks feel secure and don't fall down on the job. Cushioned footbed means extreme comfort and extra support for your soles. The Y-Stitched Heel creates a natural cup shape that comfortably fits and hugs your heel.

name: Fan Favorites Gift Box
description: This traditional favorite from England is a unique mixture of rich flavors that is sure to be a palate pleaser. The Fan Favorites Gift Box curates three of your (you guessed it!) fan-favorite flavors into one convenient, giftable package. A great Licorice assortment for all sweet tooths alike! Each tube is filled with 1 pound of Mini Mix, Australian Mix, and Raspberry Pretzelice.

name: Red Velvet Cupcakes
description: You can't go wrong with a classic. 25 bite-size, handcrafted Red Velvet cupcakes made with vanilla cake batter and a touch of cocoa. Iced with velvety Philadelphia® Cream Cheese icing and topped with red sprinkles.

name: The Hot Toddy
description: Simmer down with the coziest hot toddy gift set. A pair of glass mugs completed with all the ingredients needed to warm up with the classic winter drink next to the fireplace. It includes a pair of Glass Hot Toddy Mugs, Dardiman's Dehydrated Lemon Slices, Gold plated Jigger, Orange Clove Hot Toddy Kit, gourmet salted Virginia Peanuts, a pair of Honey Stir Sticks, and Cinnamon Sticks tied with twine all wrapped in a deluxe black linen paper box tied with satin ribbon.

name: Hushh Compact Sound Machine
description: A white noise machine is a powerful tool in your infant sleep routine and helps baby fall asleep fast and minimizes sleep disruption from the outside world. Hushh has thoughtful baby-friendly features like a soft LED night light, flexible clip, and child-safe locks have made it a parenting must-have and popular registry item. Measures 3.5" in diameter.

name: Personalized Alex Duffel Bag
description: This sleek duffel bag works for weekend trips or the gym. It features a waterproof back pocket for files, laptop or a tablet, a waterproof zippered shoe compartment and a zippered interior pocket. It has an adjustable, padded shoulder strap. It's made of ballistic nylon and Italian leather accents, and measures 19.5" (L) x 11.5" (H) x 10.5" (D). Includes personalization, choice of bag color and monogram text.

name: Bioluminescent Kayak Adventure for Two, Tomales Bay, CA
description: Experience one of nature's most spectacular light shows as you paddle through the glowing waters of Tomales Bay during this Bioluminescent Kayak Adventure! Learn the basics of kayaking from the Bay Area's outdoor education leader with over 21 years of experience while you discover the amazing secret behind the natural phenomenon of bioluminescence. You will even spot swimming fish and seals as they streak through the water! Includes an experience for two people.

name: Switch OLED Model w/ Neon Red & Neon Blue Joy-Con
description: Play on your TV at home or pick up and play in handheld mode on a vivid 7-inch OLED screen with the Nintendo Switch OLED Model system. The system also features 64GB of internal storage, enhanced audio, a wide, adjustable stand, and a dock with a wired LAN port.

name: Stainless Steel Measuring Spoons
description: The Stainless Steel Measuring Spoons' unique magnetic feature keeps the spoons neatly stacked together and allows you to easily remove one at a time. The soft, comfortable, non-slip handles feature permanent, etched measurement markings. Set includes 1/4 tsp, 1/2 tsp, 1 tsp, and 1 T Spoons.

name: Sweetie Pie Bouquet with Vase
description: The Sweetie Pie bouquet includes 38 mixed stems of ranunculus, roses, solidago, snapdragons, solomio, and craspedia displayed in a tasteful vase. Please note that as flowers are a live product, colors and varieties may slightly vary from the photos shown to provide you with the freshest and most beautiful bouquet.

name: Slant Collection Champagne Glasses Set of 2
description: Update your next toast with these golden amber luxurious slanted champagne flutes. These glasses are crafted from premium quality glass with a beautiful gold finish that sparkles with every pour. They measure 2.1" W x 10.82"H, and holds 6 oz each. Includes a set of 2.

name: Versa 2
description: Versa 2 delivers a new precisioncrafted swimproof design, includes innovative sleep features like Sleep Score and smart wake, can access thousands of apps, and is packed with even more advanced health, fitness and smart features to elevate every moment. For next level convenience, Versa 2 debuts an on-device microphone, which enables Fitbit’s first-ever Amazon Alexa smartwatch experience, along with a Spotify app that allows users to control their music and podcasts, and 5+ days of battery life.

name: Birthday Cake (6")
description: Milk Bar's bestselling Birthday Cake is inspired by classic kid birthday cakes. Three tiers of rainbow-flecked vanilla birthday cake layered with creamy birthday frosting, crunchy birthday crumbs and rainbow sprinkles make this cake the ultimate celebratory treat with share. Serves 8-12 people.

name: Chardonnay Oil SPF 30
description: A lightweight SPF 30 sunscreen oil made from chardonnay grapeseed oil that delivers an enviable, subtle shine while hydrating and protecting your skin.

name: Sophia Drop Earrings, Recipient's choice
description: The Sophia Drop Earrings in Gold or Silver feature a delicate metallic frame with dainty details, creating a wear-anywhere accessory. These drop earrings speak for themselves with their elegant style that can be dressed up or down. Add a touch of shine to your casual ensemble as you head out for a night on the town.

name: 5 LB Rubber Dumbbell
description: Includes ONE 5 LB Dumbell. The Inspire Fitness Rubber Dumbbells are an essential addition to any home gym, providing unparalleled quality and durability. Crafted with precision using high-quality materials, this dumbbell is designed to last.

name: Sherpa Shacket
description: Styled like a shirt, built like a jacket, and designed to keep you cozy and warm however you want to wear it. An instant season-favorite.

name: Employee Appreciation Gift Set
description: You can't go wrong with Fatty Sundays' Employee Appreciation Gift Set! It's an incredible collection of only the most popular, drool-worthy Fatty Sundays gourmet chocolate pretzels! This set includes Toffee, Rainbow Sprinkles, Salted Caramel and Birthday Cake. 12 pretzel rods per set, each pretzel rod is approx 4" long.

name: Caramel Kisses Tasting Experience
description: Enjoy a unique tasting experience of 6 different flavors and textures of caramel packaged in a luxurious gift box. Includes vanilla bean & french salted butter, mango passionfruit, scotch (Glenfiddich 15), raspberry, brown sugar, and 64% Madagascar single-origin chocolate caramel flavors.

name: The Downers Loose Leaf Tea Variety Pack
description: Three caffeine-free teas to help you rest and digest. Crafted with 100% pure ingredients with no added sugar, flavors, preservatives, or anything else. Makes 25-30 cups.

name: 3 Piece Bamboo Cutting Board Set
description: This versatile set of eco-friendly cutting boards are the epitome of sustainable elegance for every kitchen. Experience the joy of chopping, slicing, and dicing on a surface that cares for both your knives and the planet. This set includes three different-sized cutting boards to cater to all your kitchen needs. From precise chopping to a beautiful serving platter, these boards are perfect for every culinary task. Includes a set of 3, measuring 16 x 12", 14 x 10", and 12 x 8".

name: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
description: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow is a novel by Gabrielle Zevin. Amazon named it the best book of 2022. Over the course of three decades, the relationship between two friends, Sadie Green and Sam Masur, changes as they develop a Japanese-themed game that draws critical attention.

name: Drive An Indy Car for One, Homestead Miami Speedway
description: Get behind the wheel and experience the thrill of driving a full size, open wheel, Indy-style race car on the Homestead-Miami Speedway during this Drive an Indy Car adventure. Get in car 2-way radio communication with your personal racing instructor coaching you every lap and receive a full-color graduate certificate printed with your top speed. Includes an experience for one person.

name: Five-Pocket Travel Pant
description: A pant with stretch and wicking is an invitation to head out and do something knowing you'll be cool and comfortable. Mid rise and drawcord waist. Designed to be a comfy fit.

name: Love Gift Box 25-Pack
description: Celebrate the season of love with a 25-Pack featuring six limited-edition Valentine’s Day flavors wrapped in a premium Love Gift Box. Includes 5 dark chocolate, 4 marshmallow, 4 dulce de leche, 4 brookie, 4 red velvet, and 4 strawberry.

name: 49ers Vs Chiefs Super Bowl Tee
description: Super Bowl LVIII is almost here and the San Francisco 49ers and Kansas City Chiefs are meeting for the second time in four years. Gear up for the big game with this super-soft tee.

name: Coffee & Chocolate Gift Basket
description: Delight the coffee lover in your life with this classic coffee and chocolate gift basket! Inside a beautiful basket, you will discover an impressive collection of tempting chocolates and premium coffees that are impossible to resist. Boasting deliciously crisp cookies, chocolates, premium ground coffee, and more, this sophisticated arrangement is guaranteed to take any coffee break to the next level!

name: Mongolian Cashmere Robe
description: Lounge in luxury in the best cashmere robe around. Expertly crafted from the finest strands of 100% Grade Mongolian cashmere, this robe is exceptionally soft and warm. Elevate every morning, evening, and any time in between. Accented with kimono collar, 2 patch pockets, and a self-tie sash.

name: Mister
description: Modern Sprout’s mister provides the ideal amount of moisture needed for seed starting and sprout growth, and looks good doing it. Also great for both humidity-loving and water-sensitive plants.

name: Snug Comforter, Full/Queen
description: This is what dreams are made of: an all-in-one bed cover that not only elevates your bedroom aesthetic, but is ethereally soft, super comfy, and easy to wash. Featuring an innovative reversible design with cloudlike Snug fabric on top and naturally cooling, hypoallergenic viscose from bamboo underneath. Beautiful inside and out, with a filling made entirely of recycled plastic to help clean up our oceans.

name: 5.2 QT Copper Saucier
description: Unparalleled in its conductivity, speed, and natural beauty, Copper is the thoroughbred of Cookware. It responds instantly to your every move for ultimate control and precision, which is why its reputation includes the world’s best restaurants. This one is crafted in France and modernized with a Stainless Steel interior. Standard tin linings can’t tolerate high heat and require periodic retinning, but non-reactive Stainless Steel lasts indefinitely and can withstand temperatures twice as high. The Saucier’s rounded edges guarantee even cooking, while its Copper body lends total control over the trickiest dishes. Holds 5.2 QTs and measures 19.5" x 11" with a cooking surface of 9".

name: Slim Hoops Set
description: Try this set of slim stacked hoops in graduated sizes for the ultimate cool factor. This gift includes a pair of the Small Slim Huggie (11mm Outer Diameter, 8mm Inner Diameter), a pair of the Small Slim Hoop(14mm Outer Diameter, 11mm Inner Diameter), and a pair of the Medium Slim Hoop (18mm Outer Diameter, 15mm Inner Diameter).

name: Leather Care Kit
description: This kit includes everything you’ll need to clean, condition and protect your leather goods. When properly cared for, your precious leather goods will serve you well for years to come. The Leather Care Kit provides the one-two punch needed! The Ready-To-Use Foam Cleaner effectively cleans the leather opening its pores to make way for the high quality Premium Leather Balm to condition, nourish and protect from the elements.

name: Pollinator Protector Activity Kit
description: Pollinator Protector Activity Kit features a Wildflower Seed Pop that grows a small pollinator-friendly garden. As the garden grows, the included Activity Mat encourages kids to color in the flowers they see, and a Sticker Sheet enables them to add visiting pollinators to the Mat. A Pollinator Protector Merit Badge recognizes the work done to better the planet. Bees, butterflies and hummingbirds play an integral role in our food supply. The need to save the pollinators cannot be overstated. Be a part of the solution and become a pollinator protector today!

name: Press Vessel, Recipient's Choice
description:
The Press Vessel is a special home for worldly treasures. Fashioned from precision-machined anodized aluminum, it’s an airtight container that’s equally suited to storing rare spices or heirloom jewelry. 
5 oz each.
Anodized aluminum.
Silicone ring around lid creates airtight seal. Dimensions: 2.5” D x 2” H.

name: MVP Sugar Set
description: Your baking, making, and cocktail shaking besties. Their top three best-selling Fancy sugar blends are featured together — just for when you need ‘em. Food (and drink) for thought: make your cookies sparkle, donuts dazzle, and bevies extra Fancy with sugared rims. This set includes a 4oz Jar of Opal Rain Sugar, a 4oz Jar of Filthy Rich Sugar, and a 4oz Jar of Unicorn Breath Sugar.

name: Instax Photo Album in Purple
description: There is no doubt this photo album is a one-of-a-kind statement but with its lightweight and durable design it’s great for travel and versatile use… a perfect way to keep your favorite memories close at hand!

name: Extra Virgin Duo Gift Set
description: The Extra Virgin Duo contains Kosterina's two signature extra virgin olive oils packaged in chic, Mediterranean blue & white gift box. Organic Everyday is perfect for cooking & baking, while Original EVOO enhances dipping & finishing. Includes two 500ml bottles.

name: Natural Premium Bamboo Queen Duvet Cover
description: A breathable, anti-sweat and oh-so-soft duvet cover made of 100% viscose from bamboo. Includes one queen sized duvet cover, choice of color.

name: Raaka Chocolate Three Bar Box
description: This delicious box comes with a spread of bars from the Raaka Chocolate collection, in enticing flavors ranging from bourbon cask aged to green tea crunch, pink sea salt, and beyond.

name: Benji Travel Bowl, Small
description: Fun travel bowls, the Benji is the perfect solution for feeding your pup while on the go. It's made of durable fabric and can be folded in half, with a zipper design that keeps it collapsed and easy to transport. Perfect for any outdoor event. Easy clean waterproof lining. Features a dog snap to attach to leash, key chain, or bag. Measures 2.5" x 5.25" when open.

name: Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 with Sunflower Extract, 18 oz
description: The 18 oz. PLAY pump is perfect for at home or on the go, its convenient handle makes it a beach & poolside staple! A fast-absorbing, non-greasy SPF face & body lotion that hydrates skin & is water- & sweat-resistant for 80 minutes. With high-performance protection against UV & infrared radiation, this formula nourishes skin with proven ingredients while also helping to prevent photoaging & dehydration. Contains 18 oz.

name: PEMF Mat Cover
description: The HigherDOSE Mat Cover was designed to fit on top of your Infrared PEMF Mat. Adding cushion, comfort, and heat protection to your experience while making clean-up between sessions effortless. Note - PEMF Mat not included, just mat cover. Measures 73" x 29".

name: Theragun Elite, 5th Generation
description: Powerful deep muscle treatment, in an ultra-quiet smart percussive therapy device with advanced sound insulation. Elite is scientifically calibrated to reach 60% deeper into muscles than average massager for greater therapeutic benefits, melting away tension and releasing soreness.

name: Lunch Bag 5 Pack
description: The lay-flat reusable lunch bag is sized to hold a loaded sandwich. The double-lock closure makes it airtight and leakproof for toting on-the-go pasta, salads, leftovers, and other saucy options. Like all (re)zips, they’re made from 100% food-safe, PBA-free, lead-free PEVA, which is lightweight and tough enough to hold up for hundreds of uses, including to organize freezer storage, meal prep, baby needs, pet treats, and travel necessities. Includes 5 bags, each measuring 8.5" x 7.75" and holding 28 oz.

name: $75 Anise Health Gift Card
description: Culture is built into every step of your end-to-end mental health journey with Anise. This includes tailored clinical assessments that accurately diagnose your intersectional needs, cultural sensitivity training for all clinicians to deliver high-quality care to you, and personalized treatment plans that support your mental wellbeing holistically. By joining the Anise Health community, you’ll get exclusive access to a care team consisting of both a therapist AND a coach, 4 weekly telehealth appointments, and a content library of digital resources that address unique cultural stressors, such as bicultural tension, perfectionism, shame, guilt, emotional suppression, and more. Gift card will be emailed to the email address you provide upon acceptance.

name: Farmer's Choice Orchid
description: Orchids are a stunning and unique gift that are sure to brighten anyone's day. Let the Bouqs farmers personally select a seasonal favorite to find you the perfect eco-friendly orchid blooming with sustainably grown freshness and good luck! Colors may vary, but the smiles and joy are just the same. Orchid measures approximately 6" and comes in a slate blue Ecopot. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Mini Camera-Shaped Necklace Fan
description: This camera necklace fan makes you look like the world’s most legit photographer when in reality you’re the smartest summer walker. With 3 modes, you can always make sure you’re getting enough air. Fan measures 2.52" x 2.76" x 2.36" with a rechargeable battery and USB cord length of 25cm.

name: NPR Music Tiny Desk Concert by Mac Miller
description: Mac Miller’s tiny desk concert for NPR Music. Available here on translucent blue vinyl with B Side etching. 2023, Warner Records.

name: Box of 6 Dog Macarons
description: Nothing says haute French pet patisserie quite like dog macarons. These macaron treats are made from human-grade ingredients and are perfect for the most royal of dogs! Choice of flavor.

name: Yosemite National Park Tour for Two, San Fransisco, CA
description: Spend an unforgettable day touring Yosemite National Park and taking in the breathtaking sights of the Giant Sequoias, Yosemite Village, Yosemite Falls, Half Dome, El Capitan and more. Weather permitting, take a hike (2 miles round-trip) to the Tuolumne Grove of Giant Sequoias.

name: Cowboy Boot Huggie, Single
description:
External 14K Gold Plated with Internal Brass, hinge closure, measuring at 
10mm Inner Diameter, 12mm Charm.

name: Taste of Italy Gift Box
description: Embark on a gourmet taste of Italy with this thoughtful box filled with hand-selected specialties from the absolute best of Lombardy, Emilia Romagna, Abruzzo, Tuscany, Umbria, Campania, and Apulia. In this box you'll enjoy Extra Virgin Olive Oil – "Olio D’autore" Collection (16.9oz), Eliche Di Gragnano (17.6oz), Aged Balsamic Vinegar Of Modena "Gold Seal" I.G.P. (8.45oz), "Alla Norma" Tomato Sauce (7.05oz), White Truffle And Porcini Mushrooms Sauce (6.3oz), "Il Segreto Dei Medici" Tea (1.76oz), Tea Infuser (1.8"), Dark Chocolate Bar With Coffee Filling (1.06oz), Milk Chocolate Bar With Tangerine Filling (1.06oz), Milk Chocolate Bar With Piedmont Hazelnut Filling (1.06oz), and Dark Chocolate Bar With Pistachio Filling (1.6oz).

name: 3-in-1 Wireless Charger in White
description: The Belkin MagSafe 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Pad is the perfect way to keep your devices charged and ready to go. Say goodbye to fumbling with charging cords and lightning cables, with three wireless charging modules this iPhone charger can power your Apple iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at the same time.

name: The Creative Habit: Learn It and Use It for Life
description: All it takes to make creativity a part of your life is the willingness to make it a habit. It is the product of preparation and effort, and is within reach of everyone.
