Whether you are a painter, musician, businessperson, or simply an individual yearning to put your creativity to use, The Creative Habit provides you with thirty-two practical exercises based on the lessons Twyla Tharp has learned in her remarkable thirty-five-year career.

name: Welcome Home Bliss Garden
description: Brighten up a friend or family member’s new home with a beautiful succulent. The succulent box measures approximately 4" x 4" x 5.7".

name: Lydia Cropped Cardigan
description: A timeless lightweight cardigan ideal to layer over any t-shirt or tank top. Features an open-front, dropped shoulders, and v-back detail.

name: NBA 75: The Definitive History
description: In NBA 75, sports writer and basketball super fan Dave Zarum tells the story of the NBA, all 75 years, from its early barnstorming days to the multi-billion-dollar sports league it is today. Hardcover.

name: Women, Race, & Class
description: Angela Davis provides a powerful history of the social and political influence of whiteness and elitism in feminism, from abolitionist days to the present, and demonstrates how the racist and classist biases of its leaders inevitably hampered any collective ambitions.

name: Porter Drink Through 12oz Insulated Bottle
description: Insulated, leakproof, & a fliptop lid so you can enjoy ice-cold (or piping hot) spill-free sipping. Double-walled, vacuum insulated stainless steel core keeps drinks hot for 12 hours and cold for 24 hours. Edge-to-edge ceramic coating ensures liquids never touch metal for a pure, clean taste with every sip. Fits into standard car cup holders for an easy commute.

name: Ultralight Washcloth Set
description: Brooklinen's fastest-drying washcloths. Ultralight feature a strong yet light 320 GSM construction, making them perfect both on-the-go and for everyday use. Includes 2 washcloths.

name: The Barnacle X Bluetooth Speaker
description:
Bring More Music, More Places™ with The Barnacle X, the portable speaker that brings premium sound, stunning aesthetic, and rugged durability on every adventure. The X offers 4-in-1 universal mounting, up to 12 hours of battery life, and 8GB of internal storage for up to 2,000 songs, giving you the freedom to experience crystal-clear audio any time, any place – even when your smartphone stays at home. Plus, now you can customize your listening experience with 5 mood-defining light patterns, dynamic tuning for both indoor and outdoor listening, and Party Pairing, which allows you to connect multiple speakers (150+) for the ultimate portable surround sound experience. 
 
 100% waterproof 
 Stores up to 2,000 Songs 
 
 RGB Smart Lighting Technology 
 
 Party Pairing 
 
 Dual EQ Enhanced Audio 
 
 12 Hour Battery 
 
 4-in-1 Mounting System

name: Java Socks
description: Your feet work hard, so make sure they're comfy. These hiking socks are made from a unique blend of cotton, recycled plastic bottles, and even recycled coffee grounds, so you can look good and feel good. Coffee is naturally odor-absorbing, so no more worrying about what your friends will think when you take off your shoes and kick back in your Loafer Hammock. One size fits most.

name: Large Landon Carryall Bag
description: Ultra versatile everyday duffle. Features a neoprene luggage-handle sleeve and a laptop sleeve that fits most 16" laptops. Lining made using 23 recycled plastic bottles. Measures 16.5” L x 9” W x 11” H.

name: Quote Notebook
description: Keep all your ideas in one place with a Gry Mattr multi-use notebook. With three different page styles, lined, dotted and blank, this notebook has a place for your notes, diagrams, sketches or anything else that pops into your head. It features 240 pages of soft paper, and measures 8.3” W X 11.6” H X 1” D.

name: Ultimate Knife Block Set
description: In addition to the immensely popular magnetic knife block, this set includes four matching knives to cover all your kitchen blade bases. You've got a serrated bread knife for baked goods and tough-skinned fruits and veggies, a Chinese vegetable cleaver for quick and easy chopping, a BBQ knife for handling meat with care, and a supremely useful utility blade to take care of all the rest. Each blade is made of tempered, high-carbon stainless steel that offers more durability and corrosion-resistance, plus easier sharpening, than run-of-the-mill stainless steel.

name: Couplet Starter Kit
description: 2 bags of freshly roasted beans, two customer-favorite blends with the Espresso for Everyone and the Blissful Blend. These coffee beans are from family run farms, and taste fantastic!

name: Fruity Fun Variety 12 Pack
description: This is the fun your taste buds have been craving. With Classic Grape, Tropical Punch, Orange Squeeze and Lemon Lime, it’s basically a fruit party.

name: Multi-Colored Globe Light
description: This Multi-Colored Globe Light features nine vibrant light settings that create a fun, playful atmosphere anywhere. Vinyl-dipped legs improve grip and stability and orient in four ways: hang or stand lantern at camp or in the backyard.

name: GoPro HERO9
description: Adding a 23.6MP sensor and new key design and engineering features, GoPro upgrades its flagship action camera with more of everything with the rugged HERO9 Black, providing high-detail 5K30 video and 20MP photo capture alongside new collections of professional settings and practical functions.

name: Swipe Serum Concealer
description: A hydrating concealer that glides on like a serum but has the medium-buildable coverage power to instantly cover dark circles, redness, and blemishes. Swipe on directly with the applicator to cover dark circles, spot conceal, or for all over coverage. Use fingertips, a brush, or beauty sponge to blend. It’s weightless, easy to blend, and has a skin-like natural finish that doesn’t cling to dry patches. Swipe all over to help even skin tone and smooth the look of texture without silicones.

name: Woven Coaster Set
description: Beautifully woven from timeless Senegalese tradition, these coasters add a joyful statement to any tablescape. These coasters were handmade in the traditional coil-style weaving technique passed down for generations in  Senegal. Each coaster will have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product. Woven with elephant grass (belongs to the sweet grasses) and recycled plastic, each coaster measures 4" in diameter and 0.25" thick. With each gift, Expedition Subsahara donates 20% towards building a girls STEAM school in Senegal.

name: Stainless Steel Whisk
description: This hand-held and battery-operated electric whisk will elevate your matcha or lattes to unsurpassed levels of bubbly creaminess. Spiral Whisking Head and Shaft made of robust, Food-Approved, 18/8 Stainless Steel.

name: Treats + Cereal Combo Pack
description: With great snacks come this great, high-protein pack. Get their best-selling cereal flavors – Fruity, Peanut Butter, and Cocoa – plus, a box of each of their brand-new, crispy cereal Treats in Marshmallow & Chocolatey Peanut Butter flavors. Perfect for when you’re on-the-go. Or on-the-couch.

name: Barbie The Movie 11.5" Doll in Gingham Dress
description: Greetings from Barbie Land! This Barbie doll cuts a timeless silhouette in a sweet dress modeled after one of her character's iconic looks in Barbie The Movie. With her pink gingham dress, daisy necklace and pastel pumps, she's ready to have the best day ever in Barbie Land! In the likeness of Margot Robbie as Barbie, this doll makes a great gift for fans and collectors alike.

name: Future Nostalgia by Dua Lipa
description: Global Pop superstar Dua Lipa is back, revealing the name of her eagerly awaited forthcoming album, Future Nostalgia. The Lead track from the album, “Don’t Start Now,” is already a worldwide hit with over 381 million streams and an iTunes global #1. The song is an adrenalin-fueled, feel good dancefloor anthem of positivity and self-empowerment that announces a new era for the global pop star.

name: Supercharge Copper Body Brush
description: Start your day with a supercharge. This Copper Body Brush takes dry-brushing to new heights with ion-charged bristles that wake up the body, exfoliate the skin, and promote relaxation. Incorporating dry brushing as part of your daily detox routine will invigorate the skin and ignite a natural glow.

name: You're Doing Great Cupcakes 25 Pack
description: Send bite-size happiness! This best-selling assortment of cupcakes all wrapped up in their sweetest sleeve - the perfect pick-me-up for loved ones near and far. Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats.

name: Pawty Hat
description: Happy Birthday! Or Adoption Day! Every day you share with your beast is cause for celebration and now you can personalize your beast's PAWTY HAT with their age! (Or best guesstimate!). Choice of hat number.

name: Ultimate Espresso At Home Starter Kit
description: Want to start making espresso at home and have no idea where to start? You've come to the right place. This Mooka pot bundled with this Espresso for Everyone Blend (the perfect coffee for a Moka Pot) will get you most of the way to making your first fantastic espresso at home! This comes with a free magnet that shows you the exact way to make espresso at home using a moka pot. The beans are whole beans so you must have a coffee grinder at home.

name: DoubleWall Highball Glasses, Set of 2
description: These 13.5oz double wall glasses are perfectly suited for a multitude of hot and cold beverages as well as desserts. Individually handmade of heat-resistant borosilicate glasses, they are designed to keep your liquid hot or cold for a longer period, while keeping your hands cool to the touch, it also eliminates need for coasters as no messy condensation will occur. Dishwasher, microwave, oven, and freezer safe. Made from borosilicate glass. Includes a set of 2.

name: Theragun Sense
description: Relieve aches and pains, ease soreness and support restful sleep with their first FDA registered medical device that combines percussive massage with haptics, heart rate sensor and breathwork for mindfulness in moments. Designed with strict quality and safety standards, Theragun Sense is equipped with simple, visually-guided routines plus a built-in biometric sensor for personalized insights that include on-device heart rate readings.

name: NAACP Donation
description: The gift of giving! NAACP’s mission is to ensure the political, educational, equality of minority group citizens of States and eliminate race prejudice.

name: Placemat Set of 2
description: Add a handwoven touch to your table setting with these Senegalese placemats. Use them as placemats, chargers, or wall art suitable for any room. Woven with elephant grass and recycled plastic, these placemats measure 13" in diameter. They will have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product. Includes a set of two placemats.

name: 1 Month Subscription
description: Whether you are a student, professional, or lifelong learner, Brilliant Worldwide has the tools and exercises to keep your mind growing in whatever area you choose to focus. A Brilliant Worldwide digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. No expiration date. Brilliant supports their Brilliant for Educators program that gives free Premium access to K-12 teachers and their students.

name: Skeem Match Cloche with Gift Box
description: Inspired by vintage glass domes used to protect emerging seedlings, these Match Cloches are made of handblown glass and fitted with a cork to stylishly hold an assortment of matchsticks. A striker flint on the glass adds functionality, and the delicate vessels can be reused to display treasures and curiosities. It holds approx. 120 white-tipped matches, and measures 7” tall x 3” wide. With luxurious construction and minimal design, each gift box contains contoured EVA foam to fit the Match Cloche snugly as well as a match refill pack with approximately 60 matches and an additional striker strip. Choice of color.

name: Women's Fit Premium Tee
description: What’s comfier than a casual tee? A premium casual tee. Dress the part wherever you are with this women’s plain jersey t-shirt. It features a crew neck, short sleeves and a new modern relaxed fit for effortless style. 100% airlume combed and ringspun cotton.

name: Personal Blender
description: Get the perfect texture with the Brentwood personal blender. The 14 oz Capacity accommodates plenty of ingredients while its convenient one-touch blending makes it a simple, yet effective kitchen appliance.

name: All-Day Neoprene Belt Bag
description: Hands-free, adjustable, with spots to stash all your essentials? Yes, yes, and yes. This is the flexible recycled neoprene bag you’ll use on the reg – whether you’re hitting the trail, breezing through the airport, or touring around on vacay. This is a belt bag with limitless potential. This bag was made with the environment in mind, using materials made from up to 4 recycled, post-consumer plastic bottles, and measures 6" H x 9” W x 2.75” D.

name: Chain Earrings
description: Crafted to ensure elegance, function and durability. These are the perfect earrings for any occasion! Pieces are finished so they are water, sweat and tarnish resistant.

name: Chocolate Covered Oreos, 12 Pack
description: Everyone’s favorite cookie but upgraded. Choose from flavors like milk chocolate cookie butter or peppermint crunch.

name: Solstice Inflatable SuperChill Island Pool Float
description: Stay cool this season and have a blast with friends on the Swimline Solstice Inflatable Super Chill Island 6-Person Float. This pool float features 6 spacious seats with a pillow backrest and cupholders to make it a perfect day. This float features a removable cooler that you can place right in the center. Thanks to the Boston valve, blowing it up for a day out on the water and deflating it to pack it up is equally easy. With an all-around grab line, it's easier than ever to get out on the water.

name: Branded Great Jones Dutchess
description: A good Dutch oven lasts forever; a Great Jones Dutch oven is your best friend forever. This 6.75-quart enameled cast-iron Dutchess moves gracefully from stove to oven to table centerpiece. Features your logo of choice engraved.

name: Winter Wonderland Microgreens Kit
description: This fool-proof, festive kit grows nutrient-dense microgreens that fill in the holiday tree scene in 7-10 days. Includes harvesting instructions and a recipe to encourage a healthy alternative during holiday indulging.

name: Home Town Maps Pocket Flask
description: This 6 oz. map pocket flask is custom-etched with a beautifully detailed map featuring any city or town in the US. Note that if a neighborhood is entered we will reach out to you to determine the closest available city.

name: Flowknit Performance Zip Hoodie
description: So stretchy and soft you won't want to take it off. This classic full-zip has two hidden zip pockets for security on the fly. Quince's Flowknit is made from Global Recycle Standard poly yarn, which diverts and recycles plastics destined for landfill or the ocean, so you can feel and look good in what you wear.

name: Extended Trip Packing Case
description: Striking from every angle, this case boasts a modern silhouette with iconic, fluid-looking contours. The durable aluminum construction is ready for longer business and leisure trips or group packing. The inside contains 3 zip pockets and a zip divider. Measures 30.5" X 20.5" X 11.0" and has an 84L capacity.

name: The Bucket List: 1000 Adventures Big & Small
description: A travel book like no other, this unique guide will inspire both seasoned trekkers and arm-chair globetrotters alike to build experiences you will treasure forever. You'll find memorable, once-in-a-lifetime activities organized by longitude and latitude so you can max out your itinerary with the best things to do and the best places to visit around the world. Hardcover by Kath Stathers.

name: Car Emergency Kit
description: Portable Car Emergency Kit with Battery Starter Jumper Cables and First Aid Kit Car Essentials, including Flashlight with Hand Charger, Rope and More. This car tool kit is packed with 42 auto emergency supplies plus a 62 piece car survival kit. This car roadside emergency kit is a perfect car accessory for men, women, and teen drivers.

name: Standup Bag 3 Pack
description: Ready for a wasteless holiday season and these three are here to help. These (re)zip storage bags are sturdy enough to stand up on their own so they’re easy to fill. The double-seal shuts tightly enough to stop leaks. Like all (re)zips, these are made of 100% food-safe PEVA, which is waterproof, lightweight, and durable enough to meet hundreds of food storage challenges, from portability to prettiness. So a juicy salad with actually crisp croutons and dressing on the side. Leftovers fans, we’ve packed (re)zips with stewed greens, sesame noodles, fruit salad, and a grain “bowl” into our work bags, saving all kinds of disposable bags along the way. And they’re just as good at keeping baby gear, pet supplies, gym stuff, and travel essentials safe and organized.

name: Ari Heart Pendant Necklace
description: Feminine and classic, the Ari Heart Pendant Necklace is your new obsession. With an asymmetrical heart accent in one of your favorite stones, this pendant necklace is made to be a one-of-a-kind everyday accent piece. Layer it or let it shine on its own.

name: Pastel Designer's Choice
description: A soft low and lush floral arrangement featuring a combination of fresh pastel blooms, accented with cool greenery. A mix of different rose varieties, hydrangea, stock flowers, and seasonal greens may be incorporated into this design pending seasonality, freshness, and availability. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Men's Solids Calf Sock
description: Keep it simple with classic colors of the most comfortable socks in the history of feet. Easy everyday socks that are the unsung heroes of your sock drawer. One purchased = one donated.

name: Classic Turkish Cotton Robe
description: Made of 100% long-staple Turkish cotton with two slouchy front pockets, a snug waist tie and cozy shawl collar, this super plush bathrobe is the ultimate relaxation wear.

name: LARQ PureVis™ Bottle, 17oz
description: The world's first self-cleaning water bottle and water purification system in one. Using proprietary technology and UV-C LED light 99.9999% of bio-contaminants are eliminated from your water and bottle. Beverages stay cold for up to 24 hours and hot for 12 up to hours.

name: The Mini Artist Series

Includes mini bottles of: ARDOR olive oil infused with red chili peppers, jalapeno peppers, chipotle peppers, and paprika, ROSETTE olive oil infused with garlic, LUCID olive oil infused with lemon and ARISE olive oil infused with basil. Harvest Date: November 2021.

name: Glassware Set of 4
description: Choose which style of Italian-made Glassware best compliments your plans. Whether partaking a new IPA or breathing in a newly opened Red, Made In Cookware has the set for you.

name: Recipient's Choice, 2 Pack
description: theory11 is the largest producer of luxury, designer playing cards worldwide with exclusive collaborations including Star Wars, Neil Patrick Harris, and more.

name: Loftie Sleep Mask
description:
Introducing the Loftie Sleep Mask. Designed to maximize comfort, eliminate pesky bedroom lights, and help you drift off quickly, it’s the perfect bedtime addition. 
 Our sleep mask is made of silky, breathable material to keep skin feeling fresh while completely blocking out disruptive light. Hidden eye cups and a triangle band connection are specifically designed to alleviate pressure and fit comfortably on all head sizes.

name: Modern Citronella Candle
description: Made from the lemongrass plant, citronella is a natural insect repellent that keeps biting bugs at bay. This Modern Citronella collection embraces organic simplicity, blending citronella oils with earth-inspired fragrances that amplify the outdoor experience. It has a 50 hour burn time, and measures approx. 3.5” tall x 3.5” wide. Recipient's choice of fragrance.

name: Perch Bookmark
description: A trusty companion that's destined to become an emblem of knowledge and adventures accumulated, sturdy enough to move with you from book to book. The bent corners on the bookmark are thoroughly considered and balanced, allowing your book to close neatly and to prevent you from losing your place altogether (we shudder to think). It measures 5" x 0.75".

name: Cook Central 4-Quart Multicooker
description: This Cuisinart Cook Central MSC-400 multicooker features a 4-quart nonstick cooking pot and 3 programmable functions that allow you to easily prepare a variety of dishes. A 90-minute steam option enables versatility.

name: Vegan Leather Zip Pouch
description: This large vegan leather pouch is smooth to the touch, and features a silver zipper. Perfect storage for stationery, notes, art supplies, and more. It sports an inner slip pocket and measures 10”W X 7”H .

name: EOS R10 Mirrorless Camera with RF-S 18-45 f/4.5-6.3 IS STM Lens
description: The EOS R10 is perfect for content creators looking to take their creativity to the next level. Featuring a high-speed shooting 15 FPS mechanical shutter1,2, a 24.2 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, and lightning fast autofocus, the EOS R10 camera brings some of the best features from the growing EOS R Series to a sleek, lightweight design.

name: All-Day Neoprene Toiletry Bag
description: This All-Day Neoprene Toiletry Bag is the sleek travel accessory you'll never want to leave home without. The spacious interior and multiple compartments allow you to neatly organize your toiletries, cosmetics, and additional travel necessities. Plus, it's made from 4 recycled water bottles for a look that’s equally conscious and cool. Measures 6" H x 9.5" W x 4" D.

name: I LOVE YOU Luxury Chocolate Gift Box
description: This limited edition edible art chocolate box reveals a secret hidden I LOVE YOU message spelled out on chocolates when you open it. Delight with a gourmet luxe box of Compartes chocolates in the signature black gift box with gorgeous chocolates inside, not only a delicious gift of the world's best chocolate, but a reminder of love.

name: PackLite Nova USB Solar Lantern
description: The PackLite Nova USB is handy in a power outage. Use it to light up your tent, have a picnic under the stars, or light up hard-to-reach places.  It clips onto your backpack for easy charging on-the-go, and is a convenient size to store in your glove compartment or emergency kit. Made for maximum performance with 75 lumens / 24 hours. Measures 4.75" x 4.75" x 4.75" inflated.

name: PIXIO Flags Magnetic Block Construction Set
description: Build 83 different flags with 111 magnetic PIXIO blocks in 8 colors. With the PIXIO FLAGS set, there are 83 different countries to choose from. You can stick your flags to your fridge even if you’ve never been to the countries they represent (at least, not yet!). Recommended for ages 6+.

name: Supporting Small Businesses
description: Browse our curated selection of small businesses.

name: Tea Blend
description: Choose which highly cultivated small batch tea leaf best suits you, with 15 sachets in each box. Recipient's choice of tea blend.

name: Spice Rack + Spice Jar Set
description: This beautiful kitchen addition comes with an Acacia wood three-tiered spice rack perfect for any countertop or pantry and nine (9) 4oz spice jars that will keep your spices air-tight and fresh. Just add your favorite spices and you are ready to cook!

name: Crossbody
description: This all-purpose crossbody is made from recycled polyester and features an adjustable strap, two small interior pockets, one large interior pocket, and an exterior pocket at the back. It measures 10”x5”x2”.

name: Balsamic Vinegar Trio
description: Set yourself up for amazing salads, marinades, and sweet treats with this Balsamic Vinegar Trio. Each bottle is crafted by artisans in Modena, Italy for authentic flavor and body using ingredients that are true to the Mediterranean. This trio contains one bottle of each:  Original Balsamic Vinegar, Dark Chocolate Balsamic Vinegar, and Fig Balsamic Vinegar. 375ml each.

name: Vegan Leather Large Domed Pouch
description: This versatile vegan leather domed pouch is smooth to the touch and large enough to store all your essentials. Use it as a tech case, travel companion, or makeup toiletry bag. Fits easily into your tote bag or backpack. Measures 11”W X6”H X 4”D.

name: Caramel Gift Box
description: A delightful assortment of handcrafted caramels infused with your favorite snack food flavors. Each caramel is meticulously made to ensure a truly mouthwatering experience, and the gift box's stylish presentation adds a touch of elegance to any gifting gesture.

name: 1000 Piece Puzzle Collection 1
description: A modern 1000 piece puzzle made by incredible artists creating original, accessible art. Select from a variety of beautiful designs, each made by a uniquely talented artist.

name: Occasion Box, One Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: Send a message with cookies, and let the box do the talking. Each box includes Cravory's ever so popular Best Seller's Mix cookies, as well as a signature Cravory box and card. Makes the perfect gift.

name: The Tea Break
description: A small token (but a big gesture!) of appreciation for everyone in your life who deserves a sweet break once in a while. This adorable gift features a caffeine-free Herbal Tea together with its tea infuser and an Organic Acacia Honey with its charming wooden honey dipper. A perfect combination for a leisurely (and yet so relaxing!) afternoon tea.

name: Soft Rib Hand Towel
description: Rejuvenate your bath with this supersoft and absorbent hand towel. Made from 100% long-staple Turkish cotton, the towel features a sculpted rib design for a fresh look and faster drying time. Gift includes 1 hand towel.

name: Rose Quartz Eye Mask
description: Wake up your whole face. This Rose Quartz Eye Mask is a seamless way to reduce puffiness and strain muscles around the eyes, combat fatigue from screen time + help eye cream absorb better. Rose quartz radiates universal love promoting feelings of peace + harmony.

name: Sense
description: Sense is Fitbit's most advanced health smartwatch, bringing innovative sensor and software technology with the world’s first electrodermal activity (EDA) sensor on a smartwatch to help manage stress, along with advanced heart rate tracking technology, new ECG app, and an on-wrist skin temperature sensor, all powered by 6+ days of battery life.

name: Concept Planner
description: There’s designated space for your goals and ideas at the start of each open-dated yearly, monthly and weekly section, plus plenty of room for notes and to-do lists. Smyth Sewn binding lies flat when open and a durable, fabric-like cover is built to last. It has 252 pages, and measures 8.3" x 5.8" (21 cm x 14.8 cm). Includes one notebook.

name: Modern Citronella Incense
description: Made from the lemongrass plant, citronella is a natural insect repellent that keeps biting bugs at bay. Modern Citronella incense includes outdoor incense sticks that burn for up to one hour each. It contains 50 one-hour sticks in paper tube packaging, and measures 11” tall x 2.25” wide.

name: The Ritual Shampoo & Conditioner
description: The Ritual Shampoo & Conditioner are impeccably gentle, yet powerfully cleansing formulas that use naturally-derived, coconut-based surfactants to lift grease, dirt, and pollutants from your hair, moisturizing as they go. The Ritual Shampoo removes everything you need it to and nothing you don’t, protecting your scalp and its natural balance for fresh, lightly moisturized and subtly fragranced hair. The Ritual Conditioner is based on Crown Affair's signature Renewal Mask, tweaked to get it just-right for more frequent use. The Ritual Shampoo & Conditioner are designed for all hair types, textures and lengths. Both are also safe for color-treated hair.

name: Sand Cloud Microstripe Diamond Towel
description: This soft, sand-repellent beach blanket is super-lightweight, making it perfect to keep with you so you're always prepared for summer fun. Sustainably made from Turkish cotton. Includes 1 towel, measures 36" x 64".

name: Italian Moka Pot 3-Cup Espresso Maker
description: Indulge in the rich, robust flavors of true Italian espresso with this 3-Cup Moka Pot. Crafted with precision and passion, this sleek and compact design brings the charm of traditional brewing right to your kitchen. Suitable for electric, gas or ceramic cooktops and as a fireside camp coffee maker. Features a premium pressure release valve and heat resistant handles.

name: The Barnacle Vibe 2.0 Bluetooth Speaker
description: The world's most dynamic Bluetooth speaker, with powerful audio, and ultra deep bass performance to play loud & clear outdoors. The Barnacle Vibe 2.0 includes next-level upgrades that maximize overall sound performance. It's 100% waterproof, shockproof, dust/sand proof, can float, has an 8 hours of battery life and is virtually indestructible in & out of the water. It even stores up to 2,000 songs.

name: Cookie Tin, Assorted Dozen
description: These classic cookies are baked fresh when you order, using the highest quality ingredients that are obvious in every bite. There is a reason why Mrs. Fields is one of the most recognized cookie stores in the United States. Includes twelve assorted classic cookies.

name: An Appreciation Gift of Choice
description: Choose a gift of your choice from our curated collection.

name: Soft Rib Bath Towel
description: Rejuvenate your bath with this supersoft and absorbent bath towel. Made from 100% long-staple Turkish cotton, the bath towel features a sculpted rib design for a fresh look and faster drying time. Gift includes 1 towel.

name: Stop-Infusion Travel Mug
description: The ultimate tea travel mug for wherever life takes you. Designed with the go-getters in mind, it’s 100% leak-proof, has perfected flow control, and allows you to start or stop your iced or hot tea infusion wherever you are. Holds 16oz.

name: Work Hard Play Hard
description: It's been a long week, and you deserve this! Enjoy Nosh's Work Hard Play Hard set of three 7.5 oz tubes, containing 1 tube of "YOU'RE A STAR" sour star gummies, 1 tube of "BOSS B*TCH" peach heart gummies, and 1 tube of "WORK WORK WORK" tropical rainbow drops.

name: Monogrammed Codie Canvas Tote
description: This simple silhouette is a crowd favorite with all of its user friendly compartments. It features side pockets perfect for water bottles and an umbrella as well as a zippered closure for security.

name: Glass Wine Decanter with Oak Stopper
description: A timeless piece that brings elegance to any table. This decanter is specifically designed to enhance the flavor of your favorite red wine, but it works for any drink you see fit. It is a classic, sleek carafe made sustainably from pure glass with a beautiful solid oak stopper. It holds 67 ounces and measures 7 3/4" wide x 11" high.

name: Sizzle EVOO
description: Before you say “EVOO isn’t for cooking,” read this: Thanks to the super stable Picual olive, Sizzle was born for the heat. It’s still 100% extra-virgin, but made with mid-harvest olives that give it a more mellow flavor.

name: Coffee Box 10 oz
description: Truly remarkable coffee that starts with the best beans sourced thoughtfully around the world. Choice of flavor profile.

name: Cricut EasyPress 2
description: This is your essential iron-on tool. Enjoy heat-transfer perfection every time. Cricut EasyPress 2 combines the speed of a heat press and the convenience of a household iron. Eliminate guesswork and get fast, effortless results that really last even after repeated washes.

name: Stainless Steel Martini Glass
description: A martini that stays icy cold from the first to last sip? Sounds divine. Stemless and designed to feel like sipping from fine glassware, this is insulated so your hands stay warm but your cosmo stays ice cold.

name: Cable Cocoon Cardigan

The luxuriously lightweight feel makes for the perfect year-round wear, whether paired with sweats or styled with a dress. It's 39% baby alpaca, 39% merino wool, and 22% nylon.

name: 8.5 x 8.5 Glossy Hardcover Photo Book

name: Small Batch Granola 8 oz Bag
description: Select the granola flavor of your choice, includes one 8oz bag. The granola flavors are all super nutty, that's what sets it apart. The granola is sweetened naturally with honey or organic maple syrup. You will surely taste the difference!

name: 18 Stems Red Rose Bundle
description: A classic bundle of 18 hand-picked premium red roses romantically wrapped in kraft paper and accented with seasonal greenery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: 2 Pack, Whole Bean Coffee
description: The freshest coffee imaginable. 100% Colombian farm-fresh specialty house blend coffees, roasted to order. 2 x 12oz bags, whole bean.

name: Men's Running Ankle Sock 6-Pack
description: These are lightweight, purpose-built socks for running, working out and movement. They use Bombas Hex Tec construction for breathability and moisture-wicking, and made with proprietary poly/cotton blend yarns. With comfort innovations like strategic zone cushioning and airflow ventilation, they are specially designed to help you move with grace and speed. As always, 6 Purchased = 6 Donated.

name: GO Active Short
description: When you're ready to get out there and get active, this short leads the way. Stretch wicking on the outside for flexibility and breathability. Bike short lining for comfort and support.

name: Dove
description: A modern design featuring white and ivory blooms, accented with contemporary greenery in a glass vase. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: 15 LB Rubber Dumbbell
description: Includes ONE 15 LB Dumbell. The Inspire Fitness Rubber Dumbbells are an essential addition to any home gym, providing unparalleled quality and durability. Crafted with precision using high-quality materials, this dumbbell is designed to last.

name: Checker Rings, Black Set of 2
description: The perfect set of 2. A classic checker pattern adorns these vintage dome inspired silhouettes. You'll love a checker print because it'll never go out of style. This stunner has a modern appeal to infuse a little fun into your daily stack. The Dome Height is 10mm.

name: Notch Pinky Ring
description: Solid vintage brass pinky ring. Choice of size.  Each ring is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship.

name: Braided Money Tree in Ceramic Potter
description: Many cultures believe that this plant can bring good luck, prosperity, and financial success. Most stems have five to six leaves, but if you get one with seven, it's considered to be a sign of incredibly good luck. Easy to care for and makes a great gift. Plant is about 15 inches tall, and planters are 100% premium ceramic, hand-finished in a matte glaze, and include drainage holes with rubber stoppers. Includes one 15" Money Tree, a 5" ceramic potter, and one bag of custom-blended organic potting mix.

name: Clayton Card Wallet
description: The Clayon Card Wallet is designed with simplicity in mind. Its 3-slot construction allows you to carry credit cards, business cards, and ID, eliminating unnecessary bulk and clutter. Measures 4" x 2.75".

name: 1 Month Yum Yum Snack Box
description: The Universal Yums snack box delivers the best, most exciting international treats from a country or region around the world. Each box features delicious international snacks and an interactive 12+ page booklet to help introduce snackers to the exciting new cultures they're tasting! Each box will feature an exciting, mystery country or region and contains 10-12 snacks.

name: Gourmet Marshmallows
description: This gourmet marshmallow gift box is filled with the perfect, small batch fluffy treat that will leave you wanting s'more. XO Marshmallows are all egg free and gluten-free. No high fructose corn syrup, and no preservatives. Includes 12 marshmallows.

name: Premium Essential Oil Blend
description: Essential oil blends to uplift mood or set a peaceful tone, made for all the moments in between and best diffused when you’re curled up on the couch. Add 20-35 drops to a diffuser, sit back and relax.. Essential Oil Blend is 0.5 fl. oz. and is 100% pure, non-toxic, vegan and cruelty-free.

name: Cloud Nine Cocktail Decorating Kit
description: State of bliss at the tip of your lips. This Cloud Nine Cocktail Decorating Kit is a delightful daydream in Tourmaline Pink and Diamond White Edible Glitter. Drink up! Rim a glass with Fairy Floss Cotton Candy Flavored Fancy Sugar, and enjoy your mind’s own paradise. Add edible glitter to still and carbonated beverages and spirits to create a glittery hurricane, or dust onto desserts and savory items for a sparkly finish. It’s 100% FDA-approved, textureless, odorless, and tasteless.

name: Meals on Wheels Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps support the local programs that keep seniors safe and living independently nationwide.

name: The Clips
description: A two-piece handcrafted clip set that holds hair in place without kinks. Crown Affair created The Clips with versatility and longevity top of mind: Handcrafted in France in timeless silhouettes and sized to perfection for as many hair types and as many different uses as possible, they are elevated, classic, and versatile, no matter your hair type. With gently rounded tips, a sloping curve, and an added set of smaller hidden teeth for reliable hold on any hair type, The Clips are made from Italian plant-based cellulose acetate; a sturdy, flexible, and eco-friendly material.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Crewneck Sweater
description: The classic cashmere sweater is timeless. Lightweight, soft and cozy, it's perfect for just about any time of year and occasion. This quality cashmere is incredibly long-lasting and three times as warm as wool, sourced sustainably and ethically.

name: Gel Hot and Cold Eye Mask
description: This gel eye mask is perfect for both hot and cold therapy. Use heat to soothe dry eyes, sinus pain, and stress. Use cold for puffy and swollen eyes, or simply keep it at room temperature for a relaxing sleep mask.

name: Pearl Drop Hoop Earring Pair
description: Delicate hoop for everyday wear. Vintage gold hardware and rice pearl detail on a 14k gold plated hoop. Each piece is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship out.

name: Jewelry Set
description: This set includes 3 Flex Medium Capsules that feature labels to keep your jewelry organized and untangled while away from home. These travel capsules feature a magnetic design that connects each container vertically or horizontally. Rest easy while traveling with these modular travel capsules. They are not only TSA-compliant but also 100% leakproof, ensuring your liquids and essentials stay securely contained. Pack these carry on reusable containers and say goodbye to messy spills on your journeys.

name: Monogrammed Large Split 2 Wheeled Duffel
description: This large, easy-access duffel can handle all of your gear while offering the convenience of wheeled luggage. Staying organized is simple too. With a quick zip of the interior, the roomy main compartment can be divided into two sections to separate, for example, clean and dirty items, or clothing from shoes. Smaller pockets inside and out keep essentials in order.

name: Harry Potter Hogwarts™ Courtyard: Sirius’s Rescue
description: Kids can recreate a classic scene from Harry Potter™ and the Prisoner of Azkaban™ and act out enchanting stories of their own. A daring escape and a wild flight aboard Buckbeak™ the Hippogriff are just the beginning of this thrilling Hogwarts™ adventure. This versatile playset is based on memorable scenes from Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban™. It features 3 iconic minifigures – Harry Potter, Hermione Granger™ and Sirius Black™ – and popular Buckbeak™ the Hippogriff. Buckbeak has movable wings and room on his back for a minifigure passenger. A prison cell high in the Hogwarts tower is the scene for a daring rescue, and Harry’s famous Firebolt racing broomstick is there to speed kids to their next magical adventure! Includes 345 pieces and is best for ages 8+.

name: Personalized Jim Vegan Luggage Tag
description: This Jim Bag Tag offers discreet ID coverage and beautiful craftsmanship. It features antique gold hardware, Vegan Leather, and an adjustable buckle strap. The tag measures 2.75" (H) x 4.5" (L) x 0.125" (D).

name: Soothing Milk Bath - Coconut Milk + Oatmeal
description: This calming blend combines healing herbal extracts with vitamin-rich coconut milk to leave skin moisturized, velvety soft, and smelling ever so slightly like a delicious baked good. Formulated to alleviate dryness, this comforting blend is also a fantastic remedy for sunburns or anyone with very sensitive skin. Milk Bath can also be used as a face mask or spot treatment on particularly dry or irritated areas. Simply mix a bit of Milk Bath with water to form a paste and apply it to the affected area. Includes an 8 oz glass jar, provides 6-8 uses.

name: Ace Fanny Pack
description: Whether you’re an avid explorer or just like to keep things hands-free on the regs, The Ace Fanny Pack is your perfect companion. Measures 9.25" L x 5.5" H x 2.75" W.

name: Raaka Chocolate Chocolate Library Gift Box
description: 8 bars from Raaka's collection. This gift collection showcases the variety of cacao beans and the unconventional methods Raaka uses to bring out their flavors.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: This speaker brings good times wherever it goes. It provides two hours of continuous playback through Bluetooth and features a standard 3.5mm audio input for connecting with other devices. The 33-foot range is perfect for road trips, beach days, and parties.

name: Square Link Anklet
description: It doesn't get cooler than this sleek and modern anklet. You are always on the go so we made being trendy effortless. An ankle bracelet says you're chic, no fuss, and ready to relax. Breeze into summer with style. It measures 8.5" - 9.5".

name: Ubarre Weight, 16lb
description: The Ubarre's ergonomic shape is designed for comfort and utility. Made of steel, it measures 11 x 14 inches.

name: TRX Weighted Jump Rope
description: Cardio and strength in one. Turn your jump rope intervals into strengthening sessions with weighted handles that tire out arms more quickly than you can say "double under." Extra grippy handles enhance your ability to hold on through every weighted rep while your heart rate shoots up from the extra resistance. Removable weights instantly transform your workouts into speed session. Solid PVC roper interior for long-lasting durability.

name: Toto Poop Bag
description: The cutest little poop bag holder/dispenser. Features a dog snap to attach to leash, key chain, or bag. Handles unsnap to fit onto leash handles.  Lightweight and compact. Measures  1.25" x 3.25".

name: Taste Of America Collection
description: The gift of delicious possibilities, this handpicked collection includes food and drink tours all across America! From homemade beignets in New Orleans to craft beers in Denver, your taste buds will be dazzled in the city of your choice. All you have to do is choose a delicious experience. The Goody CX team will be in touch with instructions on redeeming your gift.

name: Valentine's Day Pretzel Gems™
description: These Valentine's Day Pretzel Gems offer a delicious balance of sweet and salty, making them impossible to resist (and ideal to gift). A crispy Pretzel core is enrobed in holiday-inspired gourmet chocolate, making way for a surely satisfying bite! Includes 1 tube holding 1 lb of pretzel gems.

name: Monogrammed Extended Trip Packing Case, Matte Black
description: Exceptionally striking up close or from a distance, this super durable packing case boasts a modern silhouette with fluid looking, strategically contoured angles. This larger hardside luggage piece is ideal for longer business or leisure trips, or when two are traveling together. As with all metals, wear and tear, including nicks, dings and slight denting, is to be anticipated and carried with pride for a journey well-traveled. To further add to the unique characteristics of your travel case, they’ve packed a variety of vintage-inspired decorative stickers inside your case. Upon delivery, this item will require a signature. Dimensions include20.5" W X 30.5" H X 11" D.

name: Braiding Sweetgrass
description: Drawing on her life as an indigenous scientist, and as a woman, Kimmerer shows how other living beings offer us gifts and lessons, even if we've forgotten how to hear their voices. In reflections that range from the creation of Turtle Island to the forces that threaten its flourishing today, she circles toward a central argument: that the awakening of ecological consciousness requires the acknowledgment and celebration of our reciprocal relationship with the rest of the living world.

name: Single Mystery Tackle Box
description: These Single Mystery Tackle Boxes are stuffed full of tackle from leaders in the fishing industry, and even feature limited edition baits. Choice of box type.

name: Daily Weekly Monthly Planner
description: This classic Daily Weekly Monthly Planner is an open-dated planner that features space to timestamp events and tasks, room for notes, and sketches with matching spiral binding for ease of use. Includes daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly sections complete with a place for notes and monthly goals. Also features 2 pockets in the back to organize any loose-leaf paper you come across throughout your day.

name: Monogrammed Cleo Leather Key Fob
description: A classic all leather key chain tab with gold tone dog snap. Monogram is included for a stylish personalized look.

name: SELPHY Wireless Compact Photo Printer
description: Print vibrant, professional-like photos off a memory card, USB flash drive, or computer connection with the ultra-compact Canon SELPHY CP1500, in a sleek black design. At approximately 7 x 5 x 2", the SELPHY is a portable photo printer that supports four different paper sizes, including small adhesive stickers.

name: Double Wall 13.5oz Glasses, Set of 2
description: These double wall glasses maintain the perfect sipping temperature and prevents condensation from forming. The elegant shape fits comfortably in your hand and remains cool to the touch. Includes a set of 2, each holding 13.5oz.

name: Bath Board
description: The Bath Board puts all of your bathing ritual accessories at your fingertips. Crafted from premium pine wood (FSC Certified) with hemp rope handles and a minimal design to compliment any bathroom aesthetic. Measuring 32” wide and 8” deep, the Bath Board accommodates most standard tubs and has enough room to hold a beverage, a candle, and other bathing ritual accessories. The flip up mirror is perfect for applying face masks and scrubs.

name: Unisex Premium Crewneck Sweatshirt
description: Take the cold seasons in style with this premium crew neck sweatshirt. Available in multiple colors, this sweatshirt is sure to keep you warm and stylish all day long. Featuring a 3-end fleece fabric, it has a real tight-knit construction giving it better quality and durability. It’s not only beautiful but also comfy and soft to the touch with the best in its class and under 5% shrinkage. 80% ringspun cotton, 20% polyester.

name: Money Tree Plant
description: In many cultures worldwide gifting a Money Tree has become very common since people want to influence other people’s lives positively. A perfect indoor foliage plant to give your home a tropical feel!

name: The Sidecar Toiletry Kit
description: A reusable waterproof pouch easily slips into the rear pocket for swift access, featuring elasticized mesh interior organizer pockets. Additionally, it includes a front zip pocket for small items and a side webbing grab handle. Measures 8.75" x 6.75" x 3.5".

name: Responsible Down Puffer Jacket
description: The perfect jacket for your cold-weather adventures is here: the Responsible Down Puffer Jacket. You'll be warm all winter long thanks to the water-repellent and wind-resistant fabric. Sourced responsibly to ensure best practices in animal welfare. Meet your new winter wardrobe essential and enjoy it for years to come.

name: POP Keys Wireless Mechanical Tactile Switch Keyboard
description: Let personality POP on your deskspace and beyond with POP Keys. The new, head-turning mechanical keyboard from Logitech comes with 8 swappable emoji keys and an emoji menu button, all customizable through Logitech software. Enjoy a satisfying, retro typewriter-like experience, with multi-device wireless connectivity (via Bluetooth® or Logi Bolt USB receiver) and a series of cool new shortcuts.

name: 1000 Piece Puzzle Collection 2
description: A modern 1000 piece puzzle made by incredible artists creating original, accessible art. Select from a variety of beautiful designs, each made by a uniquely talented artist.

name: Reversible Kitchen Towel Set of 3
description: Reversing to a 100% Turkish cotton terry cloth, the Sweet July Reversible Kitchen Towels are super absorbent, making them the perfect tool for drying, cleaning, and soaking up house-hold spills. The plush, soft, and functional dish towels come in a set of three stripe patterns. Each dish towel measures 20″ x 30″. Machine washable. Choice of set color.

name: Fruit Pie
description: Using their signature, melt in your mouth, all-butter crust and time-tested family heirloom recipes, they’ve created a classically Southern selection of sweet pies your family will love. Choose your favorite!

name: PIXIO Pixoplasma Magnetic Block Construction Set
description: PIXOPLASMА includes five magnetic block colors: yellow, orange, red, pink, and violet. Like the particles that make up our universe, these colors attract one another to create cosmic fusions. Model the abstract 3D objects emitted by the charged particles of your mind. Recommended for ages 6+.

name: Flowknit Ultra-Soft Performance Polo
description: Level up your perfect polo. This supersoft option is ideal for golf, travel, or date-night. This insanely-soft Flowknit fabric is not only sustainable, but jam-packed with performance features like moisture-wicking and anti-odor for ultimate versatility. Flowknit is made from Global Recycle Standard poly yarn, which diverts and recycles plastics destined for landfill or the ocean, so you can feel and look good in what you wear.

name: Think Vegan
description: For the newly (or long-term) vegan special ones in your life, Tasty Ribbon scoured Italy to find exciting products that could add a bit of flare to your next vegan meal. Think about a pasta night with vegan ragout, a re-interpretation of the traditional Tuscan meat sauce made extra special with the best (and most attractive!) extra virgin olive oil from Puglia. Let them indulge in the most delicious hazelnut spread or enjoy a gourmet snack or aperitivo with truffle potato chips, organic artichoke spread, organic sparkling orange juice, and our bestselling olives mix. They will thank you over and over again!

name: Cup Cubes Freezer Tray
description: Prep, freeze and thaw 1 cup portions of anything. Made from premium, FDA-certified silicone with a strong metal frame, this bigger Cup Cube is a clean and easy way to hang onto leftovers. And it's not just for the freezer, it withstands super high temps, so you can bake mini banana (or zuchini) bread loaves. Made from premium, LFGB-certified silicone for easy-to-pop-out cubes in perfect portions. Snap-on lid for easy stacking while protecting against freezer odors.

name: A Valentine's Day Treat
description: Choose a valentine's day treat of your choice.

name: 3 Count Sauce Variety Pack
description: Carbone Fine Food's brand new 3-Jar Variety Pack includes a jar of Carbone's super-premium marinara, arrabbiata, and tomato basil.

name: Series 3 Smart Dog Collar and 6 Month Fi Subscription
description: This collar has real-time Live GPS Tracking when your dog is lost, a 200% LTE signal with the ability to track in most remote areas and on hikes. With 400lbs resistance, it handles the worst chewers and pullers. This gift includes a 6 month subscription as well as the collar itself. A Fi digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address the recipient provides within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription and select dog collar details on Fi website.

name: The Honey Couplet
description: Brightland is excited to announce a brand new addition to their family: raw, unfiltered honey straight from the hive. This honey offers complex aroma and superior palatability, and was hand-selected to support small, family-run farms in the United States -- just like their olive oils and vinegars. The Couplet includes one jar each of California Orange Blossom Honey and Kauai Wildflower Honey.

name: 60 Minute Session
description: Flytographer connects you with hand-picked local photographers in over 350 destinations around the globe for fun, hassle-free photo shoots. For the cost of a nice evening out, Flytographer can capture your destination vacation and deliver the perfect travel souvenir, priceless memories. This 1 hour session includes 30 photos at 1-2 locations.

name: All-in-One Cast Iron Grill
description: The All-in-One Cast Iron Grill is an outdoor cook’s dream. A cast iron base and domed lid, grill grate, baking steel, tripod stand, and coal tray combine in countless configurations to expand your outdoor dining options. Done cooking? Pack it all down into a single self-contained bundle to minimize what you carry. Provides 7 ways to cooking and included a Wok base, domed lid, grill grate, baking griddle. Bowl measures 15" x 15" x 5" with a kit that measures 18" x 15" x 19".

name: Arc Soundbar with Dolby Atmos
description: Bring all your entertainment to life with the brilliantly realistic sound of Arc, featuring Dolby Atmos. Enjoy control with your TV remote, voice, the Sonos app, Apple AirPlay 2, and more.

name: Pasta Master
description: Open your door to the world of pasta with this fun, tasty Italian gift box that includes all the ingredients of an unforgettable Pasta al Pomodoro dish. The finest imported pasta, P.O.D. extra virgin olive oil, aged Parmigiano Reggiano cheese, tomato and basil sauce will delight every “Pasta Master” in your life, even the most sophisticated ones that love to garnish the plate with fresh basil.

name: 16oz Seal Tight Bowl
description: From soups to snacks, leak-proof your leftovers with the reusable Porter Seal-Tight Bowl. Designed to encourage healthier habits, this eco-friendly bowl is crafted from durable borosilicate glass wrapped in the highest quality protective silicone, making it the perfect alternative to plastic takeout containers. Packed lunches never looked so good. Holds 16oz and measures 3.6 x 4.4 x 4.4 in.

name: Fully Baked Bakeware Collection
description: You’ll be set up for success to make any dessert you fancy with this seven-piece mixed-material collection of bakeware. The entire set is oven-safe, dishwasher-friendly, nonstick and nontoxic, so your baked goods pop right out and clean up is hassle-free. This set includes the Holy Sheet half-sized sheet pan, 2x Breadwinner 1-lb loaf pans, 2x Patty Cake 9" cake pans, the Hot Dish 9x13" modern ceramic casserole dish, and the 10" ceramic pie dish, Sweetie Pie.

name: Metallic Ember Mug², 10oz
description: Designed for home or office, the Ember Mug² does more than simply keep your coffee hot. This smart mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.

name: Oasis Snake Plant
description: Spice up your life with this sleek snake plant. Upright green and yellow leaves are known for promoting focus and helping boost your memory. And if you believe all that glitters is gold, then this brushed gold ceramic planter is for you. This plant purifies the air, reduces allergens, and it’s low maintenance. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Men's Hemp Jersey Pocket Tee
description: Layered or solo, tees are essential in every season. This relaxed-fit, hemp short-sleeve crewneck shows up every day.

name: Grill Spatula
description: Check steaks, flip burgers, and spread sauces. This spatula is crafted with hand-forged stainless steel and fitted with a smooth, natural walnut handle that keeps cool over high heat. This grill spatula is longer than normal length which allows for comfort and safety when working around fire and hot coals. Measures 24.5" x 3.75" x 1.75".

name: Sour Candy Tube
description: Even more tasty than they are pretty, this licorice is a delightful blend of sweet and sour, with bold fruity flavors that are simply irresistible. Includes 1 tube filled with 1 pound of candy.

name: Dutch Baby
description: Dutch Baby is a round, 3.5-quart cast-iron Dutch oven that's customized for smaller batches and kitchens. Perfect if you frequently cook for one or two people.

name: 27" T350 Series FreeSync Monitor
description: Seamless screen with 3-sided border-less display stretches from edge to edge for immersive viewing and maximum concentration. With refined dark blue gray exterior, the screen brings more sleek and modern look.

name: Silicone Suction Placemat Set
description: UpwardBaby’s rounded placemats are a convenient and hassle-free way for growing babies and toddlers to practice eating on their own without making a mess. Perfect for baby-led weaning and all stages of learning to eat! Each of the 3 placemats fit the corners of rounded tables for a seamless toddler dining experience. Ideal for eating at home or on the go!

name: Vegan Birthday Gift Box 25 Pack
description: Each flavor is handcrafted with the most delicious dairy-free vegan ingredients.

name: Black Hollywood: Reimagining Iconic Movie Moments
description: A visionary photography book that brings together the best of classic Hollywood with today's iconic Black entertainers for an immersive experience unlike anything you've ever seen before. By Carell Augustus. Hardcover.

name: Malala Fund Donation
description: More than 120 million girls are out of school today. Your support helps break down the barriers holding them back.

name: Dark Pepites
description: Immerse yourself in a flavor journey where Valencia almonds, handpicked and perfectly roasted, meet a luscious blend of Venezuelan and Madagascan 70% dark chocolate. Each bite is a symphony of taste and texture, blending the almonds' crunchiness with the smooth, rich decadence of our carefully curated chocolate. These delightful Vegan confections are not just treats, but a sensory expedition into the realms of gourmet pleasure. This gift holds 15 pieces.

name: Etched Box Grater with Removable Zester
description: This grater features four different etched stainless steel grating surfaces to make short work of grating, slicing and shredding, plus a detachable zester for quick zesting tasks. The non-slip base keeps the grater in place as you work, while the soft handle provides a comfortable grip. Use directly over the included container to catch and measure food in one go. When you're done, snap the lid over the container to seal for storage.

name: amfAR Donation
description: The gift of giving! amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research, is one of the world's leading nonprofit organizations dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education, and advocacy.

name: Branded Two Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: These are the cookies that get you hooked and keep you asking for more. Even non-cookie lovers can’t stop themselves with this mix of Cravory's most craveable and gourmet cookie flavors. Includes 12 cookies.

name: Puffer Corduroy
description: Designed with grandpa in mind, Brunch introduces the puffer as part of the ‘grandkords’ collection. It is a silhouette designed for the cooler months with extra warmth and an added collapse back for indoor/outdoor versatility. The puffer is the perfect lightweight and insulated shoe for any activity.

name: Organic Core Sheet Set, King
description: Meet the freshly-squeezed collection of GOTS-certified organic cotton that’s safe for your world. In 100% long-staple organic percale, it's breathable, crisp, lightweight, and relaxed (thanks to garment washing!). Go organic already—it’s the next level of comfort. Includes 1​ flat sheet, 1 fitted sheet, and 2 pillowcases in King size. Choice of set color.

name: Premium Sampler Variety Box
description:
This snack box is a collection of 20 individually wrapped organic snacks. Get ready to discover the newest, most delicious, healthiest, and trusted natural brands. It includes 1 Blake's Birthday Cake Rice Crispy Treat, 1 Kibo Lentil Chip, 1 Good Crisps Good Crisps, 1 Chum Chum Fruit Bites Mango, 1 Pasokin Peanut Butter Bites, 1 Partake Chocolate Chip Cookies, 1 Sweet Nothings Oatmeal Raisin and Peanut Butter Nut Butter Bites, 1 YumEarth Tropical Fruit Snacks, 1 Field Trip Pepperoni Beef & Pork Stick, 1 Country Archer Pineapple Mini Stick, 1 Natures Bakery Raspberry Fig Bar, 1 Natures Bakery Blueberry Fig Bar, 2 Wiley Wallaby Huckleberry Licorice, 1 Emmy's Coconut Peanut Butter Cookie, 1 Kapop Cinnamon Churro Vegan Puffs, 1 Wonderful Pistachios Roasted & Salted Pistachios, 1 Rip Van Wafels Chocolate Brownie Amsterdam Wafel, 1 BEAR Raspberry Fruit Rolls,
and 1 Yum Earth Vegan Sucker.

name: Smart Growhouse
description: Modern Sprout's Smart Growhouse makes sustaining a year-round garden inside of your home not only doable, but beautiful. A watertight planter allows for easy planting, watering, and harvesting. Stylish and multi-functional, the Smart Growhouse is perfect for an endless variety of kitchen herbs and leafy greens plus cacti, succulents and houseplants. Rated for 25,000 hours of usage depending on timer settings. LEDs emit little to no heat and have a conformal coating for water resistance and durability. Interior is sized to hold 4” potted plants.

name: F80 FLAT KABUKI™ BRUSH
description: An industry icon, their #1 best-selling foundation brush provides a buildable, airbrushed foundation finish. With ultra-soft Sigmax® fibers that smooth out your favorite liquid or cream products like a dream, you’ll get high-definition skin in no time!

name: Railroad Lantern
description: A modern twist on an antique and well-loved Union Pacific vintage lantern. Gorgeous seeded glass and copper accents make this a unique light for a curated dinner table or at camp. High-tech and functional, this railroad lantern utilizes battery or USB with a run time of 100+ hours on low or 3.5 hours on high. Adjustable brightness LED Edison-style bulb provides a classic warming glow perfect for every occasion.

name: Rae Roll-Top Dry Bag
description: With a wipeable waterproof interior, roll top clip closure, and plastic clip, even if you aren’t spending your summer sun drenched and water logged, you can still find lots of uses for roll top Rae. This waterproof bag is good for protecting your goodies, doubles as a produce bag, and separates the damp from the dry.

name: 6x3 Inch Tattoo
description: Select your choice of 6x3 inch tattoo. Each tattoo is designed by one of Inkbox's talented artists and lasts 1-2 weeks.

name: Good to Great
description: Good to Great: Why Some Companies Make the Leap... and Others Don't is a management book by Jim C. Collins that describes how companies transition from being good companies to great companies, and how most companies fail to make the transition. Hardcover.

name: Memory Foam Bed Pillow
description: A pillow with a unique ergonomic shape that ensures your head is always properly positioned for a good night's sleep, regardless of your sleeping position. Bed Pillow's three-dimensional design, with different heights, fits the natural curvature of your neck. It can be used on both sides, so that the Bed Pillow adapts to you and not the other way around. Bed Pillow is designed to offer the perfect support for all kinds of sleeping positions: on either side, on your back, or on your stomach. So you'll have the perfect support even if you move during the night. Includes one pillow, choice of color.

name: Acacia Wood Nested Bowl Trio
description: Made of Acacia wood, these nesting serving bowls make a beautiful addition to your tablescape or kitchen. Each piece has its own uniqueness as it is made by hand. Serve salads, snacks or sides in the varying sizes. Includes a set of three bowls measuring 8.4″, 10.2″, and 12″.

name: Choco Box
description: Give the gift of the sweet break they deserve with these melt-in-your-mouth delights: assorted chocolate pralines, pistachio and hazelnut bars and cremino gianduja ingot. Great flavors can come in small boxes and this selection is the proof!

name: Round and Baguette Diamond Criss Cross Stud Earrings
description: Crafted in 10K yellow gold, these exquisite stud earrings are adorned with a mesmerizing criss-cross design, showcasing the brilliance of 10 natural diamonds. With a total weight of 1/10 cttw, these diamonds are carefully set in a prong setting, allowing them to shimmer and dance with every movement. The round and baguette diamond arrangement creates a harmonious balance, exuding sophistication and grace. The H-I color of these diamonds adds a touch of warmth, while the I1-I2 clarity ensures a radiant sparkle.

name: Caro Pen
description: There are many instances throughout the day when an easily accessible pen can be a big help. Signing a lease? Writing a poem during your lunch break? Composing a grocery list? Instead of rummaging through your bag for a pen that may or may not be there, meet the Caro Pen— ensuring that no epiphany, good idea, or quick sketch goes unrealized. The Caro Pen’s cap doubles as a loop that can slide onto your keyring, alongside your keys and any other tools you might use, you'll be equipped, ready to write down that important phone number, even when your phone is dead.

name: After Sun Gel
description: An elegant, modern take on the aloe vera after sun gels you grew up with that’s non sticky, alcohol-free, and specially designed to soothe, hydrate and rejuvenate sun-exposed skin. Helps prevent peeling and prolong a summer glow while keeping skin feeling soft, luxurious, and smooth. Contains 6 fl oz.

name: Streaming Stick 4K
description: Roku® Streaming Stick® 4K features exactly what you need for smooth streaming in spectacular 4K, Dolby Vision®, and HDR10+ picture in a design that it plugs right into the TV with a simple setup. It's got a whole lot of practicality packed into a shape that doesn't take over your whole wrist, with signature Wren orange accents to help it stand out from the crowd. Luminescent hands and index markings bring nighttime functionality, while a built-in compass function helps you keep your bearings. The whole thing's water resistant up to 100 meters of pressure, and the interchangeable, NATO-style strap ensures your skin never touches hot metal on a boiling summer day.

name: Candy Gram
description: Nosh's signature Candy Gram puts a modern spin on the "tele-gram" sending a message with little treat to sweeten your day! Includes 3 oz of candy.

name: Silicone Bottle Stopper Set of 3
description: Sip, store, and repeat with silicone bottle stoppers. Store bottles flat or stand them up in small spaces with our easy-to-clean, reusable bottle stoppers. The low-profile hidden cork creates an airtight seal for no leaks, drips, spills, or fuss. Dishwasher safe. Includes a set of 3 bottle stoppers, choice of color.

name: Closed Helix Keyring
description: A helix-shaped brass wire with turned end-caps. Simply unscrew the knurled side to add or remove keys.

name: Pregnancy Belly Oil
description: Made for pregnant women, by a pregnant woman. A clean, nontoxic blend of carefully formulated organic botanical oils created specifically for pre and postpartum skin. Formulas absorb instantly, so you're never felt leaving greasy. While all Esker Body Oils are safe for use during pregnancy, this target certified organic formula is specially optimized for this purpose with very subtle scent profiles and rich hydrating properties. Includes one 2oz/60ml bottle.

name: Dutch Licorice Lace Tube
description: Imported from the Netherlands, these vibrant, smooth, chewy licorice laces are the perfect cure for any sweet tooth. Experience real European quality in each shoe-lace like piece. Kids and grown-ups alike fall in love with these delectable strands. This old-fashioned treat will never go out of style! Includes 1 lb of candy.

name: Bilboquet Carafe
description: A playful take on the traditional wine decanter. Perfect for wine, but also any other liquid. Made of Borosilicate glass, measures 9.5”H × 6”W and holds 32 oz.

name: 4 Pack Sweet Pie Bundle
description: A delicious assortment of petite and sweet pies to sample! Pies are 5 inches in diameter and serve 1 - 2 people. This Sweet Pie 4 Pack includes Caramel Pecan, Chocolate Chess, French Coconut Custard, and Signature Buttermilk.

name: Slim Single Billfold
description: A classic design, this slim wallet offers understated utility that’s perfect for everyday use. It features just enough room for your essentials: cash, ID, and cards. Beautiful design details elevate both the style and functionality, creating rich textured and smooth leather accessories that you will use every day for years to come.

name: Variety Pack, 4 Boxes
description: Try Magic Spoon's most popular flavors including Fruity, Frosted, Cocoa, and Peanut Butter. Magic Spoon has reimagined all your favorite childhood cereals with 4g net carbs, 13-14g complete protein, 140-170 calories, and no artificial ingredients.

name: Bagel & Cream Cheese Making Kit
description: When picking up bagels for a get-together, a dozen is the no-fail preferred order at any New York bagel shop. But with this kit, you can skip the line and make a dozen homemade bagels. From roping, looping, boiling to baking, getting to make your own bagels is as much fun as eating them. Perfect for any party or gathering, make and share these bagels with friends and family. Choose flavors like everything, or a mixed bag of that includes poppy, sesame, plain.

name: Baked Goods Sampler Gift Basket
description: This gift basket boasts some of your favorite gourmet baked goods. Beloved rich brownies and tempting cookies are artfully arranged in a beautiful gift basket.

name: Baby Bowl and Spoon, Set of 3
description: The UpwardBaby silicone baby bowl and spoon set is perfect for baby-led weaning and babies in the early stages of learning to eat solid foods. Even the rowdiest babies won’t be able to flip UpwardBaby bowls. They instantly stick to almost any clean, smooth surface and lift free when parents tug on the handy tab. Your baby’s first spoon is covered with soft, silicone making it safe to learn with and easy on sensitive, teething toddler gums.

name: Black Truffle Salt
description: If you crave the luxuriousness of truffles, Truffle Salt will become your go-to seasoning. You can substitute it for some of the salt in your favorite recipes or use just a pinch as a finishing touch to elevate any meal.

name: Telegraph Collection Soup Bowl
description: The sleek, ear-handled ceramic design makes the ideal canvas for all the colorful and delicious soups you cook up. Each piece is hand-thrown, which gives it a unique feel and variation. Includes 1 soup bowl measuring 5". Dishwasher safe, microwave safe, oven safe up to 300 degrees.

name: JBL Go 3 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: JBL Go 3 features bold styling and rich JBL Pro Sound. With its new eye-catching edgy design, colorful fabrics and expressive details this a must-have accessory for your next outing. Your tunes will lift you up with JBL Pro Sound, it’s IP67 waterproof and dustproof so you can keep listening rain or shine, and with its integrated loop, you can carry it anywhere. JBL Go 3 looks as vivid as it sounds and plays for 5 continuous hours when fully charged.

name: Pot Holders
description: Keep your hands cool when the heat is kicking with these two-tone Pot Holders, complete with an easy access pocket to help with the holding. Throw it down on the table under whatever’s hot: voila, you’ve got a handy trivet to protect your surfaces. These two-tone Pot Holders are for those who love organization & precision in the kitchen. This gift comes with two holders, each measuring 7.75” x 7.75".

name: Arte Cheese & Charcuterie
description: The Arte Cheese & Charcuterie Board features 35 hand selected artisan cheeses, charcuterie, dried fruits, nuts and crackers sourced from around the world. This board serves 10-12 and arrives chilled, fully arranged and ready-to-serve in a reusable acacia wood board. Includes 66 oz of cheese, charcuterie, and condiments total. Includes bamboo serving ware. Nuts arrive individually bagged and placed in each tray.

name: Chain Ring
description: Crafted to ensure elegance, function and durability. This is the perfect ring for every day. Pieces are finished so they are water, sweat and tarnish resistant and clasps are lasered for enhanced durability.

name: Super Soft Stripe Knit Pillow
description: When transforming a room, or even a couch, into a sanctuary for comfort, think pillows. Just one well-placed Super Soft Stripe Knit Pillow can provide the visual balance and physical and emotional support you need when you need couch time. Whatever feat you've accomplished should land you somewhere soft and cozy. Includes one pillow, measuring 18" x 18".

name: 10K Yellow Gold Diamond Accented Leaf and Branch Stud Earrings
description: A captivating masterpiece that effortlessly blends nature's elegance with timeless sophistication. Crafted with utmost precision, these earrings feature a delicate leaf design adorned with 30 dazzling round diamonds. The 1/10 cttw of natural diamonds shimmer brilliantly, accentuating the beauty of the wearer. Set in a pave setting, these diamonds exhibit a mesmerizing H-I color, while the I1-I2 clarity ensures a radiant sparkle.

name: Rook Knife
description: The culmination of more than two years of design, the Rook Knife is a frame lock folding knife with S35VN blade steel, a drop point blade, and a flipper mechanism for easy one-handed opening. Constructed entirely from metal, it's slimmer than most folding knives, but with greater density and heft. This knife features a body that's half brass-half stainless, and a blade that's black PVD coated for a hint of tactical precision. Blade length measures 2.3" and when closed pocket knife measures 3.2"

name: Curious Critters Garden Kit
description: Restore nature’s floor! Includes non-invasive wildflower seeds, paper pulp critter, wooden marker and colored pencils. After being colored in, the paper pulp critter serves as a plant marker for your wildflower garden. Your critter is backyard compostable!

name: The Infinite Soy Candle
description: The Infinite Candle brings home your favorite moments in California. The non-toxic vegan soy wax is free of phthalates and phenols so you can safely enjoy it all day. Designed to have many lives, the elegant ceramic vessel can be emptied and repurposed around your home. Vessel measures 3.25" x 4.25", holds 11 oz, with a burn time of 50+ hours.

name: Kind to Yourself Kit
description: Kindhumans donates 3% of your gift to a nonprofit of your choice. Sustainable self care products, made by ethical brands with clean ingredients. This kit includes 1 Cast of Stones Love Soaking Salts, 1 Cast of Stones Love Moisturizing Body Spray, 1 Cast of Stones Palo Santo and Crystal Pouch, 1 Earth Tu Face Organic Anti-Oxidant Rich Facial Oil, 1 Anato Kelp Forest Mask & Polish, and 1 Terra Thread Lok Makeup Pouch, choice of color.

name: Box of 12 Macarons
description: The specialist in authentic high end French macarons, the freshness and quality of these meringue-based confections will melt in your mouth. Includes a box of 12 macarons.

name: Catch:3 Classics, Italian Leather
description: Single device wireless charging with a valet silhouette, allowing you to thoughtfully organize accessories and charge your devices. Weighted so it stays put, made with quality materials like aluminum alloy wrapped in premium Pebble-Grain Italian Leather and personalized with gold foil stamping. This charger can charge through most cases up to 3mm in thickness and has a USB C input, braided charging cable included. Measures 11" x 8" x 0.6". Gold foil monogram included and choice of leather color. Special characters not permitted for monogram and monogramming is done with capitalized letters.

name: MAG:1 Essentials
description: The MAG:1 is a low profile magnetic charger wrapped in designer-quality Belgian Linen and a durable ABS coated frame. It effortlessly blends in wherever it’s placed. This charger works best in locations where space saving is top of mind - like on end tables, office desks, and kitchen countertops or islands. MAG:1 also comes with a Courant-branded travel pouch for your on-the-go charging needs. For full magnetic compatibility, it's recommend to use MAG:1 with the iPhone 12 or 13.

name: Black Girls Code Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation creates new opportunities for girls and gender nonconforming youth of color to have a daring impact on tech. When they succeed, we all succeed.

name: Electric Citrus Juicer
description: Easily juice oranges, lemons, limes and more at home with this Electric Citrus Juicer. Juice oranges, lemons, limes and more. The self-reversing cone extracts maximum amount of juice. The clear view pitcher lifts off the base for immediate serving, and has removable parts that are dishwasher safe and stack for convenient storage. 25w power, holds 40 oz.

name: Occasion Box, Two Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: Send a message with cookies, and let the box do the talking. Each box includes Cravory's ever so popular Best Seller's Mix cookies, as well as a signature Cravory box and card. Makes the perfect gift.

name: Auto Fragrance
description: These can transport your car (or closet) to distant realms, real and imaginary.

name: Linen Weekender Bag
description: Your solution for that quick weekend trip. With just enough room to pack your essentials for a few days, and two snug pockets for full sized bottles of wine, the weekender will become your most used travel bag. Made of a cotton linen blend, and a quilted woven pattern to look chic sitting on your shoulder. It measures 16″ x 19″.

name: The Scrunchie No. 001
description: A set of three 100% silk scrunchies for less damage, more fun. Give your hair a break from breakage and switch to silk instead.

name: Ballpoint Pen
description: Exude brilliance in any task with this striking ballpoint pen. A feat of innovation, this bold and playful design catches the light with a multitude of dazzling flatback crystals inspired by jewelry techniques and is stamped with the Swarovski logo.

name: Team Bride
