description: It's official, you're on Team Bride! Clean linen and fresh marine notes mix with pops of citrus, linen, orange blossom, and marine.

name: Cufflinks
description: Give that suit a touch of style and class with these gunmetal jet black cufflinks. Each cufflink measures 1.8 x 1.2 x 2.1 cm and includes a set of 2.

name: Best Sellers Marshmallow Variety Pack
description: These are the Best of the Best! XO's top 3 best selling, most beloved marshmallows for anyone who wants to try a smaller portion of these iconic flavors. This set of 16 marshmallows comes with for of each flavor including Salted Caramel, Cinnamon Roll, Chocolate Chip, and Funfetti. Marshmallows are all egg free and gluten-free. No high fructose corn syrup, No preservatives.

name: 2 Piece Serving Utensil Set
description: Handmade salad servers made from Acacia wood to toss your greens. Each set has its own unique wood grain making them one of a kind. Gift includes 2 utensils, each measuring 12″.

name: Acrylic Paint Pen 4-Pack
description: These acrylic paint pens are an illustrator's dream. The precision of a pen combined with the glossy finish, smooth consistency and reassuring thickness of acrylic paint. Perfect for decorating your pieces with floral and abstract patterns, filling in detailed sketches and giving your pottery that colourful fired and glazed look. These pens are super versatile, and work perfectly on plastic, wood, cardboard, paper, glass and most other surfaces. Includes a set of 4.

name: Influence: The Psychology of Persuasion
description: Robert Cialdini—New York Times bestselling author of Pre-Suasion and the seminal expert in the fields of influence and persuasion—explains the psychology of why people say yes and how to apply these insights ethically in business and everyday settings. Understanding and applying the principles ethically is cost-free and deceptively easy. Backed by Dr. Cialdini’s 35 years of evidence-based, peer-reviewed scientific research—including a three-year field study on what leads people to change—Influence is a comprehensive guide to using these principles to move others in your direction.

name: Classic Tie-Dye Gift Box 25 Pack
description: Share the Latest & Greatest cupcakes in this go-to Classic Gift Box! This fan-favorite assortment comes with 25 handcrafted, mini cupcakes in 12 flavors. Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats, wrapped up in their signature tie-dye gift box!

name: Men's Tri-Block Ankle Socks
description: This tri-blocked ankle sock is architectural in design and pure Bombas in comfort, with the same high quality soft cotton yarn-work as the core ankle collection. One purchased = one donated.

name: Koda 16" Gas Powered Pizza Oven
description: Take charge of your outdoor cooking experience with this gas-powered outdoor pizza oven designed for stone baking epic 16-inch pizzas and delicious flame-cooked steaks, fish and vegetables. Blending a showstopping design with the convenience of cooking with gas, Koda 16 boasts a wide opening, large cordierite stone baking board and innovative L-shaped burner. Switch on the instant gas ignition, and you’ll be ready to cook in 20 minutes. Koda 16 reaches up to 950 °F (500 °C), the blazing heat needed for cooking stone-baked, perfect pizza. Compatible with propane tanks only.

name: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 16GB
description: Now with a 6.8” display and thinner borders, adjustable warm light, up to 10 weeks of battery life, and 20% faster page turns. Store thousands of titles, then take them all with you. A single charge via USB-C last weeks, not hours. Now with adjustable warm light to shift screen shade from white to amber.

name: Sweet July x Johanna Howard Home Throw
description: Sweet July partnered with Johanna Howard Home to create a cotton chenille throw with bold lines and curves to elevate your living space. The throw features a reversible design in a thick, soft fabric that you can cozy up with. It measures 52” x 70″ and is machine washable. Includes one throw, choice of color.

name: Bakery Treats Thank You Gift
description: There are so many ways to say thank you, but the sweetest way is with this Bakery Treats Thank You Gift. In a sophisticated green gift box are two brownie flavors, four cookie flavors, and four classic chocolate with vanilla cream whoopie pies. A total of 16 baked goods in this gift!

name: MagGo Battery with Stand for Apple iPhone MagSafe Devices
description: Enhance your charging experience with the simplicity of magnetic technology. Avoid the hassle of tangled cables while gaming or watching videos, thanks to the easy magnetic attachment. With its ultra-compact dimensions of 3.7 x 2.5 x 0.59 inches, it offers the convenience of a credit-card size. It's not just a battery, but also a wireless charger. Compatible with Apple iPhone 12 or higher.

name: Best Seller Pack
description: Whether you're new to TRUFF or their biggest fan, this best sellers pack is a collection of TRUFF’s most sought after items. Includes their Signature Black Truffle Hot Sauce, White Truffle Hot Sauce, and their decadent Black Truffle Oil.

name: Baby Socks 4-Pack (0-6 Months)
description: The best way to add some comfort and coziness to someone special’s little feet? Hands down (or rather, feet-down), Bombas made for the tiniest of little baby feet. Designed to inspire more smiles than a straight-to-the-belly raspberry, and so comfy they’ll want to start walking as quickly as possible. Fit for US sizes 0-6M. 4 purchased = 4 donated.

name: Pre-Order Select Electric Wine Aerator
description: The Aervana Select gives you the most control and flexibility of any aerating product yet. With the turn of a dial, it allows you to choose exactly the right amount of aeration for the wine being served. The dial has a range of settings from a minimum of no aeration, to the full scale that correlates to pouring a bottle into a decanter and expositing it to air for three hours. Includes a stainless steel tube that fits bottles 750 ml to 1.5L and a counter top stand for elegant storage. Note this gift is in pre-order status and ships beginning 2/20.

name: Ghianduja 2-Pack
description: This one is inspired by memories of childhood, slathering hazelnut spread on very tall stacks of crepes. This version of the sweet treat is made with olive oil instead of palm oil and half the sugar for a more sustainable, better-for-you and oh-so-drizzable good snack. Sold in 2-packs because more is more. Available smooth or crunchy, filled with crushed almonds and puffed quinoa.

name: Super-Soft Sweatshirt Cardigan
description: Meet cardigan style with sweatshirt ease. This shawl collar cardigan has it all, with supersoft + buttery fleece, buttons, and pockets. Designed to be a comfy fit.

name: Mag:3 Essentials, Italian Leather
description: The MAG:3 features a sleek 2-in-1 charging zone with both “MagSafe” and “Qi” compatibility to power your iPhone and AirPods side by side. The recrafted valet tray has increased tray space with an improved modern shape to display your everyday essentials - plus, an extra USB-C port on the back, perfect for a 3rd device or Apple Watch.

name: Energizing Tea Box
description: Need a little extra pep in your step? Get an energy boost without all the jitters with the Energizing Tea Box. This box is packed with caffeinated teas to help improve focus and mental clarity while keeping you calm, grounded and ready to face the day. This box comes with enough tea to make 16 cups.

name: Triple Threat
description: Fly by Jing's best-selling trio. This good-on-everything-trio includes 1 jar each of the numbing yet savory 100% natural Sichuan Chili Crisp, the sweet and spicy umami-rich Zhong Sauce, and the Mala Spice Mix that includes a potent mix of 11 herbs and spices. Includes 3 jars: 6 oz Chili Crisp, 6 oz Zhong Sauce & 3.5 oz Mala Spice Mix.

name: Branded Clara French Press in Matte Black
description: Clara is in an immersion league of her own. With nuanced details and upgraded features, this brewing process is easy, enjoyable, and the epitome of a coffee table centerpiece. Whether you want to dial in a French press recipe at breakfast or entertain a crowd with shrimp cocktail in one hand and Clara in the other, you will always end up with an elevated cup.

name: Comfy Rib Sweater Pant
description: Knit with UpWest's comfy sweater yarn, this is the perfect lounge pant.

name: Tiramisu Classico Cake
description: Two layers of coffee washed cake are filled with a light buttercream and topped with a delectable coffee whipped cream. As an extra touch, this delight is then sprinkled with dark chocolate and cocoa. With just the right mixture of coffee and chocolate, you can be sure that this Italian favorite will perk up anyone's day. Serves 6 to 8, and measures 7 inches in diameter.

name: Dolby 5.1 Soundbar
description: Elevate your favorite content. Dolby Digital 5.1 capable creates realistic surround sound by projecting it from all around you, while DTS Virtual: X expands your listening experience without having to add extra speakers.

name: Hot Dish
description: This 9-by-13-inch ceramic casserole dish is a modern take on a nostalgic, versatile classic. This practical pan handles lasagna, cakes, chicken parts, roast vegetables, cobblers, and crisps with ease.

name: 12oz Double Wall Glasses Set of 2
description: The double-wall glass provides insulation suitable for use with hot or cold drinks. Double-wall glass insulates for a cool to touch experience without the need for a handle. The form visually suspends liquid in the center, putting your coffee, tea, cocktails or water on elegant display. Includes a set of two, 12 oz glasses. Choice of color.

name: Outdoor Shatter-Resistant Wine Glass Set of 4
description: This set of four wine glasses are made from clear shatter resistant acrylic plastic with beautiful design patterns and are hard-wearing enough to stand up to being thrown into a picnic basket after use. These glasses work just as well outdoors as indoors. They hold 10 oz., and measure H 4 3/8".

name: Adjustable Round Zafu Meditation Cushion
description: This traditional Zafu-style meditation cushion helps reduce joint stress, relieve lower back pain, and reduce numbness in the hands and feet during extended meditation. With a machine-washable cover and adjustable design, you'll enjoy deeper, more comfortable meditation.

name: 1 Dozen Red Roses in Vase
description: A classic design featuring 12 premium hand-picked roses, accented with seasonal greenery. Glass vase included. We cannot guarantee a specified delivery date. The Goody support team will reach out to you to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: DEUXnuts
description: These babies are sweet, snackable, and enhanced with B12 and L-Theanine for focus & energy support. They’re perfectly poppable at any time of the day, from your morning routine to a midnight snack! Comes in 2 packs with 4 donuts in each pack. Vegan and gluten-free.

name: Treat Yo Self
description: The name says it all! Treat youself or someone you love with this set of three 7.5 oz containers that include 1 tube of "CAKE CAKE CAKE" cupake gummies, 1 tube of "SELF CARE" sour peach heart gummies, and 1 tube of "PIZZA PARTY" pizza gummies.

name: Kindhumans x MiiR 12 oz Travel Tumbler
description: Good riddance single-use coffee cups. The Kindhumans x MiiR Travel Tumbler is way more sustainable and makes the perfect companion for your morning routine. It keeps your beverage hot or cold longer and has a leak-proof lid that prevents spilling your drink on your lap before that big meeting or epic adventure.

name: Escape Room for Two, San Francisco, CA
description: Combine a fun social activity with critical thinking and challenging puzzles during this entertaining Escape Room experience in San Francisco. Choose from 5 different escape room scenarios that each present a different theme and special challenge. Whether you're naturally curious or more of an analytical thinker, this escape room experience is the perfect way to put your unique skills to the test! Includes an experience for two people.

name: SIGMAGIC® BRUSHAMPOO™
description: Give your brushes a deep, gentle clean with this all-natural cleanser designed to clean and condition brush bristles. Outperforming instant brush sprays that only remove surface-level makeup residue and bacteria, this SigMagic® formula penetrates brush bristles to remove even the toughest pigment and foundation stains.

name: 9x13" Baking Dish
description: A classic Bakeware shape, the Rectangular Baking Dish can handle anything from savory bakes to snacking cakes. This dish was made in France, from 202-Year-Old Porcelain Recipe and is thermal-shock resistant.

name: Bruschetta Kit
description: The makings of an unforgettable bruschetta. Includes olive oil, tapenade and pesto starring the bright flavors of black and green olives. Tasty Ribbon donates 5% of proceeds to God's Love We Deliver.

name: Codex Leather-Wrapped Rocks Glasses, Set of 2
description: These glasses pay homage to old-school apothecaries and alchemists, with minimally processed leather wraps that get better with age. The natural oils in the leather develop a patina over time, showing off each glass's history, and each wrap has a unique stamp so you can remember which one's which. The leather helps insulate, too, keeping your hands hand temperature and your drinks drink temperature.

name: Zodiac Chocolate Collection - Celestial Star Signs Chocolate Gift Box
description: Unlock celestial chocolate magic with this Zodiac Chocolate Gift Box, an opulent indulgence for the senses. Encased in a luxurious gold gift box, this divine collection features 12 tantalizing chocolate pieces, each representing a unique zodiac sign. Embark on a delicious journey as you savor Compartés exquisite chocolates, meticulously crafted to captivate your taste buds. Whether you’re an adventurous Aries, a sophisticated Libra, or any other sign, this celestial ensemble is a heavenly treat that combines decadence and astrology into one enchanting experience.

name: Thank You Jewel Garden
description: The Jewel Garden will put a smile on anyone's face and bring a touch of nature to any small space.

name: Ascent Series A2500 Blender
description: The Ascent Series A3500 Gold Label is the ultimate kitchen upgrade. Eye-catching gold accents and sophisticated colors elevate the look of any kitchen. The A3500 offers exceptional performance and compatibility with a wide range of containers and attachments. And since Vitamix blenders last up to 10x longer than an average blender, it’ll be the centerpiece of your kitchen for years to come. 64 oz.

name: Mini Eyeshadow Palette
description: Bask in this lavish mix of matte eyeshadows, shimmer eyeshadows and metallic eyeshadows, and find the perfect color to compliment your day. Includes one pallet, choice of shade assortment.

name: Telegraph Dimpled Carafe
description: This Dimpled Carafe is perfect to enjoy just about any beverage out of. Each piece is hand-thrown, which gives it a unique feel and variation, and can be used for serving or as a decorative piece in your tablescape.

name: Monogrammed Leather Cord Keeper 3 Pack
description: Neatly store mouse cables, extension cords, and phone cords in this attractive 3 pack of leather cord keepers with antique hardware. Includes 3 cord keepers. Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted.

name: Monogrammed Leather Cord Keeper
description: Neatly store your mouse cables, extension cords, and phone cords in this attractive grey leather cord keeper with antique hardware. Choice of personalized monogramming and leather color. Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted.

name: Paddywax Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Aromatherapy never looked so good. This sleek ceramic diffuser elevates your space as it diffuses essential oils throughout the home. Dispense a few drops in water to create a space to relax, set your intentions, and enjoy.

name: Sunset Catamaran Cruise for One, San Francisco, CA
description: Feel the excitement of the night approaching as you escape for an evening aboard the San Francisco Sunset Catamaran Cruise! Marvel at the city’s dazzling skyline as you journey across the tranquil Pacific waters of the Bay Area for an unforgettable outing as the 55-foot catamaran leaves the vibrant hustle and bustle of SF’s Fisherman’s Wharf behind. As you sail through the Bay, take in unbeatable views of Alcatraz Island, Angel Island and Treasure Island, and of course the Golden Gate Bridge. Enjoy countless photo ops as the sites take your breath away! Includes an experience for one person.

name: The Pouch
description: Your new go-to insulated pouch that fits it all. Carry your breakfast, lunch, dinner and more in this vegan leather exterior x insulated interior pouch. Can be placed into your tote bag or worn on it’s own. The lunchbox reinvented. Measures 11" x 4.5" x 10".

name: 30 by Adele
description: 30 is the fourth studio album by the English singer and songwriter Adele. It was released on 19 November 2021 by Columbia Records.

name: Walk Suite Bundle
description: Diggs' complete Walk Suite has everything you need to upgrade walks with your BFF. Made with sturdy yet sleek materials and convenient features (hello, no-rip poop bags!), it’s your new go-to when you’re on-the-go. Leash and Collar are made with easy to clean, soft-touch coated nylon that’s comfortable and makes walks a breeze for you and your pup. This set includes 1 roll of Poop Bags, Dispenser, Leash, and Collar.

name: Candle Discovery Set
description: Discover Apotheke's best selling fragrances as well as new favorites with this set of six 2 oz discovery candle tins. Includes six 2 oz tin candles, each with 15 hours burn time and made of a soy wax blend.

name: The Bee's Knees Package
description: This gift includes six sweet-as-honey cookies, a bee-themed ceramic mug by Helmsie, Cup of Sunshine Tea (two sachets), raw honey and wooden dipper, a Bee-themed journal by Helmsie, a gold pen, and a Mystery Message Puzzle: Bee-cause You Are the Absolute Best.

name: 50oz Silicone Reusable Stand-Up Bag
description: The reusable Porter Bag is a better bag for cooking, freezing, steaming, preserving, storing, and sous-viding. This 50 oz Standup Porter Bag is easy to load, unload, and store upright, making it ideal for storing frozen fruits and vegetables, fresh herbs in the fridge, and bunches of grapes. Don’t limit the Porter Bag to culinary uses, use it to store make-up, crafts, first-aid supplies, and much more. Made from one piece of 100% LFGB-certified silicone with no chemicals, glues, or adhesives.

name: No Kid Hungry Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps connect vulnerable kids in communities around the country with the nutritious food they need to grow and thrive.

name: The Essentials Set
description: Get in sync with the Essentials Set! This set includes 3 pouches of top plant-powered patches. Power through the afternoon slump with B12 Awake, bounce back from a night out with Rescue, and use Dream for the beauty sleep you deserve. Includes 4 patches each, 12 in total.

name: SuperDew Highlighter Balm
description: SuperDew is a translucent complexion-boosting highlight balm. The first rule of glassy skin is healthy skin. That's why SuperDew is infused with skin-loving ingredients like soothing chamomile and calming green tea extract. They work to deliver a boost of skin benefits with every application. Use it for glossy eye looks and apply to dry, flaky skin in a pinch!

name: Pint Glass, Set of 6
description: This set of modern pint glasses make anything you want to drink look good. Includes a set of six 16oz/pint sized glasses.

name: Mask-nificent
description: Treat your skin to a mask-nificent hydrogel mask session with this bundle containing Bubbly Hydrogel Mask to energize dull skin, On Ice Hydrogel Mask to soothe and firm, Chill Mode Hydrogel Mask to calm stressed skin, and Beauty Sleep Hydrogel Mask to nourish skin. Each mask is infused with skin-loving ingredients like hyaluronic acid, antioxidants, and plant extracts tailored to target specific skin concerns. Includes 4 face masks.

name: Yellow 24k Moet Champagne Chocolate Truffles Gift Box
description: This chic chocolate gift box is filled with moet infused dark chocolate champagne truffles for a elegant and refined gifting experience. The award-winning chocolate truffles are infused with champagne, made from the world's best dark chocolate and decked out in a gorgeous gold art deco print, you can't go wrong with 2 of life's greatest pleasures: chocolate and champagne.

name: Branded Cahier Journal
description: The Cahier Journal is a lightweight, flexible paper companion for everyday notes and academic work. Customizable raw cardboard covers add a handcrafted feel.

name: The Fundamentals
description: Seven pieces of kitchenware you’ll reach for every day, for every meal. Each item serves a fundamental purpose (or two or three), and is designed down to its finest detail using high-end materials. Includes, The 8" Knife, The Almost 4" Knife, The Only Tongs, The Wood Spoon, The Metal Spoon, The Slotted Spatula and a maple wooden base to house everything.

name: Posy Bracelet
description: Upcycled acrylic pearls with gold plated tube beads, finished with a daisy heart millefiori charm. Measures 7". Recipient's choice of color. Each bracelet is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship out.

name: Local Harvest Fruit Gift Box
description: This Local Harvest Fruit Gift Box perfectly balances incredibly succulent gift-quality fruit and indulgent gourmet snacks. Only the highest quality fruits are selected and featured in this gourmet fruit gift.

name: Porter 15-Piece Collection Set
description: Give your kitchen an eco-makeover with a total set for meal prep, leftovers & more. For fridge, freezer & pantry. This bundle includes Porter Mugs (2), Porter Glasses (2) , Porter Water Bottle, Porter Snack Bag (10 oz), Porter Sandwich Bag (34 oz), Porter Storage Bag (48 oz), Porter Stand Up Bag (36 oz), Porter Stand Up Bag - Large (50 oz), Porter Bowl, Porter Seal Tight Bowl (16 oz), Porter Seal Tight Bowl (24 oz), and Porter Utensil Sets (2).

name: Polarized New Wayfarer
description: Ray-Ban RB2132 New Wayfarer sunglasses are a slightly smaller interpretation on the most famous style in sunwear. The iconic Ray-Ban Wayfarer is immediately recognizable anywhere in the world. The Ray-Ban signature logo is displayed on both sculpted temples. These sunglasses allow the wearer to enjoy a classic, celebrated style while adding their own individuality. Glasses are eye size 52 mm.

name: The Mini Wash Day Ritual
description: Your wash day ritual now comes as a mini set complete with The Ritual Shampoo, The Ritual Conditioner and The Oil. These three products work together both in-shower and post-shower to gently cleanse, moisturize, and provide long-lasting hydration through your air dry and until your next wash. They’re perfect as travel companions, or as a first introduction into the CA universe (and your new go-to ritual). Wash day begins with the lightweight, yet powerfully cleansing Ritual Shampoo formula that uses naturally-derived, coconut-based surfactants. Follow with The Ritual Conditioner, which deeply moisturizes from within to strengthen, soften, and hydrate hair. After the shower, finish with The Oil, a lightweight serum, for hair that’s smooth, shiny, and thoroughly hydrated all the way through.

name: The Artist Capsule
description: The Artist Capsule features all four of Brightland's infused olive oils: ROSETTE garlic, LUCID lemon, ARDOR chili and ARISE basil. The Artist Capsule celebrates the merging of art and food, with category-changing artists who have designed labels for each blend.

name: OneLiner Lip and Eye Liner
description: What is it? A creamy-matte, high-pigment multi-use liner for lips, eyes, and face to create infinite looks with versatility. Made with good for you, moisturizing ingredients like shea butter and marula oil, these pencils glide on without tugging or dragging, and are super blendable.

name: inKind Pass Gift Card, $50 Value
description: inKind Pass gift cards can be redeemed via the inKind mobile app for food, beverage and tax across hundreds of top-rated restaurants, bars, and coffee shops nationwide. An inKind Pass gift card will be delivered via email within 24 hours. A $50 value.

name: Marbled Match Holder with Striker and Matches
description: Take your match game up a notch with a beautiful hand-poured concrete match striker and match set. Each match stick holder is made with hand-poured concrete with a cork bottom to protect your surfaces. Each set comes with 70 matches included. The matches are approximately 1.85 inches. There is also a striker pad attached to the side of your holder for easy lighting. Each vessel is approximately 1.85 inches high and 2 inches wide.

name: Breakfast In Bed
description:
Slow down their weekend with the Breakfast in Bed Box. A cozy throw blanket compliments all the ingredients to make breakfast in the comfort of one's own home. It includes a tasseled plaid throw blanket, a 
pair of matte black mugs, signature coffee tin with Costa Rica Tarrazu Ground Coffee (medium roast with notes of caramel and fruit), buttermilk pancake mix by Finding Home Farms. a petite jar of maple syrup by Finding Home Farms, a Gold Tin Candle in Cinnamon Chai from Benjamin Soap Co., a 
wooden mixing spoon, all wrapped in a deluxe XL black linen paper box tied with black ribbon and seasonal foliage.

name: The Bail Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide free bail assistance to thousands of low-income Americans every year.

name: Travel Duffel 35L
description: This Duffle is a perfect weekender, over-nighter, gym bag. Features removable padded top handles, a removable padded shoulder strap, weatherproof nylon canvas construction, and all-custom aluminum hardware.

name: Sigma PALMAT® Brush Cleaning Tool
description: Say goodbye to dirty makeup brushes! The Palmat® is a 2-in-1 brush cleaning tool that deep cleans your brushes to keep them just like new. It works great for those with a large brush collection or those with only one makeup brush. Small and portable, it's perfect for traveling! Includes one brush cleaner.

name: Meals on Wheels Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps support the local programs that keep seniors safe and living independently nationwide.

name: Vitamin C Facial Mask
description: This Vitamin C rich, powder mask combines French + Australian pink clays with fruit and botanical extracts to reveal smooth, soft, radiant skin. Naturally scented with delicately floral geranium essential oil, this mask is a staple for low-key at-home facials. 1.2 oz.

name: Office Desk
description: Designed with thoughtful details including flared legs, heigh-adjustable feet, and a brushed cable port, the Office Desk sets the foundation for you to do your best work. Its impact-resistant, double laminated top resists spills and dings while its steel frame supports up to 650 lbs with exceptional stability. Measures 48"W x 24"D x 30"H. Choice of color.

name: Wood Smoking Chips Trio
description: Bring some smoky flavor to your homemade cocktails and cheeses with this variety pack of 100% natural wood chips. In this set, you're getting three jars of our hickory chips, each of which imbue food and drinks with their own layered profiles, and they're safe to burn indoors.

name: Great Jones Holy Sheet Pan
description: This half-sized sheet pan, Holy Sheet, is a kitchen superhero: bold and colorful in appearance, but the custom nonstick ceramic coating allows for a quick, easy, and drama-free cleanup. It's oven-safe and dishwasher-friendly, and handsome enough to carry straight to your table. Measures 18.5" x 13.5" x 1".

name: Match Holder with Striker and Matches
description: Take your match game up a notch with a beautiful hand-poured concrete match striker and match set. Each match stick holder is made with hand-poured concrete with a cork bottom to protect your surfaces. Each set comes with 70 matches included. The matches are approximately 1.85 inches. There is also a striker pad attached to the side of your holder for easy lighting. Each vessel is approximately 1.85 inches high and 2 inches wide.

name: Super-Plush Robe
description: Feel like you’re lounging in luxury every morning. The Super-Plush Robe is the ultimate in plushness and softness and made of combed, long-staple Turkish cotton. The robe features wide sleeve adjustable cuffs, pockets, and an adjustable tie waist.

name: The Negroni: A Love Affair with a Classic Cocktail
description: In 2019, the Negroni turned 100 years old, and it's more popular than ever. The Negroni will give readers insight into the drink's origins in Italy (it started as a twist on the Americano), and the tools to make over 20 simple variations from drink experts and bartenders around the world.

name: Incense
description: Incense isn't just aromatic. Its essential oils have been shown to promote calm, focus, and clarity, as well as enhance sleep. Includes one pack with 15 sticks, select the incense fragrance of your choice.

name: Superfood Latte Sampler
description: Try all 3 superfood latte blends! Original Turmeric supports skin glow, gut health, and immunity, Matcha Turmeric adds a boost of gentle energy, and Cacao Turmeric helps us relax and destress. In 12 travel-friendly sachets.

name: Stainless Steel Grand Pinot Wine Glass Set of 2
description: Enjoy perfect temperature wine with this large capacity 13 oz all purpose wine glass! Unlike other stainless steel wine tumblers, it's classic shape and thin 1mm rim feels just like drinking from fine glassware. Lightweight and comfortable to hold it's also unbreakable so you can enjoy your favorite varietal at the dinner table or on the patio. Includes a set of 2.

name: Elemental 4-Cup Chopper
description: Simplify food prep before dinner with this 4-cup Cuisinart food processor. It purees, chops and grinds ingredients to the desired consistency, and the SmartPower blade has an auto-reverse feature to ensure food is evenly chopped. This 4-cup Cuisinart comes with a spatula for scraping the sides of the bowl for consistent results.

name: Brushed Cotton Duvet Cover, Full/Queen
description: An instant update that'll keep you comfy, this cover looks as good as it feels. Crafted in Portugal from 100% cotton, this exceptionally cozy brushed cotton fabric has a buttery soft finish, just like your favorite lived-in shirt.

name: 11-Piece High Carbon Steel Kitchen Knife Set and Block
description: This JoyJolt Knife Set comes with 10 razor sharp knives, forged from high carbon steel with full tang, so you can slice a tough piece of steak like a knife through butter! The German steel knives are wrapped in a classic Pakkawood handle and nestled in an elevated knife block. This set includes a knife block, 8” Chef Knife, 8” Bread Knife, 8” Slicing Knife, 7” Nakiri, 5.5” Kitchen Utility Knife a 3.5” Paring Knife, and 4 Steak Knives.

name: Tushy System
description: Poop with the TUSHY Ottoman. Spray with the TUSHY bidet. Pat dry with TUSHY Stand Tissues. Scrub your toilet clean with the TUSHY Brush. With the TUSHY System, every phase of your toileting experience is enhanced, leaving you completely satisfied, completely clean and completely guilt-free.

name: The Backpack
description: A chic, vegan leather backpack with a padded laptop sleeve and insulated compartment; perfect for carrying your laptop, lunch + more. Be prepared to take on your day hands-free, with 6 adjustable strap sizes. Measures 14.25" x 11.5" x 6" with a 3.5" handle drop.

name: Addis Passport Wallet
description: The Addis Passport Wallet is travel ready and features multiple card slots and compartments to fit a passport, credit cards, ID, and travel documents. Choice of color.

name: 500 Piece Puzzles
description: This assortment of 500 piece puzzles provides for the perfect family activity, conversational piece, mental challenge and exercise as well as an opportunity to escape and focus on each piece of inspiration. Puzzles of Color puzzles are made to be glued, framed and displayed and make for a great centerpiece addition to any wall.

name: Personalized Tech Roll Up
description: Tame those pesky cords and say hello to your new favorite personalized travel companion. For easy storage on the go, this soft leather roll up features 3 pockets that will keep your cords organized and accessible. Personalized with your choice of initials. Please allow up to 10 business days for personalized gifts to deliver.

name: Black Girls Code Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation creates new opportunities for girls and gender nonconforming youth of color to have a daring impact on tech. When they succeed, we all succeed.

name: Titleist 2022 Tour Speed Golf Balls
description: Titleist Performance Urethane (TPU) combined with a proprietary casing layer, and reformulated core produce an incredible combination of speed and spin to cover any shot, tee to green. The reformulated core delivers high speed, while the reformulated, proprietary casing layer, uniquely designed for Tour Speed, maintains low long game spin. Color: white and includes a dozen.

name: Organic Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Bursting with 60% dark chocolate chips and made using a handcrafted traditional recipe from Piedmont, these cookies are perfect for dunking in your espresso or cappuccino creating a moment of true indulgence. Includes 1 box. Made in Italy, GMO-Free.

name: Classic Turkish Cotton Hand Towel
description: This exceptionally plush Turkish cotton hand towel is made using innovative Aerocotton Technology. Soft and absorbent, this luxe hand towel will leave you feeling fresh and clean. Gift includes one hand towel.

name: Slotted Fish Turner
description: Designed specifically for handling delicate foods like fish, this lightweight turner is a kitchen heavyweight thanks to clever, purposeful engineering. Its flexible head features a beveled edge that effortlessly slides underneath ingredients, ensuring your culinary creations remain intact while generous slots allow for swift drainage of excess oils and liquids. Full-tang, tempered stainless steel fights corrosion over the long haul and is firmly fitted to a hand-polished Acacia handle by classic brass rivets.

name: UpwardBaby Suction Bowl and Plate Placemat Set
description: UpwardBaby’s complete suction plate and bowl set was designed to provide parents with a convenient and hassle-free way to let their growing toddlers practice eating on their own without having to stress about the post meal mess! Spend less time cleaning up after meals and more time where it matters, with your little ones. UpwardBaby’s Toddler Plate and Bowl Feeding Set is made with thick, pure silicone making it microwavable and dishwasher-friendly, as well as resistant to odors and stains.

name: Chocolate Hearts
description: Crafted by Milanese chocolatier T’a Milano, these heart-shaped chocolates embody the taste of Italian excellence in every bite. The ten rich milk and dark chocolate treasures are made with only the finest ingredients following the artisan’s family tradition of chocolate-making for over four generations. And this gourmet gift is sure to capture the heart of your sweetheart this Valentine’s Day.

name: Girls, Inc Donation
description: You have the power to help a girl grow up strong, smart, and bold. She is a leader and ready to succeed. Your investment will help equip her to create positive change in her life and in the world around her.

name: Toiletry Bag
description: The easiest home for your lotions, potions, razors, and daily essentials. This surprisingly roomy Toiletry Bag is made from Negative Nylon and is perfect for stashing toiletries for when you’re on the road or at home. This bag measures 8.25" x 4.75" x 4.25" .

name: Happy New Year Bliss Garden
description: This fresh succulent garden arrives in a festive Happy New Year planter gift box, ready to display and enjoy.

name: 3 Piece Peeler Set
description: Peel 3 ways with this 3-piece peeler set. Serrated peeler is perfect for softer produce such as tomatoes and plums, the swivel peeler is perfect for firmer produce like carrots and potatoes, and the julienne peeler creates attractive slices for garnish. They all have non-slip grips, stainless steel blades, and are dishwasher safe.

name: Morning To Night Loose Leaf Tea Essentials
description: The perfect cup awaits, no matter what you need throughout your day. Bundle a smooth caffeine boost for the morning, a helping hand for digestion and inflammation in the afternoon, and sweet chocolatey indulgence for the evening. Comes with Firebelly's Tea Strainer with resting cup for simple, mess-free steeping. Sounds like a day made.

name: A Goody Gift
description: Select a gift of your choice! Shipping is included.

name: FTL Luggage Tag
description: Never lose your luggage again with FTL's leather luggage tag.

name: Beast Blender + Hydration System
description: The combination of the Beast Blender with the Hydration System allows you to make perfect blends and infused water. INCLUDED: Blender - Blender Base, Blade Assembly, 1000mL Blending Vessel, 500mL Blending Vessel, Drinking Lid, Carry Cap, two Storage Lids; Hydration System - Glass Hydration Bottle, Infusion Chamber, Drinking Lid. SPECIFICATIONS: Single button to pulse + blend. 1000-watts, 120V

name: Shearling Moroccan Slipper, Smoke
description: Moroccan-style slippers with shearling-lined upper and suede outsole. Like traditional Moroccan styles, the back heel folds down and flips up to cover the heels.

name: 15 Piece Gift Box
description: This signature Zbox features 15 time-honored flavors from the famed Numbered Collection and legendary Z chocolates created by the World Champion Master Chocolatier Pascal Caffet. Savor slow-roasted Piedmont hazelnuts and crunchy visible bits of California almonds blanketed in 40% Ivory Coast milk chocolate couverture from Chocolate n°0, all the way to the lavish ganache of fresh seedless raspberry purée whisked with robust Venezuelan and Madagascan blend 70% dark chocolate and cocoa butter wrapped in 40% Ivory Coast milk chocolate couverture from Chocolate n°11. Then, indulge in three legendary Z chocolates' lush caramel and crunchy praliné with Bourbon-Vanilla from Madagascar enveloped in either Venezuelan and Madagascan blend 70% dark chocolate or velvety white chocolate couverture.

name: Birthday Party Candle
description: Vanilla cake smothered in frosting. The off-key singing of friends and family wishing you another magical year. Top Notes are Butter, Cream, and Vanilla.

name: European Linen Duvet Cover, King
description: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, this mid-weight linen duvet offers year-round luxury and feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, this linen only gets softer over time. Woven from 100% European flax, made without the use of harmful chemicals or pesticides. King size duvet cover.

name: LoveSeen Gift Card, $50
description: A gift card to use towards lashes. A LoveSeen digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout.

name: Little Hottie
description: This 8-inch square ceramic baker is ideal for smaller servings and easy portability, so you’re always potluck-ready. Ceramic stoneware is scratch- and stain-resistant and extremely easy to clean. While the base is cute and compact, the signature handles are oversized, making it easy to grab with an oven mitt. Not only is Little Hottie oven-safe, it’s also dishwasher-safe, freezer-safe, and microwave-safe.

name: Graza Drizzle and Sizzle EVOO
description: The Drizzle is Extra Virgin finishing oil made from olives that are picked early, when flavor is bold and antioxidants are highest. 500ml made for eating, never heating. The Sizzle is Extra Virgin cooking oil made from mature, mid-season olives that yield a more mellow flavor. 750ml to use every day, in every way. Includes 2 bottles.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps bring independence back to our nation’s most severely wounded veterans.

name: Large Frankie Jewelry Case
description: For those times when you travel and don’t want to leave your shine behind. Meet the Frankie Travel Jewelry Case. With a soft, microfiber-lined interior featuring smartly designed loops, straps, and slots, this zippered jewelry travel case keeps your favorite pieces in place, protected, and artfully organized. Lightweight and light on the planet, this eco-friendlier travel jewelry organizer is made with Repreve® recycled polyester created by repurposing 4 plastic water bottles.

name: Get Well Soon Cookie Cake
description: This classic cookie cake is baked fresh when you order, made using the highest quality ingredients and the results are obvious in every bite. Moist and chewy, this colossal cookie cake is made with real butter, whole eggs, and pure vanilla. Eat your cookie cake with a fork or your fingers, on plates, napkins, or right out of the box. Any way you slice it, our Big Cookie Cakes are still first in flavor. Due to the dough mixing process, all product may have come in contact with nut oils. Kosher certified.

name: Porcelain Rose Wine Stopper
description: Individually sculpted and molded by hand, each Rose Wine Stopper pays homage to the Venus et Fleur eternity roses that started it all. Designed to last generations of wine enthusiasts. It measures 85mm W x 65mm H.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Nursing Shawl
description: This 100% Grade-A cashmere nursing shawl is lightweight and breathable, so it will keep you and baby warm without the risk of overheating. Whether you use it for feeding, a stroller blanket, or carseat cover, this will be your go-to staple. Wear, wash, repeat. This quality cashmere is incredibly long-lasting and three times as warm as wool.

name: Pleasure Chest Soft Cooler
description: The perfect size for small family outings, road trips, or a 12-hour shift, this tall, square cooler is a great shape for stacking containers. Stash napkins, utensils, or chocolate bars (no judgement!) in the outside pockets for quick access. Remember ice packs! Because it squishes flat in your suitcase, you'll love the Pleasure Chest for travel, and it makes a great leave-behind hostess gift. It measures 9" W x 12.5" H x 9" D.

name: Home Town Maps Candle
description: Choose a candle scent best fit for you and customize the kraft label with a map of any town in the US. Includes one 7.5 oz candle made of natural soy wax with 50-60 hour burn time.

name: The Hot Pot Starter Set
description: Everything you need to build the fire hot pot of your sweatiest dreams at your kitchen table. This gift includes The Hot Pot (an electric hot pot with a flexible temperature control dial for table top use, including glass lid, heat-safe handles, and an easy-read power indicator light), 2 Silver Chopsticks, 2 Slotted Spoons Designed to interlock with the pot edge, and 2 Fire Hot Pot Base, Fly By Jing's all-natural spicy, tingly, complex soup base.

name: Large Double-Sided Packing Cube
description: Hassle-free packing starts here. Organize your travels with this lightweight, larger-sized packing cube. A life-changing packing tool for frequent flyers, it allows you to organize daily outfits or simply keep your delicates separate from heavier items. The see-through mesh top compartment allows you to keep track of where everything is.

name: Fly by Jing Sichuan Chili Crisp
description: Proudly crafted in Chengdu, Sichuan Chili Crisp is hot, spicy, crispy, numbing and deliciously savory. Intensely flavorful yet not off-the-charts spicy, it’ll make your food taste bolder and the world around you seem a little bit brighter. Use it on everything. Yes, even that. Includes 1 jar.

name: Chocolate Jewels, 24 Piece
description: ChocAllure brings a visionary approach to the chocolate world, that treats chocolate making as an art. Each Chocolate Jewel has an intricate and artistic design and is layered with exquisite ingredients and textures. Inspired by the world of french pâtisserie, desserts such as creme brulee or dark chocolate tartlet are transformed into the Chocolate Jewel they are known for. This box will contain 12 flavors, 2 of each, a collection of ChocAllure's legendary seasonal chocolates with flavors such as Salted Caramel Cheesecake, Hot chocolate and Marshmallow, and Caramel Apple. Flavor assortment varies per box.

name: Sustainable Knit Beanie
description: Kindhumans donates 3% of your gift to a nonprofit of your choice.  Stay cozy, warm and sustainable with this beautifully hand-knit beanie. Made from eco-friendly, recycled products, you’ll feel warm inside and out.

name: Pacific Natural
description: Pacific Natural illustrates Jenni's conscious way of living, through personal anecdotes and tips, with Jenni's home state of California serving as the backdrop. Organized by season, this entertaining book is your guide to creating special moments with family and friends. Each chapter includes tabletop ideas, simple crafts, tips for keeping a stocked kitchen and pantry, what to plant in your garden, and healthy, delicious recipes.

name: Inspire Collection Notebook
description: Getting thoughts on paper is the best way to remember, preserve and pass along adventures, ideas, and future dreams. Store yours in an Inspire notebook. Each notebook holds 240 pages and measures 5.4 x 8.4 inches. Made with pebbled leather and featuring a ribbon market, back pocket and elastic close. Includes one notebook, choice of color.

name: Main Line Duffle
description: Light as a feather and roomy enough to pack for a week, the Main Line is a holdall duffle perfect for road trips, weekend getaways, or longer vacations. Features a removeable woven shoulder strap, two interior zip pockets, and a two-way, locktable zipper. Made with premium sustainable materials like Ecocraft canvas and OEKO-Tex Standard 100 using 14 upcycled plastic water bottles.

name: The Large Luncher
description: Yes, it’s a lunchbox…and it’s Modern Picnic's best seller for a reason. With an insulated interior and vegan leather exterior, you can pack your food and no one would ever know what was inside. The Large Luncher is perfect for fitting 2+ meals + drinks, and is easily wipeable (in case of those accidental spills). Packing your own food is faster, cheaper, healthier and now chicer. Measures 10.5" x 12" x 7.25" with a 5.8" handle drop.

name: Glow Garden
description: This fresh succulent garden arrives in a beautifully crafted planter gift box - ready to display and enjoy. Measures approximately 4 x 5 inches.

name: Souk Bowl
description: Use this bowl as a catch-all in your entryway or foyer, for jewelry, makeup, or other odds and ends. Generations of Senegalese weaving expertise has been passed down to create this practical, functional, and decorative piece. Full of color and culture, this basket is crafted using a coil-style weaving technique with elephant grass and recycled plastic strips. Each will have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product. Measures 5x8".

name: PAL BT
description: Add a splash of color to your home or take the PAL BT with you to express your unique style. The weather-resistant PAL BT has a battery that lasts a minimum of 16 hours, making it the optimum portable companion. With Bluetooth streaming and a sensitive AM/FM tuner, it is ready to play your favorites wherever you take it. Its attractively simple design is the antithesis of today's overly complicated speakers, with just three knobs to control all functions. The PAL BT is the classic portable speaker ready to go with you in vivid color and sound. Choice of color.

name: Lightweight Down Comforter, King/Cali King
description: Perfect for hot sleepers, with a cloud-like softness that comforts without the weight. Snuggle up to a perfect level of warmth and construction, each tucked within their ultra-soft, 100% long staple cotton shell. Ultra-soft baffle box construction ensures even distribution of warmth and coziness.

name: Men's Roam Performance Pant
description: Meet your most essential pant. Made with feat's signature lightweight FlowTech fabric, the Roam Performance Pant is designed to perfectly balance comfort & versatility. Transition from lounging to just about any activity you can come up with in a pant designed to get you moving and performing your best.

name: Grapefruit Face Cleanser
description: This best-selling cleanser is the essential first step in your uncomplicated regimen. This 3-in-1 formula gently yet effectively removes makeup, dirt and oil all while toning and improving the look of your skin without drying or stripping. Natural grapefruit extract is vitamin and antioxidant rich, cleansing the skin while providing an uplifting aromatic experience. Includes one 8 fl oz bottle.

name: Ibuki + Air Purifier
description: IBUKI+ is one of the best air purifiers for allergies to get you through pollen season and beyond, removing up to 99.97% of pollutants. 360-degree suction technology leaves no stone unturned while three-layer filtration captures everything, including VOCs, pet hair, paint odor, kitchen odor, spores, pollen, mold, pet hair, dust, and other contaminants in the air. It refreshes air in up to 1,200 sqft up to 5x per hour, perfect for two-to-three bedroom apartments or small homes.

name: 1 Month Couture+
description: Give the gift of choosing a special piece from thousands of luxury accessories. This one month membership allows you to choose 2 items from jewelry to bags to limited edition pieces. This membership allows for two items at a time, 1 from the Classique closet & 1 from the Couture closet, with a retail value over $4,000. A Vivrelle digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address you provide within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription on Vivrelle's website.

name: Onyx Heart Necklace, Dainty Cable Chain
description: Sweet but tough. Becket + Quill's signature onyx heart dangling from a 18″ rolo chain.

name: Nest Mug
description: This Nest Mug boasts a 80% recycled double-walled, vacuum-sealed stainless-steel body to keep your 10oz of hot stuff hot and your cold stuff cold. Thanks to a dual-thread design, the Nest Mug it integrates with other Nest components, including the Pour Over device, instantly making the Nest Mug an essential part of your gear quiver. They created a screw-on, splash proof lid allowing you to sip with ease.

name: Collapsible 24 oz Cup
description: Recommended for Venti Iced lovers, Big Gulp sippers, and thirsty road trippers. The 24 oz cup is large and in charge, yet fits standard cupholders and is fully collapsible. The mouth tab creates an airtight, leak-proof seal and it comes with a straw for splash-proof sipping. Made of LFGB Certified silicone and is BPA-free.

name: Sweatshirt Blanket
description: This sweatshirt blanket is exactly what happens when a blanket is made to feel like your softest, most favorite sweatshirt ever. Made 100% with jersey-knit polyester sweatshirt material, this blanket takes that warm feeling to the max. Made for snuggles, this heavyweight blanket now only needs your custom art to become an instant favorite for colder days. Measures 60" × 50".

name: Happy Anniversary Cookie Cake
description: This classic cookie cake is baked fresh when you order, made using the highest quality ingredients and the results are obvious in every bite. Moist and chewy, this colossal cookie cake is made with real butter, whole eggs, and pure vanilla. Eat your cookie cake with a fork or your fingers, on plates, napkins, or right out of the box. Any way you slice it, our Big Cookie Cakes are still first in flavor. Due to the dough mixing process, all product may have come in contact with nut oils. Kosher certified.

name: Daisy Best Seller Set
description: This set includes the Mini Pavé Huggie Pair (Gold/Clear), the Daisy Huggie Pair (Gold), the Daisy Stud Single (Gold), and the Mini CV Stud Single (Gold/Clear).

name: Old Flame Breakable Heart Decorating Kit
description: Oh, to begin again. Make your second act an affair to remember using our Old Flame Breakable Heart Decorating Kit. Kit includes a large Geo Heart Mold, Alphabet Mold, Wooden Mallet, 24 Karat Gold Edible Shimmer, and 2 decorating melt tubes in red and pink.

name: Leibovitz Sumo Book
description: The legendary photographer, Annie Leibovitz, takes stock of more than 40 years of work from her viscerally intimate reportage for Rolling Stone magazine in the 1970s to polished portraits for Vanity Fair. By Annie Leibovitz. Hardcover.

name: Chunky Hoop Set
description: This statement piece features a chunky gold hoop set. Each piece is lightweight, making them comfortable to wear while still showcasing a bold style. Enjoy a luxurious look with these fashionable chunky hoops. This gift includes a pair of the Micro Chunky Huggie(10mm Outer Diameter, 6mm Inner Diameter), a pair of the Mini Chunky Huggie(12mm Outer Diameter, 8mm Inner Diameter), and a pair of the Small Chunky Huggie(14mm Outer Diameter, 10mm Inner Diameter).

name: Everyday Cleanser
description: Give your skin a reset. This daily gel face wash is formulated with 1% glycolic acid to gently exfoliate dead skin and promote skin's natural healthy biome. Formulated with a plant-derived surfactant blend and sea kelp to leave your skin feeling refreshed, nourished, and smooth. This unscented and fragrance-free cleanser will keep skin feeling soft, and balanced, never tight and itchy. Bottle holds 3.4 fl oz / 100 ml.

name: The Beauty Edit
description: This set features labels for a complete beauty routine. Includes 3 Flex Smalls, 9 Flex Mediums, and 2 Flex Extenders. Note shipping takes an estimated 12-14 business days.

name: Cocktail Mix 8 Pack
description: Sayso is an all-natural cocktail mix in tea bag format, designed to be steeped in spirits and cool water to create a restaurant-caliber drink in minutes.

name: Men's Valentine's Day Dress Calf Sock 4-Pack
description: A little shorter than a normal dress sock, hitting mid-calf. That makes these a little more casual, but with all the same comfort innovations and sock tech. As always, 4 purchased = 4 donated.

name: Match Holder with Matches & Match Refill Kit
description: Combining Tenn Prairie's two favorite things, the Original match holder and a Match Refill Kit. It's the perfect way to not have to worry about finding replacement matches. It's also a great way to have a little fun. Choose the same Refill Kit color or mix it up and try out a new color. There is a color for everyone. Includes a match holder with two sets of matches.

name: LARQ Pitcher with Advanced Filter
description: The LARQ Pitcher improves the quality of your water using Nano Zero filter technology removing chlorine, lead, PFAS, and more.

name: PSOG Party Safe Original Greats Cupcakes 25 Pack
description: The Party Safe Original Greats, no nut flavors included. Includes seven of their most-loved signature flavors, all iced by hand & topped with ingredients like Oreo® cookie pieces and semi-sweet chocolate chips, chosen to compliment each magical bite. These cupcakes do not contain peanuts. However, all of their products are made in a bakery that processes peanuts, tree nuts, and other allergens. Includes 25 cupcakes.

name: Active Recovery Hydro-Gel Moisturizer
description: This active recovery hydro-gel repairs and nourishes the skin, made with powerful active ingredients that lock in moisture. Contains 2.54 oz.

name: The 10-Piece Stainless Set
description: Their most popular cookware set. This 10-piece stainless steel and non stick cookware set will look great in your kitchen and contains award-winning cookware materials to help you execute any dish for your next dinner party or Thanksgiving gathering. Toss your rusted, mismatched cookware and give your kitchen a complete makeover.

name: Milk Street: The New Rules
description: By Christopher Kimball. Become the best cook you know with this playbook of new flavors, 200 new recipes and new techniques. James Beard award finalist and winner of the IACP award for best general cookbook. Hardcover.

name: Bouncer Bliss, Cotton Classic Quilt
description: Bouncer Bliss is a lightweight and handy baby bouncer with natural rocking that makes life with young children easier and more enjoyable. This baby bouncer offers natural rocking generated by your baby’s own movements, unlike a battery or electrically powered baby swing. That means that this bouncer weighs less, making it easier to move around and take with you. Made of soft 35% cotton and 65% recycled polyester blend with removable washable fabric. Best suited for babies 0-2 years, weighing 8-29 lbs, from 21".

name: Mini Portable Nano Face Mister
description: Take the incredible health benefits of a humidifier on the go, this pocket-sized mini face mister is your new best friend. With this handy gadget, you can now take moisture with you on the go. Use it for a refreshing spritz whenever you need it, after your workout class, before a big meeting, or even on your power walk home. The nano-fine mist will give your skin a truly wonderful glow. Measures 2.44" x 1.26" x 3.78".

name: Serotonin Soak Salt
description: Want to bathe like a biohacker? Turn on the tub, tune into your body, and drop into SEROTONIN SOAK. Uniquely formulated with Magnesium Zechstein Flakes, this powerful bath soak relaxes your mind, boosts your mood, and recalibrates your system. For centuries, baths have been used to heal, restore, and re-center. They combined the ancient art of bathing and the purest, science-backed ingredients available (Magnesium Zechstein Flakes, French Green Clay, Apple Cider Vinegar, Essential Oils) to formulate SEROTONIN SOAK. You can’t buy happiness, but you can bathe in it.

name: The Good Prep Set
description: The consciously-sourced refresh you deserve, this prep set includes a sustainable cutting board and knives that you'll never have to upgrade again. A worthy investment for your kitchen, and the earth. This set includes The reBoard, The 8" Knife, The Almost 4" Knife and The Sharpener. Each knife is made of Japanese high-carbon and stainless steel, with a matte and stain-resistant composite handle. The reBoard is BPA-free and made with 75% recycled plastic, 25% renewable sugarcane.

name: Nest Cam
description: Nest Cam is wire-free, so it goes almost anywhere, outside or in to give you a complete picture of your home when you are away. It knows the difference between people, animals, and vehicles, so you can get the alerts that are important to you. Listen and speak through the camera right from the Google Home app. Check in anytime with 24/7 live view. If you miss a notification, you can always go back and see what happened with 3 hours of free event video history. And it’s easy to install yourself – no outlet or wires required.

name: Beer Making Book
description: Have you been wanting to make beer at home, but have been unsure where to start? Whether an experienced or novice brewer, a seasonal and local home cook, or simply a DIY aficionados, the Beer Making Book has something for everyone. Greenmarket-inspired and seasonally brewed, the Beer Making Book includes fun and imaginative recipes for everyday and special occasion brews: Everyday IPA and Lady Lavender for spring; Grapefruit Honey Ale and Lobster Saison for summer; Apple Crisp Ale and Pumpkin Dubbel for fall, and Chocolate Maple Porter and New Year Beer for winter. You’ll also find food pairing suggestions, recipes for cooking with beer, and tips for growing hops.

name: Pothos 'Jade' in Ceramic Potter
description: This common pothos has long, cascading vines and jade green foliage. It is one of the most popular and adaptable houseplants out there. When it's thirsty, its leaves look droopy and start curling. Small pothos is about 10 inches tall, and 5" planters are 100% premium ceramic, hand-finished in a matte glaze, and include drainage holes with rubber stoppers. Includes one bag of custom-blended, organic potting soil, a 5" ceramic planter and a 10" pothos.

name: Inner Peace Lily
description: Known for lush dark green leaves and white hooded leaf bracts, this 6” peace lily wants to nama-stay in your home or office to bring all the tranquil, meditative vibes. Resting in a white ceramic pot, this resilient plant helps clean the air and is easy to care for. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Chili Crisp Vinaigrette
description: Introducing Chili Crisp Vinaigrette: all natural flavor, crafted with scientific precision to create a perfectly balanced gustatory experience for an instant hit of deep flavor. The perfect balance of salt-acid-fat-heat to complement anything you'd like to drizzle it on. Use it on salads, dumplings, noodles, marinades, or whatever you like to eat. Made with 10-year aged black vinegar, premium soy sauce, nutty sesame oil, and Fly by Jing's classic Sichuan Chili Crisp.

name: Vegan OMG (Ooey Marshmallow Goodness)
description: Ooey Marshmallow Goodness is a version of marshmallow creme -- a sticky, sweet spreadable marshmallow treat that is perfect for dips, dunks, and desserts of all kind. You'll love to keep your pints in the fridge or freezer (fluff ice cream anyone?) but you can keep them at room temp too!

name: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
description: Aging and reclusive Hollywood movie icon Evelyn Hugo is finally ready to tell the truth about her glamorous and scandalous life. But when she chooses unknown magazine reporter Monique Grant for the job, no one is more astounded than Monique herself. Monique begins to feel a very real connection to the legendary star, but as Evelyn's story near its conclusion, it becomes clear that her life intersects with Monique's own in tragic and irreversible ways.

name: Heavy Duty Grill Grate
description: Heavy-duty steel grill grate for open-fire cooking. Portable, simple, and ready to go, this is a cooking surface wherever you need it. Folding legs make for easy transportation and compact storage. Cook directly on the grill surface for seared steaks, sausages, veggies, and more. Use with our cast iron skillet or dutch oven for even temperature and increased versatility. Measures 31" x 15.75" x 9.25".

name: Scented Candle
description: Set a relaxing mood in your home with a fragrant, clean-burning candle housed in a minimalist concrete vessel. Made of soy-based wax and scented with essential oils. Candle is 8 oz with a 65 hour approximate burn time.

name: Arya Chain Anklet
description: Add metallic shine to your look when you rock this elegant textured anklet! The lobster clasp ensures a secure closure, and the simple yet striking design is perfect for your next getaway. Made with rhodium plated brass.

name: MAG:2 Classics
description: The perfect accessory for an iPhone and AirPods user. Magnetically snap-on your iPhone 12/13/14 on the charging stand, and place your wireless charging AirPods on the base. This unique, sleek design, inspired by home decor, works best on your desk or bedside.

name: Stainless Steel Slim Can Cooler
description: This 2-in-1 insulated stainless steel can cooler keeps 12oz beer and seltzer slim cans cold while elevating drinking out of a can from convenient to classy! It's svelte shape measures just 2.75 inches wide so it is super easy to hold.

name: ASPCA Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the ASPCA helps fight cruelty and makes a life-changing difference for animals across America.

name: The Brevitē Backpack
description: The Brevitē Backpack is the perfect backpack for work, travel and everything in between. Featuring premium details to make traveling a breeze including a main compartment for an extra set of clothes, a laptop pocket that holds up to a 16" Macbook, passport pocket, luggage passthrough to fit comfortably on your suitcase, and a hidden pocket to keep valuables safe. Backpack measures 17" x 11" x 5.5" and is made of 600D Polyester.

name: Premium Jerky Sampler Gift Box
description: This snack box is a collection of 12 individually wrapped exotic protein rich jerky snacks. Get ready to discover the newest, most delicious, healthiest, and trusted jerky and meat brands. It includes 1 Think Jerky Grass Fed Sweet Chipotle Jerky, 1 Chomps Grass Fed Beef Sticks & Finished Jerky Stick, 1 Epic Jerky Grass Fed Venison Steak Snack Strips, 1 Ostrim Beef & Ostrich Jerky Stick, 1 Ostrim Chicken Buffalo Wing Snack Stick, 1 Mission Meats Grass Fed Pork Stick, 1 Mission Meats Grass Fed Beef Bar, 2 Field Trip Seasoned Pepperoni Beef & Pork Stick, 2 Field Trip Crispy Cuts Pork Rinds, and 1 Field Trip All Natural 100% Grass Fed Beef Jerky.

name: WWF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the World Wildlife Fund helps protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max Clear Case with MagSafe
description: Thin, light, and easy to grip, this Apple-designed case shows off the brilliant colored finish of iPhone 15 Pro Max while providing extra protection.

name: Classic Percale Core Sheet Set, Queen
description: Hotel-sheet lovers, these are your sheets. Cool, crisp, and ideal for hot sleepers, this is the fabric that put Brooklinen on the map. The Classic Percale sheets start with the highest quality threads, using 270 thread count long-staple cotton with a one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under weave. This results in a matte finish for that breathable, hotel-style feel. Its exceptional softness and durability means it gets better with every wash, without pilling. Its lightweight, matte finish makes it the top choice for warmer climates, and year-round hot sleepers. This gift includes 1 Flat Sheet, 1 Fitted Sheet, and 2 Pillowcases.

name: Checker Rings, Green Set of 2
description: The perfect set of 2. A classic checker pattern adorns these vintage dome inspired silhouettes. You'll love a checker print because it'll never go out of style. This stunner has a modern appeal to infuse a little fun into your daily stack. The dome height is 10mm.

name: Grit: The Power of Passion and Perseverance
description: The belittled daughter of a scientist, Angela Duckworth is now a celebrated researcher and professor. It was her early eye-opening stints in teaching, business consulting, and neuroscience that led to her hypothesis about what really drives success: not genius, but a unique combination of passion and long-term perseverance. She shares what she's learned from interviewing dozens of high achievers--from JP Morgan CEO Jamie Dimon to New Yorker cartoon editor Bob Mankoff to Seattle Seahawks Coach Pete Carroll.

name: Bath & Towel Spray
description: Indulge your senses and transport yourself to an at-home spa, pre-shower, post bath and anytime in between with this eucalyptus herbal scent. This luxury room spray can be used on towels, robes, bedding or as a room refresher.

name: Organic Ribbed Robe
description: Wrap your bath routine in organic luxury. The Organic Ribbed Robe is 380 GSM with a horizontal ribbed texture that’s rich, plush, and absorbent. This 100% Turkish cotton is something to behold and wrap yourself in pure relaxation. The ultra-soft ribbed texture comes with side-seam pockets, wide sleeves, and an adjustable waist.

name: Dual Voltage Handheld Steamer
description: Small enough to fit in a suitcase, or travel bag, but packs a punch! Take it with you on vacation to quickly get rid of wrinkles for photo-worthy outfits. The dual-voltage feature makes this the best travel companion. Simply switch the voltage, and within 2 minutes, you are set to steam! It's gentle on all fabrics, has 11 minutes of continuous steam, and has an 8' cord.

name: Match Cloche
description: Inspired by vintage glass domes used to protect emerging seedlings, these Match Cloches are made of handblown glass and fitted with a cork to stylishly hold an assortment of matchsticks. A striker flint on the glass adds functionality, and the delicate vessels can be reused to display treasures and curiosities. It holds approx. 120 white-tipped matches, and measures 7” tall x 3” wide. Recipient's choice of color.

name: The Essentials Set
description: This 40-piece set comes with four of each of the Ceramic Big Bowls, Small Bowls, Big Plates, Small Plates, and Mugs, plus a Four-Person Flatware Setting. The Essentials Set combines the Ceramics and Flatware you’ll use every single one of your years and days. Each piece of flatware is forged from European 18/10 stainless steel and is dishwasher safe. Each ceramic piece is made with locally sourced clay by artisans in Portugal and is safe for the dishwasher, freezer & oven up to 480 degrees.

name: Serving Bowl
description: A high-edged beauty that looks good holding fruit on your counter, serving vegetables on your table, and filled with popcorn on your sofa.

name: Go Wicking Open-Back Tank
description: With its super-cute open back and super-soft and sustainable wicking jersey fabric, this tank is reason enough to get your body moving. Tie the back for a cropped look.

name: The reBowl
description: The truly all-purpose reBowl is the go-to for mixing, serving, and storing. Plus, it’s BPA-free, dishwasher and microwave-safe, and made from the same sustainable materials as the award-winning reBoards. Made of 75% recycled plastic and 25% renewable sugarcane. Measures 10" wide, 5" tall, with a 2.75 qt capacity.

name: Ultimate New Parent Package
description: What’s inside the Ultimate New Parent Package is more than a tiny bit adorable. Grown-ups get Spoonful's famous soup, rolls, and cookies. The lucky baby gets a collection of designer bibs, blankets, and baubles cute enough to knock their little socks off. This gift includes two 32-ounce containers of soup (4-6 parent-size servings), half dozen bacci rolls, half dozen chocolate chip cookies, a soothing pacifier with drop-stopping clip, matching teething rattle, three bandana bibs, two coordinating swaddle wraps, a friendly fox plush toy, and a shiny ladle.

name: Mugs, Set of 4
description: This minimal 12oz mug is a favorite way to get your (caffeine) fix. The round, ever-so-slightly tapering base and the smooth curvature of the handle are inspired by Japanese ceramics. Pleasure awaits.

name: Instax Square SQ1®
description: Showcasing a modern, minimal, and clean design, the Fujifilm Instax Square SQ1 is loaded with features. From square-formatted prints and Automatic Exposure to One-Touch Selfie Mode and textured grip for a comfortable shooting experience, you’re in complete command of capturing your most precious moments.

name: TRUFF Original Truffle Hot Sauce
description: TRUFF's sauce is a curated blend of ripe chili peppers, organic agave nectar, black truffle, and savory spices. This combination of ingredients delivers a flavor profile unprecedented to hot sauce.

name: Pizza Tour for Two, Chicago, IL
description: Come see the beautiful city of Chicago "One Slice at a Time" with this fun and delicious Chicago Pizza Tour! Explore Chicago's neighborhoods including Lincoln Park, Printers Row, River North, Hyde Park, River West or The Loop and enjoy tastings at 4 pizzerias sampling a variety of Chicago's legendary pizzas. Learn about Chicago's interesting historical sites, architectural beauties and the history of Chicago-style pizza. Includes an experience for two people.

name: 7 FT Chrome Olympic Bar
description: Made with high quality materials, the Inspire Fitness Chrome Olympic Bar is a gym staple that enables you to target various muscle groups with a wide variety of exercises. Weights sold separately. Bar without weights weighs 45 LBS.

name: 100% New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls
description: These 100% New Zealand wool dryer balls are the natural alternative to synthetic dryer sheets and fabric softeners. Save time and the planet, all while getting perfectly soft and wrinkle free laundry results. Includes a set of 3.

name: Kickstart Box
description: Take a break with the Kickstart Box. An afternoon indulgence with your favorite pick-me-up treats. A perfect box to say thanks to special clients, warm a home, or celebrate a special occasion. This gift box includes a matte black ceramic mug, a pair of Pour-over Coffee Packets from Kuju, and Mt Rosemary trail mix from Bareclaw Kitchen, all wrapped in a deluxe black paper box tied with black ribbon.

name: Verve Chair
description: Experience instant relief the moment you sit. Verve is a high-performance work chair that stands out through its striking silhouette, playful palette, and approachable ergonomics. Wrapped in a unique 3D knit, it's V-shaped suspended back offers integrated and adjustable spine support for continuous comfort. There are six points of adjustment for a perfect fit: tilt and tilt lock, seat height, seat depth, armrest height, lumbar height, and tilt tension.  Measures 27"W x 27"D x 27-31"H.

name: 5.5 Quart Bowl-Lift Stand Mixer
description: Up your culinary caliber with 2x the power in the bowl than our Tilt Head Stand Mixer.* Professional-style performance paired with a 3-point locking bowl provides you with stability for mixing heavy, dense ingredients. Designed with 11 distinct speeds, including 1/2 speed, you'll have power and control from high to low, and everything in between. So no matter if you're folding, kneading, mixing, shredding, or beating, the KitchenAid 5.5 Quart Bowl-Lift Stand Mixer is designed to take it all on.

name: Brushed Cotton Duvet Cover, King/Cal King
description: An instant update that'll keep you comfy, this cover looks as good as it feels. Crafted in Portugal from 100% cotton, this exceptionally cozy brushed cotton fabric has a buttery soft finish, just like your favorite lived-in shirt.

name: Color of Change Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Color of Change designs campaigns powerful enough to end practices that unfairly hold Black people back, & champion solutions that move us all forward.

name: Branded Great Jones Dutch Baby
description: Dutch Baby is a round, 3.5-quart cast-iron Dutch oven that's customized for smaller batches and kitchens. Perfect if you frequently cook for one or two people. Features your logo of choice engraved.

name: Cravory Cookies Two Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: These are the cookies that get you hooked and keep you asking for more. Even non-cookie lovers can’t stop themselves with this mix of Cravory's most craveable and gourmet cookie flavors. Includes two dozen cookies.

name: Black Truffle Butter
description: For this home-style product, San Pietro a Pettine selected the most fragrant Italian truffles.  Ideal on top of steaks, as a delicious addition to pasta, rice, and vegetables. Made in Italy, GMO-Free.

name: Levain Cookie Tin Bundle
description: Elevate the joy of Levain cookies with this signature tin, a delightful gift that combines 8 iconic cookies and a lasting memento in Levain's classic blue hue. An homage to Levain's roots, the signature tin features their West 74th Street bakery, where founders Connie & Pam first made the iconic cookie back in 1995. The charming blue tin holds 8 cookies packed in beautiful cellophane bags with hand-tied blue ribbons. The tin helps to keep cookies fresh on the counter and serves as a sweet memento long after the cookies have been enjoyed. Recipient's choice of cookie assortment.

name: AirTag 4-Pack
description: AirTag is an easy way to keep track of your stuff. Attach one to your keys, slip another one in your backpack. And just like that, they’re on your radar in the Find My app. AirTag has your back. Includes 4 Airtags.

name: Gourmet Meat & Cheese Sampler
description: Pop open your favorite bottle of wine, and spread out all of the delicious food that they’ve compiled in this Gourmet Meat & Cheese Sampler! It’s perfect for any social event, or to enjoy in the comfort of your own home. Pair a Pinot Noir with the garlic cheese, or maybe a sweet Riesling with their premium beef & pork summer sausage. No matter what kind of wine is being served, this meat and cheese sampler gift has something that will pair perfectly with it.

name: TB12 Trucker Hat
description: This classic TB12 by Tom Brady Trucker Hat will keep you cool throughout your toughest workouts and longest seasons. An oversized patch features the classic TB12 embroidered logo for distinct style. This hat features a pre-curved visor, classic snapback, and breathable mesh back for constant comfort.

name: Radial Cuff in Brass
description: The Radial Cuff features a radial shape that closely mirrors the particular oval of a wrist for a glove-like fit, a subtly beveled edge to reflect light and create contour, precision machining for consistent sizing, five different sizes to accommodate a wide range of humans, and a slimmed down, sleek profile.

name: It Worked for Me: In Life and Leadership
description: It Worked for Me is a collection of lessons and personal anecdotes that shaped four star-general and former Secretary of State Colin Powell's legendary career in public service. At its heart are Powell's "Thirteen Rules,"--notes he accumulated on his desk that served as the basis for the leadership presentations he delivered throughout the world.

name: ShineOn Lip Jelly
description: Jelly = the shine of a gloss, the comfort of a balm, and a pop of color. For never sticky, always shiny lips! ShineOn is a moisturizing lip treatment formulated with a unique blend of 5 nourishing oils to soothe and protect lips.

name: Dopp Kit
description: This Dopp Kit Pouch is perfect for on-the go. Made with organic cotton, the pouch is great for your toiletries, cosmetics, shaving accessories, school supplies and more. Meet your new essential travel accessory. Measures 20 x 13 x 10 cm.

name: 8 Piece Deluxe Kit
description: This 8-pack combines 2 of each of some of (re)zip's most versatile styles, so you have one handy whenever you need it! With this (re)zip set you get four different sizes of food-safe, lead-free, and BPA-free bags, so you can pick the ones that suit your needs perfectly. Yes, of course, they are great for food, but you’ll find yourself reaching for these lightweight, freezer-safe, durable bags that seal up like a champ for all kinds of storage needs from batteries to baseball cards to those extra nuts and bolts and adapters you know you’ll need the minute you toss them. The 8-piece Deluxe Kit includes 2 Mini Stand-up 1/2-Cup Bags, 2 Stand-up Snack (1-Cup) Bags, 2 Snack Bags, and 2 Lunch Bags.

name: Baby Carrier Mini, 3D Mesh
description: Created especially for newborns and designed to make your first months as a new parent both easier and cozier, Baby Carrier Mini is soft, snug and easy to use. It’s designed to meet a very young baby’s great need for closeness. It's simple to put on and take off, making it perfect for frequent, short babywearing sessions.
