It has a convenient, clever design that lets you unfasten the entire front section to gently lift out your baby and place them in a cradle or crib if they fall asleep. 3D Mesh fabric is made of 100% polyester to be super-soft and flexible while also breathable and designed to release excess heat. Suitable for newborns through 12 months, between 7-24 lbs, or 21-30".

name: Claire European Crystal Champagne Flutes, Set of 2
description: The Claire Champagne Flutes are not just glasses; they're a promise of an unforgettable experience. Made from high-quality, lead-free crystal, they boast a flawless clarity that lets the brilliance of your champagne shine through. Their slender stems and graceful curves are a testament to their exquisite craftsmanship, while the narrow rims expertly capture the delicate aromas and flavors of your favorite bubbly. Includes a set of 2 champagne glasses, each holding 5.7 oz.

name: Insulated Flask + Light
description: Durable, water resistant and ready for anything, this combo is made to travel. Ready to go all night, the Insulated Flask + Light is an always on icon for the outdoors. Engineered for clarity in the darkness, this 4-mode LED Lantern illuminates with precision while seamlessly integrating into the double wall 8 oz Insulated Flask. Perfectly packable, from beach to peak.

name: Catch:2 Essentials, Belgian Linen
description: Multi-device wireless charging, without any of the drawbacks of "dead-zones". Weighted so it stays put, wrapped in designer-quality Belgian Linen and personalized for you, this charger will be a sleek addition wherever it's placed. Can charge through most cases up to 3mm in thickness and has a USB C input, braided charging cable included. Measures 7.8" x 3.1" x 0.6". Recipient's choice of linen color. Monogram included - special characters not permitted and monogramming is done with capitalized letters.

name: Branded 18 oz Insulated Water Bottle
description: Get to drinking faster with the Chug Cap. It just takes a quick half-twist of the TripleHaul Handle to open and then you’re good to go, making it easy to steal a sip without slowing down. This Double-Wall Vacuum Insulated water bottle has the power to keep your water cold (or coffee hot) until the last sip. Engraved with your logo front and center.

name: 12 Pack
description: 12 cans of the flavor of your choice!

name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Donate to the world's leading children's hospital. Your donation will help St. Jude provide treatment for the toughest childhood cancers and pediatric diseases.

name: Staff The Hanger
description: Hangers fitting of your favorite 'fits. With a golden hook because you're worth it. Includes a set of 8 hangers, measuring 15.4"W x 6.3"H x 0.4"D.

name: Home Town Maps 32 oz Bottle
description: Stay refreshed and inspired with this Home Town Map 32oz Insulated Bottle. Not only does it keep your beverage cold right down to the last sip, it comes engraved with a detailed map of ANY U.S. city or town for a uniquely personalized and eye-catching engraved water bottle.

name: The Sauté Pan
description: Minimize mess, maximize flavor. The tall walls on this 10.5” sauté pan safely contain your stews and sauces. Plus, it’s got a signature copper core for rapid, even heating and the perfect sear, every time and for years to come.

name: LoveSeen Gift Card, $100
description: A gift card to use towards lashes. A LoveSeen digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout.

name: 24 Piece Macron Build-a-Box
description: Delicately handmade French macarons. Most of the macarons are gluten-free and made with almond flour, though they are made in a shared facility.

name: Sichuan Gold
description: Introducing Sichuan Gold: Featured on Hot Ones, a bright and flavorful chili oil spiked with the electrifying tingle of Sichuan’s prized Tribute Peppers for a heady, full-body flavor experience.

name: Groom Piñatagram
description: Surprise a groom to be! Filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: Call Us What We Carry
description: Amanda Gorman captures a shipwrecked moment in time and transforms it into a lyric of hope and healing. Harnessing the collective grief of a global pandemic, this beautifully designed volume features poems in many inventive styles and structures and shines a light on a moment of reckoning. Hardcover.

name: Reusable Stretch Bundle
description: Eliminate food waste by saving and storing leftovers, without the single-use plastic. Crafted from premium clear-view silicone, these products stretch & cling to a variety of bowls, cans, pans, and more so you can keep food fresh. Lids & wraps are made from super stretchy & crystal clear silicone that is freezer safe, dishwasher safe, BPA free, microwave safe, and oven safe. The Reusable Stretch Bundle includes: 2.5", 3.8", 4.5", 5.7", 6.5", and 8.0" circular Stretch Lids, 5x9", 8x8", and 9x13" rectangular Stretch Baking Lids, and 7x8", 10x11", and 13x14" rectangular Stretch Wraps.

name: Radius Pant
description: Engineered with technical fabric and smart details, these pants are weather-resistant and ready for whatever your day throws at you (or spills on you). Designed thoughtfully including a flex waist, belt loops, stealth zip pockets, back-ribbed ankle cuffs and back zip pockets.

name: 12 Year Aged Balsalmic
description: Taking you straight to Italy, this thick aged balsamic has the right balance of sweet-and-sour taste and flavor and is a delicious addition to both savory and sweet food. Includes one 3.38 oz bottle. Made in Italy, GMO-Free.

name: Ficus 'Tineke' in Ceramic Potter
description: This variegated rubber tree has beautiful variegated leaves that sport a white cream and sage green color. It's extremely easy to take care of, and you can maximize variegation if you have bright light. Plant is about 8 to 12 inches tall. Planters are 100% premium ceramic, hand-finished in a matte glaze, and include drainage holes with rubber stoppers. Includes one Ficus Tineke, one 5" ceramic potter, and one bag of custom-blended potting mix.

name: OMGF Gluten-Free Cupcakes 25 Pack
description: Oh my, gluten free! Six wheatless, handcrafted gluten-free flavors that are fantastically rich and sweet. Now with new flavors, including Cookies & Cream, Marshmallow, Cookie Dough, and Chocolate Caramel.

name: Braided Pom Pom Throw
description: Cozy and breathable snug fabric braided for texture and finished with fuzzy pom poms. Comfort and style in this 75" x 52" throw.

name: Loog Mini Acoustic Guitar
description: A tiny 3-string guitar, about the same size as a ukulele, bundled with flashcards, an app, and free video lessons. With the Loog Mini, kids get to play songs from the very beginning, feeling rewarded and encouraged to keep on playing and learning. Recommended for ages 3+.

name: Aromatherapy Oil Rollers
description: Palermo Body natural aromatherapy oils are harmoniously blended for solidarity of the senses and evoking nostalgia and will heal the body and mind. Includes a 10ml glass rollerball bottle, choice of oil blend.

name: Daily Essentials SPF Starter Kit
description: This trio of SPF favorites provides daily protection for face & body, plus makes reapplying a breeze! Start with hydrating, full body coverage by applying the original PLAY lotion. Next, apply Unseen Sunscreen for face protection that doubles as a makeup-gripping primer. Then, use the (Re)setting Refreshing Mist to easily refresh & reapply SPF through the day.

name: Butchers Cut Filet and Lobster Feast
description: This gift includes 4 Butcher's Cut Filet Mignons (6 oz.), 4 Split Lobster Tail Skewers (7 oz. pkg.), 4 Mini Baguettes with Garlic Butter (3 oz.), 4 Stuffed Baked Potatoes (5.5 oz.), 2 Green Beans in Butter Sauce (6.5 oz. pkgs.), 4 Caramel Apple Tartlets (4 oz.) & Steak Seasoning (1 oz.).

name: Station Money Clip in Vapor Silver
description: A sleek new home for your cash and cards, the Station Money Clip is light, springy, and low-profile. Made with titanium for it's airy feel, incredible strength and durability and a contour that allows it to sit flat in your pocket, reducing potential discomfort. Weighs 5g and measures 2.5" x 0.925" x 0.225".

name: Vegan and GF Chocolate Chip Walnut 8 Pack
description: These vegan, gluten-free cookie features chunks of crunchy walnuts and semi-sweet vegan chocolate chips. Baked with a rich and creamy butter that’s made from cashews, it’s a plant-based take on the classic Levain cookie, one that everyone can enjoy.

name: Girl Dad Shirt
description: If you have daughters, you know how lucky you are. This tee pays homage to the girl(s) in your life.

name: Valentine's Macaron Collection
description: Experience love in every bite with this Valentine's Collection including 12 macarons in red velvet, salted caramel, and hazelnut, complemented by 4 limited edition printed macarons with love icons.

name: Electric Wine Bottle Opener with Foil Cutter, Vacuum Stopper, and Aerator Pourer
description: Use the Brentwood Electric Wine Bottle Opener with Foil Cutter, Vacuum Stopper, and Aerator Pourer to enhance your wine tasting experience. Effortlessly remove a cork in just 4 seconds and unlock your wine’s full potential using the aerator pourer. It includes a fresh vacuum seal stopper and foil cutter, an operates with 4 AA batteries.

name: PowerShot V10 4K Video 20.9-Megapixel Digital Camera for Vloggers and Content Creators
description: The PowerShot V10 is a vlog and still camera in a new highly portable form factor with components from the popular G-Series line that lets you create impressive videos on-the-go. With stereo sound capture, a built-in stand, and easy live streaming, this cam is ready to go when you are. Don’t let its size fool you, this is a vlogging studio in a compact package that can be operated with one hand to let you express your story.

name: ABBA Gold, Greatest Hits
description: ABBA's Gold, Greatest Hits collection features 19 timeless hits such as "Dancing Queen," "Mamma Mia," "Take a Chance on Me," "Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! (A Man After Midnight)" and more! This 2 LP set is pressed on 180-gram vinyl.

name: Callaway 2022 Fairway C Stand Bag Black
description: The compact, sleek and stylish Fairway C is ready for every round and easily accommodates all of your golf essentials.

name: Extra Large Ice Bucket with Lid and Ice Scoop
description: Planning for a large celebration? Prepare in style with a beautiful extra-large insulated stainless steel ice bucket. The 7 liter capacity holds up to 4 wine bottles or 8 bottles of beer, making it ideal for parties. Includes a scoop and unique floating lid, a firm rubber grip on the bottom, and double walled and vacuum insulated so ice won't melt from happy hour through after-dinner cocktails.

name: Abeba Leather Envelope
description: Handmade in Ethiopia, the Abeba Leather Envelope is crafted using a single piece of leather. It is perfect to carry as a clutch with your essentials or to slip inside your tote for extra storage. Measures 8.5" x 0.5" x 5". Choice of color.

name: Cookies The New Classics: Baking Book
description: 100 bold cookie recipes that take the gold-star standards beyond what you've ever known ONE OF THE TEN BEST COOKBOOKS OF THE YEAR-. By Jesse Szewczyk.

name: PIXIO 100 Magnetic Block Construction Set
description: 100 PIXIO magnetic blocks in six perfectly paired colors let you bring even bigger ideas to life. The set includes six basic colors: black, white, red, green, yellow, and turquoise. Now you can create one large 3D object or multiple figures at once. 24 PIXIO blocks are all you need to model a 3D person. Recommended for ages 6+.

name: The Half Glass Set
description: The Half Glass does triple duty as a water glass, weeknight wine glass and rocks glass. Made from ultra-thin (and ultra-strong) borosilicate glass, it's stackable, dishwasher-safe, resistant to thermal shock and made for everyday use. Comes as a set of 4.

name: Pie Dish
description:
A French Porcelain Pie Dish ensures no soggy bottoms, evenly-baked crust, and a rim that lattice will love. This naturally non stick dish is a 
202-Year-Old Porcelain Recipe and thermal-shock resistant.

name: Branded Marine Layer Lined Blanket
description: The outside is made with absurdly soft mock twist sherpa fleece fabric. The inside is lined with Marine Layer's signature sustainable tee shirt fabric. Now you don't have to sleep in sweaters.

name: Print Block Candle
description: Printing with carved wood blocks is an ancient technique for decorating fabric. Skeem has a large collection of these blocks that have intricately detailed carvings. These candles are inspired by print blocks and feature carved maple lids on matte-white, 3-wick vessels, a thoroughly modern interpretation of the originals. Hand poured in the USA with Skeem's exclusive soy base,  candle has approximately 80 hour burn time.

name: The Core Four
description: Fly By Jing's best-selling lineup of hot and tingly sauces that are highly addictive and super versatile to instantly transform anything you drizzle it on. Includes one jar each of Sichuan Chili Crisp, Xtra Spicy Chili Crisp, Zhong Sauce, Mala Spice Mix.

name: Go Rib Bike Short
description: This super-soft, ribbed bike short is ready for you to work hard or play hard. Sustainable wicking jersey and phone pockets makes it look easy.

name: Retro Electric Tea Kettle
description: With its charming bullet shape and fun chrome metal accents, the Smeg kettle goes beyond basics with a soft-opening lid to manage steam release and a swivel base that goes full circle. Measures 9"Wx8"Dx10"H.

name: Sweet Nothings Sprinkles
description: Bound to give you butterflies. Sweet Nothings is a doe-eyed blend of pastel pink, blue, yellow, green, and purple crunchy jimmies, nonpareils, candy pearls, pearlescent sugar crystals, and conversation hearts blissfully in a world of their own. It’s the feeling of falling in love. Includes 1 jar that contains 133g or 0.5c.

name: The Popper
description: Make perfect theater-quality popcorn in less than five minutes. Designed from premium stainless steel, Popsmith's stovetop Popper merges durability with style for the modern snacker. Using your own kernels or Popsmith's all-inclusive popcorn making kits, you'll enjoy popcorn that's superior in flavor and rich in nostalgia. Designed with all stainless steel and a multi-layered metal bottom that delivers even heat distribution, ensuring no burnt kernels or unpopped popcorn.

name: Galaxy Buds2 True Wireless Earbud Headphones in Graphite
description: Feel every note like you’re there with Galaxy Buds2. Now everyone can have a next-level listening experience, whether you’re rocking out to your playlist or staying informed with a podcast.

name: Tonga Inflatable Stand-Up Light Weight Paddleboard
description: This inflatable Stand-Up Paddleboard from Solstice is amazingly sturdy and comfortable. The Tonga SUP is nearly 11' long and 32" wide for increased stability for riders of any experience level. Kit includes a carry bag and high pressure pump so you'll be ready to go right out of the box! You'll get on the Tonga and not even know its inflatable! You'll be ready to hit the water paddling with the Solstice 35000 aluminum 3-piece adjustable SUP paddle! It's a perfect combination of strength and comfort.

name: Fluted Bedside Carafe Set
description: Featuring an origami style glass cup and matching rippled jar, this is  the perfect set to keep bedside. The water jug and matching glass can be stacked for easy storage. Includes one 26 oz carafe and one 9 oz drinking glass. Lead, Phthalate, and BPA-Free.

name: Cacao Turmeric Latte Blend
description: Cacao Turmeric is like a healthy hot cocoa made to boost your health from within. It's a blend of 7 essential superfoods like anti-inflammatory turmeric and calming cacao. This gift includes 30 daily servings.

name: Uwraps Weights, 1.5lb
description: These vegan leather Ubarre Uwraps can be used as ankle weights or wrist weights. With an ergonomic shape designed for comfort and utility, it's a chic and delicious body loving workout tool. Whether you are adding to your yoga practice, using on ankles or wrists on your run, or rocking as though they were your new favorite anklet and bracelet the UWRAPS will help to bring more movement and health to your day. Includes two UWRAPs.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: A lovely design featuring bright white and red blooms, accented with soft pink; Inspired by sweet strawberry shortcake. Varietals such as ranunculus, hydrangea, stock flowers, and alstroemeria will be incorporated into this design pending seasonality, freshness, and availability.

name: Patty Cake
description: Patty Cake makes baking so it's easy it’s kid-friendly. This wavy, corrugated bottom releases baked goods effortlessly and resists scratching. Plus, the signature stainless-steel design ensures an even, golden finish. Measures 9" in diameter, 2" tall.

name: Men's Hybrid Ribbed Calf Socks
description: They call this a hybrid because it works as an elevated everyday sock, a dress sock, and everything in between. It’s ribbed from toe-to-cuff for a refined look and cushioned in the footbed for a little extra softness. Lighter than a standard Bombas, it’s designed to be thin enough for loafers, substantial enough for sneakers, and can be styled slouched or straight. Get ready to wear it with everything. One purchased = one donated.

name: The Exercise Mat
description: Stakt is the only 2-in-1 fitness mat that doubles as a block for added versatility in your workouts and extra support for whichever way you move. When folded, the stakt mat can be used for step ups, tricep dips, incline exercises and more. It's 2x thicker than your average yoga mat and made from a BPA-free foam, making it twice as supportive. Measures 10 mm thick, 69" x 23.6" flat 3" x 23.6" folded. Includes 1 mat, recipient's choice of color.

name: The Hard Thing About Hard Things
description: Ben Horowitz, cofounder of Andreessen Horowitz and one of Silicon Valley's most respected and experienced entrepreneurs, offers essential advice on building and running a startup—practical wisdom for managing the toughest problems business school doesn’t cover, based on his popular ben’s blog. Filled with his trademark humor and straight talk, The Hard Thing About Hard Things is invaluable for veteran entrepreneurs as well as those aspiring to their own new ventures, drawing from Horowitz's personal and often humbling experiences.

name: Turkish Throw Blanket
description: This luxurious, perfectly soft, 100% Turkish Cotton Blanket is ideal for a queen bed, beach blanket, or throw blanket, and more. Each blanket is unique and may vary slightly in size, color, and weight. Size is approximately 65 x 85".

name: Ultra-Soft High-Rise Legging
description: This Ultra-Soft High-Rise Legging is sure to become your new favorite pair of leggings. These super soft leggings are perfect for yoga classes, low impact exercises and all-day wear. Just because they are soft does not mean they compromise on performance qualities -the Ultra-Soft fabric features quick-drying, moisture-wicking and anti-microbial technology with the 4-way stretch. Each legging is made from approximately 7 recycled 2 liter bottles. Inseam is 25".

name: 6oz Double Wall Glasses Set of 4
description: The double-wall glass provides insulation suitable for use with hot or cold drinks. Double-wall glass insulates for a cool to touch experience without the need for a handle. The form visually suspends liquid in the center, putting your coffee, tea, cocktails or water on elegant display. Includes a set of four, 6oz glasses. Choice of color.

name: Stainless Steel Beer Glass with Lid, 24 oz
description: Sleek and sophisticated design is a step above typical stainless steel tumblers. Thin rimmed, lightweight and easy to hold, it has superior insulation without the bulk and contains 24 oz of your favorite beverage.

name: The Complete Couplet Coffee Trio Bundle
description: Need some variety in your daily brew? Can't commit to just one bean? Try all three of these classics in this convenient trio bundle, including Espresso for Everyone, Blissful Blend, and Peaceful Peru.

name: Le Spritz 12 pack
description: Ghia's signature non-alcoholic aperitivo, but spritzed. Because a real drink is made of real ingredients, powerful enough to bring out the best version of you. Born on the coasts of France and Italy, the classic Apéritif is a bold combination of botanicals that kickstart the appetite and the conversation. Light and dry, an aperitif is perfect for slow-sipping and fast-talking, a drink that takes friends from sunset to sunrise.

name: Stainless Steel Cocktail Shaker
description: Forgo the hand-freeze with this insulated, stainless-steel shaker that keeps your hands nice and warm and your drink nice and icy.

name: Everyday Spa Day Set
description: This set is perfect for making each and every day a spa day. Use 4-6 pumps of the Magnesium Bath Enhancer on bath days and unwrap a Shower Steamer Tablet for shower days. Plus, it comes with a limited edition privacy door tag so you can get the uninterrupted "me-time" you deserve.

name: Rosé All Day
description: Say cheers to this fan favorite dry skin solution with this hydrating, renewing, and perfectly pink Rosé kit. Formulated with antioxidants Resveratrol (from grapes!), Hyaluronic Acid, and Strawberry Extract to help protect from environmental stressors which can lead to early signs of aging. This kit includes a range of luxurious face sheets, eye gels, and fingers and toes masks, all enriched with the nourishing properties of strawberries.

name: Malala Fund Donation
description: More than 120 million girls are out of school today. Your support helps break down the barriers holding them back.

name: Abera Billfold Wallet
description: The Abera Billfold Wallet was crafted with perfect storage and functionality in mind. The simple and sleek design features six pockets inside for cards and one large cash pocket, an all-around great leather wallet for men. Its classic design and premium full-grain leather make it a wallet that will go with you anywhere and everywhere for years to come. Measures 8.5" x 0.25" x 3.5" open, 4.5" x 0.5" x 3.5" closed. Choice of color.

name: Wynwood
description: For those that lean towards a bit more artsy vibe, these compact round eye style have the details you're looking for. Named after one of Nectar's favorite art districts in Miami, they have contrasting tortoise shell arms adding a bit of flair without being over the top. They may not make you the next Picasso but then again, maybe they will. It's all in how you use 'em.

name: Linen Placemat Set of 4
description: Add a dose of comfort and style to your dining table with the perfect placemat. Made of washed rustic linen, these are the perfect addition for both indoor and outdoor dining. This gift comes in a pack of 4, each placemat measuring 14″ x 18″. Machine washable. Choice of set color.

name: Luxury Organic Sateen Pillowcase Set, Queen/Standard
description: Sweet dreams start here. Rather than rely on thread count alone, Quince begins with high-quality threads sourced from the finest long-staple 100% organic cotton on Earth and weave them with the utmost of care. The result: buttery, breathable luxe sateen that only gets softer with each wash. Equal parts durable and luxurious thanks to a sleek-without-too-much-sheen design, this sateen bedding is crafted using windmill-powered green energy and finished without the use of harsh pesticides, GMOs or toxins like formaldehyde. Investing in practices that are good for you and the planet means you can rest a little easier. Includes 2 standard pillowcases.

name: Shampoo and Body Wash System
description: This gentle and baby-safe shampoo and body wash system will be enjoyed by the whole family. Reduce, refill and recycle with the Shampoo and Body Wash System. The Concentrate makes a luxurious 2-in-1 foaming shampoo and body wash that is perfect for sensitive skin and gentle enough for newborns. Formulated with botanicals and probiotics to support baby’s natural microbiome. Each bottle of Concentrate refills up to 8 stainless steel bottles for more than 200 bath times! Includes 34 oz cleaning concentrate and 1 reusable stainless steel bottle.

name: Camp Kitchen Kit
description: Kindhumans donates 3% of your gift to a nonprofit of your choice. Ditch the usual disposables and green your camp kitchen for a happy camper and planet. This kit includes 1 Dr. Bronner's Organic 4-1 Sugar Soap 12oz, 1 EcoCoconut Twin Pack Scourers, 2 Full Windsor Magware, 2 ECOlunchbox Camping Tray, 1 Full Circle Kind Cloths Plant-Dyed Dish Cloths (3 pack), and 1 × Kindhumans Icon Organic Cotton Tote.

name: Expandable Check-In Hard Shell Suitcase 27"
description: Quince's ultra-light, check-in-ready bag has a super sturdy polycarbonate shell and is now available in an even larger size (big enough to fit two weeks’ worth of clothes!). An organizer’s dream, it features interior compartments with a compression panel to help you pack more, plus a removable laundry bag for your dirty clothes.

name: Travel Mini Sound Machine
description: The Yogasleep Travel Mini Sound Machine combines robust white noise options and a night light in one sleek and lightweight pocket-sized device, ready for travel anywhere. The travel mini offers six lush soundtracks created to promote relaxation and improve your sleep environment, including white noise, brown noise, and three nature-inspired sounds. Measures 2.5" x 2.5" x 1.77".

name: PlayStation VR2
description: Escape into worlds that feel, look and sound truly real as virtual reality gaming takes a huge generational leap forward with PlayStation VR2. Enjoy stunningly vibrant 4K HDR visuals4 in compatible games, a vast 110º field of view and state-of-the-art graphical rendering, all made possible by the power of PS5.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max Silicone Case with MagSafe
description: Designed by Apple to complement iPhone 15 Pro Max, the Silicone Case with MagSafe is a delightful way to protect your iPhone. Comes in black.

name: Performance V630W Native 1080P Projector
description: Experience excellence with the Vankyo Premium Projector. Boasting native 1920x1080 resolution, seamless WiFi connectivity, and an impressive 50,000 hours of lamp life, the VANKYO Performance V630W sets a new standard for home cinema and office projectors.

name: 7-Piece Copper Set
description: The Copper Set is the pinnacle of Cookware, offering peak performance in an exceptionally elegant package. Unparalleled in its conductivity, speed, and natural beauty, Copper is the thoroughbred of Cookware. The Copper Set combines 4 iconic French silhouettes for a kitchen that can cook anything and look good while doing it. Spanning the Frying Pan(10.93" diameter), Saucier(11" diameter), Saucepan(11” diameter), and 5.2 qt Rondeau(11” diameter), the 7-Piece Set covers all your bases while improving the speed and quality of everything you make.

name: Bath Tea Kit
description: Steep yourself in a relaxing, soothing blend of herbs, fruits, and flowers to feel your stresses drift away. Using tea in your bath infuses your bathwater with antioxidants while reducing inflammation and helping balance your skin. Tea baths can also help increase circulation and relax your muscles, improving muscle tension and pain. And your bathroom will smell lovely! This Kit Includes a bath tea assortment with a floral watercolor-printed double-layered clutch with golden clasp.

name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant is a natural air purifier that will make a great addition to your home or office! Snake plants have strong, sturdy, sword shaped leaves, which are drought tolerant and retain water. Pro tip: this plant can easily be propagated by leaf cuttings, so you can multiply your family of snake plants! This plant comes in a 4" nursery pot. Planter not included.

name: Spring Collection Single Nail Polish
description: Turn up the brightness with these new, trending colors. Each bottle is long-wearing, 8-free, vegan-friendly, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and made in the USA. Application is made easy with highly pigmented colors, just 1-2 coats needed. Includes one polish, choice of color.

name: Heritage Pocket Notebook
description: Made with sumptuous South Afrian full grain leather, this pocket notebook gains a beautifully unique patina with use. Love the sound as your pen or pencil glide across the smooth creamy white 80 gsm paper. Order your collections and ideas with a table of contents and numbered pages.  The pocket size measures 3.8 x 5.8 inches and holds 80 pages.

name: Birthday Box
description: This Sea Salt Caramel birthday box is the perfect treat to celebrate!

name: Monogrammed Golf Bag
description: Keep your clubs organized and protected with this ultra-durable golf bag. Full-length dividers ensure your clubs don’t get tangled, while a host of sturdy storage pockets let you easily get to your accessories and valuables. Designed with a hood to cover and safeguard the main compartment, and outfitted with a TUMI towel.

name: Butchers Cut Steak Dinner for Four
description: This gift includes 4 Butcher's Cut Top Sirloins (6 oz.), 4 Stuffed Baked Potatoes (5.5 oz.) & 4 Caramel Apple Tartlets (4 oz.).

name: I Love You Cookie Cake
description: This classic cookie cake is baked fresh when you order, made using the highest quality ingredients and the results are obvious in every bite. Moist and chewy, this colossal cookie cake is made with real butter, whole eggs, and pure vanilla. Eat your cookie cake with a fork or your fingers, on plates, napkins, or right out of the box. Any way you slice it, our Big Cookie Cakes are still first in flavor. Due to the dough mixing process, all product may have come in contact with nut oils. Kosher certified.

name: Candle Care Kit
description: Proper candle care is essential to the longevity of every candle. Ensure your candle has the best care with this candle care kit, featuring wick scissors, wick dipper, and candle snuffer. Each kit arrives in a hand lettered bag for safe keeping.

name: Bagette Market Tote
description: Elevate your grocery game with the Bagette! You won't find a bigger, better, stronger, or cuter bag for your daily bread. No double bagging necessary. The Bagette has a big square bottom and holds 2x as much as typical grocery bags. Two sets of straps set it apart from the pack. Keep in your car trunk at all times and prepare for compliments from fellow shoppers. It measures 12.5" W x 14.5" H x 12" D.

name: Square Baker
description: This semi-matte glaze Square Baker holds your favorite baked goods in the oven and on the table. It's just the right size for brownies, blondies and bread puddings. It measures 12x9.5x1" and holds 76.7oz.

name: Pencil (2nd Generation)
description: The new Apple Pencil makes note-taking, writing, and drawing better than ever. It magnetically attaches to iPad Pro, charges wirelessly, and lets you change tools with a simple double tap. Apple Pencil (2nd generation) works with iPad Pro 12.9-inch (3rd, 4th, 5th, and 6th generation); iPad Pro 11-inch (1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th generation); iPad Air (4th and 5th generation); and iPad mini (6th generation).

name: Sweet & Salty Chocolate Minis
description: Caramelized sugar and toasted coconut are a perfect match. This creamy, milky, vegan chocolate is borderline buttery when it melts on your palate. A sprinkle of pink sea salt and a dash of vanilla rounds out the flavor, giving you a little bit of everything in one bite. Each bar is wrapped in a sweet or salty message, so pass them along to your friends, loved ones, or someone you've been admiring. Each bag contains 40 mini bars.

name: All-Day Neoprene Duffle Bag
description: Meet the eco-friendly solution for all your travel needs. This All-Day Neoprene Duffle Bag is crafted from 31 recycled water bottles, making this an excellent choice for eco-conscious consumers. The high-quality, water-resistant neoprene ensures it's durability and versatility, while the spacious interior features multiple pockets and compartments to keep your items organized and accessible. Whether you're heading away for the weekend, or running from the office to the gym, this will be your go-to bag. It measures  H 12” x L 17.5” x W 10”.

name: Classic Fruit Pie
description: Sink your teeth into this delicious and fresh Pie, delivered just in time for your loved one's next event. Sweet and simple and out of control with flavor! Each pie arrives in a gift box and serves 6-8 people, measuring 8" in diameter.

name: Women's Double Cushion Gripper Slipper
description: Half slipper. Half sock. 100% comfortable. Bombas made these Gripper Slippers with a new and improved fit that’s still super cozy. They also have a soft brushed lining on the inside to keep you toasty, and special grips on the outside to help prevent slipping. Plus, every pair comes with a little travel bag that makes packing a breeze. 1 purchased = 1 donated.

name: Women's Everyday Compression Socks
description: Made with a medium level of compression, these Compression Socks aren’t too tight, they’re just snug enough to feel supportive. Great for those who like traveling, running or if you have a job where you’re standing on your feet all day, like nursing. Or maybe you’re pregnant and need something to help ease soreness after being on your feet. They’re good at that, too. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Koda Journal Cover
description: The Koda Journal Cover will become your new favorite office supply, filling it up daily with to-do lists, new product sketches, and goals for the future. Each Koda Journal Cover comes with one Moleskine Cahier Journal Insert.

name: We Miss You Rice Krispie Treat 12 Pack
description: Not quite as good as being there in person, but this “we miss you” 12-Pack is a nice way to sweeten up someone’s day and remind them how much you love them.  This 12-pack comes with assorted nut-free treats, and half of them are garnished with elegant “we miss you” fondant plaques.

name: Dark Chocolate Bar 6 Pack
description: Hu's dark chocolate bars are made with simple ingredients with an unbeatable taste. Select your choice of flavor from a range of unique, mouth-watering creations.

name: HigherDOSE Infrared Sauna Blanket V3
description: HigherDOSE's Infrared Sauna Blanket detoxifies the body, relaxes the mind, boosts your mood, promotes glowing skin, and stokes a healthy DOSE of your brain’s feel-good chemicals. They've spent years perfecting the technology, so that you don’t have to visit a wellness spa to soak up the benefits of infrared. This portable device is perfect for living room sweat sessions or on-the-go wellness. Stay high, on your own time. Measures 71 x 71 inches, unfolded. Maximum interior circumference when in use is approximately 65 inches.

name: The Dutchess & King Sear
description: Two kitchen multitaskers in one easy set! The Dutchess is an oval, 6.75-quart enameled cast-iron Dutch oven that's perfect for braises, stews, roasts, and more! It's paired with King Sear, a 12-inch cast-iron skillet which functions as a durable workhorse ideal for cooking chicken with crispy skin, caramelized onions, and steak (pre-seasoned to make cleaning easy). They’re both big enough to feed lots of pals! Includes one Dutchess and one King Sear.

name: Block Trolley
description: A modern design classic, the Block Trolley is an award winning and versatile mobile trolley that can easily be moved around to meet a variety of work or home needs. The compartments are easily accessible from any direction or orientation, with wheels for 360 degree turns. A black nylon ring around the wheels adds grip and stability supporting two different shelves for storage or decor. Measures 19.7"L x 13.8"D x 25.2"H. Choice of color.

name: Snug Waffle Robe
description: A soft-as-can-be, waffle-textured wrap made from the same impossibly cozy fabric as Sunday Citizen's blankets. Featuring pockets and a tie waist. Made of 100% microfiber. Choice of color and size.

name: TRX Strength Band, 5-15lb
description: Take your workouts to another level with help from the TRX ER 5-15 lb Strength Band. The band supplies up to 15 pounds of resistance for improved strength training results. The durable latex construction encourages lasting use and a lightweight feel, while the full-length design allows you to receive a reliable full body workout.

name: 7.5 QT Oval Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven
description: The Dutch Oven’s exceptional heat retention and circulation transforms even tough cuts into tender, fall-off-the-bone braises. With a new oval shape and increased capacity, you can sear larger cuts of meat and prepare bolognese for a crowd. Its light-colored cooking surface makes it easy to keep an eye on fond (and thus flavor) development, and the non stick enamel simplifies cleaning. Made In's proprietary Cloud Cover Lid boasts pea-sized dimples to trap steam and return moisture to your food. Holds 7.5 QT and measures 10.72" x 17.02" x 4.84".

name: Men's Air Slub Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: You know that super soft feeling of a vintage t-shirt? Bombas managed to create it instantly with cotton slub: a slightly textured fabric that gives you the perfect, worn-in feel. Now, every new shirt can feel like an old favorite. One purchased = one donated.

name: Classic Turkish Cotton Bath Sheet
description: This exceptionally plush Turkish oversized cotton bath sheet is made using innovative Aerocotton Technology. Soft and absorbent, it will leave you feeling fresh and clean. Set includes 1 oversize bath sheet.

name: Creativity Journal
description: The Creativity Journal is an icebreaker for creativity to help you loosen up and unlock your unique, creative self. With prompts that engage, inspire, and instigate, you'll realize that there's no one way to stay creative. Includes 61 prompts, 128 pages. Journal measures 5.75" x 8.5" (14.6 cm x 21.6 cm). Includes one journal.

name: Clutch® Pro Lightning for iPhone 5 - iPhone 14
description: Small, sleek and beautiful, Clutch is a thin charger the size of a few credit cards, making it extremely easy to store in any wallet or purse. Magnetizes to iPhone 12 or newer, and can also attach if the phone has a magnetic case. Note the magnet feature is for attachment purposes only, this is not for wireless charging. You don’t have to carry extra cables with you, Clutch comes with an attached lightning charging cable and LED indicators for increased convenience and ease of use.

name: European Linen Duvet Cover Set, King

The Comb No. 002 increases circulation to nourish your roots and promote growth. Measures 7.5in x 1.6in.

The H-I color of the diamonds adds a touch of brilliance, while the I1-I2 clarity ensures a mesmerizing glow. The light color works best in the morning when you are fresh faced, while the darker colors are great for evening and night use when you may be removing your makeup. Includes 6 face towels and 1 towel holder.

name: The Bail Project Donation

Combining “fast to action” features with classic design cues and the use of Instax Mini instant film, it’ll keep you one shot ahead of the rest. The Instax Mini 40 is ready to hit the streets running thanks to its built-in selfie mode.

In addition to a removable zippered interior pouch for your toothbrush, contact lens case or comb, the larger iteration is complete with a side slip pocket and detachable air mesh brush pouch. Elastic loops cradle items like lip balm, razors or travel fragrance, and the extra volume inside provides enough space to easily contain TSA-sized moisturizers, shampoo and shower gel. Each dose contains Propolis, Tributyrin, and two probiotic strains— Bacillus Coagulans SC 208 and Bacillus Subtilis HU58— to promote digestive regularity and fortify immune response.

Origin of Life reaches back through history to trace artistic motifs from the prehistoric era to Ancient Greece to the Renaissance, noting how contemporary artists continue to tap into such universal themes. Between more than 150 artworks, expert texts and a short anthology of motherhood in literature, this publication reveals how depictions of motherhood in the arts have been linked to broader cultural perceptions. brand: The Spa & Wellness Gift Card by Spa Week

name: My Queen

Each delectable piece features either an X or an O, making every bite a thrilling and tasty challenge. Perfect for chocolate lovers and game enthusiasts, this delightful set of nine chocolates is sure to bring joy, fun, and deliciousness to any occasion. Treat yourself or surprise a loved one with this irresistible blend of sweet confection and strategic gaming.

name: No Kid Hungry Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps connect vulnerable kids in communities around the country with the nutritious food they need to grow and thrive.

name: Marvel Infinity Gauntlet
description: The Marvel Infinity Gauntlet is a challenging construction project that rewards the builder with an impressive display piece that perfectly evokes Marvel’s captivating style. This LEGO brick recreation of the iconic Infinity Gauntlet featured in the Marvel Studios’ Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame movies is certain to attract attention and interest wherever it is displayed. With movable fingers, vibrantly coloured Infinity Stones and a descriptive tablet attached to a sturdy base, this golden gauntlet provides an engrossing construction challenge and a finished model that will captivate all who see it. Includes 590 pieces.

name: Girl Dad Hoodie
description: If you have daughters, you know how lucky you are. This super-soft fleece pays homage to the girl(s) in your life.

name: Atlas Backpack
description: The Atlas is the ideal backpack that goes with you on every work venture or weekend adventure. Created for optimal functionality, with an exterior foam-padded laptop compartment and five interior pockets to keep your life organized. The sleek design matched with our premium full grain Ethiopian leather makes the Atlas a fundamental piece to your collection and built to last.

name: Glowscreen SPF 40, 1.7 oz
description: Formulated with hyaluronic acid, niacinamide and vitamin B5 to hydrate and perfect, this cult beauty fave creates a dewy, glowy base without any visible glitz or glitter. Plus it provides broad spectrum protection from UV rays and infrared radiation, and it helps filter blue light from tech! Wear on its own, or layer under makeup as a glowy primer to give skin a naturally supple, lit-from-within look. Contains 1.7 oz.

name: Rose Eye Gels, 15 pair
description: Raise a glass of fine Rosé and toast to the ultimate dry-skin savior! Treat your delicate eye area to a luxuriously hydrating experience with these playful yet powerful pink gels, formulated to protect skin from environmental aggressors with their antioxidant-rich combination of Resveratrol and Strawberry Extract, plus an ultra-hydrating dose of Hyaluronic Acid. Includes 15 pairs.

name: Compact Camp Chair
description: When it's packed up, this camp chair takes up about as much space as a water bottle — and putting it together only takes a minute. The design uses a pole-and-hub system to lock the durable fabric into place, taking cues from classic tentmakers. When it's assembled, the chair can support up to 250 pounds, even though it only weighs about two. There's also a handy side pocket, plus anti-sink feet to keep the chair steady on sand and dirt.

name: Acrylic Cup
description: Made for grabbing beverages on the go, this double-wall insulated acrylic cup will keep cold drinks cold for 24 hours and hot for 12 hours. The cup, the plastic lid, and the straw are all BPA-free.

name: Sun Belt Sampler
description: A deluxe, sample-sized variety pack of Vacation's most iconic, leisure-enhancing sunscreens, all served in the convenience of a stylish, “festival-friendly” belt bag. This gift includes 1 Classic Lotion SPF 30 (1 oz), 1 Super Spritz SPF 50 (1 oz), 1 Baby Oil SPF 30 (1 oz), 1 Aloe Vera After Sun Gel (1 oz), and 1 "Festival Friendly" Belt Bag.

name: Pizza Night Kit
description: A perfect gift for pizza lovers, this set includes all the essentials for making a Carbone Pizza night right at home.  Just in time for the holiday season, this gifting kit arrives with everything needed to serve it up, including (2) 14oz jars of Carbone Pizza sauce, (1) 3lb bag of King Arthur '00 Pizza Flour, a wooden pizza board, a rocker pizza cutter and spatula. With just the addition of a few fresh ingredients, including cheese and your favorite toppings, pizza night will be complete!

name: Mini Handy Pillow
description: With an ultra-portable and versatile design suitable for both righties and lefties, Mini fits on your hand, wrist, or forearm to match your favorite resting position. Whether you're commuting, at work, studying in the library, or even just lounging at home, you'll always have a comfy moment of relaxation within arm's reach.

name: Licorice Tube
description: Choose which tube of licorice excites your taste buds the most. Bubble Gum Red? Finnish Duo? Australian Red? The good news is there's no wrong choice. Each tube is filled with 1 pound.

name: Power Advantage 5-Speed Hand Mixer
description: Thoroughly blend dense and heavy ingredients with this hand mixer that provides 220 watts of power and features 5 speeds that can be easily adjusted with the slide control.

name: Stilosa 15 Bar Pump Espresso Machine
description: The Stilosa Espresso Machine by De'Longhi is an elegantly designed espresso machine that elevates your espresso experience at home. De'Longhi's manual machine is designed to provide an easy brewing experience of authentic specialty drinks: latte, cappuccino and espresso. The 15 bar pump pressure and durable stainless steel boiler ensure perfect extraction of espresso.

name: PIXIO 50 Magnetic Block Construction Set
description: 50 PIXIO magnetic blocks in six perfectly paired colors to let you bring your creative ideas to life. Start by building simple models using the instructions, and then, when you’re ready, move on to creating your own designs. It includes six colors: black, white, red, green, yellow, and turquoise, that will help you transform simple shapes into recognizable figures. Recommended for ages 6+.

name: Outdoor Big Plates
description: Bring California craft to your outdoor table with The Outdoor Big Plates. Perfect for breakfast, lunch, or dinner outdoors, these plates are plastic-free and unbreakable with natural colors, elegant shapes, and refined matte finishes for your years and days outside. Includes 4 plates.

name: Jade Pothos, Small
description: This common pothos has long, cascading vines and jade green foliage. It is one of the most popular and adaptable houseplants out there. When it's thirsty, its leaves look droopy and start curling. Low to bright indirect light, direct sun will burn his leaves. Measures ~10" tall and a comes in a 4" grow pot.

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Graduation 12 Pack
description: Celebratory Rice Krispy Treats with Graduation themed garnished and plaques. Flavors include Birthday Cake, S’more, Caramel Sea Salt, Cotton Candy and Hot Cocoa

name: On the Move Workout Set
description: Elevate your workouts with the On the Move Workout Set. These SJ Resistance Bands help to build muscle, increase strength, and improve flexibility. Stay fresh with 100% cotton SJ Workout Towels that roll perfectly into a gym bag. Stay hydrated with the SJ Nalgene water bottle that's perfect for everyday use.

name: Happy Birthday Candy Gram
description: The Candy Gram puts a modern spin on the "tele-gram" sending a Happy Birthday message with little treat to sweeten anyone's day! Filled with 3oz of sprinkle Gummy Bears with a sweet gummy inside and crunchy colorful outside.

name: Anker Car Charger Bundle
description: With its fast and compact design, this 3-port car charger allows you to charge up to three devices simultaneously, ensuring you stay connected while focusing on the road. Equipped with high-speed charging capabilities compatible with PD and PPS, a single output port can reach up to 35W, meaning you can charge your iPhone from 0% to 50% in just 25 minutes. Plus, with the advanced ActiveShield 2.0 protection, your devices are safeguarded as it intelligently monitors temperature and adjusts power output in real-time. Includes a 3' cable with two USB-C male ends and the car charger with three female ports (2 USB-C ports and 1 USB-A port).

name: NBA Jogger
description: Practice-level vibes with game-time warmth, and your favorite team front and center. These joggers go all day. Boom goes the dynamite!

name: The Essential Apron
description: Tested by Michelin Star chefs and fearless home cooks the world over. Relentlessly refined to be the perfect companion to any cooking adventure. The hardest working, best looking apron in the world: The Essential Apron.

name: Chiefs Travis Kelce Big Yeti
description: Travis Kelce’s nickname from wayback is the inspiration for this super-soft Kansas City Chiefs look. Rep one of the greatest tight ends of all time and instrumental part of KC’s Super Bowl LIV and LVII wins, and go Big Yeti!

name: Good Air Humidifier Bundle
description:
The Cloud Humidifier Hydrates the air in your home to give you better sleep, dewy skin, and improved natural immunity. It includes a two-pack of replacement filters to keep your mist as pure as possible. It also includes
an Urban Garden Spray, a crisp and uplifting air freshener spray to make your space smell light and vibrant.Urban Garden Spray, a crisp and uplifting air freshener spray to make your space smell light and vibrant.

name: Linen Napkin Set of 4
description: These washed rustic linen napkins will add texture to any table. A perfect addition to a casual and cozy tablescape for both indoor and outdoor dining. This gift comes in a pack of 4, each napkin measuring 20″ x 20″. Machine washable. Choice of set color.

name: The Pepper Peperomia Thailand Plant
description: The Pepper is a Peperomia Thailand plant, also known as Peperomia rotundifolia 'Thailand' plant. It is a charming and compact houseplant with small, round leaves. It is a relatively easy plant to care for. This plant comes in a 4" nursery pot. Planter not included.

name: Video Doorbell Wireless
description: See, hear and speak with visitors from anywhere with the new and improved Video Doorbell (2020 Release). Customize your motion zone settings to focus only on important areas and receive real-time notifications on your phone, tablet, or select Alexa-enabled device when there’s movement at your door. With infrared night vision and live view capabilities, you can check in on what matters anytime from the free Ring App. Video Doorbell lets you stay conveniently connected to home, no matter where you are.

name: Beast Stainless Steel Hydration Bottle
description: Made of insulated stainless steel to keep your colds cold and your hots hot. Built to last, the stainless steel nature is durable, and keeps the flavor of your water pure. The Beast Hydration Bottle was specially designed for an easy experience: the vessel features a wide opening for easy fill of your liquids, ice, and even your Beast blends to take with you on the go. With a 22 oz. capacity, the Stainless Steel Hydration Bottle is the perfect size for your daily essential hydration.

name: Small Hunter Toiletry Bag
description: Keep your grooming essentials organized with the Hunter Toiletry Bag. A removable zippered compartment and side slip pocket perfectly hold items like a small comb, contact lens case or tissue packet, while elastic loops cradle items like lip balm, razors or travel fragrance. Measures 7.5” L x 4” W x 4.5” H.

name: The Signature Scent
description: The Signature Scent perfumes every one of Crown Affair's formulas. It’s primarily uplifting, boosting your mood and leaving you calmer and happier than before. It’s sparkling, but subtle; like getting a good night’s sleep can give you an indescribable glow, it blends seamlessly into your hair and with whatever fragrance you’re already wearing on your body. It just adds a touch of romance and that’s the love affair; it’s what taking your time smells like. This scent has been perfected in its purest form: an actively hydrating, gentle and non-drying hair perfume. Bottle holds 3.4 fl oz.

name: PhonePal 3-in-1 Pro Cooling Fan, Power Bank + Phone Stand
description: This multi-functional 3-in-1 fan is a must-have for the heat. Turn it on anytime, anywhere to cool down all day long, it lasts up to 8 hours with a full charge! The bottom compartment of this portable personal fan is a 3000 mAh power bank that can be used to charge your phone while powering the fan. Fold the fan 90 degrees and prop up the back lever, and this gadget instantly turns into a phone stand! Measures 6.57" x 3.15" x 0.71".

name: Music System Home (Gen. 2)
description: A design-driven smart Hi-Fi system, the Music System Home Generation 2 offers built-in Chromecast and AirPlay 2 to quickly and easily connect to your home’s Wi-Fi and stream music from many of your favorite streaming apps. The unique four-speaker design produces dynamic and room-filling audio. The Music System Home includes a variety of ways to connect your television, making it the perfect entertainment system companion. An embodiment of smart home audio and design, the Music System Home Generation 2 connects you with the music and audio content you love. Choice of color.

name: Smart Landscape Growframe
description: A Full Spectrum Grow Light for Living Green. Light the way to a greener home. This Smart Growframe is the vital solution for creating a lush vertical plantscape in sun-deprived spaces. It beautifully frames and thoughtfully nourishes low-to-bright light loving plants. Simply mount, add plants and connect to the Modern Sprout App. Light is delivered daily to keep your plants happy and brighten your home. Produces a natural white light with long lifespan LEDs. It measures at 32.1” x 5.3” x 11.5”.

name: Linen Throw Pillow
description: This washed rustic linen throw pillow is the perfect addition to any cozy and casual setting in your home. Add dimension to a comfy couch or your favorite reading nook. Includes one pillow, measures 20″ x 20″. Choice of color.

name: 3 Months Couture
description: Choose any 1 item from thousands of luxury accessories. This three month membership allows you to choose 1 couture piece from jewelry to bags to limited edition pieces each month, with a retail value up to $4,000. A Vivrelle digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address you provide within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription on Vivrelle's website.

name: Men's Wool Half Zip
description: Jenni Kayne's best-selling half zip sweater, this lightweight knit boasts added length and a straighter body. Made with a 70% wool 30% cashmere blend.

name: No Kid Hungry Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps connect vulnerable kids in communities around the country with the nutritious food they need to grow and thrive.

name: Poultry Sampler
description: This gift includes 4 Steakhouse Chicken Breasts (6 oz.), 4 Chicken in Pastry (8 oz.), 2 Chicken Cordon Bleu (7.75 oz.), 2 Chicken with Wild Rice (7.75 oz.), 4 Boneless Chicken Breasts (1 lb. pkg.) & 4 Italian Marinated Chicken Breasts (3 oz.).

name: Danke
description: This "thank you" curation packs a big gesture in a small package. A little bit of thoughtfulness goes a long way. This box includes an Appointed Black Linen Notepad, Theory 11 Playing Cards, 2 Le Pens with blank ink, the Art of Caramel Popcorn, and a Keepsake Box.the Art of Caramel Caramel Popcorn, and a Keepsake Box & Handwritten Card.

name: WWF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the World Wildlife Fund helps protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature.

name: 3 months Couture+
description: Give the gift of choosing a special piece from thousands of luxury accessories. This three month membership allows you to choose 2 items from jewelry to bags to limited edition pieces. This membership allows for two items at a time, 1 from the Classique closet & 1 from the Couture closet, with a retail value over $4,000. A Vivrelle digital redemption code will be delivered by email from Goody to the email address you provide within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. This redemption code can be used to activate a subscription on Vivrelle's website.

name: Rosé Fingers Hand Mask
description: The Rosé Renewing Fingers Mask is designed to restore moisture, smoothness, and elasticity to dry hands. The mask is enriched with a blend of hydrating and soothing ingredients, including shea butter, strawberry oil, and resveratrol. These ingredients work together to deeply moisturize and nourish your skin, leaving your hands feeling soft and revitalized while protecting from signs of environmental stressors which can lead to early signs of aging.

name: The Luncher
description: Yes, it’s a lunchbox…and is Modern Picnic's OG, best selling style for a reason. With an insulated interior and vegan leather exterior, you can pack your food and no one would ever know what was inside. The Luncher is perfect for fitting a meal + drink, and is easily wipeable (in case of those accidental spills). Packing your own food is faster, cheaper, healthier and now chicer. It measures H 8.5” x W 9.8” x D 6.5”.

name: Full Steam Duo
description: Rinse, steam, splatter, serve! This colorful, multitasking design is a 4-in-1 colander, steamer, splatter guard, and trivet. It’s made with food-grade silicone and reinforced by stainless steel. BPA and BPS-free and dish-washer safe. Heat-resistant up to 550 degrees Fahrenheit. Includes a set of two.

name: The Cottage Fairy Companion
description: The Cottage Fairy Companion is your accessible and beautiful guide to mindful living. It teaches the fundamentals of cottagecore style through the practices of The Cottage Fairy’s daily life. By Paola Merrill. Paperback.

name: Sterling Silver Birthstone Studs
description: Every birth month has a special meaning. Now, you can show off your unique birthstone with a pair of stone studs that will add sparkle to any look! Each pair is available in one of twelve stone colors and is adorned with a CZ top stone. Available in gold and silver metal tones. They're made with 14K gold plated sterling silver or sterling silver, cubic zirconia/created opal/faux pearl.

name: Large Office Desk
description: Designed with thoughtful details including flared legs, heigh-adjustable feet, and a brushed cable port, the Office Desk sets the foundation for you to do your best work. Its impact-resistant, double laminated top resists spills and dings while its steel frame supports up to 650 lbs with exceptional stability. Measures 60" x 30". Choice of color.

name: Function101 Bentostack Charge 8000
description: BentoStack Charge 8000 is an Apple Accessory Organizer with a built in Power Bank / Wireless Charging Cover designed for workspace and mobile use. The Charge Cover features an integrated 8000 mAh battery with 3-in-1 simultaneous charging. The USB-C Power Delivery Port charges the latest Apple hardware like the iPad Pro. The USB-A Port enables charging devices by wire. The top surface is a Qi-Certified Wireless Charger for Qi-enabled iPhones and the latest model AirPods. Includes a USB-A to USB-C Charge Cable. Made of light durable plastic with a soft touch finish.

name: 40 Piece Signature Truffles Gift Set
description: The Signature Truffles ultra-luxe 40 piece gift set is bursting with 40 of Compartés seasonal handmade chocolate truffles, displayed in this gorgeous black gift box that is as visually beautiful as it is delicious. They're the most popular chocolates for a very good reason! Flavors may include the signature infusions, from Dark Chocolate Smoked Sea Salt and even classics such as Apple Pie! Made with all natural ingredients, with no preservatives or additives.

name: One-Piece Henley Swimsuit
description: With snap-henley style, sustainable fabric, and a flattering fit, this one-piece swimsuit is an essential.

name: Gold Bar Initial Necklace
description: Make any look truly your own with this gold bar initial necklace! Each gorgeous, dainty piece features a letter--recipient chooses the letter of their name, their sister's name, or the names of their friends. Whether you gift this beautiful silver bar necklace or keep it for yourself, you're sure to get a trendy little piece that's perfect for wearing anywhere, anytime.

name: Small Revol Collapsible Dog Crate
description: Revol is an attractive, collapsible dog crate that is easy to set up, transport, and store. Revol's design, inspired by baby industry quality standards, incorporates premium materials and ergonomic, easy-to-use doors. Puppy divider included. Dimensions are 25"L x 17"W x 19"H.

name: World Central Kitchen Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide fresh meals to communities in need.

name: Beer Making and Bottling Kit
description: You don’t need a brewery or a basement full of equipment to make great beer, just this Beer Making + Bottling Kit and a few items already found in your kitchen (a stockpot, strainer, and funnel). This starter kit gives you the tools and quality ingredients needed to brew your first batch of beer and the footing to go on brewing many, many more. This  American Pale Ale Beer Making + Bottling Kit includes a how-to guide, glass fermenting jug, airlock, racking cane, sanitizer, screw-cap stopper, tubing clamp, thermometer, beer bottles (10), clear vinyl tubing, bottle capper, and bottle caps (12). They also include the grain, hops, and yeast for you to make a batch of their American Pale Ale. The kit makes just under two six packs of beer.

name: Avery Day Tote
description: Avery Day Tote was designed to allow you to bring anything you need along, without packing 12 bags. Fit it all in style and no longer go without! Uses include shopping, beach days, coffee shop visits, or literally anytime you're gone all day. Woven by hand in Bali, Indonesia it measures 19"x12"x8", while the straps measure 9.5".

name: Extra Virgin Hydrating Face Oil Rollerball
description: Quick & easy to apply, this face oil melts into the skin instantly to protect, nourish and restore hydration for an on-the-go dewy glow. The metal applicator has a cooling effect that not only feels good, but can reduce swelling and inflammation. Formulated with clean ingredients, this super moisturizing yet featherweight face oil quickly absorbs to help nourish, soften, and rejuvenate skin. A powerhouse duo of Kosterina's signature extra virgin olive oil and lachestim, a restorative oil found only from mastic trees from the Greek island of Chios, boosts hydration and protection for a youthful, fresh-faced appearance without clogging pores.

name: Spoon Rest
description: This semi-matte glazed Spoon Rest features a dipped edge and generous landing space for quick pit stops between stir and taste. It's dishwasher safe and measures 4.75" at its diameter.

name: Women's Air Slub V Neck T-Shirt
description: You know that super soft feeling of a vintage t-shirt? Bombas managed to create it instantly with cotton slub: a slightly textured fabric that gives you the perfect, worn-in feel. Now, every new shirt can feel like an old favorite. One purchased = one donated.

name: Pocket Notebook
description: This grab-and-go notebook is the perfect daily notebook. The beautiful 100 GSM pages make for a smooth writing and drawing experience. It features 160 pages and measures 4.3” W X 5.83” H.

name: Lightweight Down Duvet Insert, King/Cal King
description: Transform your bed into a cloud of comfort. Made with European white down, this insert has a fill power of 750, giving it superior fluff and just the right amount of warmth. Soft sateen is sewn around the down in a baffle box construction, keeping the feathers evenly distributed. It's finished it off with sturdy, double stitched seams to maintain its shape and durability for years to come.

name: Branded Bliss Garden
description: This fresh succulent garden arrives in a beautifully branded planter gift box, ready to display and enjoy. Measures approximately 4 x 5 inches.

name: Girls, Inc Donation
description: You have the power to help a girl grow up strong, smart, and bold. She is a leader and ready to succeed. Your investment will help equip her to create positive change in her life and in the world around her.

name: Zen-sational Weekend
description: Take some well-deserved time for yourself and indulge in the ultimate skincare experience with this blissful relaxation bundle. This new kit brings together Patchology's top face masks, lip gels, and eye gels to help you restore, deeply moisturize, and illuminate your skin. Includes 1 Chill Mode Hydrogel Face Mask, 1 FlashMasque Hydrate Face Mask, 1 Flashmasque Illuminate Face Mask, 5 pairs of Rejuvinating Eye gels, and 5 Hydrate Lip Gels.

name: Trike
description: The timeless design of the Banwood tricycle for kids is the perfect way to get the youngest one familiar with biking and coordination training. This retro styled trike comes with a softly padded oak seat, vegan leather grips, wooden oak pedals, a removable push handle and a cute wicker basket in front to bring along their favorite toys. Suggested for children ages 3-6. Seat height is 30 cm. Choice of color.

name: Stainless Steel Beer Glass, Set of 2
description: TV room to pool party, the stainless steel of these beer glasses make them an ideal indoor-outdoor glass. Each holds 16 ounces of your brew with room for foam, but it’s shatterproof, doesn't sweat and keeps beer or any beverage at the right temperature from start to finish. Includes a set of 2 glasses.

name: SPHERA
description: The SPHERA wireless speaker offers a unique mix of style and sound, enhancing your home décor with cable-free high-quality audio. Enjoy a variety of wireless listening experiences by streaming your favorite music services from any iOS or Android device. As simple as a single speaker or building the perfect audio system, the SPHERA speaker can be configured to offer mono, stereo, and multi-room audio playback. Cased in a Tivoli Audio furniture-grade wood cabinet and finished with an upholstery-grade fabric grill, the SPHERA wireless speaker brings an aesthetic touch to your audio.

name: Air Purifier MAX with True NanoSeal HEPA
description: The Shark Air Purifier uses Pure Air Microforce to deliver fast, powerful, and quiet purification. Clean Sense IQ senses air quality & auto-adjusts to improve air quality and report results in real time. A HEPA filter captures 99.98% of airborne particles like allergens, dust, and dander. This purifier cleans up to 1200 square feet.

name: The Starting Lineup 3-Piece Set
description: Meet The Starting Lineup, a three-piece collection designed specifically to guide beginner cooks. This oven-safe, dishwasher-friendly set includes the essential team players you need to build your collection and nothing more. All pieces are safe for all ovens and stovetops, including induction, and are nonstick and nontoxic for easy cleanup. Set includes the 3.5 quart Dutch Baby dutch oven, 8.5" Small Fry frying pan, and Little Sheet quarter-sized sheet pan.

name: Elisa Pendant Necklace with Ivory Mother-of-Pearl
description: A dainty stone and delicate metallic chain combine to create the Elisa Pendant Necklace in Ivory Mother-of-Pearl, your new favorite wear-anywhere accessory. This pendant necklace can be paired with any look, providing that extra touch of timeless style. Make the Elisa Ivory Mother-of-Pearl Necklace a staple in your wardrobe and you will not be disappointed. Made with 14K yellow gold over brass, chain measures 15" with lobster clasp.

name: Golf Stand Bag
description: Featuring a patent-pending backpack strap, this bag is easy to carry between holes. Crafted from FXT® Ballistic Nylon, it holds up to 14 PGA-regulated clubs. It also has an open side pocket with magnetic closure, temperature insulated cooler, and the stand legs extend and retract to allow for angled, easy access to clubbs while in play/stowage when in transit or stored.

name: Organic Everyday Extra Virgin Olive Oil Tin
description: Cooking with olive oil is key to living a healthy lifestyle. This 500ml tin is a bakers best friend, with a wide opening perfect for cooking family style meals or pouring into measuring cups. Crafted with cooks in mind, this Organic Everyday EVOO stands up to heat beautifully with smoke point of over 400° F. Made from 100% Koroneiki early harvest olives, it has a mild, fruity flavor with a smooth finish that will not overpower your food. Includes 1, 500ml tin.

name: Woven Vase
description: Add texture, color, and cultural richness to any space with these handwoven vases. Display them as they are or fill them with dried botanicals and anything your heart desires. Each vase was handwoven with elephant grass and recycled plastic and measures 10"H with 3" diameter from bottom. May have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product.

name: Seven Days in June
description: Seven Days in June takes a second chance love story and manages to capture within its pages an entire spectrum of Black spirit, joy, humor, and redemption. By Tia Williams. Paperback.

name: Classic Turkish Cotton Tub Mat
description: Step out of the tub and onto this plush mat, designed to keep your bathroom floor dry and your toes nice and warm. Made of 100% Turkish cotton, it measures 20" x 31".

name: Reusable Face Rounds
description: Made of soft cotton terry, these reusable face rounds are absorbent and easy to use for removing makeup and toning your skin. They make for a sustainable swap for disposable cotton rounds that get thrown out after every use. Each set includes 7 reusable cotton rounds in one cotton net bag that can be used when machine washing.

name: Yoga Bundle
description: This yoga bundle is a perfect companion for your restorative practices, yin yoga, prenatal yoga, meditation, and back massage. Whether to improve your flexibility, or just to relax after work, these props will assist you. This set includes 3 yoga wheels measuring 13", 10", and 6" diameters, a yoga knee pad measuring 26" x 10" x 0.6", and a yoga bolster measuring 26" length x 11" width x 5.5" height.

name: The Full Glass Set
description: A foot above the rest, this unique cup beautifully holds water, wine, and cocktails. Made from ultra-thin (and ultra-strong) borosilicate glass, it's stackable, dishwasher-safe, resistant to thermal shock and made for everyday use. This set includes 4 glasses, each glass holds 12.6 oz and measures 4.9" tall, 3.11" wide.

name: The Coated Pan
description: Smooth as silk(en tofu). At last, a pan that looks as good as it cooks. The 10.5-inch showstopper uses a one-of-a-kind stainless steel alloy built around a core of copper, infused with a fume-free coating that lasts up to 37x longer than ceramic.

name: The Connoisseur's Set, Reserve Glass Edition
description: Discover the Original Rocks paired with stunningly beautiful crystal whiskey Reserve Glass. The round solid granite stones cool your drink without the dilution found from traditional melting ice cubes which alters the true taste of spirits. Designed for the connoisseur, this collection will elevate your whiskey tasting experience, awaking your senses as you sip your favorite whiskey.

name: House Blend 2-pack, Ground
description: 100% Colombian farm-fresh specialty house blend coffees, roasted to order. 2 x 12oz bags, medium grind.

name: Clean Home Bundle
description: Turn everyday staples into luxurious rituals with the Clean Home Bundle. It's everything you need for clean, nourished hands and an impressive signature scent for your entire home. The Calendula Hand Cleanser gently cleanses without stripping your hands' natural oils, while the Bath & Towel Spray infuses Palo Santo, Lavender and Eucalyptus to transform your space into a five-star wellness resort. All made with zero harsh chemicals or artificial fragrance.

name: Secret Food Tour with Drinks for One, San Francisco, CA
description: Free your inner foodie as you taste and sip your way through one of San Francisco’s most fascinating neighborhoods on this San Francisco Food Tour with drinks. You'll be in good hands with this TripAdvisor Travelers’ Choice Award Winner, Secret Food Tour, where passionate local guides will introduce you to some of San Francisco’s iconic and award-winning dishes. Bring out the mouth-watering flavors of your meal with specially selected signature drinks! Includes an experience for one.

name: Premium Whole Food Approved Snack Box
description: This snack box is a collection of 20 individually wrapped healthy Whole Food friendly protein rich snacks and supplements. It includes 1 Chomps Grass Fed & Finished Jerky Sticks, 1 Nicks's Sticks Spicy Grass-Fed Beef Sticks, 1 Diamond Foods Himalayan Pink Salt Walnuts, 1 Bunny James Foods Carrot Fries, 1 Think Jerky Beef Mini Stick, 1 Mission Meats Turkey Sticks, 1 Artisana Organic Pumpkin Seeds, 1 Wonderful Pistachios Roasted and Salted Pistachios, 2 Eden Pocket Snacks Pumpkin Seeds, , 1 Karma Nuts Golden Turmeric Wrapped Cashews, 1 Jana Banana Banana Bar Coconut, 1 New Primal Free-Range Turkey Stick, 1 Think Jerky Turkey Mini Stick, 1 Justin's Almond Butter Squeeze Packs, 1 Artisana Organics Raw Organic Cashew Butter, 1 Solely Organic Fruit Jerky, 1 Chum Chum Fruit Bites, 1 Sea Snax Seaweed Snacks , and 1 Taali Water Lily Pops Tikka Masala.

name: Herbal Remedies
description: Herbal Remedies are made with a blend of 100% Organic Herbs and each is designed to provide a specific type of support towards releasing, healing, transforming and managing the flow of daily life.

name: 3 Month Flower Bouquet Subscription
description: This is the gift that keeps blooming with Bouqs' digital flower subscription. Treat yourself to three months of farm-fresh, Deluxe Sized flower deliveries. Personalize your pre-paid subscription when you choose your collection and easily customize delivery settings. Gift card for value of 3 months of flower bouquets will be emailed to you. Vases not included.

name: 3 Flavor Hampton Classic Popcorn Tin, 1 Gallon
description: Did someone say movie night in? Or holiday party? This 1 gallon 3 flavor tin is the perfect size for a small gathering with family and friends or to indulge at home. Flavors include Butter, Caramel, and Orange Cheddar Cheese Popcorn.

name: Drizzle EVOO
description: Like a sprinkle of flaky salt or the squeeze of a good condiment, Drizzle adds a big pop of flavor right before you dig in. Drizzle’s flavors are sensitive, though, so keep it off the heat.

name: Smart Electric Toothbrush
description: This sleek collection (for adults and kids!) features timed sonic vibrations to guide good brushing, and a reusable mirror mount that doubles as a travel cover for on the go. Pair one or more brushes to the iOS or Android app, then you’re all set. Quip’s Bluetooth® Smart Motor will automatically store your routine, no phone needed! The good habit dashboard shows you when and how well you brush and where you earn bonuses for never missing a beat! Redeem points for rewards you’ll love (from quip and their growing list of partners), like free refills, products, and more.

name: Solid Gold Bakery Tower
description: A stunning gift tower wrapped with an elegant purple ribbon and filled with the finest in gourmet bakery treats. In this customer favorite, this gift includes a 4-inch Cinnamon Coffee Cake, 10 Gourmet Cookies in Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal Raisin, Snickerdoodle, Butter Pecan, and Ginger Molasses; 8 Brownies in Chocolate Truffle, Chocolate Truffle w/Walnuts, Marble Cheesecake and Cookies & Cream; and to top it all off 6 Square Hazelnut Truffles.

name: Kombucha Making Kit
description: Everything you need to brew your own homemade Green Tea Kombucha in one kit. Making kombucha couldn’t be easier. All you need to do is brew a batch of sweet tea (with the included green tea and cane sugar) and ferment it with the included SCOBY (which stands for Symbiotic Colony of Bacteria and Yeast). Included in the Kombucha Making Kit is a 1/2 Gallon Glass Fermenting Jar, Kombucha SCOBY, Kombucha Starter Liquid, Cane Sugar, Premium Green Tea, Cloth Cover, and band.

name: Eden
description: A lush combination of garden varietals featuring orange and magenta blooms, accented with seasonal wildflowers and greenery. Includes premium flowers, glass vase, and fresh hand delivery. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Branded Unisex ThermoBall™ Vest
description: The Unisex ThermoBall™ Eco Vest features an innovative quilting pattern and advanced insulation for lightweight warmth, durability and packability. It’s also made with 100% recycled fabrics and fill, because gear should be tougher on the cold and easier on the planet.

name: SOS Recovery Cream
description: A safety net for your skin, this super hydrating, gentle moisturizer helps recover and reset skin back to its baseline with hyaluronic acid and ceramides. SOS Cream instantly hydrates, soothes irritation + helps reinforce the skin barrier. SOS has received the National Eczema Association's Seal of Acceptance™ and is safe for all skin types. Tube holds 1.86 oz.

name: 50G Gift Set
description: Includes a 50G tin in a custom wooden presentation box, one mother of pearl caviar spoon, and a key to open.

name: inKind Pass Gift Card, $25 Value
description: inKind Pass gift cards can be redeemed via the inKind mobile app for food, beverage and tax across hundreds of top-rated restaurants, bars, and coffee shops nationwide. An inKind Pass gift card will be delivered via email within 24 hours. A $25 value.

name: $25 Spa and Wellness Gift Card
description: The Spa & Wellness Gift Card by Spa Week is the ultimate wellness gifting solution offering unfettered access to the largest Spa & Wellness network of over 9,000 spa locations throughout North America, providing hundreds of spa and wellness services such as massages, facials, waxing, man/pedi's, salon services, fitness classes and beauty products.  A Spa Week digital gift card will be delivered to you by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. No expiration date.
brand: The Spa & Wellness Gift Card by Spa Week

name: Carver Digital Frame
description: Send photos from your phone to Carver, Aura's top-selling WiFi-connected frame. Enjoy all your favorite moments on Carver's 10.1" landscape display, and watch as it intelligently pairs complementary portrait photos side-by-side. Add unlimited photos and videos, and invite all your loved ones to fill the frame using the free Aura app. The frame measures 10.5" x 7.3" x 2.1", with a 1280x800, 150PPI resolution.

name: 12oz Rocks Glass, 12 pack
