description: Classic composure meets modern chill. Savor the good times and great malts in this nostalgic style. Was your day neat or on the rocks? Made with up to one post-consumer bottle per cup and is #1 curbside recyclable. No glass equals no stress, these cups are guaranteed to never break, chip or crack. Made of BPA-free plastic. Note this cup is note dishwasher safe. Each cup measures 2.8" x 3.5" and set includes 12 rocks glasses.

name: Private Reserve 8-Bottle Wine Cellar
description: Designed by fit on the countertop, this compact, slim-line wine cellar cradles up to eight 750- to 1,500-milliliter bottles of wine or champagne on contoured chrome racks. The thermoelectric, compressor-free cooling system chills quietly and efficiently. Touchscreen controls on the outer door let you select temperatures from 39 to 68 degrees.

name: Desk Organizer Set
description: Organize and enliven your workspace with this set of three desk organizers made of sturdy, powder-coated metal. The large organizer holds files, while the smaller ones are perfect for envelopes, cards, and other small desktop items. Each measures, Blue Dome: 1.5" L x 5.3" W x 7.6" H, Coral Slant: 1.7" L x 5.7" W x 5.2" H, and Pink Scallop: 1.8" L x 7.1" W x 2.1 " H.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps bring independence back to our nation’s most severely wounded veterans.

name: Baby2Baby Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide children living in poverty across the country with diapers, clothing and all the basic necessities that every child deserves.

name: Stainless Clad Saute Pan
description: The 3.5 QT Saute Pan's large surface area provides the functionality of a 12 inch frying pan while the high, straight walls allow for easy execution of braising and sauce-based dishes. You’ll end up using this pan as a serving dish, too.

name: Best Seller XL Cupcake 12 Pack
description: This 12-Pack includes Crumbs' best selling flavors the following in their signature size. Flavor assortment includes Two Red Velvet, Two Cookies and Cream, Two Birthday Cake, Two Devil's Food, Two Vanilla Sprinkle, and Two Cotton Candy.

name: Glow and Grow Kits
description: Burn, plant, and grow! This ceramic candle vessel transforms into a planter after the flame has burned down and includes a complete kit to grow flowers, herbs and houseplants. A 12oz scented soy-blend candle features a light and refreshing scent. The grow kit components are tucked in the bottom of the box and include non-GMO seeds, soilless grow medium, plant food, activated carbon and instructions for success.

name: Everyday Extended Crew Sock
description: Thanks to premium combed cotton and a cushioned footbed, you'll feel great about pulling these socks on everyday. Includes one pair, choice of color. One size fits most men's US shoe sizes 9-13.

name: International Committee of the Red Cross in support of Israeli and Palestinian Civilians Donation
description: The gift of giving! The ICRC has been present in Israel and the occupied territories since 1967. As a neutral, independent, humanitarian organization, the ICRC visits detainees in Israeli and Palestinian places of detention. They also help improve access to essential services like water and electricity in Gaza and support livelihood projects throughout the occupied territories.
brand: International Committee of the Red Cross

name: Clean Sense Air Purifier 500
description: The Shark Air Purifier uses Pure Air Microforce to deliver fast, powerful, and quiet purification in a compact size. Clean Sense IQ senses air quality & auto-adjusts to improve air quality and report results in real time. A HEPA filter captures 99.98% of airborne particles like allergens, dust, and dander. This purifier cleans up to 500 square feet.

name: Parker Briefcase
description: The Parker Briefcase is a blend of sophistication and structure, made with premium bullhide leather for strength and structure, and Ethiopian highland sheepskin for sophistication and softness that can't be matched. Measures 17" x 5" x 12.5".

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Champagne Diamond 11 Stone Band
description: Reimagine the classic band with this modern 10kt yellow gold plated 925 sterling silver ring. 13 natural, round-cut champagne color diamonds sparkle along the top half of the band. The diamonds are pave set and have a total carat weight of 1/4 cttw. This ring is the perfect addition to your growing jewelry collection, and adds the perfect amount of bling to any day.

name: Roller + Gua Sha Set
description: Lift, sculpt, de-puff and detoxify your skin with this Black Obsidian Gua Sha and Roller Set. Regular use of the black obsidian roller helps to release puffiness and can be used to apply oils and serums. The varying ridges of the gua sha aids in lymphatic drainage and can help relieve facial and jaw tensions. Includes 1 roller and 1 gua sha.

name: The Works
description: Indulge in TRUFF's entire line of truffle-infused pantry staples. This pack features four unique hot sauce varieties, two savory pasta sauces, two distinctive mayonnaises, decadent black and white truffle oil, and their luxurious black truffle salt.

name: CamelBak Eddy 20 oz
description: Stay hydrated anywhere you go with the CamelBak Eddy water bottle. Made with robust Tritan material that offers top-tier shatter, stain, and odor resistance. This reusable water bottle is BPA-Free and its screw-on lid along with the spill-proof biting valve make for an effortless, mess-free drinking experience.

name: Snug Crystal Weighted Blanket
description: Weighted blankets put a steady, gentle pressure on your body to make you feel comforted and relaxed. This weighted blanket gets it's soothing density from glass pearls and crystal pieces, harnessing natural healing energy. It measures 77" x 52". Choice of color and weight.

name: Lab Grown Birthstone and Round Diamond Tennis Bracelet
description: Vivid created birthstones and sparkling white diamonds are set in this S-link tennis bracelet crafted in cool .925 sterling silver. This bracelet features 20 sparkling diamonds set in miracle-plate settings that multiply their sparkle, for a total diamond weight of 0.15 carats. The 20 sustainably lab-grown birthstones alternate with the diamonds in a delicate dimensional and open setting, adding brilliant color to this feminine fashion bracelet. The perfect gift to celebrate a birthday.

name: Pave Edgy Set
description: The Pave Edgy Set includes the Medium Pave Oval Hoop pair, as well as the Baguette Charm Huggie, single. The hoop pair measure 17.3mm height, 11.8mm width, while the Baguette Charm measures 8mm inner diameter, 11mm outer diameter, and a 5mm x 3mm x 2.5mm CZ stone.

name: 3 Month Flower Bouquet Subscription
description: The ultimate gift for any flower lover, this subscription will deliver a farm fresh flower bouquet once a month for 3 months. Sourced from eco-friendly farms, each arrangement is unique and will come with a surprise assortment each time. Your recipient will receive 1 bouquet per month for 3 months. Each bouquet will be 19-32 mixed stems of flowers, greens, and fillers. Vases not included.

name: The Prepster Backpack, 3-Day Emergency Bag
description: The Prepster™ Backpack features deluxe comforts, tech gear, and first-aid essentials in a "keep-your-hands-free" backpack design for one person. Generously stocked with all of the necessary supplies such as the Preppi Solar charger & hand-crank Emergency radio, 3-day water and food supply, Malin+Goetz essential kit, Marvis toothpaste & toothbrush, premium chocolate bar, Kusmi Tea, FIRST-AID KIT, Multi-tool equipped with pliers, sharpened blades, can openers, and a wood saw, Preppi Poncho, Preppi mylar space blanket, hand warmers, Floating high decibel whistle, Duct tape, Air Respirator 95% Filter Mask , Tube Tent for quick shelter, UCO Waterproof Survival Matches, Preppi 4-hour candles, canvas PVC Dot Work gloves, Utility bags, Paracord Rope 550, Field Notes Expedition Waterproof Notebook and Preppi Pencil, LED combination Signal Flare, Flashlight, Flasher, Glowstick & Whistle, LED Headlamp, Poker Playing Cards, and a BYOS Stainless Steel Hip Flask.

name: Revitalizing Eye Cream
description: The most technologically advanced eye treatment helps improve the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles. Formulated with a luxuriously concentrated blend of absorbent fatty acids, hydrating peptides and marine algae extract to help restore and brighten delicate eye area. It absorbs residue-free and doesn't migrate into eyes. It's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, with natural fragrance and color. 5 fl oz.

name: Leisure 510 HD 720P Projector
description: Experience the ultimate movie night with the Leisure 510 projector that effortlessly connects to various devices, displays crystal-clear HD images, and delivers impressive audio quality through its built-in speakers. Enjoy worry-free movie marathons thanks to its long-lasting LED lamp, which lasts over 10 years with daily use, and the efficient cooling fan that keeps things quiet for an immersive cinematic experience.

name: Birthday Wishes Variety Pack Gift Box
description: Hip Hip Hooray! It's your day! This set of 16 gourmet marshmallows comes with Cotton Candy, Funfetti, Vanilla, and Cookies and Cream flavored mallows. Who needs cake?!

name: Home Town Maps Cutting Board
description: Etched with the roads and neighborhoods of any city and town in the US, this maple cutting board does double duty. The blank side will become your go-to cutting board while the other beautifully engraved side works as a serving board and features the city of your choosing. Any US city available, note that if a neighborhood or town is entered we will reach out to you to determine the closest available city. Measures 9" x 12".

name: LA Chocolate Bar Gift Set
description: Compartés Gourmet Chocolate Bars Los Angeles Gift Set is the perfect California or LA gift. Featuring 4 premium gourmet chocolates in flavors like California Love, Old Hollywood and Blonde Bombshell this set evokes Compartés rich Hollywood and Beverly Hills tradition, including Marilyn Monroe who used to be a customer. Featuring a surfing bear graphic on the California Dream to the now iconic and best selling California Love bar designed with palm trees and an Angeleno sunset, this chocolate gift set is the ultimate made in LA treat. It also includes the classic Old Hollywood art deco inspired bar with smoked sea salt, just like Sinatra used to like!

name: Monogrammed Leather Mousepad
description: Meet the perfect mousepad for your at home office set up. Made with 100% leather and personalized to you. Choice of monogram inscription and leather color. Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted, 3 character limit.

name: Quip Travel Best Sellers Kit
description: What you need for your next vacay or a long weekend at home! This travel set includes the Electric Toothbrush & Cover Brushes created by dentists and designers with all the guiding features teeth need (and no wires or bulky charger), a Refillable Floss Pick with easy, one-click restring, Refresh Bag with a flexible silicone shell and handle, and Mint Travel-Size Anticavity Toothpaste (100% recyclable tube & cap).

name: Rainbow Rice Krispie Treat Bars
description: Twelve of their festive rainbow rice krispie treat bars presented in an elegant gift box.  Rainbow rice krispie treat are individually wrapped and will stay fresh for months. They are gluten-free, dairy-free, and nut-free.

name: Treat House Assorted Rice Krispie 12 Pack
description: Assorted 12 pack of delicious hand-crafted crispy rice and marshmallow treats. Flavors include Cookies and Cream, Caramel Sea Salt, Birthday Cake, Chocolate Mint, S’more, M&M, and other seasonal favorites. All treats are gluten free with the exception of Cookies and Cream.

name: Luxury Organic Sateen Sheet Set, Queen
description: Sweet dreams start here. Rather than rely on thread count alone, Quince begin with high-quality threads sourced from the finest long-staple 100% organic cotton on Earth and weave them with the utmost of care. The result: buttery, breathable luxe sateen that only gets softer with each wash. Equal parts durable and luxurious thanks to a sleek-without-too-much-sheen design, these sateen sheets are crafted using windmill-powered green energy and finished without the use of harsh pesticides, GMOs or toxins like formaldehyde. Investing in practices that are good for you and the planet means you can rest a little easier. Set includes 1 fitted sheet, 1 flat sheet, and 2 standard pillowcases. Fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 16" deep.

name: Stay Diffuser, White
description: The Stay Diffuser is long-lasting, scenting your largest rooms for up to 18 hours. It’s perfect for gathering places such as living rooms, open-plan kitchens, dining rooms, and bedrooms.

name: Shoe Dog
description: In this instant and tenacious New York Times bestseller, Nike founder and board chairman Phil Knight offers a rare and revealing look at the notoriously media-shy man behind the swoosh, illuminating his company’s early days as an intrepid start-up and its evolution into one of the world’s most iconic, game-changing, and profitable brands.

name: Men's Merino Wool Blend Calf Socks
description: Merino Wool is a natural wonder that is soft, warm, and moisture-wicking to keep your feet dry and cozy. Bombas blended it with polyester and spandex to provide just the right amount of stretch, tension, and arch support, too. While originally made for winter days, Bombas fans wear Merino year round.

name: Monogrammed Cuyama Coaster
description: The Parker Clay Cuyama Coasters are named after the Cuyama Valley, a fertile stretch of ranches and farmland along the north side of Santa Barbara's coastal mountain range. Whether you’re hosting a cocktail party or searching for the perfect host gift, these Cuyama Coasters are the ideal companion for entertaining. Includes 4 coasters + complimentary gold foil monogram.

name: Roll Tight Storage Bags
description: The perfect space-saving tool for organizing your freezer, fridge, and pantry. Set of three storage bags with an endlessly bendable, coated metal crimping bar to keep food airtight & fresh. Crafted from premium food grade materials that are freezer safe & BPA-Free. Includes a 25 oz, 36 oz, and 50 oz bag.

name: Cactus Soothing Face Mask
description: This immediate hydration boost is supercharged with healing ingredients like Cactus Extract and Cica to soothe redness and irritation while reducing fine lines. Perfect for a post-shave treatment or whenever you need a moment for you. Includes 4 masks.

name: Bright Future with Signature Vase
description: This inviting 26 stem mix of bright sunflowers, soft roses, and intriguing spider mums is a serious force of attraction. A longtime customer fave, this creates a refreshing look you can't get away from. Signature Vase included. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: 6 Months Alo Moves
description: Unlock wellness wherever you are with Alo Moves. Find what moves you with instant access to thousands of classes from top trainers, including styles like yoga, Pilates, barre, strength, HIIT, walking, meditations, self-care, and more. Improve your sleep, boost your energy, and feel more productive during your day when you include Alo Moves in your routine.

name: Italian Essentials
description: This is the ultimate box to transport you to sunny Italy, with a combination of pastas, tomato sauce, basil pesto, sweet and savory cookies, and an assortment of chocolate treats.

name: Lofie Clock
description: Loftie is a thoughtfully connected alarm clock designed to help you break up with your smartphone alarms and get more sleep. With a dimmable display, nightlight, two-phase alarm, and custom content playable right on the device, Loftie is everything you need (and nothing you don’t) for a dreamier bedroom atmosphere.

name: Nostalgia 4 Everyone Box
description: Zac’s most thoughtful box yet comes as a true box of delicious nostalgia. For every box sold, Zac’s will donate 4% of proceeds to charities. It comes with S’mores Bark, Salted Caramel Pretzel Bark, 1 Salted Caramel Pretzel Cookie, 1 N4E Cookie, 2 M&M Pretzels, 2 Salted Caramel Pretzels, and 2 Chocolate Covered Oreos.

name: Piano Cocktail Glass Set of 2
description: A set of two cocktail glasses reminiscent of the jazz clubs of the gilded age of New York, with a contemporary twist. Sold in pairs of two mismatching (but complimentary) color combinations, with two stainless steel garnish skewers. Each glass holds 3.5oz.

name: Kids Classic Bike
description: This Vintage kids’ bike was designed with a timeless Scandi look and unique rosewood pedals. With a lightweight alloy frame, cream colored 16” tires, and adjustable saddle and handlebars which leave room to grow with your child. This bike is equipped with a safety bell, back-pedal brake, hand break, detachable training wheels and comes with a detachable wicker basket to bring along your little one’s favorite things for a day’s adventure. Seat height ranges from 46cm - 57cm. Suggested for children ages 4-7.

name: Classic Pickleball Paddle
description: Elevate your pickleball game with these vacation spot-inspired pickleball paddles, combining classic elegance with modern performance. Make a statement on the court as you channel the timeless sophistication of Monte Carlo, Ibiza, Casablanca, and more.

name: Shimmer Wine Glass with Lid
description: Enjoy every sip with this 13oz all purpose wine and cocktail glass with travel lid. Unlike other stainless steel wine tumblers, it's classic shape and thin rim feel just like drinking from fine glassware, without the warm wine! Insulated stainless steel keeps hands from warming your wine (or ice from melting) so your drinks taste great from start to finish.

name: Beast Blender Plus
description: The Beast Blender + Hydration System is thoughtfully designed and meticulously engineered with industry-leading technology, resulting in a machine that is the ultimate in preparing nutrient-rich smoothies and infusions that make you Strong Inside™. This combination allows you to make perfect blends and infused water. By quickly pulsing your ingredients before infusing, your water will have tons of flavor and more nutrients compared to infusing larger pieces of ingredients. It’s also great for taking your blends on the go. This combination allows you to make perfect blends and infused water. By quickly pulsing your ingredients before infusing, your water will have tons of flavor and more nutrients compared to infusing larger pieces of ingredients. It’s also great for taking your blends on the go.

name: Instax Mini Instant Film Value Pack
description: The Fujifilm Instax Mini Instant Film Value Pack means you can express your creativity and capture the world around you without a worry. With 60 exposures and only a moment to develop, you can easily share the picture with your friends. Designed for use with all Fujifilm INSTAX MINI Instant Cameras as well as INSTAX MINI Instant Smartphone Printers.

name: Stainless Steel Cocktail Shaker and Martini Glass Barware Set
description: Whether you’re a dirty martini gal or a Manhattan is more your style, you’ll be set to serve up cocktails for happy hour with these insulated stainless-steel martini glasses and shaker. Cocktails stay cold and the leak proof and sweat free shaker design keeps hands and countertops dry. This set includes an insulated stainless steel cocktail shaker with built in strainer and two 8oz insulated stainless steel martini glasses.

name: Get a Grip
description: After years of profitable, predictable growth, Swan Services was in a rut. The company Eileen and Vic had founded and built for 10 years was a different place. Get A Grip tells the story of how Swan Services resolves its issues by implementing the Entrepreneurial Operating System®. With the help of EOS, Eileen, Vic, and their leadership team learn to develop and commit to a clear vision, establish focus, build discipline, and create a healthier and more cohesive team. The story of Swan Services is a fable, but the Entrepreneurial Operating System®, a complete entrepreneurial toolkit, is very real and has helped thousands of businesses worldwide.

name: $75 Daily Harvest Gift Card
description: Stock your freezer with delicious food built on organic fruits + veggies delivered to your doorstep, ready in minutes. Enjoy craveworthy food made with 250+ unique, nutrient-packed ingredients. A Daily Harvest digital gift card will be delivered to you by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout.

name: 24/7 Woven Boxer
description: Mack Weldon developed a fabric that's cool and soft enough to sleep in, with a fit that's tailored enough to wear under pants. Includes one pair, choice of color and size.

name: Ascent Series A3500 Blender
description: Five program settings (for Smoothies, Hot Soups, Dips & Spreads, Frozen Desserts, and Self-Cleaning) automatically adjust to the container size you’ve selected, process your recipes, and stop the blender when complete. Built-in wireless connectivity will allow Ascent™ Series blenders to evolve with the latest innovations for years to come. Container holds 64oz.

name: Compass Backpack
description: The Compass Backpack is will be your new favorite travel companion, whether on the trails or catching flights. Made from a specialty blend of durable, slash proof, water repellent fabric, your gear will remain dry and protected no matter the adventure. TSA approved coded zipper lock keeps your valuables safe while traveling and your essentials right where you want them. Padded sleeves are designed to fit up to 17" laptops and 10" tablets, both sleeves are equipped with velcro straps to keep your electronics secure.

name: Florere Forget-Me-Not
description: Crafted with meticulous skill, this stunning creation captures the beauty of one of nature’s most eye-catching flowers. The blue forget-me-not is produced with 876 light-catching facets, displayed atop a gold-tone metal stem that gracefully entwines across a natural unfaceted crystal base. Representing true love and faithfulness, this freestanding design would make a truly impressive gift for a loved one, serving as a permanent reminder that they’re in your thoughts. No vase or base required. Not suitable for children under 15.

name: Sleepy Bear Lovey
description: Perfect for cuddling, this cotton security blanket will help soothe baby, so Mama can get some much needed rest of her own. This gender neutral oatmeal colored bear is made from super soft cotton, making it cozy for naps, or for snuggles on the go. It is the perfect token to show baby some love too, while also keeping Mom's need to run errands or catch a snooze in mind.

name: Grill Press
description: This Stainless Steel Grill Press is ideal for maximizing contact between your ingredients and your cooking surface, perfect for smashburgers, bacon, or paninis. Stainless Steel construction is durable enough for open fire cooking, and a raised handle gives you more leverage and keeps your hand away from the hot cooking surface. Safe up to 800F.

name: Sculpd x Papier Collaboration Sketchbook
description: The best creations in life start life on paper. To help you plan your next creative project Sculpd x Papier have created a limited edition hardback unlined notebook for you to sketch out and jot down your crafty ideas. Ideas are the lifeblood of creativity, those little moments of inspiration pop into your head and then just like that they're gone from memory. It’s a good idea to keep them safe. Sketchbook holds 96 leaves (192 sides) of smooth plain paper and measures 153mm x 215mm.

name: TRUFF Hot Sauce Bundle Pack
description: A flavor focused bundle of TRUFF's original black truffle formula paired with TRUFF's hotter offering designed for the heat seekers. Kick up the heat when you want it and enjoy the sweet when you need it.

name: Talon Raincoat
description: Made of water-repellant fabric, the best-selling Talon raincoat has the vibe of a traditional anorak for your pup. No worries: Details like a sturdy snap-off hood, adjustable cuffs, drawstrings and flap pockets means it's super functional during all those spring showers - without ruining your pup's hair.

name: 22oz Vacuum Insulated Water Bottle with Flip Lid & Sport Straw
description: Keep drinks piping hot or icy cold for 12 hours or more with this triple vacuum insulated stainless steel water bottle with straw. It comes with flip lid, straw lid and extra straw. A 100% leak proof water bottle for easy travel without fear. Bottle holds 22oz and measures 10" H x 2.5" W.

name: "Il Segreto dei Medici" Tea Tin
description: Inspired by the secret recipe of the Medici family, this soft blend is made of jasmine and white teas, with chocolate notes. Made in Italy, GMO-Free. Includes one 3.52 oz tin.

name: Insulated Dry Bag Cooler
description: Keep your valuables dry and safe, whether you’re at a poolside barbecue or on a deep-sea fishing trip. This bag's made of durable, rubberized 500D PVC, with a roll-top closure and heat-treated seams that make things completely airtight (meaning the bag'll float if you leave some extra air in there). The best part? It comes with a removable, insulated layer that can keep food and drinks cold for hours. Plus, there's a front pocket with a mesh window to wrangle odds and ends once you're away from the water. Measures 24" H x 10" W, Rolled 17" H.

name: Body Plane
description: The Body Plane, a patent-pending, in-house-designed body exfoliator tool, uses a colloidal sterling silver blunt edge to gently scrape the skin of dead skin, dullness and impurities while providing an intimate and gentle self-massage. The Body Plane is intended to be used when the skin is warm, damp and freshly anointed with oil.

name: The Host
description: An indulging assortment of hosting items completed with delicious charcuterie bites. A kind gesture to warm a home this gift includes a small wood cheeseboard with spreading knife, a Cherry Chai Spread and Preserve from Brins, Artisan Fruitcake Crisps by Rustic Bakery, gourmet salted Virginia Peanuts, Dardiman's Dehydrated Orange Crisps, and a deluxe kraft paper box tied with ivory ribbon.

name: Licorice Sampler Pack Gift Box
description: Get 6 tubes, each filled with a 1/2 lb of licorice! The classic Red includes ss petites, Red Laces, Strawberry Sour Twists, Strawberry Pillows, Finnish Red, and Australian Red. The Sour Sampler includes Blue Raspberry Sour Twists, Sweet n' Sour Petites, Dutch Rainbow Sours, Watermelon Sour Twists, Sarah's Favorite, and Strawberry Sour Twists.

name: IBUKU HEPA Air Purifier
description: IBUKI is Miko's best-selling true HEPA air purifier with a three-layer filtration and 360-degree suction design. IBUKI covers up to 400 sqft and completely refreshes the air up to 5x per hour, making it the best air purifier for bedrooms, studios, and one-bedroom apartments. You can control when and how IBUKI runs with adjustable fan speed and timed operation. It removes up to 99.97% of pollutants. Features a built-in essential oil diffuser, allowing you to add your favorite scents directly in.

name: Color of Change Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Color of Change designs campaigns powerful enough to end practices that unfairly hold Black people back, & champion solutions that move us all forward.

name: Legacy Essential Oil Blend
description: A new heirloom, legacy is grounding and balanced. With top notes of Rose and Bergamot and bottom notes of Frankincense and Cedarwood, it smells like the warmest welcome. Return to your surroundings and return to yourself. 100% pure, vegan, and cruelty free. Bottle contains 0.5 fl oz.

name: Italian Fresh Cheese Making Kit
description: Make some of the richest and creamiest cheeses you’ll ever taste. Capture the simplicity and delicacy of fresh Italian-style cheese by making it the way it’s supposed to be done. At home in a kitchen no bigger than your own. Includes equipment and ingredients to make mozzarella, burrata, ricotta and mascarpone. All you need is milk.

name: Personalized Zebrawood Cufflink & Tie Bar Set
description: This personalized cuff link & tie bar set is the perfect accessory for any formal occasion. Stylish and timeless yet slightly out of the ordinary, this zebrawood and stainless steel set will make any shirt and tie combo stand out from the crowd. Your recipient personalizes with their initials. Set includes a 40mm x 6mm Tie Bar and 2 Cufflinks each with a 15mm diameter. Please allow up to 10 business days for personalized gifts to deliver.

name: 13-Piece Knife Organizer Set
description: Perfect for kitchens with limited counter space, the in-drawer Knife Organizer offers elegant and expandable drawer storage that actually keeps blades sharp. The 9-Piece Organizer can hold up to 5 large (Chef, Nakiri, Bread, and Santoku) plus 4 small (Paring and Steak) knives, while the 3-Piece Extension can hold an additional 2 large knives plus 1 small knife. When fitted together, another small slot is gained, resulting in a baker’s dozen worth of storage opportunities for 7 large and 6 small knives.

name: Mongolian Cashmere Tee
description: Does it get more luxe than cashmere basics? Not really. Super soft and lightweight, this short sleeve cashmere sweater is a wardrobe staple for layering all year round. Tees are meant for everyday wear. Now yours can be cashmere. This quality cashmere is incredibly long-lasting and three times as warm as wool, sourced sustainably and ethically. Crafted from 100% Grade-A Mongolian cashmere, 12 gauge.

name: Glow Stick SPF 50
description: A portable, glow-boosting, dry oil sunscreen stick for face, chest and shoulders. Glow Stick sunscreen is a mess-free, travel-friendly SPF that you can pop into your handbag, beach bag or tote bag, depending on wherever the day is taking you. It's totally invisible, majorly hydrating and perfect to use as a face or body highlighter, as it leaves behind a dewy finish without an oily residue. Contains 0.70 oz.

name: The Espresso for Everyone Blend, 12oz
description: The Espresso for Everyone : a modern, crowd-pleaser type of bean. A mix of Brazilian, Nicaraguan, and Peruvian beans, it's great in any preparation but espresso extraction was in mind for these beans in particular. Recommend as a drip as well!

name: Edgewater Collection Espresso Cup and Saucer
description: A ceramic collection beautiful enough for guests but durable enough to withstand every day use. The subtle speckled pattern adds visual interest and texture making it the perfect backdrop for all your delicious kitchen creations. Each piece is hand-thrown and unique giving it a beautiful handmade quality. The cup holds 5oz, the saucer is 4″. Dishwasher safe, microwave safe, oven safe up to 300°F. Includes one espresso cup and saucer, choice of color.

name: Essential Oil
description: Each of these scents are a curated blend of essential oils, 100% Pure with no synthetic fragrances, no diluting oils, and no artificial coloring. Just knowing that you're taking a holistic approach to your mental and emotional health is the first step toward improving it. Each oil focuses on a different path to a better you.

name: Minera Picture Frame
description: Inject some timeless elegance into your home with this stunning picture frame. Created by product designer Thomas Feichtner, it shines in silver-tone metal and glistens with approximately 3’300 clear and silvery colored crystals. It features a glass front and a velvety flocked back and stand, and fits a 5x7” picture.

name: Always Grand With Signature Vase
description: Eternally iconic and elegant, red roses still stand out as the ultimate symbol of unconditional love. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Dry January Pack
description: Your Dry January starts here. It contains everything you need including a bottle of Original Apéritif, a bottle of Berry Apéritif, 12-pack of Le Spritz in all 4 flavors (Ghia-Soda, Ghia-Ginger, Lime & Salt, Sumac & Chili), and A Really Fancy Pour Spout.

name: Organic Airy Gauze Placemats, Set of 4
description: Made from 100% organic cotton, these placemats are not only eco-friendly but also incredibly soft and gentle to the touch. The natural texture of the gauze fabric adds a unique touch to your table setting, and the simple yet elegant design complements any style of dishware. These placemats are also versatile, perfect for use at any meal or occasion, from casual picnics to formal dinners. With their durable construction, these placemats are designed to last, so you can enjoy them for years to come. Plus, their organic cotton material means they are free from harsh chemicals and pesticides, making them safe for you and the planet. These placemats are easy to clean and maintain, and their organic cotton material means they are a sustainable choice for your home. Set includes 4 placemats, each measuring 14" x 20".

name: Celebrate You
description: The Celebrate You bouquet includes 24 mixed stems of roses, ranunculus, scabiosa, solomio, and eucalyptus and arrives in a beautiful vase. Please note that as flowers are a live product, colors and varieties may slightly vary from the photos shown to provide you with the freshest and most beautiful bouquet.

name: Revive & Refresh Set
description: Everybody needs some R&R and Esker believes that bathing rituals can soothe the skin and elevate the spirit. Revive & Refresh the skin below your chin in three simple steps with this curated set. First, prep your skin for maximum product absorption with the Bestselling Dry Brush. Next, dip into a restorative bath filled with Magnesium Bath Enhancer. Last, seal in the essential minerals and moisture with the gentle, scent-free Nourishing Oil, and you'll be on your way to a whole new you.

name: Pre-Order Aviator Carry-On Plus
description: Engineered for the smoothest ride, this best-selling carry-on is not only going to become your new favorite travel companion but it's also the most sustainable piece of luggage you'll ever own. TSA approved sizing, measures 14.7" x 22.7" x 9.6". Note this gift is in preorder and ships 02/23/24 - 03/01/24.

name: Electric Knife Sharpener
description: The 2-Stage Electric Knife Sharpener turns any dull kitchen or sports knife razor sharp in seconds. No skills required, simply follow the automatic blade guides from stage 1 to stage 2. Anti-slip base and guided slots stabilize the knife. No clean up, unit collects all excess metal.

name: 8 Cup French Press
description: Enjoy french press style coffee without the messy grounds. GroundsLifter is an innovative tools used to remove coffee grounds in one step. Allows coffee grounds to infuse completely in a span of a few minutes. Stainless steel housing with borosilicate glass carafe. Fine mesh filter plunger keeps grounds out of the cup. Makes up to 8 cups of coffee.

name: Grillmaster BBQ Knife
description: This blade has scalloped edges, a design that keeps food from clinging and cuts meat cleanly without uneven tears, making for slices that look like you took a laser to them. It's got a forked tip, too, so you can flip chops, work the grill, and serve freshly carved meats all with one tool. The blade's tempered, high-carbon stainless steel construction offers more durability and corrosion resistance, and easier sharpening, than run-of-the-mill stainless steel, and it runs full-tang under a gorgeous, hand-polished acacia handle with stamped brass rivets.

name: Scalloped Rim 8oz Short Tumbler Glass, Set of 4
description: This stylish tumbler combines a contemporary fluted design with a delightful shade of pink, creating a versatile and charming glass that is perfect for any occasion. The epitome of style and charm, making these the perfect gift for those who appreciate unique and aesthetic drinkware. The delightful pink hue, combined with the fluted design and scalloped rim, adds a touch of sophistication to any beverage. Includes a set of 4, 8oz short tumblers.

name: Leather Coasters, Set of 4
description: These coasters get better with age. They're made from full-grain leather with natural oils that develop a patina over time, proudly displaying each coaster's history—spills, stains, and all. They've got felt bottoms, too, which lets them slide effortlessly across your favorite table without leaving so much as a scratch. Best of all, they're sourced and handcrafted in the USA with minimal processing and a handsome stamp on each.

name: PLAY Antioxidant Body Mist SPF 50 with Vitamin C, 6 oz
description: A non-aerosol, sweat- and water-resistant sunscreen body spray with SPF 50 that leaves skin radiantly glowing. This lightweight, refreshing SPF mist is literally the easiest way to wear sunscreen, just point, spray and play! You can even apply it onto wet skin for total UV protection. Contains 6 oz.

name: 15 Piece Assortment
description: Indulge in a symphony of time-honored flavors, artfully enhanced with the distinctive zChocolat touch. These assortments offers a delectable ensemble that captures the essence of zChocolat's iconic recipes. Immerse yourself in the sheer delight of each meticulously crafted creation. Includes a 15 piece assortment, your choice of flavors.

name: Collar, Recipient's choice
description: Designed for daily wear, this dog collar is made with premium, durable materials. With matte metal details and soft-touch coated nylon, it’s as comfortable as it is good-looking. It’s also easy to clean and odor-resistant, so you can let your pup sniff, dig, and roll to their heart’s content.

name: Reserve Classics
description: An unbreakable, and most durable set of wine, champagne, and beer glasses for years to come. Made with Tritan™ Copolyester, a shatterproof, ultra-durable, and dishwasher-safe material, you'll never have to worry about broken glass again. Glasses are crystal clear and feel just like a glass with superb hand weight. BPA-free. This gift includes the RESERVE 16oz Wine Glass 4 Pack, the 9oz Champagne Glass 4 Pack, and the 16oz Pint Glass 4 Pack.

name: Mini Link Choker Necklace
description: This stackable, delicate yet stunning choker features 4mm gold filled links. Chain Length: 14”-15”

name: Go Rib Bra Top
description: Made with super-soft and sustainable wicking jersey that breathes with you through your workout. This ribbed bra top is super-cute on its own or peeking out from your favorite sweatshirt or wrap.

name: 4 Pack
description: Your recipient selects their choice of wellness patch designed for boosting their day or helping to treat life's common struggles. Includes 4 patches.

name: Extra Strong Straight Black Organic Cold Brew Coffee (12 cartons, 11oz each)
description: Individual servings of our original extra strong, surprisingly smooth cold brew. Each carton = 4 espresso shots (300 mg caffeine). Packaging preserves perfect freshness until opened. 12 cartons. 11oz each.

name: Bamboo Crystal Weighted Blanket
description: Weighted blankets put a steady, gentle pressure on your body to make you feel comforted and relaxed. Perfectly fitted with a naturally cooling cover, this weighted blanket gets its soothing density from glass pearls and crystal pieces. It measures 77" x 52". Choice of color and weight.

name: Olivia Premium Martini Glasses, Set of 2
description: A must-have in every bar, these martini glasses are light, modern, and ready to surprise any connoisseur. Each glass holds 8.4 oz and includes a set of two.

name: $200 Gift Card
description: Celebrate with Experiences! These award winning events are great for gifting on birthdays, graduation, as thank you's, or just a little special surprise. This digital gift card can be redeemed for live-streamed workshops with options for everyone including cocktail, culinary, flower arranging, wine tasting & more! An Alice's Table digital gift card will be delivered to you by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem. No expiration date.

name: ASPCA Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the ASPCA helps fight cruelty and makes a life-changing difference for animals across America.

name: Ultra-Form High-Neck Cropped Tank
description: This Ultra-Form High-Neck Cropped Tank is designed to hit just below your rib cage. Quince's signature, buttery soft Ultra-Form fabric has the quick-dry technology and 4-way stretch you want, keeping you cool and comfortable. It also features a built-in shelf bra for light support, perfect for low intensity workouts like yoga or everyday wear.

name: Great Spoon
description: Cute, comfortable, and cool to the touch. The Great Spoon consists of silicone that is easy to grip as you stir, flip, and spoon. With bright colors inspired by lollipops and rainbows, it’ll bring comfort and happiness into your daily cooking and baking. Plus, it's extremely durable with an ergonomic design.

name: TRX Suspension Training Mat
description: This non-slip mat is the perfect density for stretching, cardio, yoga, and weight training. Lines measurements allow you to regress or progress your exercise angles with different foot or hand placement. Designed with non-toxic PVC foam this might be the last mat you will ever need. Ample sizing at 6' long x 2' wide, with 5mm thickness for comfort. Includes one mat.

name: 5PM Happy Hour Kit
description: Everything needed to kick start happy hour. Includes 5 Craftmix drink Packets to make one each of Blood Orange Mai Tai, Mint Mojito, Mango Margarita, Strawberry Mule. Also included are 3 custom Craftmix cocktail cups, 3 custom Craftmix coasters, 2 cans of Bubbly Water, 1 stainless steel shot glass, and 1 stainless steel straw. Just add alcohol, if desired, and enjoy!

name: 32oz Vacuum Insulated Water Bottle with Flip Lid & Sport Straw
description: Keep drinks piping hot or icy cold for 12 hours or more with this triple vacuum insulated water bottle. This versatile bottle comes with flip lid, straw lid and extra straw. It's 100% leak proof so you can carry on the go in your bag without fear! It holds 34oz and measures 10" tall.

name: Natural Premium Bamboo King Top Sheet
description: A simple, breathable, hypoallergenic and silky-soft flat sheet made of viscose from bamboo. The perfect finishing touch for the perfect bed. Includes one king sized top sheet, choice of color.

name: Congratulations Cookie Cake
description: This classic cookie cake is baked fresh when you order, made using the highest quality ingredients and the results are obvious in every bite.  Moist and chewy, this colossal cookie cake is made with real butter, whole eggs, and pure vanilla. Eat your cookie cake with a fork or your fingers, on plates, napkins, or right out of the box. Any way you slice it, our Big Cookie Cakes are still first in flavor. Due to the dough mixing process, all product may have come in contact with nut oils. Kosher certified.

name: City Lights Catamaran Sail for Two, San Francisco, CA
description: Sail peacefully underneath a sea of stars and enjoy unparalleled views of San Francisco’s twinkling city lights on this nighttime catamaran cruise. Float across the San Francisco waterfront and take in views of the Bay Bridge, Coit Tower, the Transamerica Pyramid, and so much more. Feel the cool sea breeze as you sip on 2 complimentary beverages and discover unforgettable cityscapes during this 1-hour sail. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Best-Sellers Travel Kit

This set includes 1 oz each of the Grapefruit Face Cleanser, Vitamin E Face Moisturizer, Bergamot Hand + Body Wash, Vitamin B5 Body Moisturizer, Peppermint Shampoo, and Cilantro Conditioner. All products are vegan and cruelty free.

name: Super Bowl Crewneck

The removable tag adds to the comfort while the cadet collar adds to its versatile style.

Plus, Cube is wearable, portable and convenient for relief anytime you need it.

name: Best Sellers Set

name: BuildOn Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide access to education for a child in a country with high rates of poverty and illiteracy.

name: Volcano Vanilla Cookies

name: Ice Breaker Glittery Ice Cubes Set

name: Branded Pet Hoodie

Choose between a black or white rib color for some extra style points and print your artwork in stunning detail.

name: Fire Pit Grill 23"
description: This 23" fire pit comes with a pole and grill grate for controlled temperature cooking. Modular design allows for multi-use as fire pit and open-fire grilling/cooking station. This system works great for backyards or can easily be packed for camping.

name: Large Abstract Painting Kit

name: Placemats, Set of 4
description: A great Placemat is an effortless, everyday way to add instant polish to your table. These 4 Placemats will quickly become an essential element in setting a table you’ll never want to step away from. They measure 13"x18".

name: House Blend 3-pack, Ground

name: Mindful Meditation Kit

The Mindfulness Timer ia a simple tool providing five digital-free minutes for your mindfulness modality of choice. The Centering Essential Oil Roller is a grounding blend featuring a soft, soothing scent with notes of lavender and cardamom.

name: Cast Iron Griddle

Naturally nonstick cast iron heats evenly, so your food is consistently cooked every time. Measures 21" x 11" x .75".

name: Bookmark This with Mason Jar Vase

Lavender micro poms and white Sweet Williams are like perfect dots of icing on a layer cake made of antique carnations with yellow and peach roses, 48 mixed stems in all, tucked in a Mason Jar Vase. Don’t worry though — this frosting has all the sugar, but none of the calories. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Cuff Earring

name: 12 Pack

name: amfAR Donation

description: These absurdly soft joggers are looser than leggings but definitely more fitted than sweatpants. Because nobody should really be wearing sweatpants in this day and age.

Ready your taste buds for an adventure! Get the Ultimate Keto Friendly Snacks Variety Sampler Box and explore delicious, healthy treats without breaking your diet. It includes 1 Legendary Foods Strawberry Toaster Pastry, 
 1 Keto Bar Keto Bar Chocolate Peanut Butter, 1 Southern Recipe Small Batch Sea Salt and Black Pepper Pork Rinds, 1 IQ Bar Lemon Blueberry Brain Fuel Bar, 1 Mission Meats Cracked Pepper Pork Sticks, 1 Chip Monk Baking White Chocolate Macadamia Keto Cookie, 1 Think Jerky Turkey Stick Mini, 1 Munk Pack Pumpkin Seed Cinnamon Almond Keto Nut and Seed Bar, 1 Nunbelievable Low Carb, Low Sugar Keto Friendly Snickerdoodle W/ Baobab Cookies, 1 Karma Nuts Golden Turmeric Wrapped Cashews, 1 Bubba's Sour Cream & Chive Keto Nut Mix, 1 Eden Salty Organic Pumpkin Seeds, 1 Shrewd Foods Baked Cheddar Protein Crisps, 1 Rip Van Dark Chocolate Wafers, and 1 Pizzootz Infused Peanuts.

name: amfAR Donation
description: The gift of giving! amfAR, The Foundation for AIDS Research, is one of the world's leading nonprofit organizations dedicated to the support of AIDS research, HIV prevention, treatment education, and advocacy.

Made of suede leather upper with 100% Australian shearling lining and insole. Recommended to size down if you are between sizes, sizes are standard US women's shoe sizes.

name: Wounded Warrior Project Donation

Includes everything you need to grow fresh flowers, just add water. Setup takes less than 5 minutes. Reuse your vessel by adding potting soil and seeds. Vessel designed for planting only.

name: Laundry Hamper

name: Hair Set

description: The gift of giving! Your donation to Toys for Tots helps provide toys, books and other gifts to less fortunate children this holiday season.

description: Stuffed with hypoallergenic microfiber that mimics the loft and insulation of luxury down, this comforter is perfect for the allergy prone. The loops on every corner will keep it in place and the baffle box construction will keep it fluffy and evenly distributed.

name: Donut Making Kit
description: Warm and fresh from the oven, homemade doughnuts are otherworldly. You won’t be able to go back to ones from any coffee shop. As a bonus, making them is easy. With easy to follow instructions, the batter comes together fast. After just 15 minutes in the oven, you have a dozen beautiful doughnuts to share with friends and family. Whether you choose apple cider, chocolate glazed, or any other flavor, this is your last doughnut stop.

name: Jelly Doughnut Making Kit
description: Delicately puffed, dusted with sugar, and filled with your favorite jelly, homemade jelly doughnuts are easy to make and even easier to enjoy. These are some of the tastiest treats your kitchen will ever know. This Jelly Doughnut Making Kit includes a stainless-steel pastry tip and piping bag perfectly sized to fill freshly made doughnuts with your choice of jelly for the ultimate fruit-filled doughnut of your dreams.

name: Blitzscaling
description: LinkedIn cofounder, legendary investor, and host of the award-winning Masters of Scale podcast reveals the secret to starting and scaling massively valuable companies. The secret is blitzscaling: a set of techniques for scaling up at a dizzying pace that blows competitors out of the water. The objective of Blitzscaling is not to go from zero to one, but from one to one billion, as quickly as possible. Whether your business has ten employees or ten thousand, Blitzscaling is the essential playbook for winning in a world where speed is the only competitive advantage that matters.

name: Women's Branded Cinched Bottom Hoodie
description: Style stacked upon style: this hoodie is an absolute must for any cold day. Made with a boxy, oversized fit, it hits all the cozy marks one needs to feel at home wherever they are. The mid-length design along with the cinched elastic hem, add extra fashion points for any casual outing while the 52% Airlume cotton and 48% ring-spun cotton/polyester fleece blend feels impeccable to the touch.

name: 30-Piece Sustainable Kitchen Set
description: Give your kitchen an eco-makeover — a total set for meal prep, leftovers & more. For fridge, freezer & pantry. This bundle includes Porter Mugs - 12 oz (2), Porter Mugs - 16 oz (2), Porter Glasses (4) , Porter Water Bottles (2), Porter Snack Bag - 10 oz (2), Porter Sandwich Bag - 34 oz (2), Porter Storage Bag - 48 oz (2), Porter Stand Up Bag - 36 oz (2), Porter Stand Up Bag - Large - 50 oz (2), Porter Bowls (2), Porter Seal Tight Bowls - 16 oz (2), Porter Seal Tight Bowls - 24 oz (2), Porter Utensil Sets (2), Cup Cubes - 6 Cube Tray, and The Ice Box.

name: Bagel Making Kit
description: Ready for a batch of bagels? Make a dozen fresh bagels with this mix containing all the ingredients you need to make a dozen of these New York classics. Choose which flavor best fits your morning!

name: Catch:2 Classics, Italian Leather
description: Multi-device wireless charging, without any of the drawbacks of "dead-zones". Weighted so it stays put, made with quality materials like aluminum alloy wrapped in premium Pebble-Grain Italian Leather. This charger can charge through most cases up to 3mm in thickness and has a USB C input, braided charging cable included. Measures 7.8" x 3.1" x 0.6".

name: Comfy Curved Hem Crewneck Sweater
description: So comfortable, so soft, so versatile. Made with recycled yarn, this tunic-length sweater is perfect for leggings or denim. Designed to be a comfy fit.

name: Uber Appliance Uber Chill 2.0 Thermoelectric Mini Fridge
description: The Sleek and highly functional Uber Chill 2.0 Personal Mini Fridge/cooler is capable of housing up to six 12 ounce cans or four 6.9 ounce bottles of your favorite beverage. Utilizing state of the art and environmentally friendly thermo-electric peltier technology, this mini fridge is capable of cooling or warming the contents within a reasonable amount of time, making it convenient in almost any occasion. In addition to this, the portable unit comes with both standard home and car power cables for ultimate portability. This is a great mini fridge for the bedroom, this small refrigerator is great as a dorm fridge, or a cubicle mini fridge. It measures 11" x 7-1/4" x 10".

name: Bronzino™ Cream Bronzer
description: What is it? An illuminating bronzer balm that adds instant warmth and a subtle shimmer for that healthy summer glow-from-within. Bronzino™ is your one-way ticket to that fresh-from-vacay glow! Bronzino has a light-catching glow that doubles as a highlight and was inspired by that moment when the sun sets over the ocean.

name: Everyday Slim Crewneck
description: This lighter-weight version of Jenni Kayne's best-selling Everyday Sweater boasts a slim, fitted look. With an ever-so slight crop, this lightweight knit pairs perfectly with high-waisted pants or a slip skirt.

name: Flyport Plane-Shaped USB Hub 4 in 1
description: Need more USB ports for your charging station? Prep your at-home flight deck with this unique Flyport USB Hub 4 in 1. Splits a USB plug into 4, and adds a 3.3 ft extension cord while introducing energetic flair to your workspace. Measures 4.13" x 3.35" x 1.02".

name: Stratus Active Short
description: Their innovative active short is powered by 37.5® Technology to keep you cool, dry, and fresh. Inseam measures 7".

name: The Pouch, Small
description: This all-purpose pouch is made from recycled polyester and features a top zipper. Organize the little things with two small internal pockets and one large magnetic pocket. Plus, there’s a bottom handle for when you’re on the go. Your new sidekick thinks of everything. It measures 8.8” x 4.4” x 3.8”.

name: Black Girl Baking: Wholesome Recipes Inspired by a Soulful Upbringing
description: For Jerrelle Guy, food has always been what has shaped her--her body, her character, her experiences and her palate. Each one of her recipes tells a story. Jerrelle leads you on a sensual baking journey using the five senses, retelling and reinventing food memories while using ingredients that make her feel more in control and more connected to the world and the person she has become.

name: World Central Kitchen Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide fresh meals to communities in need.

name: First Aid Stash Light
description: Take everything from big excursions to everyday adventures with confidence knowing you have this First Aid Stash + Light by your side. Compact, nearly indestructible, and ready to be packed with essential supplies that can be tailored to your journey using the four aluminum storage refill tins. The built in 4-mode LED Lantern, inclusive of high, medium, red and SOS settings, makes it the ultimate adventure companion, no matter where you roam.

name: Ember Mug², 10oz
description: Designed for home or office, the Ember Mug² does more than simply keep your coffee hot. This smart mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.

name: Valentine's Day Cupcakes 3-Pack, Bundle of 12
description: Upgrade your Valentine’s Day treats with bite-size cupcakes! This  Valentine’s Day 3-Pack bundle includes 12 packs of three bite-size cupcakes in limited-edition flavors. Includes 6 dark chocolate, 6 marshmallow, 6 dulce de leche, 6 brookie, 6 red velvet and 6 strawberry.

name: Loma Bag
description: A lightweight golf bag that holds up to 7 clubs and weighs less than 2 pounds! This is your new go-to bag for any Par 3 course. With a built-in stand and an insulated pouch for drinks, this bag makes walking the course and practicing at the driving range a breeze. It's perfect for your local short course, practice sessions, or those cart-path-only days.

name: Telegraph Collection Serving Bowl
description: The sleek and simple design makes the ideal canvas for all the colorful and delicious meals you cook up. Each piece is hand-thrown, which gives it a unique feel and variation. Dishwasher safe, microwave safe, oven safe up to 300°F. Includes one bowl, measures 14″. Choice of color.

name: GiveWell Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to GiveWell helps donors do as much good as possible with each dollar they give. GiveWell's recommend charities such as Helen Keller International and Against Malaria Foundation offer the best bang for the buck in terms of lives saved or improved per dollar donated.

name: Cheesecake
description: Whatever your flair for flavor, Bake Me A Wish has a cheesecake for you! Each cheesecake measures 7" in diameter and serve 6-8 people.

name: Weekender Set Plus with Personalized Embroidery
description: The Weekender and Aviator were made for each other...and made for week-long trips. The Weekender is made from durable, spill-proof EcoCraft Canvas®, and features a personalized monogram, smart straps that slip over the handle of the carbon-neutral Aviator Carry-On Plus, while the plus easily fits in airplane overhead compartments. Some things are just better together. The weekender measures 15" x 15" x 8", and the Aviator 14.7" x 22.7" x 9.6". Monogram is for weekender only, aviator suitcase does not haver monogram.

name: Chinese Medicine Starter Bundle
description: This bundle is a well-rounded approach to tap into the different modalities of Chinese Medicine for pain or sleep. From chronic pain and headaches, to managing stress or a more restful sleep, your kit has all your needs covered.

name: Hyperbola Infinity Bracelet
description: Rich with symbolic meaning, this delicate bracelet will elevate any outfit. The rhodium-plated design features a soft chain with an infinity motif, which is adorned with a pavé of clear crystals. A single Swarovski Zirconia is also placed in the elongation for an extra touch of luxury. Wear this piece to bring discreet luxury into your style. Adjustable bracelet measures 6.125" - 7.625" with lobster clasp.

name: Women's Air Slub Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: Made from a soft, textured fiber that is 100% cotton and has a relaxed, heathered look and a lived-in feel. Air circulates through this fabric more easily, which helps keep you dry. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Best Seller XL Cupcake 6 Pack
description: The Best Seller 6 Pack includes the following flavors in Crumbs' signature size, including Two Red Velvet, Two Birthday Cake, and Two Cookies and Cream.

name: Unseen Sunscreen SPF 40, 1.7 oz
description: This cult favorite is the original invisible sunscreen! With an oil-free formula & a natural finish, this innovative, antioxidant-rich essential glides onto skin to provide broad spectrum UVA/UVB & infrared protection while helping to filter blue light. It also doubles as a makeup-gripping primer! Contains 1.7 oz.

name: Nasal Spray+
description: Stop and smell the great outdoors with an invigorating herbal formula to cleanse and clear congestion. Each spray gives a potent dose of propolis, oregano oil, eucalyptus, xylitol, and saline so you can breathe deeply. Expands the nasal passage to cleanse the sinus of irritants, soothes and moisturizes irritated nasal passages. Non-habit forming. Contains 1 fl oz.

name: Extra Strong Cold Brew On Tap (96oz)
description: Coffee shop quality cold brew coffee at the push of a button. Surprisingly smooth. Each glass = 2 espresso shots (150 mg caffeine). The box keeps your brew fresh after opening and fits any fridge

name: ReFillable Candle System
description: A vessel you’ll keep forever, with reFillable candle scents you can swap out when you want to change things up, meet Fill Mill. It's a concrete vessel that adds style to any home, with recyclable candle fills you can switch up with the click of a magnet. Each of the soy wax Fills has been poured in the USA and infused with one of Fill Mill's uniquely crafted scents inspired by experiences, not things. So when the mood changes, the scent can too, just click in a fresh Fill and you’re on to your next feel. Includes one vessel and one candle fill.

name: The Comfy Original Quarter Zip Wearable Blanket
description: Just when you thought their famous wearable blanket couldn't get any better, they went and added a zipper to create The Comfy Original® Quarter-Zip! Designed with the ultimate in comfort and flexibility in mind, The Comfy Original® Quarter-Zip has the same buttery soft feel that’s made The Comfy Original® the best-selling wearable blanket in history, and the added zipper makes it easier to slide over your head and control how warm you want to be.

name: Micromodal 4" Trunk, 3-pack
description: These ultra-soft Micromodal 4" Trunk checks all the boxes: form-fitting, supportive, breathable, and of course, comfortable. This essential trunk is made with an ultra-soft micromodal stretch blend that feels incredibly luxurious. We also added a no-roll elastic waistband so you don't have to worry about any rolling, pinching, or bunching.

name: Snug Comforter, King
description: This is what dreams are made of: an all-in-one bed cover that not only elevates your bedroom aesthetic, but is ethereally soft, super comfy, and easy to wash. Featuring an innovative reversible design with cloudlike Snug fabric on top and naturally cooling, hypoallergenic viscose from bamboo underneath. Beautiful inside and out, with a filling made entirely of recycled plastic to help clean up our oceans.

name: 100 Piece First Aid Kit
description: The Thrive Travel First Aid Kit is packed with 100 must-have pieces of hospital-grade medical gear. This complete home first aid kit is also ideal in a small emergency road kit, adventure or military kit, or nursing supply kit.

name: Groovy Birthday Gift Box 50 Pack
description: 50 Mini cupcakes of their best selling flavors! Features the ever-changing Mini of the Month, 3 seasonal cupcake flavors and all 8 of Melissa's Original Greats.

name: Monogrammed Billie Nylon Pouch
description: Made with lightweight nylon, gold-tone hardware, and sporting a top zip closure,  The Billie Nylon Pouch is easy to pack and easy to use.

name: Make It Super DIY Bead Kit
description: Don't Worry, Bead Happy! Calling all future jewelry designers (and fans of anything sparkly), this bead kit is for you! Dream up and design your very own jewelry in a combination of colors, beads and pendants for a sparkly, special, Super Smalls look that is all your own. Kit includes beads, pendants and cords, all packaged in a reusable Make It Super yellow box with individual compartments to keep your beads organized. Small parts, not intended for children under 4 years old.

name: Odyssey G51C 32" QHD FreeSync Premium Gaming Monitor
description: Your gaming world, more lifelike than ever before. Packing in 1.7 times the pixel density of Full HD, QHD resolution boasts incredibly detailed, pin-sharp images. Experience a fuller view with more space to take in all the action.

name: Percale Queen Fitted Sheet
description: This comfortable, durable fitted sheet hugs your mattress with a continuous elastic hem. Crafted in Portugal from 100% premium, certified long-staple Egyptian cotton, the percale is lightweight and durable with a crisp finish that only gets better with time. Machine washable. Includes one fitted sheet in Queen size, choice of color.

name: Candle
description: A scent is a world you can return to over and over again. Comes with a 7oz candle, choose from 10 different scents.

name: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite 32GB
description: Now waterproof, so you’re free to read and relax at the beach, by the pool, or in the bath. Your Kindle has been tested to withstand accidental immersion in water. Now with Audible. Pair with Bluetooth headphones or speakers to listen to your story.

name: The Dipping Duo Gift Set
description: A set of the Originals for all their drizzling, dressing, and dipping needs in a beautiful Mediterranean blue gift box. Includes one Original Extra Virgin Olive Oil, and one Original Balsamic Vinegar. Each bottle measures 12.7oz.

name: Ultimate Sticker Book
description: 700+ Stickers, what else do you need?! Rainbows, unicorns, butterflies, glow-in-the-dark stars, oversized gemstones and MORE. With over 700 stickers, the Ultimate Sticker Book really lives up to its name! It's a supersized sticker book with plenty of stickers of every shape size and color designed for crafting, decorating or just collecting! Small parts, not intended for children under 3 years old.

name: Washable Satin Sleep Pant
description: With so much love for these flowy, slit-hem washable satin sleep pants that open to the knee, they are a favorite for a reason. Designed to be a comfy fit.

name: Mini Stash Speaker
description: The Mini Stash Speaker packs a powerful audio punch in a compact, packable size. With its portable design, durable military-grade aluminum construction and refillable aluminum tins this kit is the ultimate choice for anyone who wants to take their music (and a few essentials) with them wherever they go. Outfitted with the crystal-clear sound of the Speaqua Bluetooth® Speaker this is music that moves with you.

name: Infused Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: Kosterina's Original Extra Virgin Olive Oil, now combined with your favorite infused flavors. Each bottle starts with 100% pure, ultra-premium extra virgin olive oil, which is cold-pressed from early harvest olives in southern Greece. Then a dash of Mediterranean flavor is added for an olive oil that will add complexity and depth to any dish. Recipient selects the infused olive oil of their choice.

name: The Original Rocks
description: Discover fast-cooling non-diluting round solid granite stones used to perfectly cool fine spirits without watering down your drink. Each of these 6 whiskey stones has a different color and granite-style making each set unique and stand out beautifully. Elevate your drinking experience or spoil a loved one with this bestseller.

name: Congratulations Rice Krispie 12 Pack
description: A sweet way to say congratulations.  An assortment of Treat House's most popular rice krispie flavors are topped with six colorful fondant plaques that help you say “CONGRATULATIONS!!!”.

name: Canvas Tote
description: This tote bag will be the best companion on weekly shopping trips and beach days. It's made from a natural, cotton canvas fabric that is extremely durable. The design is simple with two comfortable shoulder straps yet spacious and functional.

name: Brightland The Duo
description: Paired together to balance and round out your kitchen, Brightland’s AWAKE is made for slow days and cozy nights, while ALIVE is made for fare that fuels active days.

name: Chocolate Mousse Torte Cake
description: Two rich, chocolate cake layers are filled with luscious chocolate whipped cream mousse, then covered with milk chocolate frosting and a dark chocolate glaze. Garnished with fudge rosettes and dark chocolate shavings.

name: Retinol Correcting Serum
description: This advanced multi-vitamin serum is formulated to help reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, neutralize free radicals and protect skin against environmental pollution. Features a complex blend of antioxidant rich multivitamins including; vitamins A (retinol), C, E and superoxide dismutase protects against daily environmental aggressors. time-released encapsulation technology ensures a gentle yet effective formula for all skin types especially the most sensitive.

name: Spectrum Wall Planner
description: This best-selling poster-sized wall planner is a giant wall calendar inspired by the innate beauty of color. The Spectrum Wall Planner is open-dated, so you can start using it at any time. Display page by page or at once for a powerful long-term planning tool. Each page of this 12-month calendar measures 30.1" x 20.6".

name: Odyssey Necklace
description: This statement piece has a gleaming gold compass etched on the reverse side and offers versatility with more than two ways to wear. She has an adjustable toggle closure for multiple length options, as well as the option to remove the charm to wear the elegant chain alone. Made with 14K gold plated brass, glass crystals and reconstituted stone. Choice of stone color.

name: Merkato Signature Tote
description: One of Parker Clay's all-time best sellers, this classic everyday tote bag pairs versatility with superb quality and good looks. Every detail has been thought through and tested: sturdy shoulder straps made just the right length to keep you comfortable, a silhouette designed to maximize space for when you need to tote a few extra items, and even an interior D-ring to help you find your keys. Measures 14.5" x 5" x 13". Choice of color.

name: Shearling Moroccan Slipper, Ivory
description: Moroccan-style slippers with shearling-lined upper and suede outsole. Like traditional Moroccan styles, the back heel folds down and flips up to cover the heels.

name: The Mooka pot
description: If you like cottagecore vibes you’ll eat this up. Cutest moka pot available anywhere.

name: Claire European Crystal Red Wine Glasses, Set of 2
description: This premium quality crystal is carefully crafted in Europe, enjoying a unique cylinder-shaped design with tall stems and wide rims which allow the wine to properly breathe. This set of 2 large glasses are crafted with finest attention to detail and are dishwasher safe and easy to clean. The crystal body is shaped like a perfect cylinder, adding a sparkly note to your favorite wine. Includes a set of 2 red wine glasses.

name: Heart On Ice Glittery Ice Cubes Set
description: This Heart On Ice Glittery Ice Cubes Set creates mini heart-shaped glittered cubes of ruby red edible glitter. Tray measures 7.25” x 4.25” x 0.5”.

name: Crushed Fruit Vinegar Trio
description: These Crushed Fruit Vinegars are the perfect combination of tangy and sweet, with no added sugar. They are delicious in salad dressings, over dessert, or as an immediate burst of fresh flavor in cocktails and mocktails.

name: 18-Hour Jersey Boxer Briefs 3 Pack
description: Includes 3 pairs of Mack Weldon's ridiculously soft, signature 18-Hour Jersey underwear, designed for any and every day. Choice of color.

name: Snug Lumbar Pillow
description: Lovely, comfy, and versatile; this triple treat decorates and is there when you need it for your head, lower back or between your legs. Cover is made of 100% microfiber, filling is memory foam. Includes one pillow measuring 36" x 14".

name: Cleansing Essentials
description: A self-care essential set for your private retreat. Pair the Terry Headband with the Pava Cleanser for your daily face wash ritual. The creamy and gentle exfoliating cleanser effectively removes makeup to reveal soft skin and a refreshed complexion without stripping hydration, while the unique combination of lychee seed powder and mint leaves the skin feeling invigorated post wash. Headband is made of 100% cotton terry and is one size fits all.

name: Broad-Spectrum Face Sunscreen SPF30
description: Geologie's SPF30 combines mineral and physical sunscreens to provide maximum protection from UVA and UVB rays, with a lightweight and mattifying finish that also adds hydration. Oil and fragrance-free. Contains 2.54 oz.

name: Cup 001
description: Meet Cup 001: Golde's at-home favorite to make all your bevs that much better. Works with hot or cold drinks. Made with 100% borosilicate glass for a functional design that's equal parts lightweight and durable. Holds up to 16 fl. oz. of your favorite drinks. Dishwasher safe!

name: Martin Rising: Requiem for a King
description: With imagination and power, the award-winning Pinkney duo celebrates MLK's nonviolent struggle for civil rights -- as he transforms America through the spirit of love.

name: All-Day Neoprene Backpack
description: They say it’s all about work-life balance, right? That’s exactly what you’ll get in this All-Day Neoprene Backpack. With a built-in laptop sleeve, detachable pouch for valuables, and ample pockets to keep you organized, this backpack will be your go-to from 9-to-5 and beyond.  This bag was made with the environment in mind, using materials made from up to 27 recycled, post-consumer plastic bottles. It measures 17” H x 11.5” W x 5” D.

name: Make-A-Wish Donation
description: The gift of giving! For every wish we’re able to grant, there’s another child with a critical illness waiting for theirs.

name: Large Fatima Winged Shopper
description: Dyed in vibrant hues, bolga grass is used by Ghanaian weavers in the Bolgatanga region to create this one-of-a-kind basket. Perfect for a trip to the farmers’ market, a picnic, toys, or a million other uses, a market shopper will make any task more enjoyable by bringing vibrance and beauty to your life. Each shopper will have slight variations in design, color, and size as this is a one-of-a-kind handmade product. Measures approximately 18" W x 15"L.

name: Opening Night Play Shoes
description: Fashion may be a serious business, but these shoes are made for play! These sparkly blue kitten heels are just begging for a spin at the after party. Complete with an oversized flower jewel, black tulle bow, and colorful gems in the heel (that jingle while you walk!), your dress-up chest just got a Super fashion-forward upgrade. These shoes are One Size, recommended for kids ages 3-6 or shoe size 9.5-12 (with a little room to grow!) Small parts, not intended for children under 3 years.

name: Performance Tech Short
description: Form, meet function. These jersey-lined performance tech shorts do double duty with just the right amount of stretch and sun protection. And they look good too. Designed to move with you, they’re perfect for training, travel, or lounging around the house.

name: Gingham Dog Collar
description: Fashion for your best friend. Adjustable collars in cute patterns to suit your pup's personality. Made of nylon webbing with gold tone hardware.

name: Theragun Pro, 5th Edition
description: Theragun PRO (5th Generation) is Therabody's best massage gun and now even quieter.  Designed by experts and backed by science, it delivers a 60% deeper massage than the competition and is the only massage gun with the proven 5-in-1 benefits of recovery, performance, sleep, mobility, and stress relief. The Theragun PRO is the ultimate tool for recovery and pain relief to keep you moving.

name: Outdoor Shatter-Resistant Tumbler Set of 4
description: This set of 4 tumblers have both great design and are durable, and work just as well outdoors as indoors. This is a series everybody needs at home, filling a function which is often missing, in a design which cheers every-body up who sees it.

name: Classic Healthy Gift Basket
description: Inside a classic wood gift crate, you will discover an assortment of carefully selected foods that are good for you as well as delicious. Complete with wholesome and flavorful pure wildflower honey, granola bar, immunity tea, parmesan crisps, and even more healthy treats. This thoughtful and nutritious gift is one you can feel really good about sending.

name: Deluxe Gift Basket
description: The Deluxe Gift Basket is not only filled with delicious gourmet treats but comes packaged as a beautifully decorated basket with ribbon tied at the top. The basket includes 5 oz. Chocolate Caramel Sea Salt Popcorn, 4 oz. Chocolate Chip Cookies, 15 oz. Caramel Popcorn, Chocolate Covered Oreos, 3 oz. Gummy Bears.

name: Head to Toe Body Relief Bundle
description: Get all of WTHN's best-selling, body-relieving tools + herbs in one with the ultimate Head To Toe Body Relief Bundle. From chronic pain, to headaches, to body stiffness and stress, this bundle targets discomfort from all angles to promote total body relief whenever you need it. This gift includes the Head To Toe Muscle Rub,  Head To Toe Relief, the Body Cupping Kit, and the Acupressure Mat Set.

name: Le Duo Magnifique Eternity Roses
description: This luxurious arrangement is comprised of 85-90 gorgeous Eternity® Roses set in Parisian hat box-inspired vases. The classic arrangements will elevate any space with grace and majesty. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care. Hat box measures 24" x 12" x 9".

name: 36oz Silicone Reusable Stand-Up Bag
description: The reusable Porter Bag is a better bag for cooking, freezing, steaming, preserving, storing, and sous-viding. This 36 oz Standup Porter Bag is easy to load, unload, and store upright, making it ideal for storing frozen fruits and vegetables, fresh herbs in the fridge, and bunches of grapes. Don’t limit the Porter Bag to culinary uses, use it to store make-up, crafts, first-aid supplies, and much more. Made of 100% LFGB-certified silicone with no chemicals, glues, or adhesives. Includes one 36oz bag, recipient's choice of color.

name: Lunar New Year Joy Garden
description: Bring good luck into the new year with a growing gift! Chinese New Year 2024 will fall on Saturday, February 10th, 2024, starting a year of the Dragon. Gift prosperous gifts for a successful year ahead! This garden measures approximately 3.5 x 3.5 x 6.0 inches.

name: Meals on Wheels Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps support the local programs that keep seniors safe and living independently nationwide.

name: Surf and Turf Meal
description: This gift includes 4 Butcher's Cut Top Sirloins (6 oz.), 4 Split Lobster Tail Skewers (7 oz. pkg.), 4 Stuffed Baked Potatoes (5.5 oz.) & 4 Caramel Apple Tartlets (4 oz.).

name: Cord Organizer Pouch
description: Tame the tangled mess. This travel cord organizer keeps your accessories nice and neat so you can feel in control of your tech. With a handy cord organizer pouch, you can transport this little sidekick everywhere. Measures 8.87" x 6.3" x 1.97".

name: Organic Airy Gauze Throw
description: Do you dream of sleeping on a cloud? Start with this light-as-air throw. Woven with the finest 100% organic long-staple cotton, it features four gauze layers woven by skilled artisans in India to create the softest, most breathable fabric you can imagine. And you can sleep better knowing that the third-generation family-owned business manufactures everything with renewable energy, recycles their fabric waste and provides housing and free education to all of their employees. Measures 50" x 60".

name: Saddle Chair
description: Branch partnered with Finnish design company myKolme to offer a bold take on active sitting. The Saddle Chair combines posture-improving form and sustainable style to encourage a workday filled with movement and joy. The contoured seat drops knees below hips to ease lower back. Align your spine, open your hips, and activate your core at work. Great for  workers who alternate between sitting and standing. It measures 21.2-31.5"H x 16.9"W x 14.2"D. Choice of color.

name: Cravory Cookies One Dozen Cookie Assortment
description: These are the cookies that get you hooked and keep you asking for more. Even non-cookie lovers can’t stop themselves with this mix of Cravory's most craveable and gourmet cookie flavors. Includes 12 cookies.

name: The Anti-Insomnia Notebook
description: Turn restless nights into restful ones with sustainable change.
