Using long-term tools and strategies for better sleep, this notebook guides you through Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-I), the most effective evidence-based program for a variety of sleep issues. Whether you take any kind of sleep aid or go it on your own, you’ll learn about your unique circadian habits and create a long-term plan for sleep success.

name: NBA x Grateful Dead Tee
description: NBA x The Grateful Dead: it’s the grooviest collection ever. Rep your team with the most psychedelically super-soft tee ever. Keep on ballin’, dudes. Pay homage.

name: 800 Piece Puzzle
description: Inspiring 800 piece jigsaw puzzles that look good before, during and after completion.

name: Latest & Greatest Cupcakes 50 Pack
description: A 50 bite-size cupcake sampler of 12 unique, hand-crafted cupcake flavors. Baked by Melissa's most-loved originals, the ever-changing delicious Mini of the Month, and the new seasonal flavors. The perfect party pack for your next celebration.

name: Purifying Clay Cleanser
description: The Purifying Clay Cleanser dares to answer the question: “what if you combined a detoxifying clay mask with a hydrating face wash?”. This cleanser uses Cactus Extract and a Tri-Clay blend to remove excess oil and cleanse skin deeply from the grime of the day, never leaving skin feeling dry or tight. Powerful ingredients, yet gentle enough for daily use.

name: Smart Planner 2024 Weekly, 12-Month
description: The Smart Planner blends the distinctive and unmistakable design features of a Moleskine paper planner with Smart Pen technology that syncs your handwritten schedule to your favorite calendar app online. Once you have paired your Smart Pen and Moleskine Notes App, all you have to do is note down your plans on the page and watch as they appear on screen across your preferred devices, all set for you to consult and share anytime.

name: The Cleansing Scrub
description: Scalp health is hair health and The Cleansing Scrub is the dream scalp refresh. Formulated with nourishing Bolivian pink salt granules that exfoliate gently and dissolve fully in water, it has a delicately grainy texture and whipped lather that together lift buildup, remove impurities and polish skin for a comfortable, balanced feeling. Holds 6.8oz.

name: Dakota Neoprene Backpack
description: A water-resistant backpack that fits a laptop and is perfect for the gym or the office. Lining made using 19 recycled plastic bottles. Measures 11.5” L x 5” W x 17” H.

name: 9oz Champagne Flute, 12 Pack
description: Brighten up your next mimosa or champagne night with colors that everyone will love. Perfect for outdoors, glasses are made with up to one post-consumer bottle per cup and are BPA-free. Guaranteed to never break, chip, or crack. Each 12 pack comes with 3 cups of each color. Handwash only and 100% recyclable. Each cup measures 3.7" x 3.3".

name: Branded Great Jones King Sear
description: This 12-inch cast-iron skillet is a durable workhorse ideal for cooking chicken with crispy skin, caramelized onions, and steak. It’s big enough to feed multiple pals, and pre-seasoned to make cleaning easy. Great Jones partners with and donates regularly to charities that focus on food insecurity, including Hot Bread Kitchen and Heart of Dinner. Features your logo of choice engraved on the handle.

name: No Kid Hungry Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps connect vulnerable kids in communities around the country with the nutritious food they need to grow and thrive.

name: Camp Stool
description: This easy-to-carry and quick-to-assemble tripod chair offers you a way to take a load off wherever you are. Featuring a water-resistant polyester seat and durable PVC-coated steel legs, it unfolds in seconds. And with an integrated shoulder strap, it'll come with you anywhere. Measures 15.75" x 12.2".

name: Cookie Jar Assorted 8-Pack
description: Try them all! One cookie jar of each of Crumbs Bakeshop's assortment of cookie flavors. Flavor assortment includes Chocolate Cherry, Chocolate Chip, Sprinkle Sundae, Oatmeal Raisin, Psychedelic Cookies, Red Velvet, Cotton Candy, and Chocolate Candy. Package includes 8 cookie jars that are 5” high and 13” round.Package includes 8 cookie jars that are 5” high and 13” round.

name: Vacation Perfume
description: Vacation's signature scent that smells like sunscreen and summer all-in-one. Eau de Toilette for all genders. Base notes of pool water, swimsuit lycra, sea salt. 1 fl oz.

name: Raspberry Waffle Cone 10 Pack
description: Jammy, punchy, and undeniably pretty, enjoy Raaka's crisp chocolate waffle cone cookie set in a pink, raspberry infused vegan white chocolate. The first bite will make you swoon. Includes 10 waffle cones.

name: Carver Mat Digital Frame
description: Send photos from your phone to Carver Mat, Aura's top-selling WiFi-connected frame. Enjoy all your favorite moments on Carver Mat's 10.1" matted landscape display, and watch as it intelligently pairs complementary portrait photos side-by-side. Add unlimited photos and videos, and invite all your loved ones to fill the frame using the free Aura app. This frame measures 10.5" x 7.3" x 2.1", with a 1280 x 800 HD display.

name: Air Mesh Dash Tote
description: Your favorite multi-purpose tote, now with an even sportier style. Cushiony, lightweight, recycled, the Air Mesh Dash is the futuristic tote of your dreams. Designed to flex from the beach to the office to farmers market, it’s weightless yet super durable. With an interior phone pocket, handy key leash, and lots of space for everything from office supplies to fresh veggies, it’s the tote that’s up for anything. Pack it in your luggage for an extra “just in case” bag for your everyday adventures. Made of 100% GRS Certified Recycled Performance Air Mesh. Measures 14.75"L x 6"W x 14.5"H.

name: Coastal Beach Towel
description: This deliciously soft, sand-repellent beach towel is your new oceanside staple. Absorbent and quick to dry, with a tight weave specially designed to repel sand and a classic stripe motif. Lay all day in the sun, then throw it in the laundry basket (no mess) when you get home. It measures 35" x 75".

name: Remi Glasses Case
description: Some moments call for cat eyes, and others are for aviators. The Remi Glasses Case was made for bringing your shades and frames from here to there and back again. This foldable sunglasses travel case features a chic geometric silhouette with magnetic closure that stores up to 3 pairs securely. Skip the scratches with an ultra-soft microfiber lining and elastic straps to keep everything in place.

name: PIKA3D PRO for Creatives
description: PIKA3D Plug and Play makes it easy to create simple shapes in 3D and use the figures to build and construct more detailed objects or structures! Just plug in the pen, choose your filament color and bring your 3D creation to life! Think outside the box, create any 3D shapes or design a freehand 3D drawing. In addition to arts and crafts and home use, PIKA3D is especially useful in studying Math, Architecture, Science, and many others.

name: Smiley Box
description: The Smiley Box is the best way to jumpstart your day! With this box of happiness, you'll get an assortment of smile-inducing goodies like a smiley-faced box, assorted smile journal, fuzzy smile keychain, three holographic smile stickers, PLUS two yellow shoelace hair ties for a bright and happy day!

name: USB C to HDMI Adapter
description: Stream audio and video with this black Belkin USB-C to HDMI adapter and charger. The USB-C port connector delivers up to 60W for ultra-fast device charging, while the plug-and-play design offers hassle-free use. This Belkin USB-C to HDMI adapter and charger supports 4K resolution at 60Hz for transmitting clear, detailed visuals.

name: Branded Theragun Mini 2.0
description: The mini is your pocket-sized partner, giving you Theragun quality muscle treatment with unparalleled portability. Compact but powerful, Theragun mini is the most agile massage device that goes wherever you do.

name: Mystery Jungle Box
description: If you're looking to spice things up in the bedroom, or any room, really, consider this mystery bundle of four small plants (4" pot diameter). The uncertainty of not knowing which plants you'll receive is simply exhilarating and definitely way more fun than a Zoom hangout.

name: Kitty Fortune Cookie
description: You can’t read a cat’s palm so the only way to tell your kitty’s future is to bring home a Kitty Fortune Cookie! Stuffed with organic catnip, your cat will hardly believe their future. Choice of fortune cookie message.

name: Explorian E310 Blender
description: Create a variety of textures and liquids with this Vitamix Explorian E310 blender. 10 variable speeds plus pulse allow you to prepare soups, make fresh salsa and knead dough. The aircraft grade hardened stainless steel blades deliver consistent results. This Vitamix Explorian E310 blender comes with a 48-oz., self-cleaning container for easy under-cabinet storage.

name: 19 DEGREE ALUMINUM Briefcase
description: Striking from every angle, the iconic curves of 19 Degree and the durability of aluminum are reimagined in this sleek briefcase. This briefcase measures 12.0" X 16.0" X 3.6", has a top carry handle with leather accent as well as a removable shoulder strap.

name: Always Deluxe
description: Eternally iconic and elegant, red roses still stand out as the ultimate symbol of unconditional love. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Crystalline Ballpoint Pen
description: Showcasing their signature Crystalline technique, this white lacquered metal ballpoint pen features delicate crystals for extra elegance. Chrome metal accents and a clip finish this refined design. The high quality ink cartridge is easy to replace: simply open the pen in the middle with a twist.

name: Extra Virgin Oil Balm
description: This oil balm packs the power of a face oil in a super convenient stick form. Perfect for your purse and a true nightstand necessity, this EVOO balm delivers grab-and-go nourishment to the places that need it most. Stick contains 14g/.5oz.

name: Corkscrew Knife
description: A unique combination of utility and portability, the Provisions Corkscrew Knife boasts a 4-inch half-serrated blade, wine key, and bottle opener. Slice bread, meats, and cheeses. Open a bottle of wine or beer and tuck the knife safely away for later.

name: The Cast-Iron Family 3-Piece Cast Iron Set
description: Cast iron is superior at retaining and evenly distributing heat, there’s a reason humans have been cooking with cast iron for eons. This set includes the top three draft picks, all of which share a common material but have very different use cases. Dutch Baby nests perfectly inside The Dutchess, and you can hang King Sear for easy storage. All are oven-safe. The Dutchess and Dutch Baby are dishwasher-safe. The Dutches is 6.75 quarts, The Dutch Baby is 3.5 quarts, King Sear measures 12 inches.

name: Open Fire Glove
description: Work an open fire with well-protected hands. These natural full-grain cowhide leather gloves protect against heat, coal, and sparks for extended periods. Thick cut and high cuff design shield while still allowing for flexibility and freedom of movement. Durable and made to last.

name: Everyone Unisex Jogger
description: Perfect for lounging, even better for video calls, these unisex joggers deliver comfort and ease, whenever you need it. Made with sustainable fabric. Designed to be a comfy fit.

name: Classic Whip SPF 30
description: A “lighter-than-air” sunscreen made with eco-friendly propellants and an authentic “tilt valve” actuator that produces perfect, star-shaped mountains of foam, inspired by everyone’s favorite after dinner indulgence.

name: The Dutchess
description: A good Dutch oven lasts forever; a Great Jones Dutch oven is your best friend forever. This 6.75-quart enameled cast-iron Dutchess moves gracefully from stove to oven to table centerpiece.

name: 14k Gold Hoops
description: 14k gold hoops handcrafted from 14k solid gold for heirloom staying power. Your subtle statement piece, small hoops that pack a punch. Hoops measure 12mm diameter.

name: JBL Charge5 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker
description: The JBL Charge 5 speaker delivers bold JBL Original Pro Sound, with its optimized long excursion driver, separate tweeter and dual pumping JBL bass radiators. Up to 20 hours of playtime and a handy powerbank to keep your devices charged to keep the party going all night. The IP67 waterproof and dustproof Charge 5 survives whatever comes its way. Simply put, it looks as great as it sounds.

name: Chill Chews
description: Daily stressors deplete your magnesium supply. These magnesium gummies rebalance your inner seas, relax the body, and calm the mind. It’s no coincidence that you feel restored after a dip in a salty ocean. Chill chews combine magnesium citrate with an apoptogenic mushroom blend and ashwagandha giving these gummies a uniquely targeted blend of supplements aimed at easing stress, anxiety, and inflammation relief.

name: Ace Crew Neck Sweatshirt
description: This classic crew neck sweatshirt is made from Mack Weldon's exclusive Ace fabric, an insanely soft micro-brushed French terry. Built to go with everything you’ll ever own. Choice of color and size.

name: 16oz Century Glass Set of 2
description: A modern classic destined to become your new go-to drinking glass. The Century Collection is made using premium borosilicate glass that is most commonly associated with laboratory glassware and high end kitchenwares. It provides a delicate appearance and superior thermal shock durability. Includes a set of two, 16oz glasses. Choice of color.

name: On-The-Go Blanket
description: A unique blend of waterproof DWR-coated cotton and ripstop that’s soft, warm and lightweight, as well as dirt and odor-resistant. If you're settling in to a campsite for the night, it’s designed to make a great travel pillow, too. Just fold it into itself, zip it up, and get comfy. If you're just heading to the park for some lunch, it'll act as a spill-proof picnic blanket. Measures 72" L x 50" W.

name: Hand Soap Duo
description: Your sink's new BFF, forever. They've eliminated the single-use plastic waste of traditional hand soaps by creating one bottle made to last forever. Just fill with water, drop in a tablet and voila! Hydrating, foamy goodness at your fingertips. Each set makes six full bottles of Foaming Hand Soap for you to enjoy in 3 scents.

name: 20oz Glass Water Bottle
description: Elevate your hydration experience with this versatile bottle that allows you to enjoy your favorite hot or cold beverage. Crafted from high-quality borosilicate glass that ensures a pure and clean taste, free from unwanted odors or flavors. Heat safe with a heat-proof sleeve and comes with a carry strap and nonslip silicone sleeve. Bamboo lid has a stainless steel interior for bamboo protection. BPS, Phthalate, PVC and BPA free. Measures 2.75" wide and 9" tall.

name: Ella Mini Backpack
description: Meet the mini leather backpack that doesn't skimp on space! Parker Clay crafted a light and stylish backpack purse that's just the right size for all your adventures. Featuring adjustable straps for the perfect fit, exterior and interior pockets to keep your accessories organized, and stylish brass hardware–this little bag is the perfect mix of personality and functionality. Made of premium Ethiopian full grain leather. Measures 9"L x 10" H x 4" W with adjustable straps 25-30". Choice of color.

name: A Gift Of Wellness
description: Choose a gift of your choice from our curated wellness collection.

name: Go Neck Pillow
description: Go's 360° ergonomic design offers full neck support to maintain proper spinal posture and prevent neck and back pain. With its supportive memory foam core, Go offers the best comfort for the frequent traveller and compresses to 60% of its size when stored in the included travel bag. Choice of color.

name: ReFillable Candle System Ultimate Set
description: A vessel you’ll keep forever, with reFillable candle scents you can swap out when you want to change things up, meet Fill Mill. It's a concrete vessel that adds style to any home, with recyclable candle fills you can switch up with the click of a magnet. Each of the soy wax Fills has been poured in the USA and infused with one of Fill Mill's uniquely crafted scents inspired by experiences, not things. So when the mood changes, the scent can too, just click in a fresh Fill and you’re on to your next feel. Includes one vessel and three candle fills in scents Last Drink by the Bonfire, On the Open Dessert Road, and Sunday Dinner at the Grove.

name: Coconut Wax Votive Candle
description: Crafted from organic coconut wax with a cotton wick for clean burning, these candles fill your senses and your home with the benefits of natural essential oils. Herbal, Woody, Fresh, and Floral fragrances bring a sense of calm and clarity into your space, while the reusable glass vessel can be enjoyed long after the life of the candle. Includes one votive candle, choice of fragrance. Burn time of 15-20 hours.

name: Large Round Eternity Roses
description: This luxurious Large Round arrangement is comprised of 42-49 gorgeous Eternity® Roses set in Parisian hat box-inspired vase. Venus et Fleur eternity flowers are luxury florals that can last more than a year with proper care. The classic arrangements will elevate any space with grace and majesty. Box measures 12 x 12 x 9. Includes one arrangement, choice of rose color.

name: Backpack Cooler Chair
description: A backpack, a cooler, and a seat? It's an unlikely combo, but one we welcome with open arms. Set up shop at the park, and fold the back down to enjoy the comfort of high-density foam-padded seating. The backrest is attached to the seat by adjustable straps, supporting your weight so you can lean back with confidence. It's also got room for eight cold ones in the insulated cooler pocket, along with some snacks in the dry pocket. Toss this water-resistant ripstop mash-up over your shoulder and adjust the straps for a just-right fit, you've got all you need for a casual outdoor kickback.

name: Flowknit Breeze Performance Long Sleeve Tee
description: The fan fave flowknit tee, but now in a long sleeve style. Perfect for training, travel, or lounging, the insanely-soft Flowknit fabric is jam-packed with performance features like moisture-wicking and anti-odor. Built for next-level comfort, and for everyday wear. This Flowknit is made from Global Recycle Standard poly yarn, which diverts and recycles plastics destined for landfill or the ocean, so you can feel and look good in what you wear.

name: Fragrance Discovery Gift Set
description: Experience MALIN+GOETZ's entire collection of six modern and dynamic eau de parfums in one beautifully packaged set. Inspired by traditional apothecary ingredients and favorite memories, each dynamic scent is elevated through the modern pairing of opposite but complementary notes. Formulated for gender-neutral appeal and everyday wear, these convenient 2 ml spray vials are sized to travel with you wherever you go. Includes six 2ml spray vials.

name: Viennese Coffee Cake
description: The finest award winning cake made from a recipe that's been handed down for generations. Every bite into this delicious Viennese Coffee Cake will delight the taste buds and make you crave more. Made with the freshest ingredients, these yellow cakes are delightfully moist and covered in cinnamon. This dessert does not contain any nuts, which makes it the perfect treat for those who have nut allergies. 8 inches in diameter.

name: Cast Iron Reversible Griddle
description: A griddle and a grill, all in one. Fry up some bacon, eggs, and pancakes on the large, smooth top side of the griddle, then use the same piece of premium cast iron kit to put some handsome grill lines on a juicy ribeye later that night. When designing this reversible griddle, Marcellin chose the optimal thickness for a balance of excellent heat retention and even distribution, making sure it's still durable enough for high-heat searing. The result is that it's safe for use with metal utensils, and built to last a lifetime.

name: The Oil
description: Crown Affair's signature Oil is formulated with smoothing tsubaki seed and hydrating meadowfoam seed oil to de-frizz, add shine, and naturally protect your hair from heat and exposure. Made with just five ingredients, the Oil is a near-weightless serum for deep hydration, protection, and a reduction of unwanted frizz and the appearance of split ends and flyaways. Lightly scented with naturally-derived Italian bergamot, yuzu, and lemongrass; and underlying notes of amber and wood. Bottle contains 1 oz.

name: The Culture Map: Breaking Through the Invisible Boundaries of Global Business
description: An international business expert helps you understand and navigate cultural differences in this insightful and practical guide, perfect for both your work and personal life. By Erin Meyer.

name: Crystalline Wine Glasses, Set of 2
description: Make your dining experience a memorable one with this set of two modern and sophisticated red wine glasses. Their stems are filled with clear crystals for a sparkling effect and the base is made of a large faceted clear crystal. Includes a set of 2, each glass measures 9.25" x 3.25" x 2.625".

name: Switch 32GB Lite
description: Dedicated to portable play. The Nintendo Switch Lite system is a lightweight, compact, and designed exclusively for handheld play. Bring it along and enjoy a little “me time” wherever you happen to be, whether you’re on the road or in your own backyard.

name: APOTHEKE Signature Candle
description: Hand-poured with perfume-grade fragrance oils and a high quality soy wax blend. Hand-made in Brooklyn, NY. Includes one 11 oz candle with a 60-70 hour approximate burn time.

name: Women's Go To Tank
description: With a high neck, fitted style, and built-in bra, this cami has coverage, comfort, and support. Feels super-soft on your skin and looks great on its own or under a light jacket or cardi.

name: Extra Strong Black Organic Cold Brew Coffee (6 cartons, 32oz each)
description: Wandering Bear's original extra strong, surprisingly smooth cold brew, with 5 glasses per carton. Perfect for crowded fridges. Each glass = 2+ espresso shots (180 mg caffeine). Packaging preserves perfect freshness until opened. 6 cartons. 32oz each.

name: The Blissful Blend, 12oz
description: Their signature blend of Nicaraguan and Peruvian beans. The Nicaraguan beans are sourced directly from family-run farm Fincas Mierisch, while the Peruvian beans are from San Ignacio.

name: Miniband Bundle
description: Small in size, big in burn. Easy to bring anywhere, this TRX Miniband bundle pack is great for burnout sets, injury rehab, low-impact training and targeting stabilizer muscles at home or on the go.

name: Pride Cooling Mineral Hydro Mist
description: Use this refreshing super fine mist whenever you want to press the reset button- after sun, post-workout, and as part of your everyday skincare routine. Inspired by the healing properties of natural mineral springs, this blend of skin-hydrating minerals, hyaluronic acid, and calming calendula improves skin softness and elasticity. It’s lightly scented with an all natural eucalyptus-peppermint blend to refresh, enliven, and cool you down. The bottle holds net 2 fl oz. / 60 ml. 10% of sales will be donated to the Ali Forney Center in New York City, whose mission is to protect LGBTQ youths from the harms of homelessness and empower them with the tools needed to live independently.

name: Terry Spa Headband
description: Crafted from soft cotton terry towel, this terry headband is the perfect hair accessory for cleansing, makeup application or an at-home facial. Feautures an adjustable velcro closure to keep your hair neatly tucked and protected while you indulge in your skincare treatments.

name: Seiren Mini Wired Ultra-compact Condenser Microphone
description: With the Razer Seiren Mini, big sounds can come in small packages. Introducing our ultra-compact condenser mic made for streaming with smaller or portable setups, and capable of producing professional-grade audio—thanks to a supercardioid pickup pattern and a 14mm condenser capsule.

name: Sunset Kayak Tour for Two, Chicago, IL
description: Kayak down the Chicago River at sunset and experience the city like you've never seen it before. Casually paddle across the waters with an outfitter with 20 years of experience as you watch the city turn gold during this 3-hour paddle. All skill levels are welcome as no prior experience is necessary. Includes an experience for two people.

name: Home Town Maps Rocks Glass, 2 Pack
description: Well Told's bestselling 11 oz rocks glass is custom-etched with a stunningly detailed map of U.S. cities and towns. Designed and made with pride in the USA. Comes with 2 glasses.

name: The Joan
description: The Joan bouquet includes 14 mixed stems of lilies, gerbera daisies, mini callas, carnations, aster, and eucalyptus! Vase not included.

name: Meskel Square Zip Wallet
description: An essential piece for your collection, the Meskel Zip Wallet is crafted from full-grain Ethiopian leather and designed with eight card and one cash slot to stay organized. Crafted from premium vegetable-tanned Ethiopian full-grain leather. Please note that since leather is a natural material, each product can have slight color, texture, and grain variations. Measures 4.5" L x 1" W x 4.5" H.

name: 30 Minute Session
description: Flytographer connects you with hand-picked local photographers in over 350 destinations around the globe for fun, hassle-free photo shoots. Flytographer can capture your destination vacation and deliver the perfect travel souvenir, priceless memories. This 30 minute session includes 15 photos at one location.

name: Kraken Wired Gaming Headset
description: Whether you’re competing in an intense tournament or lounging at home, Kraken for Consoleis a headset dedicated to superior sound quality and long-lasting comfort so you can play at your best all day. Enjoy superior sound clarity and deep, punchy bass for a wide soundscape. From subtle footsteps sneaking up behind you to climatic explosions that blow you away, every sound detail is heard when you’re gaming with the Razer Kraken for Console.

name: Toddler Short Sleeve Tee
description: Uplift any child's wardrobe with a custom kid's t-shirt. The Bella Canvas short sleeve tee for toddlers is a 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton jersey with a tear-away label for extra comfort. Choose your favorite color out of a big variety, and make unique staples that toddlers will happily wear every day.

name: Flourless Chocolate Cake
description: Take your chocolate passion to the next level with the delectable flourless chocolate cake! This cake starts with a thick and fudgy base, then layered with chocolate frosting and chocolate shavings all around the side. Serves 6 to 8, measures 7 inches in diameter.

name: Original EVOO & Balsamic Vinegar Duo
description: EVOO & Balsamic Vinegar - the perfect duo. The perfect pairing to make balsamic vinaigrettes, balsamic reductions, drizzling over fresh fruits and veggies, in a dish for dipping bread, in marinades, desserts, and just about anything that needs a zippy flavor.

name: Ceramic French Press
description: Brew perfect, full-bodied coffee in the traditional french press method. This heavy walled ceramic press pot is a functional and beautiful addition to your kitchen table. The ceramic body maintains a consistent temperature throughout the brewing process, and holds 850ml. Choice of color.

name: Bliss Garden
description: This fresh succulent garden arrives in a beautifully crafted planter gift box - ready to display and enjoy. Measures approximately 4 x 5 inches.

name: Iced Tea Collection
description: Summertime, and the sippin’s easy. If you believe that tea is amazing all year ‘round, make the most out of summer tea with the Iced Tea Collection! It’s filled with fun and fruity tea blends to support all your outdoor activities, or for sitting on the porch and sipping with a nice book. Cheers! Included is Tiny Bee Tea - Black Currant Buzz (2oz loose leaf), Chez Lulu - Tarte Aux Fraises (2oz loose leaf), Tea Goblin - The Luscious Lemon (2oz loose leaf), Steep Society - Moroccan Mint (2oz loose leaf), and Blue Tea Heart Sticker.

name: Original Duck Eco-Friendly Umbrella
description: Meet The Original Duck Umbrella, sustainably handmade and built to last. It's wind resistant with a waterproof coating, features an automatic open button and a high-strength steel frame. 100% created from recycled plastic bottles, with a sustainably sourced birch wood handle. It measures 14” in length and weighs 12.34 oz.

name: The Silent Patient
description: Alicia Berenson's life is seemingly perfect. A famous painter married to an in-demand fashion photographer.  One evening her husband Gabriel returns home late from a fashion shoot, and Alicia shoots him five times in the face, and then never speaks another word. Alicia's refusal to talk, or give any kind of explanation, turns a domestic tragedy into something far grander, a mystery that captures the public imagination and casts Alicia into notoriety.

name: Reserve Stemless Wine Glass Set, 4 Pack
description: Whether you’re picnicking on the Pacific coast or sailing the Scandinavian seas, this color series will bring a tasteful touch of modern elegance to your everyday life. Made out of Tritan™ Copolyester, a shatterproof, ultra-durable, and dishwasher-safe material, these 'glasses' will allow you to go anywhere & do anything in good taste. Crystal clear material feels just like glass with a superb hand weight. BPA-free. Made to last and withstand decades of use. Each glass holds 16oz, includes 4 glasses.

name: BeachPlease Luminous Blush + Lip Cream
description: A multi-purpose tinted balm that blends seamlessly on cheeks and lips for a natural luminous finish. No cakiness, no harsh lines, just beautiful sun-kissed skin. This silicone-free formula is made with skin-loving plant-based ingredients like green tea extract and aloe vera extract that gives a skincare boost with every application.

name: House Blend 12oz Coffee Bag, Ground
description: 100% Colombian farm-fresh specialty house blend coffee, roasted to order. 12oz bag, medium grind.

name: The Chiffon Trenches: A Memoir
description: During André Leon Talley's first magazine job, alongside Andy Warhol at Interview, a fateful meeting with Karl Lagerfeld began a decades-long friendship with the enigmatic, often caustic designer. André moved to Paris as bureau chief of John Fairchild's Women's Wear Daily, befriending fashion's most important designers (Halston, Yves Saint Laurent, Oscar de la Renta). He eventually became creative director at Vogue, developing an unlikely but intimate friendship with Anna Wintour. As she rose to the top of Vogue's masthead, André also ascended, and soon became the most influential man in fashion.

name: Grillmaster BBQ Multi Tool
description: A full-tang, heavy-gauge stainless steel blade ensures reliable long-term corrosion-resistance and strength; its finely beveled edge easily slide under ingredients while serrated and straight edges handle in-pan fine-tuning. Generous slots allow grease and liquids to drain effortlessly. A beautifully hand-polished Acacia handle is held fast by classic brass rivets and capped off with a handy leather hanging loop – so you can keep the 'Excalibur' of your cooking arsenal at hand and on full display.

name: Contagious: Why Things Catch on
description: In this book, Berger reveals the secret science behind word-of-mouth and social transmission. Whether you're a manager at a big company, a small business owner trying to boost awareness, a politician running for office, or a health official trying to get the word out, this book will show you how to make your product or idea catch on.

name: The Old Fashioned
description: All the ingredients for crafting the classic nightcap drink paired with modern whiskey glasses and complementing treats. Elevate their bar cart, office or kitchen with this sophisticated old fashioned set. It includes a pair of Crystal Rocks Glasses from Viski, Old Fashioned Syrup from Pratt, a Gold Plated Jigger, the Night Cap Chocolate Bar from Compartes, and a Dehydrated Orange Slice from Dardiman's all packaged in a deluxe black linen paper box tied with satin ribbon.

name: Women's Cushioned No Show Sock 4-Pack
description: Bombas Cushioned No Shows have everything other no shows don't: a contoured design that stays on all day, a seamless toe, and super soft plush longstaple cotton that feels soft but not too thick. Just like the regular no shows, but a little cushier. As always, Four Purchased = Four Donated. Includes 4 pairs of socks.

name: Women's Running Ankle Socks
description: Lightweight, purpose-built socks for running, working out and movement. These are made using bombas Hex Tec construction for breathability and moisture-wicking, with comfort innovations like strategic zone cushioning and airflow ventilation. Specially designed to help you move with grace and speed. As always, one purchased = one donated.

name: Stainless Steel Ice Bucket with Lid & Tongs
description: Make an elegant and innovative addition to your barware assortment with this double walled and insulated ice bucket. In addition to keeping ice from melting, it includes a unique hanging lid and tongs so you can make cocktails with ease.

name: Folding Camp Table
description: Bring the comforts of home to your outdoor hangs with this sturdy, extra-portable camp table. Featuring a wood-grain finish tabletop for a touch of elegance and an oxidized aluminum alloy frame for durability and stability, the table’s clever design allows its legs to stow away for quick storage and transportation. An easy-carry handle makes packing and setup a breeze, and included leg extenders make it simple to adjust the tabletop height to suit your needs.

name: Luna Decanter Set
description: A unique and timeless gift, this set includes several masterly hand made products carefully enclosed in an elegantly embossed gift box. This five piece set includes a 23.6 oz decanter and four 10.5 oz old fashioned style tumbler glasses. Made with lead free crystal, dishwasher safe.

name: Radiance
description: This stunning mix of 24 white Asiatic lilies is a definite showstopper, and it's perfect for everyone in the crowd — especially the one who loves to take center stage. With soft white petals that burst into bloom, admirers will be left wanting an encore stat. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: Washable Satin Sleep Short
description: Cool, lightweight, washable silk with elastic waist and pockets. This is the short for a cooler night's sleep. Designed to be a comfy fit. Choice of color and size.

name: Halloween Rice Krispie 12 Pack
description: Spooky assortment of some favorite seasonal treats. Flavors includes  Hot Cocoa, Pumpkin Pie, Spooky Cookies and Cream, Caramel Sea Salt and M&M, sure to be gobbled up by all your Goblins! All treats are gluten free with the exception of Spooky Cookies and Cream.

name: UNICEF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to UNICEF USA helps ensure the world’s most vulnerable children get the nutrition, water, protection, education and health care they need to survive and thrive.

name: NBA Logo Tee
description: From the buzzer-beating finishes you can’t forget to the dynasties that defined the game, pay homage to a tradition that only gets richer with each season. Cheer on your favorite team with a super-soft unisex tee featuring your NBA team's logo.

name: Apple Watch Band for Case Sizes 38-41mm
description: Machete Apple Watch Bands are beloved by fashion editors world wide. Made of Italian Acetate with hypoallergenic Stainless Steel hardware. Watch bands measure 8.75" and can be sized down at a local jeweler if needed. Machete partners with and donates to 1% For The Planet.

name: Posy Huggie Pair
description: These charming millefiori heart huggie hoops are made with gold plated surgical steel and feature a millefiori heart bead and vintage acrylic pearl. Choice of color. Each pair is handmade to order, please allow up to 10 days to ship.

name: 1/4 Sheet Non-Stick Pan
description: The Sheet Pan was created in partnership with Chef Matt Horn, the award-winning pitmaster behind Oakland’s Horn Barbecue. Professional-grade Non Stick guarantees that everything releases without fuss for the easiest cleanup possible. It measures 13”x 9.5”.

name: Make-A-Wish Donation
description: The gift of giving! For every wish we’re able to grant, there’s another child with a critical illness waiting for theirs.

name: Single Jar
description: Superfood cookie dough, ready to eat. Includes 1 of your choice.

name: Girls, Inc Donation
description: You have the power to help a girl grow up strong, smart, and bold. She is a leader and ready to succeed. Your investment will help equip her to create positive change in her life and in the world around her.

name: The Mini Luncher
description: Yes, it’s a lunchbox, perfect for the little things. With an insulated interior and vegan leather exterior, you can pack your food and no one would ever know what was inside. The insulated interior will keep your food cool + is easily wipeable in case of those accidental spills. Packing your own food is faster, cheaper, healthier and now chicer. Measures 6.8" x 7.8" x 4.7" with a 4" handle drop.

name: 30G Gift Set
description: Includes a 30G tin in a custom wooden presentation box, one mother of pearl caviar spoon, and a key to open.

name: The Vanishing Half
description: Weaving together multiple strands and generations of this family, from the Deep South to California, from the 1950s to the 1990s, Brit Bennett produces a story that is at once a riveting, emotional family story and a brilliant exploration of the American history of passing. Looking well beyond issues of race, The Vanishing Half considers the lasting influence of the past as it shapes a person's decisions, desires, and expectations, and explores some of the multiple reasons and realms in which people sometimes feel pulled to live as something other than their origins. Hardcover.

name: Electric Candle Lighter
description: This rechargeable electric lighter is sleek and modern looking, while also being environmentally friendly. The ultra-thin design and sleek finish make this lighter an attractive accessory. In only 1-2 hours, you can fully charge your lighter and it will last for hundreds of uses. It measures 7 x 0.5 x 0.31".

name: White Unicorn Piñatagram for Anytime
description: A magical piñata design, perfect for any celebration. Filled with Skittles, Starburst, Laffy Taffy, Double Bubble, Airheads, Sweetarts and Life Saver mints.

name: SIGMA SPA® Express Brush Cleaning Mat
description: Swirl away product build-up, oil and dirt with this compact silicone mat, featuring 7 exclusive textures to clean brushes of every size! Positions in sink for easy cleaning.

name: Super Spritz SPF 50
description: A premium face mist sunscreen specially formulated with daily use in mind. Super Spritz is designed to work well over makeup, fit neatly in your bag, and provide instantaneous hits of refreshment and protection as you go about your day. The invisible finishing mist does not disturb makeup and has a quick dry down with subtle satin finish. Transparent on all skin tones. Holds 2.2 fl oz.

name: Walden Digital Frame
description: Aura Frames' largest, wall-worthy WiFi-connected picture frame. Send photos from your phone to Walden, the WiFi-connected frame that takes you from tabletop to wall. Enjoy all your favorite moments on Walden's 15" Full HD dual orientation display, featuring an anti-glare finish and a 4:3 aspect ratio (the same as your phone’s camera). Add unlimited photos and videos, and invite all your loved ones to fill the frame using the free Aura app. This frame has a 15" dual orientation, and measures 15.7" x 4.3" x 12.7" with a 1500 x 1200 HD Display.

name: Rainbow Ring
description: Meet the Rainbow Band Ring- this whimsical piece is adorned with an arc of meticulously selected CZ stones, each shimmering with the joyous hues of the rainbow. Perfect for the color-loving daydreamer, this ring is more than an accessory, it's your very own piece of wearable joy.

name: Tile Coffee Mug
description: Choose your message! This beautiful white ceramic mug with gold lettering is easy to hold with its generous size and chic gold handle.  The mug's dimensions are 4 x 3.5" (5.5" w/handle).

name: The GoBox, 3-Day Kit
description: The most compact emergency kit for 1-Person, its design makes it perfect for your house, office, or car. It contains all the emergency essentials in a book sized box including a pop-out handle for easy transport. Packed full of essential items to help get you through an emergency scenario, including a comprehensive First-Aid Kit, 3-day food and water rations, a multi-tool, LED flashlight, glow stick, mylar emergency space blanket, emergency rain poncho, waterproofing utility bag, Kraft Notebook, Preppi pencil, air respirator mask, safety matches, 4-hour candles, emergency whistle, and playing cards.

name: The Body Keeps the Score
description: Trauma is a fact of life, and Dr. Bessel van der Kolk, one of the world's foremost experts on trauma, has spent over three decades working with survivors. In The Body Keeps the Score, he uses recent scientific advances to show how trauma literally reshapes both body and brain, compromising sufferers' capacities for pleasure, engagement, self-control, and trust. He explores innovative treatments--from neurofeedback and meditation to sports, drama, and yoga--that offer new paths to recovery by activating the brain's natural neuroplasticity.

name: Pothos
description: The Golden Pothos is one of the worlds' best-selling plants, and for a good reason! They are basically impossible to kill and thrives in situations other plants can't handle. They don't need much water, and they are quite happy in darker parts of your home. They can survive almost anything: from a few weeks without water to being placed in a room with low light. Not only are they easy to maintain, but the Golden Pothos is also extremely beautiful. A must for any Green Space! Overall size is 4" to 6" W, 6" to 8" H, and is not safe for pets.

name: 3 Piece Ultimate Tool Set
description: The 3-Piece Ultimate Tool Set combines GIR’s top-selling kitchen tools. This set includes the Ultimate Spatula, Ultimate Flip, and Ultimate Spoonula. Choice of set color.

name: Curated Collection of BIPOC Founded Brands
description: Shop our curated selection of BIPOC founded brands.

name: NBA on Fire Tee
description: This tee’s on fire! Relive all your hoop dreams of the nineties with a throwback-inspired tee to rep your team and the days of dynasties and double-wristbands. It’s all that and a bag of chips, really. Pay homage.

name: CLIQ Collapsible Chair
description: CLIQ Chair is a sturdy, comfortable, portable chair that rapidly packs up to the size of a water bottle. Set up in seconds, no tent poles, and incredibly compact, this portable chair is surprisingly comfy. Perfect for on the go socializing, spectating, and sitting just about anywhere. Holds up to 300 lbs.

name: Circle Mirror
description: As easy as it is stylish, this simple pocket-sized mirror features a swivel opening and is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. Mirrors are made of Italian Acetate and measure 3" each.

name: The Rabbit Hutch
description: Ethereally beautiful and formidably intelligent, Blandine shares her flat with three teenage boys she neither likes nor understands, all, like her, now aged out of the state foster care system that has repeatedly failed them, all searching for meaning in their lives. Hardcover.

name: Garment-Dyed Crewneck
description: Luxurious comfort and style are what this unisex, garment-dyed sweatshirt is all about. It's made with 80% ring-spun cotton and 20% polyester and the fabric is 3-end garment-dyed, ring-spun, color-blast fleece with a 100% cotton face. Each sweatshirt comes with a relaxed fit, a rolled-forward shoulder, and a back neck patch.

name: Pull Up Style Diaper 4 Pack
description: The first and only EWG VERIFIED™ diaper in the world, is the safest “pull up” diaper for baby’s developing brain and body. Quilted 360 flexitech waistband is snug and comfy for tots on the move. Made with plant-based materials and organic cotton to feel dreamy soft. Engineered with proprietary Magic Channels and Flash Dry Technology for happy skin and overnight leak protection. Includes 4 packs of wet wipes and 4 packs of diapers. Sizing starts at size 3.

name: Tigi Card Wallet
description: Perfect for holding business cards or just a few necessities, this limited edition Tigi Card Wallet is the perfect accessory to give as a gift or toss inside your tote for extra organization. Crafted from premium Ethiopian full grain leather and measures 5" x 3". Choice of color.

name: Best Selling Classic Candle Bundle
description: Discover the best of APOTHEKE with a bundle of their four best-selling scents. This exclusive bundle features Charcoal, Earl Grey Bitters, Sea Salt Grapefruit, and White Vetiver. Made with a premium soy wax blend and essential and perfume-grade fragrance oils, these luxury scented candles are designed to provide a clean-burning and exceptional scent experience. Each candle is housed in a glass vessel with a velvety-smooth luxe matte finish and has an approximate burn time of 60-70 hours.

name: Personalized Milo Dog Carrier
description: This lightweight bag features mesh panels on 3 sides for maximum ventilation, a hard board base with a removable plush bed to provide comfort for your companion. With pockets for accessory storage, carrying handles and a padded shoulder strap, Milo makes traveling with your pet simple.  Recommended for pets up to 15lbs. Airline friendly. Measures 17" x 14"x 13".

name: Calendula Hand Cleanser
description: Calendula Hand Cleanser is a luxury hand wash in a super luxury - and earth friendly - reusable weighty, 16.9 oz glass bottle. Gently and thoroughly cleanse your hands with clove, palo santo, litsea and helichrysum essential oils - all of which are naturally anti-bacterial, anti-microbial, anti-inflammatory and detoxifying. Hand fulls of Calendula petals steep in the essential oil blend and permeate each pump with skin softening, spirit calming, healing for your hands.

name: 24oz Vacuum Insulated Tumbler with Lid & Straw
description: Keep drinks piping hot or icy cold for 12 hours or more with this triple vacuum insulated tumbler. It comes with flip lid, straw lid and extra straw. This 100% leak proof reusable cup is perfect for a variety of your favorite beverages on the go. Holds 24 oz and measures 8.78" H x 2.5" wide to fit perfectly in a car cupholder.

name: Alpaca Basketweave Throw
description: Super-soft alpaca throw designed to complete any space. Designed to last a lifetime, this superfine alpaca is handwoven by artisans in the mountains of Peru, making for a subtle texture that's as soft as it is durable. Made with 70% Alpaca 23% Polyamide 7% Wool. It measures 50" x 70".

name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital Donation
description: The Gift of Giving! Donate to the world's leading children's hospital. Your donation will help St. Jude provide treatment for the toughest childhood cancers and pediatric diseases.

name: Big Plates
description: Beauty in utility. The minimalist Big Plate is just right for breakfast, brunch, lunch, dinner, midnight snack, and everything in between. Its rimless, coupe-style simplicity will delight you all day long. Safe for dishwasher, freezer, microwave, and oven safe up to 480 degrees. Includes a set of 4 plates, each measures 10.7" in diameter and 1.2" tall.

name: Hand + Body Wash
description: This best-selling hand and body cleansing gel lathers into a rich foam to effectively wash away dirt, sweat and debris. It thoroughly purifies and refreshes without overdrying skin, and is made for all genders and skin types (especially sensitive). Hydrating amino acids + glycerin bind water to the skin, enhancing water retention and skin moisture. Includes one 8.5 fl oz bottle.

name: Bridgestone 2022 Tour B RX Golf Balls
description: The New TOUR B with REACTIV iQ is the smarter tour ball. The proprietary New REACTIV iQ is a SMART cover technology that reacts to the force of impact. It delivers increased ball speed for maximum distance off the tee and hit & sit performance on approach shots. The TOUR B RX is ideal for players with swing speeds under 105 mph who want additional distance.

name: Loma XL Bag
description: Meet The Loma's bigger brother, the Loma XL. At 3.4 pounds, the Loma XL is a lightweight golf bag built to carry 8 clubs comfortably. Sunday Golf took the same iconic Loma design and made it slightly bigger to accommodate a couple more clubs while adding a double strap. With the ability to easily carry a half set during a full round, this is is a minimalist golfers dream bag.

name: Fire Hot Pot Base
description: A spicy, tingly, complex base for building a fire hot pot at home. Spiced with a warming medley of ginger, star anise, and clove and rounded out with Sichuan Pepper extract to electrify your tastebuds. No MSG, sugar-free, vegan. Contains 2 pouches per bag, 480g total.

name: Bud Vase
description: This bud vase is the perfect addition to any (and every) table. Made with semi-matte glazes to enhance your dining table, your counter, your bedside, or your neighbor's stoop. Dishwasher safe. Includes one bud vase, measures 6" tall and 2.75 inches at base.

name: WWF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to the World Wildlife Fund helps protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature.

name: Collapsible 14 oz Junior Bottle
description: Sip, sip, hooray! With a spill-proof and collapsible design, your kiddo can sip smoothies at school or guzzle water after the game. Screw-on cap creates airtight, leak-proof seal. Dishwasher safe, comes apart for easy cleaning. Bottle is made of LFGB Certified silicone, cap is made of BPA-free polypropylene. Recommended for Ages 6+.

name: Serving Fork and Spoon
description: A two-piece set that works for serving salad (and everything else). Available in stealth Matte Black, and subtly luxe Matte Gold colors. Choice of color.

name: Plastic Free Tote Bag
description: “Plastic doesn’t go with my outfit.” Make a bold statement and reduce your daily use of plastic bags with this stylish, yet sturdy oversized canvas tote. This bag is large enough to hold your produce from the Farmer’s Market, carry your laptop and notepad to work, or to pack all of your snacks and towels for a beach day! Measures 18"W x 15.5"H x 7.5" bottom.

name: Ultimate Jerky Lovers Gift Box
description: Bunny James Ultimate Jerky Lovers Box is a collection of 25 protein rich jerky snacks. You'll be happily chomping on zero sugar grass fed jerky and delicious elk meat sticks. It includes 1 Nick's Sticks Spicy Grass-Fed Beef Sticks, 1 Field Trip Island BBQ Crispy Cuts, 1 Field Trip Original Beef Jerky, 1 Field Trip Pepperoni Beef & Pork Stick, 1 Field Trip Cracked Pepper Turkey Stick, 1 Mission Meats Turkey Sticks, 1 Think Jerky Jalapeno Beef Sticks, 1 Stryve Hickory Seasoned, 1 Chomps Original Beef Stick, 1 Chomps Jalapeno Beef Stick, 1 Think Jerky Sweet Chipolte Jerky, 1 Think Jerky Beef Stick Mini, 1 Think Jerky Turkey Stick Mini, 1 Tillamook Zero Sugar Jerky Stick Original, 1 Tillamook Zero Sugar Jerky Stick Teriyaki, 1 New Primal Free-Range Turkey Stick, 1 Real Original, 1 Wicked Cutz Italian Beef & Cheese, 1 Ostrim Sweet & Spicy Beef & Elk Jerky Stick, 1 Ostrim Buffalo Wing Chicken Jerky Stick, 1 Country Archer Jerky Bag, 2 Country Archer Original Beef Mini Sticks, and 2 Country Archer Pineapple Mini Sticks.

name: Barbie™ Dreamhouse Candle
description: Experience Barbie's™ world with a scent inspired by the original empowerment icon and her unforgettable abode. Rose and jasmine accent three floors of dreamy Barbie™ décor. A pristine pink couch overlooks the Malibu sunset as uplifting notes of lemon and sandalwood welcome you home.

name: The Comfy Original Wearable Blanket
description: The Comfy Original® wearable blanket is the world’s first of its kind letting you stay warm and cozy whether you’re at home or on the go. The Comfy Original® blanket’s huge, one-size-fits-all design combines an ultrasoft microfiber exterior with a luxurious, sherpa-lined interior to make you think you’re being hugged by a cloud.

name: Daughter Diary
description: In partnership with Ebonee Davis, DAUGHTER Org, and Black Girls Film, the Daughter Diary is a workbook specifically created to aid in the healing and inspiration of Black girls and women. Made from 100% recycled paper, this journal features imagery of Black women in all shades, having each other’s back and holding each other up as we do in our day to day lives. Aspirational messages are printed between the pages as a reminder that Black women’s healing, goals and progression is by no means linear, but we have the tools within us to fulfill our ancestors' wildest dreams.

name: Telegraph Carafe + Cup Set
description: Complete your tablescape with a set of  sleek and simple Telegraph Carafe and Dimple Cups. Each piece is hand-thrown, which gives it a unique feel and variation. Set includes one carafe and two cups.

name: Striped Lambswool Throw Blanket
description: Comfort and style combine for the perfect throw blanket. Made with 100% Lambswool in Germany by a 100-year-old family mill, this stylish, doublefaced throw will add warmth and beauty to any room.

name: Cashmere Fisherman Sweater, Oatmeal
description: It doesn't get much more classic than this best-selling, never-want-to-take-it-off, wear-everywhere sweater. Lightweight and 100% cashmere, so soft to the touch, you might need more than one.

name: Soundcore by Anker Space One True Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Carve out your own quiet in the world around you with minimal effort and maximum convenience with Soundcore's Space One over-ear headphones. The Space One is durable and built to shield and adapt to the noise around you. Superior comfort to provide long-lasting playtime make these headphones a must-have for around the world trips.

name: Steak Knives
description: Add these chic Steak Knives to your Flatware assortment for the carnivores in your life. Includes 4 Steak Knives.

name: Dohm Classic Natural Sound Machine
description: Loved by generations since 1962, the Dohm Classic features a signature fan-based natural white noise 2 speed options for adjustable tone and volume creates a personalized sound environment, helping to mask noise for better sleep. Powered by an 6-foot 120V AC plug, just plug it in, flip the switch to high or low, then rotate the cap and collar to find the best sound for you.

name: Branded Copper Vacuum Insulated Cup, 12oz
description: The right drink, the right moment, the right temperature – that’s what this 12oz personalized insulated cup is all about. With a double-wall, 18/8 stainless steel construction this cup is as tough as they come while the copper insulation keeps your drinks frosty for 24 hours and hot for 6. Enjoy easy sipping thanks to the push-on lid.

name: Ion Weekender
description: Whether you’re heading out for a long weekend or business trip, the Ion Weekender will keep your clothes fresh and everything organized. Includes eight compartments for easy storage, anti-odor silver interior lining, waterproof zippers and versatile duffel & backpack straps. Choice of color.

name: AirPods Max
description: AirPods Max reimagine over-ear headphones. An Apple-designed dynamic driver provides immersive high-fidelity audio. Every detail, from canopy to cushions, has been designed for an exceptional fit. Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise, while Transparency mode lets it in. And spatial audio with dynamic head tracking provides theater-like sound that surrounds you.

name: Lipshade 100% Mineral SPF 30 Lipstick
description: This lip-enhancing lip color delivers 100% mineral SPF protection & balmy hydration in 5 comfortable, versatile shades that suit a wide range of skin tones. Featuring a subtle peppermint flavor and a satin finish, Lipshade softens and conditions lips with peptides and natural mango, murumuru and shea butters. Build your look to high-pigment full coverage, choose your perfect shade, or mix and match to create your look.

name: Eyeshadow Palette
description: Indulge in 14 rich, warm hues in long-lasting, buttery soft formulas or warm matte, shimmer and metallic shades with these luxe eyeshadow palette and dual-ended brush. Featuring a versatile mix these colors have something for everyone. Choice of palette shades.

name: One Case
description: For the libation lover who likes to keep their drink real. These upgraded mixers are refreshing, made with 80% to 90% less sugar, flavored with real juice and botanical extracts rather than so-called “natural flavors”. Includes 12, 8 oz cans.

name: Golf Lesson With A PGA Pro for One, Yonkers, NY
description: Hone your golf skills across 9 holes with a PGA Professional on this amazing 90-minute playing lesson. Enjoy unforgettable one-on-one teaching from a PGA certified coach and master your putt stroke, get a cleaner swing, and improve your short game. Includes an experience for one person.

name: 20 LB Rubber Dumbbell
description: Includes ONE 20 LB Dumbell. The Inspire Fitness Rubber Dumbbells are an essential addition to any home gym, providing unparalleled quality and durability. Crafted with precision using high-quality materials, this dumbbell is designed to last.

name: Popcorn Tasting Kit
description: This tasting kit contains a decadent assortment of Funky Chunky's favorite flavors. Small bag of Chocolate Popcorn, Chocolate Pretzels, Sea Salt Caramel Popcorn, Chip-Zel-Pop and Peanut Butter Cup Popcorn.

name: Huntsman Mini Wired Optical Clicky Switch Gaming Keyboard with Chroma RGB Backlighting
description: Dominate on a different scale with the Razer Huntsman Mini a 60% gaming keyboard with cutting-edge Razer Optical Switches. Highly portable and ideal for streamlined setups, it’s time to experience lightning-fast actuation in their most compact form factor yet.

name: Classic Snack Gift Box
description: Everything about this Classic Snack Gift Box emotes happiness! From the bright white and gold magnetic closure keepsake box to the gourmet delights tucked inside it! Light hazelnut wafer sticks and peanut butter & chocolate chip cookie bites exquisitely arranged underneath the cover. Are you looking for a bit of crunch? The cinnamon & brown sugar kettle corn won't disappoint. Prefer savory? The vegetable cheddar cheese and organic flatbread crackers never disappoint.

name: UNICEF Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation to UNICEF USA helps ensure the world’s most vulnerable children get the nutrition, water, protection, education and health care they need to survive and thrive.

name: Charge 5
description: Fitbit Charge 5 connects the dots between your activity, sleep and stress so you can make the best decisions for your body, mind and health. It all starts with Daily Readiness, a score based on activity, sleep and heart rate variability (HRV) that helps you optimize your workout routine. Your score comes with personalized activity recommendations: low means go easy and recover--light yoga, deep breathing--while a high score gives you the green light to go all out. Enhance your recovery routine with advanced stress-management tools like the on-wrist EDA sensor.

name: Zebra Succulent
description: The Zebra Plant or Haworthia fasciata, is a delicate and beautiful succulent houseplant. It's a low maintenance plant, and looks great alone or as a companion to other plants in your home or office! It's green leaves have small, clustered white bumps on them, making it look just like a zebra. The Harper Succulent comes in a 4" nursery pot, planter not included.

name: Large Popcorn Bag Gift Box
description: This deluxe gift box set contains one large bag of Funky Chunky's signature Nutty Choco Pop, sweet & salty Chocolate Pretzel, Peanut Butter Cup, Sea Salt Caramel, and nut-free Chip Zel Pop. Gift wrapped with a bow, it contains five 5 oz. bags.

name: Men's Gripper Slipper 2 Pack
description: Now made with a thicker footbed for extra cushioning, these Gripper Slippers have an ultra-warm brushed lining, special grips on the outside designed to help prevent slips, plus a separate travel bag that makes packing a breeze. You may never want to wear real shoes again. Includes 2 pairs. As always, two purchased = two donated.

name: Flowknit Breeze Performance Tee
description: The ultimate do-everything tee, in a crew neck. Perfect for training, travel, or lounging, this insanely-soft Flowknit fabric is jam-packed with performance features like moisture wicking and anti-odor. Built for next-level comfort, even for everyday wear. Flowknit is made from Global Recycle Standard poly yarn, which diverts and recycles plastics destined for landfill or the ocean, so you can feel and look good in what you wear.

name: Birthday Astrology Garden
description: Choose your sign! This gift arrives in a beautifully designed zodiac themed planter gift box, ready to display and enjoy! Succulent box measures approximately 4" x 4" x 5.7".

name: Delicate Threader Hoop Earrings
description: These threader hoops are sure to be unlike any other hoops in your earring collection. Their unique shape is delicate, but not so delicate that they won’t get noticed when you wear them out and about! Drop measures 1.6", choice of color.

name: TB12 Plant-Based Protein 12ct
description: Designed to help you move from workdays to workouts, TB12 Plant-Based Protein provides a clean, sustainable and complete 24 grams of plant protein and a complete amino acid profile. These convenient single-serve packets allow for easy, pre-measured, mess-free, protein on-the-go for a clean, smooth finish every time. Includes 12 packets.

name: Dessert Person
description: By Claire Saffitz. New York Times bestseller. In her first cookbook, Bon Appétit and YouTube star of the show Gourmet Makes offers wisdom, problem-solving strategies, and more than 100 creative inspiring recipes. Hardcover.

name: Incredible Bakery Tower
description: Warm their spirits with a towering bundle of baked goods. This gift tower arrives with a 4-inch Cinnamon Walnut Coffee Cake, 20 Gourmet Cookies (Chocolate Chip, Oatmeal Raisin, Snickerdoodle, Butter Pecan, and Ginger Molasses), Six Gourmet Brownies (Velvet Ganache, Cheesecake, Raspberry Crumb, Iced Lemon Blondie, Tuxedo), 12 Square Hazelnut Truffles and a delicious 8-inch cinnamon coffee cake.

name: Extra Virgin Skincare Trio
description: All your skincare essentials in one set. Experience a self-care daily routine that transports you to the Mediterranean seaside and leaves you feeling fresh and hydrated all day long. This set includes Hydrating Face Oil (super moisturizing yet featherweight face oil), Oil Balm (EVOO balm delivers grab-and-go nourishment to your skin), and an Extra Virgin Face Moisturizer (Ultra hydrating, antioxidant-rich moisturizer for all skin types). Conveniently combined with their signature drawstring pouch.

name: Gemstone Solitaire Stud Earrings
description: Striking and timeless, these stunning .925 sterling silver solitaire stud earrings feature bold gemstones in a bezel setting. The gemstones are 3.5mm. The notched posts and friction backs keep these pierced earrings safe and secure on your ears for comfortable wear all day long. This authentic design is crafted of real 92.5% sterling silver that has been electro-coated with genuine rhodium (a platinum-family metal), a precious metal that will keep a tarnish-free shine for years to come.

name: Seed + Mill Sampler
description: This gift includes two of the bestselling halva flavors (Pistachio and Sea Salt Dark Chocolate) beautifully packaged in an 8oz container, as well as a 16oz jar of Organic Tahini.

name: Bamboo Charcoal Sheet Mask + Beard Oil
description: Half mask, half beard treatment, the Bamboo Charcoal Sheet Mask + Beard Oil gives each section of skin (and beard) just what it needs: A detoxifying, hydrating charcoal-infused mask for your skin and a nourishing beard oil blend to treat your beard. Plus, the mask is designed with expandable nose slits to fit any face size and shape. Includes 4 masks.

name: Detect Pro Self-Empty Robot Vacuum
description: The Detect Pro robot vacuum is powered by 3 deep-cleaning technologies that enable the robot to maximize performance by sensing mess level, floor type, and edges & corners. DirtDetect sees even the hidden debris and automatically increases suction and cleaning passes to remove the mess on carpets and hardfloors. Now with NeverStuck technology, this robot will navigate around obstacles and lift itself up and over thresholds and onto thick carpets.

name: Branded Chocolate Covered Pretzel Gift Box
description: You can't go wrong with Fatty Sundays' Best Sellers Assorted Set! It's an incredible collection of only the most popular, drool-worthy Fatty Sundays gourmet chocolate pretzels! This set includes Toffee, Rainbow Sprinkles, Salted Caramel and Birthday Cake. 12 pretzel rods per set, each pretzel rod is approx 4" long.

name: Propolis Throat Spray
description: Support your immune system with your daily dose of bee propolis. This all-star ingredient contains antioxidants and other immune-boosting compounds with every spray. Additionally supports immune system with antioxidants, vitamin C, zinc, iron, B vitamins, and over 300 other beneficial compounds. Naturally contains flavonoids and polyphenols that fight free radicals and combat oxidative stress. Soothe a scratchy throat. Contains 1.06 fl oz.

name: Performance Pickleball Paddle
description: The Performance Composite Pickleball Paddle has a durable carbon fiber surface with a high quality honeycomb core. This paddle is longer and ideal for increasing the amount of power and spin you can generate on the ball. The OH619 Paddle is perfect for the player who is ready to level up and elevate their pickleball game.

name: Baby Carrier One Air, 3D Mesh
description: A sturdy and structured carrier with many adjustable features, letting your baby sit in a protected and comfortable position while you are out and about together. Crafted in cool, comfortable mesh, this carrier offers sturdy support and multiple carrying positions. The waist belt and padded shoulder straps relieve pressure on your back and shoulders and make babywearing possible for newborns and up to the age of three. The unique 3D mesh has been specially developed to suit young babies as it’s super soft, flexible and dries quickly after washing. Best suited for babies 0–3 years, 8–33 lbs, 21–39 in.

name: TRX Strength Band, 15-30lb
description: Your go-anywhere, do-anything resistance training accessory, the 15–30 lb. TRX Strength band adds light intensity to your training and also can help you make your moves more manageable.

name: No Wrong Answers
description: A game of PG-rated conversation cards with 70+ of the least pressing, but most interesting questions to get people talking and laughing. Created by comedians, the deck is perfect for bringing the fun to happy hours, road trips, family dinners, work Zoom meetings and anywhere else that could use more laughter and hilarious conversations. A portion of each sale goes to supporting Chicago's food bank, the Greater Chicago Food Depository.

name: Kiss N Tell Dessert Decorating Kit
description: The secret is out. These Kiss N Tell Dessert Decorating Kit creates showstopping sweets that’ll make you swoon. Includes 1 jar of sprinkles containing 0.5 cups, 1 4g jar of iridescent edible glitter, and one fancy dusting pump for even dispersement of edible glitter.

name: 500ml Bottle
description: The endlessly refillable, beautifully sustainable cult favorite glass water bottle. It makes drinking water blissful, it’s dishwasher safe, it's the water bottle soulmate you never knew existed. 500ml, choice of color.

name: Baby2Baby Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide children living in poverty across the country with diapers, clothing and all the basic necessities that every child deserves.

name: Roll Top Camp Table
description: Roughin' it is a little less rough when you've got a table like this. It's big enough to set up for a campsite snack session, but folds up so nicely you can take it absolutely anywhere. Better yet, the matte aluminum tabletop is easy to clean, so you can go from in-the-meal to on-the-move in no time. Measures 26.7" L x 18.1" W.

name: BuildOn Donation
description: The gift of giving! Your donation helps provide access to education for a child in a country with high rates of poverty and illiteracy.

name: 3-Piece Mini Tool Set
description: Combining GIR’s top-selling kitchen tools, the GIR 3-Piece Mini Tool Set is made for little hands and big ideas. This includes a Mini Spoonula, Mini Flip, and Mini Spatula. All BPA and BPS-free and made with 100% pharmaceutical-grade, platinum-cured silicone.

name: Mom and Baby Care Package
description: Perfect for an expectant Mom, or for a new mom during postpartum aka the "fourth trimester", this gift basket is filled with items that comfort and sooth both mom and baby during their first days and weeks together. For mom, this gift includes a Classic Nurtured 9 Maternity/Postpartum Robe, A Dry Brush, and a fizzy bath bomb. For baby, this gift includes a Diaper Caddy, Sun Swaddle Blanket, Sleepy Bear Lovey, and Silicone Sun Teether.

name: Take Care Gift Set, Grounding Aloe
description: Find balance with these grounding botanical essentials. This zen collection will have you creating simple but serene moments for yourself, so you can let go a little. The Aloe Bamboo Grow Kit comes equipped with a complete passive hydroponic system, plus non-GMO lavender seeds. The Aroma Diffuser includes an elegant glass vessel, natural reeds and a soothing essential oil swirl of lemongrass, cedarwood, clary sage, and coconut.

name: Monogrammed Sewn Leather Luggage Tag
description: A beautiful luggage tag made of high quality full-grain genuine leather. Measures 2.5" x 4.5". Gold foil monogram with choice of inscription and choice of leather color. Monogramming is done in capital letters, special characters not permitted, 3 character limit.

name: The Warmth of Other Suns
description: From 1915 to 1970, this exodus of almost six million people changed the face of America. Wilkerson compares this epic migration to the migrations of other peoples in history. She interviewed more than a thousand people, and gained access to new data and official records, to write this definitive and vividly dramatic account of how these American journeys unfolded, altering our cities, our country, and ourselves. Paperback.

name: Hedley & Bennett x Crocs Clog
description: The Croc x H&B Jibbitz™ pack features an H&B apron, Hat, ampersand logo, and labeled deli cup as an IYKYK nod to all our back of house cooks out there. Enjoy the comfort and style of the iconic Crocs clog with a slip-resistant outsole and unique adjustable heel strap. In this versatile clog, you’ll have the benefit of enhanced traction and security, which can meet a variety of needs. The specially-designed heel strap adjusts to be extra secure, and is easier to get on and off with its textured pull tabs.

name: Ultimate Cosmetics Storage Box
description: Each cosmetic item will find its rightful place, enabling you to effortlessly create stunning looks with ease. Say goodbye to the stress of searching for misplaced products or struggling with a cluttered mess. The Ultimate Cosmetics Storage Box brings order and efficiency to your beauty routine, allowing you to focus on what truly matters, expressing your unique style. Measures 11.26" x 7.28" x 14.57".

name: Technic The Batman Batcycle
description: Give Batman fans aged 9 and up an awesome challenge as they build Batman’s iconic motorcycle in LEGO Technic form. Inspired by the 2022 The Batman movie, this LEGO Technic The Batman, Batcycle (42155) toy is packed with hot features. Kids will love assembling all the parts of this authentic scale model before recreating favorite scenes from the movie.

name: The Pastry Mat
description: From temperature to weight to liquid, the Pastry Mat removes the guesswork with a handy chart of common measurement conversions, right where you need it. Includes 1 pastry mat.

name: Baby's First Year Calf Sock 8-Pack Gift Box
description: Kids grow up so fast. With this pack, you can make sure they grow up comfortably, too. Four pairs of comfy socks for their first six months. Four pairs of grippy socks for months 0-6. Perfect for preventing slips as they learn to stand, toddle, and do other big kid things. 8 purchased = 8 donated.

name: International Committee of the Red Cross in support of Israeli and Palestinian Civilians Donation
description: The gift of giving! The ICRC has been present in Israel and the occupied territories since 1967. As a neutral, independent, humanitarian organization, the ICRC visits detainees in Israeli and Palestinian places of detention. They also help improve access to essential services like water and electricity in Gaza and support livelihood projects throughout the occupied territories.
brand: International Committee of the Red Cross

name: Chocolate Lovers 8 Pack
description: This gift box was created for all the people who really love chocolate...whether that’s a classic chocolate chip cookie loaded with chips, or a chewy, decadent, almost brownie-like cookie. Consider this the ultimate indulgence. Each gift box contains four Dark Chocolate Chocolate Chip cookies and four Two Chip Chocolate Chip cookies.

name: The Latecomer
description: From the New York Times bestselling author of The Plot, Jean Hanff Korelitz’s The Latecomer is a layered and immersive literary novel about three siblings, desperate to escape one another, and the upending of their family by the late arrival of a fourth. Hardcover.

name: Women's Hemp Fleece Wide-Leg Pant
description: Wide-leg pants go anywhere, but we especially love them for lounging. Made with durable, textured hemp fleece fabric that's super-soft on the inside, we'll cancel any plan for the sake of this cropped wide-leg pant.

name: Freehand Tattoo Marker, Recipient's Choice
description:
The Freehand Tattoo Marker empowers your inner artist and gives you the freedom to easily create custom tattoos. From delicate, detailed designs to bold, abstract pieces, the possibilities are endless. This kit includes a
Freehand Tattoo Marker, 2 Reusable Development Patches, Glove, Access to Inkbox Trace App, and 
Easy-To-Understand Instructions.

name: Variety Pack, 36 Pack
description: The Variety Packs contains 36 packets of mix to create 36 delicious cocktails or mocktails, showcasing Craftmix's best selling flavors. Just add liquor (if you want), sparkling water, a packet of craftmix, pour over ice and you'll be instantly on vacation enjoying Blood Orange Mai Tai's, Mango Margarita's, Passionfruit Paloma's and Strawberry Mule's. Includes 36 total packets, 9 of each flavor.

name: Sterling Silver Birth Flower Pendant
description: Most of us know about our birthstone and our zodiac sign, but did you know you have a flower that corresponds to your birth month, too? These beautiful birth flower pendants are a gorgeous gift to celebrate your birth flower all year round.

name: Video Doorbell Wired
description: Answer the door from anywhere and stay connected 24/7 with this Ring small wired doorbell. It delivers 1080p HD video, two-way talk, advanced motion detection, real-time alerts sent straight to your phone. Filter out movement next door or on a busy street with adjustable motion settings so you'll only receive the alerts that matter.

name: Assorted Rice Krispie Treats 6-Pack
description: Assorted 6- pack of Treat House's delicious hand made crispy rice and marshmallow treats. Flavors include Cookies and Cream, Caramel Sea Salt, Birthday Cake, Chocolate Pretzel, and M&M. Contains Dairy, Nuts, Gluten.

name: Quad Chopper
description: Made with flexible, yet sturdy silicone that’s perfect on non-stick surfaces, this kitchen hero smashes, mashes, chops, and cooks all of your favorite meals to perfection. This powerhouse has two hard and two semi-soft fins for double the prep power with half the effort. Includes one quad chopper, choice of color.

name: Three Wishes Orchids
description: Big things start with three little wishes. Orchids are known to bring good wishes and luck, and this set of three eco-friendly, one-of-a-kind mini orchids are a stunning gift sure to brighten anyone's day! With just a little bit of care, these orchids can bloom for weeks or even months, providing long-lasting beauty and enjoyment. The Goody support team will reach out to you via text message to confirm your preferred delivery date.

name: 100% Mulberry Silk Pillowcase, King
description: Upgrade your beauty sleep with 100% mulberry silk. Sleeping on a silk pillowcase keeps your skin and hair hydrated, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and minimizes dreaded bed head. Plus, silk fiber contains 18 kinds of amino acids that make it amazing for skin nourishment, hypo-allergenic, and naturally thermoregulating to help maintain body temperature. Includes one king size silk pillowcase, crafted from washable 100% mulberry silk with a 22mm fabric weight.

name: Nest Pour Over Set
description: Making coffee outside just got a lot easier. The Nest Pour Over Set incorporates double-walled insulated stainless-steel construction with a food-grade polypropylene lid into a rugged, portable pour over coffee brewing system. Each component is designed to work together, intuitively, to deliver the simplest brewing experience you’ve ever had in camp. Dual threads enable the 3-piece Kit to nest as on compact, transportable unit. When disassembled, the Kit delivers one 10 oz double walled mug, one splashproof lid, and a double walled pour-over coffee device. It’s an integrated, compact system that’s perfect for overlanding or anywhere you want a great cup.

name: Sunday Sauce 10-piece Gift Set
description: Unforgettable meals make for unforgettable memories! Give the gift of unforgettable Carbone meals with this ultimate gift set that includes all the essentials for elevated at-home dining. This 10-piece collection comes with a Carbone Reusable Tote bag, to bring your essentials wherever needed, and includes Carbone pasta sauces (Marinara, Tomato Basil, Arrabbiata, and Roasted Garlic in 24oz Jars), DeCecco pastas (16oz box of Spaghetti and Penne), Graza Extra Virgin Olive Oil, and a Carbone wooden spoon. Bring the world-famous Carbone experience to your table with no reservations needed!

name: 4 Tins Mushroom Chocolates
description: Whether you need to refocus your morning with a burst of brain energy, or need to calm your mind at the end of a long day, Alice Mushroom Chocolate has the answer for you.
