Each bite of Alice is formulated to promote long-term benefits while also delivering an immediate boost to cognitive functions. The long term benefits come from the functional mushrooms. These substances are felt over time, not instantly. When incorporated into a daily routine, the nutrients compound in your body and become more effective (and noticeable) with sustained use. But we also know that nothing beats instant gratification. That’s why Alice combined mushrooms with the best nootropics and adaptogens. This union pairs the long-term benefits of mushrooms with the immediate effects of the nootropics, and keeps you on your journey into the delights of fungi. Each gift contains 8 bars for a total of 64 square doses.

name: BYO Lunch Bundle
description: Let's do lunch! The BYO Lunch Bundle includes the bento-inspired Porter Lunch Box to keep food crisp, fresh, and separate and the portable utensil set for the ultimate to-go meal. This bento-inspired, ultralight lunch container has a generous 1-liter capacity bowl with optional divider, removable tray to keep things separated, and a snap-strap seal for easy transport. The Porter Utensil Set is a compact set of stainless steel utensils means no more plastic utensils, and it comes in a silicone carrying case to help things stay clean.

name: Grow By Gifting Assorted Small Succulent Gift
description: This beautiful hand-picked succulent comes in a modern two-inch ceramic pot and is planted 24 hours before delivery in soil & rock.

name: Function101 BentoStack
description: The Bento Stack is a must-have desk accessory to keep tech products looking neat. With roomy compartment lids to help perfectly organize: charging cables, Apple watch bands, Airpods and more, plus it’s handy on the go and ideal for travel.

name: Butchers Cut Filet Mignon Dinner
description: This gift includes 4 Butcher's Cut Filet Mignons (6 oz.), 1 package Broccoli & Cauliflower Gratin (22 oz.), 4 Stuffed Baked Potatoes ( oz.) & 4 Caramel Apple Tartlets (4 oz.).

name: Luxe Sateen Core Sheet Set, Queen
description: Ideal for softness lovers and snuggle fans. Buttery smooth softness that gets better with every wash. These Luxe Sateen sheets start with the highest quality threads using 480 thread count long-staple cotton with a one-yarn-under and three-yarn over weave. This means more thread surface is exposed, giving the Luxe Sateen its signature silky-soft feel and luminous sheen. Sateen is more tightly woven, which means you get a warmer, incredibly soft sheet that's ideal for year-round comfort. This gift includes 1 Flat Sheet, 1 Fitted Sheet, and 2 Pillowcases.

name: Pretzel Dips Ultimate Sampler Pack
description: The Pretzel Dips Ultimate Sampler Pack is the perfect combination of flavor and crunch. Each Pack contains five tubes of Pretzels (Salted Honey Butter, Sea Salt Caramel, Buttered Cinnamon Sugar Twist, Cheddar, Salt and Vinegar) and two distinct Pretzel Dips flavors (Blueberry Bourbon Pecan and Pecan Honey Mustard), offering a variety of tastes that any consumer would love.

name: Kentucky Bourbon Trail® Map Rocks Glass, 2 Pack
description: Make it a (bourbon) whiskey with a pair of 11 oz Map Rocks Glasses etched with the route of the famous bourbon trail from Louisville to Lexington, Kentucky.  The perfect gift for the bourbon lover in your life.

name: The Sloan Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant is a natural air purifier that will make a great addition to your home or office! Snake plants have strong, sturdy, sword shaped leaves, which are drought tolerant and retain water. Pro tip: this plant can easily be propagated by leaf cuttings, so you can multiply your family of snake plants! 4" Gold planter included.

name: Ultimate Grill Set
description: Toadfish set out to design the best tools on the market for passionate backyard chefs. These tools were made with the highest quality stainless steel and balanced with soft-touch inlays to sit securely in the hand. The built-in spoon rests to keep your surfaces clean and your food sanitary.

name: Mini Mat
description: The Mini Mat is an all-in-one placemat + plate that suctions to the table. The mat’s stable base reduces tipped bowls and plates and helps infants and toddlers learn to self-feed.

name: Freshwater Pearl and Diamond Accent Drop Huggie Earring
description: A captivating masterpiece for those who seek elegance and sophistication. These exquisite pearl drop earrings feature a dazzling array of 12 round diamonds accented. The diamonds, sourced from nature, boast a brilliant H-I color and are set in a mesmerizing pave setting. The I1-I2 clarity adds a unique allure to these earrings. The lustrous white freshwater-cultured pearls, sourced from Chinese freshwater, are beautifully showcased in a cup setting. With a medium-luster and AAA+ grade, these 6.0mm round pearls exude timeless beauty.

name: Stainless Steel Cocktail Shaker and Martini Glass Set
description:
A classy addition to your barware assortment, you’ll be set to serve up cocktails for happy hour with these elegant insulated stainless-steel martini glasses and shaker. Cocktails stay ice cold from start to finish and the leak proof and sweat free shaker design keeps hands and countertops dry. Insulated stainless steel cocktail shaker includes built in strainer and jigger measure.  The stainless steel 8 oz martini glasses have thin 1mm rims for a better drinking experience .  
 
 Insulated stainless steel cocktail shaker includes built in strainer and jigger measure 
 
 
 4 stainless steel 8 oz martini glasses have thin 1mm rims for a better drinking experience 
 
 Ice stays ice and drinks stay cold to the last sip

name: $50 Anise Health Gift Card
description: Culture is built into every step of your end-to-end mental health journey with Anise. This includes tailored clinical assessments that accurately diagnose your intersectional needs, cultural sensitivity training for all clinicians to deliver high-quality care to you, and personalized treatment plans that support your mental wellbeing holistically. By joining the Anise Health community, you’ll get exclusive access to a care team consisting of both a therapist AND a coach, 4 weekly telehealth appointments, and a content library of digital resources that address unique cultural stressors, such as bicultural tension, perfectionism, shame, guilt, emotional suppression, and more. Gift card will be emailed to the email address you provide upon acceptance.

name: JAVA Coffee Grinder
description: JAVA is the ultimate manual coffee grinder that makes every morning more enjoyable. VSSL developed a uniquely integrated dual purpose extendable grinder handle, allowing for a smooth and effortless rotation allowing for a precise grind. The magnetic handle attachment and pop-off top make it easy to load your beans, and the stainlesssteel bearings ensure a consistent grind size every time without the “wobble” inferior grinders produce. In under a minute, JAVA can produce 20 grams of grinds, just right for one cup of tasty coffee. When the extendable handle is not deployed, it locks into a carabiner position for a compact and secure carry solution. Say hello to a better morning with JAVA.

name: Quick Wipes, 30 Pack
description: The original dual-textured cleaning wipe ..but bigger and better! Jason Markk has taken their iconic Quick Wipe and optimized on formula and function to deliver an even more superior clean on the go. Conveniently sized and individually packaged for you to keep a Quick Wipe in your pocket, purse, gym bag you never know when you might need one! 30 wipes per box.

name: 100% Mineral SPF Starter Kit
description: A trio of 100% mineral SPF favorites for face and body, featuring nourishing skincare ingredients optimized for sensitive skin. This gift includes Mineral Mattescreen SPF 40 (0.5 fl. oz.), PLAY 100% Mineral Lotion SPF 30 (1 fl. oz.), and Mineral Sheerscreen SPF 30 (0.5 fl. oz.).

name: Peugeot Salt & Pepper Mills
description: This set of salt and pepper mills is made by the iconic Peugeot, a 210-year-old French heritage brand known for its superior craftsmanship. They stand four inches tall and fit perfectly in the palm of your hand. The adjustable precision grind makes them as functional as they are charming, plus you can pretend your home kitchen is a Parisian bistro! Includes one salt mill and one pepper mill, each measuring 4" tall.

name: Digital Gift Card, $150
description: A gift card to treat yourself for a facial + gratuity! A Heyday digital gift card will be delivered by email within 24 hours with instructions to redeem at checkout. Please Note: Gift cards do not expire and can be redeemed online or at any Heyday location for products and services.

name: Sweet July Candle Trio
description: Experience all three of the Sweet July candle scents without having to choose. The trio of candles allows you to enjoy the different moods that each scent can bring into your space. Each candle is 3 x 9 oz / 255 g. The 3 fragrances include the Signature Scent, Sweet Mornings, and Sweet Dreams. Hand-poured in San Francisco, these candles are vegan, and cruelty free. Each features a wick made of pure, braided cotton and is made using premium, soap grade fragrance.
